tika-vin06t:16: Saññā nimittaṃ kattā ca, parimāṇaṃ payojanaṃ;
tika-vin06t:18_0: Vacanato samantapāsādiketi saññā. Dīpantare bhikkhujanassa atthaṃ nābhisambhuṇātīti
tika-vin06t:18_1: nimittaṃ. Buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyenāti kattā. Samadhikasattavīsatisahassamattena
tika-vin06t:18_2: tassa ganthenāti parimāṇaṃ. Ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ dhammassāti payojanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:19: Tatrāha – “vattabbaṃ vattumicchatāti yaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha kathaṃvidho vattā”ti? Uccate –
tika-vin06t:22_0: Tatra paṭhīyateti pāṭho. So hi anekappakāro atthānurūpo atthānanurūpo ceti. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:22_1: Sandhāyabhāsito byañjanabhāsito sāvasesapāṭho niravasesapāṭho nīto neyyoti. Tatra
tika-vin06t:22_2: anekatthavattā sandhāyabhāsito nāma “mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā”tiādi. Ekatthavattā byañjanabhāsito
tika-vin06t:22_3: nāma “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”tyādi. Sāvaseso nāma “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, āditta”mityādi.
tika-vin06t:22_4: Viparīto niravaseso nāma “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe
tika-vin06t:22_5: āpāthaṃ āgacchantī”tyādi. Yathā vacanaṃ, tathā avagantabbo nīto nāma “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”tyādi.
tika-vin06t:23_0: Atthopi anekappakāro pāṭhattho sabhāvattho ñeyyattho pāṭhānurūpo pāṭhānanurūpo sāvasesattho
tika-vin06t:23_1: niravasesattho nītattho neyyatthotyādi. Tattha yo taṃtaṃsaññāpanatthamuccārīyate
tika-vin06t:23_2: pāṭho, sa pāṭhattho “sātthaṃ sabyañjana”mityādīsu viya. Rūpārūpadhammānaṃ lakkhaṇarasādi
tika-vin06t:23_3: sabhāvattho “sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāvetī”tyādīsu viya. Yo ñāyamāno hitāya bhavati, sa ñātumarahattā
tika-vin06t:23_4: ñeyyattho “atthavādī dhammavādī”tyevamādīsu viya. Yathāpāṭhaṃ bhāsito pāṭhānurūpo
tika-vin06t:23_5: “cakkhu, bhikkhave, purāṇakamma”nti bhagavatā vuttamato cakkhumapi kammanti. Byañjanacchāyāya
tika-vin06t:23_6: atthaṃ paṭibāhayamānena vutto pāṭhānanurūpo. Vajjetabbaṃ kiñci apariccajitvā parisesaṃ
tika-vin06t:23_7: katvā vutto sāvasesattho “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjatī”ti ca, “sabbe tasanti
tika-vin06t:23_8: daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno”tyādīsu viya. Viparīto niravasesattho “sandhāvitaṃ
tika-vin06t:23_9: saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca. Tatra, bhikkhave, ko mantā ko saddhātā…pe… aññatra
tika-vin06t:23_10: diṭṭhapadehī”tyādi. Saddavaseneva vedanīyo nītattho “rūpā saddā rasā gandhā, phoṭṭhabbā
tika-vin06t:23_11: ca manoramā”tyādīsu viya. Sammutivasena veditabbo neyyattho “cattārome, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:24: “Yo attho saddato ñeyyo, nītatthaṃ iti taṃ vidū;
tika-vin06t:26_0: Evaṃ pabhedagate pāṭhatthe vijānātīti pāṭhatthavidū. Na saṃhīrate parapavādīhi dīgharattaṃ
tika-vin06t:26_1: titthavāsenetyasaṃhīro. Bhāvanāyāgamādhigamasampannattā vattuṃ sakkotīti vattā, saṅkhepavitthāranayena
tika-vin06t:26_2: hetudāharaṇādīhi avabodhayituṃ samatthotyattho. Socayatyattānaṃ pare ceti suci, dussīlyaduddiṭṭhimalavirahitotyattho.
tika-vin06t:26_3: Dussīlo hi attānamupahantunādeyyavāco ca bhavatyapattāhārācāro iva niccāturo vejjo.
tika-vin06t:26_4: Duddiṭṭhi paraṃ upahanti, nāvassaṃ nissayo ca bhavatyahivāḷagahākulo iva kamalasaṇḍo.
tika-vin06t:26_5: Ubhayavipanno sabbathāpyanupāsanīyo bhavati gūthagatamiva chavālātaṃ gūthagato viya
tika-vin06t:26_6: ca kaṇhasappo. Ubhayasampanno pana suci sabbathāpyupāsanīyo sevitabbo ca viññūhi,
tika-vin06t:26_7: nirupaddavo iva ratanākaro. Nāssa maccharotyamaccharo, ahīnācariyamuṭṭhītyattho.
tika-vin06t:29_0: Evaṃ vuttacatukkassa vā apariccāgī; Hitussuko iti sotūnaṃ hitāyossuko, tesamavabodhanaṃ
tika-vin06t:29_1: pati patthetī tyattho; So eso sucittā piyo; Catukkassa apariccāgittā garu; Asaṃhīrattā
tika-vin06t:29_2: bhāvanīyo; Desakattā vattā; Hitussukattā vacanakkhamo; Pāṭhatthaviduttā gambhīrakathaṃ
tika-vin06t:31: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako”. –
tika-vin06t:36_0: Tattha dhammagaruttā kathaṃ na paribhavati, ācariyagaruttā kathikaṃ na paribhavati,
tika-vin06t:36_1: saddhāpaññādiguṇapaṭimaṇḍitattā attānaṃ na paribhavati, asaṭhāmāyattā amatābhimukhattā
tika-vin06t:36_2: ca avikkhittacitto bhavati, sumedhattā yonisomanasikarotītyattho. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin06t:37_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṃ bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ
tika-vin06t:37_1: kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ. Katamehi pañcahi? Na kathaṃ paribhoti, na kathikaṃ paribhoti,
tika-vin06t:37_2: na attānaṃ paribhoti, avikkhittacitto dhammaṃ suṇāti ekaggacitto, yoniso ca manasi karotī”ti.
tika-vin06t:40_0: Idāni assārambho – tattha yoti aniyamaniddeso, tena visuddhajātikulagottādīnaṃ kilesamalavisuddhiyā,
tika-vin06t:40_1: pūjārahatāya vā akāraṇataṃ dassetvā yo koci imissā samantapāsādikāya ādigāthāya niddiṭṭhalokanāthattahetuṃ
tika-vin06t:40_2: yathāvuttahetumūlena thirataraṃ acalaṃ katvā yathāvuttahetukālaṃ accantameva pūrento
tika-vin06t:40_3: avasāne yathāvuttahetuphalaṃ sampādetvā yathāvuttahetuphalappayojanaṃ sādheti, sova
tika-vin06t:44_0: Tatra hetūti atidukkarāni tiṃsapāramitāsaṅkhātāni puññakammāni. Tāni hi accantadukkhena
tika-vin06t:44_1: kasirena vacanapathātītānubhāvena mahatā ussāhena karīyantīti atidukkarāni nāma.
tika-vin06t:44_2: Atidukkarattā eva hi tesaṃ atidullabhaṃ loke anaññasādhāraṇaṃ nāthattasaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ
tika-vin06t:44_3: phalanti, taṃ tattha hetuphalaṃ; hetumūlaṃ nāma yathāvuttassa hetuno nipphādanasamatthā
tika-vin06t:44_4: mahākaruṇā, sā ādipaṇidhānato paṭṭhāya “mutto mocessāmī”tiādinā nayena yāva hetuphalappayojanā,
tika-vin06t:44_5: tāva abbocchinnaṃ pavattati. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
tika-vin06t:49_0: Yāya samannāgatattā “namo mahākāruṇikassa tassā”ti āha. Hetukālaṃ nāma catuaṭṭhasoḷasaasaṅkhyeyyādippabhedo
tika-vin06t:49_1: kālo, yaṃ sandhāyāha “kappakoṭīhipi appameyyaṃ kāla”nti. Tattha accantasaṃyogatthe
tika-vin06t:49_2: upayogavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ “māsaṃ adhīte, divasaṃ caratī”tiādīsu viya. Kāmañca so
tika-vin06t:49_3: kālo asaṅkhyeyyavasena pameyyo viññeyyo, tathāpi kappakoṭivasena aviññeyyataṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:49_4: “kappakoṭīhipi appameyyaṃ kāla”nti āha. Tattha kālayatīti kālo, khipati viddhaṃsayati
tika-vin06t:49_5: sattānaṃ jīvitamiti attho. Kala vikkhepe. Tattha kappīyati saṃkappīyati sāsapapabbatādīhi
tika-vin06t:49_6: upamāhi kevalaṃ saṃkappīyati, na manussadivasamāsasaṃvaccharādigaṇanāya gaṇīyatīti
tika-vin06t:49_7: kappo. Ekantiādigaṇanapathassa koṭibhūtattā koṭi, kappānaṃ koṭiyo kappakoṭiyo. Tāhipi
tika-vin06t:49_8: na pamīyatīti appameyyo, taṃ appameyyaṃ. Karontoti nānatthattā dhātūnaṃ dānaṃ dento,
tika-vin06t:49_9: sīlaṃ rakkhanto, lobhakkhandhato nikkhamanto, attahitaparahitādibhedaṃ taṃ taṃ dhammaṃ
tika-vin06t:49_10: pajānanto, vividhena vāyāmena ghaṭento vāyamanto, taṃ taṃ sattāparādhaṃ khamanto,
tika-vin06t:49_11: paṭiññāsammutiparamatthasaccāni saccāyanto, taṃ taṃ sattahitaṃ adhiṭṭhahanto, sakalalokaṃ
tika-vin06t:49_12: mettāyanto, mittāmittādibhedaṃ pakkhapātaṃ pahāya taṃ taṃ sattaṃ ajjhupekkhanto cāti
tika-vin06t:49_13: attho. Khedaṃ gatoti anantappabhedaṃ mahantaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ anubhavanaṭṭhena gato,
tika-vin06t:49_14: sampattotyattho. Saṃsāradukkhañhi sārīrikaṃ mānasikañca sukhaṃ khedayati pātayatīti
tika-vin06t:52_0: Ca vutta”nti, tamayuttaṃ. Na hi bhagavā lokahitāya saṃsāradukkhamanubhavati. Na hi
tika-vin06t:52_1: kassaci dukkhānubhavanaṃ lokassa upakāraṃ āvahati. Evaṃ panetaṃ dasseti tiṃsapāramitāpabhedaṃ
tika-vin06t:52_2: hetuṃ, pāramitāphalabhūtaṃ nāthattasaṅkhātaṃ phalañca. Yathā cāha “mamañhi, ānanda,
tika-vin06t:52_3: kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccantī”tiādi. Tattha bhagavā yathāvuttahetūhi
tika-vin06t:52_5: parinipphannavineyyabhāve satte vinayi, saṃsāradukkhato mocayīti attho. Na evaṃ saṃsāradukkhena
tika-vin06t:52_6: lokassa upakāraṃ kiñci akāsi, tasmā karonto atidukkarāni lokahitāyāti sambandho.
tika-vin06t:52_7: Imissā yojanāya sabbapaṭhamassa bodhisattassa uppattikālato paṭṭhāya bodhisattassa
tika-vin06t:52_8: nāthattasaṅkhātapāramitāhetuphalādhigamo veditabbo. Yo nāthoti hi sambandho adhippeto.
tika-vin06t:55_0: Iti vacanaṃ sādhakaṃ. Paṭhamacittassa pāramitābhāvo rukkhassa aṅkurato paṭṭhāya uppattiupamāya
tika-vin06t:55_1: sādhetabbo. Etthāha – “khedaṃ gatoti vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ, yathāvuttanayena guṇasādhanāsambhavato”ti?
tika-vin06t:55_2: Na, antarā anivattanakabhāvadīpanato. Dukkarāni karonto khedaṃ gato eva, na antarā
tika-vin06t:55_3: khedaṃ asahanto nivattatīti dīpeti. Lokadukkhāpanayanakāmassa vā bhagavato attano
tika-vin06t:58_0: Evaṃadhippāyassa attamattadukkhānubhavanasamatthatāya kāyeva kathāti atisayaṃ atthaṃ
tika-vin06t:58_1: dassetīti attho. Atha vā khedaṃ gatoti byāpāraṃ paricayaṃ gatotipi attho sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:58_2: Kammādīsu sabyāpāraṃ purisaṃ disvā santi hi loke vattāro “khinnoyaṃ kamme, khinnoyaṃ
tika-vin06t:58_3: satte”tiādi. Imissā yojanāya nāthoti iminā buddhattādhigamasiddhaṃ koṭippattaṃ nāthabhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:58_4: patvā ṭhitakālo dassitoti veditabbo. Keci “mahākāruṇikassāti vadanto buddhabhūtassāti
tika-vin06t:58_5: dassetī”ti likhanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ viya, bodhisattakālepi tabbohārasabbhāvato.
tika-vin06t:58_6: Tasmā so ettakaṃ kālaṃ dukkarāni karonto avasāne dukkarapāramitāpāripūriyā tāsaṃ
tika-vin06t:58_7: phalabhūtaṃ nāthabhāvaṃ patvā lokahitāya byāpāraṃ gatoti ayamattho nidassito hoti.
tika-vin06t:58_8: “Bodhiṃ gato”ti vuttepi subyattaṃ hetuphalaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Buddhabhāvappattasseva
tika-vin06t:58_9: ca nāthassa namo kato hoti visesavacanasabbhāvato, na bodhisattassa. Evaṃ santepi
tika-vin06t:58_10: vinayādhikāro idhādhippeto. So ca pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya yāvamaraṇakālā hoti. Taṃ
tika-vin06t:58_11: ativiya parittaṃ kālaṃ lajjino atisukaraṃ sīlamattaṃ ekakassa attano hitāya attamattadukkhāpanayanādhippāyena
tika-vin06t:58_12: paripūrento ko nāma idhalokaparalokātikkamasukhaṃ na gaccheyya, nanu bhagavā sakalalokadukkhāpanayanādhippāyena
tika-vin06t:58_13: kappakoṭīhipi appameyyaṃ kālaṃ karonto atidukkaranirassādaṃ khedaṃ gatoti aññāpadesena
tika-vin06t:59_0: Lokahitāyāti ettha lokiyati ettha dukkhanti loko, luyate vā jātijarāmaraṇadukkhehīti
tika-vin06t:59_1: loko, iminā sattalokaṃ jātilokañca saṅgaṇhāti. Tasmā tassa sattalokassa idhalokaparalokahitaṃ
tika-vin06t:59_2: atikkantaparalokānaṃ vā ucchinnalokasamudayānaṃ lokānaṃ, idha jātiloke okāsaloke
tika-vin06t:59_3: vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārasaṅkhātañca hitaṃ sampiṇḍetvā lokassa, lokānaṃ, loke vā
tika-vin06t:59_5: “dhammaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi…pe… taṃ suṇāthā”ti evaṃ yācanaṭṭhenāpi nāthateti
tika-vin06t:59_7: ca karuṇāya upagantvā tapati, suttantavasena vā tesaṃ sabbasattānaṃ anusayite kilese
tika-vin06t:59_8: karuṇāya ca paññāya ca upagantvā tapati, abhidhammavasena vā te te saṅkhāre aniccādilakkhaṇavasena
tika-vin06t:59_9: upaparikkhitvā attano kilese paññāya upecca paricchinditvā tapatīti tapanaṭṭhenāpi
tika-vin06t:59_10: nāthateti nātho. Sadevake loke appaṭipuggalattā kenaci appaṭihatadhammadesanattā
tika-vin06t:59_11: paramacittissariyappavattito ca issariyaṭṭhenāpi nāthateti nātho. “Dhammiyā kathāya
tika-vin06t:59_12: sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesī”ti vacanato sampahaṃsanasaṅkhātena
tika-vin06t:59_13: āsīsaṭṭhena, paṇidhānato paṭṭhāya “kathaṃ nāmāhaṃ mutto mocayissāmī”tiādinā nayena
tika-vin06t:59_14: āsīsaṭṭhena vā nāthateti nāthoti veditabbo, sammāsambuddho. Catūhipi nāthaṅgehi catuvesārajjacatupaṭisambhidādayo
tika-vin06t:59_15: sabbepi buddhaguṇā yojetabbā, ativitthārikabhayā pana na yojitā.
tika-vin06t:60_0: Namoti paramatthato buddhaguṇabahumānapabbhārā cittanati, cittanatippabhavā ca vacīkāyanati.
tika-vin06t:60_1: Atthu meti pāṭhasesena sambandho. Mahākāruṇikassāti ettha sabbasattavisayattā mahussāhappabhavattā
tika-vin06t:60_2: ca mahatī karuṇā mahākaruṇā. Tattha paṇidhānato paṭṭhāya yāvaanupādisesanibbānapurappavesā
tika-vin06t:60_3: niyuttoti mahākāruṇiko, bhagavā. Ettha ca mahākāruṇikassāti iminā yathāvuttahetumūlaṃ
tika-vin06t:60_4: dasseti. Nikkaruṇo hi paradukkhesu udāsino buddhatthāya paṇidhānamattampi atibhāriyanti
tika-vin06t:60_5: maññanto appameyyaṃ kālaṃ atidukkaraṃ hetuṃ pūretvā nāthattasaṅkhātaṃ hetuphalappayojanabhūtaṃ
tika-vin06t:60_6: lokahitaṃ kathaṃ karissati. Tasmā sabbaguṇamūlabhūtattā mahākaruṇāguṇameva vaṇṇento
tika-vin06t:60_7: “namo mahākāruṇikassā”ti āha. Ettāvatā hetuanurūpaṃ phalaṃ, phalānurūpo hetu, dvinnampi
tika-vin06t:60_8: anurūpaṃ mūlaṃ, tiṇṇampi anurūpaṃ payojananti ayamattho dassito hoti.
tika-vin06t:63: Ettha siyā “anekesu bhagavato guṇesu vijjamānesu kasmā ‘mahākāruṇikassā’ti ekameva gahita”nti? Uccate –
tika-vin06t:64: Dosahīnassa satthassa, codanā tu na vijjate;
tika-vin06t:66: Na mayā codanā katā, kintu pucchā eva katā. Apica –
tika-vin06t:74: Sammāpi codanā taṃ khalu, guravo vivākyā vivaddha;
tika-vin06t:79: Yassa hi vākyasahassaṃ, vākye vākye satañca jivhā;
tika-vin06t:80: Nāmaṃ dasabalaguṇapadesaṃ, vattuṃ kappenapi na sakkā.
tika-vin06t:88: Yathā tvaṃ sattānaṃ, dasabala tathā ñāṇakaruṇā;
tika-vin06t:89: Guṇadvandaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, tava guṇagaṇā nāma tiguṇāti. –
tika-vin06t:90_0: Sabbaguṇaseṭṭhattā mūlattā ca ekameva vuttaṃ. Atha vā “chasu asādhāraṇañāṇesu aññatarattā
tika-vin06t:90_1: taggahaṇena sesāpi gahitāva sahacaraṇalakkhaṇenā”ti ca vadanti. Visesato panettha
tika-vin06t:90_3: viya sattesu, paññā yassa mahesino”ti paññāguṇo vaṇṇito tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āsayānusayacaayādhimuttibhedānurūpaparicchindanapaññāya,
tika-vin06t:90_5: paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti bhagavato ubhopi paññākaruṇāguṇā vaṇṇitā. Idha pana
tika-vin06t:90_6: vinaye āsayādinirapekkhaṃ kevalaṃ karuṇāya pākatikasattenāpi asotabbārahaṃ suṇanto,
tika-vin06t:90_7: apucchitabbārahaṃ pucchanto, avattabbārahañca vadanto sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesīti karuṇāguṇoyeveko
tika-vin06t:99_0: Dutiyagāthāya asambudhanti dhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvaṃ abujjhanto. Buddhanisevitanti
tika-vin06t:99_1: buddhānubuddhapaccekabuddhehi gocarabhāvanāsevanāhi yathārahaṃ nisevitaṃ. Bhavā bhavanti
tika-vin06t:99_2: vattamānabhavato aññaṃ bhavaṃ gacchati upagacchati, paṭipajjatīti attho. Atha vā
tika-vin06t:99_3: bhavoti sassatadiṭṭhi. Tassa paṭipakkhattā abhavoti ucchedadiṭṭhi. Bhavoti vā vuddhi.
tika-vin06t:99_4: Abhavoti hāni. Bhavoti vā duggati. Abhavoti sugati. “Appamāṇā dhammā, asekkhā dhammā”tiādīsu
tika-vin06t:99_5: viya hi vuddhiatthattā akārassa. Bhāvayatīti bhavo, jāti. Bhavatīti vā bhavo. Savikārā
tika-vin06t:99_6: bahuvidhakhandhuppatti dīpitā. Abhavoti vināso, jātibhāvaṃ maraṇabhāvañca gacchatīti
tika-vin06t:99_7: vuttaṃ hoti. Ettha arahantānaṃ maraṇampi khaṇikavasena gahetabbaṃ. Bhavesu abhavo
tika-vin06t:99_8: bhavābhavo, taṃ bhavābhavaṃ, bhavesu abhāvapaññattiṃ gacchatīti attho. Jīvalokoti
tika-vin06t:99_10: viseseti. Avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsinoti ettha navapi lokuttaradhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin06t:99_11: Apacayagāmitā hi catumaggadhammassa odhiso avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃso, so assa atthi,
tika-vin06t:99_12: tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā tattha sahāyabhāvūpagamanena nibbānassāpi. Yathāha “yo kho, āvuso,
tika-vin06t:99_13: rāgakkhayo…pe… idaṃ vuccati nibbāna”nti. Arahattassāpi tathā rāgādikkhayavacanasabbhāvato.
tika-vin06t:99_15: vuccati. Atha vā sahacaraṇalakkhaṇakaāraṇatāya paṭipakkhagocaraggahaṇatā. Anabhihitopi
tika-vin06t:99_16: hi dhammassa tatrābhihitova bujjhitabbo iti vacanato kāraṇagocaraggahaṇena cattāripi
tika-vin06t:99_17: phalāni gahitāni. Narakādīsu apatamānaṃ dhāreti sugatiyaṃ uppādanenāti dhammo. Puna
tika-vin06t:99_18: sugatimhi ajananakārī akusaladhamme nivāretvā poseti pavatteti vaḍḍhetīti dhammo.
tika-vin06t:99_19: So pana kāmarūpārūpabhedato tividho accantasukhāvahanato, tatopi uttamattā dhammavaro.
tika-vin06t:100_0: Etthāha – “catunnaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasaccānaṃ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:100_1: sandhāvitaṃ saṃsarita’nti vacanato catusaccadhammaṃ asambudhaṃ bhavā bhavaṃ gacchati
tika-vin06t:100_2: jīvalokoti siddhaṃ. Tasmā yaṃ asambudhaṃ gacchati, tasseva “tassā”ti ante taṃniddesena
tika-vin06t:100_4: Aññathā “namo avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsino dhammavarassa tassā”ti taṃniddesena samānavibhattikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:100_6: vacanaṃ visesanavacanaṃ. Tasmā dukkhasamudayasaccānaṃ tabbhāvappasaṅgo natthīti ce?
tika-vin06t:100_7: Na, taṃniddesena samānavibhattiṭṭhāne avisesitattā. Api ca maggasaccanirodhasaccesu
tika-vin06t:100_8: phalānaṃ apariyāpannattā nava lokuttaradhammā saṅgahitāti vacanavirodho, phalānaṃ
tika-vin06t:100_9: asaṅgahe verañjakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ na kevalaṃ ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañca, api ca ariyaphaladhammehi
tika-vin06t:100_11: vacanavirodho cāti pubbāparaviruddhā esā gāthā sāsanaviruddhā cā”ti? Vuccate – sabbametamayuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:100_12: vuttagāthatthājānanato. Ettha hi ācariyena pavattipavattihetuvisayavibhāgo ca dassito.
tika-vin06t:100_13: Kathaṃ? Tattha asambudhanti asambodho, so atthato avijjā, tāya ca taṇhupādānāni gahitāni,
tika-vin06t:100_14: tayopi te dhammā samudayasaccaṃ, bhavābhavanti ettha dukkhasaccaṃ vuttaṃ. Sugatiduggatippabhedo
tika-vin06t:100_15: hi bhavo atthato pañcupādānakkhandhā honti. “Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa
tika-vin06t:100_16: samudayo hotī”ti vacanato dukkhappavatti pavatti nāma, dukkhasamudayo pavattihetu
tika-vin06t:100_17: nāma, avijjāsaṅkhātassa ca pavattihetussa aggahitaggahaṇena nirodhamaggasaccadvayaṃ
tika-vin06t:100_18: visayo nāma. Vuttañhetaṃ “tattha katamā avijjā? Dukkhe aññāṇaṃ…pe… dukkhanirodhagāminiyā
tika-vin06t:101_0: Ettha ca nirodhasaccaṃ buddhena gocarāsevanāya āsevitaṃ, maggasaccaṃ bhāvanāsevanāya.
tika-vin06t:101_1: Ettāvatā asambudhaṃ buddhanisevitaṃ yanti upayogappatto yo visayo nirodho ca maggo
tika-vin06t:101_2: ca, tassa yathāvuttāvijjādikilesajālattayaviddhaṃsino namo dhammavarassāti ayaṃ gāthāya
tika-vin06t:101_5: sati rāgavirāgāti gāthattho, so dhammaṃ deseti…pe… brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti suttattho
tika-vin06t:101_6: ca asesato gahito hoti. Atha vā imāya gāthāya kevalaṃ pariyattidhammova gahito hoti,
tika-vin06t:101_7: yaṃ sandhāyāha “so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ…pe… brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetī”ti, tampi
tika-vin06t:101_8: asambudhaṃ buddheheva nisevitaṃ gocarāsevanāya anaññanisevitaṃ. Yathāha “bhagavaṃmūlakā
tika-vin06t:101_9: no, bhante, dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā…pe… bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
tika-vin06t:102_0: Tatiyagāthāya sīlādayo kiñcāpi lokiyalokuttarā yathāsambhavaṃ labbhanti, tathāpi
tika-vin06t:102_1: ante “ariyasaṅgha”nti vacanato sīlādayo cattāro dhammakkhandhā lokuttarāva. Ettha
tika-vin06t:102_3: “vimuttiñāṇappabhutīhī”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca kiñcāpi vimuttīti phaladhammāva sutte
tika-vin06t:102_4: adhippetā, tathāpi “maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhati. Pahīne kilese paccavekkhati.
tika-vin06t:102_5: Phalaṃ paccavekkhati. Nibbānaṃ paccavekkhatī”ti vacanato maggādipaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:102_6: vimuttiñāṇanti veditabbaṃ. Vimutti vimokkho khayoti hi atthato ekaṃ. “Khaye ñāṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:102_7: anuppāde ñāṇanti ettha khayo nāma maggo, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayoti phalanibbānānaṃ
tika-vin06t:102_8: adhivacana”nti sutte āgatameva. Pahīnakilesānaṃ khayo pākatiko khayo eva. Pabhuti-saddena
tika-vin06t:102_9: tisso vijjā cha abhiññā catasso paṭisambhidāti evamādayo guṇā saṅgahitā. Samannāgamaṭṭhena
tika-vin06t:102_10: aparihīnaṭṭhena ca yutto. Khettaṃ janānaṃ kusalatthikānanti “anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ
tika-vin06t:102_11: lokassā”ti suttato kusalassa viruhanaṭṭhānattā, suttantanayena upanissayapaccayattā
tika-vin06t:102_12: ca kāmaṃ kusalassa khettaṃ hoti saṅgho, na kusalatthikānaṃ janānaṃ. Tasmā na yujjatīti
tika-vin06t:102_13: ce? Na, suttatthasambhavato. Sutte “anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:102_14: Kassa lokassa? Puññatthikassa khettaṃ saṅgho, puññupanissayattā puññakkhettaṃ hoti
tika-vin06t:102_15: saṅgho, kusalatthikānanti ca vuccanti. Lokepi hi devadattassa khettaṃ yaññadattassa
tika-vin06t:102_16: khettaṃ sāliyavupanissayattā sālikhettaṃ yavakhettanti ca vuccati. Ariyasaṅghanti
tika-vin06t:102_17: vigatakilesattā ariyaṃ parisuddhaṃ ariyānaṃ, ariyabhāvaṃ vā pattaṃ sīladiṭṭhisāmaññena
tika-vin06t:102_18: saṅghatattā saṅghaṃ. “Ariya-saddena sammutisaṅghaṃ nivāretī”ti keci likhanti, taṃ
tika-vin06t:102_19: na sundaraṃ vimuttiñāṇaguṇaggahaṇena visesitattā. Sirasāti iminā kāmaṃ kāyanatiṃ
tika-vin06t:102_20: dasseti, tathāpi uttamasaṅghe guṇagāravena uttamaṅgameva niddisanto “sirasā namāmī”tyāha.
tika-vin06t:102_21: Sirassa pana uttamatā uttamānaṃ cakkhusotindriyānaṃ nissayattā, tesaṃ uttamatā ca
tika-vin06t:105_0: Evamavatvā kasmā ratanattayapaṇāmaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttanti? Vuccate – satācārattā. Ācāro
tika-vin06t:105_1: kiresa sappurisānaṃ, yadidaṃ saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapūjāvidhānaṃ. Tasmā “satācārato
tika-vin06t:105_2: bhaṭṭhā mā mayaṃ homā”ti karīyati, catugambhīrabhāvayuttañca vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmassa
tika-vin06t:105_3: mahāsamuddaṃ ogāhantassa viya paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatassāpi mahantaṃ bhayaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:105_5: “evaṃ buddhaṃ sarantāna”ntiādi. Apicācariyo satthupūjāvidhānena asatthari satthābhinivesassa
tika-vin06t:105_6: lokassa yathābhūtaṃ satthari eva sammāsambuddhe satthusambhāvanaṃ uppādeti, asatthari
tika-vin06t:105_8: vuttadosaṃ pariharati. Antarāyabahulattā khandhasantatiyā vippakatāya vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāya
tika-vin06t:105_10: vaṇṇo sukhaṃ bala”nti vuttānisaṃse yāva saṃvaṇṇanāpariyosānā pattheti. Api cettha
tika-vin06t:105_12: paṭipajjantānaṃ ussāhaṃ janeti. Lokiyalokuttarabhedassa, lokuttarasseva vā saddhammassa
tika-vin06t:105_14: janeti. Saddhammapaṭivedhamattābhilāsino hi te. Paramatthasaṅghapūjāvidhānaṃ paramatthasaṅghabhāvādhigamatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:105_15: sāvakayānaṃ paṭipajjantānaṃ ussāhaṃ janeti, maṅgalādīni vā sātthāni anantarāyāni
tika-vin06t:105_16: ciraṭṭhitikāni bahumatāni ca bhavantīti evaṃladdhikānaṃ cittaparitosanatthaṃ “pūjā
tika-vin06t:105_17: ca pūjaneyyāna”nti bhagavatā pasatthamaṅgalaṃ karoti. Vuccate ca –
tika-vin06t:106: “Maṅgalaṃ bhagavā buddho, dhammo saṅgho ca maṅgalaṃ;
tika-vin06t:110: Ettha ca satthupadhānattā dhammasaṅghānaṃ pūjāvidhānaṃ satthupūjāvidhānamicceva daṭṭhabbaṃ sāsanato lokato ca. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
tika-vin06t:114: Saṅgho ca vutto yamato sa satthā.
tika-vin06t:116: Dhammakāyo yato satthā, dhammo satthā tato mato;
tika-vin06t:117: Dhammaṭṭhito so saṅgho ca, satthusaṅkhyaṃ nigacchati.
tika-vin06t:118: Santi hi loke vattāro kosagataṃ asiṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ visuṃ aparāmasitvā “asiṃ gahetvā ṭhito eso”ti. Tenevāha cāriyamātraccevā –
tika-vin06t:121_1: “buddho”ti yadi paññāpiyati, dhammo paṇāmārahoti kā eva kathā, saṅgho ca “saṅghe
tika-vin06t:121_2: gotami dehi, saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā”ti vuttattā bhājananti
tika-vin06t:121_3: dīpeti. Atha vā “buddhasubodhito dhammo ācariyaparamparāya suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittatelamiva
tika-vin06t:121_4: aparihāpetvā yāvajjatanā ābhatattā eva mādisānampi sotadvāramanuppatto”ti saṅghassa
tika-vin06t:121_5: ācariyo atīva ādarena paṇāmaṃ karoti “sirasā namāmī”ti.
tika-vin06t:122_0: Evaṃ anekavidhaṃ paṇāmappayojanaṃ vadanti, ācariyena pana adhippetappayojanaṃ attanā
tika-vin06t:122_2: iti-saddo ratanattayapūjāvidhānaparisamattattho. Yadi evaṃ yathāvihitamattameva pūjāvidhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:122_3: arahati ratanattayaṃ, na tato uddhanti āpajjatīti aniṭṭhappasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ “evamaccantanamassaneyya”nti
tika-vin06t:122_4: āha. Tattha evanti iminā yathāvuttavidhiṃ dasseti. Yathāvuttena vidhinā, aññena vā
tika-vin06t:122_5: tādisena accantameva muhuttamapi aṭṭhatvā abhikkhaṇaṃ nirantaraṃ niyamena namassanārahaṃ
tika-vin06t:122_6: namassamānassa hitamahapphalakaraṇatoti attho. Evaṃvidhaṃ dullabhaṭṭhena mahapphalaṭṭhena
tika-vin06t:122_7: ca siddhaṃ ratanabhāvaṃ ratanattayaṃ namassamāno yaṃ puññābhisandaṃ alatthaṃ alabhiṃ.
tika-vin06t:122_8: Akusalamalaṃ tadaṅgādippahānena punātīti puññaṃ. Kilesadarathappaṭippassaddhiyā sītalattā
tika-vin06t:122_9: cittaṃ abhisandetīti abhisando. Puññañca taṃ abhisando cāti puññābhisando, taṃ puññābhisandaṃ.
tika-vin06t:122_10: Gaṇṭhipade pana “puññamahattaṃ”nti bhaṇanti, “vipula”nti vacanato so attho na yujjatīti
tika-vin06t:122_11: ācariyo. Atha vā puññānaṃ abhisando puññābhisando, taṃ puññābhisandaṃ. Sanda savaneti
tika-vin06t:122_12: dhātu. Tasmā puññasotaṃ puññussayanti attho yujjati, taṃ pana vipulaṃ, na parittanti
tika-vin06t:123_0: Pañcamagāthā yasmiṃ vinayapiṭake pāḷito ca atthato ca anūnaṃ lajjīpuggalesu pavattanaṭṭhena
tika-vin06t:123_1: ṭhite sakalaṃ tividhampi sāsanaṃ tesveva puggalesu patiṭṭhitaṃ hoti. Kassa sāsananti
tika-vin06t:123_2: ce? Aṭṭhitassa bhagavato. Bhagavā hi ṭhitihetubhūtāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā abhāvena aṭṭhitoti
tika-vin06t:123_3: vuccati. Ucchedadiṭṭhiko hi paraloke nirapekkho kevalaṃ kāmasukhallikānuyogamanuyuñjanto
tika-vin06t:123_4: tiṭṭhati, na paralokahitāni puññāni kattuṃ byāvaṭo hoti, sassatadiṭṭhiko tāni kattuṃ
tika-vin06t:123_5: āyūhati. Bhagavā pana tathā atiṭṭhanto anāyūhanto majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjanto
tika-vin06t:123_6: sayañca oghaṃ tari, pare ca tāresi. Yathāha “appatiṭṭhaṃ khvāhaṃ, āvuso, anāyūhaṃ
tika-vin06t:123_7: oghamatari”nti. Catubrahmavihāravasena sattesu suṭṭhu sammā ca ṭhitassāti atthavasena
tika-vin06t:123_8: vā susaṇṭhitassa. Susaṇṭhitattā hesa kevalaṃ sattānaṃ dukkhaṃ apanetukāmo hitaṃ upasaṃharitukāmo
tika-vin06t:123_9: sampattiyā ca pamodito apakkhapatito ca hutvā vinayaṃ deseti, tasmā imasmiṃ vinayasaṃvaṇṇanādhikāre
tika-vin06t:123_10: sāruppāya thutiyā thomento āha “susaṇṭhitassā”ti. Gaṇṭhipade pana “manāpiye ca kho,
tika-vin06t:123_11: bhikkhave, kammavipāke paccupaṭṭhite”ti suttassa, “susaṇṭhānā surūpatā”ti suttassa
tika-vin06t:123_12: ca vasena susaṇṭhitassāti attho vutto, so adhippetādhikārānurūpo na hoti. Amissanti
tika-vin06t:123_13: kiṃ vinayaṃ amissaṃ, udāhu pubbācariyānubhāvanti? Nobhayampi. Amissā eva hi vinayaṭṭhakathā.
tika-vin06t:123_14: Tasmā bhāvanapuṃsakavasena amissaṃ taṃ vaṇṇayissanti sambandho. Pubbācariyānubhāvanti
tika-vin06t:123_15: aṭṭhakathā “yasmā pure aṭṭhakathā akaṃsū”ti vacanato tesaṃ ānubhāvo nāma hoti. Kiñci
tika-vin06t:123_16: apubbaṃ disvā santi hi loke vattāro “kassesa ānubhāvo”ti. Atha vā bhagavato adhippāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:123_17: anugantvā taṃtaṃpāṭhe atthaṃ bhāvayati vibhāvayati, tassa tassa vā atthassa bhāvanā
tika-vin06t:124_0: Pubbācariyānubhāve sati kiṃ puna taṃ vaṇṇayissanti iminā ārambhenāti tato vuccanti
tika-vin06t:124_2: teneva niddhotāsavattā visuddhapaṭisambhidehi, visuddhapaṭisambhidattā ca saddhammasaṃvaṇṇanakovidehīti
tika-vin06t:124_3: yojanā veditabbā. Keci “pubbācariyāti vutte lokācariyāpi, sāsane rāhulācariyādayopi
tika-vin06t:124_4: saṅgayhanti, te apanetuṃ kāmañcātiādi vutta”nti vadanti. “Taṃ vaṇṇayissa”nti vuttattā
tika-vin06t:124_5: pubbaṭṭhakathāya ūnabhāvo dassitoti ce? Na, cittehi nayehi saṃvaṇṇitoti dassetuṃ
tika-vin06t:124_6: “kāmañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Saddhammaṃ saṃvaṇṇetuṃ kovidehi, tāya saṃvaṇṇanāya vā kovidehi
tika-vin06t:125_0: Sallekhiyeti kilesajātaṃ bāhullaṃ vā sallikhati tanuṃ karotīti sallekho, sallekhassa
tika-vin06t:125_1: bhāvo sallekhiyaṃ, tasmiṃ sallekhiye. Nosulabhūpamehīti asulabhūpamehi. Mahāvihārassāti
tika-vin06t:125_2: mahāvihāravaṃsassa. Paññāya accuggataṭṭhena dhajo upamā etesanti dhajūpamā, tehi
tika-vin06t:125_3: dhajūpamehi. Sambuddhavaraṃ anuayehi anugatehi sambuddhavaranvayehi, buddhādhippāyānugehīti
tika-vin06t:125_4: adhippāyo. Idha vara-saddo “sāmaṃ saccāni buddhattā sambuddho”ti vacanato paccekabuddhāpi
tika-vin06t:126_0: Aṭṭhakathāya ūnabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni attano karaṇavisesaṃ tassa payojanañca dassetuṃ
tika-vin06t:126_1: “saṃvaṇṇanā”tiādimāha. Na kiñci atthaṃ abhisambhuṇātīti kiñci payojanaṃ phalaṃ hitaṃ
tika-vin06t:126_2: na sādhetīti attho “na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhotī”tiādīsu viya. Ajjhesanaṃ
tika-vin06t:126_3: buddhasirivhayassāti iminā yasmā sahampatibrahmunā ajjhiṭṭhena dhammo desito bhagavatā,
tika-vin06t:126_4: sāriputtassa ajjhesanaṃ nissāya vinayo paññatto, tasmā ayampi ācariyo taṃ ācariyavattaṃ
tika-vin06t:126_5: pūjento imaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ buddhasirittherassa yācanaṃ nissāya akāsīti dasseti. Samanussarantoti
tika-vin06t:127_0: Tato paraṃ dve gāthāyo kattabbavidhidassanatthaṃ vuttā. Tena tāsu aṭṭhakathāsu vuttavinicchayapaccayavimatiṃ
tika-vin06t:127_1: vinodeti, ekaṭṭhakathāya kusalassa vā “ayaṃ nayo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ natthī”ti paṭikkhepaṃ
tika-vin06t:127_2: nivāreti, ayuttatthapariccāgena tattha abhiniviṭṭhānaṃ abhinivesaṃ pariccajāpeti,
tika-vin06t:127_3: theravādadassanena vinayavinicchayaṃ pati vinayadharānaṃ kāraṇopapattito uhāpohakkamaṃ
tika-vin06t:127_4: dasseti, ayuttattheravādapaṭikkhepena puggalappamāṇataṃ paṭikkhipatīti ime cānisaṃsā
tika-vin06t:127_5: kattabbavidhidassanena dassitā honti. Saṃvaṇṇanaṃ tañca samārabhanto tassā saṃvaṇṇanāya
tika-vin06t:127_6: mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ sarīraṃ katvā samārabhissaṃ, mahāpaccariyampi yo vutto vinicchayo,
tika-vin06t:127_7: tatheva kurundīnāmādīsu loke vissutāsu aṭṭhakathāsu ca yo vutto vinicchayo, tatopi
tika-vin06t:127_8: vinicchayato mahāaṭṭhakathānayena, vinayayuttiyā vā yuttamatthaṃ tassa sarīrassa
tika-vin06t:127_9: alaṅkāraṃ viya gaṇhanto samārabhissaṃ. Kiṃ saṃvaṇṇanameva, na aññanti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:127_10: puna saṃvaṇṇanāggahaṇaṃ. Atha vā antogadhattheravādaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ katvā samārabhissanti
tika-vin06t:127_11: yojanā veditabbā. Theravādā hi bahiaṭṭhakathāya vicaranti. Ettha ādi-saddena cūḷapaccariandhakaariyaṭṭhakathāpannavārādayopi
tika-vin06t:127_12: saṅgahitā. Tattha paccarī nāma sīhaḷabhāsāya uḷumpaṃ kira, tasmiṃ nisīditvā katattā
tika-vin06t:127_13: tameva nāmaṃ jātaṃ. Kurundīvallivihāro nāma atthi, tattha katattā kurundī nāma jātā.
tika-vin06t:128_0: Samma samārabhissanti kattabbavidhānaṃ sajjetvā ahaṃ ṭhito, tasmā taṃ me nisāmentūti
tika-vin06t:128_1: gāthāya taṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ me mama, mayā vā vuccamānanti pāṭhaseso. Nisāmentu passantu
tika-vin06t:128_2: paññācakkhunā suṇantu vā saddhāvīriyapītipāmojjābhisaṅkhārena saṅkharitvā pūjayantā
tika-vin06t:128_3: sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ. Kassa dhammaṃ? Dhammappadīpassa tathāgatassa. Kiṃ dasseti? Padīpaṭṭhāniyo
tika-vin06t:128_4: hi dhammo hitāhitappakāsanato, padīpadharaṭṭhāniyo dhammadharo tathāgato, tasmā parinibbutepi
tika-vin06t:128_5: tasmiṃ tathāgate tattha sokaṃ akatvā sakkacca dhammaṃ paṭimānayantā nisāmentūti dasseti.
tika-vin06t:128_6: Atha vā “dhammakāyā tathāgatā”ti vacanato dhammo ca so padīpo cāti dhammappadīpo, bhagavā.
tika-vin06t:129_0: Yo dhammavinayo yathā buddhena vutto, so tatheva buddhaputtehi sāvakehi ñāto avabuddho,
tika-vin06t:129_1: yehi tesaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ matiṃ adhippāyaṃ accajantā niravasesaṃ gaṇhantā. Pureti
tika-vin06t:129_2: purā, porāṇattherā vā. Aṭṭhakathāti aṭṭhakathāyo, upayogabahuvacanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:130_0: Yaṃ atthajātaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ, taṃ sabbampi pamādalekhakānaṃ pamādalekhamattaṃ
tika-vin06t:130_1: vajjayitvā. Kiṃ sabbesampi pamāṇaṃ? Na, kintu sikkhāsu sagāravānaṃ idha vinayamhi
tika-vin06t:130_2: paṇḍitānaṃ, mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana saccepi alikepi dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ, taṃ pamādalekhanti
tika-vin06t:130_3: veditabbaṃ. Pamādalekhaṃ vajjayitvā pamāṇaṃ hessatīti sambandho.
tika-vin06t:131_0: Tato cāti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaatthajātato tantikkamaṃ pāḷikkamaṃ. Suttantā suttāvayavā.
tika-vin06t:131_1: Antoti hidaṃ abbhantarāvayavasambhāvanādīsu dissati. Suttantesu bhavā suttantikā,
tika-vin06t:131_2: tesaṃ suttantikānaṃ, suttantaganthesu āgatavacanānanti attho. Atha vā amīyatīti anto,
tika-vin06t:131_3: sādhīyatīti adhippāyo. Kena sādhīyati? Suttena, suttassa anto suttanto, ko so? So
tika-vin06t:131_4: so atthavikappo, tasmiṃ suttante niyuttāni vacanāni suttantikāni. Tesaṃ suttantikānaṃ
tika-vin06t:131_5: vacanānamatthaṃ. Tassa tassa āgamasuttassa abhidhammavinayasuttassa cānurūpaṃ paridīpayantī,
tika-vin06t:131_6: ayaṃ tāvettha samāsato atthavibhāvanā – “itipi so bhagavā”tiādīnaṃ suttantikānaṃ
tika-vin06t:131_7: vacanānamatthaṃ āgamasuttantānurūpaṃ. “Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ siyā kusalaṃ siyā akusalaṃ
tika-vin06t:131_8: siyā abyākata”nti evamādīnaṃ abhidhammasuttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthaṃ abhidhammasuttantānurūpanti
tika-vin06t:131_9: evamādi. Hessatīti bhavissati, karīyissatīti adhippāyo. Vaṇṇanāpīti ettha api-saddo
tika-vin06t:131_10: sampiṇḍanattho, so tasmāti padena yojetabbo. Kathaṃ? Paṇḍitānaṃ pamāṇattāpi vitthāramaggassa
tika-vin06t:131_11: samāsitattāpi vinicchayassa asesitattāpi tantikkamassa avokkamitattāpi suttantikavacanānaṃ
tika-vin06t:131_12: suttantaṭṭhakathānurūpaṃ dīpanatopi tasmāpi sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāti. Ettha “tantikkamaṃ
tika-vin06t:131_14: bhāro’ti gatā, mayaṃ pana vatvāva gamissāmā”ti dassetuṃ “suttantikāna”nti vuttaṃ kira.
tika-vin06t:134_0: Tadaṅgavinayādibhedena vinayassabahuttā vinayo tāva vavatthapetabbo. “Buddhena dhammo
tika-vin06t:134_1: vinayo ca vutto”ti pubbe vuttattā idāni “vuttaṃ yenā”ti na vattabbanti ce? Tassa
tika-vin06t:134_2: evamādivacanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti sambandho. Dhāritaṃ yena cābhataṃ. Yatthappatiṭṭhitañcetanti
tika-vin06t:134_3: vacanaṃ sakalampi vinayapiṭakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hotīti āhacca
tika-vin06t:134_4: bhāsitaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo. Na hi bhagavato atītādīsu appaccakkhaṃ kiñci atthi.
tika-vin06t:134_5: Yadi attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hoti, padasodhammāpattiṃ na janeyyāti ce? Na, sāvakabhāsitassapi
tika-vin06t:134_6: padasodhammāpattijananato. Niyamābhāvā atippasaṅgoti ce? Na, padasodhammasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:134_7: “saṅgītittayaṃ āruḷho”ti visesitattā. Tathā aṭṭhakathāyampi saṅgītiṃ āruḷhattā “khandhānañca
tika-vin06t:134_8: paṭipāṭi…pe… saṃsāroti pavuccatī”ti evamādivacanaṃ, yañca saṅgītiāruḷhakkamānugataṃ,
tika-vin06t:136_0: Paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma cāti ettha ca-saddo atirekattho, tena aññāpi atthīti dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:136_1: Tampi sālavanaṃ upagantvā mittasuhajje apaloketvā nivattanato upavattananti pākaṭaṃ
tika-vin06t:136_2: jātaṃ kira. Yamakasālānanti ekā kira sālapanti sīsabhāge, ekā pādabhāge. Tatrāpi
tika-vin06t:136_3: eko taruṇasālo sīsabhāgassa āsanne hoti, eko pādabhāgassa, mūlakhandhaviṭapapattehi
tika-vin06t:136_4: aññamaññaṃ saṃsibbitvā ṭhitasālānantipi vuttaṃ. Anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyāti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe
tika-vin06t:136_5: karaṇavacanaṃ “katakicco pītija hāsa ceto averamukhenābhatakuṇḍalenā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin06t:136_6: Parinibbāne parinibbānahetu, tasmiṃ ṭhāne vā mā socittha cittena, mā paridevittha
tika-vin06t:136_7: vācāya “paridevanaṃ vilāpa”nti vacanato. Mahāsamaṇenāti nissakkatthe karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:136_8: Sūriyaṃ’sūbhi paṭukarā’bhā’riṇassa tāṇā ityatreva. Yañca bhagavato anuggahaṃ, tassa
tika-vin06t:136_9: anuggahassāti ācariyā. Ekacce pana “yaṃ yasmā ahaṃ anuggahito”ti vadanti. Nibbasanānīti
tika-vin06t:136_10: niṭṭhitavasanakiccāni, mayā paribhuñjitvā apanītāni. Yadi suyuttāni dhāressasīti
tika-vin06t:136_11: pucchati, kavacasadisāni sāṇāni. Issariyasadisā nava anupubbavihārādayo. Aṭṭha samāpattiyo
tika-vin06t:139_0: Satthusāsanameva pariyatti satthusāsanapariyatti, sā suttageyyādivasena navaṅgā.
tika-vin06t:139_3: evaṃ santepi atthi viseso tehi sammukhāpi asammukhāpi sutaṃ, therena pana asammukhāpaṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin06t:139_4: nāma natthīti. Na vāyanti ettha vāti vibhāsā, aññāsipi na aññāsipīti attho. Tatra
tika-vin06t:139_5: uccinane. Bahusaddo vipullattho “anantapāraṃ bahu veditabbamitya”treva. Pubbe “tipiṭakasabbapaayattippabhedadhare”ti
tika-vin06t:139_6: vuttattā “bahu cānena…pe… pariyatto”ti na yujjatīti ce? Na, tipiṭakassa anantattā,
tika-vin06t:139_7: tasmā amhe upādāya tena bahu pariyattoti adhippāyo. Itarathā ānandatthero tehi appassutoti
tika-vin06t:139_8: āpajjati, “asammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ nāma natthī”ti vacanavirodho ca. Aḍḍhamāso atikkantoti
tika-vin06t:139_9: ettha eko divaso naṭṭho, so pāṭipadadivaso, kolāhaladivaso nāma so, tasmā idha na
tika-vin06t:139_10: gahito. Saṃvegavatthuṃ kittetvā kīḷanato sādhukīḷanaṃ nāma. Svepīti api-saddo apekkhāmantānuññāya.
tika-vin06t:139_12: antogadhaṃ na hotīti ce? Na, bhagavato kāle laddhanayattā kathāvatthu viya. Chaḍḍitā
tika-vin06t:139_13: patitā uklāpā chaḍḍitapatitauklāpā. Āṇā eva appaṭihataṭṭhena cakkanti āṇācakkaṃ.
tika-vin06t:139_14: Ekato ettha nipatantīti ekanipātanaṃ. Ākāsena āgantvā nisīdīti eketi etaṃ dutiyavāre
tika-vin06t:139_15: gamanaṃ sandhāyāti āyasmā upatisso. Paṭhamaṃ vā ākāsena gantvā parisaṃ patvā bhikkhupantiṃ
tika-vin06t:139_16: apīḷento pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā āsane eva attānaṃ dassesi. Ubhayathā ca āpāthaṃ gato,
tika-vin06t:139_17: tena ubhayampi yujjati, aññathā dvīsu ekaṃ abhūtaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:140_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ pucchi…pe… āyasmā upālitthero vissajjesīti
tika-vin06t:140_1: idaṃ pubbe “paṭhamaṃ āvuso upālī”tiādinā vuttapucchāvissajjanaṃ saṅkhipitvā saṅgītikārakehi
tika-vin06t:140_2: dassitavacananti gaṇṭhipade likhitaṃ. Tathā hotu, kimatthaṃ panettha “nidānampi pucchi,
tika-vin06t:140_3: puggalampi pucchi, vatthumpi pucchī”ti evaṃ pubbe dassitānukkamena avatvā “vatthumpi
tika-vin06t:140_4: pucchi, nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchī”ti evaṃ anukkamo katoti? “Vatthumūlakattā
tika-vin06t:140_5: sikkhāpadapaññattiyā uppaṭipāṭiyā vutta”nti vadanti eke. Ettha pana vicāraṇā verañjakaṇḍe
tika-vin06t:140_6: sampatte karīyati. Rājāgāraketi evaṃnāmake uyyāne. Abhiramanārahaṃ kira rājāgārampi.
tika-vin06t:140_7: Tattha, yassa vasenetaṃ evaṃ nāmaṃ labhati. Atha kho “āyasmā mahākassapo”tiādinā
tika-vin06t:140_8: pubbe vuttameva saṅkhipitvā dasseti saṅgītikārako vasīgaṇo. Yadi evaṃ yathā nidānampi
tika-vin06t:140_9: pucchi, puggalampi pucchīti ettha pucchākkamo dassito, tathā ānandattherassa vissajjanakkamopi
tika-vin06t:140_10: kimatthaṃ na dassitoti ce? Iminānukkamena saṅgahaṃ pañcapi nikāyā anāruḷhāti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:140_11: Kathaṃ pana āruḷhāti? Āyasmā mahākassapo pañcapi nikāye anukkameneva pucchi, ānandatthero
tika-vin06t:140_12: pana anukkameneva pucchitampi apucchitampi tassa tassa suttassa sabhāvaṃ antarā uppannaṃ
tika-vin06t:140_13: vatthuṃ uddesaniddesakkamaṃ mātikāvibhaṅgakkamanti evamādisabbaṃ anurūpavacanaṃ pakkhipitvā
tika-vin06t:140_14: vissajjesi, tenevāha “eteneva upāyena pañcapi nikāye pucchī”ti. Atha vā “ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:141_0: Gahakāranti imassa attabhāvagehassa kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ gavesanto yena ñāṇena
tika-vin06t:141_1: sakkā so daṭṭhuṃ, tassatthāya dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhāro ettakaṃ kālaṃ anekajātisaṃsāraṃ
tika-vin06t:141_2: taṃ ñāṇaṃ avindanto vicarinti attho. Dukkhā jāti punappunanti idaṃ gahakārakagavesanassa
tika-vin06t:141_3: kāraṇavacanaṃ. Sabbā te phāsukāti tava sabbā anavasesakilesaphāsukā mayā bhaggā.
tika-vin06t:141_4: Gahakūṭaṃ nāma avijjā. Somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇaṃ somanassamayaṃ. Na hi somanassamayaṃ
tika-vin06t:141_6: taṃ pana tattha tattha pakāsayissāma. Aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhamme ca vinaye cāti
tika-vin06t:141_7: ettha pāṇātipāto akusalanti evamādīsu maraṇādhippāyassa jīvitindriyupacchedakappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-vin06t:141_8: cetanā akusalaṃ, na pāṇasaṅkhātajīvitindriyassa upacchedakasaṅkhāto atipāto. Tathā
tika-vin06t:141_9: adinnassa parasantakassa ādānasaṅkhātā viññatti abyākato dhammo, tabbiññattisamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-vin06t:141_10: theyyacetanā akusalo dhammoti evamādinā aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhamme paṭibalo
tika-vin06t:141_11: vinetuṃ. Jātarūparajataṃ parasantakaṃ theyyacittena gaṇhantassa yathāvatthuṃ pārājikathullaccayadukkaṭesu
tika-vin06t:141_12: aññataraṃ, bhaṇḍāgārikasīsena diyyamānaṃ gaṇhantassa pācittiyaṃ, attatthāya gaṇhantassa
tika-vin06t:141_13: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ, kevalaṃ lolatāya gaṇhantassa anāmāsadukkaṭaṃ, rūpiyachaḍḍakasammatassa
tika-vin06t:141_14: anāpattīti evaṃ aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite vinayepi paṭibalo vinetunti attho. Bhāvetīti
tika-vin06t:141_15: vaḍḍheti, etena phalavasena javanavasena ca cittassa vuddhiṃ dasseti. “Avisiṭṭha”nti
tika-vin06t:146_0: Sāsanassa napuṃsakattā “yathā…pe… dhammasāsanānī”ti vuttaṃ. Duccaritasaṃkilesaṃ nāma
tika-vin06t:146_1: atthato cetanā, tathākārappavattacittuppādo vā. Aniccādilakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā pavattattā
tika-vin06t:146_2: vipassanācittāni visayato lokiyā’bhisamayo asammohato lokuttaro, lokuttaro eva vā
tika-vin06t:146_3: abhisamayo visayato nibbānasaṅkhātassa atthassa, itarassa maggādikassa asammohatotipi
tika-vin06t:146_4: eke. Ettha “paṭivedho”ti vuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ gambhīranti ce? Gambhīrassa udakassa
tika-vin06t:146_5: pamāṇaggahaṇakāle dīghena pamāṇena bhavitabbaṃ, evaṃ alabbhaneyyabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:146_6: idānīti vuttanti eke. Yassa catthāya maggaphalatthāya. Tañca atthaṃ nānubhonti nādhigacchanti
tika-vin06t:146_7: kañci attanā adhippetaṃ, itivādapamokkhañca. Kasmā? Atthassa anupaparikkhitvā gahitattā.
tika-vin06t:146_8: Adhigataphalattā paṭividdhākuppo. Puna khīṇāsavaggahaṇena arahantameva dasseti, na
tika-vin06t:146_9: sekkhaṃ. So hi yathā bhaṇḍāgāriko rañño kaṭakamakuṭādiṃ gopetvā icchiticchitakkhaṇe
tika-vin06t:146_10: upaneti, evaṃ sahetukānaṃ sattānaṃ maggaphalatthāya dhammaṃ desesi. Tāsaṃyeva tattha
tika-vin06t:146_11: vinayapiṭake pabhedato vuttattā, vāyamitvā tā eva pāpuṇātīti ācariyā. Kimatthaṃ tissova
tika-vin06t:146_12: vijjā tattha vibhattāti? Sīlasampattiyā etaparamupanissayabhāvato. “Aparehipi sattahaṅgehi
tika-vin06t:146_13: samannāgato bhikkhu vinayadharo hoti. Āpattiṃ jānāti, anāpattiṃ, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ,
tika-vin06t:146_14: garukaṃ āpattiṃ, anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati…pe… dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena
tika-vin06t:146_15: atikkantamānusakena satte passati…pe… āsavānañca khayā…pe… upasampajja viharatī”ti
tika-vin06t:146_16: suttamettha sādhakaṃ. Vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā sīlasampattiṃ nissāya āsavakkhayañāṇena
tika-vin06t:146_17: saheva viya dibbacakkhupubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāni paṭilabhati. Visuṃ etesaṃ parikammakiccaṃ
tika-vin06t:146_18: natthīti dassanatthaṃ tāsaṃyevāti vuttanti ca vadanti eke. Abhidhamme pana tissovijjā
tika-vin06t:146_19: cha abhiññā catasso ca paṭisambhidā aññe ca sammappadhānādayo guṇavisesā vibhattā.
tika-vin06t:146_20: Kiñcāpi vibhattā, tathāpi visesato paññājātikattā catasso paṭisambhidā pāpuṇātīti
tika-vin06t:146_21: dassanatthaṃ tāsaṃ tatthevāti avadhāraṇavipallāso kato. Attanā duggahitena dhammenāti
tika-vin06t:146_22: pāṭhaseso. Kattari cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ, hetutthe ca, attanā duggahitahetūti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:149: Pannabhārāti patitakkhandhabhārā. “Bhārā have pañcakkhandhā”ti hi vuttaṃ. “Sammukhā bhavissāma na bhavissāmā”ti vattāro. Tesu daharā kira. Jamminti lāmakaṃ.
tika-vin06t:152_0: Brahmalokā cavitvāti ettha cattāro maggā pañcānantariyāni niyatamicchādiṭṭhīti imeyeva
tika-vin06t:152_1: niyatā, na mahaggatā, tasmā paṇidhivasena heṭṭhupapattipi hoti. Aticchathāti aticca
tika-vin06t:152_2: icchatha, gantvā bhikkhaṃ pariyesathāti adhippāyo. Keṭubhaṃ nāma kabyakaraṇavidhiyuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:152_3: satthaṃ. Kiriyākappaṃ ityeke, kattākhyādilakkhaṇayuttasatthaṃ. Asandhimittāti tassā
tika-vin06t:152_4: nāmaṃ. Tassā kira sarīre sandhayo na paññāyanti, madhusitthakena kataṃ viya sarīraṃ
tika-vin06t:152_5: hoti. Tasmā “evaṃnāmikā jātā”tipi vadanti. Māgadhakena patthena cattāro patthā āḷhakaṃ,
tika-vin06t:152_6: cattāri āḷhakāni doṇaṃ, catudoṇā mānikā, catumānikā khārikā, vīsatikhāriko vāhoti.
tika-vin06t:152_7: Kethumālāti “sīsato uṭṭhahitvā ṭhito obhāsapuñjo”ti vadanti. Rājiddhiadhikārappasaṅgenetaṃ
tika-vin06t:152_8: vatthu vuttaṃ, nānukkamena. Anukkamena pana buddhasāsanāvahāraṃ vatthuṃ dīpento “rājā
tika-vin06t:152_9: kirā”tiādimāha. Kilesadamanena dantaṃ. Kāyavācāhi guttaṃ. “Pācīnamukho”tipi pāṭho
tika-vin06t:152_10: atthi. Pubbe jeṭṭhabhātikattā teneva paricayena pattaggahaṇatthāya ākāraṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:152_11: Abhāsīti “bhāsissāmī”ti vitakkesi. Apare “aññātanti vuttepi sabbaṃ abhaṇī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:152_12: Amatanti nibbānasaṅkhātāya nivattiyā saguṇādhivacanaṃ, tassā appamādo padaṃ maggo.
tika-vin06t:152_13: Maccūti pavattiyā sadosādhivacanaṃ, tassā pamādo padaṃ maggoti evaṃ cattāri saccāni
tika-vin06t:152_14: sandassitāni honti. Saṅghasaraṇagatattā saṅghanissitā pabbajjā, bhaṇḍukammassa vā
tika-vin06t:152_15: tadāyattattā. Nigrodhattherassānubhāvakittanādhikārattā pubbe vuttampi pacchā vattabbampi
tika-vin06t:152_16: sampiṇḍetvā āha “puna rājā asokārāmaṃ nāma mahāvihāraṃ kāretvā saṭṭhisahassāni…pe…
tika-vin06t:152_18: vacanato sekkhāva paramatthato dāyādā, tathāpi thero mahindakumārassa pabbajjatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:152_19: ekena pariyāyena lokadhammasiddhena evamāha “yo koci mahārāja…pe… orasaṃ putta”nti. Vuttañhi vede –
tika-vin06t:154: Attā ve putto nāmāsi, sa jīva saradosata”nti.
tika-vin06t:155_0: Tasmā iminā pariyāyena oraso putto mātāpitūhi pabbajito ce, atthato te sayaṃ pabbajitā
tika-vin06t:155_1: viya honti. Dhammakathikā kasmā nārocenti? Rājā “theraṃ gaṇhitvā āgacchathā”ti amacce
tika-vin06t:155_2: pesesi, dhammakathikā therassa āgamanakāle parivāratthāya pesitā, tasmā. Apica tena
tika-vin06t:155_3: vuttavidhināva vadanti caṇḍattā, caṇḍabhāvo cassa “ambaṃ chinditvā veḷuyā vatiṃ karohī”ti
tika-vin06t:155_4: vuttaamaccavatthunā vibhāvetabbo. Kasmā pana dhammakathikā rājāṇāpanaṃ karontīti?
tika-vin06t:155_5: “Sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ samattho”ti vuttattā. Dīpakatittiroti kūṭatittiro. Ayaṃ pana
tika-vin06t:155_6: kūṭatittirakamme niyuttopi suddhacitto, tasmā tāpasaṃ pucchi. Sāṇipākāranti sāṇipākārena.
tika-vin06t:155_7: Vibhajitvā vadatīti vibhajjavādī “atthi khvesa brāhmaṇa pariyāyo”tiādinā. Apica sassatavādī
tika-vin06t:155_8: ca bhagavā “atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ asaṅkhata”ntiādi -vacanato. Ekaccasassatiko
tika-vin06t:155_9: ca “sappaccayā dhammā, appaccayā dhammā”ti vacanato. Antānantiko ca –
tika-vin06t:157: Na ca appatvā lokantaṃ, dukkhā atthi pamocanaṃ”. ;
tika-vin06t:158_0: “Anamataggoyaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃsāro pubbakoṭi na paññāyatī”ti vacanato. Amarāvikkhepikapakkhampi
tika-vin06t:158_1: īsakaṃ bhajati bhagavā “sassato lokoti abyākatametaṃ asassato lokoti abyākatameta”ntiādiabyākatavatthudīpanato
tika-vin06t:158_2: sammutisaccadīpanato ca. Tañhi ajjhattabahiddhādivasena na vattabbaṃ. Yathāha “ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ
tika-vin06t:158_3: na vattabbaṃ ajjhattārammaṇantipī”tiādi. Tathā adhiccasamuppannikapakkhampi bhajati
tika-vin06t:158_4: “laddhā mudhā nibbutiṃ bhuñjamānā”ti vacanato. Tattha hi mudhāti adhiccasamuppannavevacanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:158_6: ca “ahañhi, brāhmaṇa, ucchedaṃ vadāmi rāgassā”ti vacanato. Diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādī
tika-vin06t:158_7: ca “khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti vacanato, “natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti vacanato,
tika-vin06t:158_8: diṭṭheva dhamme nirodhasamāpattidīpanato ca. Evaṃ tena tena pariyāyena tathā tathā
tika-vin06t:160_0: Pupphanāmo sumanatthero. Mahāpadumattheroti eke. Mahiṃsakamaṇḍalaṃ andharaṭṭhanti
tika-vin06t:160_1: vadanti. Dhammacakkhu nāma tayo maggā. Sotāpattimagganti ca eke. Pañcapi raṭṭhāni
tika-vin06t:160_2: pañca cīnaraṭṭhāni nāma. Rājagaheti deviyā katavihāre. Silakūṭamhīti pabbatakūṭe.
tika-vin06t:160_3: Vaḍḍhamānanti alaṅkaraṇacuṇṇaṃ. Ariyadese atīva sammataṃ kira. Ekarasena nāthakaraṇā
tika-vin06t:160_4: iti damiḷā. Sārapāmaṅganti uttamaṃ pāmaṅgaṃ. Petavatthuādinā saṃvejetvā abhisamayatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:160_6: pāṭho. Dasabhātikanti abhayakumārādayo dasa, te idha na vuttā. Vutthavasso pavāretvāti
tika-vin06t:160_7: cātumāsiniyā pavāraṇāyāti attho. Paṭhamapavāraṇāya vā pavāretvā ekamāsaṃ tattheva
tika-vin06t:160_8: vasitvā kattikapuṇṇamāsiyaṃ avoca, aññathā “puṇṇamāyaṃ mahāvīro”ti vuttattā na sakkā
tika-vin06t:160_9: gahetuṃ. Mahāvīroti buddhopacārena dhātuyo vadati. Jaṅghappamāṇanti “thūpassa jaṅghappamāṇa”nti
tika-vin06t:160_10: vadanti. Mātulabhāgineyyā cūḷodaramahodarā. Dharamānassa viya buddhassa rasmi sarasarasmi,
tika-vin06t:160_11: rañño lekhāsāsanaṃ appesi, evañca mukhasāsanamavoca. Doṇamattā magadhanāḷiyā dvādasanāḷimattā
tika-vin06t:160_12: kira. “Paricchinnaṭṭhāne chijjitvā”ti pāṭho. Sabbadisāhi pañca rasmiyo āvaṭṭetvāti
tika-vin06t:160_13: pañcahi phalehi nikkhantattā pañca, tā pana chabbaṇṇāva. Kattikajuṇhapakkhassa pāṭipadadivaseti
tika-vin06t:160_14: juṇhapakkhassa paṭhamadivaseti attho. Mahābodhiṭṭhāne parivāretvā ṭhitanāgayakkhādidevatākulāni.
tika-vin06t:160_15: Gopakā nāma rājaparikammino tathābhāvakiccā. Tesaṃ kulānaṃ nāmantipi keci. Udakādivāhā
tika-vin06t:160_16: kāliṅgā. Kāliṅgesu janapadesu jātisampannaṃ kulaṃ kāliṅgakulanti keci.
tika-vin06t:161_0: Paṭhamapāṭipadadivaseti dutiyauposathassa pāṭipadadivaseti attho. Tattha ṭhitehi
tika-vin06t:161_1: samuddassa diṭṭhattā taṃ ṭhānaṃ samuddasālavatthu. Soḷasa jātisampannakulāni aṭṭha
tika-vin06t:161_2: brāhmaṇāmaccakulāni. Mahāariṭṭhatthero cetiyagirimhi pabbajito. Amaccassa pariveṇaṭṭhāneti
tika-vin06t:161_3: sampatikālavasenāha. Mahindatthero dvādasavassiko hutvā tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ sampatto,
tika-vin06t:161_4: tattha dve vassāni vasitvā vinayaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi, dvāsaṭṭhivassiko hutvā parinibbuto.
tika-vin06t:161_5: Vinayo saṃvaratthāyāti vinayapiṭakaṃ, tassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ vā. Yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ
tika-vin06t:161_6: sappaccayanāmarūpapariggaho. Maggādipaccavekkhaṇe asati antarā parinibbānaṃ nāma
tika-vin06t:161_7: natthi sekkhassa maraṇaṃ vā, satiyeva hoti. Tasmā āha “vimuttiñāṇadassana”nti. Anupādāparinibbānatthāyāti
tika-vin06t:161_8: kañci dhammaṃ anupādāya aggahetvā īsakampi anavasesetvā parinibbānatthāyāti attho.
tika-vin06t:161_10: dassetvā idāni parahitanipphattiṃ dassetuṃ “etadatthaṃ sotāvadhāna”nti āha. Tassattho
tika-vin06t:161_11: – attano vinayakathanaṃ vinayamantanañca uggahetuṃ paresaṃ sotassa odahanaṃ sotāvadhānaṃ.
tika-vin06t:161_12: Tato uggahitavinayakathāmantanānaṃ tesaṃ upanisā yathāvuttakāraṇaparamparā siddhāyevāti
tika-vin06t:161_13: na puna dassitāti veditabbā. Aññathā etadatthā upanisāti iminā vacaneneva anupādāparinibbānassa
tika-vin06t:161_14: saṅgahitattā anupādāparinibbānato uddhaṃ sotāvadhānāsambhavato etadatthaṃ sotāvadhānanti
tika-vin06t:161_15: ante na sambhavatīti niratthakaṃ bhaveyya, na ca niratthakaṃ parahitanipphattiyā
tika-vin06t:162: Evaṃ yathā yathā yaṃ yaṃ, sambhaveyya padaṃ idha;
tika-vin06t:163: Taṃ taṃ tathā tathā sabbaṃ, payojeyya vicakkhaṇoti.
tika-vin06t:168_0: “Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ. Tena kho
tika-vin06t:168_1: pana samayena vesāliyā avidūre kalandagāmo nāma hotī”ti vinayanidāne ārabhitabbe
tika-vin06t:168_2: verañjakaṇḍassa ārambho kimatthoti ce? Vuccate – mūlato pabhuti vinayanidānaṃ dassetuṃ.
tika-vin06t:168_3: Yadi evaṃ “paṭhamaṃ āvuso upāli pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti, vesāliya”nti vacanena
tika-vin06t:168_4: virujjhatīti ce? Na virujjhati. Kasmā? Kattha paññattanti hi nidānapucchā. Evaṃ santepi
tika-vin06t:168_6: viyāti? Nāyuttaṃ, sabbesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ pāṭekkaṃ nidānassa puṭṭhattā tassa vissajjetabbattā
tika-vin06t:168_7: ca sabbasādhāraṇamahānidānaṃ paṭhamamāha. Ekantena pucchāvissajjanakkamena pārājikādīni
tika-vin06t:168_8: saṅgahaṃ āropitāni. Kathaṃ āropitānīti ce? Āyasmatā mahākassapena anukkamena sabbopi
tika-vin06t:168_9: vinayo pucchito, puṭṭhena ca āyasmatā upālittherena yathāsambhavaṃ nirantaraṃ vissajjitameva.
tika-vin06t:168_10: Apucchitānipi vinītavatthuādīni yujjamānāni vatthūni antokatvā vissajjanakkameneva
tika-vin06t:168_11: gaṇasajjhāyamakaṃsūti veditabbaṃ. Aññathā verañjakaṇḍaṃ paṭhamapārājikasseva nidānanti
tika-vin06t:168_12: vā anadhikārikaṃ vā nippayojanaṃ vā pāṭekkaṃ sikkhāpadanidānapucchānantaraṃ tadeva
tika-vin06t:168_13: vissajjetabbanti vā āpajjati, tasmā ādito pabhuti vinayanidānaṃ dassetuṃ “tena samayenā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:169_0: Idāni nidānabhaṇane payojanaṃ vakkhāma – vinayassaāṇādesanattā bhagavato tāva āṇārahabhāvadīpanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:169_1: āṇābhūtassa ca vinayassa anaññavisayabhāvadīpanaṃ, āṇāya ṭhitānaṃ sāvakānaṃ mahānubhāvadīpanañcāti
tika-vin06t:169_2: tividhamassa payojanaṃ. Kathaṃ? Āṇāsāsanāraho hi bhagavā pahīnakilesattā, adhigataguṇavisesattā,
tika-vin06t:169_3: lokajeṭṭhaseṭṭhattā, tādibhāvappattattā ca, arasarūpatādīhi aṭṭhahi akkosavatthūhi
tika-vin06t:169_4: akampanato bhagavato tādibhāvappatti veditabbā, aṭṭhannampi tesaṃ akkosavatthūnaṃ
tika-vin06t:169_5: attani sambhavapariyāyadīpanapāḷiyā pahīnakilesatā veditabbā. Catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ tissannañca
tika-vin06t:169_6: vijjānaṃ adhigamaparidīpanena adhigataguṇavisesatā veditabbā. “Nāhaṃ taṃ brāhmaṇa
tika-vin06t:169_7: passāmi sadevake…pe… muddhāpi tassa vipateyyā”ti ca “jeṭṭho seṭṭho lokassā”ti ca
tika-vin06t:169_8: vacanena jeṭṭhaseṭṭhatā veditabbā, idañca bhagavato āṇārahabhāvadīpanappayojanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:169_9: “Āgamehi tvaṃ sāriputta, āgamehi tvaṃ sāriputta, tathāgatova tattha kālaṃ jānissatī”ti
tika-vin06t:169_10: vacanaṃ anaññavisayabhāvadīpanaṃ. “Sādhāhaṃ, bhante, pathaviṃ parivatteyya”nti ca
tika-vin06t:169_11: “ekāhaṃ, bhante, pāṇiṃ abhinimminissāmī”ti ca “sādhu, bhante, sabbo bhikkhusaṅgho
tika-vin06t:169_12: uttarakuruṃ piṇḍāya gaccheyyā”ti ca imehi therassa tīhi sīhanādehi āṇāya ṭhitānaṃ
tika-vin06t:169_13: sāvakānaṃ mahānubhāvatādīpanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sāvatthiyādīsu aviharitvā kimatthaṃ bhagavā
tika-vin06t:169_14: verañjāyameva tadā vihāsīti ce? Naḷeruyakkhassa pītisañjananatthaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghassa
tika-vin06t:169_17: ca. Tesu pacchimaṃ balavakāraṇaṃ, tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tena samayenāti yena
tika-vin06t:169_18: kālena āyasmato…pe… tena kālenā”ti. Purimesu catūsu asaṅgahakāraṇesu paṭhamena bhagavā
tika-vin06t:169_19: mettābhāvanādinā amanussānaṃ cittasaṃrakkhaṇena bhikkhūnaṃ ādaraṃ janeti. Dutiyena
tika-vin06t:169_20: parisāvacarena bhikkhunā evaṃ parisā saṅgahetabbā, evaṃ appicchena santuṭṭhena ca
tika-vin06t:169_21: bhavitabbanti vā dasseti. Tatiyena paccaye nirapekkhena kulānuggaho kātabboti. Catutthena
tika-vin06t:169_22: evaṃ mahānubhāvenāpi paccayatthaṃ na loluppaṃ kātabbaṃ, kevalaṃ paradattupajīvinā
tika-vin06t:172_0: Ce? Nanu vuttaṃ pubbeva “idañhi buddhassa bhagavato attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hotī”tiādi,
tika-vin06t:172_1: tasmā upālittherena vuttassa tenātiādipāṭhassa atthaṃ nānappakārato dassayanto karissāmi
tika-vin06t:172_2: vinayassa bhagavato attapaccakkhavacanabhūtassa atthavaṇṇananti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin06t:172_3: Yadi evaṃ “tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatīti evamādivacanapaṭimaṇḍitanidānaṃ
tika-vin06t:172_6: puriso”tiādīsu viya. Vinayassādibhāvena saṅgītikārakehi anuññātattā vinayapariyāpannatāpi
tika-vin06t:172_7: yujjati tassa vacanassa. Etthāha – yathā suttante “ekaṃ samaya”nti ca, abhidhamme
tika-vin06t:172_8: ca “yasmiṃ samaye”ti aniyamato vuttaṃ, tathā avatvā idha “tena samayenā”ti paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin06t:172_9: taṃniddesova kasmā vuttoti? Vuccate – tassa tassa sikkhāpadapaññattisamayassa, yassa
tika-vin06t:172_10: vā sikkhāpadapaññattihetubhūtassa samayassa hetu bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi, tassa
tika-vin06t:172_11: ca samayassa atītassa tesaṃ saṅgītikārakānaṃ vasīnaṃ suviditattā. Kathaṃ? “Ye te
tika-vin06t:172_12: bhikkhū appicchā te ujjhāyantī”tiādivacanato, “atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:172_13: ārocesu”nti ca “atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne sannipātāpetvā”ti ca “bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin06t:172_14: tadanucchavikaṃ tadanu…pe… dasa atthavase paṭicca saṅghasuṭṭhutāyā”ti ca “evañca
tika-vin06t:172_15: pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti ca khandhakesu ca “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:172_16: tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajja”ntiādivinayakkamassa vacanato yo so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo,
tika-vin06t:172_17: tassa tassa vinayakkamassa so paññattisamayo ca suvidito tesaṃ pañcasatānaṃ dhammadharānaṃ
tika-vin06t:172_18: bhikkhūnaṃ, nāyaṃ nayo suttantābhidhammesu sambhavati. Tasmā suviditattā tena samayena
tika-vin06t:172_19: hetubhūtena viharatīti viharatipadena ekasambandhattā ca paṭhamaṃ yaṃniddesādino
tika-vin06t:172_20: asambhavato ca vinayapiṭake taṃniddesova paṭhamaṃ vutto. Kathaṃ? Ettha “yena kho
tika-vin06t:172_21: pana samayena vesāliyā avidūre kalandagāmo nāma hotī”ti vā “yena kho pana samayena
tika-vin06t:172_22: vesālī…pe… hotī”ti vā asambhavato yaṃniddesena avatvā taṃniddesasseva sambhavato
tika-vin06t:172_23: “tena kho pana samayena…pe… kalandagāmo nāma hotī”ti vuttanti, kevalaṃ suviditattā
tika-vin06t:172_24: vā. Aniyamaniddesavacananti ettha kiñcāpi yathāvuttanayena niyamaniddesavacanamevetaṃ
tika-vin06t:172_25: taṃniddesattā, tathāpi sampatikālavasena taditaresaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aviditattā “aniyamaniddesavacana”nti
tika-vin06t:172_26: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “ayañhi sabbasmimpi vinaye yuttī”ti, taṃ tabbahulena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:173_0: Yadi sabbaṃ tenāti padaṃ aniyamaniddesavacanaṃ bhaveyya, tena hi bhikkhave bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin06t:173_1: sikkhāpadanti ettha idampi pubbe siddhatthaṃ tenāti padaṃ aniyamaniddesavacanaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin06t:173_2: “Tena samayena buddho bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ viharatī”tiādīsu vuttaṃ tenāti padañca aniyamaniddesavacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:173_3: bhaveyya, na ca hoti, tasmā yesaṃ tena taṃniddesena niddiṭṭhattho avidito, tesaṃ
tika-vin06t:173_4: vasenāha “aniyamaniddesavacanameta”nti. Atha vā tato paṭhamaṃ tadatthādassanato pacchāpi
tika-vin06t:173_6: vā pubbaṇhādīsu ayaṃ nāmāti aniyametvā kālaparidīpanassa samayasaddassa upapadabhāvenapi
tika-vin06t:173_7: evaṃ vattumarahati “yadidaṃ aniyamaniddesavacana”nti. Atha vā “tenā”ti vutte tena
tika-vin06t:173_8: ghaṭena paṭenāti sabbatthappasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ niyamaṃ karoti “samayenā”ti. Kena
tika-vin06t:173_9: pana samayena? Parabhāge atthato siddhena sāriputtassa parivitakkasamayena. Etthāha
tika-vin06t:173_10: – vitakkasamayo ce idhādhippeto, “parato idha pana hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:173_11: Yo hi so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo sāriputtādīhipi dubbiññeyyo, tena samayena hetubhūtena
tika-vin06t:173_12: karaṇabhūtena cā”tiādivacanaṃ virujjhatīti? Na, bāhullena vuttattā. Suttantābhidhammesu
tika-vin06t:173_13: viya avatvā idha vinayapiṭake karaṇavacanena kasmā niddesoti hi codanā. Tasmā tassā
tika-vin06t:173_14: vissajjane bāhullena karaṇavacanappayojanaṃ vattukāmo ācariyo āha “yo so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:173_15: Na sampati vuccamānasseva karaṇavacanassa payojanaṃ vattukāmo, imassa pana hetuatthova
tika-vin06t:173_16: sambhavati, na karaṇattho, tasmā āha “aparabhāge atthato siddhenā”tiādi. Samayañcāti
tika-vin06t:173_17: āgamanapaccayasamavāyaṃ tadanurūpakālañca upādāyāti attho. Paccayasāmaggiñca āgamanakālañca
tika-vin06t:174_0: Etthāha – yathā “ekova kho, bhikkhave, khaṇo samayo cā”ti ettha khaṇasamayānaṃ eko
tika-vin06t:174_1: attho, tathā kālañca samayañca upādāyāti kālasamayānaṃ eko attho siyā, apica āgamanapaccayasamavāyo
tika-vin06t:174_2: cettha samayo kālassāpi āgamanapaccayattā samayaggahaṇeneva so gahitoti visuṃ kālo
tika-vin06t:174_3: kimatthaṃ gahitoti ca? Vuccate – appeva nāma svepīti kālassa paṭhamaṃ niyamitattā
tika-vin06t:174_4: na samayo kālattho. Tasmiṃ sveti niyamitakāle itaresaṃ āgamanapaccayānaṃ samavāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:174_6: kālañca upādāyāti sveti paricchinnadivase pubbaṇhādikālaniyatabhāvaṃ dasseti, tasmā
tika-vin06t:174_7: kālasamayānaṃ na ekatthattā kālassa visuṃ gahaṇampi sātthakanti veditabbaṃ. Yasmā
tika-vin06t:174_8: khaṇe khaṇe tvaṃ bhikkhu jāyasi ca jīyasi ca mīyasi ceti bhikkhuniyā santike abhikkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:174_9: gacchatīti ca khaṇe khaṇe bhāsati satthusāsananti ca khaṇasaddo anekattho, tathā
tika-vin06t:174_10: samayasaddo ca, tasmā ekamekena niyamento “ekova kho, bhikkhave, khaṇo ca samayo
tika-vin06t:174_11: cā”ti āha. Khaṇasamayānaṃ attho ekattho yujjati khaṇo okāsalābho, aṭṭhakkhaṇavajjito
tika-vin06t:174_12: navamo khaṇoti attho. Attano attano ucchedādayo diṭṭhigatasaṅkhāte samaye ettha pavadantīti
tika-vin06t:174_14: tindukācīraṃ. Ekasālaketi eko sālarukkho. “Kuṭikā”tipi vadanti. Atthābhisamayāti
tika-vin06t:174_15: attano hitapaṭilābhā. Dhīroti ca paṇḍito vuccati, nāñño. Sammā mānābhisamayāti suṭṭhu
tika-vin06t:174_16: mānassa pahānena, samucchedavasena suṭṭhu mānappahānenāti attho. Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭhotiādīsu
tika-vin06t:174_17: “catunnaṃ saccānaṃ catūhi ākārehi paṭivedho”tiādīsu khandhapañcakasaṅkhātassa dukkhassa
tika-vin06t:174_18: dukkhākāratāyaṭṭho. Saṅkhataṭṭho kāraṇuppattiattho, dukkhāya vedanāya santāpaṭṭho.
tika-vin06t:174_19: Sukhāya vedanāya vipariṇāmaṭṭho. Pīḷanaṭṭhādikova abhisamayaṭṭhoti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin06t:174_21: Dukkarakārikasamayopi kāḷo samaṇo gotamo na kāḷotiādinā pākaṭo. Sattasattāhāni ca
tika-vin06t:175_0: Accantameva taṃ samayanti ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva pattasanniṭṭhānā, tāva accantasampayogena
tika-vin06t:175_1: tasmiṃ samaye. Karuṇāvihārena vihāsīti karuṇākiccavihārena tasmiṃ samaye vihāsīti
tika-vin06t:175_2: attho. Taṃ samayañhi karuṇākiccasamayaṃ. Ñāṇakiccaṃ karuṇākiccanti dve bhagavato
tika-vin06t:175_3: kiccāni, abhisambodhi ñāṇakiccaṃ, mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā veneyyasattāvalokanaṃ
tika-vin06t:175_4: katvā tadanurūpakaraṇaṃ karuṇākiccaṃ. “Sannipatitānaṃ vo, bhikkhave, dvayaṃ karaṇīya”nti
tika-vin06t:175_5: hi vuttaṃ, taṃ bhagavāpi karotiyeva. Atha vā āgantukehi bhikkhūhi ādisamāyogañca.
tika-vin06t:175_6: Tattha karuṇākiccaṃ vihāraṃ dassento “karuṇāvihārena vihāsī”ti āha. Adhikaraṇañhi
tika-vin06t:175_7: kālatthoti ettha hi-kāro kāraṇattho. Tattha hi abhidhamme kālasamūhakhaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātavasena
tika-vin06t:175_8: pañcavidho samayaṭṭho daṭṭhabbo. Kālasamūhaṭṭho samayo kathaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti? Adhikaraṇamuppattiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:175_9: pubbaṇhe jātoti yathā, evaṃ kālaṭṭho samayasaddo daṭṭhabbo. Kathaṃ rāsaṭṭho? Yavarāsimhi
tika-vin06t:175_10: jātoti yathā. Tasmā yasmiṃ kāle puñje vā cittaṃ samuppannaṃ, tasmiṃ kāle puñje vā
tika-vin06t:175_11: phassādayo uppajjantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Adhikaraṇañhīti ettha abhidhamme niddiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin06t:175_12: adhikaraṇaṃ kālaṭṭho samūhaṭṭho ca hoti, “yasmiṃ samaye”ti vuttaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:175_13: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idāni bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇañca dassento “tattha vuttāna”miccādimāha.
tika-vin06t:175_14: Tattha abhidhamme vuttānaṃ bhāvo nāma kinti? Uppatti vijjamānatā, sā tesaṃ tattha
tika-vin06t:175_15: vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ, sā pana samayassa bhāvena bhāvo lakkhīyati ñāyati, tasmā
tika-vin06t:176_0: Tattha khaṇo nāma aṭṭhakkhaṇavinimutto navamo khaṇo, tasmiṃ sati uppajjati. Samavāyo
tika-vin06t:176_1: nāma cakkhundriyādikāraṇasāmaggī, tasmiṃ sati uppajjati. Hetu nāma rūpādiārammaṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:176_2: Tasmā tasmiṃ khaṇakāraṇasamavāyahetumhi sati tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ bhāvo vijjamānatā
tika-vin06t:176_3: hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Idha pana hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavatīti ettha atthadvayamekassa
tika-vin06t:176_4: sambhavatīti idha vinaye vuttassa samayasaddassa kattukaraṇatthe tatiyā hetumhi ca
tika-vin06t:176_5: ityuttattā. So dubbiññeyyoti “tathāgatova tattha kālaṃ jānissatī”ti vuttattāti vuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:176_6: hoti. Tena samayenāti tassa samayassa kāraṇā “annena vasati vijjāya vasatī”ti yathā,
tika-vin06t:176_7: annaṃ vā vijjaṃ vā labhāmīti tadatthaṃ vasatītyattho. Evaṃ “tena samayena viharatī”ti
tika-vin06t:176_8: vutte hetvatthe tatiyā daṭṭhabbā, tasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā samayañca vītikkamañca
tika-vin06t:176_9: olokayamāno tattha tattha vihāsīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tatiyapārājikādīsu “icchāmahaṃ, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:176_10: addhamāsaṃ, paṭisallīyitu”nti evamādīsu daṭṭhabbā, tasmā dutiyā kāladdhāne accantasaṃyogeti
tika-vin06t:176_11: dutiyātra sambhavati “māsamadhīte divasamadhīte”ti yathā. Idha pana hetuattho karaṇattho
tika-vin06t:176_12: ca sambhavatīti ettha yassa karaṇavacanassa hetuattho sambhavati, tena samayena hetubhūtena
tika-vin06t:176_13: taṃ taṃ vatthuvītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ vītikkamasamayasaṅkhātaṃ vā sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca
tika-vin06t:176_14: apekkhamāno bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi. Yassa karaṇattho sambhavati, tena karaṇabhūtena
tika-vin06t:176_15: samayena sampattena sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:177_0: Gaṇṭhipade pana “sudinnādīnaṃ vītikkamova kāraṇaṃ nāma, tassa niyamabhūto kālo pana
tika-vin06t:177_1: karaṇameva taṃ kālaṃ anatikkamitvāva sikkhāpadassa paññapetabbattā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin06t:177_2: niddosaṃ. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “idaṃ karaṇaṃ pubbabhāgattā paṭhamaṃ vattabbampi pacchā
tika-vin06t:177_3: vutta”nti, taṃ duvuttaṃ. Hetuatthato hi yathā pacchā karaṇattho yojiyamāno anukkameneva
tika-vin06t:177_4: yogaṃ gacchati, tathā ca yojito. Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathācariyo pacchā vuttaṃ idaṃ karaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:177_5: paṭhamaṃ yojetvā paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ hetuatthaṃ pacchā yojesi, taṃ yojanāsukhattāti veditabbanti
tika-vin06t:177_6: ācariyena likhitaṃ. Ito paṭṭhāya yattha yattha “ācariyena likhita”nti vā “ācariyassa
tika-vin06t:177_7: takko”ti vā vuccati, tattha tattha ācariyo nāma ānandācariyo kalasapuravāsīti gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:177_8: Etthāha – yathā suttante “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā”ti vuccati, tathā “tena samayena bhagavā
tika-vin06t:177_9: verañjāya”nti vattabbaṃ, atha savevacanaṃ vattukāmo thero, tathāgato sugatotiādīnipi
tika-vin06t:177_10: vattabbāni, atha imasseva padadvayassa gahaṇe kiñci payojanaṃ atthi, taṃ vattabbanti?
tika-vin06t:177_11: Vuccate – kesañci buddhassa bhagavato paramagambhīraṃ ajjhāsayakkamaṃ ajānataṃ “apaññatte
tika-vin06t:177_12: sikkhāpade anādīnavadasso…pe… abhiviññāpesī”tiādikaṃ “atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ
tika-vin06t:177_13: sudinnaṃ paṭipucchī”tiādikañca “sādiyi tvaṃ bhikkhūti. Nāhaṃ bhagavā sādiyi”ntiādikañca
tika-vin06t:177_14: tathā purāṇavohārikaṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchitvā tena vuttaparicchedena dutiyapārājikapaññāpanañca
tika-vin06t:177_15: devadattassa pabbajjānujānanañcāti evamādikaṃ vinayapariyattiṃ disvā buddhasubuddhataṃ
tika-vin06t:177_16: paṭicca saṅkā sambhaveyya, “tathā kiṃ pana tuyhaṃ chavassa kheḷāsakassā”ti evamādikaṃ
tika-vin06t:177_17: pharusavacanapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vinayapariyattiṃ nissāya khīṇāsavattaṃ paṭicca saṅkā sambhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:177_18: tadubhayasaṅkāvinodanatthaṃ āyasmatā upālittherena idameva padadvayaggahaṇaṃ sabbattha
tika-vin06t:177_19: katanti veditabbaṃ. Tenetaṃ dīpeti – kāmaṃ sabbañeyyabuddhattā buddhoyeva, bhaggasabbadosattā
tika-vin06t:177_20: bhagavāva, so satthāti. Paratopi vuttaṃ “jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchanti…pe… anatthasaṃhite
tika-vin06t:177_21: setughāto tathāgatāna”nti. Suttante ca vuttaṃ “saṇhenapi kesi vinemi pharusenapī”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:178_0: Asādhāraṇahetumhīti ettha kusalamūlāni na akusalānaṃ kadāci mūlāni honti, tathā akusalamūlāni
tika-vin06t:178_1: kusalānaṃ, abyākatamūlāni na kadāci kusalānanti ayameva nayo labbhati, yasmā kusalā
tika-vin06t:178_2: hetū taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo, tasmā kusalāni kusalānaṃyevātiādinayo
tika-vin06t:178_3: na labbhati. Puci vuccate kuṭṭhā, te mandayati nāsayatīti pucimando. Sattānaṃ hitasukhanipphādanādhimuttatanti
tika-vin06t:178_4: ettha sāmaññato vuttasatte dvidhā bhinditvā dassetuṃ “manussānaṃ upakārabahulata”ntiādi
tika-vin06t:178_5: vuttaṃ. Bahujanahitāyāti bahuno janassa hitatthāya. Paññāsampattiyā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikahitūpadesako
tika-vin06t:178_6: hi bhagavā. Sukhāyāti sukhatthāya. Cāgasampattiyā upakārakasukhasampadāyako hi esa.
tika-vin06t:178_7: Mettākaruṇāsampattiyā lokānukampāya mātāpitaro viya. Lokassa rakkhitagopitā hi esa.
tika-vin06t:178_8: Devamanussānanti ettha bhabbapuggale veneyyasatteyeva gahetvā tesaṃ nibbānamaggaphalādhigamāya
tika-vin06t:178_9: attano uppattiṃ dasseti. “Atthāyā”ti hi vutte paramatthatthāya nibbānāya, “hitāyā”ti
tika-vin06t:178_10: vutte taṃsampāpakamaggatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti, maggato uttari hitaṃ nāma natthīti.
tika-vin06t:178_11: Sukhāyāti phalasamāpattisukhatthāya tato uttari sukhābhāvato. Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātenāti
tika-vin06t:178_12: ettha samādhiṃ paññañca aggahetvā diṭṭhisīlamattaggahaṇaṃ sabbasekkhāsekkhasāmaññattā.
tika-vin06t:178_14: Diṭṭhiggahaṇena paññāpi gahitāti ce? Na, sotāpannādīnampi paññāya paripūrakāribhāvappasaṅgato,
tika-vin06t:178_15: tasmā ekalakkhaṇānampi tāsaṃ paññādiṭṭhīnaṃ avatthantarabhedo atthi dhitisamādhindriyasammāsamādhīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:178_16: viya. Aññāsīti ettha sotadvārānusārena ñātā, atthā sutāti hi vuccanti “sutametaṃ,
tika-vin06t:178_17: bho gotama, pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti cā”tiādīsu viya. “Bhikkhu kho,
tika-vin06t:178_18: upāli, saṅghaṃ bhindatī”tiādīsu viya avadhāraṇatthe vā. Verañjāyaṃ bhavo vijjamāno.
tika-vin06t:178_19: Itthambhūtassa evaṃ bhūtassa. Kathaṃ bhūtassa? Sakyaputtassa sakyakulā pabbajitassa,
tika-vin06t:178_20: evaṃ hutvā ṭhitassa kittisaddo abbhuggatoti abhisaddena yoge upayogavacanāni hontīti attho.
tika-vin06t:179_0: Kāmupādānapaccayā eva mettaṃ bhāveti, brahmaloke nibbattatīti iminā kāmupādānahetu
tika-vin06t:179_1: kammaṃ katvā kāmabhave eva nibbattatītivādīnaṃ vādo paṭikkhittoti vadanti, “brahmaloke
tika-vin06t:179_2: paṇītā kāmā”ti sutvā, kappetvā vā pacchā “tattha sampattiṃ anubhavissāmī”ti kāmupādānapaccayā
tika-vin06t:179_3: tadupagaṃ karotīti brahmalokepi kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmā, “tadārammaṇattā taṇhā kāmupādānanti
tika-vin06t:179_4: vuttā”ti ca vadanti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Kammañca cakkhussa janakakāraṇaṃ, kammassa mūlakāraṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:179_5: taṇhā, tasmā na mūlakāraṇaṃ hoti janakaṃ. Rūpataṇhādayo dukkhasaccaṃ khandhapariyāpannattā,
tika-vin06t:179_6: “yampicchaṃ na labhati, tampi dukkha”nti vacanato ca. Tassa mūlakāraṇabhāvena samuṭṭhāpikāti
tika-vin06t:179_7: tassa kāraṇabhūtassa imassa khandhapañcakassa samuṭṭhāpikāti yojetabbaṃ. “Āsavasamudayā
tika-vin06t:179_8: avijjāsamudayo”ti vacanato tassa eva kāraṇantipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Apica “rūpādi viya
tika-vin06t:179_9: taṇhāpi taṇhāya uppattippahānaṭṭhāna”nti vacanato rūpādi viya taṇhāpi dukkhasaccaṃ
tika-vin06t:179_10: kataṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ “rūpataṇhā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā
tika-vin06t:179_11: uppajjatī”ti ca “etthesā taṇhā pahīyamānā pahīyatī”ti ca. Visuddhimagge “sabbākārena
tika-vin06t:179_12: pana upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca aññatra taṇhāyā”ti vacanato
tika-vin06t:179_13: idha rūpataṇhādayo dukkhasaccanti vacanaṃ virujjhatīti ce? Na, aññamaññāsaṅkarabhāvena
tika-vin06t:179_14: dassetuṃ tattha tattha vuttattā. Yadi taṇhā upādānakkhandhapariyāpannā na bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:179_15: saccavibhaṅge “tattha katame saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā. Seyyathidaṃ,
tika-vin06t:179_17: vattabbaṃ bhaveyya, na ca vuttaṃ, tasmā dukkhasaccapariyāpannā taṇhāti ce? Na, hetuphalasaṅkaradosappasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:179_18: Na saṅkaradosoti ce? Saccavibhaṅgapāḷiyañhi pañcahi koṭṭhāsehi samudayasaccaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:180_0: Kathaṃ? Taṇhāti eko vāro, taṇhā ca avasesā ca kilesāti dutiyo, taṇhā ca avasesā ca
tika-vin06t:180_1: kilesā avasesā ca akusalā dhammāti tatiyo, taṇhā ca avasesā ca kilesā avasesā ca
tika-vin06t:180_2: akusalā dhammā tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavānīti catuttho, taṇhā ca avasesā ca kilesā
tika-vin06t:180_3: avasesā ca akusalā dhammā tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā
tika-vin06t:180_4: dhammāti pañcamo vāroti. Āma niddiṭṭhaṃ, tathāpi abhidhammabhājaniyeyeva, na aññasmiṃ,
tika-vin06t:180_5: so ca nayo ariyasaccaniddese na labbhati. Tathā hi tattha “cattāri saccāni”ccevāha,
tika-vin06t:180_6: suttantabhājaniyapañhapucchakesu viya “cattāri ariyasaccānī”ti na vuttaṃ, tasmā suttantabhājaniyova
tika-vin06t:180_7: pamāṇaṃ tattha ca taṇhāya vuttattā. Yathāha “tattha katamaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ,
tika-vin06t:180_8: yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobhavikā…pe… seyyathidaṃ, kāmataṇhā”tiādi. “Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti
tika-vin06t:180_9: iminā pariyāyena vuttattā tattha vuttampi pamāṇameva. “Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
tika-vin06t:180_10: viharati pathavīkasiṇa”nti vacanato “kasiṇānī”ti jhānāni vuttāni. Keci “uggahanimittapaṭibhāganimitte
tika-vin06t:180_11: sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. “Dvattiṃsākārāpi paṇṇattiṃ vissajjetvā
tika-vin06t:180_12: paṭikūlāti sati paṭṭhapetabbā”ti vacanato satigocarā rūpādayo ca veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:181_1: nāma. Sabhāvatoti dukkhato. Na cavatīti deve sandhāya. Ñāteyyanti ñātabbaṃ. Daṭṭheyyanti
tika-vin06t:181_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā pana “nāhaṃ gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyya”nti vadāmīti attho.
tika-vin06t:181_3: Lokanti khandhalokaṃ. Gamanena na pattabboti sarīragamanena, agatigamanena vā na
tika-vin06t:181_4: pattabbo, ariyagamanena lokantaṃ patvāva dukkhā atthi pamocananti vuttaṃ hoti. Samitāvīti
tika-vin06t:181_5: samitakileso. Āhāraṭṭhitikāti paccayaṭṭhitikā. Ye keci paccayaṭṭhitikā, sabbe te
tika-vin06t:181_6: lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena eko lokoti adhippāyo. Saṅkhārā hi sakasakapaccayāyattatāya
tika-vin06t:181_7: sattā visattā sattā nāma. Pariharanti paricaranti. Disāti upayogabahuvacanaṃ. Bhanti
tika-vin06t:181_8: paṭibhanti. Ke te? Teyeva virocamānā pabhassarā candimasūriyā. Aṭṭha lokadhammā saṅkhārāva.
tika-vin06t:181_9: “Sinerussa samantato”ti vacanato yugandharādayo sineruṃ parikkhipitvā parimaṇḍalākārena
tika-vin06t:181_10: ṭhitāti vadanti. Parikkhipitvā accuggato lokadhātu ayaṃ. “Ma-kāro padasandhikaro”ti
tika-vin06t:181_11: vadanti. Aññathāpi lakkhaṇādibhedato saṅkhāralokaṃ, āsayānusayabhedato sattalokaṃ,
tika-vin06t:182_0: Vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ parittaṃ lokiyaṃ, tena sabbaṃ lokaṃ kathaṃ abhivati?
tika-vin06t:182_1: Asadisānubhāvattā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viya. Tañhi attano visaye bhagavato sabbaññutaññāṇagatikaṃ,
tika-vin06t:182_2: lahutarappavatti ca bhavaṅgacittadvayānantaraṃ uppattito. Na kassaci evaṃlahutaraṃ
tika-vin06t:182_3: cittaṃ uppajjati, api āyasmato sāriputtassa, tassa kiresa cittavāro pañcadasabhavaṅgānantaranti.
tika-vin06t:182_4: Aggisikhadhūmasikhā ca nāgā kira sīhaḷadīpe. Atthassa dīpakaṃ padaṃ atthapadaṃ. Ekatthadīpakaṃ
tika-vin06t:182_5: padaṃ, sabbametaṃ vākyanti attho. Aṭṭha disā nāma aṭṭha vimokkhā, samāpattiyo vā.
tika-vin06t:182_6: Satthavāho satthāti nipātito yathā pisitāso pisāco. Udake maṇḍūko ahaṃ āsiṃ, na thale
tika-vin06t:182_7: maṇḍūko, vārimattameva gocaro, tassa me tava dhammaṃ suṇantassa sīsaṃ daṇḍena sannirumbhitvāti
tika-vin06t:182_8: pāṭhaseso. Anādaratthe vā sāmivacanaṃ. “Ettakenapi evarūpā iddhi bhavissatī”ti sitaṃ
tika-vin06t:182_9: katvā. Vimokkhoti cettha maggo, tadanantarikaṃ ñāṇaṃ nāma phalañāṇaṃ, tasmiṃ khaṇe
tika-vin06t:182_10: buddho nāma. Sabbassa buddhattāti kattari. Bodhetāti hetukattari. Seṭṭhatthadīpakaṃ
tika-vin06t:182_11: vacanaṃ seṭṭhaṃ nāma, tathā uttamaṃ. Sacchikāpaññattīti sabbadhammānaṃ sacchikaraṇavasena
tika-vin06t:182_12: sayambhutā paññatti, attanā eva vā ñātā sacchikatātipi sacchikāpaññatti. Bhagī bhagavā
tika-vin06t:182_13: cīvarapiṇḍapātādīnaṃ. Bhajī araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni. Bhāgī atthadhammavimuttirasassa.
tika-vin06t:182_14: Rāgādikilesagaṇabhaggamakāsi. Bhāvitattano bhāvitakāyo. Bhavassa antaṃ nibbānaṃ maggādhigamena
tika-vin06t:183_0: “Lobhaṃ, bhikkhave, ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahathā”tiādinā nayena ekakādivasenāgate gahetvā
tika-vin06t:183_2: Cīvarahetu vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, piṇḍapāta senāsanaitibhavābhavahetu
tika-vin06t:183_3: vā. Cetokhilā satthari kaṅkhati, dhamme, saṅghe, sikkhāya, sabrahmacārīsu kupitoti
tika-vin06t:183_4: āgatā pañca. Kāme avītarāgo hoti…pe… kāye, rūpe, yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā,
tika-vin06t:183_5: aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratīti āgatā pañca vinibandhā. Vivādamūlāni
tika-vin06t:183_6: kodho upanāho makkho paḷāso issā macchariyaṃ māyā sāṭheyyaṃ thambho sārambho sandiṭṭhiparāmāsitā
tika-vin06t:183_7: ādhānaggāhī duppaṭinissaggitā. Vibhaṅge pana “kodho makkho issā sāṭheyyaṃ pāpicchatā
tika-vin06t:183_8: sandiṭṭhiparāmāsitā”ti āgataṃ. Taṇhaṃ paṭicca pariyesanā, pariyesanaṃ paṭicca lābho,
tika-vin06t:183_9: lābhaṃ paṭicca vinicchayo, evaṃ chandarāgo, ajjhosānaṃ, pariggaho, macchariyaṃ, ārakkho,
tika-vin06t:183_10: ārakkhādhikaraṇaṃ, daṇḍādānasatthādāna…pe… akusalā dhammā sambhavantīti vuttānaṃ.
tika-vin06t:183_12: aṭṭhārasa, tā eva ajjhattikassupādāya aṭṭhārasa, bāhirassupādāya aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa,
tika-vin06t:183_13: tā atīte chattiṃsa, anāgate chattiṃsa, paccuppanne chattiṃsāti evaṃ aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritānīti.
tika-vin06t:183_14: Māretīti māro, pamādo “pamādo maccuno pada”nti vacanato. Sammāājīvavināsanato vā
tika-vin06t:183_15: kilesā vuccanti “māro”ti, vadhakūpamattā khandhāva mārā. Abhisaṅkhārā jātidukkhābhinibbattāpanato,
tika-vin06t:183_16: jātassa jarādisambhavato ca mārā. Ekabhavapariyāpannajīvitamāraṇato maccu māro. Aṇimatā
tika-vin06t:183_17: nāma paramāṇu viya adassanūpagamanaṃ. Laghimatā sarīrena, cittena vā sīghagamanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:183_18: Mahimatā candimasūriyādīnampipāṇinā parāmasanādi. Patti nāma yathicchitadesappatti.
tika-vin06t:183_19: Pakāsanatā, lābhakassatthasādhanaṃ vā pākammaṃ. Īsattaṃ nāma sayaṃvasitā. Vasittaṃ
tika-vin06t:183_20: nāma aparavasitā. Yatthakāmāvasāyitaṃ nāma yatthicchati yadicchati yāvadicchati,
tika-vin06t:183_21: tattha tāva tadatthasādhanaṃ. Pīḷanasaṅkhatasantāpavipariṇāmaṭṭhena vā dukkhamariyasaccantiādimhi
tika-vin06t:183_22: idaṃ codanāpubbaṅgamaṃ atthavissajjanaṃ – dukkhādīnaṃ aññepi rūpataṇhādayo atthā
tika-vin06t:183_23: atthi, atha kasmā cattāro eva vuttāti ce? Aññasaccadassanavasena āvibhāvato.
tika-vin06t:184_0: “Tattha katamaṃ dukkheñāṇaṃ, dukkhaṃ ārabbha yā uppajjati paññā”tiādināpi nayena
tika-vin06t:184_1: ekekasaccārammaṇavasenāpi saccañāṇaṃ vuttaṃ. “Yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi
tika-vin06t:184_2: so passatī”tiādinā nayena ekaṃ saccaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā sesesu kiccanipphattivasenāpi
tika-vin06t:184_3: vuttaṃ. Tattha yadā ekekaṃ saccaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, tadā samudayadassanena tāva sabhāvato
tika-vin06t:184_4: pīḷanalakkhaṇassāpi dukkhassa yasmā taṃ āyūhanalakkhaṇena samudayena āyūhitaṃ saṅkhataṃ,
tika-vin06t:184_5: tasmāssa so saṅkhataṭṭho āvi bhavati. Yasmā pana maggo kilesasantāpaharo susītalo,
tika-vin06t:184_6: tasmāssa maggadassanena santāpaṭṭho āvi bhavati nandassa accharādassanena sundariyā
tika-vin06t:184_7: anabhirūpabhāvo viya. Avipariṇāmadhammassa pana nirodhassa dassanena tassa vipariṇāmaṭṭho
tika-vin06t:184_8: āvi bhavatīti vattabbameva natthi. Sabhāvato āyūhanalakkhaṇassapi samudayassa dukkhadassanena
tika-vin06t:184_9: nidānaṭṭho āvi bhavati asappāyabhojanato uppannabyādhidassanena bhojanassa byādhinidānabhāvo
tika-vin06t:184_10: viya. Visaṃyogabhūtassa nirodhassa dassanena saṃyogaṭṭho. Niyyānabhūtassa ca maggassa
tika-vin06t:184_11: dassanena palibodhaṭṭhoti. Tathā nissaraṇassāpi nirodhassa avivekabhūtassa samudayassa
tika-vin06t:184_12: dassanena vivekaṭṭho āvi bhavati. Maggadassanena asaṅkhataṭṭho. Iminā hi anamatagge
tika-vin06t:184_13: saṃsāre maggo na diṭṭhapubbo, sopi ca sappaccayattā saṅkhato evāti appaccayadhammassa
tika-vin06t:184_14: asaṅkhatabhāvo ativiya pākaṭo hoti. Dukkhadassanena panassa amataṭṭho āvi bhavati.
tika-vin06t:184_15: Dukkhañhi visaṃ, amataṃ nibbānanti. Tathā niyyānalakkhaṇassāpi maggassa samudayadassanena
tika-vin06t:184_16: “nāyaṃ hetu nibbānassa pattiyā, ayaṃ hetū”ti hetvattho āvi bhavati. Nirodhadassanena
tika-vin06t:184_17: dassanaṭṭho paramasukhumarūpāni passato “vippasannaṃ vata me cakkhū”ti cakkhussa
tika-vin06t:184_19: issarajanassa uḷārabhāvo viyāti evamettha lakkhaṇavasena, ekassa aññasaccadassanavasena
tika-vin06t:184_20: ca itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ āvibhāvato ekekassa cattāro atthā vuttā. Upadhiviveko nikkilesatā.
tika-vin06t:185_0: Paṭipakkhaṃ atthayantīti paccatthikā. Pati viruddhā amittā paccāmittā. Sacchikatvā
tika-vin06t:185_1: pavedetīti ettāvatā bhagavato sabbaññutaṃ dīpeti. Tena ñāṇasampattiṃ dīpetvā idāni
tika-vin06t:185_2: karuṇāsampattiṃ dīpetuṃ “so dhammaṃ desesī”tiādimāha. Atha vā kiṃ so pavedesīti?
tika-vin06t:185_3: Ñāṇaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ tilokahitabhūtameva. So dhammaṃ desesīti kīdisaṃ? “Ādikalyāṇa”ntiādi.
tika-vin06t:185_4: Anena vacanena vattuṃ arahabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Sāsanadhammoti ovādapariyatti. Kiccasuddhiyāti
tika-vin06t:185_6: navakoṭisahassānītiādikaṃ vā. Maggameva brahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ. Tassa pakāsakaṃ
tika-vin06t:185_7: piṭakattayaṃ idha sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ nāma. Chasu atthapadesu saṅkhepato kāsanaṃ
tika-vin06t:185_8: saṅkāsanaṃ. Ādito kāsanaṃ pakāsanaṃ. Ubhayampi vitthāretvā desanaṃ vivaraṇaṃ. Puna
tika-vin06t:185_9: vibhāgakaraṇaṃ vibhajanaṃ. Opammādinā pākaṭakaraṇaṃ uttānīkaraṇaṃ. Sotūnaṃ cittaparitosajananena,
tika-vin06t:185_10: cittanisānena ca paññāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Byañjanapadesu akkharaṇato akkharaṃ, “ekakkharapadamakkhara”nti
tika-vin06t:185_11: eke. Vibhattiantaṃ padaṃ. Byañjayatīti byañjanaṃ, vākyaṃ. Padasamudāyo vā vākyaṃ.
tika-vin06t:185_12: Vibhāgapakāso ākāro nāma. Phusatīti phassotiādi nibbacanaṃ nirutti, niruttiyā niddiṭṭhassa
tika-vin06t:185_13: apadeso niddeso nāma. Phusatīti phasso, so tividho – sukhavedanīyo dukkhavedanīyo
tika-vin06t:185_14: adukkhamasukhavedanīyoti. Etesu ayaṃ yojanā – akkharehi saṅkāsayati, padehi pakāsayati,
tika-vin06t:185_15: byañjanehi vivarati, ākārehi vibhajati, niruttīhi uttāniṃ karoti, niddesehi paññāpeti.
tika-vin06t:185_16: Akkharehi vā saṅkāsayitvā padehi pakāseti, byañjanehi vivaritvā ākārehi vibhajati,
tika-vin06t:185_17: niruttīhi uttāniṃ katvā niddesehi paññāpeti. Akkharehi vā ugghāṭetvā padehi vineti
tika-vin06t:185_18: ugghaṭitaññuṃ, byañjanehi vivaritvā ākārehi vineti vipañcitaññuṃ, niruttīhi netvā
tika-vin06t:185_19: niddesehi vineti neyyanti veditabbaṃ. Atthoti bhāsitattho. Tassevatthassa paṭivijjhitabbo
tika-vin06t:185_20: sako sako bhāvo paṭivedho nāma. Taṃ ubhayampi attho nāma. Tena vuttaṃ “atthagambhīratāpaṭivedhagambhīratāhi
