tika-vin06t:185_21: sāttha”nti. Dhammoti vā desanāti vā byañjanameva. Niddosabhāvena parisuddhaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:185_22: sikkhattayapariggahito maggo ca, ubhayampi brahmacariyapadena saṅgahitaṃ. Paṭipattiyāti
tika-vin06t:185_23: paṭipattihetu. Āgamabyattitoti punappunaṃ adhīyamānā khandhādayo pākaṭā honti. Duruttasatthāni
tika-vin06t:186_0: 2-3. Kacci khamanīyaṃ sītuṇhādi. Kacci yāpanīyaṃ yathāladdhehi jīvitasādhanehi jīvitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:186_1: Appābādhanti appopasaggaṃ, appātaṅkanti apparogaṃ. Kacci lahuṭṭhānaṃ sarīrakicce.
tika-vin06t:186_2: Kacci balaṃ samaṇakicce. Kacci phāsuvihāro yathāvuttanayena appābādhatāya, anukkaṇṭhanādivasena
tika-vin06t:186_3: vā. Sattasaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pacchimavayo, uttarāmukhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Lokavivaraṇe
tika-vin06t:186_4: jāte idha kiṃ olokesi, natthettha tayā sadisopīti āha “tvaṃ sadevakassa lokassa aggo”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:186_5: Āsabhiṃ uttamaṃ. Upapattivasena devā. Rūpānaṃ paribhogavasena, patthanāvasena vā
tika-vin06t:186_6: uppannā rāgasampayuttā somanassavedanānurūpato uppajjitvā hadayatappanato ambarasādayo
tika-vin06t:186_7: viya “rūparasā”ti vuccanti. Tathāgatassa pahīnāti adhikāravasenāha. Tathāgatassapi
tika-vin06t:186_8: hi kassaci te pahīnāti matthakacchinnatālo viya katā. Kathaṃ? Rūparasādivacanena
tika-vin06t:186_9: vipākadhammadhammā gahitā, te vijjamānāpi matthakasadisānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ maggasatthena
tika-vin06t:186_10: chinnattā āyatiṃ tālapantisadise vipākakkhandhe nibbattetuṃ asamatthā jātā. Tasmā
tika-vin06t:186_11: tālāvatthu viya katā. “Kusalasomanassāpi ettha saṅgahitā”ti vadanti. Paṭhamamaggena
tika-vin06t:186_12: pahīnā kammapathaṭṭhāniyā, dutiyena ucchinnamūlā oḷārikā, tatiyena tālāvatthukatā
tika-vin06t:186_14: pana dīpento “āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā”ti āha. Tadaṅgappahānena vā pahīnā vipassanākkhaṇe,
tika-vin06t:186_15: jhānassa pubbabhāgakkhaṇe vā, vikkhambhanappahānena ucchinnamūlā jhānakkhaṇe. “Vivicceva
tika-vin06t:186_16: kāmehī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Samucchedappahānena tālāvatthukatā tatiyavijjādhigamakkhaṇe.
tika-vin06t:186_17: Itthambhūtā pana te rūparasādayo anabhāvaṃkatā āyatimanuppādadhammāti ekamevidaṃ
tika-vin06t:186_18: atthapadaṃ. Paṭhamāya vā abhinibbhidāya pahīnā, dutiyāya ucchinnamūlā, tatiyāya tālāvatthukatā.
tika-vin06t:186_19: Itthambhūtā yasmā anabhāvaṃkatā nāma honti, tasmā āyatiṃanauppādadhammāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:186_20: Atha vā dukkhañāṇena pahīnā, samudayañāṇena ucchinnamūlā, nirodhañāṇena tālāvatthukatā,
tika-vin06t:186_21: maggañāṇena anabhāvaṃkatā, paccavekkhaṇañāṇena āyatiṃ anuppādadhammāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:186_22: Lokiyamaggena vā pahīnā, dassanamaggena ucchinnamūlā, tividhena bhāvanāmaggena tālāvatthukatātiādi.
tika-vin06t:187_0: 11. Dhammadhātunti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dhammadhātu nāma. Anukampavacanānurūpaṃ
tika-vin06t:187_2: kāraṇaṃ “karuṇāvipphāra”nti vadanti. Paṭicchādetabbe hi attano guṇe “āraddhaṃ kho
tika-vin06t:187_3: pana me vīriya”ntiādinā pakāsento attano karuṇāvipphāraṃ pakāsetīti gahetabbo. Varabhūrimedhaso
tika-vin06t:187_4: varaputhulañāṇo, bhūrīti vā bhūmi, bhūmi viya patthaṭavarapaññoti attho. Abujjhi
tika-vin06t:187_5: etthātipi adhikaraṇena rukkho bodhi. Sayaṃ bujjhati, bujjhanti vā tena taṃsamaṅginoti
tika-vin06t:187_6: maggo bodhi, evaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇampi. Bujjhīyatīti nibbānaṃ bodhi. Tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ
tika-vin06t:187_7: upanissayavato yathāsambhavaṃ tisso vijjā veditabbā. Ekaggatāvasena tikkhabhāvo.
tika-vin06t:187_8: Tikkhopi ekacco saro lakkhaṃ patvā kuṇṭho hoti, na tathā idaṃ. Satindriyavasenassa
tika-vin06t:187_9: kharabhāvo, saddhindriyavasena vippasannabhāvo, antarā anosakkitvā kilesapaccatthikānaṃ
tika-vin06t:187_10: suṭṭhu abhibhavanato vīriyindriyavasenassa sūrabhāvo ca veditabbo. Maggavijāyanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:188: Chandoti ca saṅkappoti ca avatthantarabhedabhinno rāgova –
tika-vin06t:194_0: Vibhaṅgeyeva kiñcāpi attho vuttoti ettha ayamadhippāyo – vibhaṅgapāḷiṃ ānetvā idha
tika-vin06t:194_1: vuttopi sabbesaṃ upakārāya na hoti, tasmā taṃ aṭṭhakathānayeneva pakāsayissāmīti.
tika-vin06t:194_2: Itoti kāmehi. Kāyavivekādīsu upadhiviveko tatiyo, tasmā tatiyaṃ chaḍḍetvā dve gahetvā
tika-vin06t:194_3: tadaṅgādīsu vikkhambhanavivekaṃ gahetvā “tayo evā”ti vuttā. Evaṃ sati cittavikkhambhanā
tika-vin06t:194_4: ekatthā evāti viseso na siyāti ce? Appanāvārattā na panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāyavivekaggahaṇena
tika-vin06t:194_5: pubbabhāgaggahaṇaṃ ñāyati, tasmā cittavivekoti tadaṅgaviveko vutto, vikkhambhanena
tika-vin06t:194_6: appanākāleti gahetabbaṃ asaṅkarato. Atha vā cittavivekena tadaṅgavikkhambhanā gahitā,
tika-vin06t:194_7: itarena vikkhambhanaviveko evātipi yuttaṃ, kilesakāmattā vā dvīsu kammesu pariyāpanno
tika-vin06t:194_8: puriso viya. Yathā avijjamānena avijjamānapaññattivasena loke “saphalo rukkho”ti
tika-vin06t:194_9: vuccati, tatheva vijjamānena vijjamānapaññattivasena sāsane “savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ
tika-vin06t:195_0: Vūpasamāti ettha kesaṃ vūpasamāti, kiṃ paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ, udāhu dutiyajjhānikānanti?
tika-vin06t:195_1: Ettha yadi paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ, natthi tesaṃ vūpasamo. Na hi paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārarahitaṃ
tika-vin06t:195_2: atthi. Yadi dutiyajjhānikānaṃ, nattheva vūpasamo tattha tadabhāvāti ce? Tenetaṃ vuccati
tika-vin06t:195_3: “samatikkamā”ti, samatikkamopi na tesaṃyeva. Kintu sakalassapi paṭhamajjhānadhammarāsissāti
tika-vin06t:195_4: ce? Tenetaṃ vuccati “oḷārikassa pana samatikkamā”tiādi. Sabbepi paṭhamajjhānadhammā
tika-vin06t:195_5: oḷārikāva dutiyajjhānato, na kevalaṃ vitakkavicāradvayamevāti ce? Na vitakkavicārāyeva
tika-vin06t:195_6: tehi sampayuttānaṃ oḷārikabhāvatoti tesveva ādīnavadassanena dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe tesaṃ
tika-vin06t:195_7: abhāvo hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe apātubhāvā”ti, yassa dhammassānubhāvena,
tika-vin06t:195_8: yogena vā idaṃ jhānaṃ “sampasādana”nti vuccati “ekodibhāva”nti ca, tassa dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:195_9: saddhāsamādhayo vibhaṅge vuttā. Paṇītabhojanasikkhāpade sappiādayo viyāti vutte ayaṃ
tika-vin06t:195_10: atthavaṇṇanā na virujjhati. Samaṃ passatīti līnuddhaccaṃ pahāya khīṇāsavassa chasu
tika-vin06t:195_13: saṅkhārupekkhā nāma. Vicinane majjhattabhūtā upekkhā vipassanupekkhā nāma. Tattha
tika-vin06t:195_15: pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekā tatramajjhattupekkhāva, avatthābhedena bhedo nesaṃ.
tika-vin06t:195_16: Saṅkhārupekkhāvipassanupekkhānampi ekatā paññāvasena, kiccavasena pana duvidhatā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:196_0: Chaḷaṅgupekkhā kāmāvacarā, brahmavihārupekkhā rūpāvacarātiādinā bhūmivasena. Chaḷaṅgupekkhā
tika-vin06t:196_1: khīṇāsavasseva, brahmavihārupekkhā tiṇṇampi puthujjanasekkhāsekkhānanti evaṃ puggalavasena.
tika-vin06t:196_3: evāti evaṃ cittavasena. Chaḷaṅgupekkhā chaḷārammaṇā, brahmavihārupekkhā dhammārammaṇāvāti
tika-vin06t:196_4: ārammaṇavasena. Vedanupekkhā vedanākkhandhena saṅgahitā, itarā nava saṅkhārakkhandhenāti
tika-vin06t:196_6: ca atthato ekā, tasmā ekakkhaṇe ekāva siyā, na itarā, tathā saṅkhārupekkhāvipassanupekkhāpi.
tika-vin06t:196_7: Vedanāvīriyupekkhānaṃ ekakkhaṇe siyā uppattīti. Chaḷaṅgupekkhā abyākatā, brahmavihārupekkhā
tika-vin06t:196_8: kusalābyākatā, tathā sesā. Vedanupekkhā pana siyā akusalāpi. Evaṃ kusalattikavasena.
tika-vin06t:196_10: evaṃ pahānakkamena avatvā vibhaṅge vuttanayena kasmā vuttānīti ce? Suttānurakkhaṇatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:196_12: anubhavatīti gahetabba”nti vadanti. Kasmā? Ekaṃyeva kasiṇaṃ ārabbha sabbesaṃ pavattito.
tika-vin06t:196_13: Tatiyajjhānato paṭṭhāya upakārā hutvā āgatāti satisīsena desanā katā, vigatavalāhakādinā
tika-vin06t:196_14: sommatāya rattiyā valāhakādinā kālussiye satipi divā viya anupakārikā na hoti rattiṃ,
tika-vin06t:196_15: tasmā “attano upakārakattena vā”ti vuttaṃ. “Sūriyappabhābhibhavā, rattiyā alābhāti
tika-vin06t:196_16: ime dve hetū aparisuddhatāya kāraṇaṃ. Sommabhāvena, attano upakārakattena cāti ime
tika-vin06t:196_17: dve sabhāgatāya kāraṇa”nti vadanti, tassā aparisuddhāya jātiyāti vuttaṃ hoti, tasmā
tika-vin06t:199_2: avatvā “pādakānī”ti āha. Tena pādakabhūtānampi yathāsambhavaṃ cittekaggatā bhavokkamanatāvahataṃ,
tika-vin06t:199_3: itaresaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ pādakatāvahatañca dīpeti. Asabhāgattā javanavipassanāpādakāni
tika-vin06t:199_4: samānāni abhiññāpādakāni ca honti, abhiññāpādakāni ca vipassanāpādakāni hontītipi
tika-vin06t:199_5: dīpeti, tathā pādakābhāvaṃ dīpeti. Abhiññāya hi catutthameva pādakaṃ, na itarāni.
tika-vin06t:199_6: Tesu catutthassa tatiyaṃ pādakaṃ, tatiyassa dutiyaṃ, dutiyassa paṭhamanti. Atha vā
tika-vin06t:201: Satthu yasmā tasmā bhagavā, vijjattayamāha verañje.
tika-vin06t:202_0: Vuttañhetaṃ “vinaye suppaṭipanno bhikkhu sīlasampattiṃ nissāyā”tiādi. Sīlavato hi
tika-vin06t:202_1: sīlapaccavekkhaṇatthaṃ rattiṭṭhānadivāṭhānesu nisinnassa nisajjanato paṭṭhāya attano
tika-vin06t:202_3: attānaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ cutipariggahaṇasīlatāya cutūpapātañāṇaṃ appakasirena samijjhati,
tika-vin06t:202_4: udakādīsu sukhumatta dassanasīlatāya dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ samijjhati. Yasmā sattavidhamethunasaṃyogaparivajjanena,
tika-vin06t:202_5: kāmāsavādiparivajjanena vā brahmacariyaṃ akhaṇḍādibhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti, tasmāssa āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:202_6: appakasirena samijjhatīti ettha vinayanidāne vijjattayameva dassitaṃ, tasmā āha “yesañca
tika-vin06t:202_7: guṇānaṃ dāyakaṃ ahosi, tesaṃ ekadesaṃ dassento”ti, aññathā vijjattayapaṭilābhamattappasaṅgo siyāti.
tika-vin06t:203_0: So evanti iminā kiñcāpi catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadāpi saṅgahaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin06t:203_1: na kevalaṃ purimajjhānattikameva, tathāpi kevalaṃ purimajjhānattikameva gaṇhanto
tika-vin06t:203_3: catutthajjhānaṃ paṭilabhitvāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha, taṃ kasmāti ce? Sambhārabhūmittā.
tika-vin06t:203_4: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ettha ca purimāni tīṇi jhānāni yasmā pītipharaṇena ca
tika-vin06t:203_5: sukhapharaṇena ca sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā lahumudukammaññakāyo hutvā
tika-vin06t:203_6: iddhiṃ pāpuṇāti, tasmā iminā pariyāyena iddhilābhāya saṃvattanato sambhārabhūmiyoti
tika-vin06t:203_7: veditabbāni. Catutthajjhānaṃ pana iddhilābhāya pakatibhūmi evā”ti. Idameva vā atthaṃ
tika-vin06t:203_8: sandhāyāha “pubbe imāni cattāri jhānāni kesañci abhiññāpādakānī”ti. Yadi evaṃ catutthajjhānampi
tika-vin06t:203_9: antokatvā evanti kimatthaṃ na vuttaṃ. Tañhi pakatibhūmīti ce? Na vattabbaṃ, catutthajjhānato
tika-vin06t:203_10: parassa samāhitādibhāvappattassa cittassa atthibhāvappasaṅgato. Yasmā yasmiṃ sati
tika-vin06t:203_11: “pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmesi”nti vuttaṃ, tasmā tasmiṃ catutthajjhānacitte
tika-vin06t:203_13: abhininnāmesi”nti āha. Abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hotīti ettha taṃ iddhividhādhigamatthāya
tika-vin06t:203_14: parikammacittaṃ abhinīharati. Kasiṇārammaṇato apanetvā iddhividhābhimukhaṃ pesesi.
tika-vin06t:204_0: So evaṃ samāhite evaṃ āneñjappatteti yojanā veditabbā dutiyavikappe, nīvaraṇadūrībhāvena
tika-vin06t:204_1: vitakkādisamatikkamenāti paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ kiccasaṅgaṇhanato. Ayaṃ yojanā paṭhamavikappe
tika-vin06t:204_2: na sambhavati “parisuddhetiādīsu panā”ti vacanena “eva”nti padassa anuppabandhanivāraṇato.
tika-vin06t:204_4: vatāhaṃ āpattiñceva āpanno assaṃ, na ca maṃ bhikkhū jāneyyu”ntiādinā nayena uppannaicchāvasena
tika-vin06t:204_5: pavattānaṃ kopaapaccayānaṃ abhāvena anaṅgaṇeti attho. Ettha ca pana yathāvuttappakārā
tika-vin06t:204_6: icchāpi paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya antarāyikā “sampajānamusāvādo kho panāyasmanto
tika-vin06t:204_7: antarāyiko dhammo”ti vuttattā, pageva icchāvacarā kopaapaccayā, tasmā vuttaṃ “jhānapaṭilābhapaccanīkānaṃ
tika-vin06t:204_9: potthakesu pāṭho dissati, so pamādalekho, gaṇṭhipade ca “aho vata satthā mamaññeva
tika-vin06t:204_10: paṭipucchitvā dhammaṃ deseyyā”ti yo tadattho likhito, so dullikhito. Na hi jhānapaṭilābhapaccayā
tika-vin06t:204_11: kopādayo anaṅgaṇasutte vuttā, “na ca yuttito sambhavanti jhānalābhino tadabhāvā”ti
tika-vin06t:204_12: ācariyo vadati, taṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Ettha vijjattayassa uttaruttaravisesadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:204_13: “so evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādinā punappunaṃ aṭṭhaṅganidassanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:204_15: Bhagavā hi pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena attano anantasaṃsāradukkhaṃ passitvā, cutūpapātañāṇena
tika-vin06t:204_16: parassa ca lokassa āsavakkhayañāṇena tadubhayavūpasamattañca passitvā taṃ deseti,
tika-vin06t:204_17: paṭhamena vā attadukkhadassanato attasinehapariccāgaṃ dīpeti. Dutiyena paradukkhadassanato
tika-vin06t:204_18: paresu kopapariccāgaṃ, tatiyena ariyamaggadassanato mohapariccāgañca dīpeti. Evaṃ
tika-vin06t:204_19: nānāguṇavisesadīpanato imasseva lokiyābhiññādvayassa idha gahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:205_0: Yasmā atītajāti eva nivāso, tasmā “atītajātīsū”ti na vattabbanti ce? Na, jātiyā ekadesepi
tika-vin06t:205_1: nivāsavohārasiddhidassanato. Pāḷiyaṃ kiñcāpi “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo”tiādivacanena
tika-vin06t:205_2: sakalajātiyā anussaraṇameva pubbenivāsānussati viya dissati, na evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:205_3: Tadekadesānussaraṇampi pubbenivāsānussati evāti dassanatthaṃ, bhummavacanaṃ kataṃ
tika-vin06t:205_5: veditabbaṃ. Gaṇṭhipade pana “tesaṃ chinnavaṭumakānaṃ lokuttarasīlādīni na bhagavatā
tika-vin06t:205_6: bodhisattakāle viññātānī”ti vuttaṃ. Atthāpattito lokiyāni viññātānīti āpajjati, taṃ
tika-vin06t:205_7: dibbacakkhuñāṇādhikāre “ariyānaṃ upavādakā”ti vacanena samentaṃ viya dissati. Na
tika-vin06t:205_8: hi ariye apassantassa evaṃ hoti. Kimatthaṃ panettha anussati vuttā, nanu esa vijjādhikāroti
tika-vin06t:205_9: ce? Ādikammikassa sativasena nibbattito, atītadhammānaṃ satiyā visesādhikārattā ca.
tika-vin06t:209_0: Tattha rāge ussannatare tejosaṃvaṭṭo. Dose āposaṃvaṭṭo. Mohe vāyosaṃvaṭṭo. Keci “dose
tika-vin06t:209_1: tejosaṃvaṭṭo, rāge āposaṃvaṭṭo, mohe vāyosaṃvaṭṭo”ti vadanti. Yasmā amutrāti cittaṃ,
tika-vin06t:209_2: vacanaṃ vā bhavādiniyamena hoti, tasmā “bhave vā”tiādi. Evaṃnāmo evaṃgottoti padadvayena
tika-vin06t:209_6: panetaṃ ānubhāvaparidīpana”nti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Amutrāti ettha paṭhamayojanāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:209_7: sīhokkantavasena anussaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tañca kho anulomavasena. “Paṭilomavasenā”tipi
tika-vin06t:209_8: likhanti, taṃ duviññeyyaṃ. Sīhokkantaṃ dassetuṃ “anekāsu kappakoṭīsū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:209_9: Yathā tanti nidassanena paṭipattisādhāraṇena phalasādhāraṇataṃ dassento brāhmaṇassa
tika-vin06t:209_10: ādaraṃ janeti, attānamevekaṃ ukkaṃsetīti vacanaṃ nivāreti. “Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ
tika-vin06t:209_11: arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti tassa pubbe uppannacitte eva niyojeti. Paṭhamā abhinibbhidāti
tika-vin06t:209_12: vacanena avijjaṇḍakosassa bahupaṭalabhāvaṃ dasseti, tena aṭṭhaguṇissariyādinā anabhinibbhidaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:212_1: parittapaccuppannaajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṃ hoti. Na cutiṃ vā paṭisandhiṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:212_2: karoti. Tasmā “yathākammūpage satte pajānāmī”ti vacanaṃ viya phalūpacāreneva vuttamidanti
tika-vin06t:212_3: veditabbaṃ. Dibbavihārasannissitattā kāraṇopacārena dibbaṃ. Iminā pana keci ācariyā
tika-vin06t:212_4: “kusalākusalā cakkhū dibbacakkhu kāmāvacara”nti vadanti, te paṭisedhitā honti. Catutthajjhānapaññā
tika-vin06t:212_5: hi ettha adhippetā. Mahājutikattā mahāgatikattāti etesu “saddasatthānusārenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:212_6: Ekādasannaṃ upakkilesānaṃ evaṃ uppattikkamo upakkilesabhāvo ca veditabbo, mahāsattassa
tika-vin06t:212_7: ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā nānāvidhāni rūpāni disvā “idaṃ nu kho ki”nti vicikicchā
tika-vin06t:212_8: udapādi, so upakkileso upakkilesasutte “vicikicchādhikaraṇañca pana me samādhimhi
tika-vin06t:212_9: cavi, samādhimhi cute obhāso antaradhāyati dassanañca rūpāna”nti vacanato. Tato “rūpāni
tika-vin06t:212_10: me passato vicikicchā uppajjati, idāni na kiñci manasi karissāmī”ti cintayato amanasikāro,
tika-vin06t:212_11: tato kiñci amanasikarontassa thinamiddhaṃ udapādi, tato tassa pahānatthaṃ ālokaṃ
tika-vin06t:212_12: vaḍḍhetvā rūpāni passato himavantādīsu dānavarakkhasādayo passantassa chambhitattaṃ
tika-vin06t:212_13: udapādi, tato tassa pahānatthaṃ “mayā diṭṭhabhayaṃ pakatiyā olokiyamānaṃ natthi,
tika-vin06t:212_14: adiṭṭhe kiṃ nāma bhaya”nti cintayato uppilāvitattaṃ udapādi. Gaṇṭhipade pana “uppilaṃ
tika-vin06t:212_15: dibbarūpadassenenā”ti vuttaṃ, “taṃ duvuttaṃ parato abhijappāvacanena tadatthasiddhito”ti
tika-vin06t:212_16: ācariyo vadati. Tato chambhitattappahānatthaṃ “mayā vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ paggahitaṃ, tena
tika-vin06t:212_17: me idaṃ uppilaṃ uppanna”nti vīriyaṃ sithilaṃ karontassa kāyaduṭṭhullaṃ kāyadaratho
tika-vin06t:212_18: kāyālasiyaṃ udapādi, tato taṃ cajantassa accāraddhavīriyaṃ udapādi, tattha dosaṃ
tika-vin06t:212_19: passato atilīnavīriyaṃ upadādi, tato taṃ pahāya samappavattena vīriyena chambhitattabhayā
tika-vin06t:212_20: himavantādiṭṭhānaṃ pahāya devalokābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā devasaṅghaṃ passato
tika-vin06t:212_21: taṇhāsaṅkhātā abhijappā udapādi, tato “mayhaṃ ekajātikarūpaṃ manasi karontassa abhijappā
tika-vin06t:212_22: uppannā, tasmā dāni nānāvidhaṃ rūpaṃ manasi karissāmī”ti kālena devalokābhimukhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:212_23: kālena manussalokābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nānāvidhāni rūpāni manasi karoto nānattasaññā
tika-vin06t:212_24: udapādi, tato “nānāvidharūpāni me manasi karontassa nānattasaññā udapādi, tasmā dāni
tika-vin06t:212_25: abhijappādibhayā iṭṭhādinimittaggāhaṃ pahāya ekajātikameva rūpaṃ manasi karissāmī”ti
tika-vin06t:212_26: tathā karoto abhinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ udapādi evaṃ pahīnaupakkilesassāpi anadhiṭṭhitattā.
tika-vin06t:212_27: Obhāsañhi kho jānāmi, na ca rūpāni passāmītiādi jātaṃ.
tika-vin06t:213_0: Tassattho – yadā parikammobhāsameva manasi karomi, tadā obhāsaṃ sañjānāmi, dibbena
tika-vin06t:213_1: cakkhunā rūpāni na ca passāmi, rūpadassanakāle ca obhāsaṃ na jānāmīti. Kimatthamidaṃ
tika-vin06t:213_2: vuttaṃ, na hi etaṃ upakkisesagatanti? Na kevalaṃ upakkilesappajahanamevettha kattabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:213_3: yena idaṃ visuddhaṃ hoti, aññampi taduttari kattabbaṃ atthīti dassanatthaṃ. Vicikicchā
tika-vin06t:213_4: cittassa upakkilesotiādīsu “ime dhammā upakkilesāti ādīnavadassanena pajahiṃ, na
tika-vin06t:213_5: mayhaṃ tadā uppannattā”ti keci vadanti. Mānusakaṃ vāti iminā sabhāvātikkamaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:213_6: Maṃsacakkhunā viyāti iminā pariyattiggahaṇaṃ, vaṇṇamattārammaṇatañca upameti. Vaṇṇamatte
tika-vin06t:213_7: hettha satta-saddo, na “sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ettha viya sabbasaṅkhatesu,
tika-vin06t:213_8: hīnajātiādayo mohassa nissando vipāko. Kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā pubbe atītabhave
tika-vin06t:213_9: ahesuṃ, sampati nirayaṃ upapannāti evaṃ pāṭhasesena sambandho veditabbo. “Yathākammūpagañāṇañhi
tika-vin06t:213_10: ekantamatītārammaṇaṃ, dibbacakkhu paccuppannārammaṇa”nti ubhinnaṃ kiccavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:213_11: Mahallakoti samaṇānaṃ sāruppamasāruppaṃ, lokācāraṃ vā na jānātīti adhippāyena vuttattā
tika-vin06t:213_12: guṇaparidhaṃsanena garahatīti veditabbaṃ. “Niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti vutto ariyapuggalo
tika-vin06t:213_13: maggāvaraṇaṃ kātuṃ samatthaṃ pharusavacanaṃ yadi katheyya, apāyagamanīyampi kareyya,
tika-vin06t:213_14: tena so apāyupagopi bhaveyya, tasmā upaparikkhitabbanti eke. “Vāyāmaṃ mā akāsīti
tika-vin06t:213_15: therena vuttattā maggāvaraṇaṃ karotī”ti vadanti. Pubbeva sotāpannena apāyadvāro pihito,
tika-vin06t:213_16: tasmāssa saggāvaraṇaṃ natthi. “Pākatikanti pavattivipākaṃ ahosī”ti vadanti. “Vuddhi
tika-vin06t:213_17: hesā, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye, yo accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikarotī”ti
tika-vin06t:213_18: vacanato pākatikaṃ ahosīti eke. Sace so na khamatīti sotāpannādīnaṃ khantiguṇassa
tika-vin06t:213_19: mandatāya vā āyatiṃ tassa suṭṭhu saṃvaratthāya vā akkhamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sukhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:213_20: vā āyassa ārammaṇādino abhāvā kālakañcikā asurā honti. “Ito bho sugatiṃ gacchā”ti
tika-vin06t:213_21: vacanato manussagatipi. Dibbacakkhuñāṇavijjāti dibbacakkhumeva dassanaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:213_22: tassa tassa atthassa vindanaṭṭhena vijjāti attho.
tika-vin06t:216_0: 14. So evaṃ samāhite citteti kiṃ purimasmiṃyeva, udāhu aññasmiṃyeva catutthajjhānacitte.
tika-vin06t:216_1: Aṭṭhakathāyampi yato vuṭṭhāya purimavijjādvayaṃ adhigataṃ, tadeva puna samāpajjanavasena
tika-vin06t:216_2: abhinavaṃ abhiṇhaṃ katanti dassanatthaṃ “so evaṃ samāhite citteti idha vipassanāpādakaṃ
tika-vin06t:216_3: catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabba”nti vuttaṃ. Etthāha – yadi tadeva puna samāpajjanavasena
tika-vin06t:216_4: abhinavaṃ kataṃ, atha kasmā pubbe viya “vipassanāpādakaṃ abhiññāpādakaṃ nirodhapādakaṃ
tika-vin06t:216_6: avatvā “idha vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabba”nti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:216_7: nanu idha tathāvacanaṭṭhānameva taṃ arahattamaggena saddhiṃ sabbaguṇanipphādanato,
tika-vin06t:216_10: vipassanāpādakamidha vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tattha pariyāpannattā, na tadārammaṇamattena.
tika-vin06t:216_11: Pariyāyatoti aññenapi pakārena. “Ime āsavā”ti ayaṃ vāro kimatthaṃ āraddho? “Āsavānaṃ
tika-vin06t:216_12: khayañāṇāyā”ti adhikārānulomanatthaṃ. Maggakkhaṇe hi cittaṃ vimuccati, phalakkhaṇe
tika-vin06t:216_13: vimuttaṃ hotīti idaṃ ekattanayena vuttaṃ. Yañhi vimuccamānaṃ, tadeva aparabhāge vimuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:216_14: nāma hoti. Yañca vimuttaṃ, tadeva pubbabhāge vimuccamānaṃ nāma hoti. Bhuñjamāno eva
tika-vin06t:216_15: hi bhojanapariyosāne bhuttāvī nāma. “Iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dassetī”ti paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa
tika-vin06t:216_16: ca paṭṭhāne “maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhati, phalaṃ, nibbānaṃ, pahīne kilese
tika-vin06t:216_17: paccavekkhatī”ti ayamuppattikkamo vutto. Pavattikkamo panettha sarūpato atthatoti
tika-vin06t:216_18: dvidhā vutto. Tattha “vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ ahosī”ti sarūpato catubbidhassapi paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa
tika-vin06t:216_19: pavattikkamanidassanaṃ. “Khīṇā jātī”tiādi atthato. Teneva ante “abbhaññāsi”nti puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:216_20: desanaṃ akāsi paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa tathā appavattito. Appaṭisandhikaṃ hotīti jānanto
tika-vin06t:219_0: 15. Kaṇṇasukhato hadayaṅgamatoti vacanameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Anattukkaṃsanatotiādi
tika-vin06t:219_1: puggalavasena, kaṇṇasukhatoti sotindriyaṃ sandhāya. Āpāthāramaṇīyatoti ñāṇāpāthāramaṇīyato.
tika-vin06t:219_2: Sayameva heṭṭhāmukhajātaṃ vā, maggo pana asoko hoti. Tadā hi soko pahīyamāno. Cariyādianukūlato
tika-vin06t:219_3: appaṭikūlaṃ. “Madhuramima”nti vuttattā “dhammamima”nti vacanaṃ adhikaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin06t:219_4: Tasmā “rāgavirāgamima”nti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ yojetvā puna piṇḍetvā dhammamimaṃ upehīti
tika-vin06t:219_5: yojetabbaṃ, “dhammameva saraṇatthamupehī”ti paṭhanti kirāti dīpeti. Saraṇagatānaṃ
tika-vin06t:219_6: teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṃ santāsaṃ duggatiṃ parikkilesaṃ dukkhaṃ hiṃsatīti ratanattayaṃ
tika-vin06t:219_7: saraṇaṃ nāma. Tappasādataggarutādīhi vihatakileso tapparāyanatākārappavatto cittuppādo
tika-vin06t:219_8: saraṇagamanaṃ. Taṃsamaṅgīsatto saraṇaṃ gacchati. Pabhedena pana duvidhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ
tika-vin06t:219_9: lokuttaraṃ lokiyanti. Tattha lokuttaraṃ diṭṭhasaccānaṃ maggakkhaṇe saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena
tika-vin06t:219_10: nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhati. Lokiyaṃ puthujjanānaṃ
tika-vin06t:219_12: ijjhati. Taṃ atthato ratanattaye saddhāpaṭilābho saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhi. Lokuttarassa
tika-vin06t:219_13: cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalaṃ, sabbadukkhakkhayo ānisaṃsaphalaṃ. “Yo ca buddhañca
tika-vin06t:219_14: dhammañca…pe… sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Lokiyassa bhavabhogasampadā. “Ye
tika-vin06t:219_15: keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse”ti hi vuttaṃ. Lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ tīsu vatthūsu aññāṇasaṃsayamicchāñāṇādīhi
tika-vin06t:219_16: saṃkilissati, na mahājutikaṃ hoti, na mahāvipphāraṃ. Lokuttarassa natthi saṃkileso.
tika-vin06t:219_17: Lokiyassa sāvajjo anavajjoti duvidho bhedo. Tattha aññasatthārādīsu attasanniyyātanādīhi
tika-vin06t:219_18: sāvajjo hoti, so aniṭṭhaphalo. Anavajjo kālakiriyāya, so avipākattā aphalo. Lokuttarassa
tika-vin06t:219_19: nevatthi bhedo. Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññaṃ satthāraṃ na uddisati. Yo koci
tika-vin06t:219_20: saraṇagato gahaṭṭho upāsako. Ratanattayaupāsanato upāsako. Pañca veramaṇiyo sīlaṃ.
tika-vin06t:220_0: 16. Lacchāma nu khoti duggate sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sakkhissāma nukho noti samiddhe sandhāya.
tika-vin06t:220_1: Tattha verañjāyaṃ. Paggayhatīti pattaṃ paggaho, tena paggahena pattenāti attho. Samādāyevāti
tika-vin06t:220_2: nidassanaṃ. Na ca vaṭṭatīti puna pākaṃ kiñcāpi vaṭṭati, tathāpi na suṭṭhu pakkattā
tika-vin06t:220_3: vuttaṃ, “uttaṇḍulabhattaṃ labhitvāpi pidhetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanañcettha
tika-vin06t:220_4: sādhakaṃ. “Sāvakānaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmī”ti iminā vacanena ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ
tika-vin06t:220_5: sandhāya “pacchā sīla”nti vuttaṃ. Upālittheropi taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ paṭicca bhagavatā
tika-vin06t:220_6: bahūni sikkhāpadāni paññattāni atthīti dīpeti. Yadi evaṃ verañjāyaṃ “etassa bhagavā
tika-vin06t:220_7: kālo”ti vacanaṃ na sametīti ce? Na, tato pubbe sikkhāpadābhāvappasaṅgato. Thero pana
tika-vin06t:220_8: paññattāni ṭhapetvā idāni paññapetabbāni pātimokkhuddesappahonakāni sandhāyāha. Bhagavāpi
tika-vin06t:220_9: “na tāva sāriputta satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetī”ti bhaddālisutte viya ekaccesu
tika-vin06t:220_10: paññattesupi tato paraṃ paññapetabbāni sandhāyāha. Idheva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sāmampi
tika-vin06t:220_11: pacanaṃ samaṇasāruppaṃ na hoti na ca vaṭṭatī”ti vacanañca, tathā “ratticchedo vā
tika-vin06t:220_12: vassacchedo vā”tiādivacanāni ca atthi. Aññathā “dvīhākārehi buddhā bhagavanto bhikkhū
tika-vin06t:220_13: paṭipucchantī”ti idhevedaṃ pāḷiṭhapanaṃ virujjhatīti ācariyena vicāritaṃ, taṃ sundaraṃ
tika-vin06t:220_14: pubbepi paññattasikkhāpadasambhavato. Kintu idha pāḷiṭhapanavirodhavicāraṇā pana
tika-vin06t:220_15: nippayojanā viya mama dissati. Kasmā? Upālittherena saṅgītikāle vuttapāṭhattā. Ratticchedoti
tika-vin06t:220_16: sattāhakiccaṃ sandhāya vutto. “Sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā ratticchedo vā vassacchedo
tika-vin06t:220_17: vā ekabhikkhunāpi na kato”ti vuttaṃ kira mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, tasmā vassacchedassa
tika-vin06t:220_18: kāraṇe sati sattāhakiccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti eke. Vinayadharā pana nicchanti, tasmā
tika-vin06t:220_19: aṭṭhakathādhippāyo vīmaṃsitabbo, imāya verañjāyaṃ appicchatādipaṭipadāya pasannā.
tika-vin06t:221_0: 17-8. Upapannaphaloti bahuphalo. “Khuddaṃ madhu”nti pāṭho. Theraṃ sīhanādaṃ nadāpetuṃ
tika-vin06t:221_1: pucchīti iminā ācariyo yaṃ pubbe āṇāya ṭhitānaṃ sāvakānaṃ mahānubhāvatādassanaṃ “verañjāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:221_2: nivāsappayojana”nti amhehi vuttaṃ, taṃ sampādeti, rājagahe verañjāyañcāti ubhayattha
tika-vin06t:221_3: vitakkuppāde ekato piṇḍetvā dassento “atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassā”tiādimāha. Kālaṃ
tika-vin06t:221_4: sandhāya ciraṃ, ṭhitiṃ sandhāya cirāti viggaho.
tika-vin06t:222_0: Kāmaṃ hinoti attano phalanibbattiyā sahāyaṃ gacchatīti kattari hetu, tathāpi idha
tika-vin06t:222_1: tena karaṇabhūtena tassa phalaṃ hinoti pavattatīti hetu. Tathā ghaṭanti tenāti ghaṭo.
tika-vin06t:222_2: Kilāsunoti payojanābhāvena avāvaṭā. Abbokiṇṇāni visabhāgehi. Āgāminiyā anāgateti
tika-vin06t:222_3: attho. Imesaṃyeva noti dassanatthaṃ “sabbabuddhānaṃ hī”ti vuttaṃ. Yāvasāsanapariyantāti
tika-vin06t:222_4: yāva buddhā dharanti, tāvāti attho. Khattiyabrāhmaṇāva uccā, tatthāpi visesaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin06t:222_6: dvayaṃ māgadhe “upasampajjā”ti vuccati. Anupādāyāti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena aggahetvā.
tika-vin06t:222_7: Āsavehīti kattari tatiyāvibhatti. Cittānīti paccattabahuvacanaṃ. Vimucciṃsūti kammakārake.
tika-vin06t:222_8: Vimocitānīti adhippāyoti ācariyo. Āsavehīti padañca paccatte karaṇavacanaṃ katvā
tika-vin06t:222_9: gaṇṭhipade attho pakāsito. Yadi ariyamaggena niruddhānaṃ āsavānaṃ vasena anāsavatā,
tika-vin06t:222_10: loke cittānipi anāsavā siyuṃ. Na hi niruddhāni cittāni ārammaṇāni karontīti tāni
tika-vin06t:222_11: aniruddhāsavavasena sāsavānīti ce. Sotāpannassa maggacittaṃ uparimaggavajjhāsavavasena
tika-vin06t:222_12: sāsavaṃ, avasiṭṭhāsavasamucchindanānubhāvattā phalāni sāsavāni siyunti? Na, āsavasamucchindanānubhāvāgataphalattā.
tika-vin06t:222_13: Bhiṃsanassa karaṇaṃ bhiṃsanakataṃ, tasmiṃ bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ, bhiṃsanakiriyāyāti attho.
tika-vin06t:222_14: Itthiliṅgaṃ vipallāsaṃ katvā napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ, purisaliṅgaṃ vā katvā. Nimittattheti ettha –
tika-vin06t:224: Vālesu cāmariṃ hanti, siṅgesu sarabho hato”ti. –
tika-vin06t:226_1: kiñcāpi siddhaṃ, tathāpi taṃ therassa vinayapaññattiyācanāya okāsakāraṇādhippāyato
tika-vin06t:226_2: vinayapaññattiyācanokāsaṃ pāpetuṃ puna bhagavantaṃ “ko pana, bhante, hetū”ti pucchi.
tika-vin06t:226_3: Bhagavāpi yācanaṃ sampaṭicchitukāmo byākāsi. “Āsavaṭṭhānīyā saṅghe pātubhavantī”ti
tika-vin06t:226_4: puggalassa saṅghapariyāpannattā vuttaṃ. Ādaratthavasenevettha dvikkhattuṃ vuttanti
tika-vin06t:226_5: yasmā thero pubbe rājagahe, sampati verañjāyanti dvikkhattuṃ kāci, tasmā ādarena
tika-vin06t:226_6: punappunaṃ yācayamānaṃ passitvā sayampi bhagavā ādareneva “āgamehi tvaṃ sāriputtā”ti
tika-vin06t:226_7: āha. Tenetaṃ dīpeti “mā tvaṃ punappunaṃ yācāhi, sampaṭicchitāva mayā te yācanā, pubbenanu
tika-vin06t:226_8: tavayācanaṃ sampaṭicchatāva mayā ettake kāle ettakāni sikkhāpadāni paññattāni, na
tika-vin06t:226_9: tāva me sāvakānaṃ āṇāpātimokkhuddesānujānanakālo sampatto, takkānumānavasena tayā
tika-vin06t:226_10: ‘etassa bhagavā kālo’ti punappunaṃ niddisiyamānopi nesa so kālo, kintu tathāgatova
tika-vin06t:226_11: tattha kālaṃ jānissatī”ti. Yasmā pana “sikkhāpadapaññattikālato pabhuti āṇāpātimokkhameva
tika-vin06t:226_13: sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanāpekkhaṃ bhummavacana”nti ekameva padaṃ vuttaṃ tassā siddhiyā
tika-vin06t:226_14: itarassa siddhito. “Sāvakānaṃ visayabhāvanti iminā mahāpadumattheravādo paṭikkhitto”ti
tika-vin06t:226_15: anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ, taṃ sundaraṃ viya. Sammukhe garahā. Parammukhe upavādo. “Na,
tika-vin06t:226_16: bhikkhave, ūnadasavassena…pe… dukkaṭassā”ti idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ bhagavā buddhattena
tika-vin06t:226_17: dasavassiko hutvā paññapesi ūnadasavassikassa tassa tathā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā abhāvato.
tika-vin06t:226_18: Na tadā atirekadasavassikova dasavassikānaṃ rattaññumahattappattito, tasmā taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin06t:226_19: verañjāyaṃ vassāvāsato pubbe rājagahe eva paññattanti siddhaṃ, tasmiṃ siddhe siddhameva
tika-vin06t:226_20: “yāva na saṅgho rattaññumahattaṃ pattoti vacanaṃ ito pubbe paṭhamayācanāyapi vutta”nti.
tika-vin06t:226_22: paṭhamayācanāya vuttavacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aññathā rattaññumahattappattakāle dve
tika-vin06t:227_0: “Atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassā”tiādimhi ayamādito paṭṭhāya atthavibhāvanā – ayaṃ
tika-vin06t:227_1: kirāyasmā assajittherato paṭiladdhaṃ ekagāthāmattakaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ nayasatasahassehi
tika-vin06t:227_2: vivecento arahattaṃ patvā sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhito “aho vata mahānubhāvoyaṃ saddhammo,
tika-vin06t:227_3: yo vināpi dhammasāminā parammukhato sutamattepi mayhaṃ mahantaṃ guṇavisesaṃ janesi,
tika-vin06t:227_4: sādhu vatāyaṃ saddhammo ciraṃ tiṭṭheyyā”ti cintento “katamesānaṃ nu kho buddhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:227_5: bhagavantānaṃ…pe… na ciraṭṭhitika”nti tamatthaṃ, kāraṇañca attano aggasāvakañāṇena
tika-vin06t:227_7: vinayapaññattiyācanokāsakaraṇatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchi. Tato pañhassa vissajjane
tika-vin06t:227_8: vinayapaññattiyācanokāse sampatte “etassa bhagavā kālo, etassa sugata kālo”ti vinayapaññattiṃ
tika-vin06t:227_9: yāci. Tato bhagavā tassā yācanāya sampaṭicchitabhāvaṃ, “etassa bhagavā kālo”ti vuttakālassa
tika-vin06t:227_10: akālataṃ, kālassa ca anaññavisayataṃ dīpento “āgamehi tva”ntiādimāha, tato bhagavā
tika-vin06t:227_11: tassa yācanaṃ, sattesu kāruññatañca paṭicca “tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū anupajjhāyakā
tika-vin06t:227_12: anācariyakā anovadiyamānā”tiādinā nayena vepullamahattataṃ paṭicca satthā sāvakānaṃ
tika-vin06t:227_13: upajjhāyavattādīni vinayakammāni, tadanurūpasikkhāpadāni ca paññapesi. Tato anukkamena
tika-vin06t:227_14: dvādasamavassaṃ verañjāyaṃ vasi. Tadā ca āyasmā sāriputto satthārā niddiṭṭhesu ciraṭṭhitihetūsu
tika-vin06t:227_15: jātesu “navaṅgasatthusāsanamahattatā ca sampati jātā, vinayapaññatti ca bahutarā
tika-vin06t:227_16: jātā, pātimokkhuddeso eveko na tāva sāvakānaṃ anuññāto, so ca parisuddhena saṅghena
tika-vin06t:227_17: karīyati. Saṅghopi etarahi parisuddho pacchimakassa sotāpannattā”ti cintetvā pātimokkhuddesaṃ
tika-vin06t:227_18: anujānāpetukāmo yattakehi ca sikkhāpadehi pātimokkhuddeso anujānīyati, tattakānaṃ
tika-vin06t:228_0: Tattha “yaṃ bhagavā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyyā”ti pātimokkhuddesappahonakasikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin06t:228_1: sandhāyāha, ayamattho bhaddālisuttena dīpetabbo. Tattha hi bahūsu sikkhāpadesu paññattesu,
tika-vin06t:228_2: paññapiyamānesu ca “na tāva bhaddāli satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetī”tiādi
tika-vin06t:228_3: vuttaṃ apaññattaṃ upādāya, tathā idhāpi apaññattaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:228_4: Parisuddhattā saṅghassa sampati sāvakānaṃ āṇāpātimokkhuddesaṃ nānujānāmīti dassento
tika-vin06t:228_5: “nirabbudo”tiādimāha. Na hi parisuddhe saṅghe ovādapātimokkhuddesassa anuddesakāraṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:228_6: atthi, tasmiṃ sati āṇāpātimokkhuddesānujānanādhippāyato. Tathā ca so tato aṭṭhannaṃvassānaṃ
tika-vin06t:228_7: accayena anuññāto. Yathāha pātimokkhaṭhapanakkhandhake “na dānāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ito
tika-vin06t:228_8: paraṃ uposathaṃ karissāmi…pe… pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti. Yaṃ pana upasampadakkhandhake
tika-vin06t:228_9: “tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ upasampādetvā ekakaṃ ohāya pakkamiṃsu…pe…
tika-vin06t:228_10: so tassā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā cirena agamāsī”ti vatthu āgataṃ, taṃ sudinnavatthuto
tika-vin06t:228_11: parato uppannampi tattha yathādhikāraṃ samodhānetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā tattheva “ubhayāni
tika-vin06t:228_12: kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni hontī”tiādinā aṅgānipi veditabbāni.
tika-vin06t:228_13: Na hi ādito eva ubhatopātimokkhāni siddhānīti. Apica ādito paṭṭhāya ayamanukkamo
tika-vin06t:228_14: veditabbo, seyyathidaṃ – rāhulakumāre uppanne bodhisatto nikkhamitvā chabbassāni
tika-vin06t:228_15: dukkaraṃ katvā sattame abhisambuddho, tasmiṃ eva saṃvacchare kapilavatthuṃ gantvā
tika-vin06t:228_17: bhagavantaṃ cīvarakaṇṇe gahetvā ‘dāyajjaṃ me samaṇa dehi, dāyajjaṃ me samaṇa dehī’ti
tika-vin06t:228_18: dāyajjaṃ yācamāno bhagavatā dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa niyyādetvā pabbājito”ti
tika-vin06t:228_19: ca vuttaṃ, tasmā rāhulakumāraṃ ārabbha “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tīhi saraṇagamanehi
tika-vin06t:228_20: sāmaṇerapabbajja”nti vuttattā saraṇagamanūpasampadā paṭhamavassabbhantare eva paṭikkhittā,
tika-vin06t:228_21: ñatticatutthakammavasena upasampadā anuññātāti paññāyati. Apica rāhulavatthumhi “na,
tika-vin06t:228_22: bhikkhave, ananuññāto mātāpitūhi putto pabbājetabbo, yo pabbājeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin06t:228_23: sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, tasmā ito pubbepi sikkhāpadāni paññattānīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:247: Ñātuṃ sayaṃ no na pare ca netuṃ,
tika-vin06t:249_0: Tattha kamabhedo sikkhāpadānaṃ parato āvi bhavissati. Bhāvabhedo tāva ukkhittakānuvattanapaccayā
tika-vin06t:249_1: bhikkhu anāpattiko, bhikkhunī pana samanubhaṭṭhā pārājikā hoti. Pārājikāpattipaṭicchādane
tika-vin06t:249_2: bhikkhussa dukkaṭaṃ, bhikkhuniyā pārājikaṃ. Duṭṭhullaṃ ārocentassa, paṭicchādentassa
tika-vin06t:249_3: ca pācittiyaṃ. Mahāsāvajjaṃ pārājikaṃ ārocentassa, paṭicchādentassa ca bhikkhussa
tika-vin06t:249_4: dukkaṭaṃ. Iccevamādīhi abhāvabhedasikkhāpadānaṃ idha bhāvabhedena yuttipariyesanaṃ
tika-vin06t:249_5: sādhayamānopi siyā anummādavighātabhāgīti. Ettāvatā sakalassapi vinayapiṭakassa vitakkayācanakālakālaññūkāraṇaphalapayojanehi
tika-vin06t:249_6: sattahi aṅgehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ nidānamāyasmatā upālittherena nidassitaṃ hoti. Tattha
tika-vin06t:249_7: therassa vinayapaññattiyācanahetubhūto vitakko nāma. Tasseva “etassa bhagavā kālo”tiādinā
tika-vin06t:249_8: pavattā yācanā nāma. Rattaññūvepullalābhaggabāhusaccamahattappatti kālo nāma. Sabbaññū
tika-vin06t:249_9: eva kālaññū nāma. Āsavaṭṭhānīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ pātubhāvo kāraṇaṃ nāma. “Tesaṃyeva āsavaṭṭhānīyānaṃ
tika-vin06t:249_10: dhammānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti vacanato āsavaṭṭhānīyadhammapaṭighāto phalaṃ nāma. “Yathayidaṃ
tika-vin06t:249_11: brahmacariyaṃ addhaniyaṃ assā”ti vacanato sāsanabrahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhiti payojananti
tika-vin06t:252_0: 22. Antimamaṇḍalanti abbhantaramaṇḍalaṃ. Tañhi itaresaṃ anto hoti, khuddakamaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin06t:252_1: vā. Anumatidānavasena tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ datvā. Tesaṃ buddhānaṃ cārikāya vinetabbā
tika-vin06t:252_2: veneyyasattā. Ocinantā viyāti bahupupphaṃ gacchaṃ mālākārā ciraṃ ocinanti, evaṃ bahuveneyyesu
tika-vin06t:252_3: gāmādīsu ciraṃ vasantā veneyyapuññaṃ pariharantā caranti. Santaṃ sukhaṃ, na vedanāsukhaṃ
tika-vin06t:252_4: viya saparipphandaṃ. Dasasahassacakkavāḷeti devānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Manussā pana imasmiṃyeva
tika-vin06t:252_5: cakkavāḷe bodhaneyyā uppajjanti. Mahākaruṇāya dhuvaṃ sattasamavalokanaṃ. Otiṇṇeti
tika-vin06t:252_6: parisamajjhaṃ āgate, ārocite vā. Yena kāraṇena mayaṃ tumhākaṃ deyyadhammaṃ dadeyyāma,
tika-vin06t:252_7: taṃ kuto sakkā laddhuṃ. Bahukiccā hi gharāvāsāti. Dutiyavikappe tanti deyyadhammaṃ.
tika-vin06t:252_8: “Tumhehi taṃ kuto laddhā”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Keci pana “paṭhamaṃ kiriyaṃ pekkhati,
tika-vin06t:252_9: dutiyaṃ deyyadhamma”nti vadanti. Ācariyo pana “paṭhamayojanāya yaṃ dānapuññaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin06t:252_10: kuto labbhā. Puññantarāyabahulā hi gharāvāsāti. Dutiyayojanāya temāsabbhantare yamahaṃ
tika-vin06t:252_11: dadeyyaṃ, atikkantakālattā tamahaṃ sampati kuto dadeyyanti dassetī”ti vadati. Sīlādikusaladhammasandassanādidhammaratanavassaṃ.
tika-vin06t:253: 23. Pattuṇṇadese pattuṇṇaṃ paṭavaraṃ. Mahāyāganti mahādānaṃ. Paripuṇṇasaṅkappanti temāsaṃ sotabbaṃ ajja suṇinti.
tika-vin06t:255_0: Upāli dāsakoti ācariyaparamparato. Bāhirabbhantaranidānaṃ, sikkhāpadānaṃ paññattiṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin06t:255_2: Sakāya paṭiññāya mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsethātiādi parasamayavivajjanatotiādi. Vibhaṅganayabhedadassanatoti
tika-vin06t:255_3: tisso itthiyo bhūmaṭṭhaṃ thalaṭṭhantiādi. Etthāha – kiṃ bhagavato mārāvaṭṭanapaṭighātāya
tika-vin06t:255_4: satti natthīti? Atthi, tathāpissa pacchā upaguttakāle pasādahetuttā adhivāseti. Ettha
tika-vin06t:255_5: upaguttādhiṭṭhānaṃ vattabbaṃ. Buddhānaṃ āciṇṇanti dijadassanena kiṃpayojananti ce?
tika-vin06t:260_0: Kiṃ bhagavā sasisso tāva mahantaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ ubbhaṇḍikaṃ katvā agamāsīti? Na
tika-vin06t:260_1: agamāsi, temāsibhāgiyaṃ pana puññarāsikaṃ deyyadhammaṃ appaṭikkhipanto brāhmaṇassa
tika-vin06t:265_0: Tasmā bhagavā assādiyanto taṃ deyyadhammaṃ appaṭikkhipanto upāyena brāhmaṇassa puññabuddhiṃ
tika-vin06t:265_1: katvā, mārassa ca manorathavighātaṃ katvā agamāsīti, “ayaṃ nayo aṭṭhakathaṃ vināpi
tika-vin06t:272_0: Idāni āyasmā upālitthero vinayapaññattiyā sādhāraṇanidānaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadānaṃ
tika-vin06t:272_2: nānappakāraṃ vidhiṃ nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “atha kho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:274: Tasmiṃ siddhe nidānānaṃ, kamasiddhi yato bhave.
tika-vin06t:275_0: Tattha sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ desanākkamo pahānakkamo paṭipattikkamo uppattikkamoti
tika-vin06t:275_1: catubbidho kamo labbhati. Tattha bhagavatā rājagahe bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujānantena
tika-vin06t:275_2: pātimokkhuddesassa yo desanākkamo anuññāto, taṃ desanākkamamanulomento āyasmā mahākassapo
tika-vin06t:275_3: paṭhamaṃ pārājikuddesaṃ pucchi, tadanantaraṃ saṅghādisesuddesaṃ, tato aniyatuddesaṃ
tika-vin06t:275_4: vitthāruddesañca pucchitvā tadanantaraṃ bhikkhunīvibhaṅgañca teneva anukkamena pucchi,
tika-vin06t:275_5: nidānuddesantogadhānañca sarūpena anuddiṭṭhānaṃ pucchanatthaṃ khandhakepi pucchi.
tika-vin06t:275_6: Etena ca khandhake paññattā thullaccayā saṅgahitā honti. Pucchitānukkameneva upālitthero
tika-vin06t:275_8: antokatvā desesi, ayamettha desanākkamo. Ubhatovibhaṅgakhandhakato pana uccinitvā
tika-vin06t:275_9: tadā parivārapāḷi visuṃ katā. Imameva nayaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “eteneva
tika-vin06t:275_10: upāyena khandhakaparivārepi āropesu”ntiādi. Apica pāḷiyā “etenevupāyena ubhatovinaye
tika-vin06t:275_11: pucchi. Puṭṭho puṭṭho āyasmā upāli vissajjesī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ, tasmā mahākassapo
tika-vin06t:275_12: ubhatovibhaṅge eva pucchi. Vissajjento pana āyasmā upāli nivarasesaṃ desento khandhakaparivāre
tika-vin06t:275_13: antokatvā desesi. Tadā ca khandhakaparivārapāḷi visuṃ katāti ayaṃ desanākkamo. Yadi
tika-vin06t:275_14: evaṃ nidānuddeso paṭhamaṃ desetabboti ce? Na, tadasambhavato. So hi “yassa siyā āpattī”tiādinā
tika-vin06t:275_15: nayena pavattattā paṭhamaṃ sikkhāpadasaṅgahitāsu āpattīsu adassitāsu na sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:275_16: “Yāni mayā bhikkhūnaṃ paññattāni sikkhāpadāni, tāni nesaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyya”nti
tika-vin06t:275_17: vacanato sikkhāpadāneva paṭhamaṃ desetabbānīti pārājikuddesakkamo sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:276_2: vacanato “samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū”ti vacanato ca yathā garukaṃ ācikkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:276_3: sikkhanena paṭipattikkamopettha sambhavati, evamimehi tīhi kamehi desetabbānampetesaṃ
tika-vin06t:276_4: sikkhāpadānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ uppattikkamo sambhavati. Tathā hi yaṃ yaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:276_5: taṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha uppanne eva vatthusmiṃ “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ
tika-vin06t:276_6: dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti bhikkhunīnampi paññattaṃ. Aññathā taṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ anuppannapaññatti
tika-vin06t:276_7: siyā. Tato “anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthī”ti parivāre etaṃ vacanaṃ virujjhati,
tika-vin06t:276_8: ettāvatā purimena kamattayena paṭhamaṃ desetabbataṃ patte pārājikuddese paṭhamuppannattā
tika-vin06t:276_9: methunadhammapārājikaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ desetukāmo upālitthero “tatra sudaṃ bhagavā
tika-vin06t:276_10: vesāliya”nti vesālimeva pāpetvā ṭhapesi. Aññathā bārāṇasiyaṃ paññattānaṃ “na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:276_11: manussamaṃsaṃ paribhuñjitabba”nti evamādīnaṃ desanādhippāye sati bārāṇasiṃ pāpetvā ṭhapeyyāti.
tika-vin06t:284_0: Tattha bhagavā verañjāyaṃ vutthavasso anupubbena cārikaṃ caranto kattikajuṇhapakkhe
tika-vin06t:284_1: eva vesāliṃ pāpuṇitvā yāva paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ, tāva aṭṭha vassāni
tika-vin06t:284_2: vesāliyaṃyeva viharanto viya pāḷikkamena dissati, na ca bhagavā tāvattakaṃ kālaṃ
tika-vin06t:284_3: tattheva vihāsi. So hi sudinnassa sāvakānaṃ santike pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca anujānitvā
tika-vin06t:284_4: yathābhirantaṃ tattha viharitvā cārikaṃ caranto bhesakaḷāvanaṃ patvā tattha terasamaṃ
tika-vin06t:284_5: vassaṃ vasi, teneva anukkamena sāvatthiṃ patvā cuddasamaṃ vassaṃ vasi, pannarasamaṃ
tika-vin06t:284_6: kapilavatthumhi, soḷasamaṃ āḷaviyaṃ, tato vutthavasso cārikaṃ caranto rājagahaṃ patvā
tika-vin06t:284_7: sattarasamaṃ vasi, iminā anukkamena aparānipi tīṇi vassāni tattheva vasi. Ettāvatā
tika-vin06t:284_8: bhagavā paripuṇṇavīsativasso rājagahato anupubbena vesāliṃ pāpuṇi, tato upasampadāya
tika-vin06t:284_9: aṭṭhavassiko sudinno vesāliyaṃyeva methunaṃ dhammaṃ abhiviññāpesi, tato bhagavā tasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:284_10: vatthusmiṃ paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññapesīti veditabbaṃ. Tattha yasmā upālitthero ito
tika-vin06t:284_11: paṭhamataraṃ tattha vesāliyañca paññattasikkhāpadāni adassetukāmo, vinayanidānānantaraṃ
tika-vin06t:284_12: paṭhamapārājikameva dassetukāmo, tasmā vesāliyaṃ paṭhamaṃ nivāsaṃ, pacchā imassa
tika-vin06t:284_13: sikkhāpadassa paññattikāle nivāsañca ekato katvā “tatra sudaṃ bhagavā vesāliya”ntiādimāha,
tika-vin06t:284_14: tena vuttaṃ “paṭhamassettha nidāne, ṭhatvā …pe… pakāsaneyevā”ti. Tasmā imasmiṃ paṭhamapārājikassa
tika-vin06t:284_15: paññattiṭṭhānasaṅkhāte nidāne ṭhatvā “tena kho pana samayena vesāliyā avidūre kalandagāmo
tika-vin06t:284_16: nāma hoti…pe… aññataraṃ vajjigāmaṃ upanissāya viharatī”ti etasmiṃ imassa sikkhāpadassa
tika-vin06t:284_17: puggalappakāsane, “tena kho pana samayena vajjī dubbhikkhā hoti…pe… tikkhattuṃ methunaṃ
tika-vin06t:284_18: dhammaṃ abhiviññāpesī”ti imasmiṃ vatthuppakāsane ca codanānayo, parihāranayo ca veditabboti
tika-vin06t:284_19: vuttaṃ hoti. Tatrāyaṃ pakāsanā – kimatthaṃ therena aññesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ puggalavatthūni
tika-vin06t:284_20: viya saṅkhepato avatvā yattha ca so uppanno, yathā ca dhamme pasanno, yathā ca pabbajito,
tika-vin06t:284_21: yathā ca imaṃ vatthuṃ uppādeti, taṃ sabbaṃ anavasesetvā puggalavatthūni vitthārato
tika-vin06t:297: Api ca yadi paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ akarontassāpi yāva brahmalokā ayaso patthaṭo, pagevaññesanti dassanatthaṃ ajjhācārassa pākaṭabhāvadīpanaṃ. Kathaṃ? –
tika-vin06t:300_0: Nanu māgaṇḍikaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā mātāpitūnamassā hitatthaṃ dhammaṃ desetīti imamatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:300_1: dassetuṃ bījakabījakamātūnaṃ arahattuppatti therena dīpitā. “Tena kho pana samayena
tika-vin06t:300_2: vesāliyā avidūre kalandagāmo nāma hoti, yena samayena sudinno purāṇadutiyikāya methunaṃ
tika-vin06t:300_3: dhammaṃ paṭisevī”ti vā “yena samayena bhagavā paṭhamapārājikaṃ paññapesī”ti vā vacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:300_4: idha na yujjati. Kasmā? “Idha pana hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavatī”ti vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanañhi
tika-vin06t:300_5: idha na labbhati. Ciraniviṭṭho hi so gāmo, na tasmiṃyeva samayeti. Yasmā pana so
tika-vin06t:300_6: ciraniviṭṭhopi ca gāmo attano niviṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya sabbakālamatthīti vattabbataṃ
tika-vin06t:300_7: arahati, tena pariyāyena “tena kho pana samayena vesāliyā avidūre kalandagāmo nāma hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:301_0: 25-6. Anuññātosi pana tvanti samaṇavattadassanatthaṃ bhagavā pucchati. Mātāpitūhi
tika-vin06t:301_1: ananuññātanti ettha janakeheva ananuññātadassanatthaṃ pucchīti vuttaṃ. Na kho sudinna
tika-vin06t:301_2: tathāgatāti “pabbājetu maṃ bhagavā”ti yācanāvasena panevamāha, na bhagavā sayaṃ saraṇāni
tika-vin06t:301_3: datvā pabbājesi. Dukkhassāti ettha “kalabhāgampī”ti pāṭhaseso. Vikappadvayepīti dutiyatatiyavikappesu.
tika-vin06t:301_4: Purimapadassāti kiñcīti padassa. Uttarapadenāti dukkhassāti padena. Samānavibhattīti
tika-vin06t:301_5: sāmivacanaṃ. Yathā kiṃ? “Kassaci dukkhassā”ti vattabbe “kiñci dukkhassā”ti vuttanti
tika-vin06t:301_6: veditabbaṃ. Akāmakā vinā bhavissāmāti tayā saddhiṃ amaritvā akāmā jīvissāma. Sacepi
tika-vin06t:301_7: na marāma, akāmakāva tayā viyogaṃ pāpuṇissāma, tayi jīvamāne eva no maraṇaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:301_8: maraṇenapi no tayā viyogaṃ mayaṃ akāmakāva pāpuṇissāma.
tika-vin06t:302_0: 30. Katipāhaṃ balaṃ gāhetvāti kasmā panāyaṃ tathā pabbajjāya tibbacchando anuññāto
tika-vin06t:302_1: samāno katipāhaṃ ghareyeva vilambitvā kāyabalañca aggahesīti? Anumatidānena mātāpitūsu
tika-vin06t:302_2: sahāyakesu ca tuṭṭho tesaṃ cittatuṭṭhatthaṃ. Kesuci aṭṭhakathāpotthakesu keci ācariyā
tika-vin06t:302_3: “ayaṃ sudinno jīvakavatthuto pacchā paṃsukūlikadhutaṅgavasena paṃsukūliko jāto”ti
tika-vin06t:302_5: likhanti, taṃ “acirūpasampanno”ti vacanena virujjhati. “Tathā sudinno hi bhagavato
tika-vin06t:302_6: dvādasame vasse pabbajito, vīsatime vasse ñātikulaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho sayaṃ pabbajjāya
tika-vin06t:302_7: aṭṭhavassiko hutvā”ti, “bhagavato hi buddhattaṃ pattato paṭṭhāya yāva idaṃ vatthaṃ,
tika-vin06t:302_8: etthantare vīsati vassāni na koci gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyi, sabbe paṃsukūlikāva ahesu”nti
tika-vin06t:302_9: ca vuttena aṭṭhakathāvacanena virujjhati, pabbajjāya aṭṭhavassiko, na upasampadāya.
tika-vin06t:302_10: Upasampadaṃ pana jīvakavatthuto pacchā alattha, tasmā avassiko ñātikulaṃ piṇḍāya
tika-vin06t:302_11: paviṭṭho siyāti ce? Na, “alattha kho sudinno kalandaputto bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ,
tika-vin06t:302_12: alattha upasampada”nti ekato anantaraṃ vuttattā. Pabbajjānantarameva hi so upasampanno
tika-vin06t:302_13: terasadhutaṅgaguṇe samādāya vattanto aṭṭha vassāni vajjigāme viharitvā nissayamuttattā
tika-vin06t:302_14: sayaṃvasī hutvā “etarahi kho vajjī dubbhikkhā”tiāditakkavasena yena vesālī tadavasari,
tika-vin06t:302_15: tasmā “paṃsukūlikadhutaṅgavasena paṃsukūliko hotī”ti ettakoyeva pāṭho yesu potthakesu
tika-vin06t:302_16: dissati, sova pamāṇato gahetabbo. “Āraññiko hotī”ti iminā pañca senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttāni
tika-vin06t:302_17: saṅgahitāni nesajjikaṅgañca vihārasabhāgattā, “piṇḍapātiko”ti iminā pañca piṇḍapātapaṭisaṃyuttāni,
tika-vin06t:302_19: sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ visuṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. “Mā atiharāpesu”nti kālabyattayavasena
tika-vin06t:305_0: 36. Apaññatte sikkhāpadeti ettha duvidhaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ. Kathaṃ? “Evañca pana,
tika-vin06t:305_1: bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti evaṃ sauddesānuddesabhedato duvidhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:305_2: Tattha pātimokkhe sarūpato āgatā pañca āpattikkhandhā sauddesapaññatti nāma. Sāpi
tika-vin06t:305_3: duvidhā sapuggalāpuggalaniddesabhedato. Tattha yassā paññattiyā anto āpattiyā saha,
tika-vin06t:305_4: vinā vā puggalo dassito, sā sapuggalaniddesā. Itarā apuggalaniddesāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:305_5: Sapuggalaniddesāpi duvidhā dassitādassitāpattibhedato. Tattha adassitāpattikā nāma
tika-vin06t:305_6: aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā. “Pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti hi puggalova tattha dassito, nāpatti.
tika-vin06t:305_7: Dassitāpattikā nāma bhikkhunīpātimokkhe “sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammā nissāraṇīyaṃ
tika-vin06t:305_8: saṅghādisesa”nti hi tattha āpatti dassitā saddhiṃ puggalena, tathā apuggalaniddesāpi
tika-vin06t:305_9: dassitādassitāpattitova duvidhā. Tattha adassitāpattikā nāma sekhiyā dhammā. Sesā
tika-vin06t:305_11: Tattha aniddiṭṭhakārakā nāma sukkavissaṭṭhi musāvāda omasavāda pesuñña bhūtagāma
tika-vin06t:305_12: aññavādaka ujjhāpanaka gaṇabhojana paramparabhojana surāmeraya aṅgulipatodaka hasadhamma
tika-vin06t:305_13: anādariya talaghātakajatumaṭṭhaka sikkhāpadānaṃ vasena pañcadasavidhā honti. Sesānaṃ
tika-vin06t:306_1: chabbidhā honti. Tattha “yebhuyyena khāyitaṃ āpatti thullaccayassā”ti evamādikā padabhājaniye
tika-vin06t:306_2: sandissamānāpatti padabhājanasikkhāpadaṃ nāma. “Na tveva naggena āgantabbaṃ, yo āgaccheyya,
tika-vin06t:306_3: āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādikā antarāpattisikkhāpadaṃ nāma. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, divā
tika-vin06t:306_4: paṭisallīyantena dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā paṭisallīyitu”nti evamādikā vinītavatthusikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin06t:306_5: nāma. “Lohituppādako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti
tika-vin06t:306_6: evamādikā paṭikkhepasikkhāpadaṃ nāma. Khandhakesu paññattadukkaṭathullaccayāni paññattisikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin06t:306_7: nāma. “Yā pana bhikkhunī naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyya, pācittiya”nti
tika-vin06t:306_8: iminā vuttena “yā pana bhikkhunī nacceyya vā gāyeyya vā vādeyya vā pācittiya”nti
tika-vin06t:306_9: evamādikaṃ yaṃ kiñci aṭṭhakathāya dissamānaṃ āpattijātaṃ, vinayakammaṃ vā avuttasiddhisikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin06t:306_10: nāma. Chabbidhampetaṃ chahi kāraṇehi uddesārahaṃ na hotīti anuddesasikkhāpadaṃ nāmāti
tika-vin06t:306_11: veditabbaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – pañcahi uddesehi yathāsambhavaṃ visabhāgattā thullaccayadubbhāsitānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:306_16: yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ samāsato pakāsitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:307_0: Tattha apaññatte sikkhāpadeti sauddesasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Ekacce
tika-vin06t:307_1: ācariyā evaṃ kira vaṇṇayanti “cattāro pārājikā kativassābhisambuddhena bhagavatā
tika-vin06t:307_2: paññattātiādinā pucchaṃ katvā tesu paṭhamapārājiko vesāliyaṃ paññatto pañcavassābhisambuddhena
tika-vin06t:307_3: hemantānaṃ paṭhame māse dutiye pakkhe dasame divase aḍḍhateyyaporisāya chāyāya puratthābhimukhena
tika-vin06t:307_4: nisinnena aḍḍhaterasānaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ majjhe sudinnaṃ kalandaputtaṃ ārabbha paññatto”ti,
tika-vin06t:308: Yasmā dvādasamaṃ vassaṃ, verañjāyaṃ vasi jino;
tika-vin06t:309: Tasmiñca suddho saṅghoti, neva pārājikaṃ tadā.
tika-vin06t:311: Tasmiṃ siddhāti siddhāva, garukāpatti no tadā.
tika-vin06t:317: Suttameva pamāṇaṃ no, sova kālo anappakoti.
tika-vin06t:318_0: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “atha bhagavā ajjhācāraṃ apassanto pārājikaṃ vā saṅghādisesaṃ vā
tika-vin06t:318_1: na paññapesī”ti, taṃ sakalasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāyāha. Na kevalaṃ sauddesasikkhāpadamattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:318_2: tena sauddesānuddesapaññattibhedaṃ sakalaṃ pārājikaṃ sandhāyāhāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin06t:318_3: nābhiparāmasanampi kāyasaṃsaggo, tathāpi etaṃ visesaniyamanato, acchandarāgādhippāyato
tika-vin06t:318_4: ca visuṃ vuttaṃ. Chandarāgarattasseva hi kāyasaṃsaggo idhādhippeto. Asucipāne pana
tika-vin06t:318_5: hatthiniyā tāpasapassāvapānena vālakābyo nāma uppajjati, vālakābyassa vatthu vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:318_6: Maṇḍabyassa nābhiyā parāmasaneneva kira. Rūpadassane pana vejjakā āhu –
tika-vin06t:323: “Pupphike edhiyya suddhe, passaṃ narañca itthi taṃ;
tika-vin06t:325_0: Rājorodho viyāti sīhaḷadīpe ekissā itthiyā tathā ahosi, tasmā kira evaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin06t:325_1: yāva brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchi, na taṃ manussānaṃ visayo ahosi tesaṃ rūpaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:325_2: Teneva bhikkhū pucchiṃsu “kacci no tvaṃ āvuso sudinna anabhirato”ti.
tika-vin06t:326_0: 39. Kalīti kodho, tassa sāsanaṃ kalisāsanaṃ, kalaho. Gāmadhammanti ettha janapadadhammaṃ
tika-vin06t:326_1: janapadavāsīnaṃ siddhiṃ. Attāti cittaṃ, sarīrañca. Asuttantavinibaddhanti vinayasutte
tika-vin06t:326_2: anāgataṃ, suttābhidhammesupi anāgataṃ, pāḷivinimuttanti attho. Kusumamālanti nānāguṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:326_3: sandhāyāha. Ratanadāmanti atthasampattiṃ sandhāya vadati. Paṭikkhipanādhippāyā bhaddāli
tika-vin06t:326_4: viya. Padaniruttibyañjanāni nāmavevacanāneva “nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ niruttī”tiādīsu
tika-vin06t:326_5: viya. Nippariyāyena virati sikkhāpadaṃ nāma. Akusalapakkhe dussīlyaṃ nāma cetanā.
tika-vin06t:326_7: ettha lokavajjassa paññāpane saṅghasuṭṭhutā hoti pākaṭādīnavato. Paññattivajjassa
tika-vin06t:326_8: paññāpane saṅghaphāsutā hoti pākaṭānisaṃsattā. Tattha paṭhamena dummaṅkūnaṃ niggaho,
tika-vin06t:326_9: dutiyena pesalānaṃ phāsuvihāro. Paṭhamena samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighāto, dutiyena
tika-vin06t:326_10: diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ. Tathā paṭhamena appasannānaṃ pasādo, dutiyena pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvo.
tika-vin06t:326_11: “Pubbe katapuññatāya codiyamānassa bhabbakulaputtassā”ti vuttattā “sudinno taṃ kukkuccaṃ
tika-vin06t:326_12: vinodetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi, teneva pabbajjā anuññātā”ti vadanti, upaparikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:326_13: Tathā paṭhamena saddhammaṭṭhiti, dutiyena vinayānuggaho hotīti veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:327_0: Apicettha vatthuvītikkame yattha ekantākusalabhāvena, taṃ saṅghasuṭṭhubhāvāya paññattaṃ
tika-vin06t:327_1: lokavajjato, yattha paññattijānane eva atthāpatti, na aññadā, taṃ saddhammaṭṭhitiyā
tika-vin06t:327_2: vāpi pasāduppādabuddhiyā dhammadesanāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ, itarañca sekhiyaṃ, idaṃ lokavajjaṃ
tika-vin06t:327_3: nāma. Vatthuno paññattiyā vā vītikkamacetanāyābhāvepi paṭikkhittassa karaṇe, kattabbassa
tika-vin06t:327_4: akaraṇe vā sati yattha āpattippasaṅgo, taṃ sabbaṃ ṭhapetvā surāpānaṃ paṇṇattivajjanti
tika-vin06t:327_5: veditabbaṃ. Āgantukavattaṃ, āvāsika, gamika, anumodana, bhattagga, piṇḍacārika, āraññaka,
tika-vin06t:327_6: senāsana, jantāghara, vaccakuṭi, saddhivihārika, upajjhāya, antevāsika, ācariyavattanti
tika-vin06t:327_7: etāni aggahitaggahaṇanayena gaṇiyamānāni cuddasa, etāni pana vitthārato dveasīti
tika-vin06t:327_8: mahāvattāni nāma honti. Sattahi āpattikkhandhehi saṃvaro saṃvaravinayo paññattisikkhāpadameva.
tika-vin06t:327_9: Tattha paññattivinayo samathavinayatthāya samathavinayo saṃvaravinayatthāya saṃvaravinayo
tika-vin06t:327_10: pahānavinayatthāyāti yojanā veditabbā. Yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsūti ekamiva
tika-vin06t:327_11: vuttaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhutāya sati saṅghaphāsu bhavissatīti dīpanatthaṃ. Pakarīyanti ettha
tika-vin06t:327_12: te te payojanavisesasaṅkhātā atthavasāti atthavasaṃ “pakaraṇa”nti vuccati. Dasasu
tika-vin06t:327_13: padesu ekekaṃ mūlaṃ katvā dasakkhattuṃ yojanāya padasataṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha pacchimassa
tika-vin06t:327_14: padassa vasena atthasataṃ purimassa vasena dhammasataṃ atthajotikānaṃ niruttīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:327_15: vasena niruttisataṃ, dhammabhūtānaṃ niruttīnaṃ vasena niruttisatanti dve niruttisatāni,
tika-vin06t:327_16: atthasate ñāṇasataṃ, dhammasate ñāṇasataṃ dvīsu niruttisatesu dve ñāṇasatānīti cattāri
tika-vin06t:327_17: ñāṇasatāni veditabbāni. Ettha saṅghasuṭṭhutāti dhammasaṅghassa suṭṭhubhāvoti attho.
tika-vin06t:328_0: Methunaṃ dhammanti evaṃ bahulanayena laddhanāmakaṃ sakasampayogena, parasampayogena
tika-vin06t:328_1: vā attano nimittassa sakamagge vā paramagge vā paranimittassa sakamagge eva pavesapaviṭṭhaṭhituddharaṇesu
tika-vin06t:328_2: yaṃ kiñci ekaṃ paṭisādiyanavasena seveyya pārājiko hoti asaṃvāsoti. Keci pana “pavesādīni
tika-vin06t:328_3: cattāri vā tīṇi vā dve vā ekaṃ vā paṭiseveyya, pārājiko hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘so ce
tika-vin06t:328_4: pavesanaṃ sādiyati, paviṭṭhaṃ, ṭhitaṃ, uddharaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassā’tiādī”ti
tika-vin06t:328_5: vadanti, tesaṃ matena catūsupi catasso pārājikāpattiyo āpajjati. Teyeva evaṃ vadanti
tika-vin06t:328_7: “attano vītikkame pārājikāpattiṃ, saṅghādisesāpattiñca āpajjitvā sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya
tika-vin06t:328_8: gahaṭṭhakāle methunādipārājikaṃ āpajjitvā puna pabbajitvā upasampajjitvā ekaṃ saṅghādisesāpattiṃ
tika-vin06t:328_9: ekamanekaṃ vā paṭikaritvāva so puggalo yasmā nirāpattiko hoti, tasmā so gahaṭṭhakāle
tika-vin06t:328_10: sāpattikovāti antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassāpi attheva āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ. Vuṭṭhānadesanāhi
tika-vin06t:328_11: pana asujjhanato ‘payoge payoge āpatti pārājikassā’ti na vuttaṃ gaṇanapayojanābhāvato.
tika-vin06t:328_12: Kiñcāpi na vuttaṃ, atha kho padabhājane ‘āpatti pārājikassā’ti vacanenāyamattho siddho”ti
tika-vin06t:328_13: yuttiñca vadanti. Yadi evaṃ mātikāyampi “yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya
tika-vin06t:328_14: pārājika”nti vattabbaṃ bhaveyya, pārājikassa anavasesavacanampi na yujjeyya. Sabbepi
tika-vin06t:328_15: hi āpattikkhandhe bhikkhugaṇanañca anavasesetvā tiṭṭhatīti anavasesavacananti katvā
tika-vin06t:328_16: paveseva āpatti, na paviṭṭhādīsu, tamevekaṃ sandhāya “yassa siyā āpattī”ti pārājikāpattimpi
tika-vin06t:328_17: anto katvā nidānuddese vacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tasmā mātikāyaṃ “pārājika”nti avatvā “pārājiko
tika-vin06t:328_18: hotī”ti puggalaniddesavacanaṃ tena sarīrabandhanena upasampadāya abhabbabhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:328_19: “Āpatti pārājikassā”ti padabhājane vacanaṃ antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassāpi pārājikassa
tika-vin06t:328_20: asaṃvāsassa sato puggalassa atheyyasaṃvāsakabhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Na hi so saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi
tika-vin06t:328_21: theyyasaṃvāsako hoti, tasmā “upasampanno bhikkhu”tveva vuccati. Tenevāha “asuddho
tika-vin06t:328_22: hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno, tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno anokāsaṃ
tika-vin06t:328_23: kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādena dukkaṭassā”ti. Anupasampannassa
tika-vin06t:328_24: tadabhāvato siddho so “upasampanno bhikkhu”tveva vuccatīti. Tena padasodhammaṃ sahaseyyañca
tika-vin06t:328_25: na janeti, bhikkhupesuññādiñca janetīti veditabbaṃ. Bhikkhunīnaṃ saṅghādisesesu pana
tika-vin06t:328_28: āpattināmaggahaṇañca kataṃ. Ettāvatā sapuggalaniddese dassitādassitāpattidukaṃ vitthāritaṃ
tika-vin06t:328_29: hoti. Apuggalaniddesesu sekhiyesu āpattiyā dassanakāraṇaṃ sekhiyānaṃ aṭṭhakathāyameva
tika-vin06t:328_30: vuttaṃ. Tadabhāvato itaresu āpattidassanaṃ kataṃ. Apuggalaniddesesupi dassitādassitāpattidukañca vitthāritaṃ hotīti.
tika-vin06t:332_0: 40-1. Dutiyapaññattiyaṃ “idha mallā yujjhantī”tiādīsu viya paṭisevatīti vattamānavacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:332_1: pacurapaṭisevanavasena vuttaṃ, “tañca kho manussitthiyā, no tiracchānagatāyā”ti paripuṇṇatthampi
tika-vin06t:332_2: paṭhamaṃ paññattiṃ attano micchāgāhena vā lesaoḍḍanatthāya vā evamāha. Paripuṇṇatthataṃyeva
tika-vin06t:332_3: niyametuṃ “nanu āvuso tatheva taṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ, teneva makkaṭīvatthu vinītavatthūsu
tika-vin06t:332_4: pakkhittaṃ avisesattā, tathā vajjiputtakavatthu. Vicāraṇā panettha tatiyapaññattiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:332_5: āvi bhavissati. “Nanu, āvuso, bhagavatā anekapariyāyenā”tiādi na kevalaṃ sauddesasikkhāpadeneva
tika-vin06t:332_7: vuttaṃ. Atha vā yadi sauddesasikkhāpadaṃ sāvasesanti paññapesi, iminā anuddesasikkhāpadenāpi
tika-vin06t:332_8: kiṃ na siddhanti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. “Tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin06t:332_9: paññapessāmī”ti tadeva sikkhāpadaṃ paṭhamapaññattameva lesatthikānaṃ alesokāsaṃ katvā
tika-vin06t:332_10: āmeḍitatthaṃ katvā paññapessāmīti attho. Aññathā “aññavādake vihesake pācittiya”ntiādīsu
tika-vin06t:332_11: viya vatthudvayena āpattidvayaṃ āpajjati, na cāpajjati, so evattho aññenāpi vacanena
tika-vin06t:332_12: suppakāsito, suparibyattakaraṇatthena daḷhataro katoti adhippāyo. Tatiyapaññattiyampi
tika-vin06t:333_0: Yassa sacittakapakkhetiādimhi pana gaṇṭhipadanayo tāva paṭhamaṃ vuccati, sacittakapakkheti
tika-vin06t:333_1: surāpānādiacittake sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sacittakesu pana yaṃ ekantamakusaleneva samuṭṭhāpitañca.
tika-vin06t:333_2: Ubhayaṃ lokavajjaṃ nāma. Surāpānasmiñhi “surā”ti vā “pātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vā jānitvā
tika-vin06t:333_3: pivane akusalameva, tathā bhikkhunīnaṃ gandhavaṇṇakatthāya lepane, bhesajjatthāya
tika-vin06t:333_4: lepane adosattā “avicāraṇīya”nti ettakaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha na vaṭṭatīti “jānitvā”ti
tika-vin06t:333_5: vuttavacanaṃ na yujjati paṇṇattivajjassāpi lokavajjabhāvappasaṅgato. Imaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgaṃ
tika-vin06t:333_6: pariharitukāmatāya vajirabuddhittherassa gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ “idha sacittakanti ca
tika-vin06t:333_7: acittakanti ca vicāraṇā vatthuvijānaneyeva hoti, na paññattivijānane. Yadi paññattivijānane
tika-vin06t:333_8: hoti, sabbasikkhāpadāni lokavajjāneva siyuṃ, na ca sabbasikkhāpadāni lokavajjāni,
tika-vin06t:333_9: tasmā vatthuvijānaneyeva hotī”ti, idaṃ yujjati. Kasmā? Yasmā sekhiyesu paññattijānanameva
tika-vin06t:333_10: pamāṇaṃ, na vatthumattajānananti, yaṃ pana tattheva vuttaṃ “pasuttassa mukhe koci
tika-vin06t:333_11: suraṃ pakkhipeyya, anto ce paviseyya, āpatti, tattha yathā bhikkhuniyā adhakkhakaṃ
tika-vin06t:333_12: ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ parassa āmasanādikāle kāyaṃ acāletvā citteneva sādiyantiyā āpatti
tika-vin06t:333_13: ‘kiriyāva hotī’ti vuttā yebhuyyena kiriyasambhavato, tathā ayampi tadā kiriyāva hotī”ti,
tika-vin06t:333_14: taṃ suvicāritaṃ anekantākusalabhāvasādhanato. Surāpānāpattiyā ekantākusalatā pana
tika-vin06t:333_15: majjasaññinopi sakiṃ payogena pivato hotīti katvā vuttā.
tika-vin06t:334_0: Ayaṃ panettha attho – sikkhāpadasīsena āpattiṃ gahetvā yassa sikkhāpadassa sacittakassa
tika-vin06t:334_1: cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, taṃ lokavajjaṃ. Sacittakācittakasaṅkhātassa acittakassa
tika-vin06t:334_2: ca sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, tampi surāpānādi lokavajjanti imamatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:334_3: sampiṇḍetvā “yassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, taṃ lokavajja”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:334_4: Sacittakapakkheti hi idaṃ vacanaṃ acittakaṃ sandhāyāha. Na hi ekaṃsato sacittakassa
tika-vin06t:334_5: sacittakapakkheti visesane payojanaṃ atthi. Yasmā panettha paṇṇattivajjassa paññattijānanacittena
tika-vin06t:334_6: sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva, vatthujānanacittena sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ siyā
tika-vin06t:334_7: kusalaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ, tasmā “tassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevā”ti
tika-vin06t:334_8: na vuccatīti “sesaṃ paṇṇattivajja”nti vuttaṃ. Adhimāne vītikkamābhāvā, supinante
tika-vin06t:334_9: abbohārikattā supinante vijjamānāpi vītikkamachāyā abbohārikabhāvenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:334_10: Idaṃ pana vacanaṃ daḷhīkammasithilakaraṇappayojanattā ca vuttaṃ, tena yaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:337_0: 43-4. Vajjīsu janapadesu vasantā vajjino nāma, tesaṃ puttā. Yāvadatthanti yāvatā
tika-vin06t:337_1: attho adhippāyoti vuttaṃ hoti, tattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃanāvikatvā”ti,
tika-vin06t:337_2: taṃ kāmaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhāne, tadekaṭṭhe ca dubbalyāvikaraṇe paññatte sati yujjati,
tika-vin06t:337_3: na aññathā. Tathāpi idāni paññapetabbaṃ upādāya vuttaṃ, kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā
tika-vin06t:337_4: bhikkhū atirekacīvaraṃ dhāressanti, āḷavakā bhikkhū kuṭiyo kārāpenti appamāṇikāyo,
tika-vin06t:337_5: bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpenti,
tika-vin06t:337_6: saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentītiādi viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi tato pubbe adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:337_7: vikappanaṃ vā anuññātaṃ. Yadabhāvā atirekacīvaranti vadeyya, pamāṇaṃ vā na paññattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:337_8: yadabhāvā appamāṇikāyoti vadeyya, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Ullumpatu maṃ, bhante,
tika-vin06t:337_9: saṅgho anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti upasampadaṃ yācitvā upasampannena upasampannasamanantarameva
tika-vin06t:337_10: “upasampannena bhikkhunā methuno dhammo na paṭisevitabbo, asakyaputtiyo”ti ca paññattena
tika-vin06t:337_11: assamaṇādibhāvaṃ upagantukāmena nanu paṭhamaṃ ajjhupagatā sikkhā paccakkhātabbā,
tika-vin06t:337_12: tattha dubbalyaṃ vā āvikātabbaṃ siyā, te pana “sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā
tika-vin06t:337_13: methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseviṃsū”ti anupaññattiyā okāsakaraṇatthaṃ vā taṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:337_14: “So āgato na upasampādetabbo”ti kiñcāpi ettheva vuttaṃ, tathāpi itaresupi pārājikesu
tika-vin06t:337_15: yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbaṃ. Na hi sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā yo pārājikavatthuṃ
tika-vin06t:337_16: adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati, manussaviggahaṃ vā jīvitā voropeti, paṭivijānantassa
tika-vin06t:337_17: uttarimanussadhammaṃ vā ullapati, so āgato na upasampādetabbo. Anupaññatti hi daḷhīkammasithilakammakaraṇappayojanā.
tika-vin06t:337_18: Sā hi yassa pārājikaṃ hoti aññā vā āpatti, tassa niyamadassanappayojanātilakkhaṇānupaññattikattā.
tika-vin06t:337_19: Evañhi ante avatvā ādimhi vuttā “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti anupaññatti viya. Paripuṇṇe
tika-vin06t:340_0: Ayaṃ nayo veditabbo. Tattha sudinnavatthu makkaṭivatthu vajjiputtakavatthu cāti tippabhedaṃ
tika-vin06t:340_1: vatthu imassa sikkhāpadassa nidānaṃ nāma, tato nidānā “yo pana, bhikkhu, bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin06t:340_2: sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno…pe… asaṃvāso”ti imissā mātikāya bhedo jāto. Tattha hi “antamaso
tika-vin06t:340_3: tiracchānagatāyā”ti itthiliṅgavacanena “saccaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:340_4: tañca kho itthiyā no purise no paṇḍake no ubhatobyañjanake cā”ti makkaṭipārājiko
tika-vin06t:340_5: viya aññopi lesaṃ oḍḍetuṃ sakkoti, tasmā tādisassa alesokāsassa dassanatthaṃ idaṃ
tika-vin06t:340_7: na itthiyā eva methunasiddhidassanato kato, tasmā vibhaṅgo taṃniyāmako tassā mātikāya
tika-vin06t:340_8: adhippetatthaniyāmako vibhaṅgo. Vibhaṅge hi “tisso itthiyo. Tayo ubhatobyañjanakā.
tika-vin06t:340_9: Tayo paṇḍakā. Tayo purisā. Manussitthiyā tayo magge…pe… tiracchānagatapurisassa dve
tika-vin06t:340_10: magge”tiādinā nayena sabbalesokāsaṃ pidahitvā niyamo kato.
tika-vin06t:341_0: Etthāha – yadi evaṃ sādhāraṇasikkhāpadavasena vā liṅgaparivattanavasena vā na kevalaṃ
tika-vin06t:341_1: bhikkhūnaṃ, bhikkhunīnampi “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti vibhaṅge vattabbaṃ siyā. Tadavacanena
tika-vin06t:341_2: bhikkhunī purisaliṅgapātubhāvena bhikkhubhāve ṭhitā evaṃ vadeyya “nāhaṃ upasampadakāle
tika-vin06t:341_3: bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannā, tasmā na appaccakkhātasikkhāpi methunadhammena
tika-vin06t:341_4: pārājikā homī”ti? Vuccate – tathā na vattabbaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgato. Bhikkhunīnampi
tika-vin06t:341_6: tañcāniṭṭhaṃ. Idaṃ aparaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgoti “sabbasikkhāpadāni sādhāraṇāneva, nāsādhāraṇānī”ti.
tika-vin06t:341_8: taṃyeva upajjha”ntiādi vuttaṃ, apica yo tathā lesaṃ oḍḍetvā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto
tika-vin06t:341_9: vajjiputtakā viya pārājiko hoti. Te hi “bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti vacanābhāve
tika-vin06t:341_10: sati “āpattiṃ tumhe, bhikkhave, āpannā pārājika”nti vuttā bhagavatā. Ettha pana “bhikkhave”ti
tika-vin06t:341_11: vuttattā keci bhikkhuliṅge ṭhitā, “idāni cepi mayaṃ, bhante ānanda, labheyyāma bhagavato
tika-vin06t:341_12: santike pabbajjaṃ labheyyāma upasampada”nti vuttattā keci vibbhantāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:341_13: Tato āpattiyā bhedoti tato vibhaṅgato “akkhāyite sarīre pārājikaṃ, yebhuyyena khāyite
tika-vin06t:341_14: thullaccaya”ntiādi āpattiyā bhedo hoti. Anāpatti tadaññathāti tato eva vibhaṅgato
tika-vin06t:341_15: yenākārena āpatti vuttā, tato aññenākārena anāpattibhedova hoti. “Sādiyati āpatti
tika-vin06t:341_16: pārājikassa, na sādiyati anāpattī”ti hi vibhaṅge asati na paññāyati. Ettāvatā samāsato
tika-vin06t:341_17: gāthāttho vutto hoti. Ettha ca pana –
tika-vin06t:344_0: Imaṃ nayaṃ dassetvāva sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ attho pakāsitabbo. Kathaṃ? Bhagavatā pana
tika-vin06t:344_1: yenākārena yaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpitaṃ, tassa ākārassa samatthaṃ vā asamatthaṃ vāti
tika-vin06t:344_2: duvidhaṃ nidānaṃ, ayaṃ nidānabhedo. Mātikāpi nidānāpekkhā nidānānapekkhāti duvidhā.
tika-vin06t:344_3: Tattha catutthapārājikādisikkhāpadāni nidānāpekkhāni. Na hi vaggumudātīriyā bhikkhū
tika-vin06t:344_4: sayameva attano attano asantaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ musāvādalakkhaṇaṃ pāpetvā bhāsiṃsu.
tika-vin06t:344_5: Aññamaññassa hi te uttarimanussadhammassa gihīnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu, na ca tāvatā pārājikavatthu
tika-vin06t:344_6: hoti. Tattha tena lesena bhagavā taṃ vatthuṃ nidānaṃ katvā pārājikaṃ paññapesi, tena
tika-vin06t:344_7: vuttaṃ “nidānāpekkha”nti. Iminā nayena nidānāpekkhāni ñatvā tabbiparītāni sikkhāpadāni
tika-vin06t:345_1: tesaṃ appahonakatāya vā tadaññataravekallatāya vā vītikkame sati āpattibhedadassanatthaṃ,
tika-vin06t:345_2: asati anāpattidassanatthañcāti sabbattha tayo atthavase paṭicca mātikāya vibhajanaṃ
tika-vin06t:345_3: vibhaṅgo ārabhīyatīti veditabbo. Ettha pana “bhikkhakoti bhikkhu, bhikkhācariyaṃ
tika-vin06t:345_4: ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu, bhinnapaṭadharoti bhikkhū”ti kevalaṃ byañjanatthadīpanavasena
tika-vin06t:345_5: pavatto vā, “samaññāya bhikkhū”ti bhikkhubhāvasambhavaṃ anapekkhitvāpi kevalaṃ bhikkhu
tika-vin06t:345_6: nāma pavattiṭṭhānadīpanavasena pavatto vā, “ehi bhikkhūti bhikkhu, saraṇagamanehi
tika-vin06t:345_7: upasampannoti bhikkhu, ñatticatutthena kammena upasampannoti bhikkhū”ti upasampadānantarenāpi
tika-vin06t:345_8: bhikkhubhāvasiddhidīpanavasena pavatto vā, “bhadro bhikkhu, sāro bhikkhu, sekkho
tika-vin06t:345_9: bhikkhu, asekkho bhikkhū”ti bhikkhukaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatabhikkhudīpanavasena
tika-vin06t:345_10: pavatto vā vibhaṅgo ajjhupekkhito sabbasāmaññapadattā, tathā aññabhāgiyasikkhāpadādīsu
tika-vin06t:345_11: sadvāravasena, adhikaraṇadassanādivasena pavatto ca ajjhupekkhito itarattha tadabhāvatoti veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:346_0: Tattha tisso itthiyotiādi vatthuniyamadassanavasena pavatto, manussitthiyā tayo magge
tika-vin06t:346_1: methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpatti pārājikassātiādi payoganiyamadassanavasena
tika-vin06t:346_2: pavatto, bhikkhussa sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhitetiādi cittaniyamadassanavasena pavatto,
tika-vin06t:346_3: sādiyati āpatti pārājikassa, na sādiyati anāpattītiādi vatthupayoganiyame sati cittaniyamabhāvābhāvavasena
tika-vin06t:346_4: āpattānāpattidassanatthaṃ pavatto, mataṃ yebhuyyena khāyitaṃ āpatti thullaccayassātiādi
tika-vin06t:346_5: vatthussa appahonakatāya vītikkame āpattibhedadassanatthaṃ pavatto, na sādiyati anāpattīti
tika-vin06t:346_6: cittaniyamavekalyena vītikkamābhāvā anāpattidassanatthaṃ pavattoti. Evaṃ itaresupi
tika-vin06t:347_0: Anāpattivāro pana mūlāpattito, tadaññekadesato, sabbāpattito ca anāpattidīpanavasena
tika-vin06t:347_1: tividho. Tattha yo paṭhamo, so vibhaṅgo viya tayo atthavase paṭicca pavatto. Katame
tika-vin06t:347_2: tayo? Mātikāpadānaṃ sātthakaniratthakānaṃ tadaññathā uddharaṇānuddharaṇavasena sappayojananippayojanabhāvadīpanatthaṃ,
tika-vin06t:347_5: uppajjeyyuṃ, ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbānī”ti etāni kevalaṃ vatthumattadīpanapadānīti
tika-vin06t:347_6: niratthakāni nāma, tesaṃ anāpatti. “Addhānamaggaṃ appaṭipannassa uppanne eḷakalome
tika-vin06t:347_7: anāpatti, ākaṅkhamānena paṭiggahite”tiādinā nayena tadaññathā anuddharaṇena nippayojanabhāvo
tika-vin06t:347_8: dīpito hoti, yadidaṃ mātikāyaṃ “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti, idaṃ sātthakaṃ.
tika-vin06t:347_10: Yasmā jānanasādiyanabhāvena āpatti, asevantassa anāpatti, tasmā vuttaṃ mātikāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:347_11: “yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:347_13: vuttānaṃ pañcannampi aṅgānaṃ pāripūriyā petatiracchānagatapariggahite āpattippahonakaṭṭhānepi
tika-vin06t:347_14: vissajjanatthaṃ “anāpatti petapariggahite”tiādi vuttaṃ. Anāpatti imaṃ jāna, imaṃ
tika-vin06t:347_15: dehi, imaṃ āhara, iminā attho, imaṃ kappiyaṃ karohīti bhaṇatītiādi pana tadaññathā
tika-vin06t:348_0: Ettha paṭhamapaññatti tāva paṭhamabodhiṃ atikkamitvā paññattattā, āyasmato sudinnassa
tika-vin06t:348_1: aṭṭhavassikakāle paññattattā ca rattaññumahattaṃ pattakāle paññattā. Dutiyaanupaññatti
tika-vin06t:348_2: bāhusaccamahattaṃ pattakāle uppannā. So hāyasmā makkaṭipārājiko yathā mātugāmapaṭisaṃyuttesu
tika-vin06t:348_3: sikkhāpadesu tiracchānagatitthī anadhippetā, tathā idhāpīti saññāya “saccaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin06t:348_4: bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, tañca kho manussitthiyā, no tiracchānagatitthiyā”ti
tika-vin06t:348_5: āha. Tatiyānupaññatti lābhaggamahattaṃ pattakāle uppannā. Te hi vajjiputtakā lābhaggamahattaṃ
tika-vin06t:348_6: pattā hutvā yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā nhāyitvā varasayanesu sayitvā tatiyānupaññattiyā
tika-vin06t:348_7: vatthuṃ uppādesuṃ, te ca vepullamahattaṃ patte saṅghe uppannā, sayañca vepullamahattaṃ
tika-vin06t:348_9: tividhampi vatthuṃ upādāya catubbidhampi taṃ kālaṃ patvā paññattanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:349_0: Tattha yo panāti anavasesapariyādānapadaṃ. Bhikkhūti tassa atippasaṅganiyamapadaṃ.
tika-vin06t:349_1: Bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti tassa visesanavacanaṃ. Na hi sabbopi bhikkhunāmako
tika-vin06t:349_2: yā bhagavatā yāya kāyaci upasampadāya upasampannabhikkhūnaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedena
tika-vin06t:349_3: sikkhitabbasikkhā vihitā, “ettha saha jīvantī”ti yo ca ājīvo vutto, taṃ ubhayaṃ samāpannova
tika-vin06t:349_4: hoti. Kadā pana samāpanno ahosi? Yāya kāyaci upasampadāya upasampannasamanantarameva
tika-vin06t:349_5: tadubhayaṃ jānantopi ajānantopi tadajjhupagatattā samāpanno nāma hoti. Saha jīvantīti
tika-vin06t:349_6: yāva sikkhaṃ na paccakkhāti, pārājikabhāvañca na pāpuṇāti, yaṃ pana vuttaṃ andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:349_7: “sikkhaṃ paripūrento sikkhāsamāpanno sājīvaṃ avītikkamanto sājīvasamāpanno hotī”ti,
tika-vin06t:349_8: taṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena vuttaṃ. Na hi sikkhaṃ aparipūrento kāmavitakkādibahulo
tika-vin06t:349_9: vā ekaccaṃ sāvasesaṃ sājīvaṃ vītikkamanto vā sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno nāma na hoti.
tika-vin06t:349_10: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena pana catukkaṃ labbhati atthi bhikkhu sikkhāsamāpanno sīlāni
tika-vin06t:349_11: paccavekkhanto na sājīvasamāpanno acittakaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamanto, atthi na sikkhāsamāpanno
tika-vin06t:349_12: kāmavitakkādibahulo sājīvasamāpanno nirāpattiko, atthi na sikkhāsamāpanno na ca sājīvasamāpanno
tika-vin06t:349_13: anavasesaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno, atthi sikkhāsamāpanno ca sājīvasamāpanno ca sikkhaṃ paripūrento
tika-vin06t:349_14: sājīvañca avītikkamanto, ayameva catuttho bhikkhu ukkaṭṭho idha adhippeto siyā. Na
tika-vin06t:349_15: hi bhagavā anukkaṭṭhaṃ vattuṃ yuttoti ce? Na, “tatra yāyaṃ adhisīlasikkhā, ayaṃ imasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:349_17: tisso sikkhā”ti ettakameva vattabbanti adhippāyo. Sikkhattayasamāpanno hi sabbukkaṭṭhoti.
tika-vin06t:350_0: “Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti parato vacanaṃ apekkhitvā adhisīlasikkhāva vuttāti
tika-vin06t:350_1: ce? Na, tassāpi abhabbattā. Na hi adhisīlasikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto
tika-vin06t:350_2: methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevituṃ bhabbo, taṃ sikkhaṃ aparipūrento sājīvañca vītikkamanto
tika-vin06t:350_3: eva hi paṭiseveyyāti adhippāyo, tasmā evamettha attho gahetabbo. Yasmā sikkhāpadasaṅkhāto
tika-vin06t:350_4: sājīvo adhisīlasikkhameva saṅgaṇhāti, netaraṃ adhicittasikkhaṃ adhipaññāsikkhaṃ vā,
tika-vin06t:350_5: tasmā “tatra yāyaṃ adhisīlasikkhā, ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:350_6: tasmā adhisīlasikkhāya saṅgāhako sājīvo sikkhāsājīvoti vutto. Iti sājīvavisesanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:350_7: sikkhāggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Tadatthadīpanatthameva vibhaṅge sikkhaṃ aparāmasitvā “tasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:350_8: sikkhati, tena vuccati sājīvasamāpanno”ti vuttaṃ, tena ekamevidaṃ atthapadanti dīpitaṃ
tika-vin06t:350_9: hoti. Tañca upasampadūpagamanantarato paṭṭhāya sikkhanādhikārattā “sikkhatī”ti ca
tika-vin06t:350_10: “samāpanno”ti ca vuccati. Yo evaṃ “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti saṅkhyaṃ gato, tādisaṃ
tika-vin06t:350_11: paccayaṃ paṭicca aparabhāge sājīvasaṅkhātameva sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya, tasmiṃyeva
tika-vin06t:350_12: ca dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyāti ayamattho yujjati. Kintu aṭṭhakathānayo
tika-vin06t:350_13: paṭikkhitto hoti. So ca na paṭikkhepārahoti tena tadanusārena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:351_0: Adhippāyo panettha pariyesitabbo, so dāni vuccati – sabbesupi sikkhāpadesu idameva
tika-vin06t:351_2: sāvako āpattiṃ āpajjati acittakaṃ, tathā sekkho. Puthujjano pana sacittakampi, tasmā
tika-vin06t:351_3: sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanabhikkhūnaṃ sāmaññamidaṃ bhikkhulakkhaṇanti katvā kevalaṃ sikkhāsamāpanno,
tika-vin06t:351_4: kevalaṃ sājīvasamāpanno ca ubhayasamāpanno cāti sarūpekadesekasesanayena “sikkhāsājīvasamaāpanno”tveva
tika-vin06t:351_5: sampiṇḍetvā ukkaṭṭhaggahaṇena anukkaṭṭhānaṃ gahaṇasiddhito aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ukkaṭṭhova
tika-vin06t:351_6: vutto. Tameva sampādetuṃ “tasmiṃ sikkhati, tena vuccati sājīvasamāpanno”ti ettha
tika-vin06t:351_7: sikkhāpadassa avacane parihāraṃ vatvā yasmā pana so asikkhampi samāpanno, tasmā sikkhāsamāpannotipi
tika-vin06t:351_8: atthato veditabboti ca vatvā “yaṃ sikkhaṃ samāpanno taṃ appaccakkhāya yañca sājīvaṃ
tika-vin06t:351_9: samāpanno tattha dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti vuttanti ayamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:351_10: Etasmiṃ pana adhippāye adhisīlasikkhāya eva gahaṇaṃ sabbatthikattā, sīlādhikārato
tika-vin06t:351_11: ca vinayassāti veditabbaṃ. Yathā ca sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyanto sīlaṃ samādiyatīti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:351_12: evaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paccakkhanto sīlasaṅkhātaṃ sikkhaṃ paccakkhātīti vattuṃ yujjati,
tika-vin06t:351_13: tasmā tattha vuttaṃ “yaṃ sikkhaṃ samāpanno, taṃ appaccakkhāyā”ti. Sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya
tika-vin06t:351_14: paṭisevitamethunassa upasampadaṃ anujānanto na samūhanati nāma. Na hi so bhikkhu
tika-vin06t:351_15: hutvā paṭisevi, “yo pana bhikkhū”ti ca paññattaṃ. Ettāvatā samāsato “sikkhāsājīvasamānno”ti
tika-vin06t:352_0: Kiṃ iminā visesavacanena payojanaṃ, nanu “yo pana bhikkhu sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ
tika-vin06t:352_1: anāvikatvā…pe… asaṃvāso”ti ettakameva vattabbanti ce? Na vattabbaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:352_2: Yo pana sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno theyyasaṃvāsādiko kevalena samaññāmattena, paṭiññāmattena
tika-vin06t:352_3: vā bhikkhu, tassāpi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ atthi. Sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya ca methunaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-vin06t:352_4: paṭisevantassa pārājikāpatti. Yo vā pacchā pārājikaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno
tika-vin06t:352_5: tassa ca, yo vā pakkhapaṇḍakattā paṇḍakabhāvūpagamanena na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno
tika-vin06t:352_6: tassa ca tadubhayaṃ atthīti āpajjati. “Paṇḍakabhāvapakkhe ca pakkhapaṇḍako upasampadāya
tika-vin06t:352_7: na vatthū”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā itarasmiṃ pakkhe vatthūti siddhaṃ, tasmiṃ pakkhe upasampanno
tika-vin06t:352_8: paṇḍakabhāvapakkhe paṇḍakattā na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno, so pariccajitabbasikkhāya
tika-vin06t:352_9: abhāvena sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya mukhena parassa aṅgajātaggahaṇādayo methunaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-vin06t:352_10: paṭiseveyya, tassa kuto pārājikāpattīti adhippāyo. Ayaṃ nayo apaṇḍakapakkhaṃ alabhamānasseva
tika-vin06t:352_11: parato yujjati, labhantassa pana arūpasattānaṃ kusalānaṃ samāpattikkhaṇe bhavaṅgavicchede
tika-vin06t:352_12: satipi amaraṇaṃ viya paṇḍakabhāvapakkhepi bhikkhubhāvo atthi. Saṃvāsaṃ vā sādiyantassa
tika-vin06t:352_13: na theyyasaṃvāsakabhāvo atthi antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassa viya. Na ca sahaseyyādikaṃ
tika-vin06t:352_14: janeti. Gaṇapūrako pana na hoti antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno viya, na so sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno,
tika-vin06t:352_15: itarasmiṃ pana pakkhe hoti, ayaṃ imassa tato viseso. Kimayaṃ sahetuko, udāhu ahetukoti?
tika-vin06t:352_16: Na ahetuko. Yato upasampadā tassa apaṇḍakapakkhe anuññātā sahetukapaṭisandhikattā.
tika-vin06t:352_17: Paṇḍakabhāvapakkhepi kissa nānuññātāti ce? Paṇḍakabhūtattā opakkamikapaṇḍakassa viya.
tika-vin06t:353_0: Apica sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti iminā tassa sikkhāsamādānaṃ dīpetvā taṃ samādinnasikkhaṃ
tika-vin06t:353_1: appaccakkhāya tattha ca dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvāti vattuṃ yujjati, na aññathāti iminā
tika-vin06t:353_2: kāraṇena yathāvuttāniṭṭhappasaṅgato “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno
tika-vin06t:353_3: sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yathā cettha, tathā “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin06t:353_4: sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā gāmā vā araññā vā
tika-vin06t:353_5: adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyeyya, sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeyya atirekaṃ
tika-vin06t:353_6: vā, chedanakaṃ pācittiya”ntiādinā nayena sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. Antamaso tiracchānagatāyapīti
tika-vin06t:353_7: manussitthiṃ upādāya vuttaṃ. Na hi “pageva paṇḍake purise vā”ti vattuṃ yujjati. Sesaṃ
tika-vin06t:356_0: 45. Nīharitvāti ettha sāsanato nīharitvāti attho. “Pañcahupāli, aṅgehi samannāgatena
tika-vin06t:356_1: bhikkhunā nānuyuñjitabbaṃ. Katamehi pañcahi? Suttaṃ na jānāti, suttānulomaṃ na jānātī”ti
