tika-vin06t:356_2: evamādito hi pariyattisāsanato suttaṃ, suttānulomañca nīharitvā pakāsesuṃ. “Anāpatti
tika-vin06t:356_3: evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho paripucchāti bhaṇatī”ti evamādito pariyattisāsanato
tika-vin06t:356_4: ācariyavādaṃ nīharitvā pakāsesuṃ. Bhārukacchakavatthusmiṃ “āyasmā upāli evamāha –
tika-vin06t:356_5: anāpatti, āvuso, supinantenā”ti evamādito pariyattisāsanato eva attanomatiṃ nīharitvā
tika-vin06t:356_6: pakāsesuṃ. Tāya hi attanomatiyā thero etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ labhi. Api ca vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā
tika-vin06t:356_7: “anupasampannena paññattena vā apaññattena vā vuccamāno…pe… anādariyaṃ karoti, āpatti
tika-vin06t:356_8: dukkaṭassā”ti. Tattha hi paññattaṃ nāma suttaṃ. Sesattayaṃ apaññattaṃ nāma. Tenāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:356_9: “catubbidhañhi vinayaṃ, mahātherā”ti gāthā suvuttā. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ nāgasenattherena.
tika-vin06t:356_10: Āhaccapadenāti aṭṭha vaṇṇaṭṭhānāni āhacca vuttena padanikāyenāti attho, udāhaṭena
tika-vin06t:356_11: kaṇṭhokkantena padasamūhenāti adhippāyo. Rasenāti tassa āhaccabhāsitassa rasena,
tika-vin06t:356_12: tato uddhaṭena vinicchayenāti attho. Suttacchāyā viya hi suttānulomaṃ. Ācariyavādo
tika-vin06t:356_13: “ācariyavaṃso”ti vutto pāḷiyaṃ vuttānaṃ ācariyānaṃ paramparāya ābhatova pamāṇanti
tika-vin06t:357_0: Parivāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ, idha ca kiñcāpi “suttānulomaṃ nāma cattāro mahāpadesā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:357_1: atha kho mahāpadesanayasiddhaṃ paṭikkhittāpaṭikkhittaṃ anuññātānanuññātaṃ kappiyākappiyanti
tika-vin06t:357_2: atthato vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha yasmā ṭhānaṃ okāso padesoti kāraṇavevacanāni “aṭṭhānametaṃ,
tika-vin06t:357_4: “asandiṭṭhi ca pana padeso”ti ca lokato, tasmā mahāpadesāti mahākāraṇānīti attho.
tika-vin06t:357_5: Kāraṇaṃ nāma ñāpako hetu idhādhippetaṃ. Mahantabhāvo pana tesaṃ mahāvisayattā mahābhūtānaṃ
tika-vin06t:357_6: viya. Te duvidhā vinayamahāpadesā suttantikamahāpadesā cāti. Tattha vinayamahāpadesā
tika-vin06t:357_7: vinaye payogaṃ gacchanti, itare ubhayatthāpi, teneva parivāre anuyogavatte “dhammaṃ
tika-vin06t:357_8: na jānāti, dhammānulomaṃ na jānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha dhammanti ṭhapetvā vinayapiṭakaṃ
tika-vin06t:357_9: avasesapiṭakadvayaṃ. Dhammānulomanti suttantike cattāro mahāpadese. Tattha yo dhammaṃ
tika-vin06t:357_10: dhammānulomañceva jānāti, na vinayaṃ vinayānulomañca, so “dhammaṃ rakkhāmī”ti vinayaṃ
tika-vin06t:357_11: ubbinayaṃ karoti, itaro “vinayaṃ rakkhāmī”ti dhammaṃ uddhammaṃ karoti, ubhayaṃ jānanto
tika-vin06t:358_0: Tatridaṃ mukhamattaṃ – tattha paṭhamo “so ce pavesanaṃ sādiyati, paviṭṭhaṃ, ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:358_1: uddharaṇaṃ sādiyati āpatti, na sādiyati anāpattī”ti ettha vippaṭipajjati. So hāyasmā
tika-vin06t:358_2: sukhavedanīyassa upādinnaphoṭṭhabbassa, kāyindriyassa ca samāyoge sati paṭivijānanto
tika-vin06t:358_3: kāyikasukhavedanuppattimattena sādiyati nāmāti paricchinditvā tassa āpatti pārājikassāti
tika-vin06t:358_4: asevanādhippāyassapi āpattippasaṅgaṃ karoti, tathā yassa santhatattā vā yonidosavasena
tika-vin06t:358_5: vā dukkhā asātā vedanā, vātopahaṭagattatāya vā neva kāyikavedanā, tassa jānato ajānatopi
tika-vin06t:358_7: karoti, tathā yadi mocanarāgena upakkamato mutte saṅghādiseso, pageva methunarāgenāti
tika-vin06t:358_8: dukkaṭaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā saṅghādisesaṭṭhānaṃ karoti, evaṃ vinayaṃ ubbinayaṃ karoti
tika-vin06t:358_9: nāma. Itaro “anāpatti ajānantassāti vuttattā jānato jānaneneva sukhavedanā hotu vā
tika-vin06t:358_10: mā vā sādiyanā hotī”ti vatvā asevanādhippāyassapi jānato anāpattiṭṭhāne āpattiṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:358_11: anavajjaṃ sāvajjaṃ karotīti evaṃ dhammaṃ uddhammaṃ karoti. Ubhayaṃ pana jānanto “bhikkhussa
tika-vin06t:358_12: sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhiteti vacanato sevanacittamevettha pamāṇaṃ, tassa bhāvena āpatti
tika-vin06t:358_13: pārājikassa, abhāvena anāpattī”ti vatvā ubhayampi rakkhati sampādeti. Iminā nayena
tika-vin06t:359_0: Saṅgītiṃ āropetvā ṭhapitapāḷito vinimuttaṃ katvā ṭhapitattā pāḷivinimuttā atthato,
tika-vin06t:359_1: nayato, anulomato ca pāḷiokkantavinicchayappavattā anupaviṭṭhavinicchayavasena pavattāti
tika-vin06t:359_2: attho. “Na samūhanissatī”ti jānantopi bhagavā kevalaṃ “tesaṃ mataṃ pacchimā janatā
tika-vin06t:359_3: mama vacanaṃ viya pamāṇaṃ karotū”ti dassanatthañca parinibbānakāle evamāha “ākaṅkhamāno,
tika-vin06t:359_4: ānanda, saṅgho mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatū”ti, tenetaṃ
tika-vin06t:359_5: siddhaṃ “paññattampi ce sikkhāpadaṃ samūhanituṃ yassa saṅghassa anuññātaṃ bhagavatā,
tika-vin06t:359_6: tassa paññattānulomaṃ atirekatthadīpanaṃ, pagevānuññātaṃ bhagavatā”ti. Kiñca bhiyyo
tika-vin06t:359_7: ūnātirittasikkhāpadesu ācariyakulesu vivādo aññamaññaṃ na kātabboti dassanatthañca.
tika-vin06t:359_8: Kasmā saṅgho na samūhanīti? Aññamaññaṃ vivādappasaṅgadassanato. Bhagavatā ca “sabbeheva
tika-vin06t:359_9: samaggehi sammodamānehi avivadamānehi sikkhitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha ca ekacce therā
tika-vin06t:359_10: evamāhaṃsūti ca aññavādadassanato vivadamānehi sikkhitabbaṃ jātaṃ, tadabhāvattampi
tika-vin06t:360_0: Apicāti attano matiyā pākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ ārambho. Tattha “suttantābhidhammavinayaṭṭhakathāsū”ti
tika-vin06t:360_1: vacanato piṭakattayassapi sādhāraṇā esā kathāti veditabbā, “atha panāyaṃ kappiya”ntiādi
tika-vin06t:360_3: tena aviruddhassa kammassa kārakasaṅghasadisa”nti dhammasirittherassa gaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:360_4: vuttaṃ, taṃ ayuttaṃ, “suttameva balavataraṃ. Suttañhi appaṭivattiyaṃ kārakasaṅghasadisa”nti
tika-vin06t:360_5: etehi padehi ayuttattā. Pākatike pana gaṇṭhipade “tamatthaṃ vinicchinitvā tassa kārakasaṅghasadisa”nti
tika-vin06t:360_6: vuttaṃ. Paravādīti amhākaṃ samayavijānanako aññanikāyikoti vuttaṃ. Paravādī suttānulomanti
tika-vin06t:360_7: kathaṃ? “Aññatra udakadantaponā”ti suttaṃ sakavādissa, tadanulomato nāḷikeraphalassa
tika-vin06t:363_0: Evaṃ paravādinā vutte sakavādī dhaññaphalassa gatikattā, āhāratthassa ca pharaṇato
tika-vin06t:363_1: “yāvakālikameva ta”nti vadanto paṭikkhipati. Paro ācariyavādanti “suṅkaṃ pariharatīti
tika-vin06t:363_2: ettha upacāraṃ okkamitvā kiñcāpi pariharati, avahāro evā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato “tathā
tika-vin06t:363_3: karonto pārājikamāpajjatī”ti paravādinā vutte sakavādī “suṅkaṃ pariharati, āpatti
tika-vin06t:363_4: dukkaṭassā”ti suttaṃ tattheva āgatamahāaṭṭhakathāvacanena saddhiṃ dassetvā paṭisedheti,
tika-vin06t:363_5: tathā karontassa dukkaṭamevāti. Paro attanomatīti ettha “purebhattaṃ parasantakaṃ
tika-vin06t:363_6: avaharāti purebhattameva harissāmīti vāyamantassa pacchābhattaṃ hoti, purebhattapayogova
tika-vin06t:363_7: so, tasmā mūlaṭṭho na muccatīti tumhākaṃ theravādattā mūlaṭṭhassa pārājikamevā”ti
tika-vin06t:363_8: paravādinā vutte sakavādī “taṃ saṅketaṃ pure vā pacchā vā taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati,
tika-vin06t:364_1: suttaṃ paṭṭhāne likhitaṃ dassetvā “ariyamaggassa na nibbānamevārammaṇa”nti paravādinā
tika-vin06t:364_2: vutte sakavādī “ārammaṇattikādisuttānulome na otaratī”ti paṭikkhipati. Suttānulome
tika-vin06t:364_3: otarantaṃyeva hi suttaṃ nāma, netaraṃ. Tena vuttaṃ pāḷiāgataṃ paññāyatīti ettakenapi
tika-vin06t:364_4: siddhe tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhapāḷiāgataṃ paññāyatī”tiādi. Tādisañhi pamādalekhanti
tika-vin06t:364_5: ācariyo. “Appamādo amataṃ padaṃ, pamādo maccuno pada”nti vacanato dinnabhojane bhuñjitvā
tika-vin06t:364_6: parissayāni parivajjitvā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā viharanto nicco hotīti. Evarūpassa
tika-vin06t:364_7: atthassa vasena āruḷhampi suttaṃ na gahetabbaṃ, tena vuttaṃ no ce tathā paññāyatīti
tika-vin06t:364_8: siddhepi “no ce tathā paññāyati, na otarati na sametī”ti. “Bāhirakasuttaṃ vā”ti vuttattā
tika-vin06t:364_9: attano suttampi atthena asamentaṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Paro ācariyavādantiādīsu dvīsu nayesu
tika-vin06t:364_10: pamādalekhavasena tattha tattha āgataṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ theravādehi saddhiṃ yojetvā veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:365_0: Atha panāyaṃ ācariyavādaṃ. Paro suttanti paravādinā “mūlabījaṃ nāma haliddi siṅgiveraṃ
tika-vin06t:365_1: vacā…pe… bīje bījasaññī chindati vā chedāpeti vā bhindati vā…pe… āpatti pācittiyassāti
tika-vin06t:365_2: tumhākaṃ pāṭhattā haliddigaṇṭhiṃ chindantassa pācittiya”nti vutte sakavādī “yāni
tika-vin06t:365_3: vā panaññāni atthi mūle sañjāyantī”tiādiṃ dassetvā tassa aṭṭhakathāsaṅkhātena ācariyavādena
tika-vin06t:365_4: paṭikkhipati. Na hi gaṇṭhimhi gaṇṭhi jāyatīti. Paro suttānulomanti paravādinā “anāpatti
tika-vin06t:365_5: evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggahoti vacanassānulomato ‘amhākaṃ porāṇabhikkhū ekapāsāde
tika-vin06t:365_6: gabbhaṃ thaketvā anupasampannena sayituṃ vaṭṭatīti tathā katvā āgatā, tasmā amhākaṃ
tika-vin06t:365_7: vaṭṭatī’ti tumhesu eva ekaccesu vadantesu tumhākaṃ na kiñci vattuṃ sakkā”ti vutte
tika-vin06t:365_8: sakavādī “suttaṃ suttānulomañca uggahitakānaṃyeva ācariyānaṃ uggaho pamāṇa”ntiādiaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:365_9: dassetvā paṭisedheti. Paro attanomatinti “dvāraṃ vivaritvā anāpucchā sayitesu ke
tika-vin06t:365_10: muccantī”ti ettha pana dvepi janā muccanti yo ca yakkhagahitako, yo ca bandhitvā
tika-vin06t:365_11: nipajjāpitoti tumhākaṃ theravādattā aññe sabbepi yathā tathā vā nipannādayopi muccantīti paṭisedheti.
tika-vin06t:366_0: Atha panāyaṃ attanomatiṃ. Paro suttanti “āpattiṃ āpajjantī”ti paravādinā gutte sakavādī
tika-vin06t:366_1: “divā kilantarūpo mañce nisinno pāde bhūmito amocetvāva niddāvasena nipajjati, tassa
tika-vin06t:366_2: anāpattī”tiādiaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā ekabhaṅgena nipannādayopi muccantīti paṭisedheti.
tika-vin06t:366_3: Athāyaṃ attanomatiṃ. Paro suttānulomanti “domanassaṃ pāhaṃ, devānaminda, duvidhena
tika-vin06t:366_4: vadāmi sevitabbampi asevitabbampītiādivacanehi saṃsandanato sadārapose doso tumhākaṃ
tika-vin06t:366_5: natthi, tena vuttaṃ ‘puttadārassa saṅgaho”’ti paravādinā vutte kiñcāpi sakavādī bahussuto
tika-vin06t:366_6: na hoti, atha kho rāgasahiteneva akusalena bhavitabbanti paṭikkhipati. Sesesupi iminā
tika-vin06t:366_7: nayena aññathāpi anurūpato yojetabbaṃ. Idaṃ sabbaṃ upatissattherādayo āhu. Dhammasiritthero
tika-vin06t:366_8: pana “ettha paroti vutto aññanikāyiko, so pana attano suttādīniyeva āharati. Tāni
tika-vin06t:366_9: sakavādī attano suttādimhi otāretvā sace sameti gaṇhāti, no ce paṭikkhipatī”ti vadati.
tika-vin06t:369_0: Sikkhāpadavibhaṅge pana kiñcāpi yo panāti anavasesapariyādānapadaṃ, tathāpi bhikkhūti
tika-vin06t:369_1: iminā parapadena samānādhikaraṇattā tadanurūpānevassa vibhaṅgapadāni vuttāni. Bhikkhunibbacanapadāni
tika-vin06t:369_2: tīṇi kiñcāpi sabhikkhubhāvassa, abhikkhubhāvassa cāti yassa kassaci pabbajitassa
tika-vin06t:369_3: sādhāraṇāni, tathāpi “asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno,
tika-vin06t:369_4: tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṅghādisesena
tika-vin06t:369_5: dukkaṭassā”ti evamādisuttaṃ nibbacanatthayuttova puggalo “āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin06t:369_6: ettha vatthu, na itaro gihibhūtoti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabbassapi vinayapiṭakassa
tika-vin06t:369_7: sādhāraṇaṃ bhikkhulakkhaṇaṃ vatthuñhi bhagavā ārabhi. Yo pana suddho eva samāno kenaci
tika-vin06t:369_8: kāraṇena gihiliṅge ṭhito, so attano sabhikkhubhāvattā eva vatthu hoti, asuddhopi
tika-vin06t:369_9: bhikkhuliṅge ṭhitattāti ayamattho dassito hoti. Asuddhopi ñātakehi, paccatthikehi
tika-vin06t:369_10: vā rājabhayādikāraṇena vā kāsāvesu saussāhova apanītakāsāvo vatthu eva puna kāsāvaggahaṇena
tika-vin06t:369_12: hoti. Yo pana liṅgatthenako bhikkhunibbacanatthaṃ sayañca ajjhupagato, saṃvāsaṃ thenento,
tika-vin06t:369_13: tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṅghādisesena
tika-vin06t:370_0: “Samaññāya bhikkhu paṭiññāya bhikkhū”ti vacanadvayaṃ yathāvuttañca atthaṃ upabrūheti,
tika-vin06t:370_1: antarā uppannāya niyatāya micchādiṭṭhiyā upacchinnakusalamūlo kevalāya samaññāya,
tika-vin06t:370_2: paṭiññāya ca “bhikkhū”ti vuccati, na paramatthatoti imaṃ atirekatthaṃ dīpeti. Kiṃ
tika-vin06t:370_3: vuttaṃ hoti? “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ
tika-vin06t:370_4: yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi. Micchādiṭṭhiparamāni, bhikkhave, mahāvajjānī”ti
tika-vin06t:370_6: etesanti micchādiṭṭhiparamānī”ti vuttaṃ. Pañca ānantariyakammāni mahāsāvajjāni, micchādiṭṭhi
tika-vin06t:370_7: pana mahāsāvajjatarāti adhippāyoti. Kasmā? Tesañhi paricchedo atthi, sabbabalavampi
tika-vin06t:370_8: kappaṭṭhitikameva hoti, niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā pana paricchedo natthi, tāya samannāgatassa
tika-vin06t:370_9: bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ natthi, tasmā “imassa bhikkhukaraṇā kusalā dhammā saṃvijjantī”ti
tika-vin06t:370_10: vā “suddhovāya”nti vā na sakkā vattuṃ. “Diṭṭhivipattipaccayā dve āpattiyo āpajjatī”ti
tika-vin06t:370_11: vuttattā na sakkā “asuddho”ti vā “aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno”ti vā vattuṃ.
tika-vin06t:370_12: Esa hi ubhopi pakkhe na bhajati, tena vuttaṃ “samaññāya, paṭiññāya ca bhikkhu, na paramatthato”ti.
tika-vin06t:371_0: Kimatthaṃ panevaṃ mahāsāvajjāya niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā pārājikaṃ bhagavā na paññapesīti?
tika-vin06t:371_1: Dubbijānattā. Pakatiyāpesā diṭṭhi nāma “sammā”ti vā “micchā”ti vā duviññeyyā, pageva
tika-vin06t:371_2: “niyatā”ti vā “aniyatā”ti vāti. Tattha pārājikāpattiyā paññattāya bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin06t:371_3: asamadiṭṭhikaṃ pārājikaṃ maññamānā uposathādīni akatvā acireneva sāsanaṃ vināseyyuṃ,
tika-vin06t:371_4: sayañca apuññaṃ pasaveyyuṃ suddhesupi bhikkhūsu vippaṭipattiyā paṭipajjanena. Tasmā
tika-vin06t:371_5: upāyakusalatāya pārājikaṃ apaññāpetvā tassa ukkhepanīyakammaṃ, sammāvattañca paññāpetvā
tika-vin06t:371_6: taṃ saṅghena asambhogaṃ, asaṃvāsañca akāsi. Bhagavā hi tassa ce esā diṭṭhi aniyatā,
tika-vin06t:371_7: sammāvattaṃ pūretvā osāraṇaṃ labhitvā pakatatto bhaveyya. Niyatā ce, aṭṭhānametaṃ
tika-vin06t:371_8: anavakāso, yaṃ so niyatamicchādiṭṭhiko sammāvattaṃ pūretvā osāraṇaṃ labhitvā pakatatto
tika-vin06t:371_9: bhaveyya. Kevalaṃ “samaññāyabhikkhu paṭiññāyabhikkhū”ti nāmamattadhārako hutvā paraṃ
tika-vin06t:371_10: maraṇā ariṭṭho viya saṃsārakhāṇukova bhavissatīti imaṃ nayaṃ addasa.
tika-vin06t:372_0: Aṭṭhasu upasampadāsu tissovettha vuttā, na itarā pāṭipuggalattā, bhikkhūnaṃ asantakattā
tika-vin06t:372_1: ca. Tattha hi ovādapaṭiggahaṇapañhabyākaraṇūpasampadā dvinnaṃ therānaṃ eva, sesā
tika-vin06t:372_2: tisso bhikkhunīnaṃ santakāti idha nādhippetā, tissannampi upasampadānaṃ majjhe “bhadro
tika-vin06t:372_3: bhikkhū”tiādīni cattāri padāni vuttāni tissannaṃ sādhāraṇattā. Ehibhikkhubhāvena
tika-vin06t:372_4: vā saraṇagamanañatticatutthena vā upasampanno hi bhadro ca sāro ca sekkho ca asekkho
tika-vin06t:372_5: ca hoti, upasampadavacanaṃ pana nesaṃ sāvakabhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Ime eva hi āpattiṃ
tika-vin06t:373_0: Ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetoti ettha ca āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhabbā ñatticatuttheneva
tika-vin06t:373_2: upasampannā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhabbā, tenete paṭikkhipitvā “ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto
tika-vin06t:373_3: bhikkhū”ti antimova vuttoti kira dhammasiritthero, taṃ ayuttaṃ. “Dve puggalā abhabbā
tika-vin06t:373_4: āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ buddhā ca paccekabuddhā cā”ti ettakameva vuttanti. Aññathā ehibhikkhuādayopi
tika-vin06t:373_5: vattabbā siyuṃ. Kiñca bhiyyo “dve puggalā bhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo
tika-vin06t:373_6: cā”ti sāmaññena vuttattā ca, apica āpattibhayaṭṭhānadassanato ca. Kathaṃ? Āyasmā
tika-vin06t:373_7: sāriputto āvasathapiṇḍaṃ kukkuccāyanto na paṭiggahesi, cīvaravippavāsabhayā ca sabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:373_8: ticīvaraṃ gahetvā nadiṃ taranto manaṃ vuḷho ahosi mahākassapo. Kiñca saraṇagamanūpasampadāya
tika-vin06t:373_9: upasampanne ārabbha saddhivihārikavattādīni asammāvattantānaṃ nesaṃ dukkaṭāni ca
tika-vin06t:373_10: paññattāni dissanti, tasmā dubbicāritametaṃ. Ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti
tika-vin06t:373_12: bhabbataṃ sandhāya tasmimpi vutte pubbe paṭikkhittāpi sā puna evaṃ vadantena anuññātāti
tika-vin06t:373_13: bhikkhūnaṃ micchāgāho vā vimati vā uppajjati, tasmā na vuttāti vuttaṃ hoti, taṃ “bhikkhunī
tika-vin06t:373_14: nāma ubhatosaṅghe upasampannā”ti iminā sameti. Idañhi sākiyādīnaṃ anuññātaupasampadāya
tika-vin06t:374_0: Ayaṃ panettha amhākaṃ khanti – bhikkhu-padaniddesattā yattakāni tena padena saṅgahaṃ
tika-vin06t:374_1: gacchanti, ye ca vinayapiṭake tattha tattha sandissanti sayaṃ āpattāpajjanaṭṭhena
tika-vin06t:374_2: vā duṭṭhullārocanapaṭicchādanādīsu paresaṃ āpattikaraṇaṭṭhena vā, te sabbepi dassetvā
tika-vin06t:374_3: idāni yadidaṃ tassa bhikkhu-padassa visesanatthaṃ vuttaṃ parapadaṃ “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti,
tika-vin06t:374_4: tassa vasena idaṃ vuttaṃ “ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhū”ti. So eva hi kammavācānantarameva
tika-vin06t:374_5: sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno hoti tato paṭṭhāya sauddesasikkhāpadānaṃ uppattidassanato,
tika-vin06t:374_6: tasseva ca sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ dissati, netarassa. Tasseva ca sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ sambhavati
tika-vin06t:374_7: “ullumpatu maṃ, bhante, saṅgho anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti vatvā samādinnattā, tasseva ca
tika-vin06t:374_10: upādāya so eva idhādhippetoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:375_0: Yasmā panassa sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ sabbathā yujjati, tasmā “sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya taṃ
tika-vin06t:375_1: taṃ vatthuṃ vītikkamantassa tato tato āpattito anāpatti, itarassa āpattī”ti vattuṃ
tika-vin06t:375_2: yujjati, tasmā “yattha yattha sāvajjapaññatti, anavajjapaññatti vā, ayaṃ imasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:375_3: atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti vuccati, tattha tattha tadajjhācāratthenāyameva ñatticatutthena
tika-vin06t:375_4: upasampanno adhippeto nāmā”ti vattuṃ yujjatīti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ sante yaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:375_5: “yāya kāyaci upasampadāya ayaṃ imasmiṃ ‘methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā pārājiko hotī’ti
tika-vin06t:375_6: atthe bhikkhūti adhippeto”ti, tampi na vattabbameva. Kathaṃ hoti? Virodhadosopi parihato
tika-vin06t:375_7: hoti. Kathaṃ? Sace ñatticatutthena upasampanno eva idhādhippeto “bhikkhū”ti ca “upasampanno”ti
tika-vin06t:375_8: ca, tena na upasampanno anupasampanno nāmāti katvā ñatticatutthakammato aññathā upasampannā
tika-vin06t:375_9: nāma mahākassapattherādayo itaresaṃ anupasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā sahaseyyapadasodhammāpattiṃ
tika-vin06t:375_10: janeyyuṃ, omasanādikāle ca dukkaṭameva janeyyunti evamādiko virodhadoso parihato
tika-vin06t:375_11: hotīti sabbaṃ ācariyo vadati. Maṅguracchavi nāma sāmo.
tika-vin06t:376_0: Yasmā te atimahanto jātimado cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti, tasmā tumhehi mama sāsane evaṃ
tika-vin06t:376_1: sikkhitabbaṃ. “Sātasahagatā paṭhamajjhānasukhasahagatā asubhe ca ānāpāne cā”ti gaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:376_3: pathavīkasiṇādirūpāvacarajjhānasaññā. So taṃ byākāsi “avibhūtā, bhante, uddhumātakasaññā
tika-vin06t:376_4: avaḍḍhitabbattā asubhānaṃ, vibhūtā, bhante, rūpasaññā vaḍḍhitabbattā kasiṇāna”nti.
tika-vin06t:376_5: Pañcaupasampadakkamo mahāvaggā gahito. Ñatticatutthenāti ettha kiñcāpi ñatti sabbapaṭhamaṃ
tika-vin06t:376_6: vuccati, tissannaṃ pana anussāvanānaṃ atthabyañjanabhedābhāvato atthabyañjanabhinnā
tika-vin06t:376_7: ñattitāsaṃ catutthāti katvā “ñatticatuttha”nti vuccati. Byañjanānurūpameva aṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin06t:376_8: “tīhi anussāvanāhi ekāya ca ñattiyā”ti vuttaṃ, atthapavattikkamena padena pana “ekāya
tika-vin06t:376_9: ñattiyā tīhi anussāvanāhī”ti vattabbaṃ. Yasmā panettha “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, kammāni,
tika-vin06t:376_10: cha imāni, bhikkhave, kammāni adhammakammaṃ vaggakamma”nti vacanato kuppakammampi
tika-vin06t:377_0: Yasmā akuppampi ekaccaṃ na ṭhānārahaṃ, yena appatto osāraṇaṃ “sosārito”ti campeyyakkhandhake
tika-vin06t:377_1: vuccati, tasmā “ṭhānārahenā”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “ṭhānārahenā”ti idameva padaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:377_2: na pubbapadaṃ iminā akuppasiddhitoti ce? Taṃ na, aṭṭhānārahena akuppena upasampanno
tika-vin06t:377_3: imasmiṃ atthe anadhippetoti aniṭṭhappasaṅgato. Dvīhi panetehi ekato vuttehi ayamattho
tika-vin06t:377_4: paññāyati “kevalaṃ tena akuppena upasampanno ayampi imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto ‘bhikkhū’ti,
tika-vin06t:377_5: ṭhānārahena ca upasampanno ayampi imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto ‘bhikkhū’ti, kuppena upasampanno
tika-vin06t:377_6: nādhippeto”ti. Tenāyampi attho sādhito hoti “yo pana, bhikkhu, jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ
tika-vin06t:377_7: puggalaṃ upasampādeyya, so ca puggalo anupasampanno”ti vacanato yāva na ñāyati, tāva
tika-vin06t:377_9: viya aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā omasanapācittiyādivatthu hoti, kevalaṃ
tika-vin06t:377_10: anupasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā “anupasampanne upasampannasaññī padaso dhammaṃ vāceti,
tika-vin06t:377_11: āpatti pācittiyassā”tiādi āpattivatthumeva hutvā tiṭṭhati. Akuppena upasampanno pana
tika-vin06t:377_12: pacchā pārājikopi jātito upasampannaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti “paṇḍako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno
tika-vin06t:377_13: na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”tiādinā nayena vuttesu pana vajjanīyapuggalesu
tika-vin06t:377_14: koci puggalo “upasampanno”ti vuccati, nopi upasampannaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, koci tiṭṭhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:378_0: Ettha pana atthi kammaṃ akuppaṃ ṭhānārahaṃ, atthi ṭhānārahaṃ nākuppaṃ, atthi akuppañceva
tika-vin06t:378_1: na ṭhānārahañca, atthi nākuppaṃ na ca ṭhānārahanti idaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin06t:378_2: paṭhamaṃ tāva vuttaṃ, tatiyacatutthāni pākaṭāni. Dutiyaṃ pariyāyena bhikkhunisaṅghato
tika-vin06t:378_3: ekatoupasampannāya liṅgaparivatte sati labbhati. Tassa hi puggalassa pubbe sikkhamānakāle
tika-vin06t:378_4: laddhaṃ ñatticatutthaupasampadākammaṃ kiñcāpi akuppañceva ṭhānārahañca, purisaliṅge
tika-vin06t:378_5: pana pātubhūte “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, taṃyeva upajjhaṃ tameva upasampada”nti ettha
tika-vin06t:378_6: apariyāpannattā tassa puggalassa kevalaṃ sāmaṇerabhāvāpattito kammaṃ dāni kuppaṃ
tika-vin06t:378_7: jātanti vuccati. Liṅgaparivattena cīvarassa adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ viya tassa puggalassa
tika-vin06t:378_8: bhikkhunisaṅghena katāya upasampadāya vijahanaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ, aññathā so puggalo
tika-vin06t:378_9: upasampanno bhikkhūti āpajjati. Atha vā liṅgaparivatte asatipitaṃ ekatoupasampadākammaṃ
tika-vin06t:378_10: kuppati, yathāṭhāne na tiṭṭhati. Tasmā na tāva sā “bhikkhunī”ti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin06t:378_11: Yasmā aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ āpajjitvāpi anāpajjitvāpi uppabbajitukāmatāya gihiliṅgaṃ
tika-vin06t:378_12: sādiyantiyā punapi upasampadā ubhatosaṅghe labbhati, tasmā tena pariyāyena “kuppatīti
tika-vin06t:378_13: kuppa”nti vuccati, yathāvuttakammadosābhāvato pana “ṭhānāraha”nti. Bhikkhunī pana
tika-vin06t:378_14: gihiliṅgaṃ sādiyantikāle na purisaliṅgapātubhāve sati bhikkhūsu upasampadaṃ labbhatīti
tika-vin06t:378_15: sādhakaṃ kāraṇaṃ na dissati, sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya uppabbajitā ce, labhatīti eke, taṃ
tika-vin06t:378_16: panāyuttaṃ bhikkhuniyā sikkhāpaccakkhanābhāvatoti amhākaṃ khantīti ācariyo. “Yathā
tika-vin06t:378_17: ‘kattabba’nti vuttaṃ, tathā akate kuppatīti katvā karaṇaṃ satthusāsana”nti gaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:378_18: vuttaṃ. Yattha yattha “gaṇṭhipade”ti vuccati, tattha tattha “dhammasirittherassa
tika-vin06t:380_2: bodhīsu sammāsambodhiyaṃ sattā bodhisattā mahābodhisattā nāma. Pātimokkhasīlabahukattā,
tika-vin06t:380_3: bhikkhusīlattā, kilesapidahanavasena vattanato, uttamena bhagavatā paññattattā ca
tika-vin06t:380_4: adhikaṃ, buddhuppādeyeva pavattanato uttamanti aññatarasmiṃ gaṇṭhipade. Kiñcāpi paccekabuddhāpi
tika-vin06t:380_6: pavattatī”ti niyamitaṃ tena pariyāyenāti. Tenāha “na hi taṃ paññattiṃ uddharitvā”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:380_7: Pātimokkhasaṃvaratopi ca maggaphalasampayuttameva sīlaṃ adhisīlaṃ, taṃ pana idha
tika-vin06t:380_8: anadhippetaṃ. Na hi taṃ pātimokkhuddesena saṅgahitanti. Samantabhadrakaṃ kāraṇavacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:380_9: sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ sādhāraṇalakkhaṇattā imissā anupaññattiyā ariyapuggalā ca ekaccaṃ
tika-vin06t:380_10: āpattiṃ āpajjantīti sādhitametaṃ, tasmā “na hi taṃ samāpanno methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatī”ti
tika-vin06t:380_11: aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ asamatthaṃ viya dissatīti? Nāsamatthaṃ, samatthameva yasmiṃ yasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:380_12: sikkhāpade sāsā vicāraṇā, tassa tasseva vasena aṭṭhakathāya pavattito. Tathā hi kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:380_14: bhikkhuniyā”ti vuttaṃ bhikkhunivibhaṅge āgatattā. Eseva nayo aññepi evarūpesu. Kimatthanti
tika-vin06t:380_15: ce taṃ? Pāḷikkamānuvattanena pāḷikkamadassanatthaṃ. Tatridaṃ samāsato adhippāyadīpanaṃ
tika-vin06t:380_17: akaṭānudhammasikkhāpadavasena upasampanne ukkhittake siyā āpatti, tathā sahaseyyasikkhāpadeti
tika-vin06t:380_18: evamādi. Attho panettha parato āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin06t:381_0: Yaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tatopi ca maggaphalacittameva adhicittaṃ, taṃ pana idha
tika-vin06t:381_1: anadhippeta”nti ca, “tatopi ca maggaphalapaññāva adhipaññā, sā pana idha anadhippetā.
tika-vin06t:381_2: Na hi taṃsamāpanno bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatī”ti. “Tatra yāyaṃ adhisīlasikkhā,
tika-vin06t:381_3: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti imāya pāḷiyā virujjhati. Ayañhi pāḷi adhisīlasikkhāva
tika-vin06t:381_4: idha adhippetā, na itarāti dīpeti. Aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ tāsampi tiṇṇaṃ lokiyānaṃ adhippetataṃ
tika-vin06t:381_5: dīpeti. Ayaṃ panettha aṭṭhakathādhippāyo – tissopi lokiyā sikkhā imasmiṃ paṭhamapārājike
tika-vin06t:381_6: sambhavanti, kālenāpi adhicittapaññālābhī bhikkhu tathārūpaṃ asappāyaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca
tika-vin06t:381_7: tato tato adhicittato, adhipaññāto ca āvattitvā sīlabhedaṃ pāpuṇeyyāti ṭhānametaṃ
tika-vin06t:381_8: vijjati, na lokuttaracittapaññālābhī, ayaṃ nayo itaresupi sabbesu adinnādānādīsu
tika-vin06t:381_9: sacittakesu labbhati, acittakesu pana itaropi. Tathāpi kevalaṃ vinayapiṭakassa, pātimokkhasīlassa
tika-vin06t:381_10: ca saṅgāhakattā “sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāyā”ti imasmiṃ uttarapade paccakkhānārahā adhisīlasikkhāva
tika-vin06t:381_11: lokiyāti dassanatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “tatra yāyaṃ adhisīlasikkhā, ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā
tika-vin06t:382_0: Ettha sikkhāti kāyavacīduccaritato viratī ca cetanā ca, aññatra cetanāyeva veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:382_1: Sikkhāpadanti sauddesasikkhāpadaṃ, ekaccaṃ anuddesasikkhāpadañca labbhati. Cittassa
tika-vin06t:382_2: adhikaraṇaṃ katvāti tasmiṃ sikkhatīti adhikaraṇatthe bhummanti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:382_3: Yathāsikkhāpadanti paccavekkhaṇavasena vuttaṃ. Sīlapaccavekkhaṇāpi hi sīlameva, tasmā
tika-vin06t:382_6: “tasmiñca sikkhāpade sikkhatī”ti vuccati. Aññatarasmiṃ pana gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ “sikkhāti
tika-vin06t:382_7: taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ sikkhanabhāvena pavattacittuppādo. Sājīvanti paññatti. Tadatthadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:382_8: pubbe methunasaṃvarassetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Yasmā sikkhāya guṇasammatāya puññasammatāya
tika-vin06t:382_9: tantiyā abhāvato lokassa dubbalyāvikammaṃ tattha na sambhavati. Patthanīyā hi sā,
tika-vin06t:382_10: tasmā “yañca sājīvaṃ samāpanno, tattha dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti vuttaṃ. Āṇāya hi dubbalyaṃ
tika-vin06t:384_0: Ettha yāmīti amukasmiṃ titthāyatane, gharādimhi vā. Bhāvavikappākārenāti “ahaṃ assa”nti
tika-vin06t:384_1: āgatattā yaṃ yaṃ bhavitukāmo, tassa tassa bhāvassa vikappākārena, bhikkhubhāvato
tika-vin06t:385: 46. Handāti vacasāyeva. Gihibhāvaṃ patthayamānotiādipadehi cittaniyamaṃ dasseti. Ekeneva cittena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvenāti.
tika-vin06t:386_0: 51. Buddhaṃ dhammantiādipadehi khettaniyamaṃ dasseti. Tattha ādito cuddasahi padehi
tika-vin06t:386_1: sabhāvapariccāgo, pacchimehi aṭṭhahi bhāvantarādānañca dassitaṃ hoti. Paccakkhāmi
tika-vin06t:386_2: dhārehīti etehi kālaniyamaṃ dasseti. Vadatīti iminā padena payoganiyamaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:386_3: Viññāpetīti iminā vijānananiyamaṃ dasseti. Ummattako sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti, ummattakassa
tika-vin06t:386_4: santike sikkhaṃ paccakkhātītiādīhi puggalaniyamaṃ dasseti. Ariyakena milakkhassa
tika-vin06t:386_5: santike sikkhaṃ paccakkhātītiādīhi pana puggalādiniyamepi sati vijānananiyamāsambhavaṃ
tika-vin06t:386_6: dasseti. Tattha “yāya milakkhabhāsāya kālaniyamo natthi, tāyapi bhāsāya kālaniyamatthadīpane
tika-vin06t:386_7: sati sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ ruhatīti no matī”ti ācariyo. Davāyātiādīhi khettādiniyame
tika-vin06t:386_8: satipi cittaniyamābhāvena na ruhatīti dasseti. Sāvetukāmo na sāvetīti cittaniyamepi
tika-vin06t:386_9: sati payoganiyamābhāvena na ruhatīti dasseti. Aviññussasāveti, viññussa na sāvetīti
tika-vin06t:386_10: cittakhettakālapayogapuggalavijānananiyamepi sati yaṃ puggalaṃ uddissa sāveti, tasseva
tika-vin06t:386_11: savane na ruhati, na aññassāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yadi
tika-vin06t:386_12: ayameva jānātūti ekaṃ niyametvā āroceti, tañce so eva jānāti, paccakkhātā hoti sikkhā.
tika-vin06t:386_13: Atha so na jānāti…pe… appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā”ti. Sabbaso vā pana na sāveti, appaccakkhā
tika-vin06t:386_14: hoti sikkhāti cittādiniyameneva sikkhā paccakkhātā hoti, na aññathāti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:386_15: vuttaṃ. Ettāvatā “sikkhā…pe… dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti padassa padabhājanaṃ tīhi ākārehi
tika-vin06t:386_16: dassitaṃ hoti. Tattha dve amissā, pacchimo eko missoti veditabbo. Teneva vacībhedenāti
tika-vin06t:386_17: tadatthadīpanamattaṃ vacanaṃ sutvāva teneva vacībhedena jānāpetīti attho. Cittasampayuttanti
tika-vin06t:387: 53. Vaṇṇapaṭṭhānaṃ buddhaguṇadīpakaṃ suttaṃ. Upāligahapatinā vuttā kira upāligāthā. Paññāṇaṃ saññāṇanti atthato ekaṃ, tasmā bodhipaññāṇanti bodhisaññāṇaṃ, bodhibījanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:388_0: Dvinnampi niyametvāti ettha “dvīsupi jānantesu eva paccakkhāmīti adhippāyena vutte
tika-vin06t:388_1: tesu eko ce jānāti, na paccakkhātā hotī”ti aññatarasmimpi gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin06t:388_2: aṭṭhakathāya na sameti. “Gihī homī”ti vā “gihimhī”ti vā vutte kiñcāpi vattamānavacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:388_3: hoti. “Dhārehī”ti atthābhāvā ca “dhārehī”ti vutte ca parassupari gacchati, tasmā
tika-vin06t:388_4: na hoti. Sandiṭṭhikaṃ dhammanti sabbattha dhammavacanaṃ vuttaṃ yaṃ sandhāya “sandiṭṭhika”nti
tika-vin06t:388_5: vadati, taṃ pakāsetuṃ. Aññathā “vijitavijayaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vutte cakkavattiādīsupi
tika-vin06t:388_6: tappasaṅgato buddhasaddopi avasāne vattabbo bhaveyya. Ācariyavevacanesu pana yo maṃ
tika-vin06t:388_7: pabbājesītiādi upajjhaṃ aggahetvā, paraṃ vā uddissa pabbajitaṃ sandhāya vuttanti.
tika-vin06t:388_8: Okallakoti kapaṇādhivacanaṃ. Moḷibaddhoti sikhābaddho, omukkamakuṭo vā. Cellako athero.
tika-vin06t:388_9: Ceṭako majjhimo. Moḷigallo mahāsāmaṇero. Manussaviggahanāgādīnaṃ nāgarūpādīnaṃ vā
tika-vin06t:388_10: santike, bhāsājānanakinnarādīnaṃ vā. “Devatā nāma mahāpaññā”ti kira pāṭho. Davāyāti
tika-vin06t:388_11: sahasā. Ravābhaññenāti khalitabhaññena. Akkharasamayānañhi nābhiññātāya vā karaṇānaṃ
tika-vin06t:388_12: avisadatāya vā hoti ravābhaññaṃ. Avidheyyindriyatāya “potthakarūpasadisassā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:388_13: garumedhassa mandapaññassa. Kittāvatā pana garumedho hotīti ce? Samaye akovidatāya.
tika-vin06t:391_1: “Eso methunadhammo nāmā”ti sabbapāḷipotthakesu, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “eso vuccati methunadhammo
tika-vin06t:391_2: nāmā”ti uddhaṭā. Itthiyā nimittena attano nimittanti duviññeyyametaṃ dassitaṃ. Attano
tika-vin06t:391_3: nimittena itthiyā nimittaṃ suviññeyyattā na dassitaṃ. Cattāri ṭhānāni muñcitvāti
tika-vin06t:391_4: ettha abbhantaratalaṃ chupantaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ, acchupantaṃ nīharantassa anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:391_5: Majjhanti aggappadesaṃ. Uparibhāgamajjhanti uparibhāgassa aggappadesaṃ. Naṭṭhakāyappasādanti
tika-vin06t:391_6: ettha upahatindriyassa āpattisambhavato idhāpi āpattīti ce? Neti dassanatthaṃ “matacammaṃ
tika-vin06t:391_7: vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Matacammañhi anupādinnaṃ, upādinne eva pārājikāpatti. Apidhāya appaṭicchādetvā.
tika-vin06t:391_8: Yathā dantā na dissanti, tathā pidhāyeva nisīditabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:392_0: Gonasoti goṇapiṭṭhiko maṇḍalasappo, yassa piṭṭhe lohitakāni maṇḍalāni dissanti. Kalalaparicayavāricāramacchaggahaṇena
tika-vin06t:392_1: kiñcāpi samudde mahāmukhā hatthisarīrampi ekappahārena gilituṃ samatthā tato mahantatarā
tika-vin06t:392_2: ca gahitā honti, tesaṃ mukhādīsu methunadhammo na sambhavatīti tattha ṭhānaparicchedo
tika-vin06t:392_3: natthīti eke, vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ. Etameva hīti anantaraṃ sandhāya. Saddhiṃ yojanāya
tika-vin06t:392_4: akkharayojanāya. “Paññattaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ sabbehipi lajjīpuggalehi samaṃ sikkhitabbabhāvato
tika-vin06t:392_5: samasikkhatā nāmāti vuttattā sabbasikkhāpadaṃ sabbabhikkhūhi sikkhitabbaṃ. Na hi
tika-vin06t:392_6: kassaci ūnamadhikaṃ vā atthī”ti tassa gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Parivāre pana –
tika-vin06t:394: Na saṅghabhinno na ca pana pakkhasaṅkanto;
tika-vin06t:397_0: Vuttaṃ. Tadaṭṭhakathāya ca “ayaṃ pañhā nahāpitapubbakaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Ayañhi khurabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin06t:397_1: pariharituṃ na labhati, aññe labhanti. Tasmā sikkhāya asādhāraṇo”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:397_2: yathā saṃsandati sameti, tathā veditabbaṃ. Bhikkhunīnaṃyeva sādhāraṇāni sikkhāpadānipi
tika-vin06t:397_3: bhikkhu sikkhati, evamaññopi anhāpitapubbako bhikkhu taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ sikkhati eva
tika-vin06t:397_4: tadatthakosallatthanti katvā sabbampi sikkhāpadaṃ samasikkhatā nāmāti. Yaṃ taṃ vuttanti
tika-vin06t:397_6: vuttaṃ. Tena amanussitthippasaṅgena kate suvaṇṇarajatādimaye paṭikkhipati. Ito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin06t:397_7: ye ca “tayo atthavase paṭicca vibhaṅgo pavattatī”ti pubbe vuttā, te yathāsambhavaṃ yojetvā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:399_0: 57. Āpatti pārājikā assa hotīti ettha yasmā sā akusalā āpatti tassa bhikkhuno sīlasambhavaṃ
tika-vin06t:399_1: abhibhavati, rāgābhibhave tasmiṃ pārājikāti laddhanāmā pubbabhāge āpannā dukkaṭathullaccayādayo
tika-vin06t:399_2: āpattiyo abhibhavitvā vināsetvā sayamevekā assa. Vatthunā sabhāgāhi vā asabhāgāhi
tika-vin06t:399_3: vā aññāhi pārājikattena samānajātikāhi āpattīhi sayaṃ nābhibhavīyatīti eke. Taṃ taṃ
tika-vin06t:399_4: pubbe vicāritameva. Yadā pana catassopi pārājikāpattiyo ekato honti, tadā tā tassa
tika-vin06t:399_5: bhikkhuno bhikkhubhāvaṃ abhibhavanti, abhikkhuṃ karonti, anupasampannaṃ karonti,
tika-vin06t:399_6: samaññāyapi bhikkhu na hoti. Omasavādapācittiyaṃ na janetīti eke. Dutiyena atthavikappena
tika-vin06t:399_7: pārājikassa dhammassa patti sampatti āpattīti attho saṅgahito hotīti katvā āpattisampattivādīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:399_8: saṅgahito hoti, yujjati cesā parasāpekkhā. Sāpattiko nāma so bhikkhu hoti, aññathā
tika-vin06t:399_9: tassa khaṇabhaṅgena anāpattiko bhaveyya, na ca hotīti. Kadā pana hotīti? Yadā kālaṃ
tika-vin06t:399_10: karoti, yadā ca sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya sāmaṇerādibhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhati. Yadi evaṃ sikkhāya
tika-vin06t:399_11: paccakkhātāya pārājikāpatti paccakkhātā hoti sikkhā cāti ubhayaṃ tassa ekato atthi,
tika-vin06t:399_12: saṅghādisesādiāpatti sikkhāpaccakkhānena kiṃ na paccakkhātā, puna upasampannena desāpetabbā.
tika-vin06t:399_13: Sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ jātaṃ, abhikkhu āpattito vuṭṭhāti, gahaṭṭho vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin06t:399_14: sāmaṇero vuṭṭhāti, tato vinayavirodhā na vuṭṭhāti. Hañci pana vuṭṭhāti gahaṭṭho,
tika-vin06t:399_15: sāmaṇero vā sīlasampannova jhānalābhī assa, sotāpattiphalassa vā arahattaphalassa
tika-vin06t:399_16: vā lābhī assa, pārājikāpattiyā sāpattiko arahā assa. Ukkhittako uppabbajito vā parivāsāraho
tika-vin06t:399_17: mānattāraho uppabbajito vā sīlasampanno jhānalābhī assa, sotāpattiphalassa, arahattaphalassa
tika-vin06t:399_18: vā lābhī assa, sāpattiko santarāyiko arahā assa, so puna upasampanno parivāsaṃ, mānattaṃ
tika-vin06t:399_19: vā datvā abbhetabbo ukkhittako osāretabboti samāno ayaṃ upalabbhoti.
tika-vin06t:400_0: Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ āpanno yāva bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānāti
tika-vin06t:400_1: sādiyati saṃvāsaṃ, santarāyikattā uposathadivasādīsu gahaṭṭhassa viya sayameva sīlaṃ
tika-vin06t:400_2: samādiyantassapi na sīlasamādānaṃ ruhati, pageva jhānādīni. So ce bhikkhubhāvaṃ na
tika-vin06t:400_3: sādiyati na paṭijānāti saṃvāsaṃ na sādiyati, kevalaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āvikatvā rājavericorādibhayena
tika-vin06t:400_4: kāsāvaṃ na pariccajati, anupasampannova hoti sahaseyyādiṃ janeti, sīlassa ca jhānādīnañca
tika-vin06t:401: “Āpannena visuddhāpekkhena santī āpatti āvikātabbā, āvikatā hissa phāsu hoti, paṭhamassa jhānassa adhigamāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:402_0: Tattha santī āpattīti sāvasesānavasesappabhedā sabbāpi āpatti āpannā adhippetā. Evaṃ
tika-vin06t:402_1: santepi pageva gahaṭṭhādibhūmiyaṃ ṭhito jhānādīnaṃ bhāgī assa suddhante ṭhitattā,
tika-vin06t:402_2: yo pana ukkhittako anosārito, garudhammaṃ vā āpajjitvā avuṭṭhito sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya
tika-vin06t:402_3: gahaṭṭhādibhūmiyaṃ ṭhito, na so jhānādīnaṃ bhāgīyeva bhavati na suddhante ṭhitattā,
tika-vin06t:402_4: sakaraṇīyattā ca, teneva bhagavatā “so puna upasampanno osāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin06t:402_5: tassa puggalassa te bhikkhukāle āpannā antarāyikā dhammā vippaṭisāraṃ janayitvā avippaṭisāramūlakānaṃ
tika-vin06t:402_6: pāmojjādīnaṃ sambhavaṃ nivārenti, no sakāsāvesuyeva. No ce nivārenti, sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:402_7: Garukaṃ āpajjitvā bhikkhūnaṃ āvikatvā ce uppabbajito, pakatatto hutvā uppabbajitoti
tika-vin06t:402_8: katvā jhānādīnaṃ bhāgī assa “āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti vuttattā. Pageva bhikkhukāle,
tika-vin06t:402_9: na tveva ukkhittako sakaraṇīyattāti eke. Tadanuvattanako pana taṃ laddhiṃ pahāya
tika-vin06t:402_10: bhāgī assa. Na, bhikkhave, sagahaṭṭhāya parisāya sikkhāpaccakkhātakassa antimavatthuṃ
tika-vin06t:402_11: ajjhāpannakassa nisinnaparisāyāti ettha gahaṭṭho nāma pakatiyā gihiliṅge ṭhito. Sikkhaṃ
tika-vin06t:402_12: paccakkhāya bhikkhuliṅge ṭhito sikkhāpaccakkhātako. So sakāsāvesu sāpekkhattā sāmaṇerabhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:402_13: patthayamāno teneva liṅgena tīhi saraṇagamanehi sāmaṇero hoti. Antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno
tika-vin06t:402_14: saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi pacchā pubbe vuttakkamena asādiyitvā sāmaṇerabhāvaṃ patthayamāno
tika-vin06t:402_15: sikkhāpaccakkhātako viya tīhi saraṇagamanehi sāmaṇero hoti, na puna kāsāvaṃ paṭiggāhāpetabbo
tika-vin06t:402_16: bhikkhūhi paṭhamaṃ dinnaliṅgeyeva ṭhitattā. Yo pana pārājiko codiyamāno parājitvā
tika-vin06t:402_17: “handa, bhante, sāmaṇero bhavāmi, saraṇāni dethā”ti vadati, “sādhu gaṇhāhī”ti na
tika-vin06t:402_18: vattabbo, gihiliṅge ṭhapetvā puna kāsāyāni paṭiggāhāpetvā pabbājetabbo. “Idaṃ pana
tika-vin06t:402_19: sabbaṃ attano matiyā vuttattā vicāretvā gahetabba”nti ācariyo vadati. Pavesanaṃ nāma
tika-vin06t:402_20: aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassa aṅgajātena samphusanaṃ. Paviṭṭhaṃ nāma yāva mūlā pavesentassa
tika-vin06t:402_21: vippakatakāle vāyāmakālo. Sukkavissaṭṭhisamaye aṅgajātaṃ ṭhitaṃ nāma. Uddharaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:402_22: nāma nīharaṇakālo. Gaṇṭhipade pana “vāyāmato oramitvā ṭhānaṃ ṭhitaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:402_23: taṃ asaṅkarato dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Pavesanapaviṭṭhauddharaṇakālesupi sukkavissaṭṭhi hotiyeva.
tika-vin06t:405_0: 59-60. “Mataṃ yebhuyyena akkhāyita”nti vacanato amataṃ yebhuyyena khāyitampi pārājikavatthumevāti
tika-vin06t:405_1: dasseti. Sabbaso khāyitaṃ, uppāṭitaṃ vā thullaccayavatthumevāti dasseti, tathā “yebhuyyena
tika-vin06t:405_2: khāyita”nti vacanato mataṃ sabbakhāyitaṃ, uppāṭitaṃ vā dukkaṭavatthūti dasseti. Na
tika-vin06t:405_3: ca sāvasesaṃ paññapenti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Idañhi sikkhāpadaṃ lokavajjaṃ, na paṇṇattivajjaṃ.
tika-vin06t:405_4: Tattha sikkhāpadanti pārājikaṃ adhippetaṃ. Tattha thullaccayampi hi lokavajjaṃ, na
tika-vin06t:405_5: paṇṇattivajjaṃ. Atha vā ubhayampi anavasesaṃ paññattaṃ. Pārājikakhette hi heṭṭhimakoṭiṃ
tika-vin06t:405_6: pāpetvā ṭhapite tato paraṃ thullaccayanti paññattameva hoti. Tattha thullaccayakhettampi
tika-vin06t:405_7: pārājikakhettaṃ viya heṭṭhimaparicchedena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Upaḍḍhakkhāyite thullaccayanti
tika-vin06t:405_8: yattha nimittaṃ khāyitaṃ, taṃ dukkaṭavatthūti veditabbaṃ. Etthāha – paṇṇattivajjaṃ
tika-vin06t:405_9: kiṃ sāvasesameva bhagavā paññāpetīti? Na. Ekaṃsato pana yathāsambhavaṃ tattha tattha
tika-vin06t:405_10: pakāsayissāma, kimatthaṃ pana bhagavā upaḍḍhakkhāyite pārājikaṃ na paññāpesīti ayaṃ
tika-vin06t:405_11: tāva apucchā buddhavisayattā vinayapaññattiyā. Idaṃ panettha kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ “upaḍḍhabhāvassa
tika-vin06t:405_12: dubbinicchayattā”ti. Yebhuyyena khāyitaṃ nāma vaccamaggapassāvamaggamukhānaṃ catūsu
tika-vin06t:405_13: koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāse atikkamma yāva tatiyakoṭṭhāsapariyosānā khāditaṃ, tatiyakoṭṭhāsaṃ
tika-vin06t:406_0: Yadipi nimittaṃ sabbaso khāyitanti “jīvamānakasarīraṃyeva sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:406_1: taṃ vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Allasarīreti abhinave, akuthite vā manussānaṃ jīvamānasarīre
tika-vin06t:406_2: akkhināsādīsu thullaccayameva. Tiracchānagatānaṃ hatthiassādīnaṃ nāsāya vatthikose
tika-vin06t:406_3: ca thullaccayanti “amaggena amaggaṃ paveseti, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti imāya pāḷiyā
tika-vin06t:406_4: atthavisesenettha vuttaṃ. Upakacchakādīsu dukkaṭaṃ, sabbesampi tiracchānagatānaṃ
tika-vin06t:406_5: akkhikaṇṇavaṇesu dukkaṭaṃ, avasesasarīrepi dukkaṭamevāti idaṃ vinītavatthusmiṃ “ehi,
tika-vin06t:406_6: bhante, methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevā”ti. “Alaṃ bhagini netaṃ kappatī”ti iminā tāva methunarāgābhāvo
tika-vin06t:406_7: dassito hoti. “Ehi, bhante, ūruntarikāya ghaṭṭehi…pe… so bhikkhu tathā akāsī”ti iminā
tika-vin06t:406_8: tāva mocanassādo dassito hoti, tenevāha bhagavā “āpatti saṅghādisesassā”ti. “Yo pana
tika-vin06t:406_9: methunarāgena ūruntarikāya ghaṭṭeti, tassa dukkaṭa”nti siddhanti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:407_1: ettha duviññeyyo pāḷileso, tasmā “na ca, bhikkhave, rattacittena aṅgajātaṃ chupitabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:407_2: yo chupeyya, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti vacanato rattacittena akkhikaṇṇavaṇaṃ chupantassa
tika-vin06t:407_3: dukkaṭanti siddhanti ayaṃ cammakkhandhake pāḷilesoti veditabbo. “Jīvamānakapurisassāti
tika-vin06t:407_4: jīvamānakasaddo mate vattabbameva natthīti ñāpanatthaṃ vutto”ti vadanti. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:407_5: panāti idaṃ kiñcāpi “katvā mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ sarīra”nti vuttaṃ, atha kho sesaaṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin06t:407_6: “methunarāgena mukhenā”ti vacanābhāvato tattheva bhāvato taṃ vacanaṃ pāḷivacanena
tika-vin06t:407_7: saṃsanditvā dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Anugaṇṭhipade pana “taṃ sabbampīti mahāaṭṭhakathāyameva
tika-vin06t:407_8: methunarāgena itthiyā nimittaṃ appavesento chupati, thullaccaya”nti ca vuttaṃ. “Methunarāgena
tika-vin06t:407_9: mukhenā”tipi katthaci, pāḷiyaṃ avisesena “na ca, bhikkhave, rattacittena aṅgajātaṃ
tika-vin06t:407_10: chupitabba”nti vuttaṃ, tasmā “taṃ sabba”nti vuttaṃ. Purimaṃ pasaṃsantīti tiracchānagati…pe…
tika-vin06t:407_12: “Taṃ sabbampi…pe… purimaṃ pasaṃsantī”ti idaṃ saṅgītito pacchā sīhaḷadīpakehi ācariyehi
tika-vin06t:407_13: pāḷiyā, aṭṭhakathāyañca vuttavacanaṃ saṃsanditvā vuttavinicchayoti vuttaṃ. Ettha
tika-vin06t:407_14: itarathā hīti pakatimukhena. Kasmā dukkaṭanti ce? “Aṅgulibījādīni pavesentassa dukkaṭa”nti
tika-vin06t:407_15: vuttattā yuttaṃ. Tiracchānagatitthiyā passāvamagganti ettha mahāaṭṭhakathāyampi pubbe
tika-vin06t:407_16: “nimitta”nti vatvā ettha “passāvamagga”nti vuttattā avasesanimitte dukkaṭanti yuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:407_17: viya dissati. Vuttanayenevāti methunarāgena. Thullaccayanti ca khandhake passāvanimittavasenevāgatattā
tika-vin06t:410_0: 61-2. Itthinimittaṃ khāṇuṃ katvāti itthinimittassa anto khāṇuṃ pavesetvā samatalaṃ
tika-vin06t:410_1: vā katvā atirittaṃ vā khāṇuṃ ghaṭṭentassa dukkaṭaṃ pavesābhāvā. Īsakaṃ anto pavesetvā
tika-vin06t:410_2: ṭhitaṃ khāṇumeva ce aṅgajātena chupati, pārājikaṃ. “Uppalagandhā uppalabhāvā”tipi
tika-vin06t:410_3: dīpavāsino paṭhanti kira. Suttaṃ bhikkhumhīti sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhiteti ettha viya.
tika-vin06t:414_0: Pakiṇṇake yāni sikkhāpadāni “kiriyānī”ti vuccanti, tesaṃ vasena kāyo, vācā ca saha
tika-vin06t:414_1: viññattiyā veditabbā. Akiriyānaṃ vasena vinā viññattiyā veditabbā, cittaṃ panettha
tika-vin06t:414_2: appamāṇaṃ bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānassa kiriyattā, acittakattā ca. Tattha kiriyā āpattiyā
tika-vin06t:414_4: vuccati, yathayidaṃ paṭhamapārājikaṃ viññattiyā abhāvepi “so ce sādiyati, āpatti
tika-vin06t:414_5: pārājikassā”ti hi vuttaṃ “na sādiyati anāpattī”ti ca. Viññattisaṅkhātāpi kiriyā vinā
tika-vin06t:414_6: sevanacittena na hoti cittajattā, vikārarūpattā, cittānuparivattikattā ca. Tasmā
tika-vin06t:414_7: kiriyāsaṅkhātamidaṃ viññattirūpaṃ itaraṃ cittajarūpaṃ viya janakacittena vinā na
tika-vin06t:414_8: tiṭṭhati, itaraṃ saddāyatanaṃ tiṭṭhati, tasmā kiriyāya sati ekantato tajjanakaṃ sevanacittaṃ
tika-vin06t:414_9: atthiyevāti katvā na sādiyati anāpattīti na yujjati. Yasmā viññattijanakampi samānaṃ
tika-vin06t:414_10: sevanacittaṃ na sabbakālaṃ viññattiṃ janeti, tasmā vināpi viññattiyā sayaṃ uppajjatīti
tika-vin06t:414_11: katvā “sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassā”ti vuttaṃ. Nuppajjati ce, na sādiyati nāma, tassa
tika-vin06t:414_12: anāpatti, teneva bhagavā “kiṃcitto tvaṃ bhikkhū”ti citteneva āpattiṃ paricchindati,
tika-vin06t:414_13: na kiriyāyāti veditabbaṃ. Ettāvatā cha āpattisamuṭṭhānāni, tāni eva āpattikarā dhammā
tika-vin06t:414_14: nāmāti ca, catūhākārehi āpattiṃ āpajjati kāyena vācāya kāyavācāhi kammavācāya āpajjatīti
tika-vin06t:414_15: ca etāni suttapadāni avirodhitāni honti, aññathā virodhitāni. Kathaṃ? Yañhi āpattiṃ
tika-vin06t:414_16: kammavācāya āpajjati, na tattha kāyādayoti āpannaṃ, tato kammavācāya saddhiṃ āpattikarā
tika-vin06t:414_17: dhammā sattāti āpajjati, atha tatthāpi kāyādayo ekato vā nānāto vā labbhanti. “Catūhi
tika-vin06t:414_18: ākārehī”ti na yujjati, “tīhākārehi āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti vattabbaṃ siyāti evaṃ virodhitāni
tika-vin06t:414_19: honti. Kathaṃ avirodhitānīti? Saviññattikāviññattikabhedabhinnattā kāyādīnaṃ. Yā
tika-vin06t:414_20: kiriyā āpatti, taṃ ekaccaṃ kāyena saviññattikena āpajjati, ekaccaṃ saviññattiyā vācāya,
tika-vin06t:414_21: ekaccaṃ saviññattikāhi kāyavācāhi āpajjati. Yā pana akiriyā āpatti, taṃ ekaccaṃ kammavācāya
tika-vin06t:414_22: āpajjati, tañca kho avasiṭṭhāhi aviññattikāhi kāyavācāhiyeva, na vinā “no ce kāyena
tika-vin06t:414_23: vācāya paṭinissajjati, kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassā”ti vacanato. Avisesena
tika-vin06t:414_24: vā ekaccaṃ āpattiṃ kāyena āpajjati, ekaccaṃ vācāya, ekaccaṃ kāyavācāhi. Yaṃ panettha
tika-vin06t:414_25: kāyavācāhi, taṃ ekaccaṃ kevalāhi kāyavācāhi āpajjati, ekaccaṃ kammavācāya āpajjatīti
tika-vin06t:415_0: Tatrāyaṃ samāsato atthavibhāvanā – kāyena āpajjatīti kāyena saviññattikena akattabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:415_1: katvā ekaccaṃ āpajjati, aviññattikena kattabbaṃ akatvā āpajjati, tadubhayampi kāyakammaṃ
tika-vin06t:415_2: nāma. Akatampi hi loke “kata”nti vuccati “idaṃ dukkaṭaṃ mayā, yaṃ mayā puññaṃ na
tika-vin06t:415_3: kata”nti evamādīsu, sāsane ca “idaṃ te, āvuso ānanda, dukkaṭaṃ, yaṃ tvaṃ bhagavantaṃ
tika-vin06t:415_4: na pucchī”tiādīsu, evamidha vinayapariyāye kāyena akaraṇīyampi “kāyakamma”nti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:415_5: ayameva nayo vācāya āpajjatītiādīsu. Tattha samuṭṭhānaggahaṇaṃ kattabbato vā akattabbato
tika-vin06t:415_6: vā kāyādibhedāpekkhameva āpattiṃ āpajjati, na aññathāti dassanatthaṃ. Kiriyāggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:415_8: tena yaṃ cittaṃ kiriyālakkhaṇe, akiriyālakkhaṇe vā sannihitaṃ, yato vā kiriyā vā
tika-vin06t:415_9: akiriyā vā hoti, na taṃ avisesena āpattiyā aṅgaṃ vā anaṅgaṃ vā hoti, kintu yāya saññāya
tika-vin06t:415_10: “saññāvimokkha”nti vuccati, tāya sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ aṅgaṃ, itaraṃ anaṅganti dassitaṃ
tika-vin06t:415_11: hoti. Idāni yena cittena sikkhāpadaṃ sacittakaṃ hoti, yadabhāvā acittakaṃ, tena tassa
tika-vin06t:415_12: avisesena sāvajjattā lokavajjabhāvova vuccati, kintu sāvajjaṃyeva samānaṃ ekaccaṃ
tika-vin06t:415_13: lokavajjaṃ ekaccaṃ paṇṇattivajjanti dassanatthaṃ lokavajjaggahaṇaṃ. Cittameva yasmā
tika-vin06t:415_14: “lokavajja”nti vuccati, tasmā manokammampi siyā āpattīti aniṭṭhappasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:415_15: kammaggahaṇaṃ. Yaṃ panettha akiriyālakkhaṇaṃ kammaṃ, taṃ kusalattikavinimuttaṃ siyāti
tika-vin06t:415_16: aniṭṭhappasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ kusalattikaggahaṇaṃ. Yā panettha abyākatā āpatti, taṃ
tika-vin06t:415_17: ekaccaṃ avedanampi saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpanno āpajjatīti katvā vedanāttikaṃ ettha
tika-vin06t:415_18: na labbhatīti aniṭṭhappasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ vedanāttikaggahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:415_20: “ticittaṃ tivedana”micceva vuccati. Tatridaṃ suttaṃ “atthāpatti acittako āpajjati
tika-vin06t:415_21: acittako vuṭṭhāti. Atthāpatti kusalacitto āpajjati kusalacitto vuṭṭhātī”tiādi. Anugaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:415_22: pana “saññā sadā anāpattimeva karoti, cittaṃ āpattimeva, acittakaṃ nāma vatthuavijānanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:416_2: siyā akiriyato. Desitavatthukapamāṇātikkantakuṭikaraṇe siyā kiriyato, adesitavatthukapamāṇātikkantakaraṇe
tika-vin06t:416_3: siyā kiriyākiriyato. Yaṃ cittaṅgaṃ labhatiyevāti kāyacittaṃ vācācittanti evaṃ. Vināpi
tika-vin06t:416_4: cittenāti ettha vināpi cittena sahāpi cittenāti adhippāyo. Yo so saviññattiko, aviññattiko
tika-vin06t:416_5: ca vutto kāyo, tassa kammaṃ kāyakammaṃ, tathā vacīkammaṃ. Tattha saviññattiko kāyo
tika-vin06t:416_6: uppattiyā kammaṃ sādheti, itaro anuppattiyā. Tathā vācāti veditabbaṃ, sikkhāpadanti
tika-vin06t:416_7: “yo tattha nāmakāyo padakāyo”ti vacanato vītikkame yujjatīti vuttaṃ. “Hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanānipi
tika-vin06t:416_8: āpattisamuṭṭhāpakacittāni. Idampi na mayā paricchinnanti hasamāno passati yadā, tadā
tika-vin06t:416_9: voṭṭhabbanaṃ javanagatika”nti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Abhiññācittāni paññattiṃ ajānitvā
tika-vin06t:417_0: Ettha pana yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno…pe… methunaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-vin06t:417_1: paṭisevanto atthi koci pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso, atthi koci na pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso.
tika-vin06t:417_2: Dukkaṭathullaccayavatthūsu paṭisevanto atthi koci na pārājiko. Pakkhapaṇḍako apaṇḍakapakkhe
tika-vin06t:417_3: upasampanno paṇḍakapakkhe methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto so pārājikaṃ āpattiṃ nāpajjatīti
tika-vin06t:417_4: na pārājiko nāma. Na hi abhikkhuno āpatti nāma atthi. So anāpattikattā apaṇḍakapakkhe
tika-vin06t:417_5: āgato kiṃ asaṃvāso hoti na hotīti? Hoti, “abhabbo tena sarīrabandhanenā”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:417_6: “Yo pana, bhikkhu, bhikkhūnaṃ…pe… asaṃvāso”ti vuttattā yo pana bhikkhubhāvena methunaṃ
tika-vin06t:417_7: dhammaṃ paṭisevati, so eva abhabbo. Nāyaṃ apārājikattāti ce? Na, “byattena bhikkhunā
tika-vin06t:417_8: paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo”ti vuttaṭṭhāne yathā abhikkhunā kammavācāya sāvitāyapi
tika-vin06t:417_9: kammaṃ ruhati kammavipattiyā asambhavato, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tatridaṃ yutti
tika-vin06t:417_10: – upasampannapubbo eva ce kammavācaṃ sāveti, saṅgho ca tasmiṃ upasampannasaññī, evañce
tika-vin06t:417_11: kammaṃ ruhati, na aññathāti no khantīti ācariyo. Gahaṭṭho vā titthiyo vā paṇḍako
tika-vin06t:417_12: vā anupasampannasaññī kammavācaṃ sāveti, saṅghena kammavācā na vuttā hoti, “saṅgho
tika-vin06t:417_13: upasampādeyya, saṅgho upasampādeti, upasampanno saṅghenā”ti hi vacanato saṅghena
tika-vin06t:417_14: kammavācāya vattabbāya saṅghapariyāpannena, saṅghapariyāpannasaññitena vā ekena vuttā
tika-vin06t:417_15: saṅghena vuttāva hotīti veditabbo, ayameva sabbakammesu yutti. Tathā atthi methunaṃ
tika-vin06t:417_16: dhammaṃ paṭisevanto koci nāsetabbo “yo bhikkhunīdūsako, ayaṃ nāsetabbo”ti vuttattā
tika-vin06t:417_17: eva, so anupasampannova, sahaseyyāpattiādiṃ janeti, tassa omasane ca dukkaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:417_18: Abhikkhuniyā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto na nāsetabbo “antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno,
tika-vin06t:417_19: bhikkhave, anupasampanno…pe… nāsetabbo”ti pāḷiyā abhāvato. Teneva so upasampannasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin06t:417_20: gacchati, na sahaseyyāpattādiṃ janeti, kevalaṃ asaṃvāsoti katvā gaṇapūrako na hoti,
tika-vin06t:417_21: ekakammaṃ ekuddesopi hi saṃvāsoti vutto. Samasikkhatāpi saṃvāsoti katvā so tena saddhiṃ
tika-vin06t:417_22: natthīti padasodhammāpattiṃ pana janetīti kāraṇacchāyā dissati. Yathā bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin06t:417_23: saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa ekakammādino saṃvāsassa abhāvā bhikkhunī asaṃvāsā bhikkhussa,
tika-vin06t:417_24: tathā bhikkhu ca bhikkhuniyā, padasodhammāpattiṃ pana janeti. Tathā “antimavatthuṃ
tika-vin06t:417_25: ajjhāpannopi ekacco yo nāsetabbo”ti avuttoti iminā nidassanena sā kāraṇacchāyā gahaṇaṃ na gacchati.
tika-vin06t:418_0: Api ca “bhikkhu suttabhikkhumhi vippaṭipajjati, paṭibuddho sādiyati, ubho nāsetabbā”ti
tika-vin06t:418_1: ca, “tena hi, bhikkhave, mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsethā”ti ca vacanato yo saṅghamajjhaṃ
tika-vin06t:418_2: pavisitvā anuvijjakena anuvijjiyamāno parājāpito, sopi anupasampannova, na omasavādapācittiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:418_3: janetīti veditabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi “upasampannaṃ upasampannasaññī khuṃsetukāmo”ti pāḷi
tika-vin06t:418_4: natthi, kiñcāpi kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “yaṃ akkosati, tassa upasampannatā, anaññāpadesena
tika-vin06t:418_5: jātiādīhi akkosanaṃ, ‘maṃ akkosatī’ti jānanā, atthapurekkhāratādīnaṃ abhāvoti imānettha
tika-vin06t:418_6: cattāri aṅgānī”ti vuttaṃ, tathāpi duṭṭhadosasikkhāpade “asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ
tika-vin06t:418_7: pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno, tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo
tika-vin06t:418_8: vadeti, āpatti omasavādassā”ti vacanato asuddhe upasampannasaññāya eva omasantassa
tika-vin06t:418_9: pācittiyaṃ. Asuddhadiṭṭhissa dukkaṭaṃ. “Suddho hoti puggalo, aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ
tika-vin06t:418_10: dhammaṃ anajjhāpanno, tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti,
tika-vin06t:418_11: āpatti omasavādassā”ti vacanato pana kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “tassa upasampannatā upasampannasaññitā”ti
tika-vin06t:418_12: na vuttaṃ anekaṃsikattā tassa aṅgassāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:419_0: Api cettha sikkhāpaccakkhātakacatukkaṃ veditabbaṃ, atthi puggalo sikkhāpaccakkhātako
tika-vin06t:419_1: na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno, atthi sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno na sikkhāpaccakkhātako, atthi
tika-vin06t:419_2: sikkhāpaccakkhātako ceva sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno ca, atthi neva sikkhāpaccakkhātako
tika-vin06t:419_3: na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno. Tattha tatiyo bhikkhunīsikkhāpaccakkhātako veditabbo. Sā
tika-vin06t:419_4: hi yāva na liṅgaṃ pariccajati, kāsāve saussāhāva samānā sāmaññā cavitukāmā sikkhaṃ
tika-vin06t:419_5: paccakkhantīpi bhikkhunī eva sikkhāsājīvasamāpannāva. Vuttañhi bhagavatā “na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:419_6: bhikkhuniyā sikkhāpaccakkhāna”nti. Kadā ca pana sā abhikkhunī hotīti? Yadā sāmaññā
tika-vin06t:419_7: cavitukāmā gihinivāsanaṃ nivāseti, sā “vibbhantā”ti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Vuttañhi bhagavatā
tika-vin06t:419_8: “yadeva sā vibbhantā, tadeva abhikkhunī”ti. Kittāvatā pana vibbhantā hotīti? Sāmaññā
tika-vin06t:419_9: cavitukāmā kāsāvesu anālayā kāsāvaṃ vā apaneti, naggā vā gacchati, tiṇapaṇṇādinā
tika-vin06t:419_10: vā paṭicchādetvā gacchati, kāsāvaṃyeva vā gihinivāsanākārena nivāseti, odātaṃ vā
tika-vin06t:419_11: vatthaṃ nivāseti, saliṅgeneva vā saddhiṃ titthiyesu pavisitvā kesaluñcanādivataṃ
tika-vin06t:419_12: samādiyati, titthiyaliṅgaṃ vā samādiyati, tadā vibbhantā nāma hoti. Tattha yā bhikkhuniliṅge
tika-vin06t:419_13: ṭhitāva titthiyavataṃ samādiyati, sā titthiyapakkantako bhikkhu viya pacchā pabbajjampi
tika-vin06t:419_14: na labhati, sesā pabbajjamevekaṃ labhanti, na upasampadaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ kiñcāpi “yā sā,
tika-vin06t:419_15: bhikkhave, bhikkhunī sakāsāvā titthāyatanaṃ saṅkantā, sā āgatā na upasampādetabbā”ti
tika-vin06t:419_16: vacanato yā paṭhamaṃ vibbhamitvā pacchā titthāyatanaṃ saṅkantā, sā āgatā upasampādetabbāti
tika-vin06t:419_17: anuññātaṃ viya dissati. Saṅgītiācariyehi pana “catuvīsati pārājikānī”ti vuttattā
tika-vin06t:419_18: na puna sā upasampādetabbā, tasmā eva sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ nānuññātaṃ bhagavatā. Antimavatthuajjhāpannā
tika-vin06t:419_19: pana bhikkhunī eva. Pakkhapaṇḍakīpi bhikkhunī eva. Kinti pucchā.
tika-vin06t:421_0: 67. Vinītāni vinicchitāni vatthūni vinītavatthūni. Tesaṃ tesaṃ “tena kho pana samayena
tika-vin06t:421_1: aññataro bhikkhū”tiādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ pāṭekkaṃ nāmagaṇanaṃ uddharitvā uddharitvā ūnādhikadosasodhanaṭṭhena
tika-vin06t:421_2: uddānā ca tā matrādisiddhigāthāhi chandovicitilakkhaṇena gāthā cāti “uddānagāthā
tika-vin06t:421_3: nāmā”ti vuttaṃ, de, sodhane iti dhātussa rūpaṃ uddānāti veditabbaṃ. Imā pana uddānagāthā
tika-vin06t:421_4: dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi saṅgītikāle ṭhapitā, katthāti ce? Padabhājanīyāvasāne. “Vatthugāthā
tika-vin06t:421_5: nāma ‘tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhū’tiādīnaṃ imesaṃ vinītavatthūnaṃ nidānānī”ti
tika-vin06t:421_6: gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ, tasmā tattha vuttanayena vinītavatthūni eva “vatthugāthā”ti vuttāti
tika-vin06t:421_7: veditabbaṃ. Idamettha samāsato adhippāyanidassanaṃ – “āpattiṃ tvaṃ, bhikkhu, āpanno
tika-vin06t:421_8: pārājika”nti mūlāpattidassanavasena vā, “anāpatti, bhikkhu, pārājikassa, āpatti saṅghādisesassa,
tika-vin06t:421_9: dukkaṭassā”ti āpattibhedadassanavasena vā, “anāpatti, bhikkhu, asādiyantassā”ti anāpattidassanavasena
tika-vin06t:421_10: vā yāni vatthūni vinītāni vinicchitāni, tāni vinītavatthūni nāma. Tesaṃ vinītavatthūnaṃ
tika-vin06t:421_11: nidānavatthudīpikā tanti vatthugāthā nāma. Uddānagāthāva “vatthugāthā”ti vuttāti
tika-vin06t:421_12: eke. Tesaṃ “iminā lakkhaṇena āyatiṃ vinayadharā vinayaṃ vinicchinissantī”ti vacanena
tika-vin06t:421_13: virujjhati. Na hi uddānagāthāyaṃ kiñcipi vinicchayalakkhaṇaṃ dissati, uddānagāthānaṃ
tika-vin06t:421_14: visuṃ payojanaṃ vuttaṃ “sukhaṃ vinayadharā uggaṇhissantī”ti, tasmā payojananānattatopetaṃ
tika-vin06t:421_15: nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ viggaho – vatthūni eva gāthā vatthugāthā. Vinītavatthuto
tika-vin06t:421_16: visesanatthamettha gāthāggahaṇaṃ. Uddānagāthāto visesanatthaṃ vatthuggahaṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:421_17: Keci pana “gāthānaṃ vatthūnīti vattabbe vatthugāthāti vutta”nti vadanti. Makkaṭivatthuṃ
tika-vin06t:421_18: aññe tattha bhikkhū ārocesuṃ, idha sayameva. Tattha kāraṇassa “bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin06t:421_19: paññatta”nti vuttattā vajjiputtakāpi aññe eva. “Tattha ānandatthero, idha te evā”ti
tika-vin06t:421_20: aññatarasmiṃ gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Ācariyassa adhippāyo pubbe vutto, tasmā upaparikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:422_0: 67-8. Ñatvāti apucchitvā sayameva ñatvā. Pokkharanti sarīraṃ bheripokkharaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:422_1: Lokiyā avikalaṃ “sundara”nti vadanti, tasmā vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti paṭhamenatthena visiṭṭhakāyacchavitāyāti
tika-vin06t:422_2: attho, dutiyena vaṇṇasundaratāyāti. “Uppalagabbhavaṇṇattā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā, tasmā uppalavaṇṇāti
tika-vin06t:422_3: nāmaṃ labhī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Nīluppalavaṇṇā kāyacchavīti vacanaṃ pana sāmacchaviṃ
tika-vin06t:422_4: dīpeti. Loke pana “uppalasamā pasatthasāmā”ti vacanato “yā sāmā sāmavaṇṇā sāmatanumajjhā,
tika-vin06t:422_5: sā pāricariyā sagge mama vāso”ti vacanato sāmacchavikā itthīnaṃ pasatthā. “Yāvassā
tika-vin06t:422_6: naṃ andhakāra”ntipi pāṭho. Kilesakāmehi vatthukāmesu yo na limpati.
tika-vin06t:423_0: 69. Itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhūtanti itthisaṇṭhānaṃ pātubhūtaṃ, tañca kho purisindriyassa
tika-vin06t:423_1: antaradhānena itthindriyassa pātubhāvena. Evaṃ purisindriyapātubhāvepi. Etena yathā
tika-vin06t:423_2: brahmānaṃ purisindriyaṃ nuppajjati, kevalaṃ purisasaṇṭhānameva uppajjati, yathā ca
tika-vin06t:423_3: kassaci paṇḍakassa vināpi purisindriyena purisasaṇṭhānaṃ uppajjati, na tathā tesanti
tika-vin06t:423_4: dassitaṃ hoti, taṃ pana itthindriyaṃ, purisindriyaṃ vā antaradhāyantaṃ marantānaṃ
tika-vin06t:423_5: viya paṭilomakkamena sattarasamacittakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya antaradhāyati. Paccuppanne
tika-vin06t:423_6: indriye niruddhe itaraṃ visabhāgindriyaṃ pātubhavati. Yasmā mahāniddaṃ okkantasseva
tika-vin06t:423_7: kirassa visabhāgindriyaṃ pātubhavati, tasmā “rattibhāge niddaṃ okkantassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:423_8: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, taṃyeva upajjhaṃ tameva upasampada”nti vacanato pavattinīyeva
tika-vin06t:423_9: upajjhāyā, upasampadācariyā bhikkhunīyeva ācariyāti katvā tāsaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:423_10: ācariyavattañca iminā bhikkhunāsadāsāyaṃ pātaṃ bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:423_11: tāhi ca imassa vihāraṃ āgamma saddhivihārikavattādi kātabbaṃ nu khoti ce? “Anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:423_12: bhikkhave, bhikkhunīhi saṅgamitu”nti vacanena vinābhāvadīpanato kevalaṃ na puna upajjhā
tika-vin06t:423_13: gahetabbā, na ca upasampadā kātabbāti dassanatthameva “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, taṃyeva
tika-vin06t:423_14: upajjha”ntiādi vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tattha bhikkhunīhi saṅgamitunti bhikkhūhi vinā
tika-vin06t:423_15: hutvā bhikkhunīhi eva saddhiṃ samaṅgī bhavituṃ anujānāmīti attho, tasmā iminā pāḷilesena
tika-vin06t:423_16: “tassā eva gāmantarādīhi anāpattī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ siddhaṃ hoti, āgantvā saṅgamituṃ
tika-vin06t:423_17: sakkā, yañca bhagavatā gamanaṃ anuññātaṃ, taṃ nissāya kuto gāmantarādipaccayā āpatti.
tika-vin06t:423_18: Na hi bhagavā āpattiyaṃ niyojetīti yuttameva taṃ, aññathā “yā āpattiyo bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin06t:423_19: bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇā, tāhi āpattīhi anāpattī”ti pāḷivacanato na gāmantarādīhi anāpattīti
tika-vin06t:423_20: āpajjati. Sādhāraṇatā āpattiyeva “yā āpattiyo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇā,
tika-vin06t:423_22: tāhi āpattīhi anāpattī”ti na vuttattāti ce? Na vuttaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgato. Bhikkhunīhi
tika-vin06t:423_23: saddhiṃ saṅkantāyapi tassā tā pahāya aññāhi saṅgamantiyā gāmantarādīhi anāpatti eva
tika-vin06t:423_24: sabbakālanti imassa aniṭṭhappasaṅgato tathā na vuttanti attho. Tattha gāmantarāpattādivatthuṃ
tika-vin06t:423_25: sañcicca tasmiṃ kāle ajjhācarantīpi sā liṅgapātubhāvena kāraṇena anāpajjanato anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:423_26: Anāpajjanaṭṭheneva vuṭṭhāti nāmāti veditabbā. Tathā yogī anuppanne eva kilese nirodheti.
tika-vin06t:423_27: Abandhanopi patto “ūnapañcabandhano”ti vuccati, sabbaso vā pana na sāveti appaccakkhātā
tika-vin06t:423_28: hoti sikkhā, evamidha anāpannāpi āpatti vuṭṭhitā nāma hotīti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:424_0: Yasmā pana sā purisena sahaseyyāpattiṃ anāpajjantīpi sakkoti bhikkhunīhi saṅgamituṃ,
tika-vin06t:424_1: tasmā anāpattīti katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ubhinnampi sahaseyyāpatti hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-vin06t:424_2: parivāre “aparehipi catūhākārehi āpattiṃ āpajjati saṅghamajjhe gaṇamajjhe puggalassa
tika-vin06t:424_3: santike liṅgapātubhāvenā”ti. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ parivāre “atthāpatti āpajjanto vuṭṭhāti
tika-vin06t:424_4: vuṭṭhahanto āpajjatī”ti, tassa sahaseyyādiṃ āpajjati asādhāraṇāpattīhi vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin06t:424_5: tadubhayampi sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Dūre vihāro hoti pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchimaṃ,
tika-vin06t:424_6: vihārato paṭṭhāya gāmaṃ pavisantiyā gāmantaraṃ hotīti attho. Saṃvidahanaṃ parimocetvāti
tika-vin06t:424_7: addhānagamanasaṃvidahanaṃ akatvāti attho. Tā kopetvāti pariccajitvāti attho. “Paripuṇṇavassasāmaṇerenāpī”ti
tika-vin06t:424_8: vacanato aparipuṇṇavassassa upajjhāyaggahaṇaṃ natthīti viya dissati. Vinayakammaṃ
tika-vin06t:424_9: katvā ṭhapitoti vikappetvā ṭhapito. Avikappitānaṃ dasāhātikkame nissaggiyatā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:424_10: Puna paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatīti pana “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ sannidhiṃ
tika-vin06t:424_11: bhikkhunīhi paṭiggāhāpetvā paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato vuttaṃ. Anapekkhavissajjanenāti
tika-vin06t:424_12: vatthuṃ anapekkhavissajjanena vā paṭiggahaṇena vā puna paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjissāmīti.
tika-vin06t:424_13: Pakkhamānattakāle punadeva liṅgaṃ parivattati chārattaṃ mānattameva dātabbanti sace,
tika-vin06t:424_14: bhikkhukāle appaṭicchannāya āpattiyā, no paṭicchannāyāti no laddhīti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:425_0: Parivāsadānaṃ pana natthīti bhikkhuniyā chādanāsambhavato vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin06t:425_1: bhikkhunī asādhāraṇaṃ pārājikāpattiṃ āpajjitvā purisaliṅgaṃ paṭilabhati, bhikkhūsu
tika-vin06t:425_2: upasampadaṃ na labhati, pabbajjaṃ labhati, anupabbajitvā bhikkhubhāve ṭhito sahaseyyāpattiṃ
tika-vin06t:425_3: na janeti. Vibbhantāya bhikkhuniyā purisaliṅge pātubhūte bhikkhūsu upasampadaṃ na
tika-vin06t:425_4: labhati, pārājikaṃ. Avibbhantamānassa gahaṭṭhasseva sato bhikkhunīdūsakassa sace
tika-vin06t:425_5: itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhavati, neva bhikkhunīsu upasampadaṃ labhati, na puna liṅgaparivatte
tika-vin06t:425_6: jāte bhikkhūsu vāti. Bhikkhuniyā liṅgaparivatte sati bhikkhu hoti, so ce sikkhaṃ
tika-vin06t:425_7: paccakkhāya vibbhamitvā itthiliṅgaṃ paṭilabheyya, bhikkhunīsu upasampadaṃ paṭilabhati
tika-vin06t:425_8: ubhayattha pubbe pārājikabhāvaṃ appattattā. Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇadvādasavassā
tika-vin06t:425_9: purisaliṅgaṃ paṭilabheyya, upasampanno bhikkhu eva. Puna sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya āgato
tika-vin06t:425_10: na upasampādetabbo aparipuṇṇavīsativassattā. Puna liṅgaparivatte sati bhikkhunīsu
tika-vin06t:425_11: upasampadaṃ labhati. Evaṃ ce katadvādasasaṅgahassa dārakassa liṅgaparivatte sati
tika-vin06t:425_12: gihigatā itthī hoti, paripuṇṇadvādasavassā upasampādetabbā kira. Bhikkhuniyā itthiliṅgantaradhānena,
tika-vin06t:425_13: bhikkhussa vā purisaliṅgantaradhānena pakkhapaṇḍakabhāvo bhaveyya, na sā bhikkhunī
tika-vin06t:425_14: bhikkhunīhi nāsetabbā bhikkhu vā bhikkhūhi puna pakatibhāvāpattisambhavā. Pakatipaṇḍakaṃ
tika-vin06t:425_15: pana sandhāya “paṇḍako nāsetabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Pakkhapaṇḍako hi saṃvāsanāsanāya nāsetabbo,
tika-vin06t:425_16: itaro ubhayanāsanāyāti attho. Yadi tesaṃ puna pakatibhāvo bhaveyya, “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:425_17: taṃyeva upajjhaṃ tameva upasampadaṃ tāniyeva vassāni bhikkhunīhi saṅgamitu”nti ayaṃ
tika-vin06t:425_18: vidhi sambhavati. Sace nesaṃ liṅgantaraṃ pātubhaveyya, so ca vidhi, yā āpattiyo bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin06t:425_19: bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇā, tā āpattiyo bhikkhunīnaṃ santike vuṭṭhātuṃ asādhāraṇāhi anāpattīti
tika-vin06t:425_20: ayampi vidhi sambhavati. Yaṃ vuttaṃ parivāre “saha paṭilābhena purimaṃ jahati, pacchime
tika-vin06t:425_21: patiṭṭhāti, viññattiyo paṭippassambhanti, paññattiyo nirujjhanti, saha paṭilābhena
tika-vin06t:425_22: pacchimaṃ jahati, purime patiṭṭhāti, viññattiyo”tiādi, taṃ yathāvuttavidhiṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:425_23: vuttanti amhākaṃ khantīti ācariyo. Itthiliṅgaṃ, purisaliṅgaṃ vā antaradhāyantaṃ kiṃ
tika-vin06t:425_24: sakalampi sarīraṃ gahetvā antaradhāyati, udāhu sayameva. Kiñcettha – yadi tāva sakalaṃ
tika-vin06t:425_25: sarīraṃ gahetvā antaradhāyati, ayaṃ puggalo cuto bhaveyya. Tasmā sāmaññā cuto bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:425_26: puna upasampajjanto opapātiko bhaveyya. Atha sayameva antaradhāyati, sopi bhāvo tassa
tika-vin06t:425_27: virujjhati. Itthindriyādīni hi sakalampi sarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitānīti khaṇanirodho
tika-vin06t:425_28: viya tesaṃ antaradhānaṃ veditabbaṃ, tasmā yathāvuttadosappasaṅgābhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:425_29: Aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhappabhānaṃ dīpānaṃ ekappabhānirodhepi itarissā ṭhānaṃ viya sesasarīraṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:426_0: 71-2. Muccatu vā mā vā dukkaṭamevāti mocanarāgābhāvato. Avisayoti asādiyanaṃ nāma
tika-vin06t:426_1: evarūpe ṭhāne dukkaranti attho. Methunadhammo nāma ubhinnaṃ vāyāmena nipajjati “tassa
tika-vin06t:426_2: dvayaṃdvayasamāpattī”ti vuttattā, tasmā tvaṃ mā vāyāma, evaṃ te anāpatti bhavissati,
tika-vin06t:426_3: kiriyañhetaṃ sikkhāpadanti vuttaṃ hoti, “āpattiṃ tvaṃ bhikkhu āpanno pārājika”nti
tika-vin06t:426_4: vacanato akiriyampetaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ yebhuyyena “kiriya”nti vuccatīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:427_0: 73-4. “Pārājikabhayena ākāsagatameva katvā pavesanādīni karontassa sahasā tālukaṃ
tika-vin06t:427_1: vā passaṃ vā aṅgajātaṃ chupati ce, dukkaṭamevā”ti vadanti. Kasmā? Na methunarāgattāti,
tika-vin06t:427_2: vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Dantānaṃ bāhirabhāvo oṭṭhānaṃ bāhirabhāvo viya thullaccayavatthu hotīti
tika-vin06t:427_3: vuttaṃ “bahi nikkhantadante jivhāya ca thullaccaya”nti. Taṃ puggalaṃ visaññiṃ katvāti
tika-vin06t:427_4: vacanena so puggalo khittacitto nāma hotīti dassitaṃ hoti. Yo pana puggalo na visaññīkato,
tika-vin06t:427_5: so ce attano aṅgajātassa dhātughaṭṭanacariṇijjhiṇikādisaññāya sādiyati, methunasaññāya
tika-vin06t:427_6: abhāvato visaññīpakkhameva bhajatīti tassa anāpatticchāyā dissati. “Methunametaṃ
tika-vin06t:427_7: maññe kassaci amanussassā”ti ñatvā sādiyantassa āpatti eva. Paṇḍakassa methunadhammanti
tika-vin06t:427_8: paṇḍakassa vaccamagge vā mukhe vā, bhummatthe vā sāmivacanaṃ. Avedayantassapi sevanacittavasena
tika-vin06t:428_0: Upahatindriyavatthusmiṃ “etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ, so ārocesī”ti duvidho pāṭho atthi.
tika-vin06t:428_1: Tattha “ārocesu”nti vuttapāṭho “vediyi vā so bhikkhave”ti vuttattā sundaraṃ, aññathā
tika-vin06t:428_2: “āpattiṃ tvaṃ bhikkhū”ti vattabbaṃ siyā. “Vediyā vā”ti dīpavāsino paṭhanti kira,
tika-vin06t:428_3: methunadhammassa pubbapayogā hatthaggāhādayo, tasmā “dukkaṭamevassa hotī”ti iminā
tika-vin06t:428_4: purimapadena sambandho. Yasmā pana dukkaṭamevassa hoti, tasmā yāva sīsaṃ na pāpuṇāti
tika-vin06t:428_5: puggalo, tāva dukkaṭe tiṭṭhatīti sambandho veditabbo. Sīsaṃ nāma maggapaṭipādanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:428_6: “Sīsaṃ na pāpuṇātīti pārājikaṃ na hoti tāva pubbapayogadukkaṭe tiṭṭhatī”ti aññatarasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:428_7: gaṇṭhipade likhitaṃ. Uccāliṅgapāṇakadaṭṭhenāti ettha bhāvaniṭṭhāpaccayo veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:428_8: Daṭṭhena daṃsena khādanenāti hi atthato ekaṃ.
tika-vin06t:429_0: 76-7. Saṅgāmasīse yuddhamukhe yodhapuriso viyāyaṃ bhikkhūti “saṅgāmasīsayodho bhikkhū”ti
tika-vin06t:429_1: vuccati. Rukkhasūcidvāraṃ upilavāya, ekena vā bahūhi vā kaṇṭakehi thakitabbaṃ kaṇṭakadvāraṃ.
tika-vin06t:429_2: Dussadvāraṃ sāṇidvārañca dussasāṇidvāraṃ. “Kilañjasāṇī”tiādinā vuttaṃ sabbampi dussasāṇiyameva
tika-vin06t:429_3: saṅgahetvā vuttaṃ. Ekasadisattā “eka”nti vuttaṃ. Ākāsataleti hammiyataleti attho.
tika-vin06t:429_4: Ayañhettha saṅkhepoti idāni vattabbaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Kiñci karontā nisinnā hontīti
tika-vin06t:429_5: vuttattā nipannānaṃ āpucchanaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. “Yathāparicchedameva ca na
tika-vin06t:429_6: uṭṭhāti, tassa āpattiyevā”ti kiñcāpi avisesena vuttaṃ, anādariyadukkaṭāpatti eva
tika-vin06t:429_7: tattha adhippetā. Kathaṃ paññāyatīti? “Rattiṃ dvāraṃ vivaritvā nipanno aruṇe uggate
tika-vin06t:429_8: uṭṭhahati, anāpattī”ti vuttattā, mahāpaccariyaṃ visesetvā “anādariyadukkaṭāpi na
tika-vin06t:429_9: muccatī”ti vuttattā ca, tena itarasmā dukkaṭā muccatīti adhippāyo. Yathāparicchedameva
tika-vin06t:429_10: ca na uṭṭhāti, tassa āpattiyevāti ettha na anādariyadukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yathāparicchedamevāti
tika-vin06t:429_11: avadhāraṇattā paricchedato abbhantare na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Puna “supatī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne
tika-vin06t:429_12: viya sanniṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Evaṃ nipajjantoti nipajjanakāle āpajjitabbadukkaṭameva
tika-vin06t:429_13: sandhāya vuttaṃ, tasmā yathāparicchedena uṭṭhahantassa dve dukkaṭānīti vuttaṃ hotīti.
tika-vin06t:429_14: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyampi “yadi rattiṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvā nipanno ‘divā vuṭṭhahissāmī’ti,
tika-vin06t:429_15: anādariye āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttaṃ, etthāpi “nipanno”ti vuttattā “aruṇe uṭṭhite
tika-vin06t:429_16: uṭṭhāhī”ti na vuttattā ca jānitabbaṃ. “Mahāpaccariyaṃ anādariyadukkaṭameva sandhāya
tika-vin06t:429_17: vuttaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttadukkaṭa”nti eke vadanti. Tassa anāpattīti atthato anipannattā
tika-vin06t:429_18: vuttaṃ. “Sace pana rattiṃ saṃvaritvā nipanno, aruṇuṭṭhānasamaye koci vivarati, dvārajagganādīni
tika-vin06t:429_19: akatvā nipannassa āpattiyeva. Kasmā? Āpattikhettattā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:430_0: Yasmā yakkhagahitakopi visaññībhūto viya khittacitto nāma hoti, assa pārājikāpattito
tika-vin06t:430_1: anāpatti, pageva aññato, tasmā “yakkhagahitako viya visaññībhūtopi na muccatī”ti
tika-vin06t:430_2: yaṃ mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ pubbe sañcicca divā nipanno pacchā yakkhagahitakopi
tika-vin06t:430_3: visaññībhūtopi na muccati nipajjanapayogakkhaṇe eva āpannattāti adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:430_4: Bandhitvā nipajjāpitova muccatīti na yakkhagahitakādīsveva, sopi yāva sayameva sayanādhippāyo
tika-vin06t:430_5: na hoti, tāva muccati. Yadā kilanto hutvā niddāyitukāmatāya sayanādhippāyo hoti,
tika-vin06t:430_6: tadā saṃvarāpetvā, jaggāpetvā vā ābhogaṃ vā katvā niddāyitabbaṃ, aññathā āpatti.
tika-vin06t:430_7: Sabhāgo ce natthi, na passati vā, na gantuṃ vā sakkoti. Cirampi adhivāsetvā pacchā
tika-vin06t:430_8: vedanāṭṭo hutvā anābhogeneva sayati, tassa “anāpatti vedanāṭṭassā”ti vacanena anāpatti,
tika-vin06t:430_9: tassāpi avisayattā āpatti na dissatīti visaññībhāveneva supantassa “anāpatti khittacittassā”ti
tika-vin06t:430_10: vacanena na dissati. Ācariyā pana evaṃ na kathayantīti avisesena “na dissatī”ti na
tika-vin06t:430_11: kathayanti, yadi saññaṃ appaṭilabhitvā sayati, avasavattattā āpatti na dissati, sace
tika-vin06t:430_12: saññaṃ paṭilabhitvāpi kilantakāyattā sayanaṃ sādiyanto supati, tassa yasmā avasavattattaṃ
tika-vin06t:430_13: na dissati, tasmā āpatti evāti kathayantīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:431_0: Mahāpadumattheravāde yakkhagahitako khittacittako muccati. Bandhitvā nipajjāpito
tika-vin06t:431_1: asayanādhippāyattā, vedanāṭṭattā ca muccatīti adhippāyo. Evaṃ sante pāḷiaṭṭhakathā,
tika-vin06t:431_2: theravādo ca sameti, tasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ vinicchayānaṃ ayameva adhippāyoti no khantīti
tika-vin06t:431_3: ācariyo, anugaṇṭhipade pana yakkhagahitakopi visaññībhūtopi na muccati nāma, pārājikaṃ
tika-vin06t:431_4: āpajjituṃ bhabbo so antarantarā saññāpaṭilābhatoti adhippāyo. “Bandhitvā nipajjāpito
tika-vin06t:431_5: vā”ti kurundīvacanena ekabhaṅgena nipannopi na muccatīti ce? Muccatiyeva. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:431_6: Atthato anipannattā. Kurundīvādena mahāaṭṭhakathāvādo sameti. Kasmā? Avasavattasāmaññato.
tika-vin06t:431_7: Kiñcāpi sameti, ācariyā pana evaṃ na kathayanti. Na kevalaṃ teyeva, mahāpadumattheropīti
tika-vin06t:431_9: abhabbo yakkhagahitako nāmā”ti ca vuttaṃ, tattha ācariyā pana evaṃ vadanti “sace
tika-vin06t:431_10: okkantaniddo ajānantopi pāde mañcakaṃ āropeti, āpattiyevāti vuttattā yo pana patitvā
tika-vin06t:431_11: tattheva sayati na vuṭṭhāti, tassa āpatti antarantarā jānantassāpi ajānantassāpi
tika-vin06t:431_12: hotī”ti. Sabbaṭṭhakathāsu vuttavacanāni sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ “idha ko muccati ko
tika-vin06t:431_13: na muccatī”ti vuttaṃ. Yakkhagahitako vā visaññībhūto vā na kevalaṃ pārājikaṃ āpajjituṃ
tika-vin06t:431_14: bhabbo eva, sabbopi āpajjati. Evaṃ “bandhitvā nipajjāpitova muccatī”ti vacanena tassapi
tika-vin06t:431_15: avasavattattā “āpatti na dissatī”ti evaṃ na kathayanti. Yasmā ummattakakhittacittavedanāṭṭesu
tika-vin06t:431_16: aññataro na hoti, tasmā “āpattiyevā”ti kathayanti. Idaṃ kira sabbaṃ na saṅgītiṃ āruḷhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:431_17: “Pavesanaṃ sādiyatītiādinā vuttattā akiriyāpi hotīti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:431_18: yadā pana sādiyati, tadā sukhumāpi viññatti hoti evāti idha kiriyā evā”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:435_0: 84. Dutiye rājūhi eva pariggahitattā “rājagaha”nti laddhanāmake samīpatthena, adhikaraṇatthena
tika-vin06t:435_1: ca paṭiladdhabhummavibhattike gijjhakūṭe pabbate catūhi vihārehi viharantoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:435_2: Tassa “vassaṃ upagacchiṃsū”ti iminā sambandho veditabbo. Tayo eva hi ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin06t:435_3: gaṇakammaṃ karonti, na tato ūnā adhikā vā akiriyattā. Tattha vinayapariyāyena saṅghagaṇapuggalakammakosallatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:435_4: idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ – atthi saṅghakammaṃ saṅgho eva karoti, na gaṇo na puggalo,
tika-vin06t:435_5: taṃ apalokanakammassa kammalakkhaṇekadesaṃ ṭhapetvā itaraṃ catubbidhampi kammaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:435_6: Atthi saṅghakammaṃ saṅgho ca karoti, gaṇo ca karoti, puggalo ca karoti. Kiñcāti?
tika-vin06t:435_7: Yaṃ pubbe ṭhapitaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ parivāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yasmiṃ vihāre dve tayo janā
tika-vin06t:435_8: vasanti, tehi nisīditvā katampi saṅghena katasadisameva. Yasmiṃ pana vihāre eko bhikkhu
tika-vin06t:435_9: hoti, tena bhikkhunā uposathadivase pubbakaraṇapubbakiccaṃ katvā nisinnena katampi
tika-vin06t:435_10: katikavattaṃ saṅghena katasadisameva hotī”ti. Punapi vuttaṃ “ekabhikkhuke pana vihāre
tika-vin06t:435_11: ekena sāvitepi purimakatikā paṭippassambhati evā”ti. Atthi gaṇakammaṃ saṅgho karoti,
tika-vin06t:435_12: gaṇo karoti, puggalo karoti, taṃ tayo pārisuddhiuposathā aññesaṃ santike karīyanti,
tika-vin06t:435_13: tassa vasena veditabbaṃ. Atthi gaṇakammaṃ gaṇova karoti, na saṅgho na puggalo, taṃ
tika-vin06t:435_14: pārisuddhiuposatho aññamaññaṃ ārocanavasena karīyati, tassa vasena veditabbaṃ. Atthi
tika-vin06t:435_15: puggalakammaṃ puggalova karoti, na saṅgho na gaṇo, taṃ adhiṭṭhānuposathavasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:435_16: Atthi gaṇakammaṃ ekaccova gaṇo karoti, ekacco na karoti, tattha añattikaṃ dve eva
tika-vin06t:435_17: karonti, na tayo. Sañattikaṃ tayova karonti, na tato ūnā adhikā vā, tena vuttaṃ “tayo
tika-vin06t:435_18: eva hi ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā gaṇakammaṃ karonti, na tato ūnā adhikā vā akiriyattā”ti. Tasmā
tika-vin06t:435_19: tayova vinayapariyāyena sampahulā, na tato uddhanti veditabbaṃ. Anugaṇṭhipade pana
tika-vin06t:435_20: “kiñcāpi kammalakkhaṇaṃ tayova karonti, atha kho tehi kataṃ saṅghena katasadisanti
tika-vin06t:435_21: vuttattā ekena pariyāyena tayo janā vinayapariyāyenapi saṅgho”ti vuttaṃ, idaṃ sabbampi
tika-vin06t:435_22: vinayakammaṃ upādāya vuttaṃ, lābhaṃ pana upādāya antamaso ekopi anupasampannopi “saṅgho”ti
tika-vin06t:435_25: pavāritā”ti vuttaṃ. Aññathā antarāyena apavāritā “vutthavassā”ti na vuccantīti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:435_26: Thambhādi kaṭṭhakammanti veditabbaṃ. Keci tanukaṃ dārutthambhaṃ antokatvā mattikāmayaṃ
tika-vin06t:435_27: thambhaṃ karonti, ayaṃ pana tathā na akāsi, tena vuttaṃ “sabbamattikāmayaṃ kuṭikaṃ
tika-vin06t:436_0: 85. “Mā pacchimā janatā pāṇesu pātabyataṃ āpajjī”ti iminā anuddesasikkhāpadena yattha
tika-vin06t:436_1: iṭṭhakapacana pattapacana kuṭikaraṇa vihārakārāpana navakammakaraṇa khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇa
tika-vin06t:436_2: vihārasammajjana paṭaggidāna kūpapokkharaṇīkhaṇāpanādīsu pātabyataṃ jānantena bhikkhunā
tika-vin06t:436_3: kappiyavacanampi na vattabbanti dasseti, teneva pariyāyaṃ avatvā tesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ
tika-vin06t:436_5: etassa nāmameva. “Gacchathetaṃ, bhikkhave, kuṭikaṃ bhindathā”ti iminā kataṃ labhitvā
tika-vin06t:436_6: tattha vasantānampi dukkaṭamevāti ca siddhaṃ. Aññathā hi bhagavā na bhindāpeyya.
tika-vin06t:436_7: Esa nayo bhedanakaṃ chedanakaṃ uddālanakanti etthāpi, āpattibhedāva. Tato eva hi
tika-vin06t:436_8: bhedanakasikkhāpadādīsu viya “aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin06t:436_9: na vuttaṃ, tathā aññassatthāya karoti, cetiyādīnaṃ atthāya karoti, dukkaṭamevāti
tika-vin06t:436_10: ca siddhaṃ, aññathā kuṭikārasikkhāpadādīsu viya “aññassatthāya vāsāgāraṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin06t:436_11: sabbattha, anāpattī”ti nayameva vadeyya, na bhindāpeyya. Sabbamattikāmayabhāvaṃ pana
tika-vin06t:436_12: mocetvā kaṭṭhapāsāṇādimissaṃ katvā paribhuñjati, anāpatti. Tathā hi chedanakasikkhāpadādīsu
tika-vin06t:436_13: bhagavatā nayo dinno “aññena kataṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ paṭilabhitvā chinditvā paribhuñjatī”tiādīsu.
tika-vin06t:436_14: Keci pana “vayakammampīti etena mūlaṃ datvā kārāpitampi atthi, tena taṃ aññena katampi
tika-vin06t:436_15: na vaṭṭatīti siddha”nti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Kasmā? Sambhāre kiṇitvā sayameva
tika-vin06t:436_16: karontassāpi vayakammasambhavato. Kiṃ vā pāḷilese sati aṭṭhakathālesanayo. Iṭṭhakāhi
tika-vin06t:436_17: giñjakāvasathasaṅkhepena katā vaṭṭatīti ettha pakatiiṭṭhakāhi cinitvā kattabbāvasatho
tika-vin06t:436_18: giñjakāvasatho nāma. Sā hi “mattikāmayā”ti na vuccati, “iṭṭhakakuṭikā”tveva vuccati,
tika-vin06t:436_20: vuccatīti no khantīti ācariyo, bhasmādayo hi mattikāya daḷhibhāvatthameva ādīyanti,
tika-vin06t:436_21: apakkiṭṭhakamayāpi giñjakāvasathasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati, na ca āyasmā dhaniyo ekappahāreneva
tika-vin06t:436_22: kumbhakāro viya kumbhaṃ taṃ kuṭikaṃ niṭṭhāpesi, anukkamena pana sukkhāpetvā sukkhāpetvā
tika-vin06t:436_23: mattikāpiṇḍehi cinitvā niṭṭhāpesi, apakkiṭṭhakamayā kuṭi viya sabbamattikāmayā kuṭi
tika-vin06t:436_24: ekābaddhā hoti, na tathā pakkiṭṭhakamayā, tasmā sā kappatīti eke. Sabbamattikāmayāya
tika-vin06t:436_25: kuṭiyā bahi ce tiṇakuṭikādiṃ katvā anto vasati, dukkaṭameva. Sace tattha tattha chiddaṃ
tika-vin06t:436_26: katvā bandhitvā ekābaddhaṃ karoti, vaṭṭati. Anto ce tiṇakuṭikādiṃ katvā anto vasati,
tika-vin06t:436_27: vaṭṭati. Kārako eva ce vasati, karaṇapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, na vasanapaccayā.
tika-vin06t:436_28: Sace anto vā bahi vā ubhayattha vā sudhāya limpati, vaṭṭati. Yasmā sabbamattikāmayā
tika-vin06t:436_29: kuṭi sukarā bhindituṃ, tasmā tattha ṭhapitaṃ pattacīvarādi aguttaṃ hoti, corādīhi
tika-vin06t:438_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvace patte dhārenti, uccāvacāni pattamaṇḍalāni
tika-vin06t:438_1: dhārentī”ti evamādīni vatthūni nissāya “na, bhikkhave, uccāvacā pattā dhāretabbā,
tika-vin06t:438_2: yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādinā nayena akappiyaparikkhāresu ca dukkaṭaṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin06t:438_3: Kasmā? Tadanulomattā. Yatthāpi na paññattaṃ, tattha “na, bhikkhave, uccāvacāni chattāni
tika-vin06t:438_4: dhāretabbāni, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādinā nayena dukkaṭaṃ sambhavati,
tika-vin06t:438_5: tasmā “tatrāyaṃ pāḷimuttako”ti ārabhitvā sabbaparikkhāresu vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ, savikāraṃ
tika-vin06t:438_6: vā karontassa āpatti dukkaṭanti dīpentena “na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Etthāha
tika-vin06t:438_7: – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ṭhapetvā paharaṇiṃ sabbaṃ lohabhaṇḍaṃ, ṭhapetvā āsandiṃ
tika-vin06t:438_8: pallaṅkaṃ dārupattaṃ dārupādukaṃ sabbaṃ dārubhaṇḍaṃ, ṭhapetvā katakañca kumbhakārikañca
tika-vin06t:438_9: sabbaṃ mattikābhaṇḍa”nti vuttattā yathāṭhapitaṃ vajjetvā itaraṃ sabbaṃ vaṇṇamaṭṭhampi
tika-vin06t:438_10: savikārampi avisesena vaṭṭatīti? Vuccate – taṃ na yuttaṃ yathādassitapāḷivirodhato,
tika-vin06t:438_11: tasmā “ṭhapetvā paharaṇi”nti evaṃ jātivasena ayaṃ pāḷi pavattā, yathādassitā pāḷi
