tika-vin06t:438_12: vaṇṇamaṭṭhādivikārapaṭisedhanavasena pavattāti evaṃ ubhayampi na virujjhati, tasmā
tika-vin06t:438_13: yathāvuttameva. Āraggena nikhādanaggena, “āraggeriva sāsapo”ti ettha vuttanayato āraggena.
tika-vin06t:439_0: Paṭṭamukhe vāti paṭṭakoṭiyaṃ. Pariyanteti cīvarapariyante. Veṇiuhumuniyupeññāma.
tika-vin06t:439_1: Agghiyanti cetiyaṃ. Gayamuggaranti tulādaṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ, gayā sīse sūcikā hoti, mukhapattā
tika-vin06t:439_2: ladrā. Ukkiranti nīharanti karonti ṭhapenti. Koṇasuttapiḷakā nāma gaṇṭhikapaṭṭādikoṇesu
tika-vin06t:439_3: suttamayapiḷakā. Yaṃ ettha cīvaraṃ vā patto vā “na vaṭṭatī”ti vutto, tattha adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:439_4: ruhati, vikappanāpi ruhatīti veditabbaṃ. Deḍḍubhoti udakasappo. Acchīti kuñjarakkhi.
tika-vin06t:439_5: Gomuttakanti gomuttasaṇṭhānā rājiyo. Kuñcikāya senāsanaparikkhārattā suvaṇṇarūpiyamayāpi
tika-vin06t:439_6: vaṭṭatīti chāyā dissati, “kuñcikāya vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vacanato aññe
tika-vin06t:439_7: kappiyalohādimayāva kuñcikā kappanti pariharaṇīyaparikkhārattā. Ārakaṇṭako potthakādikaraṇasatthakajāti.
tika-vin06t:439_9: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi tāni kuñcikā viya pariharaṇīyāni, atha kho “uccāvacāni
tika-vin06t:439_10: na dhāretabbānī”ti paṭikkhepābhāvato vuttaṃ. Kevalañhi tāni “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:439_11: vidhūpanañca tālavaṇṭañcā”tiādinā vuttāni. Gaṇṭhipade pana “telabhājanesu vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ
tika-vin06t:439_12: vaṭṭatīti senāsanaparikkhārattā”ti vuttaṃ. Rājavallabhāti rājakulūpakā. Sīmāti idhādhippetā
tika-vin06t:439_13: bhūmi, baddhasīmā ca. “Yesaṃ santakā tesaṃ sīmā, tattha parehi na kattabba”nti anugaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:439_14: vuttaṃ. “Bhūmi ca sīmā ca yesaṃ santakā, tehi eva vāretabbā. Yesaṃ pana aññesaṃ bhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:439_15: sīmā katā, te vāretuṃ na issarā”ti vadanti. “Saṅghabhedādīnaṃ kāraṇattā ‘mā karothā’ti
tika-vin06t:440_0: 86-7. Dārukuṭikaṃ kātuṃ, kattunti ca atthi. Khaṇḍākhaṇḍikanti phalāphalaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:440_1: Āṇāpehīti vacanaṃ aniṭṭhe eva vuccatīti katvā bandhaṃ āṇāpesi. Issariyamattāyāti
tika-vin06t:441_0: 88. “Evarūpaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitvā”ti ca pāṭho. Lomena tvaṃ mutto, mā punapi evarūpamakāsīti
tika-vin06t:441_1: idaṃ kiṃ byāpādadīpakaṃ, dārūsupi lobhakkhandhadīpakaṃ vacanaṃ sotāpannassa sato
tika-vin06t:441_2: tassa rājassa patirūpaṃ. Nanu nāma “pubbe kataṃ sukataṃ bhante, vadeyyātha punapi
tika-vin06t:441_3: yenattho”ti pavāretvā atīva pītipāmojjaṃ uppādetabbaṃ tena siyāti? Saccametaṃ sotāpannattā
tika-vin06t:441_4: atīva buddhamāmako dhammamāmako saṅghamāmako ca, tasmā bhikkhūnaṃ akappiyaṃ asahanto,
tika-vin06t:441_5: sikkhāpadapaññattiyā ca okāsaṃ kattukāmo “supayuttāni me dārūnī”ti tuṭṭhacittopi
tika-vin06t:441_6: evamāhāti veditabbaṃ. Imehi nāma evarūpe ṭhāne. “Āgatapadānurūpenāti aññehi vā padehi,
tika-vin06t:441_7: ito thokatarehi vā āgatakāle tadanurūpā yojanā kātabbā”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. “Na
tika-vin06t:441_8: kevalaṃ imasmiṃyeva sikkhāpade, aññesupi āgacchanti, tasmā tattha tattha āgatapadānurūpena
tika-vin06t:441_9: yojanā veditabbā”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Ujjhāyanattho adinnassādinnattāva, te ujjhāyiṃsu.
tika-vin06t:442_0: Rudradāmako nāma rudradāmakādīhi uppādito. Bārāṇasinagarādīsu tehi tehi rājūhi porāṇasatthānurūpaṃ
tika-vin06t:442_1: lakkhaṇasampannā uppāditā nīlakahāpaṇā. Tesaṃ kira tibhāgaṃ agghati rudradāmako,
tika-vin06t:442_2: tasmā tassa pādo thullaccayavatthu hoti. Māsako pana idha appamāṇaṃ. Kahāpaṇo kiñcikāle
tika-vin06t:442_3: ūnavīsatimāsako hoti, kiñci kāle atirekavīsatimāsako. Tasmā tassa kahāpaṇassa catutthabhāgo
tika-vin06t:442_4: pañcamāsako viya atirekapañcamāsako vā ūnapañcamāsako vā pādoti veditabbaṃ. Imassatthassa
tika-vin06t:442_5: dīpanatthaṃ “tadā rājagahe vīsatimāsako kahāpaṇo hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha rajatamayo
tika-vin06t:442_6: suvaṇṇamayo tambamayo ca kahāpaṇo hoti. Suvaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ viya pādopi yattha tambamayova
tika-vin06t:442_7: kato hoti, tattha sova pādoti ācariyo. Yasmā pādo ekanīlakahāpaṇagghanako, tasmā
tika-vin06t:442_8: tassa pādassa catutthabhāgova siyā pādoti eke. Idaṃ na yujjati. Yo ca tattha pādāraho
tika-vin06t:442_9: bhaṇḍo, tassa catutthabhāgasseva pārājikavatthubhāvappasaṅgato. Yadi pādārahaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin06t:442_10: pārājikavatthu, siddhaṃ “sova pādo pacchimaṃ pārājikavatthū”ti. Na hi sabbattha bhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin06t:442_11: gahetvā nīlakahāpaṇagghena agghāpenti. Yasmā tassa tasseva kahāpaṇagghena agghāpenti,
tika-vin06t:442_12: tasmā tassa tassa janapadassa pādova pādoti tadagghanakameva pādagghanakanti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:442_13: “so ca kho porāṇassa nīlakahāpaṇassa vasena, na itaresanti yattha pana nīlakahāpaṇā
tika-vin06t:442_14: vaḷañjaṃ gacchanti, tatthevā”ti keci vadanti, upaparikkhitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:444_0: 92. Gāmā vā araññā vāti lakkhaṇānupaññattikattā paṭhamapaññattiyā ādimhi vuttā. Yato
tika-vin06t:444_1: vā apakkantā, so amanusso nāma. “Amanussagāmaṃ apārupitvā, gāmappavesanañca anāpucchā
tika-vin06t:444_2: pavisituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. “Yato gāmato āgantukāmā eva apakkantā,
tika-vin06t:444_3: taṃ gāmaṃ evaṃ pavisituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti eke. Keci pana “yakkhapariggahabhūtopi
tika-vin06t:444_4: āpaṇādīsu dissamānesu eva ‘gāmo’ti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, adissamānesu pavesane anāpattī”ti
tika-vin06t:444_5: vadanti. “Gāmo eva upacāro gāmūpacāroti evaṃ kammadhārayavasena gahite kurundaṭṭhakathādīsu
tika-vin06t:444_6: vuttampi suvuttameva hotī”ti vadanti. “Tassa gharūpacāro gāmoti āpajjatī”ti vacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:444_7: paṭikkhipati. “Gāmassupacāro ca gāmo ca gāmūpacāro cā”ti vadanti, taṃ virujjhati,
tika-vin06t:444_8: na. “Imesaṃ lābhādīsu lakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘gharaṃ gharūpacāro’tiādi
tika-vin06t:444_9: vuttaṃ, taṃ na mayaṃ paṭikkhipāmā”ti ca vadanti. “Kataparikkhepo cāti gharassa samantato
tika-vin06t:444_10: tattako upacāro nāmā”ti gaṇṭhipade likhitaṃ. Anugaṇṭhipade pana “yo yo aṭṭhakathāvādo
tika-vin06t:444_11: vā theravādo vā pacchā vuccatīti ito anāgataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, nātītaṃ. Yadi atītampi
tika-vin06t:444_12: sandhāya vuttaṃ, mahāpadumatheravādova pamāṇaṃ jātanti āpajjati, tasmā anāgatameva
tika-vin06t:444_13: sandhāya vuttanti ācariyā kathayantī”ti vuttaṃ. Sesampīti gāmūpacāralakkhaṇampi.
tika-vin06t:445_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayoti tassa gāmūpacārassa gahaṇe ayaṃ nayo. Vikālegāmappavesanādīsūti ettha
tika-vin06t:445_1: “gāmappavesanañhi bahi eva āpucchitabba”nti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. “Taṃ aṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin06t:445_2: na sametī”ti vadanti. “Gāmasaṅkhātūpacāraṃ sandhāya vutta”nti gahite sametīti mama
tika-vin06t:445_3: takko. “Ādi-saddato ghare ṭhitānaṃ dinnalābhabhājanādīnī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. “Gāmūpacāre
tika-vin06t:445_4: ṭhitānaṃ pāpuṇitabbalābhaṃ sañcicca adentānaṃ pārājika”nti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:445_5: Kiñcāpi kurundiādīsu pāḷiyaṃ vuttavacanānulomavasena vuttattā “pamādalekhā”ti na
tika-vin06t:445_6: vattabbaṃ, mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttavinicchayo saṅgītito paṭṭhāya āgato. “Yañcetaṃ
tika-vin06t:445_8: Leḍḍupāteneva paricchinditabboti parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ, na upacāraṃ. So hi tato aparena
tika-vin06t:445_9: leḍḍupātena paracchinno. Imasmiṃ adinnādānasikkhāpadeti niyamena aññattha aññathāti
tika-vin06t:445_10: atthato vuttaṃ hoti. Tena vā niyamena yathārutavasenāpi attho idha yujjati. Abhidhamme
tika-vin06t:446_0: “Pariccāgādimhi akate ‘idaṃ mama santaka’nti aviditampi parapariggahitameva puttakānaṃ
tika-vin06t:446_1: pitu accayena santakaṃ viya, taṃ atthato apariccatte saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”ti gaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:446_2: vuttaṃ. “Thenassa kammaṃ theyyaṃ, thenena gahetabbabhūtaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ. Theyyanti saṅkhātanti
tika-vin06t:446_3: theyyasaṅkhāta”nti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Taṃ theyyaṃ yassa thenassa kammaṃ, so
tika-vin06t:446_4: yasmā theyyacitto avaharaṇacitto hoti, tasmā “theyyasaṅkhāta”nti padaṃ uddharitvā
tika-vin06t:446_5: “theyyacitto avaharaṇacitto”ti padabhājanampi tesaṃ porāṇānaṃ yujjateva, tathāpi
tika-vin06t:446_7: cittaṃ, yañca gamanādisādhakaṃ, parāmasanādisādhakaṃ vā majjhe pavattaṃ, yañca ṭhānācāvanapayogasādhakaṃ,
tika-vin06t:446_8: tesu ayameveko pacchimo cittakoṭṭhāso idha adhippeto ‘theno’ti apare”ti anugaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:446_9: vuttaṃ. Ūnamāsakamāsapādādīsu “avaharaṇacittesu ekacittakoṭṭhāsoti ācariyā vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:448_0: Pañcavīsati avahārā nāma vacanabhedeneva bhinnā, atthato pana abhinnā. Ākulā duviññeyyavinicchayāti
tika-vin06t:448_1: ācariyānaṃ mukhe santike sabbākārena aggahitavinicchayānaṃ duviññeyyā. Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi
tika-vin06t:448_2: viya ākulā duviññeyyavinicchayā, kevalaṃ taṃ ācariyā pubbāparavirodhamakatvā saṅgītito
tika-vin06t:448_3: paṭṭhāya āgatanayamavināsetvā vaṇṇayantīti “paṭṭhānapāḷimivāti apare vadantī”ti ca
tika-vin06t:448_4: vuttā. Porāṇāti saṅgītiācariyā. Ayamettha sāmīci eva, sace na deti, āpatti natthi,
tika-vin06t:448_5: pārājikabhayā pana yathā sikkhākāmo deti, evaṃ dātabbameva. Yāni panettha vatthūni,
tika-vin06t:448_6: tāni sīhaḷadīpe ācariyehi saṅghādīnamanumatiyā aṭṭhakathāsu pakkhittāni, “anāgate
tika-vin06t:448_7: brahmacārīnaṃ hitatthāya potthakāruḷhakālato pacchāpī”ti vuttaṃ. Āṇattikaṃ āṇattikkhaṇepi
tika-vin06t:448_8: gaṇhāti, kālantarenāpi atthasādhako, kālantaraṃ sandhāyāti idametesaṃ nānattaṃ. Bhaṭṭheti
tika-vin06t:448_9: apagate. Antarasamudde aturumuhude. Pharati sādheti. Navadhototi navakato. Pāsāṇasakkharanti
tika-vin06t:450_0: 94. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana saccepi alikepi dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ, taṃ pamādalikhitanti
tika-vin06t:450_1: veditabbanti yathetarahi yuttiyā gahetabbā. Tattha “catuvaggena ṭhapetvā upasampadapavāraṇaabbhānādisabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:450_3: likhantīti veditabbaṃ. Taṃ ācariyā “pamādalekhā”tveva vaṇṇayanti, tena vuttaṃ “pamādalikhita”nti.
tika-vin06t:450_4: Yaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ musā, tattha tattha pācittiyanti vuttaṃ. Dukkaṭassa vacane payojanābhāvā
tika-vin06t:450_5: “adinnādānassa pubbapayoge”ti vuttaṃ. Aññesampi pubbapayoge pācittiyaṭṭhāne pācittiyameva.
tika-vin06t:450_6: Pamādalikhitanti ettha idha adhippetameva gahetvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti gahite sameti
tika-vin06t:450_7: viya. Ācariyā pana “pācittiyaṭṭhāne pācittiya”nti vatvā dukkaṭe visuṃ vattabbe “saccālike”ti
tika-vin06t:450_8: sāmaññato vuttattā “pamādalekhā”ti vadantīti veditabbāti. “Kusalacittena gamane anāpattī”ti
tika-vin06t:451_0: Pācittiyaṭṭhāne dukkaṭā na muccatīti pācittiyena saddhiṃ dukkaṭamāpajjati. Bahukāpi
tika-vin06t:451_1: āpattiyo hontūti khaṇanabyūhanuddharaṇesu dasa dasa katvā āpattiyo āpanno, tesu uddharaṇe
tika-vin06t:451_2: dasa pācittiyo desetvā muccati, jātivasena “ekameva desetvā muccatī”ti kurundiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:451_3: vuttaṃ, tasmā purimena sameti. “Samodhānetvā dassitapayoge “dukkaṭa”nti vuttattā
tika-vin06t:451_4: samānapayogā bahudukkaṭattaṃ ñāpeti. Khaṇane bahukānīti samānapayogattā na paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin06t:451_5: Aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇenāti yathā panettha, evaṃ aññesupi evarūpāni aṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin06t:451_6: āgatavacanāni saṅgītito paṭṭhāya āgatattā gahetabbānīti attho. “Idha dutiyapārājike
tika-vin06t:451_7: gahetabbā, na aññesū”ti dhammasiritthero kirāha. Gaṇṭhipade pana “purimakhaṇanaṃ
tika-vin06t:451_8: pacchimaṃ patvā paṭippassambhati, teneva ekameva desetvā muccatī”ti vuttaṃ, “visabhāgakiriyaṃ
tika-vin06t:451_9: vā patvā purimaṃ paṭippassambhatī”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:452_0: Evaṃ ekaṭṭhāne ṭhitāya kumbhiyā ṭhānācāvanañcettha chahākārehi veditabbanti sambandho.
tika-vin06t:452_1: Kumbhiyāti bhummavacanaṃ. Uddhaṃ ukkhipanto kesaggamattampi bhūmito moceti, pārājikanti
tika-vin06t:452_2: ettha mukhavaṭṭiyā phuṭṭhokāsaṃ bundena mocite “ṭhānācāvanañcettha chahākārehi veditabba”nti
tika-vin06t:452_3: iminā sameti, tathā avatvā “bhūmito mutte kesaggamattampi atikkante bhūmito mocitaṃ
tika-vin06t:452_4: nāma hotī”ti daḷhaṃ katvā vadanti, upaparikkhitvā gahetabbaṃ. Ettha ekacce evaṃ atthaṃ
tika-vin06t:452_5: vadanti “pubbe khaṇantena avasesaṭṭhānāni viyojitāni, tasmiṃ vimutte pārājika”nti.
tika-vin06t:452_7: karoti, muṭṭhiṃ vā chindatī”ti vacanena dīpito.
tika-vin06t:453_0: Yaṃ pana “pītamatte pārājika”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ yathetarahi “pañcaviññāṇā uppannavatthukā
tika-vin06t:453_3: atītānāgatapaṭikkhepoti parivatteti, tathā tādisehi parivatta’nti veditabbaṃ. Na
tika-vin06t:453_4: hi aṭṭhakathācariyā pubbāparaviruddhaṃ vadanti. Yaṃ pana ācariyā “idaṃ pamādalikhita”nti
tika-vin06t:453_5: apanetvā paṭikkhipitvā vacanakāle vācenti, uddisanti, tameva ca imināpi ācariyena
tika-vin06t:453_6: “pamādalikhita”nti paṭikkhittaṃ. Yañca suttaṃ dassetvā te paṭikkhipanti, tameva ca
tika-vin06t:453_7: dassentena iminā paṭikkhittaṃ, tena vuttaṃ “taṃ pana tatthevā”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:454_0: Anāpattimattameva vuttanti neva avahāro na gīvā anāpattīti byañjanatova bhedo, na
tika-vin06t:454_1: atthatoti dassanatthaṃ. Taṃ pamādalikhitaṃ katarehīti ce? Pubbe vuttappakārehi, lekhakehi
tika-vin06t:454_2: vā, esa nayo sabbattha. “Na hi tadeva bahūsu ṭhānesu yuttato pārājikamahutvā katthaci
tika-vin06t:454_3: hotī”ti sabbaṃ anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Duṭṭhapitaṃ vā ṭhapetīti ettha tato paggharissatīti
tika-vin06t:454_4: ṭhānācāvanaṃ sandhāya katattā pārājikaṃ taṃ pana gaṇhatu vā mā vā tattheva “bhindatī”tiādivacanato
tika-vin06t:454_5: veditabbaṃ. “Tatthevāti ṭhānācāvanaṃ akarontova ṭhānā acāvetukāmova kevalaṃ ‘bhindatī’ti
tika-vin06t:454_6: aṭṭhakathāvacanato ca ñāpetabba”nti aññatarasmiṃ gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Tathā “paggharitehi
tika-vin06t:454_7: tintapaṃsuṃ gahetvā udake pakkhipitvā pacitvā gahetuṃ sakkā, tasmā gahaṇameva sandhāya
tika-vin06t:454_8: vutta”nti apare. “Rittakumbhiyā upari karoti, bhaṇḍadeyya”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ āṇattiyā
tika-vin06t:454_9: virujjhati, “yadā sakkosi, tadā taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti atthasādhako āṇattikāle eva
tika-vin06t:454_10: pārājikaṃ. Apica āvāṭakādīni thāvarapayogāni ca ettha sādhakāni. Natthi kālakatapayogāni
tika-vin06t:454_11: pārājikavatthūnīti tasmā upaparikkhitabbanti eke. Yattha yattha “apare”ti vā “eke”ti
tika-vin06t:454_12: vā vuccati, tattha tattha suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā yuttaṃ gahetabbaṃ, itaraṃ chaḍḍetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:454_13: Vadantīti ācariyā vadanti. Na, aññathā gahetabbatthatoti pāḷipariharaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:454_14: Evameke vadantīti taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Kasmā? “Passāvaṃ vā chaḍḍetī”ti ca “aparibhogaṃ
tika-vin06t:454_15: vā karotī”ti ca atthato ekattā, aṭṭhakathāya “muggarena pothetvā bhindatī”ti vuttattāpi.
tika-vin06t:455_0: Ayaṃ panettha sārotiādikathāya “amhākaṃ ācariyassa vacana”nti dhammasiritthero āha.
tika-vin06t:455_1: Saṅgahācariyānaṃ vādoti eke. Pubbe vuttāpi te eva, tasmā vohāravasenāti achaḍḍetukāmampi
tika-vin06t:455_2: tathā karontaṃ “chaḍḍetī”ti voharanti. Evametesaṃ padānaṃ attho gahetabboti evaṃ
tika-vin06t:455_3: sante “ṭhānācāvanassa natthitāya dukkaṭa”nti aṭṭhakathāvacanena ativiya sameti, tattha
tika-vin06t:455_4: ṭhānācāvanacittassa natthitāya ṭhānā cutampi na “ṭhānā cuta”nti vuccatīti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:455_5: Itarathāpīti theyyacittābhāvā ṭhānā cāvetukāmassapi dukkaṭaṃ yujjati.
tika-vin06t:456_0: 96. Sayameva patitamorasseva ito cito ca karoto thullaccayaṃ. Ākāsaṭṭhavinicchaye
tika-vin06t:456_1: tappasaṅgena tasmiṃ vehāsādigatepi asammohatthaṃ evaṃ gahetabbanti vuttaṃ. “Evamaññatrāpi
tika-vin06t:456_2: sāmise”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. “Ṭhānācāvanaṃ akaronto cāletī”ti vacanato ṭhānācāvane
tika-vin06t:456_3: thullaccayaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Keci aphandāpetvā ṭhānācāvanācāvanehipi dukkaṭathullaccaye
tika-vin06t:456_4: vadanti. “Te ṭhānācāvanaṃ akarontoti imaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā paṭisedhetabbā”ti
tika-vin06t:457_0: 97. Chedanamocanādi uparibhāgaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Avassaṃ ṭhānato ākāsagataṃ karoti.
tika-vin06t:457_1: Ettha “ekakoṭiṃ nīharitvā ṭhapite vaṃse ṭhitassa ākāsakaraṇaṃ sandhāyā”ti keci vadanti.
tika-vin06t:457_2: Te pana atha “mūlaṃ acchetvā valayaṃ ito cito ca sāreti, rakkhati. Sace pana mūlato
tika-vin06t:457_3: anīharitvāpi hatthena gahetvā ākāsagataṃ karoti, pārājika”nti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin06t:457_4: paṭisedhetabbā. Bhittinissitanti bhittiyā upatthambhitaṃ sandhāya vuttanti eke. Bhittiṃ
tika-vin06t:457_5: nissāya ṭhapitanti nāgadantādīsu ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Chinnamatteti upari uggantvā
tika-vin06t:458_0: 98. Upari ṭhitassa piṭṭhiyāti ettha adho osāraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Heṭṭhā osārentassa
tika-vin06t:458_1: uparimassa piṭṭhiyā heṭṭhimena ṭhitokāsaṃ atikkantamatte pārājikaṃ, uddhaṃ ukkhipantassa
tika-vin06t:458_2: udakato muttamatte. “Evaṃ gahite bhūmaṭṭhe vuttena sametī”ti vadanti. Matamacchānaṃ
tika-vin06t:458_3: ṭhitaṭṭhānameva ṭhānaṃ kira. Theyyacittena māretvā gaṇhato ūnapādagghanake dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin06t:458_4: sahapayogattā pācittiyaṃ natthīti eke. Madanaphalavasādīnīti ettha sīhaḷabhāsā kira
tika-vin06t:458_5: vasa iti visanti attho, garuḷākārena katuppeyitaṃ vā.
tika-vin06t:459_0: 99. Pubbe pāse baddhasūkaraupamāya vuttā eva. “Thale ṭhapitāya nāvāya na phuṭṭhokāsamattamevā”ti
tika-vin06t:459_1: pāṭho. “Vāto āgammāti vacanato vātassa natthikāle payogassa katattā avahāro natthi,
tika-vin06t:459_2: atthikāle ce kato, avahārovā”ti vadanti. “Bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana kesanti ce? Yesaṃ hatthe
tika-vin06t:459_3: kahāpaṇāni gahitāni, tesaṃ vā, nāvāsāminā nāvāya aggahitāya nāvāsāmikassa vā”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:460: 104. Nirambitvā upari. Akataṃ vā pana patiṭṭhapetīti apubbaṃ vā paṭṭhapetīti attho.
tika-vin06t:461: 106. Gāmaṭṭhe vā “gāmo nāmā”ti na vuttaṃ paṭhamaṃ gāmalakkhaṇassa sabbaso vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:462_0: 107. Araññaṭṭhe araññaṃ nāmāti puna na kevalaṃ pubbe vuttalakkhaṇaññeva araññanti
tika-vin06t:462_1: idhādhippetaṃ, kintu parapariggahitameva cetaṃ hoti, taṃ idhādhippetanti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:462_2: vuttaṃ. Teneva atthepi araññaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Aggepi mūlepi chinnāti ettha “na veṭhetvā
tika-vin06t:462_3: ṭhitā, chinnamatte patanakaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti. Tacchetvā ṭhapitoti araññasāmikehi
tika-vin06t:462_4: parehi laddhehi tacchetvā ṭhapito. Addhagatopīti cirakālikopi. “Na gahetabboti araññasāmikehi
tika-vin06t:462_5: anuññātenapī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Challiyā pariyonaddhaṃ hotīti iminā sāmikānaṃ
tika-vin06t:462_6: nirapekkhataṃ dīpeti. Tena vuttaṃ “gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Yadi sāmikānaṃ sāpekkhatā atthi, na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:463_0: 108. Tattha “bhājanesu pokkharaṇītaḷākesu ca gāvo pakkosatīti ito paṭṭhāya tayo dasa
tika-vin06t:463_1: vārā ādimeva dassetvā saṃkhittā”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Nibbahanaudakaṃ nāma taḷākarakkhaṇatthāya
tika-vin06t:463_3: na hotī”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Ito paṭṭhāya “vutta”nti vutte anugaṇṭhipadeti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:463_4: Anikkhante udaketi pāṭhaseso, sukkhamātikāpayogattā bhaṇḍadeyyampi na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:463_5: Taḷākaṃ nissāya khettassa katattāti “sabbasādhāraṇaṃ taḷākaṃ hotī”ti paṭhamaṃ vuttattā
tika-vin06t:463_6: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Yasmā taḷākagataṃ udakaṃ sabbasādhāraṇampi mātikāya sati taṃ
tika-vin06t:463_7: atikkamitvā gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati, tasmā taṃ sandhāya kurundiyādīsu avahāroti vutta”nti
tika-vin06t:463_8: apare āhūti. Iminā lakkhaṇena na sametīti yasmā sabbasādhāraṇadeso nāma tañca taḷākaṃ
tika-vin06t:463_9: sabbasādhāraṇaṃ, katikābhāvā ca mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttameva yuttanti āhācariyo.
tika-vin06t:464_0: 109. “Tato paṭṭhāya avahāro natthīti theyyāyapi gaṇhato, tasmā yathāmuṇḍamahājetabbattā,
tika-vin06t:464_1: arakkhitabbattā, sabbasādhāraṇattā ca aññampi saṅghasantakaṃ idaṃ na hotī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:465_0: 110. Ujukameva tiṭṭhatīti ettha “samīpe rukkhasākhādīhi sandhāritattā īsakaṃ khalitvā
tika-vin06t:465_1: ujukameva tiṭṭhati ce, avahāro. Chinnaveṇu viya tiṭṭhati ce, anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:465_2: taṃ suvuttaṃ, tassa vinicchaye “sace tāni rakkhantī”ti vuttattā. No aññathāti sampatte
tika-vin06t:465_3: ce vāte vātamukhasodhanaṃ karoti, pārājikanti attho.
tika-vin06t:466_0: 111. Aññesu pana vicāraṇā eva natthīti tesu appaṭikkhipitattā ayameva vinicchayoti
tika-vin06t:466_1: vuttaṃ hoti. “Etena dhuranikkhepaṃ katvāpi corehi āhaṭaṃ codetvā gaṇhato anāpattīti
tika-vin06t:467_0: 112. Eseva nayoti uddhāreyeva pārājikaṃ, kasmā? Aññehi pattehi sādhāraṇassa saññāṇassa
tika-vin06t:467_1: vuttattā. Padavārenāti corena nīharitvā dinnaṃ gahetvā gacchato. Gāmadvāranti vohāramattameva,
tika-vin06t:467_2: gāmanti attho āṇattiyā daṭṭhabbattā, dvinnampi uddhāre eva pārājikaṃ. Asukaṃ nāma
tika-vin06t:467_3: gāmaṃ gantvāti vacanena yāva tassa gāmassa parato upacāro, sabbametaṃ āṇattameva
tika-vin06t:467_4: hoti. “Ṭhatvā vā nisīditvā vā vissamitvā purimatheyyacittaṃ vūpasamitvā gamanatthañce
tika-vin06t:467_5: bhaṇḍaṃ na nikkhittaṃ, yathāgahitameva, padavārena kāretabboti, nikkhittañce, uddhārenā”ti
tika-vin06t:467_6: ca likhitaṃ. Kevalaṃ “likhita”nti vutte gaṇṭhipade gahetabbaṃ. Theyyacittena paribhuñjantoti
tika-vin06t:467_7: ṭhānācāvanaṃ akatvā nivatthapārutanīhārena “pubbevedaṃ mayā gahita”nti theyyacittena
tika-vin06t:467_8: paribhuñjanto. “Naṭṭhe bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ kirā”ti likhitaṃ. “Añño vā”ti vacanena yena ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:467_9: tena dinne anāpattīti dīpitaṃ hoti gopakassa dāne viya, “kevalaṃ idha bhaṇḍadeyyanti
tika-vin06t:467_10: apare”ti vuttaṃ. “Añño vā”ti vacanato yena ṭhapitaṃ. So vātipi labbhatīti vicāretvā
tika-vin06t:467_11: gahetabbo. Vā-saddena yassa hatthe ṭhapitaṃ, so vā deti rājagahe gaṇako viya dhaniyassa,
tika-vin06t:468_0: Tava thūlasāṭako laddhoti vuttakkhaṇe musāvāde dukkaṭaṃ. Tassa nāmaṃ likhitvāti ettha
tika-vin06t:468_2: na hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Na jānantīti na suṇantīti attho. Sace jānitvāpi cittena na sampaṭicchanti
tika-vin06t:468_3: eseva nayo. Jānantena pana rakkhituṃ anicchante paṭikkhipitabbameva etanti vattaṃ
tika-vin06t:468_4: jānitabbaṃ. Ummaggenāti purāpāṇaṃ khaṇitvā katamaggenāti attho.
tika-vin06t:469_0: Nissitavārikassa pana sabhāgā bhattaṃ denti, tasmā yathā vihāre panti, tatheva kātabbanti
tika-vin06t:469_1: sampattavāraṃ aggahetuṃ na labhanti, “tassa vā sabhāgā adātuṃ na labhantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:469_2: Attadutiyassāti na hi ekenānītaṃ dvinnaṃ pahoti, sace pahoti pāpetabboti dassetuṃ
tika-vin06t:469_3: “yassa vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Paripucchaṃ detīti pucchitapañhassa vissajjanaṃ karotī”ti
tika-vin06t:469_4: likhitaṃ. Saṅghassa bhāraṃ nāma “saddhammavācanā evā”ti vuttaṃ, “navakammikopi vuccatī”ti
tika-vin06t:469_5: ca, “ito bhaṇḍato vaṭṭantaṃ puna anto pavisatīti mahāaṭṭhakathāpadassa kurundīsaṅkhepaṭṭhakathāhi
tika-vin06t:470_0: 113. Gacchante yāne vāti ettha “suṅkaṭṭhānassa bahi ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti upatissatthero
tika-vin06t:470_1: vadati kira. “Gacchante yāne vātiādi suṅkaṭṭhānabbhantare gahetabba”nti vuttaṃ. Bahi
tika-vin06t:470_2: ṭhitassa vattabbameva natthi, “anto ṭhatvā”ti adhikāre vuttattā ceti yuttaṃ – yānādīsu
tika-vin06t:470_3: ṭhapite tassa payogaṃ vināyeva gatesu pārājiko na hoti. Kasmā na bhaṇḍadeyyanti ce?
tika-vin06t:470_4: Suṅkaṭṭhānassa bahi ṭhitattā. Araññaṭṭhe “assatiyā atikkamantassapi bhaṇḍadeyyamevā”ti
tika-vin06t:470_5: vuttaṃ tesaṃ sapariggahitattā. Idha pana “atra paviṭṭhassā”ti vacanato na bahi ṭhitassa,
tika-vin06t:470_6: taṃ kira suṅkasaṅketaṃ. Aññaṃ harāpetīti tattha “sahatthā”ti vacanato anāpatti. Nissaggiyāni
tika-vin06t:470_7: hontīti aṭṭhakathāto pācittiyaṃ, upacāraṃ okkamitvā pariharaṇe sādīnavattā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin06t:471_0: Suṅkaṭṭhāne suṅkaṃ datvāva gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti idaṃ dāni vattabbānaṃ mātikāti dhammasiritthero.
tika-vin06t:471_1: “Anurādhapurassa catūsu dvāresu suṅkaṃ gaṇhanti, tesu dakkhiṇadvārassa purato maggo
tika-vin06t:471_3: niviṭṭho, yo na gāmaṃ pavisanto upacāraṃ okkanto hoti. Thūpārāmato ca mahācetiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:471_4: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā rājavihāraṃ gacchanto na okkamatī”ti kira mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-vin06t:471_5: Ettha cāti suṅkaghāte “dvīhi leḍḍupātehīti ācariyaparamparābhatā”ti likhitaṃ. Dvīhi
tika-vin06t:471_6: leḍḍupātehīti suṅkaghātassa paricchede aṭṭhapite yujjati, ṭhapite pana atirekayojanampi
tika-vin06t:471_7: suṅkaghātaṃ hotīti tato paraṃ dve leḍḍupātā upacāroti gahetabbo. So panetthāpi duvidho
tika-vin06t:471_8: bāhirabbhantarabhedato. Tattha dutiyaleḍḍupātasaṅkhātaṃ bāhiropacāraṃ sandhāya pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:471_9: mahāaṭṭhakathāyañca dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Abbhantaraṃ sandhāya kurundiyanti no khanti.
tika-vin06t:471_10: “Atra paviṭṭhassa suṅkaṃ gaṇhantūti hi niyamitaṭṭhānaṃ ekantato pārājikakhettaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:471_11: tañca parikkhittaṃ, eko leḍḍupāto dukkaṭakhettaṃ, aparikkhittañce, dutiyo leḍḍupātoti
tika-vin06t:472_0: 114. Dhanaṃ pana gataṭṭhāne vaḍḍhatīti ettha “vaḍḍhiyā saha avahārakassa bhaṇḍadeyya”nti
tika-vin06t:472_1: likhitaṃ. “Taṃ vaḍḍhiṃ dassāmī”ti aggahesi, tattha kammaṃ akarontassa vaḍḍhatīti
tika-vin06t:472_2: katvā vuttaṃ. Kevalaṃ āṭhapitakhettassa na vaḍḍhati. “Yaṃ dhanaṃ vaḍḍhi, taṃ dentassa
tika-vin06t:472_3: avahārakassa vaḍḍhiyā adāne pārājikaṃ hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:473: Nāmenāti sappanāmena vā sāmikena katena vā.
tika-vin06t:474_0: 116. Rājagharassa antovatthumhi, parikkhittarājaṅgaṇaṃ vā antovatthu. Aparikkhitte
tika-vin06t:474_1: rājaṅgaṇe ṭhitassa sakalanagaraṃ ṭhānaṃ. Goṇassa “aparikkhitte ṭhitassa akkantaṭṭhānameva
tika-vin06t:474_2: ṭhāna”nti vuttattā khaṇḍadvāranti attanā khaṇḍitacchiddaṃ. Tattheva ghātetīti “jīvitindriyārammaṇattā
tika-vin06t:474_3: vadhakacittassa pācittiyaṃ hotīti? Na hoti. Kasmā? Adinnādānapayogattā. Tampi theyyacittaṃ
tika-vin06t:474_4: saṅkhārārammaṇaṃva hoti. Idha tadubhayaṃ labhati saddhiṃ pubbabhāgāparabhāgehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:475_0: 118. Tassuddhāre sabbesaṃ pārājikanti yadi yo āṇatto avassaṃ taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ harati,
tika-vin06t:475_1: āṇattikkhaṇe eva pārājikaṃ. “Idha tiṇṇaṃ kasmā pārājikaṃ, nanu ‘tumhe, bhante, tayo
tika-vin06t:475_2: harathā’ti vuttattā thullaccayaṃ, itaresañca paṭipāṭiyā ekekassāṇattattā ekekena
tika-vin06t:475_3: ca dukkaṭena bhavitabbaṃ. Kathaṃ, eko kira māsagghanakaṃ parissāvanaṃ thenetvā desetvā
tika-vin06t:475_4: nirussāho eva vā hutvā puna māsagghanakaṃ sūciṃ tatheva katvā puna māsagghanakanti
tika-vin06t:475_5: evaṃ siyāti? Na evaṃ, taṃ yathā uppalathenako yena vatthu pūrati tāva saussāhattā
tika-vin06t:475_6: pārājiko āsi, evamime saussāhāva na desayiṃsu vā”ti likhitaṃ, pāḷiyaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-vin06t:475_7: saṃvidahitvā gatesu ekassuddhāre sabbesaṃ pārājikaṃ vinā viya āṇattiyā kiñcāpi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:475_8: atha kho “tassāyaṃ attho”ti vatvā pacchā vuttavinicchayesu ca ekabhaṇḍaekaṭṭhānādīsu
tika-vin06t:475_9: ca sambahulā ekaṃ āṇāpentīti āṇattimeva niyametvā vuttaṃ, tasmā āṇatti icchitabbā
tika-vin06t:475_10: viya, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. “‘Ekabhaṇḍaṃ ekaṭṭhāna’nti ca pāṭho ‘ekakulassa bhaṇḍa’nti vacanato”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:476_0: 119-120. Ocarake vuttanayenevāti avassaṃhāriye bhaṇḍe. Taṃ saṅketanti tassa saṅketassa.
tika-vin06t:476_1: Atha vā taṃ saṅketaṃ atikkamitvā pacchā vā. Apatvā pure vā. Esa nayo taṃ nimittanti
tika-vin06t:476_2: etthāpi. Akkhinikhaṇanādikammaṃ lahukaṃ ittarakālaṃ, taṅkhaṇe eva bhaṇḍaṃ avaharituṃ
tika-vin06t:476_3: na sakkā, kiñci bhaṇḍaṃ dūraṃ hoti, kiñci bhāriyaṃ, taṃ gahetuṃ yāva gacchati yāva
tika-vin06t:476_4: ukkhipati, tāva nimittassa pacchā hoti. Sace taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ adhigataṃ viya āsannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:476_5: lahukañca, sakkā nimittakkhaṇe avaharituṃ, tameva sandhāya vuttaṃ kinti? Na, pubbe
tika-vin06t:476_6: vuttampi “tato paṭṭhāya teneva nimittena avaharatī”ti vuccati āraddhattā. Yadi evaṃ
tika-vin06t:476_7: “purebhattapayogo eso”ti vāro pamāṇaṃ hoti, na ca taṃ pamāṇaṃ mahāpadumattheravādassa
tika-vin06t:476_8: pacchā vuttattā, na saṅketakammaṃ viya nimittakammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha hi kālaparicchedo
tika-vin06t:476_9: atthi, idha natthi, idameva tesaṃ nānattaṃ.
tika-vin06t:477_0: 121. Tañca asammohatthanti eko “purebhattādīsu vā, akkhinikhaṇanādīni vā disvā gaṇhā”ti,
tika-vin06t:477_1: eko gahetabbaṃ bhaṇḍanissitaṃ katvā “purebhattaṃ evaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhā”ti
tika-vin06t:477_2: vadati, evaṃvidhesu asammohatthaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ saṅketaṃ nimittañca dassetunti ca, yathādhippāyanti
tika-vin06t:477_3: dutiyo tatiyassa tatiyo catutthassāti evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā ce vadantīti attho. Sace dutiyo
tika-vin06t:477_4: catutthassa vadeti, na yathādhippāyoti ca. “Paṭiggahitamatteti avassaṃ ce paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:477_5: pubbeva thullaccaya”nti ca likhitaṃ. Paṭiggaṇhakānaṃ dukkaṭaṃ sabbatthokāsābhāvato
tika-vin06t:477_6: na vuttaṃ. Pārājikāpajjanenetaṃ dukkaṭaṃ āpajjitvā āpajjanti kira. Atthasādhakāṇatticetanākhaṇe
tika-vin06t:477_7: eva pārājiko hotīti adhippāyo. Tattha maggaṭṭhāniyaṃ kataraṃ, kataraṃ phalaṭṭhāniyanti
tika-vin06t:477_9: siddhaṃ. Āṇatti ce maggaṭṭhāniyā siyā, cetanāsahajattā na sambhavati, tathā bhaṇḍassa
tika-vin06t:477_10: avassaṃhāritā ca na sambhavati. Āṇattikkhaṇe eva hi taṃ avassaṃhāritaṃ jātanti avahārakassa
tika-vin06t:477_11: paṭiggaṇhañce, tampi na sambhavati anāgatattā. Cetanā ce maggaṭṭhāniyā hoti, āṇattiādīsu
tika-vin06t:477_12: aññataraṃ, bhaṇḍassa avassaṃhāritā eva vā phalaṭṭhāniyā ce, attho na sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:477_13: Pārājikāpatti eva hi phalaṭṭhāniyā bhavitumarahati, na aññanti evaṃ tāva idha opammasaṃsandanaṃ
tika-vin06t:477_14: sambhavati cetanā maggaṭṭhāniyā, tassā pārājikāpattibhāvo phalaṭṭhāniyo. Yathā kiṃ?
tika-vin06t:477_15: Yathā paṭisambhidāmagge “saddhāya ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Saddhāya saddatthe ñāṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:477_16: atthapaṭisambhidā”ti ettha añño saddho, añño saddhāya saddatthoti siddhaṃ, yathā
tika-vin06t:477_17: ca “eko amohasaṅkhāto dhammo sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo adhipatisahajātaaññamaññanissayaindriyamaggasampayuttaatthiavigatapaccayena
tika-vin06t:477_18: paccayo”ti ettha amoho dhammo añño, aññe tassa hetupaccayatādayoti siddhaṃ. Yathā
tika-vin06t:477_19: ca vinayapiṭake yāni cha āpattisamuṭṭhānāni, evaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ “satta āpattikkhandhā”ti
tika-vin06t:477_20: vuccanti, tesaṃ aññā āpattisamuṭṭhānatā, añño āpattikkhandhabhāvoti siddhaṃ. Iminā
tika-vin06t:477_21: āpattikkhandhanayena āpattādhikaraṇassa kati ṭhānānīti? Satta āpattikkhandhā ṭhānānīti.
tika-vin06t:477_22: Kati vatthūnīti? Satta āpattikkhandhā vatthūnīti. Kati bhūmiyoti? Satta āpattikkhandhā
tika-vin06t:477_23: bhūmiyoti evamādayopi dassetabbā. Tathā hi tassā evaṃ maggaṭṭhāniyāya atthasādhikāya
tika-vin06t:477_24: cetanāya yasmā aññā pārājikāpattitā anatthantarabhūtā ākāravisesasaṅkhātā phalaṭṭhāniyā
tika-vin06t:477_25: atthi, tasmā “atthasādhakacetanā nāma maggānantaraphalasadisā”ti vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:477_26: Atha vā kevalaṃ dhammaniyāmattaṃyeva upamattena ācariyena evaṃ vuttantipi sambhavatīti
tika-vin06t:477_27: na tattha opammasaṃsandanaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ, “idaṃ sabbaṃ kevalaṃ takkavasena vuttattā
tika-vin06t:480_1: āraddhaṃ. Tattha aṅgavatthubhedena cāti avahāraṅgajānanabhedena vatthussa haritabbabhaṇḍassa
tika-vin06t:480_2: garukalahukabhāvabhedenāti attho. Atha vā aṅgañca vatthubhedena āpattibhedañca dassentoti
tika-vin06t:480_3: attho. Atirekamāsako ūnapañcamāsakoti ettha vā-saddo na vutto, tīhipi eko eva paricchedo
tika-vin06t:480_4: vuttoti. Anajjhāvuṭṭhakaṃ nāma araññapālakādinā na kenaci mamāyitaṃ. Chaḍḍitaṃ nāma
tika-vin06t:480_5: anatthikabhāvena atirekamattādinā sāmikena chaḍḍitaṃ. Naṭṭhaṃ pariyesitvā chinnālayattā
tika-vin06t:480_6: chinnamūlakaṃ. Assāmikavatthūti acchinnamūlakampi yassa sāmiko koci no hoti, nirapekkhā
tika-vin06t:480_7: vā pariccajanti, yaṃ vā pariccattaṃ devatādīnaṃ, idaṃ sabbaṃ assāmikavatthu nāma.
tika-vin06t:480_8: Devatādīnaṃ vā buddhadhammānaṃ vā pariccattaṃ parehi ce ārakkhakehi pariggahitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:480_9: parapariggahitameva. Tathārūpe hi adinnādāne rājāno coraṃ gahetvā hananādikaṃ kareyyuṃ,
tika-vin06t:480_10: anārakkhake pana āvāse, abhikkhuke anārāmikādike ca yaṃ buddhadhammassa santakaṃ,
tika-vin06t:480_11: taṃ “āgatāgatehi bhikkhūhi rakkhitabbaṃ gopetabbaṃ mamāyitabba”nti vacanato abhikkhukāvāsasaṅghasantakaṃ
tika-vin06t:480_12: viya parapariggahitasaṅkhyameva gacchatīti chāyā dissati. Issaro hi yo koci bhikkhu
tika-vin06t:480_13: tādise parikkhāre corehipi gayhamāne vāretuṃ paṭibalo ce, balakkārena acchinditvā
tika-vin06t:480_14: yathāṭhāne ṭhapetunti. Apariggahite parasantakasaññissa chasu ākāresu vijjamānesupi
tika-vin06t:480_15: anāpatti viya dissati, “yaṃ parapariggahitañca hotī”ti aṅgabhāvo kiñcāpi dissati,
tika-vin06t:480_16: parasantake tathā paṭipannake sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Attano santakaṃ corehi
tika-vin06t:480_17: haṭaṃ, corapariggahitattā parapariggahitaṃ hoti, tasmā paro cetaṃ theyyacitto gaṇhati,
tika-vin06t:480_18: pārājikaṃ. Sāmiko eva ce gaṇhati, na pārājikaṃ, yasmā codetvā, acchinditvā ca so
tika-vin06t:480_19: “mama santakaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti gahetuṃ labhati. Paṭhamaṃ dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā ce pacchā
tika-vin06t:480_20: theyyacitto gaṇhati, esa nayo. Sāmikena dhuraṃ nikkhittakāle so ce coro kālaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:480_21: añño theyyacittena gaṇhati, na pārājiko. Anikkhittakāle eva ce kālaṃ karoti, taṃ
tika-vin06t:480_22: theyyacittena gaṇhantassa bhikkhuno pārājikaṃ mūlabhikkhussa santakabhāve ṭhitattā.
tika-vin06t:480_23: Corabhikkhumhi mate “matakaparikkhāra”nti saṅgho vibhajitvā ce taṃ gaṇhati, mūlasāmiko
tika-vin06t:481_0: Etthāha – bhūmaṭṭhādinimittakammapariyosānā eva avahārabhedā, udāhu aññepi santīti.
tika-vin06t:481_1: Kiñcettha yadi aññepi santi, tepi vattabbā. Na hi bhagavā sāvasesaṃ pārājikaṃ paññapeti.
tika-vin06t:481_3: ca suttaṅgesu sandissamānā, te idha āgatesu ettha samodhānaṃ gacchantīti ca lakkhaṇato
tika-vin06t:481_4: vā tesaṃ samodhānagatabhāvo vattabboti? Vuccate – lakkhaṇato siddhova. Kathaṃ? “Pañcahi
tika-vin06t:481_5: ākārehī”tiādinā nayena aṅgavatthubhedena. Āpattibhedo hi pāḷiyaṃ vutto eva, aṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-vin06t:481_6: “kūṭamānakūṭakahāpaṇādīhi vā vañcetvā gaṇhati, tassevaṃ gaṇhato avahāro theyyāvahāro”ti
tika-vin06t:481_7: āgatattā tulākūṭagahaṇādayo theyyāvahāre samodhānaṃ gatāti siddhaṃ. Viparāmosaālopasāhasākārā
tika-vin06t:481_8: ca aṭṭhakathāyāgate pasayhāvahāre samodhānaṃ gacchanti. Imaṃyeva vā pasayhāvahāraṃ
tika-vin06t:481_9: dassetuṃ “gāmaṭṭhaṃ araññaṭṭha”nti mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā “gāmaṭṭhaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ catūhi
tika-vin06t:481_10: ṭhānehi nikkhittaṃ hotī”tiādinā nayena vibhāgo vutto. Tenedaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – gahaṇākārabhedasandassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:481_11: visuṃ kataṃ. Na hi bhūmitalādīhi gāmāraññaṭṭhaṃ yaṃ kiñcīti. Tattha yaṃ tulākūṭaṃ,
tika-vin06t:481_12: taṃ rūpakūṭaṅgagahaṇapaṭicchannakūṭavasena catubbidhampi vehāsaṭṭhe samodhānaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin06t:481_14: chindatī”ti ettha samodhānaṃ gacchati. Hadayabhedo hi sappitelādiminanakāle labbhati.
tika-vin06t:481_15: “Phandāpeti attano bhājanagataṃ karotī”ti ettha sikhābhedopi labbhati. So “tilataṇḍulādiminanakāle
tika-vin06t:481_16: labbhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Khettaminanakāle rajjubhedo samodhānaṃ gacchati. “Dhammaṃ caranto
tika-vin06t:481_17: sāmikaṃ parājetī”ti ettha ukkoṭanaṃ samodhānaṃ gacchatīti te ca tathā vañcananikatiyopi.
tika-vin06t:484_0: 131. Na ca gahite attamano hoti, tassa santakaṃ vissāsagāhena gahitampi puna dātabbanti
tika-vin06t:484_1: idaṃ “tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū sahāyakā honti. Eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi…pe…
tika-vin06t:484_2: anāpatti, bhikkhu, vissāsaggāhe”ti iminā asamentaṃ viya dissati. Ettha hi “so jānitvā
tika-vin06t:484_3: taṃ codesi assamaṇosi tva”nti vacanena anattamanatā dīpitā. Puna “anāpatti, bhikkhu,
tika-vin06t:484_4: vissāsaggāhe”ti vacanena attamanatāyapi sati vissāsaggāho ruhatīti dīpitanti ce?
tika-vin06t:484_5: Taṃ na, aññathā gahetabbatthato. Ayañhettha attho – pārājikāpattiyā anāpatti vissāsasaññāya
tika-vin06t:484_6: gāhe sati, sopi bhikkhu sahāyakattā na kuddho codesi, piyo eva samāno “kacci assamaṇosi
tika-vin06t:484_7: tvaṃ, gaccha, vinicchayaṃ katvā suddhante tiṭṭhāhī”ti codesi. Sacepi so kuddho eva
tika-vin06t:484_8: codeyya, “anāpattī”ti idaṃ kevalaṃ pārājikābhāvaṃ dīpeti, na vissāsaggāhasiddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:484_9: Yo pana parisamajjhe lajjāya adhivāseti, na kiñci vadatīti attho. “Punavattukāmatādhippāye
tika-vin06t:484_10: pana sopi paccāharāpetuṃ labhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Sace coro pasayha gahetukāmopi “adhivāsetha,
tika-vin06t:484_11: bhante, idha me cīvarānī”ti vatvā cīvarāni therena dinnāni, adinnāni vā sayaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin06t:484_12: gacchati, thero puna pakkhaṃ labhitvā codetuṃ labhati, pubbe adhivāsanā adhivāsanasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin06t:484_13: na gacchati bhayena tuṇhībhūtattā, “yaṃ cīvaraṃ idha sāmiko paccāharāpetuṃ labhatī”ti
tika-vin06t:484_14: vuttaṃ. Sāmikassa pākatikaṃ kātabbaṃ, “idaṃ kira vatta”nti vuttaṃ. Sace saṅghassa
tika-vin06t:484_15: santakaṃ kenaci bhikkhunā gahitaṃ, tassa tena saṅghassa vā dhammassa vā upakāritā
tika-vin06t:484_16: atthi, gahitappamāṇaṃ apaloketvā dātabbaṃ. “So tena yathāgahitaṃ pākatikaṃ katvā
tika-vin06t:484_17: anaṇo hoti, gilānādīnampi eseva nayo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:487_0: Sāhatthikāṇattikanti ekabhaṇḍaṃ eva. “Bhāriyañhidaṃ tvampi ekapassaṃ gaṇha, ahampi
tika-vin06t:487_1: ekapassaṃ gaṇhāmīti saṃvidahitvā ubhayesaṃ payogena ṭhānācāvane kate kāyavācācittehi
tika-vin06t:487_2: hoti. Aññathā ‘sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa aṅgaṃ na hoti, āṇattikaṃ vā sāhatthikassā’ti
tika-vin06t:487_3: iminā virujjhatī”ti likhitaṃ. Dhammasiritthero pana “na kevalaṃ bhāriye eva vatthumhi
tika-vin06t:487_4: ayaṃ nayo labbhati, pañcamāsakamattampi dve ce janā saṃvidahitvā gaṇhanti, dvinnampi
tika-vin06t:487_5: pāṭekkaṃ, sāhatthikaṃ nāma taṃ kammaṃ, sāhatthikapayogattā ekasmiṃyeva bhaṇḍe, tasmā
tika-vin06t:487_6: ‘sāhatthikaṃ āṇattikassa aṅgaṃ na hotī’ti vacanamimaṃ nayaṃ na paṭibāhati. ‘Sāhatthikavatthuaṅganti
tika-vin06t:487_7: sāhatthikassa vatthussa aṅgaṃ na hotī’ti tattha vuttaṃ. Idha pana payogaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:487_8: vuttattā yujjatī”ti āha kira, taṃ ayuttaṃ kāyavacīkammanti vacanābhāvā, tasmā sāhatthikāṇattikesu
tika-vin06t:487_9: payogesu aññatarena vāyamāpatti samuṭṭhāti, tathāpi turitaturitā hutvā vilopanādīsu
tika-vin06t:487_10: gahaṇagāhāpanavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathā kālena attano kālena parassa dhammaṃ ārabbha
tika-vin06t:487_11: sīghaṃ sīghaṃ uppattiṃ sandhāya “ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā dhammā”ti vuttā, evaṃsampadamidanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:488_0: Tatthapi ye anuttarādayo ekantabahiddhārammaṇā viññāṇañcāyatanādayo ekantaajjhattārammaṇā,
tika-vin06t:488_1: itare aniyatārammaṇattā “ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā”ti vuccanti, na ekakkhaṇe ubhayārammaṇattā.
tika-vin06t:488_2: Ayaṃ pana āpatti yathāvuttanayena sāhatthikā āṇattikāpi hotiyeva, tasmā anidassanametanti
tika-vin06t:488_4: ayampi āpatti ‘sāhatthikāṇattikā’ti vuttāti nidassanameveta”nti ekacce ācariyā āhu.
tika-vin06t:488_5: “Ime panācariyā ubhinnaṃ ekato ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ natthi. Atthi ce, ‘ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:488_6: dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā’tiādinā paṭṭhānapāṭhena
tika-vin06t:488_7: bhavitabbanti saññāya āhaṃsu, tesaṃ matena ‘siyā ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā’ti vacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:488_8: niratthakaṃ siyā, na ca niratthakaṃ, tasmā attheva ekato ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇo
tika-vin06t:488_9: dhammo. Puna ‘ayaṃ so’ti niyamena ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā dhammā viya niddisitabbābhāvato
tika-vin06t:488_10: na uddhaṭo siyā. Tattha anuddhaṭattā eva dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ubhinnampi ajjhattabahiddhādhammānaṃ
tika-vin06t:488_12: pavattiyaṃ ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇa’nti vuttaṃ, tasmā gaṇṭhipade vuttanayova sāroti
tika-vin06t:488_13: no takko”ti ācariyo. Tattha “kāyavacīkamma”nti avacanaṃ panassa sāhatthikapayogattā
tika-vin06t:488_14: ekapayogassa anekakammattāva, yadi bhaveyya, manokammampi vattabbaṃ bhaveyya, yathā
tika-vin06t:488_15: tattha manokammaṃ vijjamānampi abbohārikaṃ jātaṃ, evaṃ tasmiṃ sāhatthikāṇattike vacīkammaṃ
tika-vin06t:488_16: abbohārikanti veditabbaṃ, taṃ pana kevalaṃ kāyakammassa upanissayaṃ jātaṃ, cittaṃ
tika-vin06t:488_17: viya tattha aṅgameva jātaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “sāhatthikapayogattā”ti, “aṅgabhāvamattameva
tika-vin06t:488_18: hi sandhāya ‘sāhatthikāṇattika’nti vuttanti no takko”ti ca, vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:490: Tattha kammaṃ na taṃ cittaṃ, kammaṃ nassati khīyati.
tika-vin06t:492: Na yuttaṃ taṃ viruddhattā, kammamekaṃva yujjati.
tika-vin06t:494_0: 132. Anāpatti, bhikkhu, cittuppādeti ettha kevalaṃ cittaṃ, tasseva uppādetabbāpattīhi
tika-vin06t:494_1: anāpattīti attho. Etthāha – upanikkhittasādiyanādīsu, sabbesu ca akiriyasikkhāpadesu
tika-vin06t:494_2: na kāyaṅgacopanaṃ vā vācaṅgacopanaṃ vā, apicāpatti, kasmā imasmiṃyeva sikkhāpade
tika-vin06t:497_0: Na lesabhāvattā. Sappāye ārammaṇe aṭṭhatvā paṭiladdhāsevanaṃ hutvā tato paraṃ suṭṭhu
tika-vin06t:497_1: dhāvatīti sandhāvati. Tato abhijjhāya sahagataṃ, byāpādasahagataṃ vā hutvā visesato
tika-vin06t:498_0: 137. Vaṇaṃ katvā gahetunti ettha kiñcāpi iminā sikkhāpadena anāpatti, itthirūpassa
tika-vin06t:498_1: nāma yattha āmasantassa dukkaṭanti keci. “Kāyapaṭibaddhaggahaṇaṃ yuttaṃ, taṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:498_2: vaṭṭatīti vutta”nti vadanti. Ubhayaṃ vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:500_0: 138. Mahāpaccariyādīsu yaṃ vuttaṃ “paduddhāreneva kāretabbo”ti, taṃ suvuttaṃ. Kintu
tika-vin06t:500_1: tassa parikappāvahārakamattaṃ na dissatīti dassanatthaṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ. Uddhāre vāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:500_2: āpanno, tasmā disvā gacchanto “paduddhāreneva kāretabbo”ti idaṃ tattha duvuttanti
tika-vin06t:500_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? “Sāṭakatthiko sāṭakapasibbakameva gahetvā bahi nikkhamitvā sāṭakabhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:500_4: ñatvā ‘pacchā gaṇhissāmī’ti evaṃ parikappetvā gaṇhati, na uddhāre evāpajjati. Yadā
tika-vin06t:500_5: bahi ṭhatvā ‘sāṭako aya’nti disvā gacchati, tadā paduddhāreneva kāretabbo”ti na vuttametaṃ,
tika-vin06t:500_6: kintu kiñcāpi parikappo dissati, pubbabhāge avahārakkhaṇe na dissatīti na so parikappāvahāro,
tika-vin06t:500_7: ayamattho mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttova, tasmā “ñāyamevā”ti vadanti. Kammantasālā nāma
tika-vin06t:500_8: kassakānaṃ vanacchedakānaṃ gehāni. Ayaṃ tāvāti sace upacārasīmantiādi yāva theravādo
tika-vin06t:500_9: mahāaṭṭhakathānayo, tattha keci panātiādi na gahetabbaṃ theravādattā yuttiabhāvato,
tika-vin06t:500_10: na hi sāhatthike evaṃvidhā atthasādhakacetanā hoti. Āṇattike eva atthasādhakacetanā.
tika-vin06t:501_0: Kusasaṅkāmanakaraṇe sace paro “nāyaṃ mama santako”ti jānāti, itarassa hatthato muttamatte
tika-vin06t:501_1: pārājikāpatti khīlasaṅkāmane viya. “Attano santakaṃ sace jānāti, na hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:501_2: Evaṃ sante pañcakāni saṅkarāni hontīti upaparikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:502_0: 140. Parānuddayatāyāti ettha parānuddayatāya koṭippattena bhagavatā kasmā “anāpatti
tika-vin06t:502_1: petapariggahe tiracchānagatapariggahe”ti vuttanti ce? Parānuddayatāya eva. Yassa
tika-vin06t:502_2: hi parikkhārassa ādāne rājāno coraṃ gahetvā na hananādīni kareyyuṃ, tasmimpi nāma
tika-vin06t:502_3: samaṇo gotamo pārājikaṃ paññapetvā bhikkhuṃ abhikkhuṃ karotīti mahājano bhagavati
tika-vin06t:502_4: pasādaññathattaṃ āpajjitvā apāyupago hoti. Apetapariggahitā rukkhādī ca dullabhā,
tika-vin06t:502_5: na ca sakkā ñātunti rukkhādīhi pāpabhīruko upāsakajano paṭimāgharacetiyabodhigharavihārādīni
tika-vin06t:502_7: nissāya pabbajjā”ti vuttanissayā ca anissayā honti. Parapariggahitasaññino hi bhikkhū
tika-vin06t:502_8: rukkhamūlapaṃsukūlāni na sādiyissantīti, pabbajjā ca na sambhaveyyuṃ, sappadaṭṭhakāle
tika-vin06t:502_9: chārikatthāya rukkhaṃ aggahetvā maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyyuṃ, acchinnacīvarādikāle sākhābhaṅgādiṃ
tika-vin06t:502_10: aggahetvā naggā hutvā titthiyaladdhimeva suladdhi viya dīpentā vicareyyuṃ, tato titthiyesveva
tika-vin06t:502_11: loko pasīditvā diṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ patvā saṃsārakhāṇuko bhaveyya, tasmā bhagavā parānuddayatāya
tika-vin06t:503_0: 141. Aparampi bhāgaṃ dehīti “gahitaṃ viññattisadisattā neva bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ na pārājika”nti
tika-vin06t:503_1: likhitaṃ, idaṃ pakatijane yujjati. “Sace pana sāmiko vā tena āṇatto vā ‘aparassa
tika-vin06t:503_2: sahāyabhikkhussa bhāgaṃ esa gaṇhāti yācati vā’ti yaṃ aparabhāgaṃ deti, taṃ bhaṇḍadeyya”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:504_0: 148-9. Khādantassa bhaṇḍadeyyanti corassa vā sāmikassa vā sampattassa dinnaṃ sudinnameva
tika-vin06t:504_1: kira. Avisesenāti “ussāhagatānaṃ vā”ti avatvā vuttaṃ, na hi katipayānaṃ anussāhatāya
tika-vin06t:504_2: saṅghikamasaṅghikaṃ hoti. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyampi “yadi saussāhāva gacchanti, theyyacittena
tika-vin06t:504_3: paribhuñjato avahāro hotī”ti vuttattā tadubhayamekaṃ. Chaḍḍitavihāre upacārasīmāya
tika-vin06t:504_4: pamāṇaṃ jānituṃ na sakkā, ayaṃ pana bhikkhu upacārasīmāya bahi ṭhatvā ghaṇṭipaharaṇādiṃ
tika-vin06t:504_5: katvā paribhuñjati khādati, tena evaṃ khāditaṃ sukhāditanti attho. “Itaravihāre tattha
tika-vin06t:504_7: āgatānāgatānaṃ santakattāti “cātuddisassa saṅghassa demī”ti dinnattā vuttaṃ. Evaṃ
tika-vin06t:504_8: avatvā “saṅghassa demī”ti dinnampi tādisameva. Tathā hi bahi ṭhito lābhaṃ na labhati
tika-vin06t:505_0: 153. “Matasūkaro”ti vacanato tameva jīvantaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyanti katvā dātuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin06t:505_1: Vajjhaṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitaṃ hoti. Maddanto gacchati, bhaṇḍadeyyanti ettha kittakaṃ
tika-vin06t:505_2: bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ, na hi sakkā “ettakā sūkarā madditvā gatā gamissantī”ti jānitunti? Yattake
tika-vin06t:505_3: sāmikānaṃ dinne te “dinnaṃ mama bhaṇḍa”nti tussanti, tattakaṃ dātabbaṃ. No ce tussanti,
tika-vin06t:505_4: atikkantasūkaramūlaṃ datvā kiṃ opāto khaṇitvā dātabboti? Na dātabbo. Atha kiṃ codiyamānassa
tika-vin06t:505_5: ubhinnaṃ dhuranikkhepena pārājikaṃ hotīti? Na hoti, kevalaṃ kappiyaparikkhāraṃ datvā
tika-vin06t:505_6: tosetabbova sāmiko, eseva nayo aññesupi evarūpesūti no takkoti ācariyo. “Tadaheva
tika-vin06t:505_7: vā dutiyadivase vā maddanto gacchatī”ti vuttaṃ. Gumbe khipati, bhaṇḍadeyyamevāti
tika-vin06t:505_8: avassaṃ pavisanake sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ettha ekasmiṃ vihāre paracakkādibhayaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-vin06t:505_9: Mūlavatthucchedanti “sabbasenāsanaṃ ete issarā”ti vacanato itare anissarāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:506_0: 156. Ārāmarakkhakāti vissaṭṭhavasena gahetabbaṃ. Adhippāyaṃ ñatvāti ettha yassa dānaṃ
tika-vin06t:506_1: paṭiggaṇhantaṃ bhikkhuṃ, bhāgaṃ vā sāmikā na rakkhanti na daṇḍenti, tassa dānaṃ appaṭicchādetvā
tika-vin06t:506_2: gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti idha sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Tampi “na vaṭṭati saṅghike”ti vuttaṃ. Ayameva
tika-vin06t:506_3: bhikkhu issaroti yattha so icchati, tattha attañātahetuṃ labhati kira attho. Apica
tika-vin06t:506_4: “daharo”ti vadanti. Savatthukanti saha bhūmiyāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Garubhaṇḍaṃ hotī”ti
tika-vin06t:506_5: vatvā “tiṇamattaṃ pana na dātabba”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ kintu garubhaṇḍanti ce, arakkhiyaagopiyaṭṭhāne,
tika-vin06t:506_6: vinassanakabhāve ca ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kappiyepi cāti vatvā, avatvā vā gahaṇayutte
tika-vin06t:506_7: mātādisantakepi theyyacittuppādena. Idaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ “rājāpimesaṃ abhippasanno”ti
tika-vin06t:506_8: vacanato lābhaggamahattaṃ, vepullamahattañca pattakāle paññattanti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:510_0: 162. Tīhi suddhenāti ettha tīhīti nissakkavacanaṃ vā hoti, karaṇavacanaṃ vā. Nissakkapakkhe
tika-vin06t:510_1: kāyavacīmanodvārehi suddhena. Tathā duccaritamalehi visamehi papañcehītiādinā nayena
tika-vin06t:510_2: sabbakilesattikehi bodhimaṇḍe eva suddhenāti yojetabbaṃ. Karaṇapakkhe tīhīti kāyavacīmanodvārehi
tika-vin06t:510_3: suddhena. Tathā tīhi sucaritehi, tīhi vimokkhehi, tīhi bhāvanāhi, tīhi sīlasamādhipaññāhi
tika-vin06t:510_4: suddhenāti sabbaguṇattikehi yojetabbaṃ. Vibhāvitanti desanāya vitthāritaṃ, vibhūtaṃ
tika-vin06t:510_5: vā kataṃ vihitaṃ, paññattaṃ vā hoti. Saṃvaṇṇanāti vattamānasamīpe vattamānavacanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:511_0: Na kevalaṃ rājagahameva, idampi nagaraṃ. Saparicchedanti sapariyantanti attho. Saparikkhepanti
tika-vin06t:511_2: attano attabhāve, parassa vā attabhāve chandarāgappahānakaraṃ vicchindanakaraṃ dhammakathaṃ
tika-vin06t:511_3: katheti. Asubhā ceva subhākāravirahitattā. Asucino ca dosanissandanapabhavattā. Paṭikūlā
tika-vin06t:511_4: ca jigucchanīyattā pittasemhādīsu āsayato. Asubhāya vaṇṇanti asubhākārassa, asubhakammaṭṭhānassa
tika-vin06t:511_5: vā vitthāraṃ bhāsati. Sāmiatthe hetaṃ sampadānavacanaṃ. Asubhanti asubhanimittassa
tika-vin06t:511_6: āvibhāvāya paccupaṭṭhānāya vitthārakathāsaṅkhātaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsabhīti attho. Tesaṃyeva
tika-vin06t:511_7: ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃ dasahi lakkhaṇehi sampannaṃ kilesacorehi anabhibhavanīyattā
tika-vin06t:512_0: Tatrimānīti etthāyaṃ piṇḍattho – yasmiṃ vāre paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin06t:512_2: “paṭhamaṃ jhāna”nti gahetvā tassa paṭhamajjhānassa appanāpaṭipādikāya khippādibhedāya
tika-vin06t:512_3: abhiññāya adhigatāya kiccanipphattiṃ upādāya āgamanavasena paṭipadāvisuddhi ādīti
tika-vin06t:512_5: veditabbā. Pariyodāpakañāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena sampahaṃsanā pariyosānanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:512_6: Tattha ādicittato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānassa uppādakkhaṇaṃ, etasmiṃ antare paṭipadāvisuddhīti
tika-vin06t:512_9: pubbabhāgo lakkhīyati, tividhena ajjhupekkhanena majjhaṃ lakkhīyati, catubbidhāya
tika-vin06t:512_10: sampahaṃsanāya pariyosānaṃ lakkhīyatīti. Tena vuttaṃ “dasa lakkhaṇānī”ti.
tika-vin06t:513_1: “cittavisuddhī”ti vuccati. Tathā visuddhattā taṃ cittaṃ majjhimaṃ samādhinimittasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin06t:513_2: appanāsamādhiṃ tadatthāya upagacchamānaṃ ekasantativasena pariṇāmentaṃ paṭipajjati
tika-vin06t:513_3: nāma. Evaṃ paṭipannassa tassa tattha samathanimitte pakkhandanaṃ tabbhāvūpagamanaṃ
tika-vin06t:513_4: hotīti katvā “tattha cittapakkhandana”nti vuccati. Evaṃ tāva paṭhamajjhānuppādakkhaṇe
tika-vin06t:513_5: eva āgamanavasena paṭipadāvisuddhi veditabbā. Evaṃ visuddhassa appanāppattassa puna
tika-vin06t:513_6: visodhane byāpārābhāvā ajjhupekkhanaṃ hoti. Samathappaṭipannattā puna samādhāne byāpārābhāvā
tika-vin06t:513_7: ca samathappaṭipannassa ajjhupekkhanaṃ hoti. Kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekantena upaṭṭhitattā
tika-vin06t:513_8: puna ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpārāsambhavato ekattupaṭṭhānassa ajjhupekkhanaṃ hoti. Tattha
tika-vin06t:513_9: jātānanti tasmiṃ citte jātānaṃ samādhipaññānaṃ yuganaddhabhāvena anativattanaṭṭhena
tika-vin06t:513_10: nānākilesehi vimuttattā. Saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ vimuttirasenekarasaṭṭhena anativattanekasabhāvānaṃ
tika-vin06t:513_11: tesaṃ dvinnaṃ upagataṃ tajjaṃ tassāruppaṃ tadanurūpaṃ vīriyaṃ tathā cittaṃ yogī vāheti
tika-vin06t:513_12: pavattetīti katvā tadupagavīriyavāhanaṭṭhena ca visesabhāgiyabhāvattā āsevanaṭṭhena
tika-vin06t:513_13: ca sampahaṃsanā hotīti attho veditabbo. Apicettha “anantarātītaṃ gotrabhucittaṃ ekasantativasena
tika-vin06t:513_14: pariṇāmentaṃ paṭipajjati nāmā”ti likhitaṃ. Tattha hi pariṇāmentaṃ paṭipajjatīti etāni
tika-vin06t:513_15: vacanāni atītassa na sambhavanti, yañca tadanantaraṃ likhitaṃ “appanāsamādhicittaṃ
tika-vin06t:513_16: upagacchamānaṃ gotrabhucittaṃ tattha pakkhandati nāmā”ti. Imināpi taṃ na yujjati,
tika-vin06t:513_17: “paṭipattikkhaṇe eva atīta”nti vuttattā “gotrabhucittaṃ tattha pakkhandatī”ti vacanameva
tika-vin06t:513_18: virujjhatīti ācariyo. “Ekacittakkhaṇikampi lokuttaracittaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkarotī”ti
tika-vin06t:513_19: vuttattā “ekacittakkhaṇikassāpi jhānassa etāni dasa lakkhaṇānī”ti vuttaṃ. “Tato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin06t:513_20: āsevanā bhāvanā evā”tipi vuttaṃ. “Adhiṭṭhānasampannanti adhiṭṭhānena sahagata”nti
tika-vin06t:513_21: likhitaṃ. Tassattho – yañca “ādimajjhapariyosānasaṅkhāta”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ tesaṃ tiṇṇampi
tika-vin06t:513_22: kalyāṇakatāya samannāgatattā tividhakalyāṇakatañca. Evaṃ tividhacittaṃ tadadhigamamūlakānaṃ
tika-vin06t:513_23: guṇānaṃ, uparijhānādhigamassa vā padaṭṭhānaṭṭhena adhiṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tasmā cittassa
tika-vin06t:514_0: Addhamāsaṃ paṭisallīyitunti ettha ācariyā evamāhu “bhikkhūnaṃ aññamaññavadhadassanasavanasambhave
tika-vin06t:514_1: satthuno sati tassa upaddavassa abhāve upāyājānanato ‘ayaṃ asabbaññū’ti hetupatirūpakamahetuṃ
tika-vin06t:514_2: vatvā dhammissarassāpi tathāgatassa kammesvanissariyaṃ asambujjhamānā asabbadassitamadhiccamohā
tika-vin06t:514_3: bahujanā avīciparāyanā bhaveyyuṃ, tasmā so bhagavā pageva tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin06t:514_4: vadhamānabhāvaṃ ñatvā tadabhāvopāyābhāvaṃ pana suvinicchinitvā tattha puthujjanānaṃ
tika-vin06t:514_5: sugatilābhahetumevekaṃ katvā asubhadesanāya vā rūpasaddadassanasavanehi nippayojanehi
tika-vin06t:514_6: viramitvā pageva tato viramaṇato, sugatilābhahetukaraṇato, avassaṃ paññāpitabbāya
tika-vin06t:514_7: tatiyapārājikapaññattiyā vatthāgamadassanato ca attano sabbadassitaṃ parikkhakānaṃ
tika-vin06t:514_8: pakāsento viya tamaddhamāsaṃ veneyyahitanipphattiyā phalasamāpattiyā avakāsaṃ katvā
tika-vin06t:514_11: ca santike sutapubbā. Tato aññe eketi veditabbā. “Sakena kāyena aṭṭīyanti…pe… bhavissantī”ti
tika-vin06t:514_12: idaṃ parato “ye te bhikkhū avītarāgā, tesaṃ tasmiṃ samaye hoti eva bhayaṃ, hoti lomahaṃso,
tika-vin06t:514_13: hoti chambhitatta”nti iminā na yujjati, idañca bhagavato asubhakathārammaṇappayojanena
tika-vin06t:514_14: na sametīti ce? Na, tadatthājānanato. Sakena kāyena aṭṭīyantānampi tesaṃ ariyamaggena
tika-vin06t:514_15: appahīnasinehattā khīṇāsavānaṃ viya maraṇaṃ paṭicca abhayaṃ na hoti, bhayañca pana
tika-vin06t:514_16: asubhabhāvanānuyogānubhāvena mandībhūtaṃ anaṭṭīyantānaṃ viya na mahantaṃ hutvā cittaṃ
tika-vin06t:514_17: mohesi. Apāyupage te satte nākāsīti evamattho veditabbo. Atha vā idaṃ purimassa kāraṇavacanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:514_18: yasmā tesaṃ tasmiṃ samaye hoti eva bhayaṃ, chambhitattaṃ, lomahaṃso ca, tasmā “tena
tika-vin06t:514_19: kho pana samayena bhagavā asubhakathaṃ kathetī”tiādi vuttanti.
tika-vin06t:515_0: Atha vā sakena kāyena aṭṭīyantānampi tesaṃ hoti eva bhayaṃ, mahānubhāvā vītarāgāti
tika-vin06t:515_1: khīṇāsavānaṃ mahantaṃ visesaṃ dasseti, atiduppasaheyyamidaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ, yato evaṃvidhānampi
tika-vin06t:515_2: avītarāgattā bhayaṃ hotītipi dasseti. Tadaññe tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pañcasatānaṃ aññatarā.
tika-vin06t:515_3: Tenedaṃ dīpeti “taṃ tathā āgataṃ asihatthaṃ vadhakaṃ passitvā tadaññesampi hoti eva
tika-vin06t:515_4: bhayaṃ, pageva tesanti katvā bhagavā paṭhamameva tesaṃ asubhakathaṃ kathesi, parato
tika-vin06t:515_5: tesaṃ nāhosi. Evaṃ mahānisaṃsā nesaṃ asubhakathā āsī”ti. Yo panettha pacchimo nayo,
tika-vin06t:515_6: so “tesu kira bhikkhūsu kenacipi kāyavikāro vā vacīvikāro vā na kato, sabbe satā
tika-vin06t:515_7: sampajānā dakkhiṇena passena nipajjiṃsū”ti iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanena sameti.
tika-vin06t:516_0: Apare panāhūti kuladdhipaṭisedhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. “Ayaṃ kira laddhī”ti vacanaṃ “māradheyyaṃnātikkamissatī”ti
tika-vin06t:516_1: vacanena virujjhatīti ce? Na virujjhati. Kathaṃ? Ayaṃ bhikkhū aghātento māravisayaṃ
tika-vin06t:516_2: atikkamissati akusalakaraṇato ca. Ghātento pana māradheyyaṃ nātikkamissati balavattā
tika-vin06t:516_3: kammassāti sayaṃ mārapakkhikattā evaṃ cintetvā pana “ye na matā, te saṃsārato na
tika-vin06t:516_4: muttā”ti attano ca laddhi, tasmā taṃ tattha ubhayesaṃ magge niyojentī evamāha, teneva
tika-vin06t:516_6: kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yasmā mārassa anuvatti, tasmā evaṃ cintetvāpi attano laddhivasena
tika-vin06t:516_7: evamāhā”ti keci likhanti. Mama santike ekato upaṭṭhānamāgacchanti, attano attano
tika-vin06t:518_0: 165. Ayampi kho, bhikkhaveti iminā kiṃ dasseti? Yesaṃ evamassa “bhagavatā ācikkhitakammaṭṭhānānuyogapaccayā
tika-vin06t:518_1: tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jīvitakkhayo āsī”ti, tesaṃ taṃ micchāgāhaṃ nisedheti. Kevalaṃ tesaṃ
tika-vin06t:518_2: bhikkhūnaṃ pubbe katakammapaccayāva jīvitakkhayo āsi, idaṃ pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ tesaṃ
tika-vin06t:518_5: upanissayo hutvā, kesañci sugatiyaṃ uppattiyā upanissayo ahosīti sātthikāva me asubhakathā,
tika-vin06t:518_6: kintu “sādhu, bhante bhagavā, aññaṃ pariyāyaṃ ācikkhatū”ti ānandena yācitattā aññaṃ
tika-vin06t:518_7: pariyāyaṃ ācikkhāmi, yathā vo pubbe ācikkhitaasubhakammaṭṭhānānuyogā, evaṃ ayampi
tika-vin06t:518_8: kho bhikkhaveti yojanā veditabbā. “Assāsavasena upaṭṭhānaṃ satī”ti vuttaṃ. Sā hi
tika-vin06t:518_9: taṃ assāsaṃ, passāsaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ katvā pubbabhāge, aparabhāge pana assāsapassāsapabhavanimittaṃ
tika-vin06t:518_10: ārammaṇaṃ katvā upaṭṭhātīti ca tathā vuttā.
tika-vin06t:519_0: Asubhe pavattaṃ asubhanti vā pavattaṃ bhāvanākammaṃ asubhakammaṃ, tadeva aññassa
tika-vin06t:519_1: punappunaṃ uppajjanakassa kāraṇaṭṭhena ṭhānattā asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ vā
tika-vin06t:519_2: asubhakammassa padaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ṭhānanti asubhakammaṭṭhānanti idha asubhajjhānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:519_5: nibbuto. Parikammaṃ vāti kasiṇaparikammaṃ kira nimittuppādapariyosānaṃ. Tadā hi nirassādattā
tika-vin06t:519_6: asantaṃ, appaṇihitañca. Yathā upacāre nīvaraṇavigamena, aṅgapātubhāvena ca santatā
tika-vin06t:519_7: hoti, na tathā idha, idaṃ pana “ādisamannāhārato”ti vuttaṃ. Dutiyavikappe asecanakoti
tika-vin06t:519_8: atittikaro, tena vuttaṃ “ojavanto”ti. Cetasikasukhaṃ jhānakkhaṇepi atthi, evaṃ santepi
tika-vin06t:519_9: “ubhopi jhānā vuṭṭhitasseva gahetabbā”ti vuttaṃ. Samathena sakasantāne avikkhambhite.
tika-vin06t:519_10: Itarathā pāpakānaṃ jhānena sahuppatti siyā. Khandhādīnaṃ lokuttarapādakattā nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:519_11: visesena yassa nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ hoti, taṃ sandhāya vā. “Aniccānupassītiādicatukkavasena
tika-vin06t:519_12: anupubbena ariyamaggavuḍḍhippatto samucchindati, sesānametaṃ natthī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:520_0: Tathābhāvapaṭisedhano cāti soḷasavatthukassa titthiyānaṃ natthitāya vuttaṃ. Sabbapaṭhamānaṃ
tika-vin06t:520_1: pana catunnaṃ padānaṃ vasena lokiyajjhānameva tesaṃ atthi, tasmiṃ lokuttarapadaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:520_2: natthi eva. “Phalamuttamanti phale uttama”nti vuttaṃ. Ututtayānukūlanti gimhe araññe,
tika-vin06t:520_3: hemante rukkhamūle, vasantakāle suññāgāre gato. Semhadhātukassa araññaṃ, pittadhātukassa
tika-vin06t:520_4: rukkhamūlaṃ, vātadhātukassa suññāgāraṃ anukūlaṃ. Mohacaritassa araññaṃ anukūlaṃ mahāaraññe
tika-vin06t:520_5: cittaṃ na saṅkuṭati, dosacaritassa rukkhamūlaṃ, rāgacaritassa suññāgāraṃ. Ṭhānacaṅkamāni
tika-vin06t:520_6: uddhaccapakkhikāni, sayanaṃ līnapakkhikaṃ, pallaṅkābhujanena nisajjāya daḷhabhāvaṃ,
tika-vin06t:520_7: ujukāyaṃ paṇidhānena assāsapassāsānaṃ pavattanasukhaṃ “parimukhaṃ sati”nti iminā
tika-vin06t:520_8: ārammaṇapariggahūpāyaṃ dasseti. Kārīti karaṇasīlo. Etassa vibhaṅge “assasati passasatī”ti
tika-vin06t:520_9: avatvā “sato kārī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā “assasati passasatī”ti vutte “paṭhamacatukkaṃ
tika-vin06t:520_10: eva labbhati, na sesānī”ti ca “dīghaṃassāsavasenāti alopasamāsaṃ katvā”iti ca “ekatthatāya
tika-vin06t:520_11: avikkhepa”nti ca “asambhogavasena pajānato”ti ca “tena ñāṇenā”ti ca “pajānatoti vuttañāṇenā”ti
tika-vin06t:520_13: ca likhitaṃ. Uppaṭipāṭiyā āgatampi yujjateva, tena ṭhānena paṭisiddhaṃ. Tāluṃ āhacca
tika-vin06t:520_14: nibbāyanato kira potako sampatijātova khipitasaddaṃ karoti, chandapāmojjavasena cha
tika-vin06t:520_15: purimā tayoti nava. Ekenākārenāti assāsavasena vā passāsavasena vā evaṃ ānāpānassatiṃ
tika-vin06t:521_0: Kāyoti assāsapassāsā. Upaṭṭhānaṃ sati. Dīghanti sīghaṃ gataṃ assāsapassāsaṃ. Addhānasaṅkhāteti
tika-vin06t:521_1: kālasaṅkhāte viya kālakoṭṭhāseti attho, dīghakāle vāti attho. Eko hi assāsamevūpalakkheti,
tika-vin06t:521_2: eko passāsaṃ, eko ubhayaṃ, tasmā “vibhāgaṃ akatvā”ti vā vuttaṃ, chandoti evaṃ assāsato,
tika-vin06t:521_3: passāsato ca assādo uppajjati, tassa vasena kattukamyatāchando uppajjati. Tato pāmojjanti.
tika-vin06t:521_4: Assāsapassāsānaṃ duviññeyyavisayattā cittaṃ vivattati, gaṇanaṃ pahāya phuṭṭhaṭṭhānameva
tika-vin06t:521_5: manasi karontassa kevalaṃ upekkhāva saṇṭhāti. Cattāro vaṇṇāti “pattassa tayo vaṇṇā”tiādīsu
tika-vin06t:522_0: Tathābhūtassāti ānāpānassatiṃ bhāvayato. Saṃvaroti satisaṃvaro. Atha vā paṭhamena
tika-vin06t:522_1: jhānena nīvaraṇānaṃ, dutiyena vitakkavicārānaṃ, tatiyena pītiyā, catutthena sukhadukkhānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:522_2: ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā rūpasaññāya, paṭighasaññāya, nānattasaññāya vā pahānaṃ.
tika-vin06t:522_3: “Sīlanti veramaṇi sīlaṃ, cetanā sīlaṃ, saṃvaro sīlaṃ, avītikkamo sīla”nti vuttavidhināpettha
tika-vin06t:522_4: attho daṭṭhabbo. “Atthato tathā tathā pavattadhammā upadhāraṇasamādhānasaṅkhātena
tika-vin06t:522_5: sīlanaṭṭhena sīlanti vuccantī”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā “ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti
tika-vin06t:522_6: etthāpi cetanāsīlameva, katthaci viratisīlampīti attho daṭṭhabbo. Aññathā paṇṇattivajjesupi
tika-vin06t:522_7: sikkhāpadesu viratippasaṅgo ahosi, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatīti katvā tassāpi
tika-vin06t:522_8: viratippasaṅgo. Tasmiṃ ārammaṇeti ānāpānārammaṇe. Tāya satiyāti tattha uppannasatiyā.
tika-vin06t:522_9: “Tena manasikārenāti āvajjanenā”ti likhitaṃ. Etena nānāvajjanappavattidīpanato nānājavanavārehipi
tika-vin06t:522_10: sikkhati nāmāti dīpitaṃ hoti, yena pana manasikārena vā. Ñāṇuppādanādīsūti ettha
tika-vin06t:522_11: ādisaddena yāva pariyosānaṃ veditabbaṃ. “Tatrāti tasmiṃ ānāpānārammaṇe. Evanti idāni
tika-vin06t:522_12: vattabbanayenā”ti likhitaṃ. Tatrāti tesaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ vā. Tañhi “pubbe apariggahitakāle”ti
tika-vin06t:522_13: iminā suṭṭhu sameti. “Paṭhamavādo dīghabhāṇakānaṃ. Te hi ‘paṭhamajjhānaṃ labhitvā
tika-vin06t:522_14: nānāsane nisīditvā dutiyatthāya vāyāmato upacāre vitakkavicāravasena oḷārikacittappavattikāle
tika-vin06t:522_16: ekāsanapaṭilābhe ca uparūpari cittappavattiyā santabhāvato paṭhamato dutiyassupacāre
tika-vin06t:523_0: Vipassanāyaṃ panāti catudhātuvavatthānamukhena abhiniviṭṭhassa ayaṃ kamo, aññassa
tika-vin06t:523_1: cāti veditabbaṃ. Ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, na ito aññanti dassanaṃ sandhāya “sakalarūpapariggahe”ti
tika-vin06t:523_3: balavatī vipassanā. Pubbe vuttanayenāti sabbesaṃyeva pana matena apariggahitakāletiādinā.
tika-vin06t:523_4: Sodhanā nāma vissajjanaṃ. Assāti “passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti padassa.
tika-vin06t:524_0: Purato namanā ānamanā. Tiriyaṃ namanā vinamanā. Suṭṭhu namanā sannamanā. Pacchā namanā
tika-vin06t:524_1: paṇamanā. Jāṇuke gahetvā ṭhānaṃ viya iñjanāti ānamanādīnaṃ āvibhāvatthamuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:524_2: Yathārūpehi ānamanādi vā kampanādi vā hoti, tathārūpe passambhayanti sambandho. Iti
tika-vin06t:524_3: kirāti iti ce. Evaṃ santeti santasukhumampi ce passambhati. Pabhāvanāti uppādanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:524_4: Assāsapassāsānaṃ vūpasantattā ānāpānassatisamādhissa bhāvanā na hoti. Yasmā taṃ natthi,
tika-vin06t:524_5: tasmā na samāpajjati, samāpattiyā abhāvena na vuṭṭhahanti. Iti kirāti evametaṃ tāva
tika-vin06t:524_6: vacananti tadetaṃ. Saddova saddanimittaṃ, “sato assasati sato passasatī”ti padāni
tika-vin06t:525_0: Appaṭipīḷananti tesaṃ kilesānaṃ anuppādanaṃ kiñcāpi cetiyaṅgaṇavattādīnipi atthato
tika-vin06t:525_1: pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle saṅgahaṃ gacchanti “yassa siyā āpattī”ti vacanato. Tathāpi
tika-vin06t:525_2: “na tāva, sāriputta, satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti uddisati pātimokkhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:525_3: yāva na idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṅghe pātubhavantī”ti ettha anadhippetattā
tika-vin06t:525_4: “ābhisamācārika”nti vuttaṃ. “Yaṃ panettha āpattiṭṭhāniyaṃ na hoti, taṃ amissamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:526_1: Pañcasandhikaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti ettha jhānampi nimittampi tadatthajotikāpi pariyatti
tika-vin06t:526_2: idha kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Gamanāgamanasampannatādi senāsanaṃ. Saṃkiliṭṭhacīvaradhovanādayo
tika-vin06t:527_0: Ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatenāti niyakajjhatte vikkhepagatena. Sāraddhā asamāhitattā. Upanibandhanathambhamūlaṃ
tika-vin06t:527_1: nāma nāsikaggaṃ, mukhanimittaṃ vā. Tatthevāti nāsikaggādinimitte. “Dolāphalakassa
tika-vin06t:527_2: ekapasse eva ubho koṭiyo majjhañca passatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:528_0: Idha panāti kakacūpame. Desatoti phusanakaṭṭhānato. “Nimittaṃ paṭṭhapetabbanti nimitte
tika-vin06t:528_1: sati paṭṭhapetabbā”ti vuttaṃ. Garūhi bhāvetabbattā garukabhāvanaṃ. Ekacce āhūti ekacce jhāyino āhu.
tika-vin06t:529_0: “Saññānānatāyā”ti vacanato ekaccehi vuttampi pamāṇameva, saṅgītito paṭṭhāya aṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin06t:529_1: anāgatattā tathā vuttaṃ. “Mayhaṃ tārakarūpaṃ nu kho upaṭṭhātī”tiādiparikappe asatipi
tika-vin06t:529_2: dhātunānattena etāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ uppatti viya kevalaṃ bhāvayato tathā tathā upaṭṭhāti.
tika-vin06t:529_3: “Na nimitta’nti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati sampajānamusāvādattā”ti vuttaṃ. Kammaṭṭhānanti
tika-vin06t:530_0: Nimitte paṭibhāge. Nānākāranti “cattāro vaṇṇā vattantī”ti vuttanānāvidhataṃ. Vibhāvayanti
tika-vin06t:530_1: jānaṃ pakāsayaṃ. Assāsapassāseti tato sambhūte nimitte, assāsapassāse vā nānākāraṃ.
tika-vin06t:530_2: Nimitte hi cittaṃ ṭhapentova nānākāratañca vibhāveti, assāsapassāse vā sakaṃ cittaṃ
tika-vin06t:531_0: Aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittanti āsannabhavaṅgattāti kāraṇaṃ vatvā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-vin06t:531_1: Kasmā? Yasmā chaṭṭhe, sattame vā appanāya sati maggavīthiyaṃ phalassa okāso na hoti,
tika-vin06t:531_2: tasmā. Idha hotūti ce? Na, lokiyappanāpi hi appanāvīthimhi lokuttarena samānagatikāvāti
tika-vin06t:531_3: paṭiladdhajjhānopi bhikkhu diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthāya jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā sattāhaṃ
tika-vin06t:531_4: nisīditukāmo catutthe, pañcame vā appetvā nisīdati, na chaṭṭhe, sattame vā. Tattha
tika-vin06t:531_5: hi appanā. Tato paraṃ appanāya ādhārabhāvaṃ na gacchati. Āsannabhavaṅgattā catutthaṃ,
tika-vin06t:531_6: pañcamaṃ vā gacchati thale ṭhitaghaṭo viya javanānamantare ṭhitattāti kira ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:532_0: Puthuttārammaṇāni anāvajjitvā jhānaṅgāneva āvajjanaṃ āvajjanavasī nāma. Tato paraṃ
tika-vin06t:532_1: catunnaṃ, pañcannaṃ vā paccavekkhaṇacittānaṃ uppajjanaṃ, taṃ paccavekkhaṇavasī nāma.
tika-vin06t:532_2: Teneva “paccavekkhaṇavasī pana āvajjanavasiyā eva vuttā”ti vuttaṃ. Samāpajjanavasī
tika-vin06t:532_3: nāma yattakaṃ kālaṃ icchati tattakaṃ samāpajjanaṃ, taṃ pana icchitakālaparicchedaṃ
tika-vin06t:532_4: patiṭṭhāpetuṃ samatthatāti. “Adhiṭṭhānavasiyā vuṭṭhānavasino ayaṃ nānattaṃ adhiṭṭhānānubhāvena
tika-vin06t:532_5: javanaṃ javati, vuṭṭhānānubhāvena pana adhippetato adhikaṃ javatī”tipi vadanti. Apica
tika-vin06t:532_6: pathavīkasiṇādiārammaṇaṃ āvajjitvā javanañca javitvā puna āvajjitvā tato pañcamaṃ
tika-vin06t:532_7: jhānaṃ cittaṃ hoti, ayaṃ kira ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo. Bhagavato pana āvajjanasamanantarameva
tika-vin06t:533_0: “Vatthunti hadayavatthuṃ. Dvāranti cakkhādi. Ārammaṇanti rūpādī”ti likhitaṃ. Yathāpariggahitarūpārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:533_1: vā viññāṇaṃ passati, aññathāpi passati. Kathaṃ? “Yathāpariggahitarūpavatthudvārārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:533_2: vā”ti vuttaṃ. Yathāpariggahitarūpesu vatthudvārārammaṇāni yassa viññāṇassa, taṃ viññāṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:533_3: yathāpariggahitarūpavatthudvārārammaṇaṃ tampi passati, ekassa vā ārammaṇasaddassa
tika-vin06t:533_4: lopo daṭṭhabboti ca mama takko vicāretvāva gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:534_0: Tato paraṃ tīsu catukkesu dve dve padāni ekamekaṃ katvā gaṇetabbaṃ. Samathena ārammaṇato
tika-vin06t:534_2: pana “ārammaṇato asammohato”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ, idha tato vuttanayato uppaṭipāṭiyā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:534_3: Tattha hi yena mohena taṃ dukkhaṃ paṭicchannaṃ, na upaṭṭhāti, tassa vihatattā vā
tika-vin06t:534_4: evaṃ pavatte ñāṇe yathāruci paccavekkhituṃ icchiticchitakāle samatthabhāvato vā dukkhādīsu
tika-vin06t:534_5: tīsu asammohato ñāṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Nirodhe ārammaṇato taṃsampayuttā pītipaṭisaṃvedanā
tika-vin06t:534_6: asammohato na sambhavati mohappahānābhāvā, paṭisambhidāpāḷivirodhato ca. Tattha “dīghaṃ
tika-vin06t:534_7: assāsavasenā”tiādi ārammaṇato dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā
tika-vin06t:534_8: hoti tadārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattāti ettha adhippāyo. “Āvajjato”tiādi asammohato
tika-vin06t:534_9: pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Aniccādivasena jānato, passato, paccavekkhato
tika-vin06t:534_10: ca. Tadadhimuttatāvasena adhiṭṭhahato, adhimuccato, tathā vīriyādiṃ samādahato khaṇikasamādhinā.
tika-vin06t:535_0: Abhiññeyyanti ñātapariññāya. Pariññeyyanti tīraṇapariññāya. Sabbañhi dukkhasaccaṃ
tika-vin06t:535_1: abhiññeyyaṃ, pariññeyyañca. Tatra cāyaṃ pītīti likhitaṃ. Abhiññeyyantiādi maggakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:535_2: sandhāyāhāti vuttaṃ. Maggena asammohasaṅkhātavipassanākiccanipphattito maggopi abhiññeyyādiārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:535_3: karonto viya vutto. Vipassanābhūmidassanatthanti samathe kāyikasukhābhāvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:535_4: Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesūti cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī…pe… sikkhati passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī…pe…
tika-vin06t:535_5: sikkhatīti etesu. Modanādi sabbaṃ pītivevacanaṃ. Aniccānupassanādi kilese, tammūlake
tika-vin06t:535_6: khandhābhisaṅkhāre. Evaṃ bhāvitoti na catukkapañcakajjhānanibbattanena bhāvito. Evaṃ
tika-vin06t:538_0: 172. Ussukkavacananti pākaṭasaddasaññā kira, samānakapadanti vuttaṃ hoti. “Sutvā
tika-vin06t:538_1: bhuñjantī”ti ettha viya sañcicca voropetukāmassa sañciccapadaṃ voropanapadassa ussukkaṃ,
tika-vin06t:538_2: sañcetanā ca jīvitā voropanañca ekassevāti vuttaṃ hoti. Na kevalaṃ cetasikamatteneva
tika-vin06t:538_3: hoti, payogopi icchitabbo evāti dassetuṃ vuttānīti kira upatissatthero. “Jānitvā
tika-vin06t:538_4: sañjānitvā cecca abhivitaritvā”ti vattabbe “jānanto…pe… vītikkamo”ti voropanampi
tika-vin06t:538_5: dassitaṃ, tasmā byañjane ādaraṃ akatvā attho dassito. Vītikkamasaṅkhātatthasiddhiyā
tika-vin06t:538_6: hi purimacetanā atthasādhikā hoti. Sabbasukhumaattabhāvanti rūpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:538_7: na arūpaṃ. Attasaṅkhātānañhi arūpānaṃ khandhavibhaṅge viya idha oḷārikasukhumatā
tika-vin06t:538_8: anadhippetā. Mātukucchisminti yebhuyyavacanaṃ, opapātikamanussepi pārājikameva, arūpakāye
tika-vin06t:538_9: upakkamābhāvā taggahaṇaṃ kasmāti ce? Arūpakkhandhena saddhiṃ tasseva rūpakāyassa
tika-vin06t:538_10: jīvitindriyasambhavato. Tena sajīvakova manussaviggahopi nāma hotīti siddhaṃ. Ettha
tika-vin06t:538_11: mātukucchisminti manussamātuyā vā tiracchānamātuyā vā. Vuttañhi parivāre –
tika-vin06t:539: “Itthiṃ hane ca mātaraṃ, purisañca pitaraṃ hane;
tika-vin06t:540: Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā, na tenānantaraṃ phuse;
tika-vin06t:542_0: Paṭhamanti paṭisandhicittameva. Ekabhavapariyāpannāya hi cittasantatiyā paṭisandhicittaṃ
tika-vin06t:542_1: paṭhamacittaṃ nāma. Cuticittaṃ pacchimaṃ nāma. Aññathā anamatagge saṃsāre paṭhamacittaṃ
tika-vin06t:542_2: nāma natthi vinā anantarasamanantaranatthivigatapaccayehi cittuppattiyā abhāvato.
tika-vin06t:542_3: Bhāve vā navasattapātubhāvadosappasaṅgo. Ayaṃ sabbapaṭhamo manussaviggahoti kiñcāpi
tika-vin06t:542_4: imaṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ na sakkā, taṃ ādiṃ katvā santatiyā yāva maraṇā uppajjanakamanussaviggahesu
tika-vin06t:542_5: aparimāṇesu “sabbapaṭhamo”ti dissati. Yadā pana yo manussaviggaho pubbāpariyavasena
tika-vin06t:542_6: santatippatto hoti, tadā taṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ sakkā. Santatiṃ vikopento hi jīvitā
tika-vin06t:542_7: voropeti nāma. Ettha ca nānattanaye adhippete sati “sabbapaṭhamo”ti vacanaṃ yujjati,
tika-vin06t:542_8: na pana ekattanaye santatiyā ekattā. Ekattanayo ca idhādhippeto “santatiṃ vikopetī”ti
tika-vin06t:542_9: vacanato, tasmā “sabbapaṭhamo”ti vacanaṃ na yujjatīti ce? Na, santatipaccuppannabahuttā.
tika-vin06t:542_10: Yasmā pana santati nāma anekesaṃ pubbāpariyuppatti vuccati, tasmā “ayaṃ sabbapaṭhamo”ti
tika-vin06t:542_11: vutto, evamettha dvepi nayā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti, aññathā “santatiṃ vikopetī”ti idaṃ
tika-vin06t:542_12: vacanaṃ na sijjhati. Kiñcāpi ettha “santatiṃ vikopetī”ti vacanato santatipaccuppannameva
tika-vin06t:542_13: adhippetaṃ, na addhāpaccuppannaṃ viya dissati, tathāpi yasmā santatipaccuppanne vikopite
tika-vin06t:542_14: addhāpaccuppannaṃ vikopitameva hoti, addhāpaccuppanne pana vikopite santatipaccuppannaṃ
tika-vin06t:542_15: vikopitaṃ hotīti ettha vattabbaṃ natthi. Tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tadubhayampi voropetuṃ
tika-vin06t:542_16: sakkā, tasmā tadeva sandhāya ‘santatiṃ vikopetī’ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabba”nti āha.
tika-vin06t:542_17: “Santatiṃ vikopetī”ti vacanato pakatiyā āyupariyantaṃ patvā maraṇakasatte vītikkame
tika-vin06t:542_18: sati anāpatti vītikkamapaccayā santatiyā akopitattā. Vītikkamapaccayā ce āyupariyantaṃ
tika-vin06t:542_19: appatvā antarāva maraṇakasatte vītikkamapaccayā āpatti, kammabaddho cāti no takkoti
tika-vin06t:542_20: ācariyo. “Maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyya, maraṇāya vā samādapeyya, ayampi pārājiko hoti
tika-vin06t:542_21: asaṃvāso”ti vacanato vā cetanākkhaṇe eva pārājikāpatti ekantākusalattā, dukkhavedanattā,
tika-vin06t:543_1: vuttaṃ. Attano paṭipakkhena samannāgatattā samanantarassa paccayaṃ hontaṃ yathā pure
tika-vin06t:544_0: Ītinti sattavidhavicchikādīni yuddhe ḍaṃsitvā māraṇatthaṃ vissajjenti. Pajjarakanti
tika-vin06t:544_1: sarīraḍāhaṃ. Sūcikanti sūlaṃ. Visūcikanti sukkhamātisāraṃvasayaṃ. Pakkhandiyanti
tika-vin06t:544_2: rattātisāraṃ. Dvattibyāmasatappamāṇe mahākāye nimminitvā ṭhitanāguddharaṇaṃ, kujjhitvā
tika-vin06t:544_3: olokite paresaṃ kāye visamaraṇaṃ vā ḍāhuppādanaṃ vā payogo nāma.
tika-vin06t:545_0: Kecīti mahāsaṅghikā. Ayaṃ itthī. Kulumbassāti gabbhassa. Kathaṃ sā itarassāti ce?
tika-vin06t:545_1: Tassa duṭṭhena manasānupakkhite so ca gabbho sā ca iddhīti ubhayampi saheva nassati,
tika-vin06t:545_2: ghaṭaggīnaṃ bhedanibbāyanaṃ viya ekakkhaṇe hoti. “Tesaṃ suttantikesu ocariyamānaṃ
tika-vin06t:545_3: na sametī”ti likhitaṃ, “tesaṃ mataṃ gahetvā ‘thāvarīnampi ayaṃ yujjatī’ti vutte tikavasena
tika-vin06t:545_5: sattamāya sahuppannakāyaviññattiyā sāhatthikatā veditabbā. Āṇattike pana sattahipi
tika-vin06t:545_6: cetanāhi saha vacīviññattisambhavato sattasatta saddā ekato hutvā ekekakkharabhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:545_7: gantvā yattakehi akkharehi attano adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti, tadavasānakkharasamuṭṭhāpikāya
tika-vin06t:545_8: sattamacetanāya sahajātavacīviññattiyā āṇattikatā veditabbā. Tathā vijjāmayapayoge.
tika-vin06t:545_9: Kāyenāṇattiyaṃ pana sāhatthike vuttanayova. Thāvarapayoge yāvatā parassa maraṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:545_10: hoti, tāvatā kammabaddho, āpatti ca. Tato paraṃ atisañcaraṇe kammabaddhātibahuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:545_11: veditabbaṃ sati paraṃ maraṇe. Pārājikāpatti panettha ekā. Atthasādhakacetanā yasmā
tika-vin06t:545_12: ettha ca dutiyapārājike ca labbhati, na aññattha, tasmā dvinnampi sādhāraṇā imā gāthāyo –
tika-vin06t:559: Abhidhamme na sabbatthi, tattha sā niyatā siyā.
tika-vin06t:571: Mato sutto pabuddho vā, kusalo vadhako siyā.
tika-vin06t:573: Siyā tathā gato siddho, sahatthā vadhakacetanā”ti.
tika-vin06t:574_0: Yāni pana bījautukammadhammacittaniyāmāni pañca aṭṭhakathāya ānetvā nidassitāni,
tika-vin06t:574_1: tesu ayamatthasādhakacetanā yogaṃ gacchatīti maññe “ayaṃ atthasādhakacetanāniyamo
tika-vin06t:574_3: yena, tena sabbepi yathāsambhavaṃ kammacittaniyāme bhajanti gacchantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:574_4: Jīvite ādīnavo maraṇavaṇṇadassane na vibhattova, idha pana saṅkappapade atthato “maraṇasaññī
tika-vin06t:574_5: maraṇacetano maraṇādhippāyo”ti evaṃ avibhūtattā vibhatto, apākaṭattā, anoḷārikattā
tika-vin06t:574_6: vā avibhāgā kāritā vā. Nayidaṃ vitakkassa nāmanti na vitakkasseva nāmaṃ, kintu saññācetanānampi
tika-vin06t:575_1: vuttaṃ. Anuddesike kammassārammaṇaṃ so vā hoti, añño vā. Ubhayehīti kiñcāpi paṭhamappahāro
tika-vin06t:575_2: na sayameva sakkoti, dutiyaṃ labhitvā pana sakkonto jīvitavināsanahetu ahosi, tadatthameva
tika-vin06t:575_3: hi vadhakena so dinno, dutiyo pana aññena cittena dinno, tena suṭṭhu vuttaṃ “paṭhamappahārenevā”ti,
tika-vin06t:575_4: “cetanā nāma dāruṇāti garuṃ vatthuṃ ārabbha pavattapubbabhāgacetanā pakatisabhāvavadhakacetanā,
tika-vin06t:575_5: no dāruṇā hotī”ti ācariyena likhitaṃ. “Pubbabhāgacetanā parivārā, vadhakacetanāva
tika-vin06t:575_6: dāruṇā hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Yathādhippāyanti ubhopi paṭivijjhati, sāhatthikopi saṅketattā na muccati kira.
tika-vin06t:576_0: Kiriyāviseso aṭṭhakathāsu anāgato. “Evaṃ vijjha, evaṃ pahara, evaṃ ghāhehī’ti pāḷiyā
tika-vin06t:576_1: sametīti ācariyena gahito”ti vadanti. Purato paharitvātiādi vatthuvisaṅketameva kira.
tika-vin06t:576_2: Etaṃ gāme ṭhitanti puggalova niyamito. Yo pana liṅgavasena “dīghaṃ…pe… mārehī”ti
tika-vin06t:576_3: āṇāpeti aniyametvā. Yadi niyametvā vadati, “etaṃ dīgha”nti vadeyyāti apare. Ācariyā
tika-vin06t:576_4: pana “dīghanti vutte niyamitaṃ hoti, evaṃ aniyametvā vadati, na pana āṇāpako dīghādīsu
tika-vin06t:576_5: aññataraṃ mārehīti adhippāyo”ti vadanti kira. “Attho pana cittena ekaṃ sandhāyapi
tika-vin06t:576_6: aniyametvā āṇāpetī”ti likhitaṃ. “Itaro aññaṃ tādisaṃ māreti, āṇāpako muccatī”ti vuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:576_7: yathādhippāyaṃ na gatattā. “Evaṃ dīghādivasenāpi cittena aniyamitassevāti yuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:576_8: viya dissatī”ti aññatarasmiṃ gaṇṭhipade likhitaṃ, suṭṭhu vīmaṃsitvā sabbaṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:576_9: okāsassa niyamitattāti ettha okāsaniyamaṃ katvā niddisanto tasmiṃ okāse nisinnaṃ
tika-vin06t:576_10: māretukāmova hoti, sayaṃ pana tadā tattha natthi. Tasmā okāsena saha attano jīvitindriyaṃ
tika-vin06t:576_11: ārammaṇaṃ na hoti, tena attanā mārāpito paro eva mārāpito. Kathaṃ? Sayaṃ rasso ca
tika-vin06t:576_12: tanuko ca hutvā pubbabhāge attānaṃ sandhāya āṇattikkhaṇe “dīghaṃ rassaṃ thūlaṃ balavantaṃ
tika-vin06t:576_13: mārehī”ti āṇāpentassa cittaṃ attani tassākārassa natthitāya aññassa tādisassa jīvitindriyaṃ
tika-vin06t:576_14: ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattati, tena mūlaṭṭhassa kammabaddho. Evaṃsampadamidanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:577_0: Dūtaparamparāniddese āṇāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Itarassa āroceti, āpatti dukkaṭassāti
tika-vin06t:577_1: ācariyantevāsīnaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ ārocane, paṭiggaṇhane dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:577_2: Na vadhako paṭiggaṇhāti, tassa dukkaṭanti siddhaṃ hoti. Taṃ pana okāsābhāvato na
tika-vin06t:577_3: vuttaṃ. Mūlaṭṭhena āpajjitabbāpattiyā hi tassa okāso aparicchinno, tenassa tasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:577_4: okāse thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ. Vadhako ce paṭiggaṇhāti, mūlaṭṭho ācariyo pubbe āpannadukkaṭena
tika-vin06t:577_5: saha thullaccayampi āpajjati. Kasmā? Mahājano hi tena pāpe niyojitoti. Idaṃ pana
tika-vin06t:577_6: dukkaṭathullaccayaṃ vadhako ce tamatthaṃ na sāveti āpajjati. Yadi sāveti, pārājikamevāpajjati.
tika-vin06t:577_7: Kasmā? Atthasādhakacetanāya abhāvā. Anugaṇṭhipade pana “paṭiggaṇhati, taṃ dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin06t:577_8: hoti. Yadi evaṃ kasmā pāṭhe na vuttanti ce? Vadhako pana ‘sādhu karomī’ti paṭiggaṇhitvā
tika-vin06t:577_9: taṃ na karoti. Evañhi niyame ‘mūlaṭṭhassa kiṃ nāma hoti, kimassa dukkaṭāpattī’ti
tika-vin06t:577_11: “Vadhako paṭiggaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassa, mūlaṭṭhassa ca āpatti thullaccayassā”ti
tika-vin06t:577_12: vuttaṃ na silissati, mūlaṭṭhena āpajjitabbāpattidassanādhikārattā vadhako paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:578_0: Visakkiyadūtapadaniddese “vattukāmatāya ca kicchenettha vatvā payojanaṃ natthīti
tika-vin06t:578_1: bhagavatā na vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana “mūlaṭṭhasseva dukkaṭa”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:578_2: vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ vicāraṇā – ācariyena āṇattena buddharakkhitena tadatthe saṅgharakkhitasseva
tika-vin06t:578_3: ārocite kiñcāpi yo “sādhū”ti paṭiggaṇhāti, atha kho ācariyassevetaṃ dukkaṭaṃ visaṅketattā,
tika-vin06t:578_4: na buddharakkhitassa, kasmā? Atthasādhakacetanāya āpannattā. Teneva “āṇāpakassa ca
tika-vin06t:578_5: vadhakassa ca āpatti pārājikassā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ pana mūlaṭṭhena āpajjitabbadukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin06t:579_0: Avisaṅkete “mūlaṭṭhassa āpatti thullaccayassā”ti vuttattā visaṅkete āpatti dukkaṭassāti
tika-vin06t:579_1: siddhanti veditabbaṃ. “Vadhako paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti idaṃ pana dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin06t:579_2: vadhakasseva. So hi paṭhamaṃ āṇāpakaṃ buddharakkhitaṃ pārājikāpattiṃ pāpetvā sayaṃ
tika-vin06t:579_3: jīvitā voropetvā āpajjissatīti kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ “so taṃ jīvitā voropeti, āṇāpakassa
tika-vin06t:579_4: ca vadhakassa ca āpatti pārājikassā”ti na vuttaṃ, tathāpi taṃ atthato vuttameva,
tika-vin06t:579_5: “yato pārājikaṃ paññatta”nti pubbe vuttanayattā ca taṃ na vuttaṃ. “So taṃ jīvitā
tika-vin06t:579_6: voropeti, āpatti sabbesaṃ pārājikassā”ti hi pubbe vuttaṃ. Ettha pubbe ācariyantevāsikānaṃ
tika-vin06t:579_7: vuttadukkaṭathullaccayāpattiyo paṭhamameva anāpannā pārājikāpattiyā āpannattā. Tathāpi
tika-vin06t:579_8: vadhakassa pārājikāpattiyā tesaṃ pārājikabhāvo pākaṭo jātoti katvā “āpatti sabbesaṃ
tika-vin06t:579_9: pārājikassā”ti ekato vuttaṃ, na tathā “āṇāpakassa, vadhakassa ca āpatti pārājikassā”ti
tika-vin06t:579_10: ettha. Kasmā? Vadhakassa dukkaṭāpattiyā āpannattā. So hi paṭhamaṃ dukkaṭāpattiṃ āpajjitvā
tika-vin06t:579_11: pacchā pārājikaṃ āpajjati. Yadi pana antevāsikā kevalaṃ ācariyassa garukatāya sāsanaṃ
tika-vin06t:579_12: ārocenti sayaṃ amaraṇādhippāyā samānā pārājikena anāpatti. Akappiyasāsanaharaṇapaccayā
tika-vin06t:579_13: dukkaṭāpatti hoti eva, imassatthassa sādhanatthaṃ dhammapadavatthūhi migaluddakassa
tika-vin06t:579_14: bhariyāya sotāpannāya dhanuususūlādidānaṃ nidassanaṃ vadanti eke. Taṃ tittirajātakena
tika-vin06t:579_15: sameti, tasmā suttañca aṭṭhakathañca anulometīti no takkoti ācariyo. Idha pana dūtaparamparāya
tika-vin06t:579_16: ca “itthannāmassa pāvada, itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ pāvadatū”ti ettha avisesetvā vuttattā
tika-vin06t:579_17: vācāya vā ārocetu, hatthamuddāya vā, paṇṇena vā, dūtena vā ārocetu, visaṅketo natthi.
tika-vin06t:579_18: Sace visesetvā mūlaṭṭho, antarādūto vā vadati, tadatikkame visaṅketoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:580_0: Idāni imasmiṃyeva adhikāradvaye anugaṇṭhipade vuttanayo vuccati – “vadhako paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:580_1: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vadhakasseva āpatti, na āṇāpakassa buddharakkhitassa. Yadi pana
tika-vin06t:580_2: so vajjhamaraṇāmaraṇesu avassamaññataraṃ karoti, buddharakkhitassāṇattikkhaṇe eva
tika-vin06t:580_4: etthāpi iti-saddo viya “vadhako paṭiggaṇhāti, mūlaṭṭhassa āpatti thullaccayassā”ti
