tika-vin06t:723_24: hotī”tiādikā, tattha “saṅghādisese thullaccayadiṭṭhi hoti, dubbhāsite saṅghādisesadiṭṭhi
tika-vin06t:723_25: hotī”ti evamādikā vinaye apakataññutāya, taṃtaṃvatthusarikkhatāya vā vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:723_26: Sabbatthāpi “pārājikadiṭṭhi hotī”ti na vuttaṃ. Tathāsaññino anāpattito. “Tabbhāgiyavicāraṇāya”nti
tika-vin06t:724_1: vacanaṃ virujjheyya. Sabhāvasarikkhāsarikkhato cāti sabhāvena sadisāsadisato. Tattha
tika-vin06t:724_3: tasseva tabbhāgiyāva hoti. Tathā vatthuvasena anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇañca
tika-vin06t:724_4: pāṭekkaṃ catubbidhampi vuttaññabhāgiyaṃ na jātaṃ, tasmā tadaññabhāgiyatāya viditāya
tika-vin06t:724_5: tabbhāgiyatā pāriyesayuttiyā avuttāpi sijjhatīti katvā “aññabhāgiyameva paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin06t:724_6: niddiṭṭha”ntipi vattuṃ yujjati. Ekaṃsena tabbhāgiyaṃ na hotīti sarikkhavasena arahattaṃ
tika-vin06t:724_7: āpatti anāpattīti vivādasabbhāvato abyākatabhāvena vivādādhikaraṇassapi aññabhāgiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:724_8: siyā, pāḷiyaṃ āpattādhikaraṇassa vuttattā evaṃ vuttaṃ, ādito paṭṭhāyāti “aññabhāgiyassa
tika-vin06t:724_9: adhikaraṇassā”ti ito paṭṭhāya. “Methunarāgena manussaviggaho dosenātiādinā sarikkhato
tika-vin06t:724_10: cā”ti likhitaṃ. Taṃ vatthuvisabhāgatāya eva siddhaṃ. Ayaṃ pana vatthusabhāgatāyapi
tika-vin06t:724_11: sati āpattisabhāgatā sarikkhatoti no takkoti ca, ekasmimpi hi vatthusmiṃ āpattibhedo
tika-vin06t:724_12: hotīti ācariyo. Parato vuttanayena veditabbanti sambandho.
tika-vin06t:725_1: kammānaṃ sabhāvaṃ. Taṃ nissāyāti pubbeva hi saṃvidhāya saṅgho kammaṃ karoti. Atha
tika-vin06t:725_2: vā purimaṃ purimanti parivāsaukkhepaniyādīni saṅghakammāni nissāya abbhānaosāraṇādi
tika-vin06t:725_3: uppannanti katvā vuttaṃ. Tasmā kiñcāpi saṅghakammameva kiccādhikaraṇaṃ, tathāpi sesaviseso labbhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin06t:726: 394. Atthato ekaṃ, tasmā desassa atthamavatvā “leso”tiādi vuttaṃ kira.
tika-vin06t:727_0: 395. Savatthukaṃ katvāti puggalassa upari āropetvā khattiyādibhāvena ekajātikopi
tika-vin06t:727_1: dīgharassakāḷakodātādīnaṃ diṭṭhasutaparisaṅkitānaṃ vasena aññabhāgiyatā, dīghaṃ khattiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:727_2: ajjhācarantaṃ disvā rassādikhattiyapaññattiyā ādhārabhāvato jātilesena codeti, ekaṃ
tika-vin06t:727_3: vā khattiyaṃ ajjhācarantaṃ disvā tato visiṭṭhaññabhāgabhūtaṃ khattiyaṃ jātilesaṃ
tika-vin06t:727_4: gahetvā “khattiyo diṭṭho tvaṃ khattiyosī”ti codeti diṭṭhādiaññabhāgena. Ettha ca
tika-vin06t:727_5: “dīghādayo, diṭṭhādayo ca jātināmādīnaṃ vatthubhūtattā adhikaraṇa”nti likhitaṃ. Taṃ
tika-vin06t:727_7: ādhāravasena adhikaraṇatā ca veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ. Tampi nāmagottato aññissā nāmagottapaññattiyā
tika-vin06t:727_8: nāma kassaci abhāvato na sabbasādhāraṇaṃ, tasmā “adhikaraṇassā”ti paduddhāraṇaṃ adhikaraṇacatukkadassanatthaṃ,
tika-vin06t:727_9: taṃ samānavacanadassanatthanti no takkoti. Tattha dīghādino vā diṭṭhādino vāti ettha
tika-vin06t:727_10: dīghāditā, diṭṭhāditā ca aññabhāgo, yo cuditako itarassa viseso yato aññoti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:728_0: 399. Lahukaṃ āpattinti pārājikato lahukāpatti saṅghādisesādi. Teneva ante taṃ dassentena
tika-vin06t:728_1: “bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āpattilesopi kimatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:728_2: jātilesādayo viya na vitthāritoti ce? Tathā asambhavatoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:729_0: 400. Sāṭakapatto sarīraṭṭhapatto. Āpattiyāti pārājikāpattiyā aññabhāgiyaṃ saṅghādisesādi,
tika-vin06t:729_1: adhikaraṇañca āpattipaññattiyā. “Leso nāma āpattibhāgo”ti vuttattā āpattibhāvaleso
tika-vin06t:729_2: vuttoti veditabbo, tasmā pārājikāpattito aññabhāgiyassa āpattipaññattiyā ādhāraṇaṭṭhena
tika-vin06t:730_0: 408. Anāpatti tathāsaññī codeti vā codāpeti vāti āpattaññabhāgiyacodanāyameva, na
tika-vin06t:730_1: aññattha. Ettāvatā paṭhamaduṭṭhadose vuttavicaraṇāya saṃsanditaṃ hoti, taṃ idha kathaṃ
tika-vin06t:730_2: paññāyatīti ce? Kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyā vacanato. Vuttañhi “tattha idha ca āpattaññabhāgiyacodanāya
tika-vin06t:731: Aññābhāgiyasikkhaṃ yo, neva sikkhati yuttito. Gacche vinayaviññūhi, aññabhāgiyatañca
tika-vin06t:736_0: 410. Tesaṃ anurūpājānanato asabbaññū assa. “Na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba”nti
tika-vin06t:736_1: vuttattā paṭikkhittameva. Tikoṭiparisuddhanti parassa pāpapasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:736_2: na paṭiccakammanivāraṇatthaṃ koṭīhīti ākārehi. Parisuddhanti vimuttaṃ. Dasahi lesehi
tika-vin06t:736_3: uddissa kataṃ samaṇā paribhuñjanti, assamaṇā imeti sāsanassa garahabhāvo āgaccheyya,
tika-vin06t:736_4: garahapaccayā loko vā apuññaṃ ariyūpavādaṃ pasaveyya, tehi vimuttanti attho. Vāguranti
tika-vin06t:736_5: migajālaṃ. Attano atthāya vātiādinā paresaṃ atthāya kate kappiyabhāvaṃ dassetvā bhikkhūnañca
tika-vin06t:736_6: aññesañca atthāya kate taṃ dassetuṃ “matānaṃ petakiccatthāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin06t:737_0: Yaṃ yaṃ hītiādi tassa kāraṇassa dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Puna pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ
tika-vin06t:737_1: atthāya kataṃ na kappatīti vuttanti kira dhammasiritthero. Gaṇṭhipade “bhikkhūnameva
tika-vin06t:737_2: suddhānaṃ atthāya kataṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti likhitaṃ. Aparehi pana “matānaṃ petakiccatthāyātiādinā
tika-vin06t:737_3: vuttepi kappati, bhikkhūnaṃyeva atthāyāti iminā ‘bhikkhūnampi datvā mayaṃ bhuñjissāmā’ti
tika-vin06t:737_4: katampi vuttaṃ. Puna ‘pañcasu ekaṃ uddissakataṃ itaresaṃ na kappatī’ti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:737_5: ‘pañcasu hi sahadhammikesūtiādi vutta’nti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. Aññatarasmiṃ pana gaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:737_6: “amhākanti ca rājayuttādīnanti ca vutte vaṭṭatīti vatvā ‘tumhāka’nti avatvā ‘petakiccatthāyāti
tika-vin06t:737_7: vuttepi vaṭṭatī’ti ca dassetvā sabbattha vuttānaṃ, ādisaddena saṅgahitānañca lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:737_8: ṭhapentena ‘bhikkhūnaṃyevā’tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ‘bhikkhūnaṃ uddiṭṭhe evāti adhippāyenā’ti
tika-vin06t:737_9: vuttaṃ. Na ‘tumhākaṃ, amhākañcāti vutte anāpattī’ti dassanatthaṃ. Kasmā? Missakavārassa
tika-vin06t:737_10: abhāvā. Lakkhaṇaṃ nāma vuttānaṃ, vuttasadisānañca hoti. ‘Sace petakiccatthāyāti vuttaṭṭhāne
tika-vin06t:737_11: bhikkhūnaṃ bhojanaṃ sandhāya karontī’ti vadanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyañca ‘tasmiṃ vāre
tika-vin06t:737_12: ca na tumhākanti vutte vaṭṭatī’ti vuttattā. Teneva idhāpi ‘petakiccatthāya, maṅgalādīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:737_13: vā atthāya katepi eseva nayo’ti pubbe vuttatthavasena vuttaṃ. ‘Avadhāraṇatthena missake
tika-vin06t:737_14: vaṭṭatī’ti ce? ‘Kappiyamaṃsassa hi paṭiggahaṇe āpatti natthī’ti vacanena akappiyapaṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin06t:737_15: āpattīti āpannaṃ, ‘tañca gahetabbaṃ siyā’ti paṭikkhipitabbā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ sundaraṃ
tika-vin06t:737_16: viya dissati, vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ. Yattha cāti bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya katepi. Tamatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:737_17: āvi kātuṃ “sace panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha pana “bhikkhunīnaṃ dukkaṭaṃ, itaresaṃ daṇḍakammavatthū”ti
tika-vin06t:737_18: vadanti. Kappaṃ nirayamhīti asaṅkhyeyyakappaṃ. Vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyikāleyeva saṅghabhedo
tika-vin06t:738_0: 411. Kusalanti khemaṃ. Āpattibhayā katā lajjīhīti ettha āpattibhayena avassaṃ ārocentīti
tika-vin06t:738_2: Alajjissapi anārocentassa āpattiyeva “ye passanti ye suṇantī”ti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:739_1: attho. Odissa anuññāto nāma ummattakakhittacittavedanaṭṭādiko “anāpatti ādikammikassā”ti
tika-vin06t:739_2: ariṭṭhasikkhāpade āgatattā atthīti ce? Yampītiādi. Sā panesā anāpatti. So vuccatīti
tika-vin06t:739_3: tattha āgatopi sakammabyāvaṭopi evaṃ vuccati. Etenupāyenāti asamanubhāsantassa ca
tika-vin06t:739_4: ādikammikassa ca vuttatthavasena. Ṭhapetvā ariṭṭhasikkhāpadanti tattha ādikammikapadābhāvā.
tika-vin06t:740_0: Tivaṅgikanti ettha vācāya eva paṭinissajjantassa oṭṭhacalanādikāyaviññatti hoti,
tika-vin06t:740_1: tasmā duvidhampi viññattiṃ kathentassa hoti. Vacībhedaṃ kātuṃ asakkontassa kāyavikāraṃ
tika-vin06t:740_2: karontassa anāpattiyā bhavitabbaṃ. Kasmā? Tivaṅgesu ekassa parihīnattā, tasmā tivaṅgabhāvo
tika-vin06t:740_3: āpattiyā, aṅgahānibhāvo anāpattiyāti gahetabbaṃ. Ettha siyā – yadi aṅgahānibhāvena
tika-vin06t:740_4: anāpatti, evaṃ santepi vikāraṃ akatvā citteneva vissajjentassa anāpattiyā bhavitabbanti?
tika-vin06t:740_5: Taṃ na, kasmā? Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kāyavikāraṃ vā vacībhedaṃ vā akarontasseva pana āpajjanato
tika-vin06t:740_6: akiriya”nti hi vuttaṃ, “cittaṃ vā anuppādentassa vā”ti na vuttaṃ, tasmā cittañca
tika-vin06t:740_7: nāma viññattipaṭibaddhaṃ evāti visuṃ aṅgabhāveneva vuttattā jānitabbanti ce? Taṃ
tika-vin06t:740_8: na, dvinnaṃyeva akiriyāti, tasmā cittena vissajjentassāpi āpatti viya dissati, upaparikkhitvā
tika-vin06t:740_9: gahetabbaṃ. Tattha “akusalacitta”nti vuttanti ce? “Cittabāhullato vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:746_0: 424. Pataṃ patitaṃ vivari vivaṭṭayi. Ekato ussāreti ca giḷitato ṭhapeti ca. Ekapaṃsuthupakanadīsaṅkhaṃ
tika-vin06t:746_1: dīghamūlakapaṇṇasevālaṃ sevālaṃ daṇḍisipippariṃ paṇakaṃ pesiṭṭhiṃ nissāreti. Tilabījakanti
tika-vin06t:746_2: sukhumamūlapaṇṇakaṃ hutvā udakapiṭṭhe pattharikaṃ udakapappaṭakaṃ nissāreti.
tika-vin06t:747_1: evarūpaṃ karomātiādinā ekūnavīsatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ kira vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-vin06t:750_0: 431. Na kevalaṃ vihāro eva kīṭāgiri, sopi gāmo “kīṭāgiri”cceva vuccati. Gāmañhi sandhāya
tika-vin06t:750_1: parato “na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhūhi kīṭāgirismiṃ vatthabba”nti vuttaṃ. Ekasaṃvacchare
tika-vin06t:750_2: dvikkhattuṃ vassati kira, taṃ sandhāya “dvīhi meghehī”ti vuttaṃ. Samadhikanti cha
tika-vin06t:750_3: jane sandhāya. Akatavatthunti navaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ. “Jābhisumanādigacchaṃ allānaṃ haritānaṃ
tika-vin06t:750_4: evā”ti likhitaṃ. Bhūtagāmabījagāmabhedato panesa bhedo. Vatatthāyāti vatiatthāya.
tika-vin06t:750_5: Yaṃkiñcīti sodakaṃ vā nirudakaṃ vā. Ārāmādiatthāyāti vanarājikādiatthāya. Mālāvaccharopanaṃ
tika-vin06t:750_6: kuladūsakaṃyeva sandhāya, ganthanādisabbaṃ na sandhāya vuttanti. Kathaṃ paññāyatīti
tika-vin06t:750_7: ce? Taṃ dassetuṃ “buddhena dhammo”tiādi. “Āveḷaṃ ābiḷa”ntipi pāṭho.
tika-vin06t:751_0: Gopphananti ganthanaṃ. Veṭhimanti taggatikameva. Vedhimaṃ aññena kenaci pupphaṃ vedhetvā
tika-vin06t:751_1: kataṃ. Kaṇṭakampi bandhitunti ettha “sayaṃ vijjhanatthaṃ na vaṭṭati. Aññassatthāya
tika-vin06t:751_2: vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Jālamayaṃ vitānaṃ jālavitānaṃ. Pupphapaṭicchakaṃ gavakkhaṃ viya
tika-vin06t:751_3: sachiddaṃ karonti. Tālapaṇṇaguḷakanti tālapaṇṇamayaṃ puna katampi paṭichijjakameva.
tika-vin06t:751_4: Dhammarajju cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā pupphappavesanatthaṃ āvijjhitvā baddharajju. “Kāsāvena
tika-vin06t:751_5: baddhampi suttavākādīhi baddhaṃ bhaṇḍitasadisa”nti likhitaṃ. Aṃsabhaṇḍikaṃ pasibbake
tika-vin06t:751_6: pakkhittasadisattā vedhimaṃ na jātaṃ, tasmā “sithilabaddhassa antarantarā pakkhipituṃ
tika-vin06t:751_7: na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. “Aññamaññaṃ aphusāpetvā anekakkhattumpi parikkhipituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin06t:751_8: vadanti. Pūritanti dīghato pasāretvā pūritaṃ. Ghaṭikadāmaolambakoti “yamakadāmaolambako”ti
tika-vin06t:751_9: likhitaṃ. “Geṇḍukharapattadāmānaṃ paṭikkhittattā celādīhi katadāmampi na vaṭṭati
tika-vin06t:752_0: “Recakaṃ nāma tathālāsiyanāṭanaṭānaṃ nacca”nti likhitaṃ. Taṃ “parivattantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:752_1: “Sāriyo nāma rutasunakhā siṅgālakammakuruṅgakeḷipane ṭhitā”ti kira pāṭho. “Nibujjhantī”ti pāḷi.
tika-vin06t:753_0: 432. Abalabalādi-padānaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā. Yathā pāmokkhānaṃ vasena sabbepi “assajipunabbasukā”ti
tika-vin06t:753_1: vuttā, tathā pāmokkhappattasāvakassa vasena tadāyattavuttine sabbepi “sāriputtā”ti.
tika-vin06t:754_0: 433. “Gāme vā na vasitabba”nti imināva tasmiṃ gāme aññattha na vasitabbanti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:754_1: “Tasmiṃ vihāre vā”ti kasmā vuttanti ce? Atthasabbhāvato. Yasmiñhi gāme kuladūsakakammaṃ
tika-vin06t:754_2: kataṃ, tasmiṃ gāme, yasmiṃ vihāre vasantena kuladūsanaṃ kataṃ, taṃ vihāraṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin06t:754_3: aññasmiṃ vasituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ. Taṃ kathanti ce? “Gāme vā na vasitabba”nti
tika-vin06t:754_4: vacanena yasmiṃ gāme kuladūsanakammaṃ kataṃ, tasmiṃ vihārepi vasituṃ na labbhatīti
tika-vin06t:754_5: āpannaṃ, taṃ disvā “tasmiṃ vihāre”ti vuttaṃ, tena tasmiṃ gāme aññasmiṃ vasituṃ labbhatīti
tika-vin06t:754_6: siddhaṃ. “Tasmiṃ vihāre vasantenā”ti iminā tasmiṃ gāme aññattha vasantena sāmantagāme
tika-vin06t:754_7: piṇḍāya carituṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitaṃ hoti. Sāmantavihārepīti sāmantavihāro nāma tasmiṃyeva
tika-vin06t:754_8: gāme tassa vihārassa sāmantavihāro ca tassa gāmassa sāmantavihāro cāti ubhayaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin06t:754_9: etena tasmiṃ gāme aññattha vasantena tasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya na caritabbaṃ. Sāmantagāmepi
tika-vin06t:754_10: piṇḍāya carituṃ vaṭṭati, puna yasmiṃ gāme kuladūsanakammaṃ kataṃ, tassa sāmantagāme
tika-vin06t:754_11: kuladūsakavihārassa sāmantavatthuvihāre vasantena tasmiṃ gāmepi carituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:754_12: Yasmiṃ sāmantagāme kuladūsakaṃ na kataṃ, tasmimpi carituṃ vaṭṭati, neva vihāreti
tika-vin06t:754_13: adhippāyo. “Na nagare caritu”nti vuttattā aññasmiṃ vihāre tasmiṃ gāme vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin06t:754_14: dīpitaṃ hotīti eke. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana vicāraṇā eva natthi, tasmā suṭṭhu vicāretvā kathetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:755_0: 436-7. Dāpetuṃ na labhanti, pupphadānañhi siyā. Tasseva na kappatīti ettha yāguādīni
tika-vin06t:755_1: ānetvā “dadantū”ti icchāvasena vadati ce, sabbesaṃ na kappati, kevalaṃ pana suddhacittena
tika-vin06t:755_2: attānaṃ vā paresaṃ vā anuddisitvā “ime manussā dānaṃ datvā puññaṃ pasavantū”ti vadantassa
tika-vin06t:755_3: tasseva na kappati yāguādīnaṃ paccayapaṭisaṃyuttakathāya uppannattā. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-vin06t:755_4: “pañcannampi sahadhammikāna”nti visesetvā avuttattā atthato sayamevāti apare. Ācariyā
tika-vin06t:755_5: pana “yathā mahāpaccariyaṃ, kurundiyañca ‘tassevā’ti visesetvā vuttaṃ, evaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:755_6: visesetvā na vuttaṃ, tasmā sabbesaṃ na kappatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:760_0: 444-5. Uddesanti uddisanaṃ, āsāḷhinakkhattaṃ nāma vassūpagamapūjā. Sotassa rahoti
tika-vin06t:760_2: pārājikavacanaṃ viya. Tasmā “cakkhussa raheneva pana paricchedo kātabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:760_3: Kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce? “Mātugāmo nāma tadahujātāpi dārikā”ti vacanato, “alaṃkammaniyeti
tika-vin06t:760_4: sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu”nti vacanato ca rahonisajjassādo cettha methunasannissitakileso,
tika-vin06t:760_5: na dutiye viya duṭṭhullavācassādakileso, tasmā ca paññāyati “sotassa raho nādhippeto”ti.
tika-vin06t:760_6: Keci pana “tañca labbhatīti vacanassa dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, tena dutiye vuttā viññū
tika-vin06t:760_7: paṭibalā gahitā hotī”ti vadanti. Yena vā sāti ettha vā-saddo “tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo
tika-vin06t:760_8: vā”ti yojetabbo, so ca vikappattho, tasmā kāretabbo vā paṭijānamāno, na vā kāretabbo
tika-vin06t:760_9: appaṭijānamānoti attho. Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paṭijānamānova tena so bhikkhu
tika-vin06t:760_10: kāretabbo…pe… na kāretabbo”ti. Tasmā eva pāḷiyaṃ tadatthadvayadassanatthaṃ “sā ce
tika-vin06t:760_11: evaṃ vadeyyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Saddheyyavacasā”ti iminā sotāpannā atthabhañjanakaṃ na
tika-vin06t:760_12: bhaṇanti, sesaṃ bhaṇantīti vādīnaṃ vādo paṭisedhito hoti. “Diṭṭha”nti vuttattā “olokesī”ti
tika-vin06t:760_13: sundaraṃ. Rakkheyyāsīti mama visesaṃ kassaci nāroceyyāsīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:761_0: 446. “Sā ce evaṃ vadeyya ‘ayyassa mayā sutaṃ nisinnassa mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi
tika-vin06t:761_1: obhāsentassā”’ti, idaṃ kimatthamettha vuttaṃ, na adhippetañhetaṃ idha sotassa raho
tika-vin06t:761_2: nādhippetoti katvāti ce? Alaṃkammaniyaṭṭhāne duṭṭhullavācāpi labbhati, na pana nālaṃkammaniyaṭṭhāne
tika-vin06t:761_3: methunanti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti veditabbanti. Yathā etaṃ, tathā “sā ce evaṃ vadeyya
tika-vin06t:761_4: ‘ayyassa mayā sutaṃ mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassā”’ti
tika-vin06t:761_5: etampi idha labbhati, na dutiye nālaṃkammaniyaṭṭhānattāti eke. Kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:761_6: idhāpi dutiyāniyatādhikāre pārājikāpattiñca parihāpetvā duṭṭhullavācāpattiyā vuttattā
tika-vin06t:761_7: paṭhamāniyate duṭṭhullavācāpatti na vuttāti ce? “Sā ce”ti tassā pāḷiyā potthakā sodhetabbā.
tika-vin06t:761_9: pamāṇa”nti likhitaṃ, dutiyāniyatādhikāre ca “anandho kāyasaṃsaggaṃ passati, abadhiro
tika-vin06t:761_10: duṭṭhullaṃ suṇāti, kāyacittato kāyasaṃsaggo, vācācittato duṭṭhullaṃ, ubhayehi ubhaya”nti
tika-vin06t:764_0: 453. Dutiye kesuci potthakesu “na heva kho pana paṭicchannaṃ āsanaṃ hoti āsana”nti
tika-vin06t:764_1: likhitaṃ. “Āsananti adhikaṃ, uddharitānurūpa”nti likhitaṃ. Dvepi rahā idha adhippetā
tika-vin06t:764_3: kimatthaṃ vuttanti? Ayameva hi mātugāmo dvinnampi kāyasaṃsaggaduṭṭhullavācānaṃ ekato
tika-vin06t:764_4: vatthubhūto, tasmā vuttaṃ. Kāyasaṃsaggassa vatthubhūto dassito, na itarassāti katvā
tika-vin06t:764_5: duṭṭhullavācameva sandhāya tassā vatthuṃ dassento evamāha.
tika-vin06t:765_0: Etthāha – yathā paṭhame anadhippetāpi duṭṭhullavācā sambhavavisesadassanatthaṃ vuttā,
tika-vin06t:765_1: idhāpi kāyasaṃsaggo, kasmā na tassa vasena cakkhussa raho gahetabboti? Āma na gahetabbo,
tika-vin06t:765_2: na ca gahito, gahito eva pana nisajjavasena, na hi aṅgassa nisajjā visesoti. Appaṭicchanne
tika-vin06t:765_3: sati kathaṃ cakkhussa rahoti ce? Dūrattā. Paṭhame kasmā itthisatampi anāpattiṃ na
tika-vin06t:765_4: karoti, idha kasmā ekāpi karotīti ce? No vuccati siddhattā. Siddhaṃ hoti, yadidaṃ
tika-vin06t:765_5: aññataro bhikkhu vesāliyaṃ mahāvane…pe… dvāraṃ vivaritvā nipanno hoti…pe… sambahulā
tika-vin06t:765_6: itthiyo yāvadatthaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsūti. Tasmā na methunassa mātugāmo dutiyo hoti.
tika-vin06t:765_7: Itthiyo hi aññamaññissā vajjaṃ paṭicchādenti, teneva bhikkhunīnaṃ vajjapaṭicchādane
tika-vin06t:765_8: pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ. Tathā “āyasmā udāyī tā itthiyo vihāraṃ pekkhāpetvā tāsaṃ itthīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:765_9: vaccamagga”nti ettha “yā pana tā itthiyo hirimanā, tā nikkhamitvā bhikkhū ujjhāpentī”ti
tika-vin06t:765_10: vacanato duṭṭhullassa mātugāmo dutiyo hotīti siddhanti adhippāyo. Ubhayatthāpi ummattakādikammikānaṃ
tika-vin06t:765_11: anāpattīti tesaṃ pāṭekkaṃ nidāne āgataṃ, ādikammikānaṃ anāpattīti attho. Anugaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:765_12: pana “acelakavagge rahopaṭicchannāsanasikkhāpade ‘viññū puriso dutiyo hotī’ti imassa
tika-vin06t:765_13: anurūpato ‘itthīnaṃ satampi anāpattiṃ na karotī’ti vutta”nti ca, “dutiyāniyate ‘itthīpi
tika-vin06t:765_14: purisopī’ti idaṃ bhikkhunīvagge osānasikkhāpadassa, acelakavagge appaṭicchannāsanasikkhāpadassa
tika-vin06t:765_15: ca anāpattivāre ‘yo koci viññū puriso dutiyo’ti vuttaṃ. Imesaṃ anurūpato vuttanti
tika-vin06t:768_0: Apicettha idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ, seyyathidaṃ – idaṃ aniyatakaṇḍaṃ nippayojanaṃ apubbābhāvatoti
tika-vin06t:768_2: hi “sā ce evaṃ vadeyya ‘ayyo mayā diṭṭho nisinno mātugāmassa methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto’ti,
tika-vin06t:768_3: so ca taṃ paṭijānāti, āpattiyā kāretabbo…pe… nisajjāya kāretabbo”tiādinā āpattiyā
tika-vin06t:768_4: garukāya lahukāya ca ropanakkamalakkhaṇaṃ, kāretabboti iminā anāropanakkamalakkhaṇañca
tika-vin06t:768_5: dassitaṃ. Lakkhaṇadīpanato ādimhi, ante vā uddisitabbanti ce? Na, asambhavato. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:768_6: Na tāva ādimhi sambhavati, yesamidaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ, tesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ adassitattā.
tika-vin06t:768_7: Na ante, garukamissakattā, tasmā garukalahukānaṃ majjhe eva uddisitabbanti arahati
tika-vin06t:768_8: ubhayāmissakattā. Yā tattha lahukāpatti dassitā, sāpi garukādikā. Tenevāha “methunadhammasannissitakilesasaṅkhātena
tika-vin06t:768_9: rahassādenā”tiādi, tasmā garukānaṃ eva anantaraṃ uddiṭṭhātipi eke. Evaṃ sante paṭhamamevālaṃ
tika-vin06t:768_10: tāvatā lakkhaṇadīpanasiddhito, kiṃ dutiyenāti ce? Na, okāsaniyamapaccayamicchāgāhanivāraṇappayojanato.
tika-vin06t:768_11: “Paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammaniye”ti okāsaniyamato hi tabbiparīte okāse idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:768_12: na vikappitanti micchāgāho hoti, tannivāraṇato dutiyampi sātthakamevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:768_14: ca rahonisajjassādabhedo jāto. Dvinnaṃ rahonisajjasikkhāpadānaṃ nānatājānanañca siyā,
tika-vin06t:768_15: tathā kāyasaṃsaggabhedadīpanato. Nālaṃkammaniyepi hi okāse appaṭicchanne, paṭicchannepi
tika-vin06t:768_16: vā nisinnāya vātapānakavāṭachiddādīhi nikkhantakesādiggahaṇena kāyasaṃsaggo labbhatīti
tika-vin06t:768_17: evamādayopi nayā vitthārato veditabbā. “Bhikkhupātimokkhe āgatanayattā bhikkhunīpātimokkhe
tika-vin06t:768_18: idaṃ kaṇḍaṃ parihīnanti veditabba”nti vadanti. Atthuppattiyā tattha anupannattāti
tika-vin06t:768_19: eke. Taṃ anekatthabhāvadīpanato ayuttaṃ. Sabbabuddhakāle hi bhikkhūnaṃ pañcannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:768_20: bhikkhunīnaṃ cattāro ca uddesā santi. Pātimokkhuddesapaññattiyā asādhāraṇattā tattha
tika-vin06t:768_22: kāyasaṃsaggaviseso pārājikavatthu, “hatthaggahaṇaṃ vā sādiyeyya, kāyaṃ vā tadatthāya
tika-vin06t:768_23: upasaṃhareyyā”ti vacanato sādiyanampi, “santiṭṭheyya vā”ti vacanato ṭhānampi, “saṅketaṃ
tika-vin06t:768_24: vā gaccheyyā”ti vacanato gamanampi, “channaṃ vā anupaviseyyā”ti vacanato paṭicchannaṭṭhānapavesopi,
tika-vin06t:768_25: tathā “rattandhakāre appadīpe paṭicchanne okāse ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya
tika-vin06t:768_26: vā”ti vacanato duṭṭhullavācāpi pācittiyavatthukanti katvā tāsaṃ aññathā aniyatakaṇḍassa
tika-vin06t:774_0: 459. Samitāvināti samitā’nena kilesāti samitāvī, tena samitāvinā. “Tīṇi cīvarānī”ti
tika-vin06t:774_1: vattabbe “ticīvara”nti vuttaṃ. Saṅkhyāpubbo digunekavacananti ettha lakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:774_2: Taṃ pana adhiṭṭhitassapi anadhiṭṭhitassapi nāmaṃ “ekarattampi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena
tika-vin06t:774_4: ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātu”nti ettha anadhiṭṭhitassa nāmaṃ, idha tadubhayampi sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:774_5: “Bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ ticīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ hotī”ti ettha adhiṭṭhitameva. “Aññeneva
tika-vin06t:774_6: ticīvarena gāmaṃ pavisantī”ti ettha anadhiṭṭhitameva. Ekasmiṃyeva hi cīvare ticīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:774_7: ruhati, na itarasmiṃ pattādhiṭṭhānaṃ viya, tasmā itaraṃ atirekaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Tena
tika-vin06t:774_8: vuttaṃ “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekacīvaraṃ dhāressantī”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:775_0: 460-1. Paṭhamapaññattiyā panettha ekarattampi atirekacīvaraṃ dhāreyya, nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:775_1: vuttaṃ hoti, tato paraṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretuṃ.
tika-vin06t:775_2: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha ‘dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:775_3: dhāretabbaṃ, taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”’nti evaṃ bhagavā paripuṇṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:775_4: sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpesi. Atha pacchimabodhiyaṃ ajātasattukāle kathinaṃ anuññātaṃ, tato
tika-vin06t:775_5: paṭṭhāya bhikkhū idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine
tika-vin06t:775_6: dasāha…pe… pācittiya”nti uddisanti, esa nayo dutiyatatiyakathinesupi. Tathāpi kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:775_8: bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti vacanaṃ na paññatti, na ca anupaññattīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:775_9: Na hi paññattivatthusmiṃ, anupaññattivatthumhi vā kathinādhikāro dissatīti yathāvuttanayova
tika-vin06t:775_10: sāroti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ. Athāpi siyā “kathinassuppattikālato paṭṭhāya bhagavato
tika-vin06t:775_11: vacanaṃ anupaññattibhāvena vutta”nti. Yadi evaṃ dve anupaññattiyo siyuṃ, tato parivāre
tika-vin06t:775_12: “ekā anupaññattī”tivacanavirodho. Apica yathāvuttanayadīpanatthaṃ idha taṃ vacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:775_13: paṭhamapaññattikāle avatvā pacchā vuttaṃ. Ettha sādhitattā dutiyatatiyesu pacchā
tika-vin06t:775_14: vuttapaṭhamapaññattīsu evaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññathā tatthapi taṃ vacanaṃ pacchā vattabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:775_15: siyā. Anugaṇṭhipade pana “pacchā vuttabhāvaṃ sandhāya niṭṭhitacīvarasmintiādīsu anupaññattī”ti
tika-vin06t:775_16: vuttaṃ. Sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ pemaṃ, arahantānaṃ gāravo. Dasamaṃ vā navamaṃ vāti ettha
tika-vin06t:776_1: tasmā “naṭṭhaṃ vā vinaṭṭhaṃ vā daḍḍhaṃ vā cīvarāsā vā upacchinnā”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi
tika-vin06t:776_2: dasāhaparamaṃ dhāretabbacīvaradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ siyā, naṭṭhādikaṃ so dhāreyya.
tika-vin06t:776_3: Dhāraṇañcettha ṭhapanaṃ, paribhogo vā. Taṃ dvayaṃ katepi yujjati, akatepi yujjati,
tika-vin06t:776_4: tasmā “kataṃ vā hotī”tipi na vattabbaṃ. Na hi katameva atikkāmayato nissaggiyanti,
tika-vin06t:776_5: tasmā yaṃ cīvaraṃ upādāya “niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”nti vuttaṃ. Tampi ubbhatasmiṃ kathine
tika-vin06t:776_6: dasāhaparamaṃ kālaṃ dhāretabbanti attho na gahetabbo. Tañhi cīvaraṃ santañce, ubbhatasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:776_7: kathine ekadivasampi parihāraṃ na labbhati. Apica “cīvaraṃ nāma vikappanupagaṃ pacchima”nti
tika-vin06t:776_8: vuttaṃ. Tattha ca kataṃ nāma hoti, tasmāpi na taṃ sandhāya dhāretabbanti vuttanti
tika-vin06t:777_0: Anugaṇṭhipade panetaṃ vuttaṃ “tattha siyā – tassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ naṭṭhādīsu aññataraṃ
tika-vin06t:777_1: yadi bhaveyya, katamaṃ cīvaraṃ dasāhaparamaṃ dhāreyya. Yasmā dhāretabbacīvaraṃ natthi,
tika-vin06t:777_3: Ayaṃ panattho ‘naṭṭhaṃ vā’tiādinā nayena vuttacīvarānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ cīvare asati
tika-vin06t:777_4: gahetabbo, sati taṃ dasāhaparamaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha. ‘Kataṃ
tika-vin06t:777_5: vā hotī’ti vuttacīvaramevādhippetaṃ. Kasmā pana katacīvaraṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetanti
tika-vin06t:777_6: na vuttanti ce? Pākaṭattā. Kathaṃ? Naṭṭhavinaṭṭhacīvarādīnaṃ dhāraṇassa abhāvato
tika-vin06t:777_7: katacīvarameva idhādhippetanti pākaṭaṃ. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā paṭhamāniyate methunakāyasaṃsaggarahonisajjānamevāgatattā
tika-vin06t:777_8: sotassa raho atthuddhāravasena vuttoti pākaṭo, tasmā ‘cakkhussa raho itarasmiṃ atthe
tika-vin06t:777_9: adhippeto’ti na vutto. Evaṃsampadamidanti veditabbaṃ. ‘Kataṃ vā hotī’ti idaṃ na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:777_10: kasmā? Akataṃ atikkāmayatopi nissaggiyattā, kiñcāpi nissaggiyaṃ hoti, idha pana ticīvarādhiṭṭhānamadhippetaṃ.
tika-vin06t:777_11: Tasmiṃ ticīvarādhiṭṭhāne akataṃ, arajitaṃ, akappiyakatañca ‘imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī’tiādinā
tika-vin06t:777_12: nayena adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭati, tadatthadīpanatthaṃ ‘kataṃ vā hotī’ti vuttaṃ. Itarathā
tika-vin06t:777_13: ‘niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ paṭiladdhe’ti vadeyya, evaṃ sante ticīvaraṃ dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato
tika-vin06t:777_14: nissaggiyanti kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce? Vacanappamāṇato. ‘Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ticīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:777_15: adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu’nti vuttattā idhāpi ‘atirekacīvaraṃ nāma anadhiṭṭhita’nti
tika-vin06t:777_16: ettakameva vattabbaṃ siyā. Yasmā ‘kataṃ vā hotī’ti vacanena idhādhippetacīvarena
tika-vin06t:777_17: saddhiṃ sesampi dasāhaparamato uttari dhāretuṃ na labbhatīti anujānanto ‘atirekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:777_18: nāma anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappita’nti āha. Tattha siyā – yathā ‘avikappita’nti atthuddhāravasena
tika-vin06t:777_19: vuttaṃ, tathā ‘vikappanupagaṃ pacchima’ntipi. Kasmā? Yasmā ticīvarameva dasāhaparamaṃ
tika-vin06t:777_21: hoti ‘yo pana, bhikkhu, atirekacīvaraṃ dhāreyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya’nti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:777_22: Na ticīvarato aññampi cīvaraṃ dasāhaparamaṃ dhāretabbaṃ, tato paraṃ nissaggiyaṃ ‘antodasāha’nti
tika-vin06t:777_23: vuttattā. Yathāha ‘anāpatti antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vikappetī’ti, itarathā ‘antodasāhaṃ
tika-vin06t:777_24: adhiṭṭhetī’ti vacanamattameva bhaveyya, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:777_25: Idaṃ sabbaṃ apare vadantī”ti. Ettha antokathine uppannacīvaraṃ katameva santañce,
tika-vin06t:777_26: dasāhaparamaṃ dhāretabbanti idañcimassa sādhanatthaṃ vuttavacanañca parato idheva
tika-vin06t:777_27: vuttavicāraṇāya yathāvuttayuttiyā ca virujjhatīti na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:778_0: Idheva vuttavicāraṇā nāma – “sve kathinuddhāro bhavissatī”ti ajja uppannacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:778_2: sikkhāpadassa vuttattā. Antokathine atirekadasāhampi parihāraṃ labhati, kathinato
tika-vin06t:778_3: uddhaṃ ekadivasampi na labhati. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā atthatakathino saṅgho atthatadivasato
tika-vin06t:778_4: paṭṭhāya yāva ubbhārā ekadivasāvasesepi kathinubbhāre ānisaṃsaṃ labhati, punadivase
tika-vin06t:778_5: na labhati. Sace satisammosā bhājanīyacīvaraṃ na bhājitaṃ, punadivase anatthatakathinānampi
tika-vin06t:778_6: sādhāraṇaṃ hoti. Divasā ce sāvasesā, atthatakathinasseva saṅghassa pāpuṇāti, evameva
tika-vin06t:778_7: atthatadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva ubbhārā anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ vaṭṭati anuññātadivasabbhantarattā.
tika-vin06t:778_8: Kathinadivaso gaṇanupago hoti, ubbhatadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaparamaṃ kālaṃ uppannacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:778_9: parihāraṃ labhati, tato paraṃ na labhati. Kasmā? “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dasāhaparamaṃ
tika-vin06t:778_10: atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretu”nti vacanato. Antokathinepi ekādase aruṇuggamane nissaggiyappasaṅgaṃ
tika-vin06t:778_11: “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti ayaṃ anupaññatti vāretvā ṭhitā, na ca
tika-vin06t:778_12: te divase adivase akāsīti. Tathā tatiyakathine ca vicāritaṃ “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā
tika-vin06t:778_13: ubbhatasmiṃ kathine bhikkhuno paneva akālacīvaraṃ uppajjeyyā’ti vadantena bhagavatā
tika-vin06t:778_14: yaṃ mayā heṭṭhā paṭhamasikkhāpade ‘dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba’nti anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:778_15: tampi kathinamāsato bahi uppannameva, na antoti dīpitaṃ hotī”ti ca, “‘kālepi ādissa
tika-vin06t:778_16: dinnaṃ etaṃ akālacīvara’nti vacanato kathinubbhārato uddhaṃ dasāhaparihāraṃ na labhatīti
tika-vin06t:778_17: dīpitaṃ hoti, tehi saddhiṃ puna kathinubbhārato uddhaṃ pañca divasāni labhatīti pasaṅgopi
tika-vin06t:778_19: vuttattā vārito hoti. Tadubhayena kathinabbhantare uppannacīvaraṃ kathinubbhārato
tika-vin06t:778_20: uddhaṃ ekadivasampi parihāraṃ na labhatīti siddhaṃ hotī”ti ca. Tasmā duvidhampetaṃ
tika-vin06t:778_21: vicāraṇaṃ sandhāya amhehi “idheva vuttavicāraṇāya yathāvuttayuttiyā ca virujjhatīti
tika-vin06t:779_0: Etthāha – “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti idaṃ bhummaṃ kiṃ cīvarassa uppatti
tika-vin06t:779_1: niyameti, udāhu dhāraṇaṃ, udāhu ubhayanti, kiñcettha, yadi uppattiṃ niyameti, pacchimakattikamāse
tika-vin06t:779_2: eva ubbhatasmiṃ kathine uppannacīvaraṃ tato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ dhāretabbaṃ aniṭṭhitepi
tika-vin06t:779_3: tasmiṃ māseti āpajjati. Atha dhāraṇaṃ niyameti, antokathine uppannacīvaraṃ ubbhatepi
tika-vin06t:779_4: dasāhaparamaṃ dhāretabbanti āpajjati. Atha ubhayaṃ niyameti, tatiyakathine viya visesetvā
tika-vin06t:779_5: vattabbanti? Vuccate – kāmaṃ ubhayaṃ niyameti, na pana visesane payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-vin06t:779_6: Yaṃ antokathine uppannacīvaraṃ sandhāya “niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”nti vuttaṃ, na taṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:779_8: tena puna visesane payojanaṃ natthi, na hi katameva nissaggiyaṃ karoti, na ca naṭṭhādikaṃ
tika-vin06t:779_9: dhāretuṃ sakkāti. Yena vā adhippāyena bhagavatā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, so adhippāyo
tika-vin06t:779_10: tatiyakathine pakāsitoti veditabbo. Kasmā tattha pakāsitoti ce? Visesavidhānadassanādhippāyato.
tika-vin06t:779_11: Visesavidhānañhi “no cassa pāripūrī”tiādi. Tatthāpi “cīvaraṃ uppajjeyyā”ti avatvā
tika-vin06t:779_12: “akālacīvaraṃ uppajjeyyā”ti visesanena ubbhatepi kathine kālacīvaraṃ atthīti dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:779_13: Kiñcetaṃ? Pacchimakattikamāse uppannacīvaraṃ, teneva tattha “anatthate kathine ekādasamāse
tika-vin06t:779_14: uppanna”nti vuttaṃ, tasmā uppattiniyame vuttadosābhāvasiddhi. Yañca tattha “kālepi
tika-vin06t:779_15: ādissa dinnaṃ etaṃ akālacīvaraṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ, tassa dve atthavikappā. Ādesavasena
tika-vin06t:779_16: “akālacīvara”nti laddhasaṅkhyampi kāle uppannattā kālaparihāraṃ labhati, pagevānādesanti
tika-vin06t:779_17: ayaṃ paṭhamo vikappo uppattiniyame vuttadosābhāvameva upatthambheti. Tathā ādesavasena
tika-vin06t:779_18: akālacīvarasaṅkhyaṃ gataṃ cīvarakāle uppannattā cīvarakālato paraṃ dasāhaparihāraṃ
tika-vin06t:779_19: na labhati, pagevānādesanti ayaṃ dutiyo dhāraṇaniyame vuttadosābhāvameva upatthambheti.
tika-vin06t:779_20: Yadi evaṃ ādesavasena akālacīvarassa akālacīvaratā kimatthikāti ce? Saṅghuddesikassa
tika-vin06t:780_0: Apica puggalassa kathinadivasāpi divasāva. Evaṃ gaṇanupagattā akālacīvarasaṅkhayāpaṭilābhānubhāvena
tika-vin06t:780_2: evaṃ sabbathā catubbidhaṃ ettha vacananti veditabbaṃ. Apica atthi ekaccena kathinuddhārena
tika-vin06t:780_3: ubbhate kathine uppannaṃ ekaccassa bhikkhuno kālacīvaraṃ hoti, ekaccassa akālacīvaraṃ,
tika-vin06t:780_4: taṃ sīmātikkantassa, no ubbhāragataṃ. Taṃ dvinnaṃ vasena ubbhate uppannaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin06t:780_5: itaresaṃ aññatarena ubbhate uppannanti veditabbaṃ. Tañhi yassa ubbhataṃ, tassa akālacīvaraṃ,
tika-vin06t:780_6: itarassa kālacīvaraṃ. Tathā atthi ekaccena kathinuddhārena ubbhate kathine uppannaṃ
tika-vin06t:780_7: sabbassapi akālacīvarameva hoti. Taṃ yathāṭhapitaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tathā atthi ubbhatasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:780_8: kathine uppannaṃ ṭhapetvā vassānassa pacchime māse uppannaṃ. Tathā atthi ubbhatasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:780_9: kathine uppannaṃ akālacīvaraṃ, taṃ hemante, gimhe vā uppannanti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ
tika-vin06t:780_10: puggalakālabhedato bahuvidhattā uppannassa “ubbhatasmiṃ kathine uppanna”nti na vuttanti
tika-vin06t:780_11: veditabbaṃ. Anekaṃsikattā imampi atthavikappaṃ dassetuṃ “ubbhatasmiṃ kathineti bhikkhuno
tika-vin06t:780_12: kathinaṃ ubbhataṃ hotī”ti. Ettāvatā siddhepi “aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ aññatarāyā”tiādi
tika-vin06t:780_13: vuttaṃ. “Dhārayāmī”ti bhikkhunīvibhaṅge āgatoti vattabbo. “Eva”nti vacanena vacanabhedo
tika-vin06t:781_1: asabbasaṅgāhikaṃ. Na hi yattakaṃ saṅghāṭi adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ pacchimaṃ, tattakaṃ antaravāsakādi
tika-vin06t:781_2: adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ pacchimaṃ hoti adhiṭṭhānassa bahuvidhattā. Na evaṃ vikappanāya bhedo
tika-vin06t:781_3: tassā ekavidhattāti veditabbaṃ. “Ekādase aruṇuggamane nissaggiya”nti antimaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin06t:781_4: tato purimatarasminti attho veditabbo. Antimaṃ nāma aparakattikāya paṭhamāruṇuggamanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:781_5: Tañhi kālattā nissaggiyaṃ na karoti, tenevāha accekacīvarasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:781_6: “chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pana uppannaṃ anaccekacīvarampi paccuddharitvā ṭhapitacīvarampi
tika-vin06t:781_7: etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatiyevā”ti. Imaṃyeva nayaṃ sandhāya “accekacīvarassa anatthate
tika-vin06t:781_8: kathine ekādasadivasādhiko māso, atthate kathine ekādasadivasādhikā pañca māsā, tato
tika-vin06t:781_9: paraṃ ekadivasampi parihāro natthī”ti tatthevāha. Imasmiṃ naye siddhe anaccekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:781_10: dvādasāhe na labhatīti siddhameva hoti. Tato “anaccekacīvare anaccekacīvarasaññī,
tika-vin06t:781_11: anāpattī”ti ettha accekacīvarasadise aññasmiṃ anadhiṭṭhiteti siddhaṃ hoti. Tattha
tika-vin06t:782_1: viya, na idha vacanabhedo, tasmā saṃvaccharātikkantampi dasāhātikkantameva nāma,
tika-vin06t:782_2: tathā dutiyakathinepi saṃvaccharavippavutthampi rattivippavutthameva. Tatiye saṃvaccharātikkantampi
tika-vin06t:782_3: māsātikkantameva nāmāti veditabbaṃ. “Anadhiṭṭhite adhiṭṭhitasaññī nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti
tika-vin06t:782_4: idamekassa tikapācittiyassa ādipadadīpanaṃ. Esa nayo avikappitetiādīsupi, tasmā ettha
tika-vin06t:782_5: aṭṭhasu tikacchedesu ekaṃ vitthāretvā itaresaṃ ekekamādipadaṃ vitthārehvā dve dve
tika-vin06t:782_6: bhagavatāva saṅkhittattāti bahūsupi tikacchedesu sambhavantesu eko eva vuccati, “ayaṃ
tika-vin06t:782_7: vinayassa dhammatā”ti vadanti. Dukkaṭavāresu pana ekaṃ dukkaṭaṃ vitthāretvā sesāni
tika-vin06t:782_8: satta tatheva saṅkhittāni. Tathā antimantimo ekeko anāpattikoṭṭhāsoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:783_0: Anāpatti antodasāhanti ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – taṃ dasāhaparamaṃ dhāretabbaṃ. Taṃ atirekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:783_1: yathāsakaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti vā vikappeti vā vissajjeti vā attano
tika-vin06t:783_2: dhammatāya nassati vā vinassati vā ḍayhati vā añño vā taṃ acchinditvā gaṇhāti vissāsanto
tika-vin06t:783_3: vā gaṇhāti pācittiyato anāpatti. Dukkaṭato pana siyā āpatti siyā anāpatti saññābhedena.
tika-vin06t:783_4: Antimānaṃ panettha dvinnaṃ padānaṃ vasena anacchinne acchinnasaññī nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin06t:783_5: Avissāsaggāhe vissāsaggāhasaññī nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyantiādikā dve tikapācittiyā,
tika-vin06t:783_6: dve ca dukkaṭā saṅkhittāti veditabbā. Ettha hi yadi antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti, dasāhaparamaṃ
tika-vin06t:783_7: aruṇaṃ atikkamitvā tassa divasabhāge adhiṭṭhahatīti veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva pāḷivinicchayo.
tika-vin06t:784_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ito garukatarānītiādimhi ayaṃ codanāpubbaṅgamo vinicchayo – gaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:784_1: panassa ito nissaṭṭhacīvaradānato garukampi ñattidutiyakammaṃ yathā apalokanena karonti,
tika-vin06t:784_2: evamidaṃ ñattiyā kattabbampi pakativacanena vaṭṭatīti. Yadi evaṃ parivāre kammavaggassa
tika-vin06t:784_3: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ñattikammampi ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvāva kātabbaṃ, apalokanakammādivasena
tika-vin06t:784_4: na kātabba”nti yaṃ vuttaṃ, tena virujjheyya. Tenetaṃ vuccati “tesaṃ etaṃ anuloma”nti,
tika-vin06t:784_5: tasmā anulomanayeneva taṃ vuttaṃ. Niyamaṃ pana yathā dvinnaṃ pārisuddhiuposatho vinā
tika-vin06t:784_6: ñattiyā hoti, evaṃ dvinnaṃ nissaṭṭhacīvaradānampīti vadāma, tasmā “āyasmato demā”ti
tika-vin06t:784_7: vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Kathaṃ panetaṃ ñātabbanti? Tadanulomattāti. Ekadevedaṃ ñattikammaṃ
tika-vin06t:784_8: apalokanenāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti sādhananti veditabbanti ācariyo. Anugaṇṭhipade panettha
tika-vin06t:784_9: codanaṃ katvā “etaṃ sādhitaṃ. Ñattikammaṃ ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvāva kātabba”nti pāḷiyā
tika-vin06t:784_10: āgataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, idaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ nāgataṃ, lesato āharitvā vuttanti katvā
tika-vin06t:785_0: 468. Esa nayoti aññesaṃ cīvaresu upacikādīhi khāyitesu mamapi khāyitānītiādi. “Aññena
tika-vin06t:785_1: kataṃ…pe… sādhaka”nti vacanato samānajātikaṃ, ekatthajātikañca tatiyakathinaṃ paṭhamasamānamevāti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:786_0: 469. Ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātunti ettha ticīvaraṃ ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhātabbayuttakaṃ,
tika-vin06t:786_1: yaṃ vā ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhātuṃ avikappetuṃ anujānāmi, tassa adhiṭṭhānakālaparicchedābhāvato
tika-vin06t:786_2: sabbakālaṃ icchantassa adhiṭṭhātuṃyeva anujānāmi, taṃ kālaparicchedaṃ katvā vikappetuṃ
tika-vin06t:786_3: nānujānāmi. Sati pana paccaye yadā tadā vā paccuddharitvā vikappetuṃ vaṭṭatīti “anāpatti
tika-vin06t:786_4: antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vikappetī”ti vacanato siddhaṃ hotīti vuttametaṃ. Vassikasāṭikaṃ
tika-vin06t:786_5: tato paraṃ vikappetuṃyeva nādhiṭṭhātuṃ. Vatthañhi katapariyositaṃ antocatumāse vassānadivasaṃ
tika-vin06t:786_6: ādiṃ katvā antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātuṃ anujānāmi, catumāsato uddhaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā
tika-vin06t:786_7: ṭhapitukāmena vikappetuṃ anujānāmīti attho. Sugatacīvarato ūnakanti tiṇṇampi cīvarānaṃ
tika-vin06t:786_8: ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo. “Ticīvaraṃ pana parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vāde pana
tika-vin06t:786_9: sati tathārūpapaccaye vaṭṭati. Yathā sati paccaye vikappetuṃ vaṭṭatīti sādhitametaṃ,
tika-vin06t:786_10: pageva aññena adhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhātuṃ. “Antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vikappetī”ti aniyamato
tika-vin06t:786_11: vuttanti saṅghāṭi, uttarāsaṅgo, antaravāsakanti adhiṭṭhitānadhiṭṭhitānaṃ samānameva
tika-vin06t:786_12: nāmaṃ. “Ayaṃ saṅghāṭī”tiādīsu hi anadhiṭṭhitā vuttā. “Ticīvarena vippavaseyyā”ti
tika-vin06t:786_13: ettha adhiṭṭhitā vuttā. Sāmantavihāre vāti gocaragāmato vihāreti dhammasiritthero.
tika-vin06t:786_14: Dūratarepi labbhatevāti ācariyo. Anugaṇṭhipadepi “sāmantavihāre vāti desanāsīsamattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:786_15: tasmā ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātabba”nti vuttaṃ. Sāmantavihāro
tika-vin06t:786_16: nāma yattha tadaheva gantvā nivattituṃ sakkā. Rattivippavāsaṃ rakkhantena tato dūre
tika-vin06t:786_17: ṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭati, evaṃ kira mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti. Keci “cīvaravaṃse
tika-vin06t:786_18: ṭhapitaṃ añño parivattitvā nāgadante ṭhapeti, taṃ ajānitvā adhiṭṭhahantassapi ruhati
tika-vin06t:786_19: cīvarassa sallakkhitattā”ti vadanti. Adhiṭṭhahitvāti parikkhāracoḷādivasena. Mahantataramevātiādi
tika-vin06t:786_21: ekadesabhūtattā. Anadhiṭṭhitañce, adhiṭṭhitassa appabhāvena ekadesabhūtaṃ adhiṭṭhitasaṅkhyameva
tika-vin06t:786_22: gacchati. Tathā adhiṭṭhitañce, anadhiṭṭhitassa ekadesabhūtaṃ anadhiṭṭhitasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin06t:786_23: gacchatīti hi lakkhaṇaṃ, na kevalañcettha dutiyapaṭṭameva, tatiyapaṭṭādikampi. Yathāha
tika-vin06t:786_24: “anujānāmi…pe… utuddhaṭānaṃ dussānaṃ catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ…pe… paṃsukūle yāvadattha”nti.
tika-vin06t:787_0: Avasesā bhikkhūti vakkhamānakāle nisinnā bhikkhū. Tasmā vaṭṭatīti yathā “anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:787_1: bhikkhave, ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ parikkhāracoḷampi
tika-vin06t:787_2: vuttaṃ, na tassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo vutto, na ca saṅkhyāparicchedo, tasmā tīṇipi
tika-vin06t:787_3: cīvarāni paccuddharitvā “imāni cīvarāni parikkhāracoḷāni adhiṭṭhāmī”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin06t:787_4: paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti attho. “Nidhānamukhameta”nti kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce? “Tena
tika-vin06t:787_5: kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti ticīvaraṃ, attho ca hoti parissāvanehipi
tika-vin06t:787_6: thavikāhipī”ti etasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, parikkhāracoḷa”nti anuññātattā.
tika-vin06t:787_7: Bhikkhūnañca ekameva parissāvanaṃ, thavikā vā vaṭṭati, na dve vā tīṇi vāti paṭikkhepābhāvato
tika-vin06t:787_9: kappantīti siddhaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cīvare sīmaṃ bandheyyaṃ mariyādaṃ
tika-vin06t:787_10: ṭhapeyya”nti vacanavirodhoti ce? Na, anusandhiyā ajānanato, virodhato ca. Kiṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:787_11: hoti? Cīvarakkhandhake paṭhamaṃ gahapaticīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ, tato pāvārakosiyakojavakambalādi.
tika-vin06t:787_12: Tato “tena kho pana samayena saṅghassa uccāvacāni cīvarāni uppannāni honti. Atha
tika-vin06t:787_13: kho bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi ‘kiṃ nu kho bhagavatā cīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ, kiṃ ananuññāta”’nti
tika-vin06t:787_14: etasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, cha cīvarāni khoma”ntiādinā kappiyacīvarajāti
tika-vin06t:787_15: anuññātā, na pana saṅkhyāpamāṇaṃ. Tato “addasa bhagavā…pe… sambahule bhikkhū cīvarehi
tika-vin06t:787_16: ubbhaṇḍite sīsepi cīvarabhisiṃ karitvā khandhepi cīvarabhisiṃ karitvā kaṭiyāpi cīvarabhisiṃ
tika-vin06t:787_17: karitvā āgacchante, disvāna bhagavato etadahosi…pe… yepi kho te kulaputtā imasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:787_18: dhammavinaye sītālukā sītabhīrukā, tepi sakkonti ticīvarena yāpetuṃ, yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin06t:787_19: cīvare sīmaṃ bandheyyaṃ mariyādaṃ ṭhapeyyaṃ ticīvaraṃ anujāneyya”nti cīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:787_20: tañca kho ekameva. Chabbaggiyā pana micchā gahetvā bahūni parihariṃsu. Tāni nesaṃ
tika-vin06t:787_21: atirekaṭṭhāne ṭhitāni honti. Tato “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:787_22: dhāretu”nti anuññātaṃ, tenetaṃ paññāyati. Atirekāni bahūni cīvarāni te parihariṃsu,
tika-vin06t:787_23: “tāni dasāhaparamameva dhāretuṃ anujānāmi, na tameveka”nti vadantena yā pubbe ticīvarādhiṭṭhānasaṅkhātā
tika-vin06t:787_24: cīvare sīmābaddhā, mariyādā ca ṭhapitā, tāya satipi ticīvarabāhullapariharaṇakkamo
tika-vin06t:787_25: dassito divasaparicchedavasena. Tato paraṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, atirekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:787_27: dassitoti dvepi tāni nidhānamukhānīti siddhaṃ. Tathā parikkhāracoḷādhiṭṭhānampi siyā,
tika-vin06t:787_29: ticīvaramariyādā hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “pāṭekkaṃ nidhānamukhameta”nti. “Paṭhamaṃ ticīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:787_30: ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, puna pariharituṃ asakkontena paccuddharitvā parikkhāracoḷaṃ
tika-vin06t:787_31: adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, na tveva āditova idaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ. “Yathā ticīvaraṃ pariharituṃ
tika-vin06t:787_32: asakkontassa gilānassa vippavāsasammuti anuññātā, agilānassapi sāsaṅkasikkhāpade
tika-vin06t:787_33: tassa antaraghare nikkhepo ca, tatopi sati paccaye chārattavippavāso, tatopi asakkontassa
tika-vin06t:787_34: paccuddhāro, paccuddhaṭampi antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātuṃ, asakkontassa vikappanā ca anuññātā.
tika-vin06t:787_36: asati ‘parikkhāracoḷa’nti adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjituṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ siyā, yato
tika-vin06t:787_37: tadadhippāyaññū evaṃ vadantī”ti mahāpaccariyampi vuttaṃ. Pubbetiādi “pāṭekkaṃ nidhānamukha”nti
tika-vin06t:787_38: vuttassa payogadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Abaddhasīmāyaṃ dupparihāranti vikappanādiatthāya
tika-vin06t:788_0: Vassikasāṭikā anatirittappamāṇāti tassā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedassa vuttattā vuttaṃ. Paccattharaṇampi
tika-vin06t:788_1: adhiṭṭhātabbamevāti “idaṃ, bhante, amhākaṃ senāsanassa upari attharitabba”ntiādinā
tika-vin06t:788_2: dinnaṃ nādhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, “idaṃ tumhāka”nti dinnaṃ sayaṃ adhippetaṃva adhiṭṭhātabbanti
tika-vin06t:788_3: adhippāyo. “Sakiṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhitameva hoti, na puna paccuddharīyati kālaparicchedābhāvato”ti
tika-vin06t:788_5: atthāyāti ettha “iminā bhesajjaṃ cetāpessāmi, idaṃ mātuyā dassāmī”ti ṭhapentena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:788_6: “‘Idaṃ bhesajjassa, imaṃ mātuyā’ti vibhajantena adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthīti apare”ti
tika-vin06t:789_0: “Puna adhiṭṭhātabbanti ayaṃ saṅgītito paṭṭhāya āgataaṭṭhakathāvādo. Tato paraṃ ācariyānaṃ
tika-vin06t:789_1: tattha tattha yuttivicāraṇā”ti vuttaṃ. Pamāṇacīvarassāti pacchimappamāṇassa. Dve
tika-vin06t:789_2: cīvarānīti saha uttarāsaṅgena. Esa nayoti pamāṇayuttesu yattha katthacītiādinayova.
tika-vin06t:789_3: “Taṃ atikkāmayato chedanaka”nti vacanato uttari paṭisiddhaṃ, tato heṭṭhā appaṭisiddhattā
tika-vin06t:789_4: vaṭṭati. Tattha siyā – ticīvarassa pacchimappamāṇaṃ visuṃ sutte natthīti, na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:789_5: sikkhākaraṇīyehi siddhattā. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? “‘Parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsessāmi, pārupissāmi,
tika-vin06t:789_6: suppaṭicchanno antaraghare gamissāmī’ti vacanato yattakena pamāṇena parimaṇḍalatā,
tika-vin06t:789_7: suppaṭicchannatā ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttakkamena sampajjatī”ti vattabbaṃ. Tesaṃ vasena
tika-vin06t:789_8: pacchimappamāṇanti siddhaṃ, tañca kho muṭṭhipañcakādi yathāvuttameva vuccate. Tenevāha
tika-vin06t:790_0: Apicettha adhippetaṃ, tathāpi na sametiyevāti attho, tasmā “yadī”tiādisambandho addhā
tika-vin06t:790_1: vutto. Yasmā paricchinno sameti ca. Itaresu pana ekaccasmiṃ ācariyavāde neva paricchedo
tika-vin06t:790_2: atthi. Ekaccasmiṃ na pubbāparaṃ sametīti sambandho. Adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānameva, paribhogakāle
tika-vin06t:790_3: pana arajitaṃ na vaṭṭati. Idaṃ sabbaṃ ticīvare eva. Imassa pana sikkhāpadassa ayaṃ
tika-vin06t:790_4: saṅkhepavinicchayo – anatthate kathine hemantānaṃ paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya atthate
tika-vin06t:790_5: kathine gimhānaṃ paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya uppannacīvaraṃ sandhāya “niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”ntiādi vuttanti.
tika-vin06t:791_0: Etthāha – “rajakehi dhovāpetvā setaṃ kārāpentassāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānamevā”ti
tika-vin06t:791_1: vacanato arajitepi adhiṭṭhānaṃ ruhati, tena sūcikammaṃ katvā rajitvā kappabinduṃ
tika-vin06t:791_2: datvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti niyamo na kātabboti? Vuccate, kātabbova patto viya adhiṭṭhito.
tika-vin06t:791_3: Yathā puna setabhāvaṃ, tambabhāvaṃ vā patto adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati, na ca pana tādiso
tika-vin06t:791_4: adhiṭṭhānaṃ upagacchati, evametaṃ daṭṭhabbanti. “Yato paṭṭhāya paribhogādayo vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin06t:792_0: Avisesena vuttavacananti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vikappetabbaṃ vikappetīti evaṃ
tika-vin06t:792_1: savisesaṃ katvā avacanaṃ “na vikappetu”nti iminā viruddhaṃ viya dissati. Idāni idaṃ
tika-vin06t:792_2: adhiṭṭhānavikappananayapaṭibaddhaṃ khandhakaṃ, parivārañca missetvā pakiṇṇakaṃ vuccati
tika-vin06t:792_3: – khandhake tāva “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ, vassikasāṭikaṃ
tika-vin06t:792_4: vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ, tato paraṃ vikappetu”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Parivāre “na
tika-vin06t:792_5: nava cīvarāni adhiṭṭhātabbāni, na nava cīvarāni vikappetabbānī”ti, “dasake dasa,
tika-vin06t:792_6: ekādasake ekādasa cīvarāni adhiṭṭhātabbāni, na vikappetabbānī”ti ca anekakkhattuṃ
tika-vin06t:792_7: vacanena suṭṭhu daḷhaṃ katvā “sabbāni cīvarāni adhiṭṭhātabbāni, na vikappetabbānī”ti
tika-vin06t:792_8: vuttaṃ, tasmā ubhopi te viruddhā viya dissanti, khandhake eva ca “vassikasāṭikaṃ
tika-vin06t:792_9: vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti vuttaṃ. Tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:792_10: “vassikasāṭikā anatirittappamāṇā nāmaṃ gahetvā vuttanayeneva cattāro vassike māse
tika-vin06t:792_11: adhiṭṭhātabbā, tato paraṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā”ti vuttaṃ. Idañca viruddhaṃ
tika-vin06t:792_12: viya dissati aññamaññaṃ hemante paccuddhārasambhavato, vassāne vikappanāsambhavato
tika-vin06t:792_13: ca. Tathā idha “anāpatti antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti vikappetī”ti vacanappamāṇato sabbattha
tika-vin06t:792_14: vikappanāya appaṭisiddhabhāvo veditabboti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ parivāravacanena viruddhaṃ
tika-vin06t:792_15: viya dissati, na hi viruddhaṃ tathāgatā bhāsanti, tasmā aṭṭhakathānayovettha paṭisaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:792_16: yena sabbampi taṃ ekarasaṃ hoti. Parivāraṭṭhakathāyañca vuttaṃ “na vikappetabbānīti
tika-vin06t:792_17: adhiṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya na vikappetabbānī”ti. Ticīvarāni adhiṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya,
tika-vin06t:792_18: vassikasāṭikādīni ca attano attano adhiṭṭhānakhette na akāmā vikappetabbānīti attho,
tika-vin06t:792_19: avasesapāḷi, attho ca idha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto, tasmā sabbampetaṃ ekarasanti.
tika-vin06t:793_0: Etthāha – yadi evaṃ “nava cīvarāni nādhiṭṭhātabbānī”ti ca vattabbaṃ. Vikappitakālato
tika-vin06t:793_1: paṭṭhāya hi nādhiṭṭhātabbānīti? Ettha vuccate – “ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ…pe…
tika-vin06t:793_2: parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”nti ettha sabbattha adhiṭṭhāne paṭisedhādassanato,
tika-vin06t:793_3: vikappanāya adassanato ca “tato para”nti dvīsveva paricchedadassanato ca “nava cīvarāni
tika-vin06t:793_4: adhiṭṭhātabbāni, na vikappetabbāni ceva vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Aparo nayo – anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:793_5: bhikkhave, ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ akāmā. Kasmā? Kāle uppannaṃ anadhiṭṭhahantassa kālātikkame
tika-vin06t:793_6: āpattisambhavato, akāle uppannaṃ anadhiṭṭhahantassa dasāhātikkame āpattisambhavato
tika-vin06t:793_7: ca. Tattha yaṃ kāle uppannaṃ appahontepi dasāhe kālātikkame āpattikaraṃ, taṃ nissajjanakāle
tika-vin06t:793_8: “idaṃ me, bhante, atirekacīvaraṃ dhāritaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṅghassā”tiādinā nissajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:793_9: itaraṃ yathāpāḷimeva. Tattha paṭhamanayo “yo pana, bhikkhu, atirekacīvaraṃ dhāreyya
tika-vin06t:793_10: nissaggiya”nti imāya paṭhamapaññattiyā vasena vutto, dutiyo anupaññattiyā vasena vutto.
tika-vin06t:794_0: Yathā ca nissajjitabbavatthumhi asati yathāpāḷiṃ avatvā kevalaṃ āpatti eva desetabbā,
tika-vin06t:794_1: yathā ca vassikasāṭikanissajjane kevalaṃ pariyiṭṭhamatte yathāpāḷiṃ avatvā yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-vin06t:794_2: nissajjitabbaṃ, tathā idampīti veditabbaṃ. Yathā saṃvaccharātikkantaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:794_5: vuccatīti eke, tasmā siddhamidaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ akāmā”ti,
tika-vin06t:794_6: tathā akāmā na vikappetunti attho. Icchāya hi sati “paccuddharitvā vippavāsasukhatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:794_7: vikappanāya okāso dinno hoti, dasāhātikkame ca anāpattī”ti vacanato vikappetuṃ anujānāmīti
tika-vin06t:794_8: vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā vassikasāṭikā akāmā adhiṭṭhātuṃ dasāhātikkame āpattisambhavato.
tika-vin06t:794_9: Kittakaṃ kālanti ce? Vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ, icchāya pana sati uddhaṃyeva vikappetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:794_10: “Sabbattha vikappanāya appaṭisiddhabhāvo veditabbo”ti hi vuttaṃ. “Atthāpatti hemante
tika-vin06t:794_11: āpajjati, no gimhe, no vasse”ti ca vuttaṃ, tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tato paraṃ
tika-vin06t:795_0: Tatrāyaṃ vicāraṇā – kadā paccuddharitabbā, kadā vikappetabbā, kiñcettha yasmā “tato
tika-vin06t:795_1: para”nti vuttaṃ. Hemantañca pattamatte sā adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati, tasmā “paccuddharitvā”ti
tika-vin06t:795_2: na vattabbaṃ adhiṭṭhānassa natthitāya, atha “antocātumāse vikappetabbā”ti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:795_3: “Tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti hi vuttanti? Ettha ekacce vadanti “vattabbameta”nti. Yathā
tika-vin06t:795_4: parivutthaparivāso, ciṇṇamānatto ca santo niṭṭhitesupi parivāsamānattadivasesu, tathā
tika-vin06t:795_5: niṭṭhitesupi adhiṭṭhānadivasesu sādhiṭṭhānametanti eke. Aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ idaṃ
tika-vin06t:795_8: ṭhapitaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsento hemante āpajjati. Kurundiyaṃ pana ‘kattikapuṇṇamadivase
tika-vin06t:795_9: apaccuddharitvā hemante āpajjatī’ti vuttaṃ, tampi suvuttaṃ. ‘Cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ,
tika-vin06t:795_10: tato paraṃ vikappetu’nti hi vutta”nti. Tattha kurundinayo pacchā vuttattā sārato
tika-vin06t:795_11: daṭṭhabbo, na purimo. Nivāsento hi gimhepi orenaddhamāsaṃ āpajjati eva. Idha ca “atthāpatti
tika-vin06t:795_12: hemante āpajjati, no gimheti vutta”nti kurundivacanassāyamattho dissati.
tika-vin06t:796_1: apaccuddhārapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, na, avikappanapaccayā dasāhaparihārasambhavato”ti
tika-vin06t:796_2: kāraṇameke vadanti. Evaṃ sati hemante pattamatte adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:796_3: tañca ayuttaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānañhi “aññassa dānena…pe… chiddabhāvenāti imehi navahi kāraṇehi
tika-vin06t:796_4: vijahatī”ti vuttaṃ, na “adhiṭṭhānakhettātikkamena vā”ti. Asādhāraṇattā na vuttanti
tika-vin06t:796_5: ce? Na, “chiddabhāvenā”ti na vattabbappasaṅgato, chiddabhāvena pana ticīvarasseva
tika-vin06t:796_6: sabbaṭṭhakathāsu adhiṭṭhānavijahanassa vuttattā. Tasmā hemantassa paṭhamadivase apaccuddhārapaccayā
tika-vin06t:796_7: dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, na paccuddharitvā avikappanapaccayā. “Vikappetu”nti vacanato tato
tika-vin06t:796_8: adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti paññāyati. Na hi kattikapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchime pāṭipadadivase
tika-vin06t:796_9: avikappetvā hemante āpajjatīti vuttanti adhippāyo, yasmā taṃ apaccuddhārapaccayā
tika-vin06t:796_10: dukkaṭaṃ hemantassa paṭhamaaruṇakkhaṇe eva āpajjati, tasmā “kattikapuṇṇamadivase
tika-vin06t:796_11: apaccuddharitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Paccuddhaṭaṃ pana hemante dasāhaparihāraṃ labhati. “Dasāhe
tika-vin06t:796_12: appahonte cīvarakālaṃ nātikkāmetabbā”ti hi vuttaṃ, tañca kho samaye uppannaṃ ce,
tika-vin06t:796_13: nāsamaye. Tathā ca sādhitaṃ apaccuddhaṭaṃ na nissaggiyaṃ hoti, no ca taṃ paridahitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:796_14: tasmā kattikapuṇṇamadivase eva paccuddharaṇañca vikappanañca kattabbanti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:796_15: ettha ca yathā atirekacīvaraṃ dasame divase vikappentena dasāhaparamaṃ dhāritaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:796_16: antodasāhe ca vikappitaṃ hoti, tathā kattikapuṇṇamāya vikappentena vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ
tika-vin06t:796_17: adhiṭṭhitañca hoti, tato paraṃ anāpattikhette eva vikappanā ca hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:796_18: Ettāvatā atthi vikappanākhette adhiṭṭhānaṃ, adhiṭṭhānakhette ca vikappanāti dīpitaṃ
tika-vin06t:796_19: hoti. Aññathā “atthāpatti adhiṭṭhānena āpajjati, anadhiṭṭhānena āpajjati. Atthāpatti
tika-vin06t:796_20: vikappanāya āpajjati, avikappanāya āpajjatī”ti dukesu dve dukāni vattabbāni siyuṃ.
tika-vin06t:796_21: Tattha paṭhamaduke paṭhamapadaṃ sambhavati. Vikappanakhette hi vassikasāṭikādīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:796_22: adhiṭṭhānena vinayātisāradukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Eteneva dutiyadukkaṭassa dutiyapadaṃ
tika-vin06t:796_23: vuttaṃ hoti. Anadhiṭṭhānena āpajjatīti natthi. Antodasāhe anāpajjanato, vikappanādisambhavato
tika-vin06t:796_24: ca vikappanāya āpajjatīti natthi sabbattha vikappanāya appaṭisiddhattā, tasmā tāni
tika-vin06t:796_25: dukāni “na labbhantī”ti na vuttāni. Etthāha – yā sā “atthāpatti hemante āpajjatī”ti
tika-vin06t:796_26: vacanappamāṇato dukkaṭāpatti sādhitā, sā sañcicca apaccuddharantassa yujjati, asatiyā
tika-vin06t:796_27: ce, kañci, anāpatti. Kattikapuṇṇamāya paccuddhaṭaṃ sañcicca avikappayato dukkaṭena
tika-vin06t:796_28: saha punadivase nissaggiyaṃ, asatiyā avikappayato nissaggiyameva idha paṭhamapaññattiyā.
tika-vin06t:796_29: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vassikasāṭikā vassānamāsātikkamenāpi, kaṇḍupaṭicchādi
tika-vin06t:796_30: ābādhavūpasamenāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati, tasmā sā tato paraṃ vikappetabbā”ti, tenetaṃ
tika-vin06t:796_31: virujjhati, na kevalaṃ idameva, “tato paraṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanañca
tika-vin06t:796_32: virujjhati. Tato paraṃ nāma hi hemantaṃ, tattha ce paccuddhāro, “vassikasāṭikā vassānamāsātikkamenāpī”tiādi
tika-vin06t:796_33: na yuttaṃ adhiṭṭhānābhāvena paccuddhārābhāvato. Avirodho ca icchitabbo, tasmā “paccuddharaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:796_34: vattamatta”ntivādo etthāpi sambhavatīti ce? Na, kurundi vacanavirodhato. Tattha hi
tika-vin06t:796_35: kattikapuṇṇamāya paccuddhāro vutto, tasmā vassānadivasattā sādhiṭṭhānāvasā paccuddharīyatīti
tika-vin06t:796_36: na paccuddhāro vattamattaṃ, tasmā “tato para”nti yāva puṇṇamā adhippetā siyā. Yathā
tika-vin06t:796_37: cāyaṃ vikappo, tathā “vassānamāsātikkamenāpi ābādhavūpasamenāpī”ti idampi avassaṃ
tika-vin06t:796_38: paccuddharitabbatāya vuttaṃ siyā. Evañca sati idha samantapāsādikāya tadavacanena
tika-vin06t:796_39: sameti. Aññathā idhapi taṃ vattabbaṃ siyāti yathāvuttova vidhi ettha sambhavati,
tika-vin06t:796_40: kiñcāpi sambhavati, duviññāpayassa pana lokassa suviññāpanatthaṃ vuttā. Yasmā pana
tika-vin06t:796_41: sā vassānātikkamena adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati, hemantapaṭhamāruṇe ca apaccuddhārapaccayā
tika-vin06t:796_42: dukkaṭā sādhitā, tasmā kattikapuṇṇamāyameva paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā, avikappitāya
tika-vin06t:796_43: “nissaggiyāpajjanamevā”ti vattabbaṃ. Ettāvatāpi santosaṃ akatvā vinicchayo pariyesitabbo. Hoti cettha –
tika-vin06t:801_0: “Tuyhaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vutte vināpi “mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti vacanena sudinnaṃ hoti. Itaro
tika-vin06t:801_1: ce adhivāseti, tenāpi suggahitaṃ hoti, no ce adhivāseti, dentena sudinnaṃ. Taṃ pana
tika-vin06t:801_2: vatthu na kassaci hoti. Tathā “mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti vadati, sāmiko ce adhivāseti, vināpi
tika-vin06t:801_3: “gaṇhāhī”ti vacanena suggahitaṃ. No ce adhivāseti, sāmikasseva taṃ, na hi tassetaṃ
tika-vin06t:801_4: vinayakammanti ettha vinayakammassatthāya ce gaṇhāti, na vaṭṭati. Na kevalaṃ attano
tika-vin06t:801_5: atthāya gahitaṃ, puna tassapi deti, vaṭṭatīti ca. Tathā anapekkho hutvā parassa vissajjetvā
tika-vin06t:801_6: puna tena dinnaṃ vā tassa vissāsanto vā paribhuñjati, vaṭṭati. Tatthāpi vinayakammavasena
tika-vin06t:801_7: na vaṭṭatīti eke. Te eva “mahantaṃ vā khuddakaṃ karotī”ti ettha “ticīvare dīghato
tika-vin06t:801_8: vidatthi anatikkamitvā chinditvā karoti, evaṃ sesesupī”ti vadanti. Evarūpesu ṭhānesu
tika-vin06t:801_9: porāṇācariyānaṃ kathāmaggaṃ suṭṭhu ācariyakulasevanāya sañjānitvā tena saṃsanditvā
tika-vin06t:801_10: sato sampajāno hutvā sotūnañca cittaṃ avimohetvā kathetabbaṃ. Esā amhākaṃ āyācanā.
tika-vin06t:804_0: 471. Santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ pakkamanti. Kasmā? Kiñcāpi “na, bhikkhave, santaruttarena
tika-vin06t:804_1: gāmo pavisitabbo, yo paviseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ. Pacchā pana
tika-vin06t:804_2: “pañcime, bhikkhave, paccayā saṅghāṭiyā nikkhepāya, uttarāsaṅgassa, antaravāsakassa
tika-vin06t:804_3: nikkhepāya gilāno vā hoti, vassikasaṅketaṃ vā, nadīpāraṃ gantuṃ vā, aggaḷaguttivihāro
tika-vin06t:804_4: vā, atthatakathinaṃ vā hotī”ti vuttattā, aṭṭhakathāyampissa “pañcasu petesu aggaḷagutti
tika-vin06t:804_5: eva pamāṇaṃ. Gutte eva hi vihāre nikkhipitvā bahi gantuṃ vaṭṭati, nāgutte”ti vuttattā
tika-vin06t:804_6: apaññattepi kathine “te bhikkhū aggaḷaguttivihāre ṭhapethā”ti vatvā sabhāgānaṃ hatthe
tika-vin06t:804_7: cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā santaruttarena gāmappavese laddhakappiyā janapadacārikaṃ pakkāmiṃsūti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:805_0: 473. Avippavāsasammutinti avippavāsatthaṃ, vippavāsapaccayā yā āpatti, tadabhāvatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:805_1: vā sammutiṃ dātunti attho. Tato paṭṭhāya vaṭṭati. Kittakaṃ kālaṃ vaṭṭatīti? Māsaṃ
tika-vin06t:805_2: vā atirekaṃ vā yāva gamane saussāho, tāva vaṭṭati. Tena vuttaṃ “dhuranikkhepaṃ karontena
tika-vin06t:805_3: paccuddharitabba”nti. Puna sammutidānakiccaṃ natthīti sace dvādasannaṃ vassānaṃ accayena
tika-vin06t:805_4: añño rogo hoti, vaṭṭati, upasampadakammaṃ viya yāvajīvaṃ ekāsammuti vaṭṭatīti ca.
tika-vin06t:806_0: “Kataṃ vā hotī”tiādi imasmiṃ sikkhāpade na vattabbaṃ, kasmā? Karaṇapalibodhe upacchinnepi
tika-vin06t:806_2: bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ hotī”ti ettakameva vattabbanti ce? Na, tadāyattattā.
tika-vin06t:806_3: Adhiṭṭhānañhi karaṇapalibodhassa niṭṭhāpanāyattaṃ, tasmā “kataṃ vātiādi vutta”nti
tika-vin06t:806_4: ca vuttaṃ. Tattha katanti pubbe vuttameva.
tika-vin06t:807_2: vippavāsalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Gāmo ekūpacārotiādimhi pana ṭhapetvā satthaṃ, rukkhamūlaṃ,
tika-vin06t:807_3: ajjhokāsañca sesesu parikkhepāparikkhepavasena ekūpacāranānūpacāratā veditabbā. Yasmā
tika-vin06t:807_4: pana satthaṃ duvidhaṃ niviṭṭhaṃ, aniviṭṭhañca, tesu aniviṭṭhaṃ ekakulassa vā nānākulassa
tika-vin06t:807_5: vā aparikkhittameva hoti, niviṭṭhaṃ siyā parikkhittaṃ, siyā aparikkhittaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin06t:807_6: tattha parikkhepādivasena adassetvā abbhantaravasena vutto. Tathā abbhokāse. Rukkhamūle
tika-vin06t:807_7: chāyāvasena. Aññathā “sattho ekūpacāro nānūpacāro”tiādi uddesavirodho siyā vibhaṅge
tika-vin06t:807_8: adassitattā, tasmā satthassa purato ca pacchato ca sattabbhantarā, passato ca ekabbhantaranti
tika-vin06t:807_9: ayamekūpacāro, tato paraṃ nānūpacāro. Tathā rukkhamūlassa yattha majjhanhike kāle
tika-vin06t:807_10: chāyā pharati, ayaṃ ekūpacāro. Itaro nānūpacāro. Kasmā? Tattha hi parikkhepo appamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:807_11: Chāyāva pamāṇaṃ. Ajjhokāsassa pāḷiyaṃ vuttova. “Satthādīnaṃ ekakulasantakavasena
tika-vin06t:807_12: ekūpacāratā”ti likhitaṃ, tasmā nivesane, udosite ca vuttaparicchedova aṭṭādīsūti
tika-vin06t:807_13: katvā saṃkhittaṃ. Tato paraṃ khettadhaññakaraṇaārāmavihāresu pana parikkhittāparikkhitta-padaṃ
tika-vin06t:807_15: pana asambhavato khettadhaññakaraṇaārāmesu na uddhaṭaṃ. Vihāre sambhavantampi tattha
tika-vin06t:807_16: pacchinnattā na uddhaṭaṃ. Kulaṃ vuccati sāmiko, tasmā “ekakulassa nānākulassā”ti
tika-vin06t:807_17: iminā gāmādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ cīvaranikkhepaṭṭhānānaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:807_18: Ajjhokāsassa pana asambhavato na vuttaṃ. Yasmā panettha ekakulassa, nānākulassa ca
tika-vin06t:807_19: aparikkhittesu gāmādīsu parihāraviseso kiñcāpi natthi, parikkhittesu pana atthi,
tika-vin06t:807_20: tasmā ekanānākulaggahaṇaṃ, ekanānūpacāraggahaṇañca sātthakanti veditabbaṃ. Tatthapi
tika-vin06t:807_21: ayaṃ viseso – satthe, rukkhamūle ca kulabhedatova bhedo, nopacārabhedato. Ajjhokāse
tika-vin06t:807_22: upacārabhedato ca, so pana pāḷiyaṃ na dassitoti. “Taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvāti vacanato
tika-vin06t:808_1: Napuṃsakaliṅgadassanatthaṃ kira “sabhāya”nti paccattavasena niddiṭṭhaṃ, tassa anupayogattā
tika-vin06t:808_2: “dvāramūla”ntipi. Attano nikkhittaṭṭhāne anikkhittattā vīthihatthapāso na rakkhati,
tika-vin06t:808_3: yasmiṃ ghare cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ ghare vatthabbaṃ. “Sabhāye vā vatthabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:808_4: dvāramūle vā, hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabba”nti hi vuttaṃ. “Hatthapāseyeva aruṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:808_5: uṭṭhapetabba”nti niyamitattā jānituṃ na sakkāti ce? Antoghare na sakkā, tathā tathā
tika-vin06t:808_6: vuttattā, tasmā “yutti pamāṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Ayamattho aṭṭhakathāyampi pakāsito, punapi
tika-vin06t:808_7: khuddakagāme sabbasādhāraṇagāmadvāravasena. Sace tassa dvāradvayaṃ hoti, majjhe ca
tika-vin06t:809_0: 480-1. Yāni nivesanādīni gāmasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchanti, tāni nivesanādīnīti adhippetāni.
tika-vin06t:809_1: Ajjhokāse aparisaṅkitampi cīvaraṃ atirekasattabbhantare nikkhittaṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:809_2: ettha antosīmatā na rakkhati, satthe pana rakkhati. “Nadīparihāro ca labbhatī”ti
tika-vin06t:809_3: vacanato udakukkhepasīmāyaṃ parihāro labbhatīti siddhaṃ. Sāmantavihāro ce ekasīmo,
tika-vin06t:813_0: Idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ, tatthāyaṃ codanāpubbaṅgamo vinicchayo – keci “diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭi”nti
tika-vin06t:813_1: vacanato “ekaccikā saṅghāṭipi nādhiṭṭhātabbā. Sace adhiṭṭhāti na ruhatī”ti vatvā
tika-vin06t:813_2: upasampadāpekkhānampi diguṇameva saṅghāṭiṃ datvā upasampādenti, te iminā suttalesena
tika-vin06t:813_3: saññāpetabbā. Bhagavatā hi “chinnakaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ chinnakaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ chinnakaṃ
tika-vin06t:813_4: antaravāsaka”nti paṭhamaṃ anuññātaṃ. Tato “aññatarassa bhikkhuno ticīvare kariyamāne
tika-vin06t:813_5: sabbaṃ chinnakaṃ nappahoti. Dve chinnakāni ekaṃ acchinnakaṃ nappahoti. Dve acchinnakāni
tika-vin06t:813_6: ekaṃ chinnakaṃ nappahotī”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, anvādhikampi
tika-vin06t:813_7: āropetu”nti anuññātaṃ, tasmā ekaccikāpi saṅghāṭi vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Yā chijjamānā
tika-vin06t:813_8: nappahoti, tassā kuto diguṇatāti. Aṭṭhakathāyampissa vuttaṃ “anvādhikampi āropetunti
tika-vin06t:813_9: āgantukapattampi dātuṃ. Idaṃ pana appahonake āropetabbaṃ. Sace pahoti, āgantukapattaṃ
tika-vin06t:813_10: na vaṭṭati, chinditabbamevā”ti. Kathinaṃ pana chinnakameva vaṭṭati āveṇikalakkhaṇattā,
tika-vin06t:813_11: “chinnakaṃ diguṇaṃ nappahotī”ti vacanābhāvato cāti sanniṭṭhānamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:814_1: Tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānābhāvato “adhiṭṭhitenevā”ti vattabbaṃ hotūti ce? Na, dhutaṅgabhedena
tika-vin06t:814_2: virodhappasaṅgato. Catutthacīvarasādiyanena hi dhutaṅgabhedo, na ticīvaravippavāsena,
tika-vin06t:814_3: nāpi atirekacīvarasādiyanena, nāpi atirekacīvaradhāraṇena. Yasmā pana bhikkhūnaṃyeva
tika-vin06t:814_4: bhagavatā adhiṭṭhānavasena nava cīvarāni anuññātāni, jātivasena ca vuttāni, na evaṃ
tika-vin06t:814_5: anupasampannānaṃ. Tasmā tesaṃ cīvaraniyamābhāvā na taṃ dhutaṅgaṃ anuññātaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:814_6: viya, tasmā tassa samādānavidhāne avacanato ca sanniṭṭhānamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:815_0: Sāsaṅkasammatoti kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ sāsaṅkasikkhāpade visuṃ aṅgāni na vuttāni, “sesamettha
tika-vin06t:815_1: cīvaravaggassa dutiyasikkhāpade vuttanayena veditabba”nti vuttaṃ, na ca panetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:815_2: Tattha rattivippavāso catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ, idha chārattavippavāso, ayamettha visesoti,
tika-vin06t:815_3: tasmā aṅgasāmaññato, sammutisāmaññato ca sāsaṅkasikkhāpadameva vadanti. Idaṃ nippadesaṃ,
tika-vin06t:815_4: taṃ sappadesaṃ māsaparamattā. Tattha bahigāmepi gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā vasitvā pakkamantassa
tika-vin06t:815_5: anāpatti, idha na tathā, idha anantare anantare aruṇuggamane nissaggiyaṃ, tattha
tika-vin06t:815_6: sattameti ayaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ viseso. Aṅgāni pana cīvaranikkhepaṅgasampattito vipariyāyena,
tika-vin06t:815_7: idha vuttanayena ca siddhattā na vuttāni. Tāni kāmaṃ na vuttāni, tathāpi catutthamaṅgaṃ
tika-vin06t:815_8: visesitabbaṃ, na pana visesitaṃ. Kiṃkāraṇā? Idha vuttanissajjanakkamena nissajjetvā
tika-vin06t:815_10: pageva chārattaṃ vippavutthaṃ. Evaṃ santepi tattha yathāvuttaaṅgasampattiyā sati
tika-vin06t:815_11: tattha vuttanayeneva nissajjitabbaṃ. Hemante vā gimhe vā nissajjati ce? Idha vuttanayenāpi
tika-vin06t:815_12: nissajjituṃ vaṭṭatīti ñāpanatthaṃ catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ na visesitanti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:815_13: Māsātikkantampi cīvaraṃ “dasāhātikkanta”nti vatvā nissaṭṭhameva. Dvayena ūnamāsaṃ
tika-vin06t:815_14: hutvā “dasāhātikkanta”nti vatvā māsātikkantanti eke. Tathāpi sace paccāsācīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:815_15: hoti, nissaggiyaṃ “dasāhātikkanta”nti vatvā, mūlacīvaraṃ pana “māsātikkanta”nti vatvā nissajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:816_0: “Santaruttara”nti vā “saṅghāṭi”nti vā “cīvara”nti vā kiṃ ticīvaraṃ, udāhu aññampīti.
tika-vin06t:816_2: Atha aññampi, “niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”nti evamādinā virodhoti? Vuccate – na niyamato veditabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:816_3: yathāsambhavaṃ gahetabbato. Tathā hi “cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ
tika-vin06t:816_4: pakkamantī”ti evamādīsu ticīvarameva. “Na, bhikkhave, santaruttarena gāmo pavisitabbo,
tika-vin06t:816_5: santaruttaraparamaṃ tato cīvaraṃ sādhitabba”nti evamādīsu yaṃkiñci, tathā saguṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:816_6: katvā saṅghāṭiyo dātabbā, nivāsanaṃ dātabbaṃ, saṅghāṭi dātabbā, handa te, āvuso,
tika-vin06t:816_7: saṅghāṭi, dehi me paṭantiādīsu. Vuttañhetaṃ “sabbañhi cīvaraṃ saṅghaṭitaṭṭhena ‘saṅghāṭī’ti
tika-vin06t:816_8: vuccatī”ti. Tathā “niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”nti etthāpīti eke. Antosamaye hi yāvadatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:816_9: cīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ kariyamānaṃ kadā niṭṭhānaṃ gacchissati, tasmā ticīvaramevāti
tika-vin06t:816_10: eke. Acīvarassānāpatti paccuddhārādisiddhitoti kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Udositasikkhāpadassa
tika-vin06t:816_11: nippayojanabhāvappasaṅgato ticīvaravippavāse tecīvarassa āpattīti eke. Tatthetaṃ
tika-vin06t:816_12: vuccati na hoti āpatti paccuddhārādisiddhito. “Anāpatti antoaruṇe paccuddharati,
tika-vin06t:816_13: vissajjetī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Aññathā paccuddharantassa, antoaruṇe vissajjentassa ca yāva
tika-vin06t:816_14: añño nādhiṭṭhāti, tāva āpattiṃ āpajjati yathāvuttanayena. Aññathā sattabbhantarena
tika-vin06t:816_15: vippavāsassāti vippavāsato yathārutaṃyeva sati vippavāse vippavāsato avippavāse sati avippavāsatoti.
tika-vin06t:819_0: 497. Nappahotīti lāmakaparicchedaṃ na pāpuṇāti, teneva ticīvarassa muṭṭhipañcakādilāmakaparicchedova
tika-vin06t:819_1: tāva vutto. Cīvare paccāsā cīvarapaccāsā. Tenetaṃ dīpeti – taṃ cīvaraṃ pacchā labbhatu
tika-vin06t:819_2: vā mā vā, yāva sā paccāsā chijjati, tāva idaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ ṭhapetuṃ anujānāmīti. “Cīvarapaccāsā”ti
tika-vin06t:819_3: mariyādatthe nissakkavacanaṃ, bhummatthe vā paccattavacanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin06t:820_0: 499-500. Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ …pe… cīvarāsā vā upacchinnātiādimhi tīsu cīvaresu aññataraṃ
tika-vin06t:820_1: kataṃ hoti, sesā atthi, rakkhati. Cīvarapalibodhassa upacchede, ubbhatasmiñca kathine
tika-vin06t:820_2: samaye vā hemantassa samaye vā akālacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya, khippameva kāretabbaṃ. Sati
tika-vin06t:820_3: pāripūriyā paccāsā na rakkhati, asati natthi ce paccāsā, na rakkhati. “Anatthate
tika-vin06t:820_4: kathine ekādasamāse uppanna”nti vacanato aparakattikā atthate vā anatthate vā samayova.
tika-vin06t:820_5: Hemanto siyā samayo atthate, siyā asamayo anatthate. Tato paraṃ ekaṃsato asamayo
tika-vin06t:820_6: vāti. “Ādissa dinna”nti idaṃ idha alabbhamānampi atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:820_7: dutiyanissaggiye sesaṃ akālacīvaraṃ viya. Tattha hi bhikkhunisaṅghassa “sampattā
tika-vin06t:820_8: bhājentū”ti evaṃ ādissa dinnameva “akālacīvaraṃ kālacīvara”nti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājentiyā
tika-vin06t:820_9: nissaggiyaṃ. Tathā hi tattha yathā “akālacīvaraṃ nāma anatthate kathine ekādasamāse
tika-vin06t:820_10: uppannaṃ, atthate kathine sattamāse uppanna”nti idaṃ atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ, evaṃsampadamidaṃ.
tika-vin06t:820_11: Yadi evaṃ “ekapuggalassa idaṃ tuyhaṃ damhīti dinna”nti idaṃ kimatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na
tika-vin06t:820_12: hi taṃ bhājanīyanti ce? Abhājanīyasāmaññato vuttaṃ hoti. Yathā saṅghassa ādissa dinnaṃ
tika-vin06t:820_13: atthatakathinehi eva bhikkhūhi abhājanīyattā akālacīvaraṃ nāma jātaṃ, evaṃ puggalikampi
tika-vin06t:820_14: itarehīti attho. Evaṃ santepi kassaci siyā “ādissa dinnampi dasāhameva parihāraṃ
tika-vin06t:820_15: labhatī”ti. Tassetaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ. Paṭhamakathine “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:820_16: kathine”ti idañhi niratthakanti. Anubbhatasmimpi hi kathine dasāhaparamameva dhāretabbanti
tika-vin06t:820_17: viññātattā anādissa dinnameva sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ siyāti ce? Evaṃ santepi anādissa
tika-vin06t:820_18: dinnampi anatthatakathinānaṃ aparakattikāya dasāhameva parihāraṃ labhati “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:820_19: bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti vuttattā. Āmantāti ce? “Anatthate kathine ekādasamāse
tika-vin06t:820_20: uppanna”nti vacanena virujjhati, tasmā yathāvuttanayenevettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:821_1: dasāhātikkamepi anāpatti parihārassa dinnattā. Yathā kathinamāsabbhantare ādissa
tika-vin06t:821_2: dinnamakālacīvaraṃ kālacīvaraparihārameva labhati, tathā itaramāsepi labhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:821_3: Tasmā evaṃ ‘niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine bhikkhuno paneva cīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:821_4: uppajjeyyā’tiādinā sikkhāpade siddhepi anatthatakathinānaṃ pacchimakattikamāsaṃ anujānantena
tika-vin06t:821_5: ‘akālacīvaraṃ uppajjeyyā’ti vuttaṃ. Evañhi avutte akālacīvaraṃ nāma ‘anatthate kathine
tika-vin06t:821_6: ekādasamāse uppanna’nti na sakkā vattuṃ. Evañhi vacanato anatthatakathinānaṃ atthatakathinānaṃ
tika-vin06t:821_7: viya sabbacīvarānaṃ pacchimakattikamāse dasāhātikkame nissaggiyaṃ na hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:822_0: Bhiyyopi evaṃ vuttaṃ – yaṃ pana mayā “paṭhamakathine dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:822_1: dhāretabba”nti anuññātaṃ, tampi kathinamāsato bahi uppannameva, na antoti ayamattho
tika-vin06t:822_2: dīpito hoti. Kathaṃ? Atirekacīvarassa dasāhaparihārato uddhaṃ āpajjitabbāpattiṃ “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:822_3: bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti anupaññattiyā kathinabbhantare vāretvā tato uddhaṃ
tika-vin06t:822_4: uppannesu dasāhātikkame āpajjitabbāpattiṃ iminā sikkhāpadena vāretuṃ “akālacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:822_5: uppajjeyyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena “kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ, etaṃ akālacīvaraṃ nāmā”ti vacanato
tika-vin06t:822_6: kathinubbhārato uddhaṃ dasāhaparihāraṃ na labhatīti dīpitaṃ hoti, tehi saddhiṃ puna
tika-vin06t:822_7: kathinubbhārato uddhaṃ pañca divasāni labhatīti pasaṅgopi “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā
tika-vin06t:822_8: ubbhatasmiṃ kathine bhikkhuno paneva akālacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya…pe… khippameva kāretabba”nti
tika-vin06t:822_9: akālacīvarassa uppattikālaṃ niyametvā vuttattā nivārito hoti, tadubhayena kathinabbhantare
tika-vin06t:822_10: uppannacīvaraṃ kathinubbhārato uddhaṃ ekadivasampi parihāraṃ na labhatīti siddhaṃ
tika-vin06t:823_0: Punapi vuttaṃ – ācariyā pana evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:823_1: kathine bhikkhuno paneva akālacīvaraṃ uppajjeyyā”ti ettha “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā
tika-vin06t:823_2: ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti vadanto evaṃ viññāpeti “etthantare tiṇṇannampi akālacīvarānaṃ
tika-vin06t:823_3: uppatti abhāva”nti. Kasmā pana padabhājane vitthāritānīti? Vuccate – idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin06t:823_4: adhiṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, kintu paṭhame dasāhaṃ anujānitvā tasmiṃ appahonte sace
tika-vin06t:823_5: paccāsā atthi, tameva vaḍḍhetvā māsaṃ anujānanto imampi atthavisesaṃ dīpeti akālacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:823_6: nāma sammukhībhūtena bhājetabbantipi dīpeti. Taṃ pana “ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabba”nti
tika-vin06t:823_7: iminā sikkhāpadena vaḍḍhetvā vuttanti, tasmā tīṇipi padabhājane vitthāritānīti.
tika-vin06t:824_0: “Khippameva kāretabbanti dasāhā kāretabba”nti idaṃ pana pahonakabhāve purimasikkhāpadalakkhaṇenāti
tika-vin06t:824_1: dīpetuṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā “evaṃ sīghanti vā lahunti vā”tiādinā avatvā “dasāhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:824_2: Atthatakathinassa evaṃ hotu, anatthate pana kathine kathanti vutte anatthatassa paṭikkhepataṃ
tika-vin06t:824_3: dassetīti vutto apassanto vighātaṃ āpajjatīti. Ekatiṃse aruṇuggamane nissaggiyanti
tika-vin06t:824_4: mahantenapi paccāsācīvarena saha ghaṭitampi tabbhāvaṃ anupatitvā nissaggiyaṃ hoti
tika-vin06t:824_5: sati pacchimappamāṇasambhave, asati na hoti, puna ghaṭite hoti, aññena ghaṭite na
tika-vin06t:824_6: hoti. Chinnaṃ aññavatthu hoti. Pubbaparicchedaṃ atikkantaṃ ghaṭitaṃ puna aññaparicchedaṃ
tika-vin06t:824_7: labhatīti eke, upaparikkhitvā gahetabbaṃ. Aññatarasmiṃ gaṇṭhipade pana “saṅghassa
tika-vin06t:824_8: vā idaṃ akālacīvaranti uddissa dinna’nti ettha saṅghassa dinne āpatti nāma natthi,
tika-vin06t:824_9: ‘sotassa raho’tiādīsu viya paduddhārena vuttaṃ, tassa lābhaṃ sandhāyāti ce? Saṅghato
tika-vin06t:824_10: vā uppajjeyyāti anena siddhattā adhikamevā”ti ca “saṅgho cīvarāni labhissati gaṇo
tika-vin06t:824_11: vā’tiādināpi pāṭho atthī”ti ca vuttaṃ. Gaṇṭhipade kosallatthaṃ pana mayā sabbaṃ likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:827_1: porāṇā. Tattha nāma tvanti tattha tayā katakamme evaṃ akattabbe sati dhovāpissasi
tika-vin06t:827_2: nāma. Atha vā so nāma tvanti attho. Ubhatosaṅghe upasampannāti bhikkhūnaṃ santike
tika-vin06t:827_3: upasampadāya paṭikkhittattā tadanupasaṅgabhayā evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. “Purāṇacīvara”nti
tika-vin06t:827_4: ettha purāṇabhāvadīpanatthameva “sakiṃ nivatthampi sakiṃ pārutampī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin06t:827_5: “cīvaraṃ nāma channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ vikappanupagaṃ pacchima”nti vacanassa
tika-vin06t:827_6: okāso na jātoti eke. Yasmā vikappanupagapacchimaṃ idha nādhippetaṃ, nivāsanapārupanupagamevādhippetaṃ,
tika-vin06t:827_7: teneva nisīdanapaccattharaṇe dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā na vuttanti eke. Jātippamāṇāvacanato
tika-vin06t:827_8: yaṃ kiñci purāṇavatthaṃ dhovāpentassa nissaggiyameva, teneva “anāpatti cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin06t:827_9: aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ dhovāpetī”ti vuttaṃ. Thavikampi hi asucimakkhitaṃ paribhuttaṃ dhovāpeti,
tika-vin06t:827_10: nissaggiyameva oḷārikattā, appatirūpattā ca. Teneva kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne
tika-vin06t:827_11: cīvaraparicchedo na vuttoti eke, vicāretvā yuttataraṃ gahetabbaṃ. “Rajitvā kappaṃ
tika-vin06t:827_12: katvāti kappiyaṃ katameva nivāsetuṃ, pārupituṃ vā vaṭṭati, netara”nti vuttaṃ. Iminā
tika-vin06t:827_13: ca majjhimattheravādo upatthambhito hoti, nopatthambhito. Rajitvātiādi pana vinayavidhidassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:827_14: vuttanti mama takko. Yathā aññātikāya aññātikasaññīvāre tīṇi catukkāni, evaṃ vematikañātikavāresu
tika-vin06t:827_15: cāti nava catukkāni honti. Etthāha – ekavāraṃ dhovitvā dhovanesu dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin06t:827_16: puna “duddhota”nti maññamānā dhovati, anāpattiyā bhavitabbaṃ, dutiyavāraṃ avuttā
tika-vin06t:827_17: dhovati nāma hotīti? Vuccate – sace bhikkhu “alaṃ ettāvatā dhotenā”ti paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin06t:827_18: puna dhovantī avuttā dhovati nāmāti yujjati. No ce, vuttāva hotīti veditabbaṃ. Bhikkhussa
tika-vin06t:827_19: liṅgaparivattane ekatoupasampannāya vasena āpatti sākiyānīnaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:828: 506. Ekena vatthunāti yena kenaci paṭhamena. “Tiṇṇaṃ catukkānaṃ vasenā”ti pāṭho. Bhikkhūnaṃ santike aṭṭhavācikāya upasampannāya pākaṭattā taṃ avatvā sākiyāniyova vuttā apākaṭattā.
tika-vin06t:831: 508-510. Apaññatte sikkhāpadeti ettha “gaṇamhā ohīyanasikkhāpade”ti likhitaṃ. Araññavāsīnisedhanasikkhāpade apaññatteti eke, “taṃ na sundara”nti vadanti. Vihatthatāyāti āyāsena.
tika-vin06t:832_0: 512. Upacāroti dvādasahattho. Mahāpaccariyaṃ, kurundiyañca vuttanti ettha rattibhāge
tika-vin06t:832_1: dhammakathikassa bhikkhuno bahūsu cīvaresu mahājanena pasādadānavasena paṭikkhittesu
tika-vin06t:832_2: punadivase “upāsakānaṃ pasādadānāni etānī”ti suddhacittena gaṇhantassa doso natthi,
tika-vin06t:832_3: “bhikkhunīhipi dinnāni idha santī”ti ñatvā gaṇhato doso. Taṃ acittakabhāvenāti bhikkhunīhi
tika-vin06t:832_4: dinnabhāvaṃ ñatvā bahūsu tassā cīvarassa ajānanenāti attho. Paṃsukūlaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvāti
tika-vin06t:832_5: “bhikkhunīhi nu kho dinnaṃ siyā”ti avikappetvā “paṃsukūlaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti gaṇhantassa
tika-vin06t:832_6: vaṭṭati. Kurundiādīsu vuttopi attho ayameva, ekaṃ, “acittakabhāvenā”ti vacanena “yathā
tika-vin06t:832_7: tathā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti uppathova paṭisedhitoti apare. Evaṃ dhammasiritthero na
tika-vin06t:832_8: vadati, ujukameva vadatīti papañcitaṃ. Tasseva visayo, tassāyaṃ adhippāyo – yathā
tika-vin06t:832_9: “paṃsukūlaṃ gaṇhissatīti ṭhapitaṃ kāmaṃ bhikkhunisantakampi avikappetvā paṃsukūlaṃ
tika-vin06t:832_10: adhiṭṭhahitvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ, tathā dhammakathikassa bhikkhuniyā dinnampi
tika-vin06t:832_11: apaññāyamānaṃ vaṭṭatīti, tasmā taṃ vuttaṃ mahāpaccariyaṃ, kurundiyañca acittakabhāvena
tika-vin06t:832_12: na sametīti. Paṭikkhepo pana vikappaggahaṇe eva ruhati. Aññathā pubbāparaṃ virujjhatīti.
tika-vin06t:832_13: Taṃ na yuttaṃ paṃsukūlena asamānattā. Paṃsukūlabhāvena saṅkārakūṭādīsu ṭhapitaṃ bhikkhunīhi,
tika-vin06t:832_14: na taṃ tassā santakaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ hoti. Assāmikañhi paṃsukūlaṃ sabbasādhāraṇañca,
tika-vin06t:832_15: aññopi gahetuṃ labhati. Idaṃ pubbeva “bhikkhunīnaṃ cīvara”nti jānitvāpi paṃsukūliko
tika-vin06t:832_16: gahetuṃ labhati tadā tassā asantakattā. “Paṃsukūlaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā”ti sallekhakkamanidassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:832_17: vuttaṃ. Maṃsaṃ dadantena tathāgatena sallekhato kappiyampi bhuttaṃ nissaggiyaṃ cīvaramāha
tika-vin06t:833_0: Acittakattā kathaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ vaṭṭatīti ce? Tāya tassa adinnattā, bhikkhunāpi tato
tika-vin06t:833_1: bhikkhunito aggahitattā ca. Assāmikampi hi paṃsukūlaṃ aññissā hatthato gaṇhāti, na
tika-vin06t:833_3: Aññātikāya santakaṃ ñātikāya hatthato gaṇhāti, vaṭṭatīti eke. Yathā sikkhamānasāmaṇerādīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:833_4: hatthato paṭiggaṇhantassa anāpatti, tathā kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyañca “aññātikāya hatthato
tika-vin06t:833_5: gahaṇa”nti aṅgaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā ñātikāya santakaṃ sikkhamānāya, sāmaṇeriyā, upāsakassa,
tika-vin06t:833_6: upāsikāya, bhikkhussa, sāmaṇerassa santakaṃ aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato gaṇhantassa
tika-vin06t:833_7: ca anāpatti evaṃ yathāvuttalakkhaṇāsambhavatoti eke, teneva “ekatoupasampannāya cīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:833_8: paṭiggaṇhātī’ti avatvā ‘hatthato paṭiggaṇhāti aññatra pārivattakā, āpatti dukkaṭassā’ti
tika-vin06t:833_9: vuttaṃ, tasmā aññātikāya santakampi ekatoupasampannāya hatthato paṭiggaṇhantassa
tika-vin06t:833_10: dukkaṭa”nti vadanti, ubhopete na sārato daṭṭhabbā, kāraṇaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:834_0: 514. Ko pana vādo pattatthavikādīsūti anadhiṭṭhātabbesu bahūsu paṭalesu. Tenevāha
tika-vin06t:834_2: vā tesaṃ parikkhārattā bhisichaviyā viya anāpatti. Kiṃ paṭaparissāvanaṃ parikkhāraṃ
tika-vin06t:834_3: na hotīti? Hoti, kintu taṃ kira nivāsanādicīvarasaṇṭhānattā na vaṭṭati. Tasmā idha
tika-vin06t:834_4: nivāsanādicīvarasādhanaṃ vikappanupagapacchimaṃ cīvaraṃ nāma. Anantarātīte nivāsanapārupanupagamevāti
tika-vin06t:834_5: sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Evaṃ sante kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ kappanupagapacchimatā, pārivattakābhāvo,
tika-vin06t:834_6: aññātikāya hatthato gahaṇanti tīṇeva aṅgāni avatvā aparikkhāratāti catutthamaṅgaṃ
tika-vin06t:834_7: vattabbanti ce? Na vattabbaṃ, imasmiṃ sikkhāpade pattatthavikādiparikkhārassa acīvarasaṅkhyattā.
tika-vin06t:834_8: Paṭhamakathinādīsu vikappanupagatā pamāṇaṃ, idha kāyaparibhogupagatāti. “Aññaṃ parikkhāra”nti
