tika-vin06t:834_10: gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati, “paṭaparissāvanampī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne ca “cīvaraṃ nāma vikappanupagapacchima”nti
tika-vin06t:834_11: vacanato paṭaparissāvanaṃ cīvarameva, na parikkhāraṃ. “Ko pana vādoti nigamanavacanampi
tika-vin06t:834_12: sādhaka”nti keci vadanti, paṇṇattiṃ ajānanato acittakaṃ, na vatthuṃ, “aññātikāya
tika-vin06t:834_13: bhikkhuniyā santakabhāvājānanato, cīvarabhāvājānanato ca acittaka”nti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:837_1: moghapurisā”ti vacanena pavāritopi adātukāmo aññātako appavāritaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti
tika-vin06t:837_2: dīpitaṃ hoti. Aññathā “anāpatti pavāritāna”nti iminā virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:838_0: 517. Neva tāva viññāpetabbaṃ, na bhañjitabbanti anacchinnānaṃ cīvarānaṃ attano santakānaṃ
tika-vin06t:838_1: atthitāya, tattha paccāsāsabbhāvato ca. Paccāsā kittakaṃ kālaṃ rakkhatīti? Yāva gāmantarā,
tika-vin06t:838_2: yāva addhayojanāti eke. Yāva dassanasavanūpacārāti eke. Yāva aññe na passantīti eke.
tika-vin06t:838_4: eke. Idaṃ sabbaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ yujjati. Kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce? “Sace pana etesaṃ
tika-vin06t:838_5: vuttappakārānaṃ gihivatthādīnaṃ bhisichavipariyantānaṃ kiñci na labbhati, tena tiṇena
tika-vin06t:838_6: vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabba”nti aṭṭhakathāvacanato.
tika-vin06t:839_0: Na tāva therānaṃ dātabbānīti na tāva attano ruciyā dātabbāni, yadā therā “dethāvuso”ti
tika-vin06t:839_1: vadanti, tadā dātabbāni. “Evaṃ sati daharāpi acchinnacīvaraṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti, sākhāpalāsaṃ
tika-vin06t:839_2: bhañjituṃ vaṭṭati, na aññathā. ‘Yehi kehici vā acchinnaṃ hotī’ti hi vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:839_3: Ācariyo pana evaṃ vadati “attano ruciyāpi dātuṃ labhantī”ti. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:839_4: “paribhogajiṇṇaṃ vā’ti ettha ca ‘acchinnacīvarānaṃ ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ attanā tiṇapaṇṇehi
tika-vin06t:839_5: paṭicchādetvā dinnacīvarampi saṅgahaṃ gacchatī’ti vattuṃ yujjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Athāpi
tika-vin06t:839_6: siyā ācariyādīhi “āharāvuso”ti vutteyeva, nāvutteti, na, “kehici vā acchinna”nti
tika-vin06t:839_7: ettha vuttalesato dutiyalesassa avisesabhāvappasaṅgatoti. Atha kimatthaṃ “na tāva
tika-vin06t:839_8: therānaṃ dātabbānī”ti vuttanti ce? Yāva therānaṃ atthāya sākhāpalāsāni bhañjati,
tika-vin06t:839_9: tāva na dātabbāni, tato tāni theruddissakāni sākhāpalāsāni sayaṃ paridahitvā vināpi
tika-vin06t:839_10: therāṇattiyā attano ruciyā dātabbāni, bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiyaṃ na hoti satthunāpi
tika-vin06t:839_11: anuññātattā. “Tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā”ti hi vuttaṃ, taṃ kappiyameva sandhāya vuttanti
tika-vin06t:839_12: ce? Na, “tadalābhe na tveva…pe… dukkaṭassā”ti vacanavirodhato. Etthāha – dukkaṭabhayā
tika-vin06t:839_13: pācittiyavatthu ce atikkamitabbaṃ, tadalābhe thullaccayavatthu saṅghikaṃ, tadalābhe
tika-vin06t:839_14: pārājikavatthupi atikkamitabbaṃ siyāti? Na, pārājikassa lokavajjattā. Apica na sabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:839_15: bhūtagāmaṃ pācittiyavatthumeva, tato dukkaṭādivatthupi atthi, anāpattivatthupi kālodisakaṃ,
tika-vin06t:839_16: tasmā idaṃ tadā anāpattivatthukanti veditabbaṃ. Kittāvatā bhikkhu acchinnacīvaro
tika-vin06t:839_17: naṭṭhacīvaro hotīti? Ettāvatā naggo hotīti eke. Vikappanupagapacchimabhāvena, vikappanupagapacchimamādiṃ
tika-vin06t:839_18: katvā viññāpentassa āpattīti eke. Nivāsanapārupanupagābhāvenāti eke. Ticīvarābhāvenāti
tika-vin06t:839_19: eke. Santaruttaraparamābhāvenāti eke. Ayaṃ ekevādo yutto “santaruttaraparamaṃ tato
tika-vin06t:839_20: cīvaraṃ sāditabba”nti hi vacanato, tasmā santaruttare sati vikappanupagapacchimaṃ
tika-vin06t:839_21: viññāpentassa paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “viññāpetvā paṭilabheyya nissaggiya”nti
tika-vin06t:839_22: sikkhāpadena bhavitabbanti ce? Tanna, tadatthasiddhito nānatthattā dhātūnaṃ. Kiṃ
tika-vin06t:839_23: vuttaṃ hoti? Yathā hi “tikkhattuṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ abhiviññāpesī”ti vutte pavattesīti
tika-vin06t:839_24: attho, tathā idhāpi “cīvaraṃ viññāpeyyā”ti viññattiyā pavatteyya uppādeyyāti attho.
tika-vin06t:840_0: Tena nivatthoti taṃnivattho. Aññassa alābhena tameva paribhuñjato jirati, na lesena.
tika-vin06t:840_1: Attanāti sayameva vattuṃ yujjati, tasmā ayuttaparibhogena aparibhuñjitvā yuttaparibhogavasena
tika-vin06t:840_2: paribhuñjato jiṇṇaṃ paribhogajiṇṇaṃ nāma. Tassa sabhāgānaṃ acchinnakāle dānampi yuttaparibhoge
tika-vin06t:840_3: eva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti adhippāyo. “Ime kira dve lesā aṭṭhakathāyo, vācentānaṃ ācariyānaṃ
tika-vin06t:841_0: 521. Nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā na labhatīti yathāsukhaṃ na labhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:841_1: “Aññassatthāyā”ti etthāpi “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti anuvattati eva. Atthāya kassa?
tika-vin06t:841_2: Tasseva aññassa. Yathā aññātake tikapācittiyaṃ, tathā appavāritepīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:841_3: “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti vuttaṃ. Aññathā “ñātake ñātakasaññī”ti iminā siddhattā
tika-vin06t:841_4: na niccaṃ sesaṃ āpajjati. Apicettha aññātakaggahaṇena appavāritaggahaṇaṃ hoti, appavāritaggahaṇena
tika-vin06t:841_5: aññātakaggahaṇaṃ, aññātakā hi appavāritā honti. Tathā ñātakaggahaṇena pavāritaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:841_6: hoti, katthaci na hoti. Na pavāritaggahaṇena ñātakaggahaṇaṃ hotīti imassa atthavisesassa
tika-vin06t:841_7: dassanatthaṃ “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā appavāritāya
tika-vin06t:841_8: ca cīvaraṃ aññatra pārivattakā paṭiggaṇhantassa āpatti. Ñātikāya pana pavāritāya
tika-vin06t:841_9: ca vissāsaṃ gaṇhāti, anāpatti. Tathā purāṇacīvaraṃ ñātikāya anāpatti, pavāritāya
tika-vin06t:841_10: pana tikapācittiyameva. Ñātakānañca ekaccānaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ nāma dātuṃ vaṭṭati, na
tika-vin06t:841_11: pavāritānaṃ. Tikacchedo ca mātikāpadeneva hoti, na aññena. Tatthāpi ekeneva, na dutiyādīhīti
tika-vin06t:844_0: 522-4. Paggāhikasālaṃ vāti dussapasāraṃ vā. Hatthena paggahetvā ṭhatvā sālāyaṃ pasāretabbadussaṃ
tika-vin06t:844_1: pasārentīti codanā. Ticīvarikenevāti vinayaticīvarikena. So hi adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitaparikkhāracoḷādīsu
tika-vin06t:844_2: santesupi ticīvare acchinne santaruttaraparamaṃ viññāpetvā gahetuṃ labhati. Aññathāpīti
tika-vin06t:844_3: “pamāṇikaṃ ticīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷavasena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjato tasmiṃ naṭṭhe
tika-vin06t:844_4: bahūnipi gahetuṃ labhati, na santaruttaraparama”nti ca, tasmā taṃ vibhāganti “ticīvarikassa
tika-vin06t:844_5: taṃ vibhāganti attho, na parikkhāracoḷikassā”ti ca keci vadanti. Ācariyo pana “aññenāti
tika-vin06t:844_6: aticīvarikena, aññathāti ito vuttaggahaṇaparicchedato aññenā”ti ettakameva vadati.
tika-vin06t:844_7: Aññathāti pana sace tīṇipi naṭṭhāni, santaruttaraparamaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ, sace dve vā
tika-vin06t:844_8: ekaṃ vā naṭṭhaṃ, tena “aññathāpī”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti eke. Gaṇṭhipadesu vicāraṇā
tika-vin06t:844_9: eva natthi, tasmā upaparikkhitvā gahetabbaṃ. Pakatiyā santaruttarena carati, sāsaṅkasikkhāpadavasena
tika-vin06t:844_10: vā taṃsammutivasena vā tatiyassa alābhena vā.
tika-vin06t:845_0: 526. “Pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti sallekhadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ micchā gahetvā ñātakādiṭṭhāne
tika-vin06t:845_1: taduttari gaṇhantassa āpattīti ce? Taṃ pāḷiyā na sameti, “anāpatti ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti
tika-vin06t:845_2: hi pāḷi. Ettha ca pavāritā nāma acchinnakālato pubbe eva pavāritā, na acchinnakāle.
tika-vin06t:845_3: “Abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyyā”ti hi vuttaṃ, tasmā yo acchinnakālassatthāya pavāreti, ubhopi
tika-vin06t:845_4: appavāritā evāti veditabbā. Te hi acchinnakāraṇā naṭṭhakāraṇāva denti nāma. Apica
tika-vin06t:845_5: yathā piṭṭhisamaye satuppādaṃ katvā ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato vassikasāṭikaṃ nipphādentassa
tika-vin06t:845_6: tena sikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ, tathā idhāpi ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānepi acchinnanaṭṭhakāraṇā
tika-vin06t:845_7: na vaṭṭati, tasmā “aṭṭhakathāsu pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī’ti vuttavacanameva pamāṇa”nti
tika-vin06t:845_8: dhammasiritthero āha, taṃ ayuttaṃ, kasmā? Yasmā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ taduttari viññāpentassa
tika-vin06t:845_9: paññattaṃ, tasmiñca “aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā”ti mātikāya pāḷi, vibhaṅge
tika-vin06t:845_10: ca “aññātako nāma mātito vā…pe… asambaddho”ti pāḷi, anāpattivāre ca “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti
tika-vin06t:845_11: pāḷi, tasmā tividhāyapi pāḷiyā na sametīti ayuttameva, tasmā kevalaṃ sallekhameva
tika-vin06t:845_12: sandhāya vuttanti apare. Upari kāṇamātāsikkhāpade aṭṭhakathāsu pana “tesampi pātheyyapaheṇakatthāya
tika-vin06t:845_13: paṭiyattato pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ, na pana “pāḷiyā na sametī”ti vuttaṃ, na
tika-vin06t:845_14: tattha ca idha ca nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati, tasmā therassa laddhi sundarā viya mama
tika-vin06t:845_15: khāyati, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Yasmā panidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃyeva
tika-vin06t:845_16: paññattaṃ, tasmā idha “aññassatthāyā”ti na vuttaṃ. “Sesaṃ uttānatthamevā”ti pāṭho.
tika-vin06t:845_17: “Aññassatthāyā”ti nidānavirodhato na vuttaṃ. Tathāpi anantare vuttanayena labbhatīti
tika-vin06t:845_18: ācariyo. Evarūpesu gahapatipaṭisaṃyuttasikkhāpadesu kiñcāpi “gahapati nāma yo koci
tika-vin06t:845_19: agāraṃ ajjhāvasatī”ti vuttaṃ, tathāpi pañca sahadhammike ṭhapetvā avasesā ca sikkhāpaccakkhātako
tika-vin06t:848_0: 527-8. Api hoti cittanti attho. Meyyāti pāṭhassa mayhanti attho. Na ime sukarā, “na
tika-vin06t:848_1: imesaṃ sukarā”ti vā pāṭho. “Tassa na imesaṃ sukarā acchādetunti attho”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:848_2: “Pubbe appavārito”ti vacanato tasmiṃ khaṇe pavāritopi appavāritova hotīti.
tika-vin06t:851_0: 532. Dutiyaupakkhaṭena kiṃpayojananti? Natthi, kevalaṃ aṭṭhuppattivasena paññattaṃ
tika-vin06t:851_1: bhikkhuniyā rahonisajjasikkhāpadaṃ viya. Evaṃ sante tanti anāropetabbaṃ bhaveyya
tika-vin06t:851_2: vināpi tena tadatthasiddhito, anissarattā, anāropetuṃ anuññātattā ca. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-vin06t:851_3: “ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, saṅgho…pe… samūhaneyyā”ti. Idaṃ sabbamakāraṇaṃ. Na hi buddhā
tika-vin06t:851_4: appayojanaṃ vācaṃ nicchārenti, pageva sikkhāpadaṃ, tenevāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tañhi
tika-vin06t:851_5: imassa anupaññattisadisa”ntiādi. Anupaññatti ca nippayojanā natthi, taṃsadisañcetaṃ,
tika-vin06t:851_6: na nippayojananti dassitaṃ hoti, evaṃ sante ko panettha visesoti? Tato āha “paṭhamasikkhāpade
tika-vin06t:851_7: ekassa pīḷā katā, dutiye dvinnaṃ, ayamettha viseso”ti. Iminā atthavisesena ko panañño
tika-vin06t:851_8: atirekattho dassitoti? Porāṇagaṇṭhipade tāva vuttaṃ “ekasmimpi vatthusmiṃ ubhinnaṃ
tika-vin06t:851_9: pīḷā kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ayamatirekattho dassito”ti. Tenetaṃ dīpeti “na kevalaṃ paṭiladdhacīvaragaṇanāyeva
tika-vin06t:857: Apicetaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ taṃjātikesu sikkhāpadesu sabbesupi gahetabbavinicchayassa nayadassanappayojananti veditabbaṃ. Āha ca –
tika-vin06t:862_0: Tassāyaṃ saṅkhepato adhippāyapubbaṅgamā vicāraṇā – purāṇacīvaraṃ ekameva bhikkhu
tika-vin06t:862_1: bhikkhunīhi dvīhi, bahūhi vā dhovāpeti, bhikkhunigaṇanāya pācittiyagaṇanā, tathā
tika-vin06t:862_2: dvinnaṃ, bahūnaṃ vā sādhāraṇaṃ ekameva cīvaraṃ aññatra pārivattakā paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:862_3: idhāpi tathā dvinnaṃ, bahūnaṃ vā sādhāraṇamekaṃ viññāpeti, viññattapuggalagaṇanāya
tika-vin06t:862_4: āpattigaṇanā. Tathā aññesupi evarūpesu sikkhāpadesu nayo netabbo. Ayaṃ tāva bahutāya
tika-vin06t:862_5: nayo. Missatāya pana ñātikāya, aññātikāya ca ekaṃ dhovāpeti, ekato niṭṭhāpane ekaṃ
tika-vin06t:862_6: pācittiyaṃ. Atha ñātikā paṭhamaṃ thokaṃ dhovitvā ṭhitā, puna aññātikā sudhotaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:862_7: nissaggiyaṃ. Atha aññātikā paṭhamaṃ dhovati, pacchā ñātikā sudhotaṃ karoti, aññātikāya
tika-vin06t:862_8: payogavasena bhikkhuno dukkaṭameva. Aññātikāya ca ñātikāya ca aññātikasaññī, vematiko,
tika-vin06t:862_9: ñātikasaññī vā dhovāpeti, yathāvuttanayena nissaggiyadukkaṭādiāpattibhedagaṇanā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:862_10: Tathā aññātikāya ca ñātikāya ca santakaṃ cīvaraṃ ubhohi ekato diyyamānaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa,
tika-vin06t:862_11: aññātikāya eva hatthato paṭiggaṇhantassa ca nissaggiyameva. Atha ñātikāya anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:862_12: Atha ubhosu aññātikādisaññī vuttanayeneva nissaggiyadukkaṭādiāpattibhedagaṇanā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:862_13: Tathā aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadesupi yathāsambhavaṃ nayo netabbo. Ayaṃ missatāya
tika-vin06t:862_14: nayo. Ādi-saddena pana aneke aññātikā viññattāviññattapuggalagaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ. Eko
tika-vin06t:862_15: deti, eko na deti, nissaggiyaṃ. Atha aviññatto deti, na nissaggiyaṃ. Atha viññattāviññattānaṃ
tika-vin06t:862_16: sādhāraṇaṃ viññatto deti, nissaggiyameva. Ubho denti, nissaggiyameva. Aviññatto deti,
tika-vin06t:862_17: nissaggiyena anāpatti. Viññattassa vacanena aviññatto deti, anāpatti eva. Tathā upakkhaṭādīsupi
tika-vin06t:865_0: 537. “Na kho mayaṃ, āvuso, cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma…pe… kālena kappiya”nti ito
tika-vin06t:865_1: pubbe eva rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇasikkhāpadassa paññattattā vuttaṃ. Aññathā āyasmā upanando
tika-vin06t:865_2: maṃsassa cetāpannaṃ ekampi kahāpaṇaṃ hatthena paṭiggaṇhanto tato mahantataraṃ cīvaracetāpannaṃ
tika-vin06t:865_3: kathaṃ na paṭiggaṇhissati, evaṃ santepi cīvarapaṭisaṃyuttattā cīvaravagge saṅgāyiṃsūti.
tika-vin06t:866_0: 538-9. “Āgatakāraṇaṃ bhañjatī”ti vuttattā nanu puna codetuṃ na labhatīti eke. Āgamanassa
tika-vin06t:866_1: sātthakaṃ na hoti, cīvaraṃ na labhissati paṭisanthārassa katattāti eke. Codanālakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:866_2: na hotīti katvā vuttanti eke. “Ṭhatvā codemī”ti āgato taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhañjati, karoti
tika-vin06t:866_3: cekaṃ, tīṇipi ce karoti, ekameva, ekavacanattāti eke. Tīṇi ṭhānāni bhañjatīti eke.
tika-vin06t:866_4: Upatissatthero “na codanādiṃ bhañjati, codetukāmo akattabbaṃ akāsi, tena vattabhede
tika-vin06t:866_5: dukkaṭa”nti vadati. Dhammasiritthero pana “āsane ce nisīdati, ekāya nisajjāya dve
tika-vin06t:866_6: ṭhānāni bhañjati. Āmisaṃ ce paṭiggaṇhāti, ekena paṭiggahena dve ṭhānāni bhañjati.
tika-vin06t:866_7: Dhammaṃ ce bhāsati, dhammadesanasikkhāpade vuttaparicchedāya ekāya vācāya dve ṭhānāni
tika-vin06t:866_8: bhañjati, taṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vadati. “Yatthā”ti vutte attano eva santikaṃ gantabbanti
tika-vin06t:866_9: vuttaṃ viya hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “byañjanaṃ pana na sametī”ti. Upāsakehi āṇattā taṃ.
tika-vin06t:866_10: Mūlaṃ asādiyantenāti mūlassa akappiyabhāve sati asādiyantena. Tañca kho cittena,
tika-vin06t:866_11: na mukhena. Sace evaṃ vutte akappiyaṃ dassetīti katvā cittena akappiyaṃ icchantova
tika-vin06t:866_12: mukhena kappiyaṃ niddisati “cīvaraṃ me dethā”ti, na vaṭṭati. Paṭilābhe rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇasikkhāpadena āpatti.
tika-vin06t:867_0: Tatrāyaṃ vicāraṇā – cittena sādiyantopi mukhena kappiyavohārena ce voharati “kahāpaṇārahena,
tika-vin06t:867_1: pādārahena vā kappiyabhaṇḍena idañcidañca āharā”ti. Kiñcāpi rūpiyaṃ sandhāya vadati,
tika-vin06t:867_2: vaṭṭati eva. Kasmā? Kañci sassuṭṭhānakaṃ bhūmipadesaṃ sandhāya “sīmaṃ demāti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:867_3: vaṭṭatī”ti vacanato, “vihārassa demā”ti vutte “paṭikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vacanato
tika-vin06t:867_4: ca. Anugaṇṭhipade pana vuttaṃ “saṅghaṃ sandhāya ‘vihārassa demā’ti dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin06t:867_5: na hoti, dakkhiṇodakaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ, ‘sādhū’ti ca vattuṃ, anumodetuñca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:867_6: Kasmā? Saṅghassa ‘vihāro’ti nāmābhāvato, khettasseva ‘sīmā’ti nāmabhāvato ca, cittena
tika-vin06t:867_7: ārammaṇaṃ kataṃ appamāṇaṃ, kappiyavohārova pamāṇaṃ. Kappiyamevācikkhitattā ‘na tvevāhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:867_8: bhikkhave, kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabbaṃ pariyesitabbanti vadāmī’ti
tika-vin06t:867_9: vacanenapi na virujjhati. Kappiyavacanapaccayā dāyako sayameva kattabbayuttakaṃ jānissatīti
tika-vin06t:867_10: adhippāyato dāyakena etassa adhippāyaṃ ñatvā kappiyakārakassa hatthe ṭhapitaṃ bhikkhussa
tika-vin06t:867_11: santakameva hotī”ti. Idaṃ sabbamayuttaṃ, kasmā? Sīmāvihāravacanassa dāyakavacanattā.
tika-vin06t:867_12: Idha ca bhikkhuno vacanaṃ pamāṇaṃ. Tenevāha “athāpi ‘mama taḷākaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ
tika-vin06t:867_13: vā saṅghassa dammī’ti vutte ‘sādhu, upāsaka, saṅgho pānīyaṃ pivissatī’tiādīni vatvā
tika-vin06t:867_14: paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati evā”ti. Aññathā khettaṃ sandhāya bhikkhuno khettapaṭibaddhavacanāni
tika-vin06t:867_15: sīmāvacanena kappantīti āpajjati. Avihārassa ca bhikkhussa rūpiyaṃ dassetvā “idaṃ
tika-vin06t:867_16: vihārassa dammī”ti vutte attano atthāya diyyamānaṃ jānantenāpi taṃ appaṭikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:867_17: Tathā kahāpaṇārahādino akappiyabhaṇḍabhāvaṃ, kahāpaṇādibhāvameva vā jānantameva sandhāya
tika-vin06t:867_18: tathāvoharantassa ca anāpattīti āpajjati. “Na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kenaci pariyāyenā”ti
tika-vin06t:867_19: nippadesato vuttattā na sakkā lesaṃ oḍḍetunti no takko, vicāretvā pana gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:867_20: “No ce icchati, na kathetabba”nti vacanato yathāvuttasāmiciyā akaraṇe anāpatti dukkaṭassāti dasseti.
tika-vin06t:868_0: “Aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabba”nti vacanato yathāvuttasāmicimpi na katvā
tika-vin06t:868_1: ce nipphādeti, aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena kāretabboti dasseti. Kappiyakārakā sayameva
tika-vin06t:868_2: codetvā denti, vaṭṭati. “Sayaṃ karaṇameva paṭikkhitta”nti ca vadanti. Piṇḍapātādīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:868_3: …pe… eseva nayoti ettha “dukkaṭa”nti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ, dadantesupīti api-saddena
tika-vin06t:868_5: ca vikappenti. Taṃ visesetvā navuttattā pācittiyamevāti dasseti. “Nissaggiyamevāti
tika-vin06t:868_6: yevāpanakasikkhāpadesu siyā”ti vadanti, upaparikkhitabbaṃ. “Yassa kassaci hi aññassa…pe…
tika-vin06t:868_7: mahāpaccariyaṃ vutta”nti vacanato apabbajitānaṃ antamaso mātāpitūnampi atthāya sampaṭicchantassa
tika-vin06t:869_0: Sabbattha sampaṭicchanaṃ nāma “uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyyavā upanikkhittaṃ vā sādiyeyyā”ti
tika-vin06t:869_1: evaṃ vuttalakkhaṇameva. Evaṃ santepi katthaci paṭikkhipitabbaṃ, katthaci na paṭikkhipitabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:869_2: katthaci paṭikkhittaṃ sādituṃ vaṭṭati, evaṃ appaṭikkhittaṃ kiñci vaṭṭati, idaṃ sabbampi
tika-vin06t:869_3: dassetuṃ “sace panā”ti vitthāro āraddho. Tattha “cetiyassa…pe… na vaṭṭatī”ti vacanato
tika-vin06t:869_4: appaṭikkhittaṃ vihārassa dinnaṃ sādituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Tathā therassa “mātuyā
tika-vin06t:869_5: demā”tiādinā vuttepi paṭiggahaṇe āpatti pācittiyameva. Sāpattiko hotīti ettha kāya
tika-vin06t:869_6: āpattiyā sāpattiko hotīti? Dukkaṭāpattiyāti eke. Na yāya kāyaci, kevalaṃ aṭṭhāne
tika-vin06t:869_7: codetīti katvā “sāpattiko”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā kathanti? “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi
tika-vin06t:869_8: samannāgato saddhivihāriko paṇāmetabbo…pe… paṇāmento anatisāro”ti ettha na sammāvattantaṃyeva
tika-vin06t:869_9: apaṇāmentassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathāha – “na ca, bhikkhave, asammāvattanto na paṇāmetabbo,
tika-vin06t:869_10: yo na paṇāmeyya, āpattidukkaṭassā”ti, tasmā adhimattapemādiabhāvepi apaṇāmentassa
tika-vin06t:869_11: anāpatti dissati. Apica “sātisāro hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin06t:869_12: “sātisāro hotīti sadoso hoti, āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti vuttattā na yuttanti ce? Na, tadanantarameva
tika-vin06t:869_13: taṃmicchāgāhanivattanatthaṃ, tasmā “na sammāvattanto paṇāmetabbo”ti vuttattā anāpattikā
tika-vin06t:869_14: katāti. Dukkaṭāpatti hotīti ācariyo, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. “Kappiyabhaṇḍampi akappiyamevāti
tika-vin06t:869_15: taḷākato nipphannadhaññena parivattetvā laddhaṃ gorasampi na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:870_1: hotīti idaṃ parato “tasseva akappiyaṃ. Kasmā? Dhaññassa vicāritattā”ti iminā asadisaṃ,
tika-vin06t:870_2: tasmā suvuttaṃ. Idañhi bhikkhussa payogavasena ādito paṭṭhāya uppannena missanti.
tika-vin06t:870_3: Akatapubbaṃ navasassaṃ nāma. Khale vā ṭhatvā rakkhatīti “idaṃ vā ettakaṃ vā mā gaṇha,
tika-vin06t:870_4: idaṃ gahetuṃ labbhatī”ti vā “ito apanehi, idha puñjaṃ karohī”ti evamādinā vā payogena
tika-vin06t:870_5: ce rakkhati, taṃ akappiyaṃ. “Sace ‘mayiṭhite rakkhitaṃ hotī’ti rakkhati, gaṇhante
tika-vin06t:870_6: vā passitvā ‘kiṃ karothā’ti, bhaṇati vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ. Rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇasikkhāpade
tika-vin06t:870_7: “dvāraṃ pidahitvā rakkhantena vasitabba”nti hi vuttaṃ. Tasseva taṃ akappiyaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:870_8: Apubbassa anuppāditattā. Heṭṭhā “sassaṃ katvā āharathā”ti vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin06t:870_9: Paṇṇepi eseva nayo. “Pakatiyā sayameva karontānaṃ ussāhajananato”ti vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:870_10: “Kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattā”ti vacanato, pageva uṭṭhāpitattāti siddhaṃ hoti. Sace dāyakā
tika-vin06t:870_11: vā saṅghassa gāmakhettārāmādiṃ keṇiyā gahitamanussā vā tattha kuṭumbino “ime saṅghassa
tika-vin06t:870_12: kahāpaṇā āhaṭā”ti vadanti, “na kappatī”ti ettakameva vattabbaṃ. Kappiyakārakāva ce
tika-vin06t:870_13: vadanti, “saṅghassa kahāpaṇā na kappanti, sappiādīni vaṭṭantī”ti vattabbaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin06t:870_14: “saṅghassa kappiyakārake vā guttaṭṭhānaṃ vā ācikkhathā”ti vatvā tehi sampāditaṃ kenaci
tika-vin06t:870_15: akattabbatāya “iminā sappiṃ āharāhī”ti vicāreti niṭṭhāpetvā itaresaṃ kappiyaṃ parato
tika-vin06t:870_16: pattacatukke catutthapatto viya. Vuttañhi tattha “ime kahāpaṇe gahetvā imaṃ dehī’ti
tika-vin06t:870_17: kahāpaṇe dāpetvā gahito, ayaṃ patto etasseva bhikkhuno na vaṭṭati, dubbicāritattā,
tika-vin06t:870_18: aññesaṃ pana vaṭṭati, mūlassa asampaṭicchitattā”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ sabbesaṃ akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin06t:870_19: Kasmā? Kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattāti. Idaṃ duvuttanti ce? Na, mūlassa sampaṭicchitaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:870_20: sandhāya imassa vuttattā pattacatukke dutiyatatiyapattā viya, teneva vuttaṃ sayaṃkārivāre
tika-vin06t:870_21: “na kappatī”ti ettakameva vattabba’nti. Tato paraṃ mūlaṃ sampaṭicchati nāma.
tika-vin06t:877_0: 542. Kosiyakārakoti ettha kosaṃ karontīti “kosakārā”ti laddhavohārānaṃ pāṇakānaṃ
tika-vin06t:877_1: kosato nibbattaṃ kosiyaṃ nāma. Attanā kataṃ ce? Nissajjanakāle “sayaṃ kataṃ nissaggiya”nti
tika-vin06t:877_2: vattabbaṃ. Ubhohi ce kataṃ, yathāpāṭhameva vattabbaṃ. Attanā ca parehi ca vippakataṃ
tika-vin06t:877_3: attanā pariyosāpetītiādicatukkampi sambhavantaṃ na dassitaṃ. Vinayadhammatā hesā,
tika-vin06t:877_4: yadidaṃ ekasmiṃ tike vā catukke vā dassite itaraṃ sambhavantampi na vuccatīti.
tika-vin06t:880_0: 547. Suddhakāḷakānanti ettha yathā paṭhame “ekenapi kosiyaṃsunā”ti vuttaṃ, tathā
tika-vin06t:880_1: idha “ekenapi aññena amissetvā”ti vacanābhāvato aññehi missabhāve satipi apaññāyamānarūpakaṃ
tika-vin06t:883_0: 552. “Dhārayitvā dve tulā ādātabbā”ti vacanato yathā tulādhāraṇāya kāḷakā adhikā
tika-vin06t:883_1: na honti, tathā kāḷakānaṃ dve bhāvā gahetabbā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena. Kathaṃ paññāyatīti?
tika-vin06t:883_2: Suddhakāḷakapaṭisedhananidānena. Tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ catutthaṃ gocariyānanti heṭṭhimaparicchedo.
tika-vin06t:883_3: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ekassapi kāḷakalomassa atirekabhāve nissaggiya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:883_4: taṃ tulādhāraṇāya kiñcāpi na sameti, acittakattā pana sikkhāpadassa pubbe tulāya
tika-vin06t:883_5: dhārayitvā ṭhapitesu ekampi lomaṃ tattha pateyya nissaggiyanti adhippāyoti no takko.
tika-vin06t:883_6: Aññathā dve tulā nādātabbā, ūnakatarā ādātabbā siyuṃ. Na hi lomaṃ gaṇetvā tulādhāraṇā
tika-vin06t:883_7: karīyati. Atha gaṇetvāva kātabbaṃ. Kiṃ tulādhāraṇāya payojananti keci. “Gocariyaodātesu
tika-vin06t:883_8: ekameva diguṇaṃ katvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avicāritattā vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:886_0: 562. Navaṃ nāma karaṇaṃ upādāyāti idaṃ ādikaraṇato paṭṭhāya vassagaṇanaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:886_1: Karitvā vāti vacanaṃ niṭṭhānadivasato paṭṭhāyāti dīpeti. Dhāretabbanti vacanaṃ pana
tika-vin06t:886_2: paribhogato paṭṭhāyāti dīpeti, yasmā laddhasammutikassa gatagataṭṭhāne channaṃ channaṃ
tika-vin06t:886_3: vassānaṃ oratova katāni bahūnipi honti, tasmā aññaṃ navanti kiṃ katato aññaṃ, udāhu
tika-vin06t:886_4: dhāritato aññanti? Kiñcettha yadi katato aññaṃ, tesu aññataraṃ dukkataṃ vā paribhogajiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:886_5: vā puna kātuṃ vaṭṭati, tañca kho vināpi purāṇasanthatassa sugatavidatthiṃ appaṭisiddhapariyāpannattā.
tika-vin06t:886_6: Katato hi aññaṃ paṭisiddhaṃ, idañca pubbakatanti tato anantarasikkhāpadavirodho hoti.
tika-vin06t:886_7: Atha dhāritato aññaṃ nāma, sammuti niratthikā āpajjati, paṭhamakataṃ ce aparibhuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:886_8: satiyāpi sammutiyā aññaṃ navaṃ na vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo? Tatridaṃ sanniṭṭhānanidassanaṃ
tika-vin06t:886_9: – niṭṭhānadivasato paṭṭhāya channaṃ channaṃ vassānaṃ paricchedo veditabbo. Tattha
tika-vin06t:886_10: ca sattame vasse sampatte chabbassāni paripuṇṇāni honti. Tañca kho māsaparicchedavasena,
tika-vin06t:886_11: na vassaparicchedavasena. Sattame paripuṇṇañca ūnakañca vassaṃ nāma, tasmā vippakatasseva
tika-vin06t:886_12: sace chabbassāni pūrenti, puna niṭṭhānadivasato paṭṭhāya chabbassāni labhanti. Tañca
tika-vin06t:886_13: kho paribhuttaṃ vā hotu aparibhuttaṃ vā, dhāritameva nāma. Yasmā “navaṃ nāma karaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:886_14: upādāya vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā channaṃ vassānaṃ parato tameva pubbakataṃ dukkatabhāvena,
tika-vin06t:886_15: paribhogajiṇṇatāya vā vijaṭetvā puna karoti, niṭṭhānadivasato paṭṭhāya chabbassaparamatā
tika-vin06t:886_16: dhāretabbaṃ, atirekaṃ vā. Anto ce karoti, tadeva aññaṃ navaṃ nāma hoti karaṇaṃ upādāya,
tika-vin06t:886_17: tasmā nissaggiyaṃ. Aññathā “navaṃ nāma karaṇaṃ upādāyā”ti iminā na koci viseso atthi.
tika-vin06t:886_18: Evaṃ sante kiṃ hoti? Aṭṭhuppattīti. “Yācanabahulā viññattibahulā viharantī”ti hi
tika-vin06t:886_19: tattha vuttaṃ, tañca aññassa karaṇaṃ dīpeti. Yadi evaṃ taṃ nibbisesameva āpajjatīti?
tika-vin06t:886_20: Nāpajjati. Ayaṃ panassa viseso, yasmā “aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, anāpattī”ti
tika-vin06t:886_21: vuttattho visesoti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? “Navaṃ nāma karaṇaṃ upādāya vuccatī”ti vutte
tika-vin06t:886_22: atirekacīvarassa uppatti viya paṭilābhenassa uppatti navatā āpajjati. Tato paṭiladdhadivasato
tika-vin06t:886_23: paṭṭhāya chabbassaparamatā dhāretabbaṃ. Orena ce channaṃ vassānaṃ…pe… kārāpeyya,
tika-vin06t:886_24: nissaggiyanti āpajjati, tasmā navaṃ nāma karaṇameva upādāya vuccati, na paṭilābhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:886_25: Orena channaṃ vassānaṃ attano anuppannattā “nava”nti saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ, appaṭiladdhaṃ
tika-vin06t:886_26: ce kārāpeyya, yathā lābho, tathā kareyya vā kārāpeyya vāti ca na hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā
tika-vin06t:886_27: aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, anāpattīti visesoti.
tika-vin06t:889_0: 565. Nāssudha kocīti ettha assudha-iti avadhāraṇatthe nipāto. Tattha kiñcāpi “evaṃ
tika-vin06t:889_1: bhanteti kho te bhikkhū”ti bahuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ, tathāpi te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā
tika-vin06t:889_2: idha tesu bhikkhūsu koci bhagavantaṃ nāssudha upasaṅkamati aññatra ekenāti attho
tika-vin06t:889_3: gahetabbo. Taṃ suggāhaṃ ekāhaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ varantiādīsu viya, anujānāmi…pe…
tika-vin06t:889_4: yathāsukhaṃ maṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamantūti dassanatthāya upasaṅkamantu.
tika-vin06t:890_0: 566-7. “Mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ upasena”nti tassa gaṇapāmokkhattā vuttaṃ. Āraññikapiṇḍapātikapaṃsukūlikavasena
tika-vin06t:890_1: sabbāni vuttāni. Tenevāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “santhate catutthacīvarasaññitāyā”ti. Kiṃ
tika-vin06t:890_2: sabbepi te cīvaraṃ na bujjhantīti ce? Yathā hotu. Katamaṃ cīvaraṃ nāmāti? Channaṃ
tika-vin06t:890_3: aññataraṃ vikappanupagaṃ pacchimanti. Kiñca vāyimaṃ avāyimanti? Vāyimamevāti. Katarasuttenāti?
tika-vin06t:890_4: Addhā so suttameva na passati, siveyyakaṃ dussayugaṃ, iddhimayikañca devadattiyañca
tika-vin06t:890_5: acīvaraṃ karoti. Yadi evaṃ avāyimampīti vadāmīti. Evaṃ sante siddhā santhate cīvarasaññitā
tika-vin06t:890_6: kambalasīsena uṇṇāmayasāmaññato. Kiṃ pana te santhataṃ adhiṭṭhahiṃsūti? Duṭṭhu adhiṭṭhahiṃsu
tika-vin06t:890_7: acīvarattā, na adhiṭṭhānupagattā ca santhatassa. Atha nādhiṭṭhahiṃsu, pubbeva tattha
tika-vin06t:890_8: acīvarasaññino eteti katvā tattha cīvarasaññitāya tadubhayaṃ na yujjatīti. Kiṃ panetaṃ
tika-vin06t:890_9: adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ natthīti? Tatthevāgataṃ, apicetaṃ avikappanupagaṃ ce, cīvaraṃ na
tika-vin06t:890_10: hoti, aññathā “cīvaraṃ nāma channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññatara”nti ettāvatā siddhaṃ “vikappanupagaṃ
tika-vin06t:890_11: pacchima”nti na vattabbaṃ. Atha na vikappanupagampi cīvarameva siddhaṃ, anadhiṭṭhānupagaṃ,
tika-vin06t:891_0: Apica santhate cīvarasaññitā na kevalaṃ tesaṃyeva, aññesampi anubandhati eva “purāṇasanthataṃ
tika-vin06t:891_1: nāma sakiṃ nivatthampi sakiṃ pārutampī”ti vacanato. Aṭṭhakathācariyo panassa acīvarataṃ
tika-vin06t:891_2: sandhāyabhāsitatthadīpanena dīpeti. Nivatthapārutanti etesaṃ nisinnañceva nipannañcāti
tika-vin06t:891_3: attho. Apica evaṃ santepi santhate cīvarasaññitā anubandhati eva. Khandhake hi “nisīdanaṃ
tika-vin06t:891_4: adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”nti ca, parivāre “nava cīvarāni adhiṭṭhātabbānī”ti ca nisīdanasikkhāpade
tika-vin06t:891_5: “dasā vidatthī”ti ca idha “nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī”ti ca vuttaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyañcassa
tika-vin06t:891_6: “santhatasadisaṃ santharitvā ekasmiṃ ante sugatavidatthiyā vidatthimattapadese dvīsu
tika-vin06t:891_7: ṭhānesu phāletvā tisso dasā karīyanti, tāhi dasāhi sadasaṃ nāma vuccatī”ti ca “nisīdanaṃ
tika-vin06t:891_8: vuttanayena adhiṭṭhātabbameva, tañca kho pamāṇayuttaṃ ekameva, dve na vaṭṭantī”ti
tika-vin06t:891_9: ca vuttaṃ, tasmā nisīdanaṃ nāma navannaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:891_10: tañca santhatasadisaṃ eḷakalomamayasanthatavisesanti siddhaṃ, tathā nisīdanameva
tika-vin06t:891_11: nisīdanasanthatañca siddhaṃ. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade ca “ekamevā”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ siddhe
tika-vin06t:891_12: siddhā santhate cīvarasaññitāti attho. Kasmā? Santhatasāmaññato.
tika-vin06t:892_0: Etthāha – kathaṃ adasameva santhataṃ cīvarasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati. Anekampi anadhiṭṭhitampi
tika-vin06t:892_1: mahantampi vaṭṭati, yato sadasameva santhataṃ cīvarasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati, tato adhiṭṭhānañca
tika-vin06t:892_2: upagacchatīti. Asanthatapariyāpannattā orena ca channaṃ vassānaṃ vināpi sammutiṃ,
tika-vin06t:892_3: tañca porāṇaṃ vissajjetvā eva, na avissajjetvā “tañca kho pamāṇayuttaṃ ekameva, dve
tika-vin06t:892_4: na vaṭṭantī”ti vacanatoti. Athāpi siyā santhataṃ sayanatthameva karīyati, nisīdanaṃ
tika-vin06t:892_5: asanthatamevāti. Tañca na niyamato “purāṇasanthataṃ nāma sakiṃ nivatthaṃ sakiṃ pārutampī”ti
tika-vin06t:892_6: vuttattāti. Ettha vuccati, na ettha kāraṇaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ vinayapaññattiyā anaññavisayattā.
tika-vin06t:893_0: Santhatassa pana acīvarabhāve ayaṃ yutti – ādito “tīṇi santhatāni pana vinayakammaṃ
tika-vin06t:893_1: katvā paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭantī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato tāni akappiyānīti
tika-vin06t:893_2: siddhaṃ, bhagavatā ca khomādīni cha anuññātānīti koseyyaṃ kappiyanti siddhaṃ. Evaṃ
tika-vin06t:893_3: sante suddhakoseyyampi cīvaraṃ kappiyaṃ jātaṃ, pageva kosiyamissakasanthatacīvaranti
tika-vin06t:893_4: āpajjati. Tathā kambalañca anuññātaṃ, tañca suddhikampi hoti jātikāḷakabhāvena, pageva
tika-vin06t:893_5: odātagocariyamissakasanthatacīvaranti āpajjati. Tato ca aññamaññavirodho, tasmā na
tika-vin06t:893_6: santhataṃ cīvaraṃ nāma hoti, nisīdanaṃ pana hoti tassa pamāṇasaṇṭhānaparicchedasambhavato.
tika-vin06t:893_7: Etthāhu keci ācariyā “duvidhaṃ nisīdanaṃ santhataṃ, asanthatañca. Tattha santhataṃ
tika-vin06t:893_8: santhatameva. Asanthataṃ khomādichabbidhaṃ, tadanulomaṃ vā hoti, ayametesaṃ viseso”ti.
tika-vin06t:894_0: Etthāha – kasmā panettha “santhataṃ pana bhikkhunā”ti sikkhāpadaṃ apaññāpetvā “nisīdanasanthata”nti
tika-vin06t:894_1: paññattanti? Cīvarasaññitāya santhatānaṃ ujjhitattā tesaṃ acīvarabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:894_2: tathā paññattanti vuttaṃ hoti, tasmā te bhikkhū dhutaṅgabhedabhayā tāni ujjhitvā
tika-vin06t:894_3: terasāpi dhutaṅgāni samādiyiṃsu, sīsadassanavasena tīṇeva vuttāni, bhagavā ca tesaṃ
tika-vin06t:894_4: santhataṃ anujāni, tato nesaṃ evaṃ hoti “nisīdanacīvarasaṇṭhānampetaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ
tika-vin06t:894_5: no anuññātaṃ, catutthacīvarabhāvena pageva katasanthataṃ vā”ti. Tato santhate nesaṃ
tika-vin06t:894_6: cīvarasaññitā na bhavissatīti tadatthaṃ bhagavatā nisīdanasanthatanti paññattanti
tika-vin06t:894_7: adhippāyo. “Pacchimāni dve vaṭṭantī”ti kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce? “Anāpatti aññena kataṃ
tika-vin06t:897_1: tiyojanaparamameva haritabbāni, pageva appaṭipannassāti dasseti. Addhānamaggappaṭipannassa
tika-vin06t:897_2: nissaggiyanti vā sambandho. Teneva vāsādhippāyassa paṭippassaddhagamanussāhattā “appaṭipanno”ti
tika-vin06t:897_3: saṅkhyaṃ gatassa anāpattīti siddhā. Imasmiṃ atthavikappe hi bhikkhuno paneva eḷakalomāni
tika-vin06t:897_4: uppajjeyyuṃ…pe… asantepi hārake addhānaṃ maggappaṭipannassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti
tika-vin06t:897_5: yojanā veditabbā. Ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbānīti attano santakānaṃyeva
tika-vin06t:897_6: tiyojanātikkame āpattiṃ dasseti. Tena anākaṅkhamānena parasantakāni paṭiggahitāni
tika-vin06t:897_7: atirekatiyojanaṃ harantassa anāpatti siddhā. Ayamattho “bhikkhuno uppajjeyyu”nti
tika-vin06t:897_8: iminā, “acchinnaṃ paṭilabhitvā”ti iminā ca dīpitova hotīti. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade ca “aññaṃ
tika-vin06t:897_9: bhikkhuṃ harāpento gacchati ce, dvinnaṃ anāpattīti vuttaṃ, tasmā dve bhikkhū tiyojanaparamaṃ
tika-vin06t:897_10: patvā aññamaññassa bhaṇḍaṃ parivattetvā ce haranti, anāpattīti siddhaṃ, teneva anāpattivāre
tika-vin06t:897_11: “aññaṃ harāpetī”ti vuttaṃ. Kiṃ harāpeti? Jānantaṃ ajānantaṃ. Kiñcettha yadi jānantaṃ,
tika-vin06t:897_12: “añño harissatīti ṭhapeti, tena haritepi āpattiyevā”ti ekaṃsato na vattabbaṃ. Jānantopi
tika-vin06t:897_13: hi ekacco haratīti. Tato aṭṭhakathāya virujjhati. Atha ajānantaṃ, “aññassa yāne vā
tika-vin06t:897_14: bhaṇḍe vā ajānantassa pakkhipitvā tiyojanaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyānī”ti pāḷiyā virujjhati,
tika-vin06t:897_15: atha ubhopi ekato ekaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ harāpenti, tampi nissaggiyaṃ siyā. Anissaggiyanti
tika-vin06t:897_16: yuttiyā virujjhati “tiyojanaparamaṃ sahatthā haritabbāni asante hārake”ti avisesena
tika-vin06t:897_17: ca pāḷi vuttā. Hārakopi sacetano acetanoti duvidho. Sacetanopi eḷakalomabhāvaṃ vā
tika-vin06t:897_18: “ahamidaṃ harāmī”ti vā “maṃ esa idaṃ harāpetī”ti vā jānanājānanavasena duvidho hoti.
tika-vin06t:897_19: Tattha acetano nāma hārako nadīsoto vā nāvā vā assāmikayānaṃ vā hoti. Sacetano pākaṭova.
tika-vin06t:897_20: Tattha “maṃ esa idaṃ harāpetī”ti ettakaṃ jānantaṃ manussaṃ vā tiracchānagataṃ vā
tika-vin06t:897_21: aññaṃ harāpeti, anāpattīti anugaṇṭhipadanayo. Ayaṃ pāḷiyā, aṭṭhakathāya ca ekaraso
tika-vin06t:897_22: vinicchayo, “asante hārake”ti kiñcāpi idaṃ avisesato vuttaṃ, “aññassa yāne vā bhaṇḍe
tika-vin06t:897_23: vā ajānantassā”ti vacanato pana sacetanova hārako tattha adhippetoti paññāyati, so
tika-vin06t:897_24: ca eḷakalomabhāvañca “idaṃ harāmī”ti ca jānanto nādhippeto. Tena vuttaṃ “añño harissatīti
tika-vin06t:897_25: ṭhapeti, tena haritepi āpattiyevā”tiādi. Tattha hetukattuno abhāvatova. Pāḷiyañhi
tika-vin06t:897_26: “aññaṃ harāpetī”ti hetukattuvasena vuttā. Itare dve jānantā idha sambhavanti. “Ajānantassa
tika-vin06t:897_27: pakkhipitvā”ti pāḷiyaṃ “esa harāpetī”ti vā “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamāpetī”ti vā jānantassa
tika-vin06t:897_28: yāne vā bhaṇḍe vā pakkhipitvā tiyojanaṃ atikkamāpeti, na nissaggiyā hontīti dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:898_0: “Harāpetī”ti idaṃ hetukattuvacanataṃ sādheti, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sāmikassa ajānantassevā”ti
tika-vin06t:898_1: idaṃ “maṃ esa harāpetī”ti evaṃ ajānantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Sāreti codeti anubandhāpetī”ti
tika-vin06t:898_2: idaṃ “maṃ esa idaṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamāpetī”ti evaṃ jānantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ajānantopi
tika-vin06t:898_3: sāraṇādīhi ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ nātikkamati, na vā anubandhati. Atha sāraṇādīhi anatikkamitvā
tika-vin06t:898_4: attano ruciyā atikkamati āpatti eva bhikkhuno hetukattubhāvāsambhavato.
tika-vin06t:899_0: Idāni yathāṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya vakkhāma, “asantepi hārake”ti hārakālābhapaccayāpi
tika-vin06t:899_1: sayaṃ haraṇato nissaggiyameva, pageva sati hāraketi ayameko attho. Avadhāraṇatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:899_2: api-saddaṃ gahetvā asante eva hārake nissaggiyaṃ, sati pana hārake na tena harāpentassa
tika-vin06t:899_3: nissaggiyanti ayaṃ dutiyo attho. “Saṅghato vā…pe… attano vā dhanenā”ti iminā kiñcāpi
tika-vin06t:899_4: acittakamidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ, saṅghādito pana attanā ākaṅkhamānena paṭiggahitasseva
tika-vin06t:899_5: eḷakalomassa tiyojanātikkame āpatti, na ajānato appaṭiggahitassa cīvarādīsu kutoci
tika-vin06t:899_6: laggassa atikkamaneti dīpeti. Anugaṇṭhipade pana “kambalassa upari nipajjitvā gacchantassa
tika-vin06t:899_7: sace ekampi lomaṃ cīvare laggaṃ hoti, āpatti eva kambalato vijaṭitattā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:899_8: taṃ kambalassa paṭiggahitattā attano icchāya paṭiggahitameva hotīti yuttaṃ. Yasmā
tika-vin06t:899_9: “anāpatti katabhaṇḍe”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā taṃ anekampi katabhaṇḍaṭṭhāniyameva hoti. Tañhi
tika-vin06t:899_10: anena paṭiggahitaṃ, na lomaṃ. Atha lomampi aggahitameva hoti, katabhaṇḍaṃ dupparihāriyalomavinibbhogakatabhaṇḍo
tika-vin06t:899_11: niyamo. Evaṃ sante akatabhaṇḍe tikapācittiyaṃ, katabhaṇḍe tikadukkaṭañca nayato dassetabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:899_12: bhaveyya, aññathā tikassa dassitattā. Saussāhattāti appaṭippassaddhagamanattā. Acittakattā
tika-vin06t:899_13: cāti bhikkhuno ussāhānurūpaṃ lomānaṃ tiyojanātikkamanato vināpi payogacittena haraṇacittena
tika-vin06t:899_14: āpajjati evāti adhippāyo. Sā anāpatti pāḷiyā na sametīti anto pana payogena tiyojanaparamaṃ
tika-vin06t:899_15: atikkamitattā anāpatti. “Tiyojanaṃ haratī”ti iminā tiyojanaṃ padasā netukāmopi antotiyojane
tika-vin06t:899_16: pade pade dukkaṭaṃ nāpajjatīti dasseti, taṃ yuttaṃ “tiyojanaṃ vāsādhippāyo gantvā
tika-vin06t:899_17: tato paraṃ haratī’ti vacanassatthitāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Punapi vuttaṃ “aññaṃ harāpetīti
tika-vin06t:899_18: ‘idaṃ harissāmī’ti saussāhameva aññaṃ harāpetīti attho. Itarathā gacchantassa sīse
tika-vin06t:899_19: ṭhapesi, tasmiṃ ajānantepi anāpatti siyā”ti. Sace pana “agacchante yāne vā”tiādinā
tika-vin06t:899_20: nayena vuttattā haraṇādīhi janitaussāhānaṃ hatthiādīnaṃ ‘idaṃ karissāmā’ti vā ‘harissāmā’ti
tika-vin06t:899_21: vā ābhoge janite eva anāpatti, na ajaniteti upatissatthero āhā”ti ca vuttaṃ. Parivattetvā
tika-vin06t:899_22: ṭhapiteti dvinnampi bahi nikkhipitattāti upatissatthero. Bahisīmāya ṭhapitaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ
tika-vin06t:899_23: anto antosīmāyaṃ ṭhapitaṃ bahi karoto anāpattīti keci, na sundaraṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:900: 575. Paṭilabhitvā haratīti paṭhamatiyojanato paraṃ harati, na dutiyāditoti attho. Katabhaṇḍe uppannokāsābhāvā anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:903_0: 581. Kiñcāpi purāṇacīvaradhovanasikkhāpade cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā “aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ dhovāpetī”ti
tika-vin06t:903_1: anāpattivāre vuttaṃ. Imassa pana sikkhāpadassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya eḷakalomadhovāpanādinā
tika-vin06t:903_2: āpattīti eke. Sā vā anāpatti mūlāpattito eva, na imamhāti eke. Eḷakalomānaṃ aparikkhārattā
tika-vin06t:903_3: bhaṭṭhaṃ aggahaṇamevāti eke. Imassa antimanayassa atthappakāsanatthaṃ idaṃ pañhākammaṃ
tika-vin06t:903_5: sappadesavācipadaṃ. Kiñcettha yadi nippadesavācipadaṃ, sabbattha idameva vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:903_6: na itarāni. Atha sappadesavācipadaṃ, “avuttā dhovati, aparibhuttaṃ dhovāpetī”ti ettha
tika-vin06t:903_7: virodho. “Avuttā rajati vijaṭeti, nissaggiya”nti aniṭṭhappasaṅgatoti? Desanāvilāsamattaṃ
tika-vin06t:903_8: bhagavato vacanaṃ, katthaci tikapadavacanaṃ, katthaci ekapadavacanaṃ, nippadesapadameva
tika-vin06t:903_9: te vadantīti. Sace “katabhaṇḍaṃ dhovāpetī”ti ettha paṭivirodho, “katabhaṇḍaṃ vijaṭāpeti,
tika-vin06t:903_10: anāpattī”ti aniṭṭhappasaṅgato anāpatti evāti ce? Na, akatabhaṇḍassa suddhalomassa
tika-vin06t:903_11: vijaṭāpanaṃ ito vā dātabbaṃ. Udakādidhovanavasena piṇḍetvā ṭhitānaṃ vijaṭāpanaṃ labbhatīti
tika-vin06t:903_12: ce? Purāṇasanthatassa vijaṭāpane anāpattiyā bhavitabbaṃ, na ca taṃ yuttaṃ “aparibhuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:903_13: dhovāpetī”ti vacanato. Tena paribhuttaṃ dhovāpeti rajāpeti vijaṭāpeti, nissaggiyamevāti
tika-vin06t:903_14: siddhaṃ hoti, tañca paribhuttaṃ nāma katabhaṇḍameva hoti. Na hi sakkā eḷakalomāni
tika-vin06t:903_15: paribhuñjituṃ, aññathā “paribhuttaṃ dhovāpetī”ti vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ hoti. Na hi
tika-vin06t:903_16: ettha “purāṇāni eḷakalomāni dhovāpeyya vā”ti vacanaṃ atthi purāṇacīvarasikkhāpade
tika-vin06t:903_17: viya. Tattha ādinnakappavasena, idha taṃ likhitaṃ. Lekhadosoti ce? Na, visesahetuno
tika-vin06t:903_19: vacanato ca. Kiñcāpi iminā saddena ayamattho siddho, “dhovāpetī”ti idaṃ pana siyā
tika-vin06t:903_20: nippadesaṃ. Siyā sappadesaṃ. Tañhi “avuttā dhovatī”tiādīsu nippadesaṃ. “Katabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin06t:903_21: dhovāpetī”ti ettha sappadesaṃ. “Akatabhaṇḍaṃ dhovāpeti rajāpeti, anāpattī”ti “vijaṭāpeti,
tika-vin06t:903_22: anāpattī”ti vacanappamāṇato anāpatti evāti ce? Na, vacanappamāṇato eva āpattīti āpajjanato.
tika-vin06t:903_23: “Aparibhuttaṃ dhovāpetī”ti vacanameva hi taṃ aparibhuttaṃ santhataṃ vijaṭāpentassa
tika-vin06t:903_24: anāpattīti dīpeti ce? Siddhaṃ paribhuttaṃ vijaṭāpentassa āpatti evāti.
tika-vin06t:906_0: 583-4. Sabbampīti tividhampi. “Muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho’tiādi pana kiñcāpi rājasikkhāpade
tika-vin06t:906_1: ‘na vaṭṭatī’ti pasaṅgato vuttaṃ, sarūpato pana āpattidassanavasena sakaṭṭhānepi vattumāraddha”nti
tika-vin06t:906_2: vuttaṃ. Kathametaṃ? Muttādīnaṃ sakaṭṭhānaṃ jātaṃ, na hi tāni idha pāḷiyaṃ dissantīti
tika-vin06t:906_3: imassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttāni, rājasikkhāpadassapi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttānīti. Na kevalaṃ
tika-vin06t:906_5: sāmaññena, na sarūpato. Pāḷiyaṃ pana sarūpato “cīvaracetāpannaṃ nāma hiraññaṃ vā
tika-vin06t:906_6: suvaṇṇaṃ vā muttā vā maṇi vā”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ, tasmā rājasikkhāpadamevassa sakaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin06t:906_7: Muttāmaṇiggahaṇena cettha tajjātiyaggahaṇaṃ siddhamevāti nāgato imassa paṭhamameva
tika-vin06t:906_8: paññattattā. Yadi evaṃ idha anāgatattā kataraṃ nesaṃ sakaṭṭhānanti? Idameva atthato, no sarūpato.
tika-vin06t:907_0: Kathaṃ? Etāni hi ratanasikkhāpade nissaggiyavatthūni, dukkaṭavatthūni ca ekato “ratana”nti
tika-vin06t:907_1: āgatāni, “ratanasammata”nti kappiyavatthu āgataṃ. Tesu ca dasasu ratanesu rajatajātarūpadvayaṃ
tika-vin06t:907_2: idha nissaggiyavatthu, avasesaṃ dukkaṭavatthūti siddhaṃ. Idha ca siddhattā eva ratanasikkhāpadassa
tika-vin06t:907_3: anāpattivāre “ratanasammataṃ vissāsaṃ gaṇhāti, tāvakālikaṃ gaṇhāti, paṃsukūlasaññissā”ti
tika-vin06t:907_4: vuttaṃ, na ratanaṃ vuttaṃ. Sattavidhadhaññadāsidāsakhettādi pana brahmajālādisuttavasena
tika-vin06t:907_5: akappiyanti siddhaṃ, tasmā idha dukkaṭavatthūti siddhaṃ, teneva anuyogavatte “dhammaṃ
tika-vin06t:907_6: jānāti, dhammānulomaṃ, vinayaṃ, vinayānulomaṃ jānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā āmakamaṃsampi
tika-vin06t:907_7: dukkaṭavatthuṃ āpajjatīti? Na, idha vinaye anuññātattā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, amanussikābādhe
tika-vin06t:907_8: āmakamaṃsa”ntiādinā, tasmā na āmakamaṃsaṃ sutte āgatampi dukkaṭavatthu hoti, tathāpi
tika-vin06t:907_9: attano paribhogatthāya paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭamevāti no takkoti ācariyo. “Idha nikkhipāhī’ti
tika-vin06t:907_10: vutte upanikkhittasādiyanameva hotī”ti vadanti. “Akappiyavicāraṇā eva na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin06t:907_11: ce? Kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitanti ettha taṃ sayaṃ aparibhogārahaṃ hutvā
tika-vin06t:907_12: tadagghanakaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ paribhogārahaṃ hutvā ṭhitanti attho”ti likhitaṃ, “paṃsukūlabhāvena
tika-vin06t:907_13: ṭhitattā, guttaṭṭhānācikkhanassa kappiyattā ca kappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. ‘Idaṃ gaṇhā’tiādinā
tika-vin06t:907_14: vadantassa akappiyattā akappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhita”nti ca. Evampi kappiyañca akappiyañcāti
tika-vin06t:907_15: “imasmiṃ okāse ṭhapitaṃ, kiṃ na passasīti chekatare imeva kahāpaṇe”tiādivacanassa
tika-vin06t:907_16: kappiyattā kappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. “Idaṃ gaṇhā”ti vutte dubbicāritattā attano akappiyattā
tika-vin06t:907_17: tato āgataṃ akappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitameva hoti. “Idaṃ gaṇhā’ti vutte tena gahite ‘uggaṇhāpeyya
tika-vin06t:907_18: vā’ti vuttavidhiṃ na pāpuṇāti, kevalaṃ dubbicāritattā tasseva taṃ akappiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:907_19: mūlapaṭiggahaṇassa suddhattā parato pattacatukke tatiyapatto viyāti ca evaṃ upatissatthero
tika-vin06t:907_20: vadatī”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Kiṃ bahunā, visuddhāgamattā kappiyaṃ. Dubbicāraṇāya
tika-vin06t:907_21: sati akappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ hotīti no takkoti ācariyo. “Evaṃ saṅghagaṇādīnampi
tika-vin06t:907_22: atthāya pariccattepi tena samānagatikattā ṭhapetvā āpattivisesa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:908_0: Na kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpitanti cetāpitañce, upāyābhāvaṃ dasseti. “Upanikkhepaṃ
tika-vin06t:908_1: ṭhapetvāti sace so upāsako ‘atibahuṃ etaṃ hiraññaṃ, idaṃ bhante ajjeva na vināsetabba’nti
tika-vin06t:908_2: vatvā sayaṃ upanikkhepadese ṭhapeti, aññena vā ṭhapāpeti, etaṃ upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin06t:908_3: tato laddhaṃ udayaṃ paribhuñjanto saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjati nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:909_0: 585. Ayaṃ kira itthaṃlakkhaṇasampanno ukkaṃsato. Evaṃ aṅgasampannopi aparabhāge lobhavasena
tika-vin06t:909_1: vā aññena vā kāraṇena sace nimittaṃ katvā pāteti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Senāsanampi
tika-vin06t:909_2: paribhoge paribhogeti pavese pavese. So hi kāraṇantarena rukkhamūlikassa, abbhokāsikassapi
tika-vin06t:909_3: vaṭṭati eva, ṭhānanisajjādivasena nivāsādhippāye sati paribhoge paribhoge paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:909_4: Bhesajjassa satipaccayatā sabbakālampīti eke. Asannihitassa pacchābhattameva, sannihitassa
tika-vin06t:909_5: purebhattampīti no takkoti ācariyo. “Yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāya…pe…
tika-vin06t:909_6: paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:909_7: Dukkaṭañhi vikālabhojanasikkhāpade āgataṃ vikāle āpajjati, no kāle āhārakālattā,
tika-vin06t:909_8: sannidhisikkhāpade āgataṃ pana kālepi sannidhijātattā, teneva tattha sattāhakālikayāvajīvikadvayameva
tika-vin06t:909_9: vuttanti. “Sati paccaye”ti vacanato nāyaṃ viseso labbhatīti ce? Na, aniṭṭhappasaṅgato,
tika-vin06t:909_10: vacanāniyamato ca. Sannidhisikkhāpade hi “anāpatti yāvakālikaṃ yāvakālaṃ nidahitvā
tika-vin06t:909_11: bhuñjati. Yāmakālikaṃ yāme nidahitvā bhuñjatī”ti ettha vacanappamāṇato yāmakālikaṃ
tika-vin06t:909_12: na purebhatte, na pacchābhatte, na divase, na rattiyaṃ yāmameva nidahitvā bhuñjantassa
tika-vin06t:909_13: anāpattīti aniṭṭhappasaṅgo. Tathā tattheva “yāmakālikaṃ yāmaṃ nidahitvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin06t:909_14: sattāhakālikaṃ sattāhaṃ nidahitvā bhuñjatī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “sati
tika-vin06t:909_15: paccaye”ti, tasmā satipaccaya-vacanaṃ katthaci hoti, katthaci na hotīti vacanāniyamato
tika-vin06t:909_16: āpattiyāpi aniyamo siyā. Evaṃ santepi yathāvuttadukkaṭaṃ āpajjati eva. Na anāhārappayojanattā
tika-vin06t:909_17: yāmakālikādīnanti ce? Na, sappiādimissabhojanassa paṇītabhojanabhāvappattito. Apica
tika-vin06t:909_18: sabbakālikesu yāvakālikaṃ oḷārikaṃ, taṃ āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhantassa kāle anāpatti,
tika-vin06t:909_19: pageva anoḷārikaṃ yāmakālikādiṃ, āhāratthāya eva anuññātattā. Yāvakālike eva anāpattīti
tika-vin06t:909_20: ce? Na, anāhāratthāya gaṇhantassa āpattisambhavato itaraṃ āhāratthāya gaṇhantassa
tika-vin06t:909_21: viya, tasmā yathāvuttamevettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ pāḷiṃ, yuttiñca anulometīti.
tika-vin06t:910_0: Desanāsuddhīti ettha desanā nāma vinayakammaṃ, tena vuṭṭhānampi desanā eva nāma hotīti.
tika-vin06t:910_1: “Paṭiggaṇhātī”ti avatvā “paṭisevatī”ti vuttattā paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge
tika-vin06t:910_2: karontassa anāpatti. Khīṇāsavā katakiccattā vibhattadāyādā viya honti, tena tesaṃ
tika-vin06t:910_3: sāmiparibhogā honti. Aññathā yāvakālikabhāvaṃ anatikkantattā virujjhati. Iṇaparibhogo
tika-vin06t:910_4: na vaṭṭati, bhesajje āpattito, itarasmiṃ ayuttaparibhogato, iṇaṃ viya ananuññātabhuttattā
tika-vin06t:910_5: ca. “Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthi, tasmā na koci saṅkitabbo”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:910_6: Bhārabhūtā saddhivihārikādayo. Yathādānameva gahitattāti ettha “attano hatthena ce
tika-vin06t:910_7: deti, na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ, “atirekabhāgaṃ gahetvā punadivase attano atthāya uddhaṭabhāgaṃ
tika-vin06t:910_8: tattheva dāpeti, vaṭṭatī”ti ca. Parivattakaṃ deti, dhammiyañce, vaṭṭati. No adhammiyaṃ.
tika-vin06t:910_9: “Taṃ dhammānuggahena uggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Kena lesenāti ce? “Alabbhamānāya
tika-vin06t:910_10: sāmaggiyā anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāse”ti iminā upasampadakkhandhakavacanalesena.
tika-vin06t:911_0: 586. Assatiyā dinnanti ettha “assatiyā dinnaṃ nāma apariccattaṃ hoti, tasmā dussante
tika-vin06t:911_1: baddhakahāpaṇādīni satiṃ paṭilabhitvā dāyakā ce puna gaṇhanti, nissaggiyameva desetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:911_2: Tena akappiyabhaṇḍena te ce dāyakā sappiādīni kiṇitvā saṅghassa denti, tassapi bhikkhuno
tika-vin06t:911_3: kappati dāyakānaṃyeva santakattā. Bhikkhunā hi ‘vatthaṃ gaṇhāmī’ti vatthasaññāya
tika-vin06t:911_4: eva gahitaṃ, na rūpiyasaññāya. Idañca sikkhāpadaṃ attano atthāya uggahaṇaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:911_5: vuttaṃ, na ca tena taṃ attano atthāya paresaṃ vā atthāya gahitaṃ. Atha te dāyakā
tika-vin06t:911_6: no ce āgantvā gaṇhanti, dāyake pucchitvā attano atthāya ce pariccattaṃ, saṅghe nissajjitvā
tika-vin06t:911_7: āpatti desetabbā. No ce, āpatti eva desetabbā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ pubbāparaviruddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:911_8: Āpattidesanāya hi sati rūpiyaṃ paṭiggahitanti siddhaṃ, tasmiṃ siddhe “tato uppannaṃ
tika-vin06t:911_9: tassapi kappatī”ti idaṃ na yujjatīti. Kappati evāti ce? Na, vatthuṃ anissajjitvā
tika-vin06t:911_10: āpatti desetabbāti na yujjati. Acittakattā sikkhāpadassa yujjatīti ce? Na, sabbattha
tika-vin06t:911_11: “rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhātī”ti vacanato. “Rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhātī”ti hi vuttaṃ, aññathā sabbattha
tika-vin06t:911_12: “rūpiya”nti padaṃ niratthakaṃ hoti vināpi tena tadatthasiddhito. Anena ca vatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:911_13: paṭiggahitaṃ, dāyakena ca vatthameva dinnaṃ, vatthagatampi rūpiyaṃ theyyacittena
tika-vin06t:911_14: gaṇhanto padavārena kāretabbo. Aṭṭhakathāyañca “rūpiye arūpiyasaññīti suvaṇṇādīsu
tika-vin06t:912_0: “Apica puññakāmā”tiādi pana vidhānantaradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, teneva hi “imasmiṃ gehe
tika-vin06t:912_1: idaṃ laddhanti sallakkhetabba”nti vuttaṃ. Aññathā sallakkhaṇe vimativasena, vimatiyā
tika-vin06t:912_2: ca sati nissaggiyameva “rūpiye vematiko”tiādi vacanatoti. Idaṃ vidhānaṃ niratthakameva
tika-vin06t:912_3: āpajjati, na ca niratthakaṃ. Kasmā? Dussante baddhakahāpaṇādi assatiyā dinnaṃ vatthasaññāya
tika-vin06t:912_4: paṭiggahitañca, tato na rūpiyaṃ dinnañca hoti paṭiggahitañcāti. Ettha āpattidesanākiccaṃ
tika-vin06t:912_5: natthi, taṃ pana dāyakānameva paṭidātabbaṃ. Tato uppannaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍañca sabbesaṃ
tika-vin06t:912_6: kappatīti imassa vidhānantaradassanatthaṃ “apica puññakāmā”tiādīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:915_1: satthuvaṇṇo kahāpaṇo”tiādi pāḷivacanañca. “Arūpiye rūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ cetāpetī”tiādi
tika-vin06t:915_3: pācittiyaṃ garukassa cetāpitattā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato ca pana anukkaṭṭhaparicchedopettha
tika-vin06t:915_4: labbhatīti siddhaṃ. Satthuvaṇṇo ca kahāpaṇo ca tato ye caññe vohāraṃ gacchantīti
tika-vin06t:915_5: evamettha samuccayo veditabbo. Imasmiṃ pana sikkhāpade “nānappakārakaṃ nāma katampi
tika-vin06t:915_6: akatampi katākatampī”ti ettha vibhattānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ rūpiyārūpiyānañca dvinnaṃ vasena
tika-vin06t:915_7: pañca tikā vuttā, aṭṭhakathācariyehi tadanulomato eko tiko dassitoti sabbe cha honti.
tika-vin06t:916_0: Etthāha – aññasmiṃ sikkhāpade ekasmiṃ tikacchede dassite satipi sambhave itare na
tika-vin06t:916_1: dassīyanti, idheva kasmā dassitoti? “Nānappakāraka”nti mātikāyaṃ vuttattā idheva
tika-vin06t:916_3: Na, idha dassitanayattā. Atha ca rūpiyassa vibhaṅge “ye vohāraṃ gacchantī”ti ante
tika-vin06t:916_4: vuttattā satthuvaṇṇādayo vaḷañjanupagā evāti siddhaṃ. Tato avaḷañjanupagehi jātarūparajatehi
tika-vin06t:916_5: vohārena na nissaggiyanti āpajjati, tasmā taṃ āpajjanatthanti dassentena “katena
tika-vin06t:916_6: kataṃ cetāpetī”tiādayo tikā vuttāti, evaṃ sante rūpiyavibhaṅge “ye ca vohāraṃ gacchantī”ti
tika-vin06t:916_7: na vattabbaṃ, tasmiṃ pade avutte avaḷañjanupagāpi saṅgahaṃ gatāva hontīti katādīhi
tika-vin06t:916_8: tikattayassa vattabbapayojanaṃ na bhavissatīti ce? Na, kappiyabhaṇḍena kappiyabhaṇḍapaavattanassāpi
tika-vin06t:916_9: rūpiyasaṃvohārabhāvappasaṅgato. “Ye vohāraṃ gacchantī”ti vacanenapi kamuka kathala
tika-vin06t:916_10: kaṃsabhājana sāṭakādiparivattanassapi rūpiyasaṃvohārabhāvappasaṅgo evāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:916_12: yadetaṃ katākatādibhedaṃ pākatikarūpiyaṃ yañca kahāpaṇamāsakasaṅkhepaṃ, yañca kahāpaṇādivohārūpagaṃ,
tika-vin06t:916_13: ubhayampetaṃ idha ca anantarātītasikkhāpade ca rūpiyaṃ nāmāti adhippetatthasiddhi
tika-vin06t:916_14: hoti, na taṇḍulādīni, tattha katādivohārāsambhavato. Ettāvatā katāditikattayappayojanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:917_0: Idāni sesattikāni vuccati – ettha hi yathāvuttappabhedaṃ nissaggiyavatthu rūpiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:917_1: nāma, sesaṃ dukkaṭavatthupi kappiyavatthupi na rūpiyanti arūpiyaṃ nāma hotīti katvā
tika-vin06t:917_2: “arūpiye arūpiyasaññī pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ anāpattī”ti idaṃ na ekaṃsikaṃ āpajjati
tika-vin06t:917_3: dukkaṭavatthumhi dukkaṭāpajjanato. Idha vacanappamāṇato nissaggiyavatthuto aññaṃ
tika-vin06t:917_4: antamaso muttādipi arūpiyameva nāma. Tattha pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ anāpattīti
tika-vin06t:917_5: ce? Na, rājasikkhāpadavirodhato. Tattha hi “muttā vā maṇi vā”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā muttādi
tika-vin06t:917_6: akappiyaṃ dukkaṭavatthūti ca siddhaṃ nissaggiyavatthūsu abhāvā. Evaṃ sante “arūpiye
tika-vin06t:917_7: arūpiyasaññī pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ anāpattī”ti suddhakappiyabhaṇḍaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:917_8: vuttaṃ, na sabbaṃ arūpiyaṃ. Tato aññattha pana “arūpiye rūpiyasaññī”tiāditikadukkaṭe
tika-vin06t:917_9: ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitatike ca sabbaṃ arūpiyaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ, tasmā arūpiyabhāvadīpanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:917_10: dutiyo tiko vutto. Tadatthameva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassito eko tiko. Kasmā na pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:917_11: so vuttoti ce? Tattha cetāpitaarūpiye rūpiyachaḍḍanakasammutikiccābhāvato. Tasmiñhi
tika-vin06t:917_12: tike vutte kappiyavatthunopi arūpiyachaḍḍanakasammuti dātabbāti āpajjati, tassa vasena
tika-vin06t:917_13: rūpiyachaḍḍanakasammuti eva na vattabbāti? Na, rūpiyassapi sammutikiccābhāvappasaṅgato,
tika-vin06t:917_14: tasmā rūpiye rūpiyasaññī kappiyavatthuṃ cetāpeti pattacatukke tatiyapattaṃ viya,
tika-vin06t:917_15: taṃ saṅghādīnaṃ nissajjitabbaṃ, nissaṭṭhaṃ pana aññesaṃ kappati tatiyapatto viya.
tika-vin06t:917_16: Atha sampaṭicchitarūpiyena cetāpitaṃ hoti dutiyapatto viya, taṃ vināpi sammutiyā
tika-vin06t:917_17: yo koci bhikkhu chaḍḍeti, vaṭṭati. Tato paraṃ “sace tattha āgacchati ārāmiko vā”tiādinā
tika-vin06t:917_18: vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Tattha “rūpiye”ti vā “arūpiye”ti vā sabbattha bhummappatte
tika-vin06t:917_19: attano santakaṃ, upayogappatte parasantakanti veditabbaṃ. Etthāha – upatissatthero
tika-vin06t:917_20: purimasikkhāpadena rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇaṃ vāritaṃ, iminā suddhāgamena kappiyakārakassa
tika-vin06t:917_21: hatthe kappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitena saṃvohāro vāritoti.
tika-vin06t:918_1: ekasmiṃ eva vatthusmiṃ dvinnaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vasena ekato āpatti vuttā, taṃ pana
tika-vin06t:918_2: pacchimassa vasena nissajjitabbaṃ. Etena nissaggiyaṃ āpannampi āpajjatīti eke. Parassa
tika-vin06t:918_3: rūpiyaggahaṇaṃ parivattananti rūpiye aggahite tassa abhāvato imināva āpatti, na purimena
tika-vin06t:918_4: omasavādo viya. Musāvādena musā vadantassāpi hi omasavādeneva āpatti. Nissaggiyavatthunā
tika-vin06t:918_5: dukkaṭa…pe… eseva nayoti etassa yuttiṃ dassento “yo hi aya”nti āha.
tika-vin06t:919_0: Vaḍḍhiṃ payojentassāti ettha idaṃ gahetvā sati māse, sati saṃvacchare “ettakaṃ dehī”ti
tika-vin06t:919_1: ce vadati. Rūpiyasaṃvohāro hoti. Vinā kappiyakārakena “ettakā vuḍḍhi hotu, ettakaṃ
tika-vin06t:919_2: gaṇhā”ti vadato dukkaṭaṃ kayavikkayalakkhaṇābhāvato. “Mūle mūlasāmikāna”ntiādi kappiyakaraṇūpāyadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:919_3: vuttaṃ, na kevalaṃ nissaṭṭhaṃ aparibhogaṃ hoti, puna evaṃ kate paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:919_4: Tassapi paribhoge mūlassa kappiyakaraṇūpāyo ce na hoti, kappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbanti
tika-vin06t:919_5: yathā pāḷiyā cettha kappiyakaraṇūpāyo, so ca tatiyapattepi, “yathā ca attano atthāya
tika-vin06t:919_6: gahite evarūpupāyo, tathā saṅghādiatthāya gahitepi eso vā”ti vuttaṃ. Ime kira paṭhamadutiyapatte
tika-vin06t:919_7: yāva gahaṭṭhena parivatteti, tāva na kappiyakaraṇūpāyo, anekapurisayugampi “akappiyā
tika-vin06t:919_8: evā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Anugaṇṭhipade pana “saṅghasantakaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā
tika-vin06t:919_9: āgatakahāpaṇānipi paṭiggahaṇaṃ mocetvāva sampaṭicchitabbāni, tasmā kappiyakārako
tika-vin06t:919_10: ce imāni tāni kahāpaṇānīti vadati, na vaṭṭatiyeva, paṭikkhipitabbaṃ, na vicāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:919_11: vicāreti ce? Sabbesaṃ na kappati. Paṭiggahaṇaṃ mocetvā sampaṭicchitāni ce vicāreti,
tika-vin06t:922_0: 593. Paṭapilotikānanti paṭapilotikehi. “Ajjhācarati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti idaṃ purimasikkhāpadepi
tika-vin06t:922_1: veditabbaṃ. “Kayitañca hoti vikkayitañcā”ti etesaṃ padānaṃ viparītato “attano bhaṇḍa”ntiādi
tika-vin06t:922_2: vuttaṃ. Kasmā? “Iminā ima”nti vacanānurūpato. Saddhādeyyavinipātanaṃ panettha aṭṭhānapadānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:927: 598. Bahū patte sannicayanti ettha sannicayanti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ, bahū patte vā gahetvā sannicayaṃ karissantīti attho. “Aḍḍhaterasapalamāsānaṃ gāhikā”ti likhitaṃ. Ettha –
tika-vin06t:931_0: 602. Khādananti khādanīyaṃ sūpādi. “Byañjanassa mattā nāma odanato catuttho bhāgo”ti
tika-vin06t:931_1: brahmāyusuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā ālopassa catutthabhāgaṃ byañjanaṃ anurūpanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:931_2: “Bhikkhuniyā pattasannicayassa vāritattā tadanulomato bhikkhūnampi dutiyo vārito”ti
tika-vin06t:931_3: vuttaṃ, taṃ na yuttaṃ, pāḷiyañhi “sannicayaṃ kareyyāti anadhiṭṭhito avikappito”ti
tika-vin06t:931_4: vuttaṃ. So hi kathinakkhandhake nicayasannidhi viya ekopi punadivase “sannicayo”ti
tika-vin06t:931_5: vuccati. Anantarasikkhāpade pana “dutiyo vāritoti adhiṭṭhānaṃ niyataṃ, tasmā dve
tika-vin06t:931_6: patte adhiṭṭhātuṃ na labhati. Sace ekato adhiṭṭhāti, dvepi na adhiṭṭhitā honti. Visuṃ
tika-vin06t:931_7: visuṃ adhiṭṭhāti, dutiyo anadhiṭṭhito”ti vadanti. Vikappetuṃ pana bahūpi labhati.
tika-vin06t:931_8: Idāni vattabbaṃ sandhāya “nāmamatte viseso”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha nāmanti majjhimo majjhimomako
tika-vin06t:932_0: 608. “Pākassa hi ūnattā pattasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatī”ti vacanato adhiṭṭhitapattopi kharapākena
tika-vin06t:932_1: setattā adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti ce? Na, adhiṭṭhānavijahanesu navasu anāgatattā, tasmā
tika-vin06t:932_2: paṭhamapākānaṃ eva ūnattā pattasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati, tasmiṃ sati aññaṃ viññāpetuṃ
tika-vin06t:932_3: na vaṭṭati. “Ūnapañcabandhanenā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Chidde, rājiyā vā hi sati tehi adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:932_4: vijahatīti vijahite nāyaṃ paṭisedho, tasmā paccuddharitvā, vikappetvāpi aññaṃ viññāpetuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin06t:933_0: Evaṃ pattakārako mūlaṃ labhitvāti ettha pacitvā ṭhapitadivasato paṭṭhāya. Dātukāmo
tika-vin06t:933_1: hutvāti ettha dinnadivasato, sutadivasato vā paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ veditabbaṃ. Liṅgaparivattena
tika-vin06t:933_2: pana dasāhātikkame pattasāmikassa bhikkhussa, bhikkhuniyā pana rattātikkame nissaggiyaṃ.
tika-vin06t:936_0: 612-3. Bahū patte viññāpentīti ekamekaṃ viññāpentā bahū bhikkhū bahū patte viññāpenti,
tika-vin06t:936_1: bahū vā bhikkhū patte viññāpentīti attho. “Na, bhikkhave, patto viññāpetabbo, yo
tika-vin06t:936_2: viññāpeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ ūnapañcabandhanena samūhataṃ hoti
tika-vin06t:936_3: na hotīti? Na hoti tameva gahetvā “viññāpeti, payoge dukkaṭa”nti vuttattāti eke.
tika-vin06t:936_4: Paṭilābhampi pariyādiyitvā taṃ dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā taṃ “paṭilābhena nissaggiyo
tika-vin06t:936_5: hotī”ti iminā samūhataṃ hoti. Aññathā sadukkaṭaṃ nissaggiyaṃ āpajjati anāpattivāravirodho
tika-vin06t:936_6: ca. Yā kāci pana akataviññatti ananuññātakāle dukkaṭameva. Bhinnenāti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe,
tika-vin06t:939_0: 620. “Sā ahosi suvaṇṇamālā”ti vacanato ṭhapetvā sahadhammike aññesaṃ yathāsukhaṃ
tika-vin06t:939_1: rūpiyaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati uggaṇhāpetuṃ, sabyohārāpebhuñcāti ācariyo, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ iddhimassa iddhivisayattā.
tika-vin06t:940_0: 622. “Yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatī”ti vacanena yesaṃ maṃsaṃ na kappati, tesaṃ sappiādi kiñcāpi
tika-vin06t:940_1: na kappati, na pana nissaggiyavatthūti veditabbaṃ. Tathā na paṇītabhojanavatthūti.
tika-vin06t:940_2: Uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittanti ajjhoharaṇatthaṃ nikkhittaṃ. Itarañhi paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin06t:940_3: ajjhoharituṃ vaṭṭati. Ubhayesampīti pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitehi, purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitehi
tika-vin06t:940_4: ca katānaṃ. “Maṃsassa akappiyattā”ti kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvā. Khādiṃsūti “vikāle
tika-vin06t:940_5: kevalaṃ navanītameva khāditukāmena dadhitakkagatāni apanetabbāni, pacitukāmassa sāmaṃpākaṃ
tika-vin06t:940_6: na hotīti therassa adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ. “Khayaṃ gamissatī”ti vacanato khīraṃ pakkhipitvā
tika-vin06t:940_7: pakkasappi vikāle kappatīti siddhaṃ. Bhesajjehīti yāvajīvikabhesajjehi. Katatelaṃ
tika-vin06t:940_8: purebhattanti apacitvā kataṃ eva. Uṇhodakenāti tāpanabhāvaṃ dīpetīti keci, taṃ na
tika-vin06t:940_10: vacanato atelatthāya paṭiggahitehi, sattāhātikkantehipi katatelaṃ katadivasato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin06t:940_11: sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatīti chāyā dissati, karamandaṃ rukkhasāroti keci.
tika-vin06t:941_0: 623. Avasakasaṭe yasmā khīrādīni pakkhipitvā telaṃ pacanti, tasmā kasaṭaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:941_1: telameva vaṭṭati, tena vuttaṃ “pakkatelakasaṭe viya kukkuccāyatī”ti. Vasāya saddhiṃ
tika-vin06t:941_2: pakkattā na vaṭṭatīti ce? Vadatha, bhante, navanīte dadhiguḷikātiādisambandho. Madhumhi
tika-vin06t:941_3: cattāro kālikā yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbā, ucchumhi ca, kathaṃ? Samakkhikaṃ seḷakaṃ
tika-vin06t:941_4: madhu yāvakālikaṃ. Anelakaṃ udakasambhinnaṃ yāmakālikaṃ, asambhinnaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ,
tika-vin06t:941_5: madhusiṭṭhaṃ parisuddhaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ. Tathā ucchu vā raso vā sakasaṭo yāvakāliko,
tika-vin06t:941_6: nikkasaṭo udakasambhinno yāmakāliko, asambhinno sattāhakāliko, sukkhakasaṭaṃ yāvajīvikanti
tika-vin06t:942_0: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Catūsu kālikesu pubbaṃ pubbaṃ garukaṃ, aparaṃ aparaṃ lahukaṃ. Tesu
tika-vin06t:942_1: cāyaṃ udakasambhedo garukaṃ lahukaṃ karoti, lahukañca garukaṃ. Ambarasādīni hi yāvakālikattā
tika-vin06t:942_2: garukāni, udakasambhedo pana tāni ambapānādisamaññaṃ datvā lahukāni yāmakālikāni
tika-vin06t:942_3: karoti. “Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbattanti ucchurasaṃ upādāyā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato
tika-vin06t:942_4: ucchuraso sattāhakālikoti siddhaṃ. Tattha “udakasambhedo taṃ yāmakālikaṃ karotī”tiādiṃ bahuṃ vatvā yojitā.
tika-vin06t:943_0: Apicettha ucchuraso “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ucchurasa”nti anuññātattā guḷodakaṃ viya
tika-vin06t:943_1: ucchurasasāmaññato udakena asambhinnopi agilānassa vaṭṭati, tenevāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:943_2: “ucchuraso nikasaṭo pacchābhattaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Ayaṃ sabbo no takkoti ācariyo. Keci
tika-vin06t:943_3: panāhu “phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbatta’nti vacanato, ‘ucchurasaṃ upādāyā’ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato
tika-vin06t:943_4: ca ucchuraso phāṇitameva, tasmā guḷe viya paṭipajjitabba”nti. Keci “vuttanayena sattāhakālikova
tika-vin06t:943_5: samāno ‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ucchurasa’nti visuṃ anuññātattā asambhinnopi agilānassa
tika-vin06t:943_6: vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Keci “vuttanayena visuṃ anuññātattā eva sambhinno vā asambhinno
tika-vin06t:943_7: vā yāmakālikova, guḷodakaṃ pana sattāhakālikamevā”ti vadanti. Keci “guḷodakaṃ viya
tika-vin06t:944_0: Tatthāyaṃ paṭhamācariyavāde vicāraṇā – phāṇitānumatiyāyeva ucchurasānumatiyā siddhito
tika-vin06t:944_1: visuṃ “ucchurasa”nti uddharitvā anumati niratthikāti āpajjati, tathā “ucchuraso nikasaṭo
tika-vin06t:944_2: pacchābhattaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāpi niratthikā. “Sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vattabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:944_3: siyāti, na ca tathā sakkā vattuṃ. Pacchābhattaṃ vaṭṭanakarasādhikārattāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:944_4: tasmiṃ adhikāre sattāhakālikassa avattabbappasaṅgato. Kālabhedaṃ anapekkhitvā rasādhikāre
tika-vin06t:944_5: otiṇṇattā vuttoti ce? Na sakkā “nikasaṭo sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vattuṃ. Pacchābhattaṃ
tika-vin06t:944_6: vaṭṭanakarasādhikārattā na vattabbanti ce? Na, evañhi vutte tadaññaraso viya ayampi
tika-vin06t:944_7: pacchābhattameva vaṭṭati, na tato paranti āpajjati. Tato paraṃ aparibhogattā “pacchābhattaṃ
tika-vin06t:944_8: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttanti ce? Na, yāvakālikabhāvappasaṅgato. Na so pasaṅgo ābhidosikassāpi
tika-vin06t:944_10: vicāraṇā. Dutiyavāde vicāraṇā vuttā, vimaddo panettha bhesajjakkhandhake āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin06t:944_11: Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbattanti madhukatālanāḷikeraphāṇitādito ukkaṭavatthuto
tika-vin06t:944_13: idha phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbattameva, na madhukādito nibbatta”nti. Ettāvatā yaṃkiñci
tika-vin06t:944_14: ucchumhā nibbattaṃ, na taṃ sabbaṃ phāṇitameva nāmāti sādhitaṃ hoti. Teneva khandhake
tika-vin06t:944_15: phāṇitaṃ paṭhamaṃ anujānitvāva pacchā ucchuraso anuññāto, tathā tattheva guḷaṃ, guḷodakañca.
tika-vin06t:945_0: Ucchurasaṃ upādāya apakkā vātiādimhi pana yesaṃ laddhi “ucchuraso yāmakāliko”ti.
tika-vin06t:945_1: “Te apakkā vāti sāmaṃ bhikkhunā apakkā vā. Avatthukapakkā vāti vinā vatthunā pakkā
tika-vin06t:945_2: vā”ti atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ “ucchurasaṃ upādāyā”ti imassa vacanassa payojanābhāvappasaṅgato,
tika-vin06t:945_3: bhikkhuno pacanādhikārābhāvā. Sāmapāko idhādhippetoti ce? Sāmaṃ apakkassa ucchurasassa
tika-vin06t:945_4: tesaṃ attanomatiyā phāṇitabhāvasiddhito ca parato “purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitena aparissāvitaucchurasena
tika-vin06t:945_5: kataphāṇita”ntiādinayadassanato ca taṃ ayuttaṃ, tattha “aparissāvitaucchurasena sayaṃkataṃ
tika-vin06t:945_6: nirāmisameva vaṭṭatī”ti vacanaṃ yaṃ tattha kasaṭaṃ sāmapākaṃ na janeti, savatthukapaṭiggahitakataṃyeva
tika-vin06t:945_7: taṃ karotīti dīpeti, tasmā paṭiggahetuṃ na vaṭṭati vikāleti porāṇā. “Koṭṭitaucchuphāṇitaṃ
tika-vin06t:945_8: ‘rajanapākaṃ viya oḷārikaṃ savatthukapakkaṃ nāma hotī’ti saññāya purebhattameva vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin06t:945_9: vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathācariyā “evaṃ phāṇitaggahaṇaṃ amadhuraṃ, tasmā pacchābhattaṃ
tika-vin06t:945_10: na vaṭṭatī”ti vadiṃsu. Kiṃ madhuratāya, amadhuratāya vāti? Atthameva dassetuṃ mahāpaccariyaṃ
tika-vin06t:945_11: tathā vuttanti upatissatthero āha kira. Taṃ yuttanti ucchuto nibbattattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:945_12: tenevāha “khaṇḍasakkharaṃ pana…pe… vaṭṭatī”ti. “Taṃ khīraghaṭe pakkhipitvā pacantī”ti
tika-vin06t:946_0: Bhesajjodisaṃ vadantena itare atthuddhāravasena vuttā. “Āhāratthaṃ pharituṃ samatthānī”ti
tika-vin06t:946_1: khandhake “yaṃ bhesajjañceva assa bhesajjasammatañca lokassa, āhāratthañca phareyyā”ti
tika-vin06t:946_2: vuttattā vuttaṃ. Ettha vicāraṇā bhesajjakkhandhake āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin06t:947_0: 624. Dvāravātapānakavāṭānīti dvārassa ca vātapānānañca kavāṭāni. Kasāvapakkhepamattena
tika-vin06t:947_1: hi tāni attano sabhāvaṃ pariccajitāni honti, tasmā “makkhetabbānī”ti vuttaṃ. “Kasāvo
tika-vin06t:947_2: nāma kanakalambādīnipī”ti vadanti. Adhiṭṭhetīti “idāni ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ na bhavissati,
tika-vin06t:947_3: bāhiraparibhogo bhavissatī”ti cittaṃ uppādeti. Idha “vikappetī”ti padaṃ natthi. Adhiṭṭhānampi
tika-vin06t:948_0: 625. Paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti vissāsābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sace savissāso,
tika-vin06t:948_1: vaṭṭatīti “paribhuñja tva”nti ettāvatā vissajjitaṃ hoti, tasmā ubhinnaṃ anāpattīti
tika-vin06t:948_2: sambandho. Sace na vissajjitaṃ, āpatti hotīti siddhaṃ. Tasmā ubhinnaṃ santakaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:948_3: aññatarena sammukhībhūtena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. No ce adhiṭṭhāti, nissaggiyaṃ hotītipi
tika-vin06t:948_4: yujjati. Kākanikamattañce mūlaṃ adinnaṃ, “na adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ…pe… sakabhāvaṃ na upetī”ti
tika-vin06t:948_5: iminā etaṃ sadisaṃ na hoti, ābhidhammikagaṇānaṃ dinnaṃ viya ca na hoti. Kasmā? Ābhidhammikā
tika-vin06t:948_6: hi anupasampannāpi honti, pacchā ābhidhammikabhūtānampi taṃ sādhāraṇaṃ hotīti. Ettha
tika-vin06t:948_7: dvepi upasampannā eva, dvinnampi tattha yathākāmakaraṇīyatā atthi mamattañca, na
tika-vin06t:948_8: evaṃ tadaññesaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ, na ca dve tayo bhikkhū “ekato vassissāmā”ti karonti,
tika-vin06t:948_9: rakkhati tāva. “Avibhattattā anāpattī”ti iminā ca idaṃ sadisaṃ, yena mūlena paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:948_10: tassa sace itaro deti, so vā taṃ itarassa deti, sati paṭiggahaṇe sattāhātikkame nissaggiyattā,
tika-vin06t:948_11: tasmā taṃ cīvaraṃ dvīsu sammukhībhūtena ekena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi ettha payogo
tika-vin06t:948_12: na dissati samānaparikkhārānaṃ dvinnaṃ adhiṭṭhānapayogābhāvato, tathāpi samānasabbabhaṇḍakānaṃ
tika-vin06t:948_13: dvinnaṃ telādi yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tassa kālātikkame āpattisambhavato, anadhiṭṭhāne
tika-vin06t:948_14: dullabhavisesahetuttā ca “adhiṭṭhātabba”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ ayuttaṃ pattacīvarasattāhakālikānaṃ
tika-vin06t:948_15: asadisavidhānattā. Ettha pattacīvarañhi attano santakabhāvaṃ upagatameva anadhiṭṭhahantassa
tika-vin06t:948_16: kālātikkame āpatti, sattāhakālikaṃ pana parasantakasādhāraṇampi paṭiggahitaṃ paṭiggāhakassa
tika-vin06t:948_17: kālātikkame āpattikaraṃ. Paṭiggahaṇañcettha pamāṇaṃ, na tattha sakasantakatā, sattāhakālikañca
tika-vin06t:948_18: nissaggiyaṃ, sabbesampi anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ. Pattacīvaraṃ aññassa paribhuñjato anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:948_19: Idañca kālātikkantampi nissajjitvā pacchā laddhaṃ kappati. Pattacīvaraṃ pana taṃ
tika-vin06t:948_20: tassa vinayakammanti kappatīti. Avibhattassapi imassa dānaṃ ruhati, na pattacīvarassa.
tika-vin06t:948_21: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dvinnaṃ santakaṃ hoti…pe… sacepi avibhajitvā saddhivihārikādīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:948_22: denti, adinnameva hotī”ti. Yassa dānameva na ruhati, tassa kuto adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Eko
tika-vin06t:948_23: ce pattacīvaraṃ dasame divase itarassa deti. Tato paṭṭhāya so dasa divase pariharituṃ
tika-vin06t:948_24: labhati, na tathā sattāhakālikanti sabbathā upaparikkhiyamānaṃ sarikkhaṃ nakkhamatīti
tika-vin06t:948_25: na taṃ sārato daṭṭhabbanti ācariyassa takko. “Vinayakammavasena pana anissajjitvā
tika-vin06t:948_26: sahasā virujjhitvā kassaci pariccattampi puna paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin06t:948_27: vuttaṃ, sace desantaritaṃ, samuddantaritaṃ vā cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ jātaṃ, taṃ idha
tika-vin06t:948_28: ṭhitena bhikkhunā ekassa vantena cittena cattaṃ katvā anapekkhitvā āpattiṃ desetvā
tika-vin06t:948_29: tassa vissāsena puna gahetvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, “pattādīsu ca ayameva nayo”ti ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:948_30: “tālanāḷikeraphāṇitampi sattāhakālikaṃ evā”ti ca. “Dvinnaṃ santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin06t:948_31: sattāhakālikaṃ sattāhātikkame āpattiṃ na karoti, paribhuñjituṃ pana dvinnampi na
tika-vin06t:948_32: vaṭṭatī”ti ca “parasantakaṃ paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitepi eseva nayo”ti ca keci vadanti.
tika-vin06t:948_33: Dukkaṭavatthubhūtaṃ sappiādi nissajjitabbaṃ puna paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti vidhānaṃ na dissatīti.
tika-vin06t:951_0: 627. “Ekameva katvā”ti vacanena vassikasāṭikalakkhaṇena ñātakānampi satuppādaṃ karontena
tika-vin06t:951_1: ekameva gahetabbanti dhammasiritthero. Catubbidhaṃ khettanti ettha kiñcāpi tividhaṃ
tika-vin06t:951_2: dissati, taṃ pana evaṃ gahetabbaṃ, yasmiṃ khette pariyesituṃ labhati, taṃ pariyesanakhettaṃ
tika-vin06t:951_3: nāma, “evaṃ karaṇanivāsanādhiṭṭhānakhettānipī”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha pacchimena purimaggāho
tika-vin06t:951_4: veditabbo, na purimena pacchimaggāho, yathālābhanti ācariyo. Tassattho – adhiṭṭhānakhettena
tika-vin06t:951_5: pacchimena purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ gāho hoti, tathā nivāsanakhettena dvinnaṃ purimānaṃ.
tika-vin06t:951_6: Karaṇakhettena pana ekasseva purimassa gāho hotīti. Ettha pana kiñcāpi karaṇakhettanivāsanakhettānaṃ
tika-vin06t:951_7: kālato nānattaṃ natthi, kiriyato pana “aṭṭhiṃ katvā nivāsetabba”nti pāḷivacanato,
tika-vin06t:951_8: tasmā dvidhā katvā vuttaṃ aññatarābhāvena, tadatthasiddhito ca, kathaṃ panettha nānattaṃ
tika-vin06t:951_9: natthīti paññāyatīti ce? Pāḷito, “aḍḍhamāso seso gimhānanti katvā nivāsetabba”nti
tika-vin06t:952_0: Tathāha “pacchimo aḍḍhamāso karaṇanivāsanakhettampī”ti, iminā nayena tividhameva
tika-vin06t:952_1: khettantipi siddhaṃ. Samantapāsādikāyaṃ pana katthaci potthake “jeṭṭhamūlapuṇṇamāsiyā
tika-vin06t:952_2: pacchimapāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva kāḷapakkhuposatho, ayameko addhamāso pariyesanakhettañceva
tika-vin06t:952_3: karaṇakhettañca. Etasmiñhi antare vassikasāṭikaṃ aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ, laddhaṃ kātuñca
tika-vin06t:952_4: vaṭṭati, nivāsetuṃ, adhiṭṭhātuñca na vaṭṭatī”ti pāṭho dissati, so apāṭho yathāvuttapāḷimātikāṭṭhakathāvirodhato,
tika-vin06t:952_5: tasmā tattha “aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭati, kātuṃ, nivāsetuṃ, adhiṭṭhātuñca na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin06t:952_6: pāṭho veditabbo. Evaṃ tāva pacchimena purimaggāhasiddhi veditabbā, na purimena karaṇakhettādīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:952_7: gāho sambhavati. “Māso seso gimhānanti vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesitabba”nti ettakameva
tika-vin06t:952_8: hi vuttaṃ, na, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayameko addhamāso pariyesanakhettañceva karaṇakhettañcā”ti
tika-vin06t:952_9: vuttattāti ce? Na, tassa lekhanadosattā, tathā sādhitaṃ. Karaṇakhettena pana nivāsanakhettaggāho
tika-vin06t:952_10: atthi kālanānattābhāvato, teneva pubbe yathālābhaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, tathā ca sādhitameva,
tika-vin06t:952_11: na bhedo panatthi, payojanaṃ vuttameva. Nivāsanakkhettena adhiṭṭhānakkhettaggāho
tika-vin06t:952_12: natthi eva, na hi purimena pacchimaggāho veditabbo. Na pāḷivirodhatoti ce? Na, tadatthājānanato.
tika-vin06t:952_13: “Māso seso gimhānanti addhamāso seso gimhāna”nti ettha iti-saddassa hi ito paṭṭhāyāti
tika-vin06t:952_14: attho. Parato āpattikhettadassanato itarassa anāpattikhettabhāvo dassitova hoti.
tika-vin06t:952_16: pakatiyā vassikasāṭikadāyakā nāma saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā apavāretvā anusaṃvaccharaṃ
tika-vin06t:952_17: dentā, tattha satuppādova vaṭṭati. Vattabhede dukkaṭanti tadaññesu.
tika-vin06t:953_0: “Sace kata…pe… vassūpanāyikadivase adhiṭṭhātabbā…pe… cha māse parihāraṃ labhatī”ti
tika-vin06t:953_1: vacanato antovassepi yāva vassānassa pacchimadivasā akatā parihāraṃ labhatīti dīpitaṃ
tika-vin06t:953_2: hoti. Kasmā na vicāritanti ce? Atthāpattisiddhattā. “Cha māse parihāraṃ labhatī”ti
tika-vin06t:953_3: vacanena akatā labhatīti siddhameva, taṃ kiñcāpi siddhaṃ, sarūpena pana anāgatattā
tika-vin06t:953_4: sarūpena dassetuṃ, dussaddhāpayattā upapattito dassetuñca idamāraddhaṃ ācariyena,
tika-vin06t:953_5: “yathā cettha, evaṃ kathinabbhantare uppannacīvarampi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabba”nti
tika-vin06t:953_6: anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ, taṃ duvuttaṃ tattheva pubbāparavirodhato. Yañcettha aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:953_7: sādhakattena vuttaṃ, taṃ tamatthaṃ na sādheti. “Yadi nappahoti yāva kattikapuṇṇamā
tika-vin06t:953_8: parihāraṃ labhatī”ti vacanaṃ appahontassa yāva kattikapuṇṇamā tāva parihārakhettaṃ,
tika-vin06t:953_9: tato paraṃ ekadivasopi na hotīti dīpeti, tasmā appahonakabhāvena akatāva yāva kattikapuṇṇamā
tika-vin06t:953_10: parihāraṃ labhati, tato paraṃ na labhatīti siddhaṃ. Tathā tadeva vacanaṃ kataparihāraṃ
tika-vin06t:953_11: na labhatīti dīpeti, tasmā kattikapuṇṇamadivaseyeva adhiṭṭhātabbā. “Appahonte dasāhe
tika-vin06t:954_0: Etthāha – “ekāhadvīhādivasenā”tiādi na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā? Gimhadivasānaṃ anadhiṭṭhānakālattā,
tika-vin06t:954_1: tasmā eva “antodasāhe vā tadaheyeva vā adhiṭṭhātabbā’ti ca sāmaññato na vattabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:954_2: gimhadivasānaṃ adhiṭṭhānakhettabhāvappasaṅgato”ti. Ettha vuccati – na, tadatthājānanato.
tika-vin06t:954_3: Dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya gimhadivasā dasāhā honti, paṭhamadivase ca laddhā
tika-vin06t:954_4: niṭṭhitā vassikasāṭikā dasāhātikkantāpi vassūpanāyikadivasaṃ adhiṭṭhānakhettaṃ appattattā
tika-vin06t:954_5: na ca tāva nissaggiyaṃ hoti, vuttañcetaṃ “vassūpanāyikato pubbe dasāhātikkamepi anāpattī”ti.
tika-vin06t:955_0: Antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabbāti idaṃ na avisesena etasmiṃ antare gimhadivasepi adhiṭṭhātabbanti
tika-vin06t:955_1: imamatthaṃ dīpetuṃ vuttaṃ, kintu gimhadivase ce uppannā, adhiṭṭhānakhette ca antodasāhaṃ
tika-vin06t:955_2: hoti, antodasāhe khetteyeva adhiṭṭhātabbā, na khettanti katvā dasāhaṃ atikkamitabbanti
tika-vin06t:955_3: dīpetuṃ vuttaṃ. Kasmā? Gimhadivasānampi gaṇanūpagattā, tasmā akhettadivasepi gaṇetvā
tika-vin06t:958_0: 632. Sāmanti sakasaññitāniyamanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sakasaññitāyeva hi acchindāpanaacchindanesu
tika-vin06t:958_2: acchindantassa na nissaggiya”nti vuttameva hoti. “Datvāti datvā vā dāpetvā vā”ti
tika-vin06t:958_3: kiñcāpi padabhājanaṃ yujjati, aññassa pana santakaṃ aññassa bhikkhuno dāpetvā taṃ
tika-vin06t:958_4: sayaṃ vā acchindeyya, teneva vā acchindāpeyyāti aniṭṭhappasaṅgabhayā na vuttaṃ, atthato
tika-vin06t:958_5: pana attano santakaṃ aññena saddhivihārikādinā dāpetvā, aññassa santakaṃ vā tassa
tika-vin06t:958_6: vissāsā dāpetvā taṃ acchindeyya vā acchindāpeyya vā nissaggiyanti veditabbaṃ, tañca
tika-vin06t:958_7: kho anapekkho datvā. Yadi evaṃ “cajitvā dinnaṃ acchinditvā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍagghena
tika-vin06t:958_8: kāretabbo”ti idaṃ kinti ce? Sakasaññāya aggahetvā aññāya theyyāya gaṇhantaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:958_9: vuttaṃ, teneva vuttaṃ “sakasaññāya gahitattā panassa pārājikaṃ natthī”ti, apica “anāpatti
tika-vin06t:958_10: so vā deti, tassa vā vissasanto gaṇhātī”ti vacanatopi taṃ siddhameva. Ettāvatā tāvakālikaṃ
tika-vin06t:958_11: katvā dinnaṃ acchindantassa anāpatti sādhitā hoti. “Amhākaṃ santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhissatī”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:958_12: sāmaṇerassa dānaṃ dīpeti, tañca idha nādhippetaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ upasampanne tikapācittiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:958_13: viya anupasampanne tikadukkaṭampi āgatanti ce? Na, tadadhippāyājānanato. Anupasampannakāle
tika-vin06t:958_14: evaṃ datvā aññassa santike upasampannaṃ disvā kupito ce acchindati, upasampannasseva
tika-vin06t:958_15: vā “sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya tumhākaṃ santike upasampajjissāmī”ti vadantassa datvā puna
tika-vin06t:959_0: 633. Sakiṃ āṇatto bahukampi acchindati, nissaggiyanti ekabaddhattā ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:959_1: taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “āṇatto bahūni gaṇhāti, ekaṃ pācittiya”nti. Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:959_2: pana “vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ āṇattiyā bahuttā “sabbāni gaṇhā”ti vadantassa
tika-vin06t:959_3: gāhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, teneva tattha vuttaṃ “ekavācāya sambahulā āpattiyo”ti. Evaṃ
tika-vin06t:959_4: sante pāḷivacanaṃ, aṭṭhakathāvacanadvayañca aññamaññaṃ sameti, parasantakampi nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:959_5: hoti paṃsukūlañca, tena “dussante baddharūpiyaṃ viyā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ tadatthaniyamadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:959_6: vuttaṃ, yathāvachāditaṃ acchindanacittena sacittakaṃ, vacīkammaṃ pana kevalaṃ acchindāpentasseva
tika-vin06t:959_7: “dehī”ti balakkārena gaṇhatopi veditabbaṃ, taṃ na yuttaṃ “anāpatti so vā detī”ti
tika-vin06t:959_8: vacanato. “Tuṭṭho vā duṭṭho vā deti, anāpattiyevā”ti mātikāṭṭhakathāvacanato vāti
tika-vin06t:959_9: ce? Na, ubhayattha attano ruciyā dānaṃ sandhāya vuttattā, pasayhāvahāre anāpattippasaṅgato
tika-vin06t:959_10: ca. “Bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā’ti pāḷivacanato ca mātikāṭṭhakathāya aṅgavavatthāne
tika-vin06t:959_11: ‘upasampannatā’ti vuttattā ca ubhayattha dānaharaṇesu bhikkhubhāvo icchitabboti dīpetī”ti
tika-vin06t:959_12: vadanti, idamayuttanti no takkoti ācariyo. Kasmā? Anupasampannassa cīvaraṃ datvā
tika-vin06t:959_14: vā aññaṃ vā parikkhāraṃ datvā…pe… āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato dukkaṭaṃ tattha hotīti
tika-vin06t:959_15: ce? Nāsiddhattā, dānakāle eva upasampannatā pamāṇanti asiddhametaṃ aṭṭhakathāya vā
tika-vin06t:959_16: pāḷiyā vā yuttito vā, tasmā taṃ na yuttanti attho. Anupasampannassa cīvaraṃ datvā
tika-vin06t:959_17: tasseva anupasampannakāleyeva cīvaraṃ acchindantassa dukkaṭaṃ, upasampannakāle vā
tika-vin06t:959_18: datvā anupasampannakāle acchindantassa dukkaṭanti tassa vacanassa idaṃ vikappantarañca
tika-vin06t:959_19: sambhavati, tasmā vikappantarassa sambhavato ca na yuttaṃ, yasmā anupasampannakāle
tika-vin06t:959_20: datvā upasampannakāle acchindantassa visuṃ dukkaṭaṃ na paññattaṃ, tasmā purāṇacīvaradhovāpanādisikkhāpadesu
tika-vin06t:959_21: viya aparabhāge upasampannatā cettha pamāṇaṃ, tasmā “upasampannatā”ti aṅgesu vuttattā
tika-vin06t:959_22: ca taṃ na yuttanti attho. Ettha “paccāsīsantasseva dānamadhippetaṃ, na nissaṭṭhadāna”nti
tika-vin06t:962_0: 637. Chaṭṭhe kiñcāpi “sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā”ti vuttaṃ, mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
tika-vin06t:962_1: “cīvaratthāya sāmaṃ viññattaṃ sutta”nti avatvā kevalaṃ “cīvaratthāya viññāpitasutta”nti
tika-vin06t:962_2: aṅgesu vuttattā aññena cīvaratthāya viññattaṃ suttampi saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:962_3: Sāmanti cettha kassaci niyamanaṃ. “Sāmaṃ viññāpetvā”ti kiñcāpi vuttaṃ, tathāpi “sāmaṃ
tika-vin06t:962_4: vāyāpeyyā”ti attano atthāya vāyāpeyyāti evaṃ sambandho, attho ca veditabbo, pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:962_5: pana āsannapadena yojanā katā, tasmā sāmaṃ viññattaṃ suttanti aññaviññattaṃ kappiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:962_7: ce, tante vītaṃyeva sakiṃ adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, puna adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi adhiṭṭhitena
tika-vin06t:962_8: ekībhāvūpagamanato. “Sace pana paricchedaṃ dassetvāva cinasāṭakaṃ viya, antarantarā
tika-vin06t:962_9: adhiṭṭhitaṃ hoti, puna adhiṭṭhātabba”nti vuttaṃ. “Paṭilābhenāti vacanena vāyāpetvā
tika-vin06t:965: 642. Visiṭṭhaṃ kappañca tassa vacanena visiṭṭhaṃ katañca pamāṇaṃ, na āmisadānaṃ. Kesuci potthakesu “cīvara”nti uddharitvā vibhāgo vutto, taṃ na sametīti.
tika-vin06t:968_1: pavāritā”ti ca yaṃ vuttaṃ, te pana bhikkhū tassa vacanassa atthaṃ micchā gahetvā
tika-vin06t:968_2: accekacīvaraṃ nikkhipantā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmesuṃ. Kimidaṃ vibhattaṃ, udāhu
tika-vin06t:968_3: avibhattanti? Vibhattaṃ, puggalikaṃ vā. Teneva parato “amhākaṃ, āvuso, accekacīvarānī”ti
tika-vin06t:968_4: vuttaṃ, avibhattaṃ pana saṅghikattā na kassaci nissaggiyaṃ karoti.
