tika-vin06t:969_0: Apica “accekacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā nikkhipitu”nti iminā sāmaññavacanena vassūpanāyikadivasato
tika-vin06t:969_1: paṭṭhāya, piṭṭhisamayato paṭṭhāya vā yāva pavāraṇā nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati eva saṅghikattā,
tika-vin06t:969_2: puggalikampi “vassaṃvutthakāle gaṇhathā”ti dinnattā. Tādisañhi yāva vassaṃvuttho
tika-vin06t:969_3: hoti, tāva na tasseva, dāyakassa santakaṃ hoti, tathā ito tatiyavasse, catutthavasse
tika-vin06t:969_4: vā “pavāraṇāya gaṇhathā”tiādinā dinnampi nikkhipitvā yathādānameva gahetabbaṃ. Ayamattho
tika-vin06t:969_5: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pākaṭo. Tāni cīvarakālasamayātikkame na nissaggiyānīti ce? Na, uddissa
tika-vin06t:969_6: dinnattā. Yasmā ayaṃ samayo “kālepi ādissa dinna”nti ettha “kālo”ti āgato, gaṇabhojanasikkhāpadādīsu
tika-vin06t:969_7: “samayo”tveva āgato, tasmā idha tesaṃ ekatthatādassanatthaṃ ekato “cīvarakālasamayo”ti
tika-vin06t:969_8: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Mātikāyaṃ panettha tādisaṃ cīvaraṃ attano santakabhāvaṃ upagataṃ
tika-vin06t:969_9: puggalikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tenevāha “bhikkhuno paneva accekacīvaraṃ uppajjeyyā”ti.
tika-vin06t:969_10: Attano kuṭiyā vassaṃvutthassa bhikkhuno hi dātuṃ alabhanto antovasse eva dānakiccaṃ
tika-vin06t:969_11: pariniṭṭhāpetvā gacchati, tathā saṅghassa. Tasmā idaṃ accekacīvaraṃ atthi uppannakālato
tika-vin06t:969_12: paṭṭhāya saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā santakabhāvaṃ upagacchantaṃ, yaṃ na vassāvāsikabhāvena
tika-vin06t:969_13: dinnaṃ, atthi uppannakālato paṭṭhāya anupagantvā vassaṃvutthakāleyeva puggalassa
tika-vin06t:969_14: vā saṅghassa vā upagacchantaṃ, yaṃ vassāvāsikabhāvena uppajjitvā samaye dinnaṃ, atthi
tika-vin06t:969_15: samaye dinnampi puggalassa santakabhāvaṃ anupagacchantaṃ, saṅghasantakabhāvaṃ vā
tika-vin06t:969_16: dāyakasantakabhāvaṃ vā upagacchantaṃ, īdisaṃ sandhāya “saññāṇaṃ katvā nikkhipitabba”nti
tika-vin06t:969_17: vuttaṃ. Idaṃ atirekasaṃvaccharampi nikkhipituṃ labhati attano santakabhāvaṃ anupagatattā,
tika-vin06t:969_18: tasmā “dasāhānāgata”nti ito aññaṃ sandhāya vuttanti siddhametanti. Dasāhato puretaraṃ
tika-vin06t:969_19: labhitvā yāva pavāraṇā nikkhipituṃ na labhati, tasmā sakabhāvūpagatameva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:969_20: taṃyeva sandhāya “dasāhānāgata”nti vuttaṃ, yato “antosamaye adhiṭṭheti, vikappetī”ti
tika-vin06t:969_21: anāpattivāre vuttaṃ. Saññāṇaṃ katvā nikkhipitabbakaṃ pana parassa dātabbatāya sakabhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:969_22: anupagataṃ, na hi taṃ sandhāya “adhiṭṭheti, vikappetī”ti sakkā vattuṃ, na ca taṃ
tika-vin06t:969_23: imasmiṃ atthe nissaggiyaṃ hoti saṅghassa nissaggiyābhāvato, aṭṭhakathāyampi ayamattho
tika-vin06t:969_24: suṭṭhu pākaṭova. Katamaṃ saññāṇaṃ katvā nikkhipitabbanti ce? Parasantakaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:969_25: saṅghikameva hoti, tato “sallakkhetvā sukhaṃ dātuṃ bhavissatī”ti iminā hi parassa
tika-vin06t:970_0: “Tato paraṃ ekadivasampi parihāro natthīti dasāhaparamato uddhaṃ anupagatattā”ti
tika-vin06t:970_1: likhitaṃ, ito samayato uddhameva dasāhassa anupagatattā samayato paraṃ dasāhaṃ na
tika-vin06t:970_2: labhatīti kirassa adhippāyo. “Etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatiyevā”ti ettha “ekādasamaṃ aruṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:970_3: cīvaramāse uṭṭhetī”ti kāraṇaṃ likhitaṃ. Anugaṇṭhipade pana “anadhiṭṭhahitvā ekādasadivase
tika-vin06t:970_4: nikkhipituṃ labhatī’ti vadanto bhagavā itarampi anaccekacīvarādiṃ anujānāti, accekacīvaramukhenāti
tika-vin06t:970_5: apare”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha kataraṃ subhāsitaṃ? Ubhayampīti eke. Kathaṃ? Paṭhamaṃ “accekacīvarassa
tika-vin06t:970_6: anatthate kathine dasadivasādhiko māso, atthate kathine dasadivasādhikā pañcamāsā”ti
tika-vin06t:970_7: iminā sameti, anugaṇṭhipadaladdhiyā hi ettha “ekādasadivasādhiko”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:970_8: dutiyaṃ “dasāhānāgatanti…pe… dasāhena asampattāti attho”ti iminā sameti. Imassa nayassa
tika-vin06t:970_9: vasena “pañcamito paṭṭhāya uppannassa cīvarassa nidhānakālo dassito hotī”ti pāṭho
tika-vin06t:970_11: āpajjati, tassa vasena “kāmañcesa dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbanti imināva
tika-vin06t:970_12: siddho, aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapita”nti
tika-vin06t:970_13: ayaṃ pāṭho yujjati. Ko panettha sāroti? Yo pacchā vutto, sova sāro. Teneva aṭṭhakathācariyena
tika-vin06t:970_14: “pañcamito paṭṭhāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Porāṇagaṇṭhipadehi aṭṭhakathāya ca saddhiṃ saṃsandanato,
tika-vin06t:970_15: “dasāhānāgata”nti pāḷiyā saṃsandanato ca ettha gaṇṭhipadaladdhipi pāḷiyā sameti.
tika-vin06t:971_0: Kathaṃ? Yasmā pavāraṇādivase aruṇuggamane bhikkhu vassaṃvuttho hoti, tasmā iminā
tika-vin06t:971_1: dasamena ahena saddhiṃ chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya navadivasā dasa ahānīti dasāhaṃ, tena dasāhena,
tika-vin06t:971_2: sahayogatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Kattikatemāsikapuṇṇamā cīvarasamayaṃ asampattāti katvā
tika-vin06t:971_3: “anāgatā”ti vuccati. Yathā aparakattikapuṇṇamāya vassikasāṭikaṃ paccuddharitvā vikappento
tika-vin06t:971_4: “cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti vuccati, evaṃsampadamidanti. Ettha
tika-vin06t:971_5: vuccatīti ce? Na, imassa nippayojanabhāvappasaṅgato. Accekacīvarapaṭiggahaṇakālaṃ
tika-vin06t:971_6: niyamitanti ce? Na, “chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya uppannacīvaraṃ accekameva na hoti. Paṭhamakathinena
tika-vin06t:971_7: siddhattā”ti porāṇaṭṭhakathāgaṇṭhipadesu vuttattā tato upari “accekacīvara”nti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:971_8: paṭiggaṇhantassa āpattisaṅgaho ca. Na ca sā āpatti pāḷiyā, aṭṭhakathāya, yuttito
tika-vin06t:971_9: vā sambhavati. Aṭṭhuppattimattavasena vuttanti ce? Na, dasāhādhiccakārikā aṭṭhuppattipāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:971_10: na dissati. “Bhikkhū accekacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmentī”ti
tika-vin06t:971_11: ettha ettikā eva hi aṭṭhuppatti. Tathā hi parivāre “kismiṃ vatthusmi”nti ārabhitvā
tika-vin06t:971_12: ettakameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Accekacīvaraṃ cīvarakālaṃ nātikkāmetabbaṃ, itaraṃ
tika-vin06t:971_13: atikkāmetabbanti dassanatthaṃ idaṃ paññattanti ce? Na, accekacīvarasseva aparādhadassanato,
tika-vin06t:972_0: Kathaṃ? Dasāhena saha kattikapuṇṇamā “anāgatā”ti hi vutte dasāhato aññā sā puṇṇamāti
tika-vin06t:972_1: āpajjati. Anaññā ce, saha-saddo na sambhavati, na hi attanāva attano yogo sambhavati,
tika-vin06t:972_2: anāgata-saddo ca na sambhavati. Āgatā sampattā eva hi sā puṇṇamā. Cīvarasamayassa
tika-vin06t:972_3: anantarattā ekībhāvaṃ anāgatattā anāgatāyevāti ce? Na, tathāpi anāgata-saddassa sambhavato,
tika-vin06t:972_4: āgamanasambhave satiyeva hi anāgata-saddo sambhavati, na hi nibbānaṃ, paññatti vā
tika-vin06t:972_5: “anāgatā”ti vuccati. Nibbānaṃ viya khaṇattayaṃ, sā ca puṇṇamā na kadāci samayabhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:972_6: pāpuṇātīti ayuttameva. “Tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti pana vacanaṃ piṭṭhisamayaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin06t:972_7: ṭhitattā sambhavati. Apica pavāraṇāyaṃ aruṇe ca uṭṭhite sā puṇṇamā cīvarasamayaṃ
tika-vin06t:972_8: ekāhānāgatā evāpajjati pubbe sahayogapattattā. Evaṃ sante ekībhāvagatāpi sā cīvarasamayaṃ
tika-vin06t:972_9: anāgatā eva jātāti sabbadā na tathāviggahakaraṇavacanatthaṃ kocideva vacanato dīpetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:973_0: Kimatthaṃ panettha “dasadivasādhiko māso”tiādi vuttanti? Taṃ pāripūrisambhavato.
tika-vin06t:973_1: Pañcamiyañhi pure aruṇaṃ uppannaaccekacīvarassa dasadivasādhiko māsoyeva paripūroti
tika-vin06t:973_2: katvā tathā vuttaṃ. Apica tassā pañcamiyā divasabhāgopi sampattāya rattiyā “hiyyo”ti
tika-vin06t:973_3: vuccati, pageva pure aruṇaṃ, tenevāha “hiyyo kho, āvuso, amhāka”ntiādi. “Evaṃ sante
tika-vin06t:973_5: ṭhapitaṃ ticīvarampi etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatiyevā”’ti ca “dasadivasādhiko māso”tiādi
tika-vin06t:973_6: ca yaṃ likhitaṃ. Taṃ na, “pañcamito paṭṭhāyā”ti pāṭhe sajjiteva etena pariyāyena
tika-vin06t:973_7: yathāvuttaatthasambhavato, na tāni ṭhānāni puna sajjitāni. Yathāṭhitavaseneva ajjhupekkhitabbānīti
tika-vin06t:973_8: no takkoti ācariyo. Idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ puṇṇamāyaṃ anissaggiyatthamevāti upatissatthero.
tika-vin06t:973_9: “Pavāraṇāmāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭṭhāyā”ti pāṭhe sajjite etena pariyāyena
tika-vin06t:973_10: yathāvutto uppannassa cīvarassa nidhānakālo dassito hoti, “accekacīvaranti accāyikacīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:973_11: vuccatī”tiādi pāṭho. “Chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāyā”ti ca “kāmañcesa dasāhaparama”ntiādi ca
tika-vin06t:973_12: yaṃ likhitaṃ, taṃ na pāṭho, tasmā ekādasadivasaṃ parihāraṃ labhatīti katvā ācariyena
tika-vin06t:973_14: pana uppannaṃ anaccekacīvarampi paccuddharitvā ṭhapitaṃ ticīvarampi etaṃ parihāraṃ
tika-vin06t:973_15: labhatiyevāti pāṭho”ti ca “accekacīvarassa anatthate kathine ekādasadivasādhiko māso,
tika-vin06t:973_16: atthate kathine ekādasadivasādhikā pañcamāsāti pāṭho”ti ca ettha papañcenti, tasmā
tika-vin06t:973_17: suṭṭhu sallakkhetvā kathetabbaṃ, tuṇhībhūtena vā bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:976_0: 652. “Tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaranti idaṃ ticīvare eva ayaṃ vidhi, itarasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:976_1: yathāsukhanti dassanatthaṃ vutta”nti vadanti. “Atirekachārattaṃ vippavasantī”ti tasmiṃyeva
tika-vin06t:976_2: senāsane vāso na vippavāsoti katvā vuttaṃ. Kasmā? Cīvarappavattijānanato. Ettha kiñcāpi
tika-vin06t:976_3: “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti vacanato atirekatopi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:976_4: āraññakameva pana senāsanaṃ hoti, dhutaṅgaṃ rakkhati cīvarappavattijānanapalibodhasambhavato.
tika-vin06t:977_0: 653. “Gāvutato atirekappamāṇena labhatī”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:977_1: “Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo tena cīvarena vippavāsāyā”ti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:977_2: Yojanappamāṇepi siyāti ce? Na, “puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā vasitvā pakkamatī”ti anāpattivāre
tika-vin06t:977_3: anuññātattā. Yadi evaṃ “yojanappamāṇe na labhatī”ti idaṃ kinti? Idaṃ nibaddhāvāsavaseneva
tika-vin06t:977_4: vuttaṃ. Tattha dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjatīti? Na bhijjati, kintu na idha dhutaṅgādhikāro atthīti.
tika-vin06t:977_5: Atha kasmā “ayaṃ dhutaṅgacoroti veditabbo”ti vuttanti? Asambhavato. Kathaṃ paññāyatīti?
tika-vin06t:977_6: Aṅgesu abhāvato. Dhutaṅgadharassa patirūpasenāsanadīpanato dhutaṅgadharatā tassa
tika-vin06t:977_7: siddhā. Vacanappamāṇatoti ce? Na, vacanappamāṇato ca pāḷiyeva pamāṇaṃ. “Anāpatti
tika-vin06t:977_8: puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā vasitvā pakkamatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Gāmasīmā nikkhamitvā kittakaṃ
tika-vin06t:977_9: kālaṃ vasitvā pakkamitabbanti ce? Punadivaseyeva, tasmā aṭṭhamo aruṇo nibaddhāvāse
tika-vin06t:977_10: vā gantabbaṭṭhāne vā uṭṭhetabboti eke. Antochārattanti eke. Yāva nibaddhāvāsaṃ na
tika-vin06t:977_11: kappetīti eke. Yāva maggaparissamavinodanāti eke. Sati antarāye antochārattaṃ vasati,
tika-vin06t:977_12: anāpatti. Nibaddhāvāsakappane sati aruṇuggamane āpatti. Sace taṃsattamo divaso, tadaheva
tika-vin06t:977_13: nikkhittacīvaraṃ gahetabbaṃ, paccuddharitabbaṃ vāti eke. Sace antarā navamaggapātubhāvena
tika-vin06t:977_14: vā navagāmasannivesena vā, taṃ senāsanaṃ aṅgasampattito parihāyati. Tadaheva cīvaraṃ
tika-vin06t:977_15: gahetabbaṃ vā paccuddharitabbaṃ vā. Chārattaṃ vippavasantassa ce parihāyati, anāpatti
tika-vin06t:977_16: anuññātadivasattāti eke. Āpatti eva anaṅgasampattitoti eke. Yuttataraṃ panettha vicāretvā
tika-vin06t:977_17: gahetabbaṃ. Sace dhutaṅgadharo hoti, gāmasīmāyaṃ avasitvā pacchimappamāṇayutte ṭhāne
tika-vin06t:977_18: vasitvā pakkamitabbaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ baddhaavippavāsasīmo ce gāmo hoti, aññasmimpi māse
tika-vin06t:977_19: antosīmāya vasato anāpatti. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade “yathāvuttasenāsane vasantenāpi chārattameva
tika-vin06t:977_20: cīvaraṃ gāme nikkhipitabbanti adhippāyena aññaṃ antochārattampi aññampi vasato āpattiyevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:980_0: 657. Dethāvuso amhākanti ettha akataviññatti hoti na hotīti? Hoti, yadi evaṃ aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadassa
tika-vin06t:980_1: ca imassa ca kiṃ nānākaraṇanti? Taṃ aññātakaappavāriteyeva viññāpentassa, idaṃ ñātakapavāritepi,
tika-vin06t:980_2: taṃ anacchinnacīvarasseva, idaṃ tassapi, taṃ cīvaraṃyeva viññāpentassa, idaṃ acīvarampi.
tika-vin06t:980_3: Evaṃ sante idaṃ taṃ antokatvā ṭhitaṃ hoti, tasmā dvinnampi aṅgasampattiyā sati kena
tika-vin06t:980_4: bhavitabbanti? Iminā bhavitabbaṃ imassa nippadesatoti eke. Dvīhipi bhavitabbaṃ ubhinnampi
tika-vin06t:980_5: aṅgasiddhitoti eke. Imāni tassa aṅgāni vikappanupagacīvaratā, samayābhāvo, aññātakaviññatti,
tika-vin06t:980_6: tāya ca paṭilābhoti cattāri. Imassa pana saṅghe pariṇatabhāvo, ñatvā attano pariṇāmanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:980_7: paṭilābhoti tīṇi. Ettha paṭhamo vādo ayutto katvāpi okāsaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ, parivāre
tika-vin06t:980_8: ca avicāritattā. Yadi evaṃ tattha aṅgesu “anaññapariṇatatā”ti vattabbanti ce? Na
tika-vin06t:980_9: vattabbaṃ, atthato siddhattā. Pariṇatasikkhāpadadvayasiddhito, pariṇatasaññito, āpattisambhavato
tika-vin06t:980_10: ca “mayhampi dethā”ti vadati, “vaṭṭatī”ti anuddiṭṭhaṃ, “amhākampi atthī”ti vuttattā
tika-vin06t:980_11: vaṭṭati. “Saṅghassa pariṇataṃ…pe… āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti ettha “puggalassā”ti na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:980_12: yato suddhapācittiyavasena āgatattā. “Aññacetiyassā”ti na vuttaṃ saṅghassa acetiyattā,
tika-vin06t:980_13: tasmāyeva “cetiyassa pariṇataṃ…pe… āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti etthāpi “aññasaṅghassa aññapuggalassā”ti
tika-vin06t:980_14: na vuttaṃ. “Yato tathā idha ca ‘puggalassa pariṇataṃ…pe… āpatti dukkaṭassā’ti ettha
tika-vin06t:980_15: ca ‘attanopī’ti kiñcāpi na vuttaṃ, tathāpi sambhavatī”ti vadanti. Taṃ pana idha attano
tika-vin06t:980_16: pariṇāmanādhikārattā imassa sikkhāpadassa na vuttanti eke. Tatuttarisikkhāpade “aññassatthāyā”ti
tika-vin06t:980_17: padaṃ viyāti eke. Taṃ na, ettha puggalapariṇāmanasikkhāpade avuttattā. Dhammasiritthero panāha –
tika-vin06t:983_0: Tassattho – saṅghassa pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmeyya nissaggiyaṃ. Tadeva aññato pariṇāmeyya
tika-vin06t:983_1: pācittiyaṃ. Aññassa pariṇataṃ attano vā parassa vā pariṇāmeyya dukkaṭanti, tasmā
tika-vin06t:983_2: aññātakaviññattiādīsu vuttāpattisambhavato idha pariṇatadvaye “attano”ti padaṃ na
tika-vin06t:983_3: vuttaṃ. Tasmiñhi vutte dukkaṭamattappasaṅgo siyā, avutte panetesu vuttāpattīnaṃ yathāgamamaññatarā
tika-vin06t:983_4: ca idha avuttasiddhi dukkaṭañcāti dve āpattiyo ekato hontīti vinayadharānaṃ anavasesañāṇassa okāso kato hotīti.
tika-vin06t:995_0: 1. Vādakkhittoti ettha avisesena vādajappavitaṇḍasaṅkhāto tividhopi kathāmaggo “vādo”
tika-vin06t:995_1: icceva vuttoti veditabbo. Tesu “titthiyehi saddhi”nti vacanato ṭhapetvā vādaṃ “sesā”ti
tika-vin06t:995_2: vadanti. Chalajātiniggahaṭṭhānakusalatāya kadāci katthaci avajānitvā paṭijānāti,
tika-vin06t:995_3: tathā pubbe kiñci vacanaṃ paṭijānitvā pacchā avajānāti. Evaṃ vā aññathā vā aññenaññaṃ
tika-vin06t:995_4: paṭicarati. Evaṃ pavatto sampajānamusā bhāsaṃ paṭissuṇitvā asaccāyanto saṅketaṃ katvā
tika-vin06t:995_5: visaṃvādento evaṃ so vādakkhitto samāno pācittiyavatthuñca paripūrento vicaratīti
tika-vin06t:995_6: evamadhippāyo veditabbo. Attano vādeti ettha “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti paṭhamamāraddhe
tika-vin06t:995_7: attano vāde. “Yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti no samayo. “Sabbe dhammā”ti vutte nibbānampi
tika-vin06t:995_8: saṅgahaṃ gacchati. “Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha”nti vuttattā pana taṃ na dukkhaṃ. No ṭhānametaṃ
tika-vin06t:995_9: vijjati. Ayaṃ paravādī “yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti suttaṃ dassetvā siddhantaṃ sambhametvā
tika-vin06t:995_10: “virodhi viruddho”ti vuttaṃ dosaṃ āropessatīti tasmiṃ paṭhamavāde kañci dosaṃ sallakkhento
tika-vin06t:995_11: āropite vā dose anāropite vā “nāyaṃ mama vādo”ti taṃ avajānitvā “nibbānantveva sassata”nti,
tika-vin06t:995_12: “anattā iti nicchayā”ti ca suttaṃ disvā tassa paṭhamavādassa niddosataṃ sallakkhetvā
tika-vin06t:995_13: “mameva ayaṃ vādo”ti tameva pacchā paṭijānāti. Evaṃ tattha yathāvuttamānisaṃsaṃ sallakkhento
tika-vin06t:995_14: taṃ paṭijānitvā yadi anattā sabbe dhammā, dhammā eva na te bhavanti. Sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti
tika-vin06t:996_0: Ayañca atta-saddo sabhāvavācīti evaṃ āropite vā dose anāropite vā dosoti sallakkhetvā
tika-vin06t:996_1: “nāyaṃ mama vādo”ti tameva paṭhamavādaṃ pacchā avajānāti. Atha so paravādī sapakkhaṃ
tika-vin06t:996_2: paṭisedhe paṭijānanattāpanayanaṃ. Paṭijānāti patyāssa iti vacanato “paṭiññā aññā
tika-vin06t:996_3: so nāma te niggaho”ti vutto. Sabhāvātirittaṃ atthaṃ paṭisedhādhippāyato sabhāvato
tika-vin06t:996_4: atirittaṃ bālaparikappitamattānaṃ sandhāya “anattā sabbe dhammā”ti me paṭiññātakathā,
tika-vin06t:996_5: sā ca tadavatthāyevāti na me taṃ paṭiññātattāpanayanaṃ atthi, “nāyaṃ mama vādo”ti
tika-vin06t:996_6: avajānanaṃ pana sabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ attānaṃ sandhāya “anattā sabbe dhammā”ti na vadāmīti
tika-vin06t:996_7: adhippāyena katanti iminā aññena kāraṇena taṃ pubbe paṭiññātattāpanayanaṃ kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:996_8: paṭicchādeti. “Anattā sabbeva dhammā”ti na vattabbaṃ “atta-saddassa sabhāvavācittā”ti
tika-vin06t:996_9: idaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca tena pubbe paṭiññātattāpanayanaṃ kataṃ. Tamaññakāraṇaṃ pacchā
tika-vin06t:997_0: Yasmā na kevalaṃ yathādassitanayena so atthameva avajānāti, paṭijānāti ca, kintu
tika-vin06t:997_1: vacanampi, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “jānitabbato”ti paṭhamaṃ kāraṇaṃ vatvā paravādinā
tika-vin06t:997_2: “yadi jānitabbato aniccaṃ, nibbānaṃ te aniccaṃ siyā”ti vutte “na mayā ‘jānitabbato’ti
tika-vin06t:997_3: kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, ‘jātidhammato’ti mayā vuttaṃ, taṃ tayā badhiratāya aññena sallakkhitantiādīni
tika-vin06t:997_4: vadatīti adhippāyo. ‘Jānitabbato’ti vatvā puna ‘jātidhammato’tiādīni vadatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:997_5: “Avajānitvā puna paṭijānanto taṃ avajānanaṃ iminā paṭicchādeti nāmā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:998: 2. Jānitvā jānantassa cāti jānitvā vā jānantassa vāti atthadvayaṃ dīpetīti.
tika-vin06t:999_1: keci, tasmā evaṃ vadato vacanaṃ, taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā cetanāti ubhayaṃ vuttanti mātikāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:999_2: ubhinnaṃ saṅgahitattā. Vibhaṅge taṃ vacanaṃ yasmā vinā viññattiyā natthi, tasmā “vācasikā
tika-vin06t:999_3: viññattī”ti viññatti ca dassitā. “Evaṃ vadato vacana”nti lokavohārena vatvā paramatthato
tika-vin06t:999_4: dassento “taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā vā cetanāti vutta”nti ca vadati. Oḷārikenevāti cetanāsamuṭṭhānavācānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1000_0: 9. Diṭṭhassa hotīti diṭṭho assa, anena vā upacārajjhānavasena na mayā abyāvaṭo mato,
tika-vin06t:1000_1: “na mayā pavanto paṭo diṭṭho”tiādiṃ bhaṇantassa ca paramatthasuññataṃ upādāya eva
tika-vin06t:1000_2: “itthiṃ na passāmi, na ca purisa”nti bhaṇantassa ca na musāvādo.
tika-vin06t:1001: 11. Āpattiṃ āpajjatiyevāti ettha “dubbhāsitāpattī”ti vadanti. Kasmā? “Keḷiṃ kurumāno”ti vuttattā. “Vācā girā…pe… vācasikā viññattī”ti ujukaṃ sandhāya, kāyo na ujuko.
tika-vin06t:1004_0: 13. “Puna are patteti puna taṃ ṭhānaṃ parivaṭṭetvā āgate aññasmiṃ are”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1004_1: Patiṭṭhitārappadesanti bhūmiṃ. Puna areti puna tasmiṃyeva are bhūmiṃ patteti atthoti
tika-vin06t:1004_2: keci, taṃ na sundaraṃ viya. Jāpitoti parājito, “parājito”ti vā pāṭho. Pāpesīti abhibhavasi.
tika-vin06t:1004_3: Manāpaṃ bhāsamānassa brāhmaṇassa garuṃ bhāraṃ. Udabbahīti ākaḍḍhīti attho, anādaratthe
tika-vin06t:1004_4: vā sāmivacanaṃ. Dhanañca naṃ alābhesīti yathā so dhanaṃ alabhi, tathā akāsīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1005_0: 15. Pubbeti nidāne. Avakaṇṇakanti chinnakaṇṇakanāmaṃ. Javakaṇṇakanti vaṅkakaṇṇakanāmaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1005_1: Dhaniṭṭhakaṃ dhanavaḍḍhakanāmaṃ, sirivaḍḍhakanāmaṃ kulavaḍḍhakasseva nāmaṃ. Tacchakakammanti
tika-vin06t:1005_2: khaṇanakammakārā koṭṭhakā, pāsāṇakammakārāti keci. “Muddāti pabbagaṇanā. Gaṇanāti
tika-vin06t:1005_3: mahāgaṇanā”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. “Madhumehaṃ omeha”nti likhitaṃ. Thūlakāyassa
tika-vin06t:1005_4: maṃsūpacayoti eke. Yabha methune. Vītarāgatādīhi akkosantopi kileseheva kira akkosati
tika-vin06t:1005_5: nāma, tathā “sotāpanno”ti akkosanto āpattiyā akkosati nāmāti eke. Liṅgāyattattā accodātādipi liṅgameva jātaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1006: 16. Sabbattha vadetīti uddeso. Bhaṇatīti vitthāro. Vadetīti vā iminā paraviññāpanaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:1007_0: 26. Aññāpadesavāresu pana “evaṃ vadetī”ti vuttaṃ. Kasmā? Pubbe dassitauddesakkamanidassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1007_1: Pubbepi “hīnena hīnaṃ, hīnena ukkaṭṭhaṃ, ukkaṭṭhena hīnaṃ, ukkaṭṭhena ukkaṭṭha”nti
tika-vin06t:1007_2: jātyādīsu ekekasmiṃ catudhā catudhā dassitauddesakkamassa nidassanaṃ “eva”nti iminā
tika-vin06t:1007_3: karoti. “Hīnena hīnaṃ vadetī”ti vuttaṭṭhāneyeva hi “evaṃ vadetī”ti vutte so ākāro
tika-vin06t:1007_4: nidassito hotīti adhippāyo. Aññathā aññāpadesena so ākāro na sambhavatīti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:1007_5: Na sambhavati evāti ce? Na, visesakāraṇābhāvā, tattha anāpattippasaṅgato, aniyamaniddesena
tika-vin06t:1007_6: aniyamatthasambhavato ca. “Santi idhekacce caṇḍālā”tiādinā hi aniyamaniddesena caṇḍālaṃ
tika-vin06t:1007_7: vā acaṇḍālaṃ vā sandhāya bhaṇantassa āpattīti aniyamattho sambhavatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1007_8: Yadi evaṃ ettakameva vattabbaṃ tāvatā pubbe dassitauddesakkamanidassanasiddhitoti?
tika-vin06t:1007_9: Na, “vadetī”ti iminā ayojite “eva”nti pade imaṃ nāma ākāraṃ dassetīti anavabodhato.
tika-vin06t:1007_10: Aññāpadesanayepi paraviññāpaneyeva dukkaṭapācittiyaṃ viyāti niyamanapayojanaṃ vā
tika-vin06t:1007_11: “vadetī”ti padanti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā attano samīpe ṭhatvā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpento
tika-vin06t:1007_12: hīnena hīnaṃ vadeti bhaṇati, āpatti pācittiyassa. Sace sayaṃ hīno hīnena hīnaṃ caṇḍālaṃ…pe…
tika-vin06t:1007_13: pukkusaṃ “pukkuso”ti bhaṇati āpatti vācāya vācāya pācittiyassa, esa nayo aññāpadesavāresupīti
tika-vin06t:1007_14: yojanā veditabbā. Ayamattho duṭṭhadosesu pariyesitabbo. Aññathā “vadeti bhaṇatī”ti
tika-vin06t:1007_15: etesaṃ aññataraṃ ubhayattha anaññāpadesavāraaññāpadesavāresu, visesena vā aññāpadesavāresu
tika-vin06t:1007_16: niratthakaṃ āpajjati vināyeva tena vacanasiliṭṭhatāsambhavato. Attato pāḷiyaṃ avuttattā
tika-vin06t:1007_17: panettha “sāṇattika”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ padasandhi vadetīti vada itīti.
tika-vin06t:1007_18: Asammukhā vadantassa dukkaṭaṃ “sammukhā pana sattahipi āpattikkhandhehi vadantassa
tika-vin06t:1007_19: dukkaṭa”nti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā. Davakamyatā nāma keḷi, taṃ dassetuṃ “hasādhippāyatā”ti
tika-vin06t:1007_20: vuttaṃ. “Asammukhāpi davakamyatāya vadantassa dubbhāsitamevā”ti ācariyā vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1007_21: Pāpagarahitāya kujjhitvāpi vadantassa dukkaṭaṃ, asammukhā anāpattīti.
tika-vin06t:1010: 36-7. “Imassa sutvā amussā”ti pāṭho. “Imesaṃ sutvā”ti na sundaraṃ. Bhedāyapīti bhedāya. Tiṇṇampi bhikkhubhāvatoyeva nipajjanato “bhikkhūnaṃ pesuññe”ti bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin06t:1011_0: 38-9. “Itthannāmo āyasmā caṇḍālo…pe… pukkusoti bhaṇatī”ti vatvā pesuññaṃ upasaṃharatīti
tika-vin06t:1011_1: yojanā. Aññathā “pukkusoti bhaṇatī”ti vattabbatā āpajjati. Ettha anupasampannavāro
tika-vin06t:1011_2: labbhamānopi na uddhaṭo omasavāde dassitanayattā, saṅkhepato ante dassetukāmatāya
tika-vin06t:1011_3: vā. Tathā hi ante tīṇi dukkaṭāni dassitāni. Tāni pana dassento bhagavā yasmā “upasampannassa
tika-vin06t:1011_4: sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharatī”ti vuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ aññataravipallāsavasena
tika-vin06t:1011_5: vā ubhayavipallāsavasena vā pācittiyanti katvā dvepi tāni ekato vuttānīti dassetukāmo,
tika-vin06t:1011_6: tasmā sabbapaṭhamaṃyeva “upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ
tika-vin06t:1011_7: upasaṃharati, āpatti pācittiyassā”ti āha. “Dvīsu panetesu yasmā pārājikaṃ ajjhāpannopi
tika-vin06t:1011_8: upasampanno tādisaṃyeva upasampannaṃ khuṃsetukāmo omasati, tādisassa sutvā tādisassa
tika-vin06t:1011_9: pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati, āpatti pācittiyassa, tasmā ‘upasampanno’ti idaṃ ādipadaṃ sabbattha
tika-vin06t:1011_10: vutta”nti keci vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ, anavasesaāpattiṃ āpannassa puna āpattiyā asambhavato,
tika-vin06t:1011_11: tasmā kevalaṃ mātikāyaṃ bhikkhupadābhāvatoyeva “bhaṇati upasaṃharatī”ti padānaṃ kārakaniddesābhāve
tika-vin06t:1011_12: asambhavato eva taṃ ādipadaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Idaṃ pāḷilesābhāvato anāṇattikameva.
tika-vin06t:1011_13: “Na piyakamyassa, na bhedādhippāyassā”ti upasaṃharaṇāpekkhaṃ sāmivacanaṃ tuṇhībhūtassa
tika-vin06t:1014_0: 45-6. Sabbametaṃ padaso dhammo nāmāti ettha dhammo nāma buddhabhāsitoti evaṃ sambandho.
tika-vin06t:1014_1: Akkharasamūhoti asamattapade. Paccekabuddhabhāsitaṃ buddhabhāsite eva. Anupāsakagahaṭṭhehi
tika-vin06t:1014_2: bhāsito isibhāsitādisaṅgahaṃ gacchatīti veditabbaṃ. Katthaci potthake “devatābhāsito”ti
tika-vin06t:1014_3: padaṃ natthi, yattha atthi, sā pāḷi. Gāthābandhepi ca esa nayoti ekameva akkharaṃ
tika-vin06t:1014_4: vatvā ṭhānaṃ labbhati eva. “Evaṃ me suta”ntiādisuttaṃ bhaṇāpiyamāno ekāraṃ vatvā
tika-vin06t:1014_5: tiṭṭhati ce, anvakkharena pācittiyaṃ, aparipuṇṇapadaṃ vatvā ṭhite anubyañjanena.
tika-vin06t:1014_6: Padesu ekaṃ paṭhamapadaṃ virujjhati ce, anupadena pācittiyaṃ. Aṭṭhakathānissitoti
tika-vin06t:1014_7: aṭṭhakathānissitavasena ṭhito. Pubbe pakatibhāsāya vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathaṃ sandhāya. Pāḷinissitoti
tika-vin06t:1015_0: 48. Upacāranti dvādasahatthaṃ. “Opātetīti ekato bhaṇati samāgacchatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1015_1: Kiñcāpi apalāladamanampi sīlupadesopi bhagavato kāle uppanno, atha kho tesu yaṃ yaṃ
tika-vin06t:1015_2: buddhavacanato āharitvā vuttaṃ, taṃ tadeva āpattivatthu hotīti viññāpanatthaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1015_3: “vadantī”ti vacanehi sithilaṃ kataṃ. Buddhavacanato āharitvā vuttassa bahulatāya
tika-vin06t:1015_4: tabbahulanayena tesu āpatti vuttā, tasmā mahāpaccariyaṃ tassādhippāyo pakāsitoti
tika-vin06t:1015_5: attho. “Sabbesameva vacananti apare”ti vuttaṃ. Sace ācariyo ṭhito nisinnānaṃ pāṭhaṃ
tika-vin06t:1015_6: deti, “na ṭhito nisinnassa dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti vuttāpattiṃ nāpajjatīti eke. Tesampi
tika-vin06t:1015_7: pāṭhadānaṃ dhammadesanato na aññanti taṃ na yuttaṃ, chattapāṇikādīnaṃ pāṭhadānena
tika-vin06t:1016: “Ubho atthaṃ na jānanti, ubho dhammaṃ na passare;
tika-vin06t:1017: Yo cāyaṃ mantaṃ vāceti, yo cādhammenadhīyatī”ti. ;
tika-vin06t:1018_0: Ettha adhīyatīti attho, tasmā pāṭhadānampi dhammadesanāva. Sekhiyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dhammaparicchedo
tika-vin06t:1018_1: panettha padasodhamme vuttanayena veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā ayameva dhammo sabbattha
tika-vin06t:1018_2: dhammapaṭisaṃyuttasikkhāpadesu veditabbo. Yadi evaṃ saṅkhārabhāsādivasena cittadhammaṃ
tika-vin06t:1018_3: desentassa sekhiyavasena anāpatti siyā, tato chapakajātakavirodho. Tattha mantānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1018_4: bāhiraganthattāti ce? Na, tadadhippāyājānanato. Ayañhi tattha adhippāyo “bāhirakaganthasaṅkhātampi
tika-vin06t:1018_5: mantaṃ ucce āsane nisinnassa vācetuṃ me bhikkhave amanāpaṃ, pageva dhammaṃ desetu”nti.
tika-vin06t:1018_6: “Tadāpi me, bhikkhave, amanāpaṃ nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa mantaṃ
tika-vin06t:1018_7: vācetuṃ, kimaṅgaṃ pana etarahi…pe… dhammaṃ desetu”nti hi ayaṃ pāḷi yathāvuttameva
tika-vin06t:1018_8: adhippāyaṃ dīpeti, na aññaṃ. Teneva “mantaṃ vācetuṃ dhammaṃ desetu”nti vacanabhedo
tika-vin06t:1019_0: Mayā saddhiṃ mā vadātiādimhi pana anugaṇṭhipade evaṃ vutto “sace bhikkhu sāmaṇerena
tika-vin06t:1019_1: saddhiṃ vattukāmo, tathā sāmaṇeropi bhikkhunā saddhiṃ vattukāmo sahasā opāteti, ‘yebhuyyena
tika-vin06t:1019_2: paguṇaṃ ganthaṃ bhaṇantaṃ opātetī”tiādīsu viya anāpatti, na hi ettāvatā bhikkhu sāmaṇerassa
tika-vin06t:1019_3: uddisati nāma hoti. Yasmā mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ natthi, tasmāpi yuttamevetaṃ. Sace tattha
tika-vin06t:1019_4: vicāretvā paṭikkhittaṃ siyā āpatti, kiriyākiriyañca nāpajjati. Kasmā? Yasmā cittena
tika-vin06t:1019_5: ekato vattukāmo, atha kho naṃ ‘ekato mā vadā’ti paṭikkhipitvāpi ekato vadanto āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:1019_6: Avattukāmassa sahasā virajjhitvā ekato vadantassa anāpatti, tena vuttaṃ ‘mayā saddhiṃ
tika-vin06t:1019_7: mā vadāti vutto yadi vadati, anāpattī’ti. Tathāpi ācariyānaṃ matimanuvattantena evarūpesu
tika-vin06t:1019_8: ṭhānesu yathāvuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Kasmā? Yasmā mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ natthi,
tika-vin06t:1019_9: natthibhāvatoyeva āpatti. Sace tattha anāpattiavacanaṃ na sambhavati ayamaṭṭhānattā”ti.
tika-vin06t:1020_0: Tatrāyaṃ vicāraṇā – “mayā saddhiṃ mā vadā”ti vutto yadi vadati, bhikkhuno anāpattīti
tika-vin06t:1020_1: yuttametaṃ bhikkhuno vattukāmatāyābhāvato, bhāvepi sajjhāyakaraṇādīsu tīsu anāpattito
tika-vin06t:1020_2: ca. Atha sāmaṇerena byattatāya “mayā saddhiṃ mā vadā”ti vutto bhikkhu abyattatāya
tika-vin06t:1020_3: vadati, āpatti eva vattukāmatāsabbhāvato. Sahasā ce vadati, anāpatti tadabhāvato.
tika-vin06t:1020_4: Sace bhikkhu evaṃ “mayā saddhiṃ mā vadā”ti vatvā tena saddhiṃ sayaṃ vadati, āpatti
tika-vin06t:1020_5: eva. Na hi etaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ kiriyākiriyaṃ. Yadi etaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ kiriyākiriyaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:1020_6: yuttaṃ. Tattha anāpattīti adhippāyo. Mahāpaccariyaṃ imināva adhippāyena “mayā saddhiṃ
tika-vin06t:1020_7: mā vadā”ti vuttaṃ siyā. Na hi sāmaṇerassa kiriyā idha pamāṇanti, imasmiṃ pana adhippāye
tika-vin06t:1020_8: vutte atiyuttaṃvāti attho. Akkharattho byañjanattho. Kiñcāpi “yañca padaṃ yañca anupadaṃ
tika-vin06t:1020_9: yañca anvakkharaṃ yañca anubyañjanaṃ, sabbametaṃ padasodhammo nāmā”ti vuttaṃ, tathāpi
tika-vin06t:1020_10: “padena vāceti, pade pade āpatti pācittiyassa, akkharāya vāceti, akkharakkharāya
tika-vin06t:1020_11: āpatti pācittiyassā”ti idameva dvayaṃ yojitaṃ, taṃ kasmāti ce? Padena anupadaanubyañjanānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1020_13: sadisaṃ pacchābyañjana”nti, tasmā anupadekadesamattameva anubyañjananti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1020_14: “Akkharānubyañjanasamūho pada”nti ca vuttattā padamattameva vattabbaṃ tena anupadādittayaggahaṇatoti
tika-vin06t:1020_15: ce? Na vattabbaṃ vacanavisesato. Padena vācento hi pade vā anupade vā anubyañjane
tika-vin06t:1020_16: vā āpattiṃ āpajjati. Na akkharena. Akkharena vācento pana padādīsu aññatarasmiṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:1020_17: Na hi “varo varaññū varado varāharo”tiādimhi paṭhamaṃ va-kāraṃ vācento dutiyādiva-kāre
tika-vin06t:1020_18: opāteti, paṭhamaṃ ro-kāraṃ vācento dutiyaro-kāre opāteti, paṭhamaṃ ra-kāraṃ vācento
tika-vin06t:1020_19: dutiyara-kāre opāteti, āpatti pācittiyassāti sambhavati. Anubyañjanānulomato sambhavati
tika-vin06t:1020_20: evāti ce? Na, “pade pade āpatti pācittiyassā”ti iminā viruddhattā. Idañhi vacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1020_21: ekasmiṃ pade ekā āpattīti dīpeti. “Rūpaṃ aniccanti vuccamāno rūti opātetī”ti vacanato
tika-vin06t:1020_22: sakalaṃ pādaṃ vācentassa paṭhamaakkharamatte ekato vutte āpattīti siddhanti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1020_23: “akkharakkharāya āpatti pācittiyassā”ti iminā viruddhattā, tasmā rūti opātetīti vattuṃ
tika-vin06t:1020_24: asambhavato rū-kārassa yathāvuttadhammapariyāpannabhāvasiddhito taṃ avatvā kevalaṃ
tika-vin06t:1020_26: vuccamāno”ti vuttaṃ, vacanasiliṭṭhatāvasena vā anubyañjane vedanāvacanaṃ viyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1023_0: 50. “Na sahaseyyaṃ kappetabba”nti bhāvavasena vuttaṃ, kesuci “na sahaseyyā kappetabbā”ti
tika-vin06t:1023_1: pāṭho, na kappetabbā bhikkhunāti paññattanti adhippāyo. “Apassenaṃ vāti vāyimamañcakameva
tika-vin06t:1023_2: hotī”ti likhitaṃ. Yaṃ etesaṃ na kappati, taṃ tesampīti upajjhāyādīnaṃ santikaṃ agantvā
tika-vin06t:1024_0: 52. “Anupasampanno nāma bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso’ti vuttattā mātugāmo anupasampannoti
tika-vin06t:1024_1: catuttharattiyaṃ mātugāmo dvepi sahaseyyāpattiyo janetīti apare”ti vuttaṃ, “bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin06t:1024_2: ṭhapetvā…pe… pannoti pārājikavatthubhūto tiracchānapuriso adhippeto”ti ca, ubhayampi
tika-vin06t:1024_3: vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Dutiyasikkhāpade mātugāmo nāmāti manussitthiṃyeva gahetvā yakkhī petī
tika-vin06t:1024_4: tiracchānagatā pārājikavatthubhūtā na gahitā tesu dukkaṭattā. “Sace pana attanopi
tika-vin06t:1024_5: sikkhāpade dukkaṭaṃ bhaveyya, atha kasmā paṭhamasikkhāpade pācittiya”nti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1024_6: “Aparikkhitte pamukhe anāpattī”ti sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ, tassatthaṃ dīpetuṃ andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1024_7: “bhūmiyaṃ vinā jagatiyā pamukhaṃ sandhāya kathita”nti vuttaṃ. Puna vasatīti catutthadivase
tika-vin06t:1024_8: vasati. Bhikkhunipanneti bhikkhumhi nipanne. Sannipatitamaṇḍapaṃ nāma mahāvihāre
tika-vin06t:1024_9: sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ. “Tīṇi ca divasāni dukkaṭakhette vasitvā catutthe divase sahaseyyāpattipahonake
tika-vin06t:1024_10: sayati, pācittiyevā”ti ekacce vadanti kira, taṃ na yuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1027_0: 55. “Atha kho te manussā”ti ca “te addhikā”ti ca pāṭho. “Ekaratta”ntipi atthi, so
tika-vin06t:1027_1: na sundaro. Paṇḍake pāḷiyaṃ dukkaṭassa vuttattā “ubhatobyañjanehi mūlāpattīti dissatī”ti,
tika-vin06t:1027_2: “animittādayo itthiyovā”ti ca vadanti ubhatobyañjanake vuttaṃ viya. Kiñcāpi matitthī
tika-vin06t:1027_3: pārājikavatthu hoti, anupādinnapakkhe ṭhitattā pana idha āpattiṃ na karoti. Pārājikāpattiṭṭhānañcettha na oloketabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1030_0: 66. “Viññū paṭibalā”ti vacanato aviññū itthiyāpi desentassa anāpatti. Idha yakkhīādayo
tika-vin06t:1030_1: manussitthī viya anoḷārikattā dukkaṭavatthukā jātā. Tiracchānagatamanussaviggahitthiyā
tika-vin06t:1030_2: paṭibalatāya vuttattā itarāpi dukkaṭavatthuyevāti eke. “Mātugāmāyā”ti liṅgavipallāsena
tika-vin06t:1030_3: vuttaṃ. “Aṭṭhakathādipāṭhaṃ ṭhapetvā damiḷādinā yathāruci kathetuṃ labhati kirā”ti
tika-vin06t:1030_4: likhitaṃ, yathā yakkhīādayo dukkaṭavatthukā jātā, tathā purisaviggahaṃ gahetvā ṭhitena
tika-vin06t:1030_5: yakkhādinā saddhiṃ ṭhitassa mātugāmassa dhammaṃ desento dukkaṭaṃ anāpajjitvā kasmā
tika-vin06t:1030_6: pācittiyamāpajjatīti ce? Īsakampi dutiyapakkhaṃ abhajanato. Manussamātugāmopi na
tika-vin06t:1030_7: dutiyo, pageva yakkhādayoti. Na dutiyāniyate tassa dutiyattāti ce? Na tattha duṭṭhullavācāpekkhā
tika-vin06t:1030_8: dutiyatā, kintu nisajjāpekkhā, idha ca na nisajjamattaṃ, kintu desanā idhādhippetā.
tika-vin06t:1030_9: Sā ca nipajjanato oḷārikā, tasmā asamatthanidassanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1033_0: 67. “Catutthapārājikavatthu ca idañca ekamevā”ti vuttaṃ, na yuttaṃ. Kasmā? Tattha
tika-vin06t:1033_1: “moghapurisā”ti vuttattā. Te ariyamissakā na hontīti dvepi ekasadisānīti mama takko.
tika-vin06t:1033_2: “Ariyāpi paṭijāniṃsu, tesampi abbhantare vijjamānattā uttarimanussadhammassā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1033_4: vuttaṃ, na attano uttarimanussadhammaṃ sandhāyāti apare”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1037_0: 78-80. “Teneva hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocesī”ti pāṭho sampatipāṭho sundaro.
tika-vin06t:1037_1: Apaloketvāva kātabbā. No ce, pāḷiyaṃyeva vuttaṃ siyā. “Ottappenā”ti vattabbe ruḷhīvasena
tika-vin06t:1037_2: paresu “hirottappenā”ti vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ uttānattā na vuttaṃ, pācittiyāsambhavadassaneneva
tika-vin06t:1038_0: 83. Tattha “kamma”nti vuttaajjhācārepi pariyāpannattā taṃ tassa daṇḍakammavatthu.
tika-vin06t:1038_1: “Tattha kammaṃ āpanno”ti pubbepi likhitaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “attakāmaṃ āpanno”ti
tika-vin06t:1041_0: 86. Kaṭasakkharā setamattikā viya mudukā sakkharajāti. “Akatapabbhāreti avalañjitabbaṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1041_2: uddhaṭapaṃsu. Suddhacittāti kiñcāpi “evaṃ pavaṭṭite pathavī bhijjissatī”ti jānanti,
tika-vin06t:1041_3: no pana ce pathavībhedatthikā, suddhacittā nāma honti. Paṃsuādayo dve koṭṭhāsā āpattikarā.
tika-vin06t:1041_4: Keci “sabbacchannādīsu upaḍḍhe dukkaṭassa vuttattā sace dukkaṭaṃ, yutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1041_5: Tattha yuttaṃ tādisassa vatthuno sambhavā, idha pana jātapathavī ca ajātapathavī
tika-vin06t:1041_6: cāti dveyeva vatthūni, tasmā dvinnaṃ ekena bhavitabbanti na yuttaṃ. Etthāpi dukkaṭavacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1041_7: atthīti ce? Taṃ pana saññāvasena, na vatthuvasenāti na yuttameva.
tika-vin06t:1042_0: 87. Aggiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha ettāvatā usumaṃ gaṇhāti, tasmā vaṭṭatīti keci. Evaṃ
tika-vin06t:1042_1: sati pathaviyā aggimhi kate dūratopi bhūmi uṇhā hoti, tattakaṃ kopetabbaṃ siyā, na
tika-vin06t:1042_2: ca kappati, tasmā yasmiṃ ṭhāne patati, taṃ so aggi ḍahati, tasmā vaṭṭatīti eke. Aḍahitepi
tika-vin06t:1042_3: “adaḍḍhāya pathaviyā aggiṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā attanā pātanāyeva doso
tika-vin06t:1047_0: 89. Pharasuṃ niggahetuṃ asakkontoti dassitabhāvaṃ jānāpeti. Kasmā ayaṃ pharasuṃ uggirīti
tika-vin06t:1047_1: ce? Manussānantiādi tassa parihāro. “Ākoṭesi chindīti ca vacanato rukkhadevatānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1047_2: hatthāni chijjanti, na cātumahārājikādīnaṃ viya acchejjānī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1048_0: 90-92. Bhavanti ahuvuñcāti dvikāliko bhūtasaddo. Yadi bījato nibbattena bījaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1048_1: tadeva santakaṃ yadidaṃ. Sova kukkuṭo maṃsimakkhitoti ayameva hi parihāro. Aṭṭhakathāsupi
tika-vin06t:1048_2: hi “bīje bījasaññī”ti likhitaṃ. Yaṃ bījaṃ bhūtagāmo nāma hoti, tasmiṃ bīje bhūtagāmabījeti
tika-vin06t:1048_3: yojetvā. Amūlakattā kira sampuṇṇabhūtagāmo na hoti, “samūlapatto eva hi bhūtagāmo
tika-vin06t:1048_4: nāmā”ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti. “Abhūtagāmamūlattāti bhūtagāmato anuppannattā abhūtagāmamūlaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1048_5: bhūtagāmassa amūlakattā vā. Na hi tato añño bhūtagāmo uppajjatī”ti dvidhāpi likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1048_6: Piyaṅgu asanarukkho vaḍḍhanattaco khajjaphalo, “pītasālo”tipi vuccati. Amūlakabhūtagāme
tika-vin06t:1048_7: saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti nāḷikerassevāyaṃ. Ghaṭapiṭṭhijātattā, bījagāmānulomattā ca dukkaṭavatthu.
tika-vin06t:1048_8: Na vāsetabbaṃ “durūpaciṇṇattā”ti likhitaṃ, “yesaṃ rukkhānaṃ sākhā ruhatīti vacanato
tika-vin06t:1048_9: yesaṃ na ruhati, tesaṃ sākhāya kappiyakaraṇakiccaṃ natthīti siddha”nti vuttaṃ. Muddatiṇanti
tika-vin06t:1049_0: Samaṇakappehīti samaṇavohārehi, tasmā vattabbaṃ bhikkhunā “kappiyaṃ karohī”ti. Tassa
tika-vin06t:1049_1: āṇattiyā karontenāpi sāmaṇerādinā “kappiya”nti vatvāva aggiparijitaṃ kātabbanti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1049_3: ettha paviṭṭhāni, yathālābhato vā samaṇakappavacanaṃ gahetabbaṃ. “Kappiya’nti vattukāmo
tika-vin06t:1049_4: ‘kappa’nti ce vadati, ‘vaṭṭatī’ti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. “Kappiya’nti vacanaṃ sakasakabhāsāyapi
tika-vin06t:1049_5: vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. “Kappiyanti vatvā”ti vuttattā bhikkhunā ‘kappiyaṃ’icceva vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1049_6: “itarena pana yāya kāyaci bhāsāyā”ti vadanti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. “Ucchuṃ kappiyaṃ karissāmīti
tika-vin06t:1049_7: dāruṃ vijjhatī”ti vacanato kappiyaṃ kātabbaṃ sandhāya viraddheti vuttaṃ hoti, ācariyā
tika-vin06t:1049_8: pana “kappiyaṃ kāretabbaṃ sandhāya kappiyanti sitthādiṃ kāreti, vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:1049_9: tassa kāraṇaṃ vadantā kātuṃ vaṭṭanabhāveneva virajjhitvā katepi kappiyaṃ jātaṃ. Yadi
tika-vin06t:1049_10: na vaṭṭeyya, sitthādimhi kate na vaṭṭeyyāti, upaparikkhitabbaṃ. Uṭṭhitasevālaghaṭaṃ
tika-vin06t:1049_11: ātape nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati, vikopetukāmatāya sati dukkaṭaṃ yuttaṃ viya. “Puppharajjubhājanagatikā,
tika-vin06t:1049_12: tasmā na vaṭṭati. Nāḷe vā baddhapupphakalāpe nāḷasmiṃ katepi vaṭṭati tasmiṃ pupphassa
tika-vin06t:1049_13: atthitāyā”ti vadanti. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade “bījagāmena bhūtagāmo dassito anavasesapariyādānattha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1052: 98-9. Aññaṃ vadatīti aññavādakaṃ, “vacanaṃ kareyyā”ti likhitaṃ. “Tuṇhībhūtassetaṃ nāma”nti pāṭho. Ugghātetukāmoti samohanitukāmo, antarāyaṃ kattukāmoti porāṇā.
tika-vin06t:1053: 100. “Sudiṭṭho bhante, na paneso kahāpaṇotiādīsu anāropite dukkaṭena musāvādapācittiyaṃ, aropite pācittiyadvayaṃ hotī”ti vadanti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1054_0: 102. Adhammena vā vaggena vā na kammārahassa vāti ettha “mayi vutte maṃ vā aññaṃ
tika-vin06t:1054_1: vā saṅgho adhammena vā kammaṃ, vaggena vā kammaṃ karissati, na kammārahassa vā me,
tika-vin06t:1054_2: aññassa vā kammaṃ karissatī”ti na kathetīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1057: 103. “Chandāyā”ti akkharakkharāyātiādi viya liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, chandatthanti vā attho. Yesaṃ senāsanāni paññapeti, tesaṃ attani chandatthanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1058_0: 106. Anupasampannantiādīsu karaṇattho gahetabbo. Aññaṃ anupasampannanti aññena anupasampannena.
tika-vin06t:1058_1: Tassa vāti anupasampannassa. “Sammutikāle pañcaṅgavirahādayo asammatā nāmā”ti, “upasampannena
tika-vin06t:1058_2: laddhasammuti sikkhāpaccakkhānena vinassatī”ti ca vuttaṃ. Saṅghenāti sabbena saṅghena
tika-vin06t:1058_3: kammavācāya assāvetvā “taveso bhāro”ti kevalaṃ āropitabhāro. Kevala-saddo hettha
tika-vin06t:1058_4: kammavācāya assāvitabhāvamattameva dīpeti. Sayamevāti itaresaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anumatiyā.
tika-vin06t:1058_5: Abhūtena khīyanakassa ādikammikassa kathaṃ anāpattīti ce? Iminā sikkhāpadena. Musāvāde
tika-vin06t:1058_6: āpattiyeva dve pācittiyo vuttā viya dissanti pubbapayoge rukkhādichindanādīsu viya, vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1061_0: 110. “Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hotī”ti vacanato, parivāre
tika-vin06t:1061_1: “ekā paññatti, ekā anupaññattī”ti vacanato ca idha atthi anupaññattīti siddhaṃ. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin06t:1061_2: siddhaṃ, “evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyāthā”tiādinā pana paññattiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1061_3: na paññāyati, kevalaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, aṭṭhamāse…pe… nikkhipitu”nti ettakameva
tika-vin06t:1061_4: vuttaṃ, taṃ kasmāti ce? Paṭhamapaññattiyaṃ vuttanayeneva vattabbato avisesattā na
tika-vin06t:1061_5: vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kā ettha anupaññattīti? Ajjhokāseti. Ayamanupaññatti paññattiyampi
tika-vin06t:1061_6: atthīti ce? Atthi, taṃ pana okāsamattadīpanaṃ, dutiyaṃ cātuvassikamāsasaṅkhātakāladīpanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1061_7: Yasmā ubhayampi ekaṃ kālokāsaṃ ekato katvā “ajjhokāse”ti vuttanti dīpento bhagavā
tika-vin06t:1061_8: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave…pe… nikkhipitu”nti āhāti veditabbaṃ. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1061_9: vuttaṃ “yattha ca yadā ca santharituṃ na vaṭṭati, taṃ sabbamidha ajjhokāsasaṅkhyameva
tika-vin06t:1061_10: gatanti veditabba”nti. Hemantakālassa anāpattisamayattā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ nidānānapekkhanti
tika-vin06t:1061_11: siddhaṃ, tathā hi ajjhokāsapadasāmatthiyena ayaṃ viseso – vassānakāle ovassakaṭṭhāne
tika-vin06t:1061_12: ajjhokāse, maṇḍapādimhi ca na vaṭṭati. Hemantakāle pakatiajjhokāse na vaṭṭati, sabbamidha
tika-vin06t:1061_13: ovassakepi maṇḍapādimhi vaṭṭati, tañca kho yattha himavassena senāsanaṃ na temeti,
tika-vin06t:1061_14: gimhakāle pakatiajjhokāsepi vaṭṭati, tañca kho akālameghādassaneyevāti ayaṃ viseso
tika-vin06t:1061_15: “aṭṭha māse”ti ca “avassikasaṅkete”ti ca etesaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ sāmatthiyatopi siddho.
tika-vin06t:1062_0: Kiñca bhiyyo – aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sandassitavisesova. Cammādinā onaddhako vā navavāyimo
tika-vin06t:1062_1: vā na sīghaṃ vinassati. Kāyānugatikattāti kāye yattha, tattha gatattā. Saṅghikamañcādimhi
tika-vin06t:1062_2: kāyaṃ phusāpetvā viharituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dhammasiritthero. “Saṅghikaṃ pana ‘ajjhokāsaparibhogena
tika-vin06t:1062_3: paribhuñjatha, bhante, yathāsukha’nti dāyakā denti senāsanaṃ, evarūpe anāpattī”ti
tika-vin06t:1062_4: andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanato, idha ca paṭikkhepābhāvato vaṭṭati. “Aññañca evarūpanti
tika-vin06t:1063_0: 111. “Pāduddhārenāti bahiupacāre ṭhitattā”ti likhitaṃ. Gacchanti, dukkaṭaṃ dhammakathikassa
tika-vin06t:1063_1: viya. Kasmā na pācittiyaṃ? Pacchā āgatehi vuḍḍhatarehi uṭṭhāpetvā gahetabbato. Dhammakathikassa
tika-vin06t:1063_2: pana anuṭṭhapetabbattā. “Anāṇattiyā paññattiyampi tassa bhāro”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1064: 112. Pariharaṇeyevāti ettha gahetvā vicāraṇeti dhammasiritthero. Attano santakakaraṇeti upatissatthero. Bījanīpattakaṃ caturassabījanī.
tika-vin06t:1065_0: 113. “Yo bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā…pe… lajjī hotī’ti vuttattā alajjiṃ āpucchitvā gantuṃ
tika-vin06t:1065_1: na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Pāṭhe “kenaci palibuddhaṃ hotī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “palibuddha”nti
tika-vin06t:1065_2: ca senāsanaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ, tasmā tathāpi atthīti gahetabbaṃ. “Anāpucchaṃ vā”ti pāṭho.
tika-vin06t:1068_0: 116-7. Ettakameva vuttamaṭṭhakathāsu, tathāpi padaṭṭhādayopi labbhanti eva. Anugaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:1068_1: “aññaṃ attharaṇādi akappiyattā na vutta”nti vuttaṃ. “Mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā vihāre vā
tika-vin06t:1068_2: vihārūpacāre vā’ti imināpi saṃsandanatthaṃ ‘kiñcāpi vutto, atha kho’tiādi āraddha”nti
tika-vin06t:1068_3: ca vuttaṃ. Upacāramattañcetaṃ “rukkhamūle”ti, tattha vattabbaṃ natthi.
tika-vin06t:1069_0: 118. Anāpucchitvāpi gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti asatiyā gacchatopi anāpatti, āpucchanaṃ pana
tika-vin06t:1069_1: vattaṃ sañcicca anāpucchato vattabhedadukkaṭattā. Puggalikasenāsane saṅghikaseyyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1069_2: saṅghikasenāsane vā puggalikaseyyaṃ attharitvā gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ yuttaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:1069_3: Kasmā? “Seyyāmattameva nasseyyā”ti vuttattā. Idha pana “palibuddhaṃ palibuddho”ti duvidhampi atthi.
tika-vin06t:1072_0: 121. Chabbaggiyesuyeva therā bhikkhūti keci. Pāde dhovitvātiādimhi pavisantassa vā
tika-vin06t:1072_1: pādadhovanapāsāṇato yāva mañcapīṭhaṃ passāvatthāya nikkhamantassa vā yāva passāvaṭṭhānanti
tika-vin06t:1072_2: yojanā kātabbā. Evaṃ sante “passāvatthāya nikkhamantassa vā”ti na vattabbaṃ, “passāvaṭṭhānato
tika-vin06t:1072_3: nikkhamantassa vā”ti vattabbaṃ. Passāvaṭṭhānanti katthaci potthake. Tathā hi mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1072_4: “pavisantassa pādadhovanapāsāṇato yāva mañcapīṭhaṃ nikkhamantassa mañcapīṭhato yāva
tika-vin06t:1072_5: passāvaṭṭhānaṃ, tāva upacāro”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā “pāde dhovitvā pavisantassa, passāvatthāya
tika-vin06t:1072_6: nikkhamantassa ca dvāre nikkhittapādadhovanapāsāṇato, passāvaṭṭhānato ca mañcapīṭha”nti
tika-vin06t:1072_7: katthaci potthake pāṭho, so apāṭho. Kasmā? Mañcapīṭhānaṃ upacārassa vuttattā. Pavisantassa
tika-vin06t:1072_8: yāva mañcapīṭhānaṃ upacāro, nikkhamantassa tato paṭṭhāya yāva passāvaṭṭhānaṃ vaccakuṭicaṅkamaṭṭhānanti
tika-vin06t:1072_9: iminā atthena yathā saṃsandati, tathāvidho pāṭhoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1073: 122. Upacāraṃ ṭhapetvāti idha vuttaupacāraṃ ṭhapetvā. “Dassanasavanūpacārepi santharantassā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1076: 126-7. Chasattakoṭṭhakāni vāti ettha dvārakoṭṭhakaṃ adhippetaṃ. “Nikkhamā”ti vacanaṃ sutvāpi attano ruciyā nikkhamati, anāpatti; idha aggisālādi eva upacāroti.
tika-vin06t:1079: 129. “Pamāṇamajjhimassa galappamāṇe dinnatulāpi vehāsakuṭiyevā”ti likhitaṃ, “na sā idha adhippetā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1082_0: 135. Yāva dvārakosāti dvārasamīpā, yāva bhittīti attho, taṃ suvuttaṃ. Kavāṭavitthārappamāṇoti
tika-vin06t:1082_2: hoti. Ālokaṃ karotīti ālokaṃ sandheti pidhetīti sandhi eva ālokasandhināmakā honti.
tika-vin06t:1083_0: 136. Iṭṭhakāti chadanakapālāsilādiiṭṭhakā. Chadanūparīti ettha paṭhamaṃ tāva ekavāraṃ
tika-vin06t:1083_1: aparisesaṃ chādetvā puna chādanadaṇḍake bandhitvā dutiyavāraṃ tatheva chādetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1083_2: “Tatiyavāracatutthavāre sampatte dve magge adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyamaggaṃ āṇāpetvā pakkamitabba”nti
tika-vin06t:1084_0: Porāṇā pana “paṭhamavāreyeva tayo magge adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭati, catutthato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin06t:1084_1: āpatti pācittiyaṃ, catutthalepato paṭṭhāya āpattī”ti vadanti. Tattha chadane vuttavidhinidānena
tika-vin06t:1084_2: sameti, lepe vuttavidhitikacchedena sameti. Tathāpi so na yuttova. Nidāne, aṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-vin06t:1084_3: siddhalepattā sabbasovāpi acchanne, channevāpi anekaso pariyāyassa tatiyasseva adhiṭṭhānanti
tika-vin06t:1084_4: no sametīti ācariyo. “Dve magge”ti, “dve chadane”ti ca “tatiyavārato paṭṭhāya evaṃ
tika-vin06t:1084_5: chādāpehī’ti āṇāpetvā pakkamitabba”nti ca upatissatthero vadati kira.
tika-vin06t:1091_0: 144. Kathānusārenāti yo bhikkhunovādakatthiko kiṃsīlo kiṃsamācāro katarakulā pabbajitotiādi
tika-vin06t:1092_0: 145-147. Nissīmanti vihāre baddhasīmato aññaṃ abaddhasīmaṃ, gāmasīmādinti attho.
tika-vin06t:1092_1: “Supinantenapī”ti na sabbesanti idha bāhullanayena vuttaṃ. Chabbaggiyā hi keci vīsativassāpi
tika-vin06t:1092_2: atthi atirekavīsativassāpīti iminā imaṃ majjhimabodhikāle paññattanti viññāyati.
tika-vin06t:1092_3: “Sīlavā hotī”ti vatvā tassa catubbidhattā idha adhippetasīlameva dassetuṃ “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”tiādi
tika-vin06t:1092_4: vuttaṃ. Gaṇṭhānugaṇṭhipadesu “satisaṃvarādayo idha nādhippetā, tena vibhaṅgapāṭhaṃ
tika-vin06t:1092_5: dasseti aṭṭhakathācariyo”ti vuttaṃ. Atthatoti pāḷiatthato. Kāraṇatoti kāraṇūpapattito,
tika-vin06t:1092_6: aṭṭhakathātoti adhippāyo. Atha vā kāraṇatoti dhammato, tena atthato dhammatoti vuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:1092_7: hoti. Atha vā atthatoti phalato. “Kāraṇatoti hetuto. Dhammapadampi jātakena sahā”ti
tika-vin06t:1092_8: likhitaṃ. Pañhaṃ kathetunti “pañhaṃ puṭṭho kathetī”ti ettha bhikkhuniyā puṭṭhena
tika-vin06t:1092_9: “na jānāmī”ti na sakkā kathetuṃ. “Na kho pana taṃ bhagavanta”nti pāṭho. “Na kho paneta”nti
tika-vin06t:1092_10: ca likhanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. “Kāsāyavatthavasanāyā”ti vacanato pārājikāyapi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:1092_11: Bhikkhuniyā kāyasaṃsaggameva vuttaṃ. Methunena hi bhikkhunīdūsako hoti.
tika-vin06t:1093_0: 148-9. Bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampannā nāma parivattaliṅgā, pañcasatā sākiyāniyo vā.
tika-vin06t:1093_2: gacchatīti siddhaṃ. Bhikkhuniggahaṇena pana mātugāmo tiriyaṃ taraṇasikkhāpade saṅgahito,
tika-vin06t:1093_3: na aññattha. “Osāretabbā”ti pāḷipāṭho, pāḷi osāretabbāti attho. “Osāretabba”nti aṭṭhakathāpāḷi.
tika-vin06t:1093_4: Ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vandite dosābhāvato bahūsu ekāya vandite vaṭṭatīti ce? Bhikkhūhi kattabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:1093_5: natthi, bhikkhuniyāyeva kattabbaṃ, tasmā na vaṭṭati. “Yattha katthaci nisinnāyāti
tika-vin06t:1093_6: antodvādasahatthe nisinnāyā”ti vadanti. Na nimantitā hutvā gantukāmāti nimantitā
tika-vin06t:1093_7: hutvā gantukāmā bhikkhū idha nādhippetā, vassaṃ upagantukāmāva adhippetāti attho.
tika-vin06t:1093_8: Yato panāti bhikkhunīvihārato. Tatthāti bhikkhunīvihāre. Kiñcāpi “ovādadāyakā bhikkhū”ti
tika-vin06t:1093_9: vacanato ovādadāyakeheva sabhikkhuko āvāso hoti, na sabbehīti āpanno, tathāpi asati
tika-vin06t:1093_10: bhikkhunovādake ovādasaṃvāsānaṃ atthāya yācanatthāya avassaṃ gantabbattā aññehipi
tika-vin06t:1093_11: bhikkhūhi sabhikkhukopi sabhikkhuko evāti veditabbo. Sā rakkhitabbāti vassacchedāpatti
tika-vin06t:1093_12: rakkhitabbā. Kasmā? Āpadāsu hītiādi. “Ayaṃ uposatho cātuddasikoti pucchitabba”nti
tika-vin06t:1093_13: vuttaṃ, tampi terasiyaṃyeva, etarahi pana bhikkhuniyo cātuddasiyaṃyeva gantvā “kadā
tika-vin06t:1093_14: ayya uposatho”ti pucchanti. “Jāyāyo vā jāriyo vā”ti adhippāyena vuttaṃ kira. “Gaccheyya
tika-vin06t:1093_15: ce, āpattī”ti pāṭho. Dve tissoti dvīhi tīhi. Ekato āgatānaṃ vasena “tāhī”ti bahuvacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1093_16: vuttanti adhippāyo. “Ekā bhikkhunī vā bahū bhikkhunī vā bahūhi bhikkhunupassayehi
tika-vin06t:1093_17: ovādatthāya pesitā”ti vacanassa vitthāro “bhikkhunisaṅgho ca ayya bhikkhuniyo cā”tiādinā
tika-vin06t:1093_18: vutto. “Bhikkhunisaṅgho ca ayya bhikkhuniyo cā’tiādi nānāupassayehi pesitāya vacana”nti
tika-vin06t:1093_20: vutta”nti ca likhitaṃ. Yasmiṃ āvāse pātimokkhuddeso na pavattati, tatthāpi yācanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1093_21: sampaṭicchitvā punadivase yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tena “natthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako
tika-vin06t:1093_22: sammato”tiādi vattabbaṃ. Atthi ce sammato, niddisitabbo. “Sayameva ce sammato, aha’nti
tika-vin06t:1093_23: vattabba”nti vuttaṃ. Sace sammato vā ovādapaṭiggāhako vā pātimokkhaṃ uddisati, aññena
tika-vin06t:1093_24: ārocāpetabbanti eke, “attanāpi ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ca vadanti. Kesuci potthakesu
tika-vin06t:1093_25: “ayyānaṃ pavāretī”ti likhitaṃ, evaṃ sati “ayyassa pavāremī”ti vattabbaṃ, potthake natthi.
tika-vin06t:1096_0: 153. Munātīti jānāti. Antaradhāyatipīti ettha taduttamaṃ ce atthi, taṃ passāmi, yaṃ
tika-vin06t:1096_1: vicittaṃ vā, tadatthañca. Taggha kāraṇaṃ. Saha uppādamanantarā kiriyā. Yamā ca te
tika-vin06t:1096_2: manasā katatra netvāti. Yathā pāto siyā pāto bhavaṃ pātova udakato uggantvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1096_3: tathā virocamānaṃ aṅgīrasaṃ buddhaṃ passa, na kevalaṃ padumaṃ viya, virocamānaṃ tapantamādiccamivantalikkheti
tika-vin06t:1096_4: sambandho. Atha vā aṅgīrasaṃ buddhaṃ padumaṃva virocamānaṃ sūriyaṃva tapantaṃ passa
tika-vin06t:1096_5: buddhaṃ. Yathā pāto siyā phullamavītagandhaṃ kokanudasaṅkhātaṃ padumaṃ passasi, tathā
tika-vin06t:1096_6: virocamānaṃ aṅgīrasaṃ buddhaṃ passa. Ubhayeneva hi bhagavato kanti dīpitāti katvā
tika-vin06t:1096_7: dīpitaguṇasubhaṃ buddhaṃ sakkatvā taṃ kantiṃ pūjeyya. Pūjaneyyatopi vītināmeyya iti
tika-vin06t:1097_1: saddhivihārikādiṃ saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhāpentassa anāpatti viya dissati. Abhabbo
tika-vin06t:1097_2: hi thero sañcicca taṃ kātuṃ, gavesitabbāva ettha yuttīti keci. Therena sikkhāpadapaññattito
tika-vin06t:1100_0: 162. “Ekarattampi vasantī”ti vacanato yattha rattiyaṃ na vasanti, tattha gantvā ovadituṃ
tika-vin06t:1100_1: vaṭṭatīti eke. Yadi evaṃ saṅketaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ovadituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. “Tato
tika-vin06t:1100_2: addhayojaneyeva sabhikkhuko āvāso icchitabbo”ti na vattabbaṃ. Bhikkhunovādako ce
tika-vin06t:1100_3: addhayojanaṃ gantvā ovaditukāmo hoti, bhikkhunisaṅgho ca addhayojanaṃ gantvā sotukāmo,
tika-vin06t:1100_4: “vaṭṭatī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, tañca na vuttaṃ, tasmā na vaṭṭati. Heṭṭhimaparicchedena
tika-vin06t:1100_5: pana “ekarattampī”ti vuttaṃ. Tato paṭṭhāya upassayaṃ hoti, na upassayasaṅkhepena
tika-vin06t:1100_6: katamattenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yattha vāsūpagatā bhikkhuniyo, so upassayasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin06t:1100_7: tattha na gantvā ovādo dātabbo. Ekāvāse divā vaṭṭatīti eke, vicāretvā yuttataraṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1103_0: 164. “Upasampannaṃ saṅghena asammata”nti pāḷivacanato, “sammatena vā saṅghena vā
tika-vin06t:1103_1: bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato ca aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato sammatena
tika-vin06t:1103_2: vā vippavasitukāmena “yāvāhaṃ āgamissāmi, tāva te bhāro hotū”ti yācitvā ṭhapito,
tika-vin06t:1103_3: tassābhāvato saṅghena vā tatheva bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito aṭṭhahi garudhammehi ovadituṃ
tika-vin06t:1103_4: labhati, pageva aññena dhammenāti siddhaṃ. “Yo pana bhikkhu asammato bhikkhuniyo
tika-vin06t:1103_5: ovadeyya, pācittiya”nti pageva bhāraṃ katvā aṭṭhapitaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1103_6: Abhayagirivāsīnampi idameva mataṃ, anugaṇṭhipade pana imaṃ nayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “natthi
tika-vin06t:1103_7: kocī”tiādinā “etarahi ovādako asammato bhikkhunovādako nāmā”ti vatvā “yaṃ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1103_8: vuttaṃ ‘upasampannaṃ saṅghena kammavācāya asammataṃ, bhikkhusaṅghena pana bhikkhunisaṅghassa
tika-vin06t:1103_9: anuggahaṃ karotha, bhikkhuniyo ovadatha, bhikkhusaṅghassa ca karotha phāsuvihāranti
tika-vin06t:1103_10: evaṃ yācitvā ṭhapito bhikkhusaṅghaṃ āpucchitvā, tato so thero bhikkhuniyo ovadati,
tika-vin06t:1103_11: evarūpaṃ bhikkhusaṅghena asammatanti, tatra vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1103_12: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade pana “asammato gāmaṃ ovādatthāya āgatānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā
tika-vin06t:1103_13: paṭivacanaṃ dento saṅghānumatiyā, na ñatticatutthenā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ anugaṇṭhipadamatena
tika-vin06t:1103_14: sameti, andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttavacanaṃ tena sameti, tañca pāḷivacanaṃ, na hi ovādapaṭiggāhako,
tika-vin06t:1103_15: pātimokkhuddesako vā “pāsādikena sampādetū”ti vacanamattena bhikkhunovādako nāma
tika-vin06t:1103_16: hoti. Hotīti ce, anupasampannopi tattakena vacanena “bhikkhunovādako hotū”ti vattabbo.
tika-vin06t:1103_17: Hotīti ce, yaṃ vuttaṃ gaṇṭhānugaṇṭhipadesu “asammato nāma asammatabhāvena ‘bahussuto
tika-vin06t:1103_18: tvaṃ ovadāhī’ti saṅghena bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito”ti. Ettha bāhusaccena kiṃ payojanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1103_19: Anugaṇṭhipadeyeva “abhayagirivāsī vadatīti sutvā sammatena vā āṇatto ovadituṃ labhatīti
tika-vin06t:1103_20: dhammasiritthero pacchā anujānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Kiṃ bahukāya. “Pāsādikena sampādetū”ti
tika-vin06t:1103_21: ettakamattena bhikkhunovādako hoti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “bhāraṃ katvā”ti iminā kiṃ payojanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1103_22: tattakampi vattuṃ añño na labhati, tena ca “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ṭhapetvā bālaṃ
tika-vin06t:1103_23: gilānaṃ gamikaṃ avasesehi ovādaṃ gahetu”nti ayaṃ pāḷi virujjheyya. Kathaṃ? Tassa
tika-vin06t:1103_24: hi “na, bhikkhave, ovādo na paccāharitabbo”ti canato sammatāsammatabhāvena natthi
tika-vin06t:1103_25: kocīti “pāsādikena sampādetū”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, vadanto ca idha paṭhamena āpattiyā
tika-vin06t:1103_26: kāretabbo hotīti. Hotu asammatattā, akatabhārattā ca. Imassa ca bhikkhunovādakatte
tika-vin06t:1103_27: imassa khīyanena dukkaṭaṃ siyā, sabbametaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayamettha
tika-vin06t:1103_28: bhikkhunovādako nāmā”ti avuttattā tathā bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito ovadituṃ labhatiyeva, nāññoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1109_0: 176. Vañcetvāti “tava ñātikāyā”ti avatvā “ekissā bhikkhuniyā”ti ettakameva vatvā,
tika-vin06t:1109_1: te hi “ekissā”ti vacanaṃ sutvā aññātikāya santakasaññino sibbesuṃ. Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade
tika-vin06t:1109_2: “cīvaraṃ nāma channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvara”nti ettakameva pāḷi, tena vuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:1109_3: “cīvaranti yaṃ nivāsetuṃ vā pārupituṃ vā”tiādi. “Vikappanupagaṃ pacchima”nti ca likhitaṃ, so pamādalekho.
tika-vin06t:1113_0: 182-4. Sampadantīti padasā gacchanti. Vuttanayenevāti “sampatanti etthāti sampāto”tiādinā.
tika-vin06t:1113_1: Padagate upacāro na labbhati, accāsannattā missaṃ viya hotīti. Kukkuṭavassitaparicchinno
tika-vin06t:1113_2: mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ. “Tampi vohārenā”ti likhitaṃ. “Yebhuyyena tathā sanniveso hotīti
tika-vin06t:1113_3: katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā na pamādalekho”ti ca, “ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena vuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:1113_4: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ, tato uddhaṃ addhayojanalakkhaṇasampattaṃ nāma hotīti gahetabba”nti
tika-vin06t:1113_5: ca vuttaṃ. “Kappiyabhūmi kirāyaṃ…pe… na vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. Duddasañhettha kāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1113_6: Kataraṃ pana tanti? “Gacchāmāti saṃvidahati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin06t:1113_9: Na titthiyaseyyāya vā pabbajitāvāsattā. Dvāreti samīpatthe bhummaṃ, tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin06t:1113_10: puna “rathikāyā”ti āha. Sesaaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “etthantare saṃvidahitepi bhikkhuno dukkaṭa”nti
tika-vin06t:1113_11: āgatattā na sameti. “Gāmantare”ti vacanato aññagāmassa upacārokkamane eva āpatti.
tika-vin06t:1114_1: tattha pacchimeneva āpattī”ti vuttaṃ. “Iminā maggenā”ti vissajjetvā aññena gacchanti
tika-vin06t:1117_0: 189. Nadiyā kuto gāmantaranti ce? “Yassā nadiyā”tiādimāha. Gāmantaragaṇanāyāti yasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:1117_1: gāmatitthe āruḷho, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññagāmagaṇanāya. “Mātugāmopi idha saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”ti
tika-vin06t:1117_2: ācariyassa takko, teneva “ubhayattha ekato upasampannāya dukkaṭaṃ, sikkhamānāya sāmaṇeriyā
tika-vin06t:1117_3: anāpattī”ti ca na vuttaṃ. Eseva nayo aññesupi evarūpesu.
tika-vin06t:1118_1: lokavajjanti vattabbanti? Na vattabbaṃ, “keḷipurekkhārā”ti vacanaṃ yebhuyyatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1118_2: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade ca “tīṇi cittāni tisso vedanā”ti vuttaṃ, saṃvidahanakāle vā keḷipurekkhāro
tika-vin06t:1118_3: bhikkhu saṃvidahati, āpatti bhikkhuno gāmantarokkamane, addhayojanātikkame vā. Kusalacitto
tika-vin06t:1118_4: vā hoti paccavekkhanto, cetiyādīni vā passanto, abyākatacitto vā hoti kilamathavasena
tika-vin06t:1121: 192. Ceṭaketi dārake. Taruṇapotaketi porāṇā. “Pāpabhikkhūnaṃ pakkhupacchedāya idaṃ paññattaṃ, tasmā pañca bhojaneyevāpatti vuttā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1122_0: 194-7. Nipphāditanti viññattiyā na hoti, kintu parikathādīhi, tasmā iminā sikkhāpadena
tika-vin06t:1122_1: anāpatti, taṃ sandhāya “sabbattha anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ. “Kathānusārena tattha pasīditvā
tika-vin06t:1122_2: denti, idaṃ paripācitaṃ na hoti, vaṭṭantī”ti paṭhamasikkhāpade vuttattāti dhammasiritthero,
tika-vin06t:1122_3: upatissatthero pana “itarampi vaṭṭatiyevā”ti āha. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade pana “yasmā devadatto
tika-vin06t:1122_4: pakatiyā tattha bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ bhuñjati, tasmā imaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ nidānaṃ katvā
tika-vin06t:1130_0: 203-4. Pūgassāti pūgena. Kukkuccāyantoti nissaraṇenettha bhavitabbaṃ, taṃ mayaṃ na
tika-vin06t:1130_1: jānāmāti sanniṭṭhānassa karaṇavasena “kukkuccāyanto”ti vuccati. Yathā hi āyasmā upāli
tika-vin06t:1130_2: nayaggāhena “anāpatti āvuso supinantenā”ti āha, tathā theropi “anāpatti gilānassā”ti
tika-vin06t:1130_3: kasmā na paricchindatīti? Anattādhikārattā vinayapaññattiyā, “nāyaṃ attano okāso”ti
tika-vin06t:1130_5: katvā paññatteyeva hi so thero “anāpatti supinantenā”ti āha “aññatra supinantā”ti
tika-vin06t:1130_6: vuttapadānusārenāti. Yasmā odissa ayāvadattheva dāyakānaṃ pīḷā natthi, tasmā “anodissa
tika-vin06t:1131_0: 208. “Antarāmagge ekadivasa’nti ekaṃyeva sandhāya vutta”nti ca “eseva nayoti vuttanayameva
tika-vin06t:1131_1: dassetuṃ gantvā paccāgacchanto hītiādimāhā”ti ca “suddhacitto hutvā pakatigamaneva
tika-vin06t:1131_2: bhuñjituṃ labhatī”ti ca “agilānassa gilānasaññino kāyena samuṭṭhātī”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1134_0: 209-218. Guḷhapaṭicchannoti apākaṭova. Eko puttenāti ekassekaṃ bhattaṃ “ahaṃ aññena
tika-vin06t:1134_1: nimantito”ti na vuccati. “Sace ekato gaṇhanti, gaṇabhojanaṃ hotī”ti vuttattā cattāro
tika-vin06t:1134_2: upāsakā cattāro bhikkhū visuṃ visuṃ nimantetvā hatthapāse ṭhitānaṃ ce denti, gaṇabhojanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1134_3: hoti evāti eke, taṃ na yuttaṃ viya. “Viññattito pasavane gaṇassa ekato gahaṇe iminā
tika-vin06t:1134_4: sikkhāpadena āpatti, visuṃ gahaṇe paṇītabhojanasūpodanaviññattīhī”ti likhitaṃ. “Viññattito
tika-vin06t:1134_5: pasavanaṃ aṭṭhuppattivasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātaṃ. Sūpodanādivasena tattha āpatti
tika-vin06t:1134_6: evā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Kasmā? Parivāre eva dvinnaṃ ākārānaṃ āgatattā, tasmā
tika-vin06t:1134_8: vutta”nti vattabbaṃ. Ekato gaṇhantīti gahitabhattāpi aññe yāva gaṇhanti, tāva ce
tika-vin06t:1134_9: tiṭṭhanti, ekato gaṇhantiyeva nāma. “Gacchati ce, anāpattī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1135_0: Etthāha – “paṭiggahaṇameva hettha pamāṇa”nti vuttaṃ, atha kasmā pāḷiyaṃ “gaṇabhojanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1135_1: nāma yattha cattāro…pe… bhuñjanti, etaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ nāmā”ti vuttanti? Vuccati –
tika-vin06t:1135_2: yatthāti upayogatthe bhummavacanaṃ. Cattāroti gaṇassa heṭṭhimaparicchedanidassanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1135_3: Pañcannaṃ bhojanānanti āpattippahonakabhojananidassanaṃ. Aññatarena bhojanena nimantitāti
tika-vin06t:1135_5: bhuñjantīti vutta”nti vuttaṃ. “Aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī”ti pana na
tika-vin06t:1135_6: vuttaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyaṃyeva pākaṭattā. Yaṃ bhuñjantīti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo. Tattha
tika-vin06t:1135_7: bhuñjantīti paṭiggāhakaniyamavacanaṃ. Na hi appaṭiggahitakaṃ bhikkhū bhuñjanti. Idaṃ
tika-vin06t:1135_8: vuttaṃ hoti “gaṇassa yato paṭiggahitāhārabhojanahetu pācittiya”nti. Āgantukapaṭṭaṃ
tika-vin06t:1135_9: moghasuttena sibbitvā ṭhapenti, tattha anuvāte yathā ekatalaṃ hoti, tathā hatthehi
tika-vin06t:1135_10: ghaṭṭeti. Valetīti āvaṭṭeti. Parivattananti suttaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1135_11: suttaparivattanaṃ karoti, paṭṭaṃ sibbantānaṃ sukhasibbanatthaṃ paṭṭaparivattanañca.
tika-vin06t:1135_12: Navacīvarakārako idhādhippeto, na itaroti. “Bimbisāraṃ āpucchitvā sambhāre kayiramāneyeva
tika-vin06t:1135_13: kālā atikkantā, pacchā gaṇabhojanasikkhāpade paññatte bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchī”ti
tika-vin06t:1136_0: 220. “Dve tayo ekatoti yepi akappiyanimantanaṃ sādiyitvā”tiādivacanena akappiyanimantanapaccayā
tika-vin06t:1136_1: eva anāpatti, viññattito āpattiyevāti dīpeti. Animantito catuttho yassa tadetaṃ animantitacatutthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1136_2: Esa nayo sabbattha. Pavesetvāti nisīdāpetvā. Cīvaradānasamayaladdhakacatukkaṃ cīvarakārasamayaladdhakacatukkanti
tika-vin06t:1136_3: evamādīni. Tāni cāti yehi bhojanehi visaṅketo natthi, tāni. Mahāthereti upasampanne.
tika-vin06t:1136_4: Aṭṭhatvāti ṭhitena nimittaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Tattha tattha gantvāti rathikādīsu bhikkhusamīpe
tika-vin06t:1136_5: gantvā. Imasmiṃ pana sikkhāpade katthaci potthake “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, cīvaradānasamaye
tika-vin06t:1136_6: gaṇabhojanaṃ bhuñjituṃ. Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūna”nti pāṭho dissati. Katthaci
tika-vin06t:1136_7: “bhuñjitu”nti vatvā “evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti pāṭho, ayaṃ sobhano.
tika-vin06t:1139: 221. Adhiṭṭhitāti niccappavattā. Badaracuṇṇasakkarādīhi yojitaṃ badarasāḷavaṃ. Kirakammakārenāti kirassa kammakārena.
tika-vin06t:1140_1: gehato nikkhamitvā rathikāya aññatarassa bhikkhuno santike vikappesi, vikappentena
tika-vin06t:1140_2: pana ‘mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ itthannāmassa dammī’ti vattabbaṃ, itarena vattabbaṃ ‘tassa
tika-vin06t:1140_3: santakaṃ paribhuñja vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”’ti. Pañcasusahadhammikesūti sammukhā
tika-vin06t:1140_4: ṭhitassa sahadhammikassa yassa vikappetukāmo, taṃ sahadhammikaṃ adisvā gahaṭṭhassa
tika-vin06t:1140_5: vā santike, sayameva vā “pañcasu sahadhammikesu itthannāmassa vikappemī”ti vatvā
tika-vin06t:1140_6: bhuñjitabbanti eke, evaṃ sati thero tasmiṃyeva nisinnova tathā vācaṃ nicchāretvā
tika-vin06t:1140_7: paṭiggaṇhātīti takko dissati. Mahāpaccariyādīsu pana parammukhā vikappanāva vuttā,
tika-vin06t:1140_8: sā “tena hānanda, vikappetvā gaṇhāhī”ti iminā sameti, tathāpi mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1140_9: “tasmā yo bhikkhu pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa ‘mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ tuyhaṃ
tika-vin06t:1140_10: dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti vā evaṃ sammukhā vā ‘itthannāmassa dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti
tika-vin06t:1140_11: vā evaṃ parammukhā vā”ti vacanato sahadhammikassa santike eva vattabbaṃ, na sayamevāti
tika-vin06t:1140_12: dissati. Yasmā ayaṃ pacchimanayo porāṇagaṇṭhipadenapi sameti, tasmā idha mātikāṭṭhakathānusārena
tika-vin06t:1140_13: attho veditabbo. Ettha kiñcāpi “te manussā…pe… bhojanamadaṃsū”ti vacanato akappiyanimantanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1140_14: paññāyati, tathāpi therassa kukkuccuppattikāraṇena bhattena so nimantitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:1140_15: Aññathā parato “dve tayo nimantane ekato bhuñjatī”ti vacanena, anāpattivārena ca virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:1141_0: 229. Etthāyaṃ vicāraṇā – “añño manusso pattaṃ gaṇhāti, na dātabba”nti vacanato aparabhāge
tika-vin06t:1141_1: akappiyanimantanena natthi payojanaṃ, pubbabhāgeyeva akappiyanimantanena payojananti
tika-vin06t:1141_2: svepi bhante āgaccheyyāthāti ettha kataraṃ akappiyanimantanaṃ, tasmā adhippāyo cettha
tika-vin06t:1141_3: pamāṇanti. Na, “piṇḍāya caritvā laddhabhattaṃ bhuñjati, āpattī”ti vacanatoti. Tattha
tika-vin06t:1141_4: “svepi bhante”ti ettha yathā vacanamattaṃ aggahetvā akappiyanimantanakkamena attho
tika-vin06t:1141_5: gahito, tathā “piṇḍāya caritvā”ti etthāpi antarā akappiyanimantanena laddhabhattaṃ
tika-vin06t:1141_6: sandhāya vuttanti attho gahetabbo. Piṇḍāya hi carantaṃ disvā “ettha, bhante, bhattaṃ
tika-vin06t:1141_7: gaṇhathā”ti dinnampi akappiyanimantanena laddhaṃ nāma hoti. Vohārena pana “piṇḍāya
tika-vin06t:1141_8: caritvā laddhabhatta”nti vuccati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññathā mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1141_9: “gaṇabhojane vuttanayeneva pañcahi bhojanehi nimantitassa…pe… parassa parassa bhojane”ti
tika-vin06t:1141_10: vuttavacanavirodho. Idañhi vacanaṃ yena paṭhamaṃ nimantito, tato paṭhamanimantitaṃ
tika-vin06t:1141_11: ādāya gato parassa parassa nimantanakadāyakassa bhojaneti atthaparidīpanato nimantanato
tika-vin06t:1141_12: laddhabhattassa bhojaneyeva āpattīti dīpeti. “Dve tayo nimantane ekato”ti vacanenapi
tika-vin06t:1141_13: sameti, aññathā “yena nimantito, tassa bhojanato parassa bhojane”ti ettakaṃ vattabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:1141_14: siyā, pāḷiyaṃ vā “nimantanena ekatobhuñjatī”ti ettakaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā. Dutiyanimantanassa
tika-vin06t:1142_0: Gaṇṭhipade pana “piṇḍāya caritvā laddhabhattaṃ kasmā bhuñjituṃ na labhatīti ce? ‘Paramparabhojanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1142_1: nāma pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantito, taṃ ṭhapetvā pañcannaṃ
tika-vin06t:1142_2: bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati, etaṃ paramparabhojanaṃ nāmā’ti vuttattā”ti
tika-vin06t:1142_3: likhitaṃ. Yadi evaṃ niccabhattādikampi na vaṭṭatīti āpajjatīti niccabhattādi odissakanti
tika-vin06t:1142_4: ce? Taṃ na, tadaññassa attano dhanena nipphannassa, saṅghato laddhassa vā pāto pacanakayāgu
tika-vin06t:1142_5: ce ghanā hoti, tassāpi, ekakuṭikaṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya viharato bhikkhācariyavasena
tika-vin06t:1142_6: labhitabbaniccabhattassa ca akappiyabhāvappasaṅgato. Tattha bhikkhācariyavasena laddhaṃ
tika-vin06t:1142_7: na kappati nimantanakānaṃ appasādāvahanatoti ce? Na, “pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha
tika-vin06t:1142_8: anāpattī”ti vacanavirodhato. Khādanīyampi hi parassa khāditvā bhuttattā nimantanabhojanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1142_9: abhuñjanto appasādaṃ karoti eva, tasmā appasādāvahaṃ appamāṇaṃ, tasmā niccabhattādi
tika-vin06t:1142_10: odissakaṃ na sambhavati. Apica heṭṭhā vuttanayena saddhiṃ idha vuttanayena saṃsanditvā
tika-vin06t:1142_11: yaṃ yaṃ khamati, taṃ taṃ gahetabbanti sabbopi kesañci ācariyānaṃ vinicchayo. Ācariyassa
tika-vin06t:1142_12: pana vinicchayo ante āvi bhavissati. “Khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vā pivato amissampīti adhippāyo”ti
tika-vin06t:1142_13: vuttaṃ. Gaṇṭhipade “heṭṭhā odanenāmissetvā upari tiṭṭhatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1143_1: vacanaṃ viruddhaṃ viya dissati. “Dvinnampi adhippāyo mahāpaccariyaṃ vicārito”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1143_2: “Cārittatoti ‘santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā’ti parato vattabbato”ti vuttaṃ. Vacīkammaṃ
tika-vin06t:1143_3: avikappanaṃ. Ettha “mahāupāsako bhikkhū nimanteti…pe… pacchā laddhaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjantassa
tika-vin06t:1143_4: āpatti. Piṇḍāya caritvā laddhabhattaṃ bhuñjati, āpattī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanato,
tika-vin06t:1143_5: “kālasseva piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjimhā”ti pāḷito, khandhake “na ca, bhikkhave, aññatra
tika-vin06t:1143_6: nimantane aññassa bhojjayāgu paribhuñjitabbā, yo paribhuñjeyya, yathādhammo kāretabbo”ti
tika-vin06t:1143_7: vacanato ca nimantetvā vā pavedetu animantetvā vā, paṭhamagahitanimantanassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin06t:1143_8: paṭhamanimantanabhojanato aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci parasantakaṃ bhojanaṃ paramparabhojanāpattiṃ
tika-vin06t:1143_9: karoti. Attano santakaṃ, saṅghagaṇato laddhaṃ vā agahaṭṭhasantakaṃ vaṭṭati, nimantanato
tika-vin06t:1143_10: paṭhamaṃ nibaddhattā pana niccabhattādi parasantakampi vaṭṭati. Khandhake “na ca,
tika-vin06t:1146_0: 31-3. Paṭiyālokanti pacchimaṃ desaṃ. Pūvagaṇanāyāti atirittapūvagaṇanāyāti attho.
tika-vin06t:1146_1: Sace “apātheyyādiatthāya sajjita”nti saññāya gaṇhāti, acittakattā sikkhāpadassa āpatti
tika-vin06t:1146_2: eva. Atha uggahitaṃ gaṇhāti, na muccatiyeva. Asaṃvibhāge pana anāpatti akappiyattā.
tika-vin06t:1146_3: Acittakatā paññattijānanābhāveneva, na vatthujānanābhāvenāti eke. Na, mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1146_5: vuttaṃ “ekena vā anekehi vā dvattipattapūresu gahitesu tesaṃ anārocanena vā sayaṃ
tika-vin06t:1146_6: vā jānitvā yo aññaṃ gaṇhāti, tassa dukkaṭaṃ. Ekato tīsu, catūsu vā paviṭṭhesu ekena
tika-vin06t:1146_7: ce dvepattapūrā gahitā, dutiye dve gaṇhante paṭhamo ce na nivāreti, paṭhamassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1146_8: Nivāreti ce, anāpatti, dutiyasseva dukkaṭa”nti. Sace sañcicca na vadati, porāṇagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:1146_10: pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā appaṭiggahitattā na pācittiyaṃ, kattabbākaraṇato pana
tika-vin06t:1146_11: dukkaṭaṃ. Aññathā kiriyākiriyaṃ idaṃ āpajjati, anivāraṇaṃ, anārocanaṃ vā chaṭṭhaṅgaṃ
tika-vin06t:1146_12: vattabbaṃ siyā. Ekanikāyikānaṃ vāti ettha “āsannavihārabhikkhū, āsannaāsanasālāgatā
tika-vin06t:1146_13: vā sace visabhāgehi ānītaṃ na paṭiggaṇhanti, ‘ārāmikādīnaṃyeva vā dāpentī’ti jānāti,
tika-vin06t:1146_14: yattha paribhogaṃ gacchati, tattha dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Dvattipattapūrā’ti vacanato
tika-vin06t:1146_15: pacchiādīsu adhikampi gaṇhato anāpattī”ti keci vinayadharamānino vadanti, taṃ tesaṃyeva
tika-vin06t:1146_16: nisīdatu, ācariyā pana “pacchiādīsupi ukkaṭṭhapattassa pamāṇavasena dvattipattapūrā
tika-vin06t:1149: 236. Yāvadatthapavāraṇāya pavāritā kiñcāpi “pavāritā”icceva adhippetā aṭṭhuppattiyāva, atha kho pacchimāva idhādhippetā.
tika-vin06t:1150: 237. “Alametaṃ sabba”nti vuttattā atirittaṃ nāma hoti. Bhikkhussa idampi te adhikaṃ, ito aññaṃ na lacchatīti kira attho.
tika-vin06t:1151_0: 238-9. “Asanaṃ paññāyatī”ti eteneva “bhuttāvī”ti etassa siddhattā visuṃ atthasiddhi
tika-vin06t:1151_1: natthi. Yadi atthi, aṅgānaṃ chakkattadassananti. Vuttampi cetantiādi pavāraṇaṅgānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1151_2: pañcakattadassanaṃ. Varakoti yo koci varako. “Pavāraṇaṃ pana janetiyevāti visuṃ sitthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1151_3: vodakaṃ karonti, pavāraṇaṃ na janeti. Yāguṃ vā pivanto paṭhamaṃ udakaṃ pivati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:1151_4: Avasiṭṭhaṃ heṭṭhāsitthaṃ pavāraṇaṃ na janetī”ti likhitaṃ. Upatissatthero “janetiyevā”ti
tika-vin06t:1151_5: vadati, taṃ na icchanti ācariyā. Bhajjitapiṭṭhanti taṇḍulacuṇṇameva. Bhajjitasattuyo
tika-vin06t:1152_0: “Yāgusitthamattāneva dve…pe… paṭikkhipati, na pavāretī”ti vuttattā paracaṅkamacchādayo
tika-vin06t:1152_1: pakkhipitvā pakkayāguṃ pivanto sace aññaṃ tādisaṃyeva paṭikkhipati, pavāraṇā na hotīti
tika-vin06t:1152_2: kira dhammasiritthero. Sace aññaṃ paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti. Kasmā? Asanasaṅkhātassa
tika-vin06t:1152_3: vippakatabhojanassābhāvato. Bhojanasālāyaṃ bhuñjanto ce, attano apāpuṇanakoṭṭhāsaṃ
tika-vin06t:1152_4: abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti. Kāmaṃ paṭikkhipati, patte pana ārāmiko ākirati,
tika-vin06t:1152_5: tato bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati. Idañhi buddhappaṭikuṭṭhaanesanāya uppanneyeva saṅgahaṃ
tika-vin06t:1152_6: gacchati. Yathā hi saṅghato uddhaṭapiṇḍaṃ dussīlo deti, taṃ paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti,
tika-vin06t:1152_7: evaṃsampadamidaṃ. “Visabhāgo lajjī ce deti, taṃ tena sambhogaṃ akattukāmatāya paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin06t:1152_8: pavāretīti apare”ti vuttaṃ. Parivesanāyāti bhattagge. “Maṃsena rasaṃ, maṃsañca rasañca
tika-vin06t:1152_9: maṃsarasanti āpajjanato ‘maṃsarasa’nti vutte paṭikkhepato hoti, maṃsassa rasaṃ maṃsarasanti
tika-vin06t:1152_10: viggaho nādhippeto”ti vuttaṃ. Maṃsakarambako nāma…pe… vaṭṭatīti suddhayāgu eva hoti.
tika-vin06t:1152_11: Appavāraṇamissakakarambakoyeva hoti, tasmā na pavāreti, tena vuttaṃ parato “idañca
tika-vin06t:1152_12: karambakena na samānetabba”ntiādi, tasmā “taṃ abhiharitvā kañjiyaṃ gaṇhathā’ti vadantaṃ
tika-vin06t:1152_13: paṭikkhipati, pavāraṇā na hotī”ti ca “missakayāguṃ gaṇhathā’ti avuttattā ‘sammissitaṃ
tika-vin06t:1152_14: visuṃ katvā detī’ti vuttattā”ti ca vuttaṃ, yasmā yāgumissakanti ettha padadvaye pavāraṇārahassa
tika-vin06t:1152_15: nāmaggahaṇaṃ natthi, tasmā tatra ce yāgu bahutarā vā hoti samasamā vā, na pavāreti.
tika-vin06t:1152_16: Kasmā? Tattha abhihārakapaṭikkhepakānaṃ yāgusaññattā. Yāgu ce mandā, bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ,
tika-vin06t:1152_17: pavāreti. Kasmā? Tesaṃ ubhinnampi tattha bhinnasaññattāti takko ācariyassa. Bhattamissake
tika-vin06t:1152_18: pavāraṇārahassa nāmassa sabbhāvato sabbadā pavāreti eva. Missake pana vuttanayena
tika-vin06t:1152_19: kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ. Visuṃ katvā detīti yathā bhattasiṭṭhaṃ na patati, tathā gāḷhaṃ
tika-vin06t:1153_0: Akappiyakatanti ettha “kappiyaṃ akārāpitehi kadalipphalādīhi saddhiṃ atirittaṃ kappiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1153_1: kārāpetvāpi taṃ kadalipphalādiṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Amissakarasattā
tika-vin06t:1153_2: puna tāni kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā aññasmiṃ bhājane ṭhapetvā atirittaṃ kāretvā bhuñjituṃ
tika-vin06t:1153_3: vaṭṭati. Kasmā? Pubbe tesu vinayakammassa anāruḷhattā”ti vadanti. “Bhuttāvinā ca
tika-vin06t:1153_4: pavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena kata”nti vacanato bhuttāvinā appavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena
tika-vin06t:1153_5: kattabbanti siddhaṃ, tasmā “pātova addhānaṃ gacchantesu dvīsu eko pavārito avuṭṭhito
tika-vin06t:1153_6: tattha nisīdati, so itarena piṇḍāya caritvā laddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ attanā abhutvāpi ‘alametaṃ
tika-vin06t:1153_7: sabba’nti kātuṃ labhati evā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ sukkapakkhe “bhuttāvinā kataṃ hotī”ti
tika-vin06t:1153_8: imināva siddhaṃ, tasmiṃ pakkhe attano sattaṅgāni na pūrenti, kaṇhapakkhe paṭibhāgena
tika-vin06t:1153_9: satta vuttānīti veditabbaṃ. Bhuttāvinā appavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena, avuṭṭhitena
tika-vin06t:1153_10: vā kataṃ hoti, vaṭṭati. “Pavāritena āsanā avuṭṭhitenevā”ti imaṃ pana atthavikappaṃ
tika-vin06t:1153_11: dīpetuṃ “sattaṅgāni vuttānī”tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. So puna kātuṃ na labhati paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin06t:1153_12: katassa puna teneva kattabbappasaṅgato. Yañca akataṃ, taṃ kattabbanti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1153_13: Atha sova paṭhamo puna kattukāmo hoti, aññasmiṃ bhājane pubbe akataṃ kātuṃ labhati.
tika-vin06t:1153_14: Dutiyo paṭhamabhājanepi kātuṃ labhati. “Yena akataṃ, tena kātabba”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1153_15: Imamevatthaṃ sandhāya “yena yaṃ paṭhamaṃ kappiyaṃ kataṃ, tameva so puna kātuṃ na
tika-vin06t:1153_16: labhati, aññena kātabba”nti likhitaṃ. Tattha tanti taṃ paṭhamaṃ katanti attho. Pesetvā
tika-vin06t:1153_17: kāretabbanti ettha anupasampanno ce gato, tatraṭṭhena ekena bhikkhunā paṭiggāhetvā
tika-vin06t:1153_18: aparena kāretabbanti tattha ekova evameva kātuṃ na labhatīti. “Yaṃ kiñci gilānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1153_19: uddissā’tiādivacanato vihārādīsu gilānassa pāpuṇanakoṭṭhāsampi gilānātirittaṃ nāma,
tika-vin06t:1153_20: tasmā vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Āhāratthāyāti vikāle evāti eke.
tika-vin06t:1154: 241. Kāyakammaṃ ajjhoharaṇato. Vacīkammaṃ vācāya “atirittaṃ karotha bhante”ti akārāpanenāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1160_0: 247-9. Naṭānaṃ nāṭakāni naṭanāṭakāni, sītāharaṇādīni. Mūlañca taṃ khādanīyañcāti
tika-vin06t:1160_1: mūlakhādanīyaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha. Piṭṭhanti cuṇṇaṃ. Khārakamūlanti yūpasamūlaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1160_2: Caccumūlaṃ neḷiyamūlaṃ. Tambakaṃ vacaṃ. Taṇḍuleyyakaṃ cūḷakuhu. Vatthuleyyakaṃ mahākuhu.
tika-vin06t:1161: Koṭṭhaṃ jaraṭṭhaṃ vuccati. Gaṇṭhi muhukulamudu vicayattha vajamuju vaduḷavi.
tika-vin06t:1162_0: Vajjayetime kiṃsukaṃ, haliddi. Kaseruko, kaṭibalavanti tassa nāmaṃ. Ambāṭakaṃ amūlakaṃ
tika-vin06t:1162_1: piḍhala kakkula. Masālu kinaḷa. Āluva kaḷi taḍḍhiaḷi alasa kaṭissala namedati mera.
tika-vin06t:1162_2: Siggu sīri koḷa kālakaṃ nekaḷavi. Khīravallikando tumūroriyo hoti. Saṅkhato dhovanameva.
tika-vin06t:1162_3: Ayaṃ “parisaṅkhāro”ti likhitaṃ. Khīrakākolī kirikaveḷi. Jīvikaṃ jīvihi. Usabhaka ummasuviyi.
tika-vin06t:1163_0: Hintālaṃ kitili. Kuntāla toho tilisatā padikaḷiro paṭasevalakaḷi. Karamandakaṃ karamba
tika-vin06t:1163_1: daṇḍokira udakajoti kaṇḍako. “Siṅghatakotipi vuccatī”ti likhitaṃ. Phaggava hakiḷi.
tika-vin06t:1164_0: Sellu loholiyaṃ. Kāsamaddaka kuduvavali anasikina. Ummādiya melelidiya. Cīnamuggo
tika-vin06t:1164_1: venamutti huramugga. Rājamāso māhaviliti. Aggimanto muñci. Sunipaṇṇako tipilavanināḷikā
tika-vin06t:1164_2: tilaka. Bhūmiyaṃ jātaloṇīti ettha loṇīnāmassa sādhāraṇattā “bhūmiya”nti visesetvā
tika-vin06t:1164_3: vuttaṃ. Brahmīpattaṃ demeteye paṇasā. “Dīpavāsino vadantī”ti sithilaṃ katvā kasmā
tika-vin06t:1164_4: vuttanti ce? “Khādanīyatthaṃ pharatīti lakkhaṇena asamānattā”ti vuttaṃ. Padeliviniteki.
tika-vin06t:1165: Agandhikapupphaṃ karissayeti cekavādidapupphaṃ celepatimalaṃ. Jīvantīpupphaṃ jīvitandigamala. Bakula muthuvala. Kuyyaka punapunnāmapunnarā, jātisumana. Navamālikā cehemala.
tika-vin06t:1166_0: Tintiṇika kacinī vileyi. Mātuluṅga lavano. Pussaphala supuli. Timbarūsaka tigibberehiti
tika-vin06t:1166_1: susatudhuta. Tipusavātiṅgaṇa dhutatikeṇa paṭiyi. Coca variyiyeli. Moca atireli. Goṭṭhaphalaṃ
tika-vin06t:1167: Asamussi bimba iti keci. Kāsmarīti sepaṇṇi. Atitemeti kariyametissa. Jātiphalaṃ kataṃmeti. Kaṭukaphalaṃ tiriraka.
tika-vin06t:1168: Taruṇaphalaṃ kiriupulu. Pokkharaṭṭhi kiñcakkhaṭṭhi. Siddhatthakaṃ sāsapaṃ setavaṇṇaṃ. Rājikaṃ rattaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:1169_0: Hiṅguṃ hiṅgujatunti sabbāpi hiṅguvikatiyo. Ettha hiṅgujatu nāma pattasākhā pacitvā
tika-vin06t:1169_1: kātabbā. Sākhā pacitvā katā sipāṭikā. Aññehi missetvā katāti keci. Takaṃ kaṭṭhajanti
tika-vin06t:1169_2: aggikeḷini. Nikitissākālesayo. Timera, takapatti pasākhāpatte pacitvā kātabbā. “Takapaṇṇi
tika-vin06t:1172_0: 253. Aparajju sannidhi nāma hotīti attho. Ajja paṭiggahitanti na kevalaṃ paṭiggahitameva,
tika-vin06t:1172_1: atha kho uggahitakampi, teneva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassāti evaṃ
tika-vin06t:1172_2: sannidhikataṃ yaṃ kiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vā ajjhoharitukāmatāya gaṇhantassa
tika-vin06t:1172_3: paṭiggahaṇe tāva āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi taṃ paṭhamameva paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1172_4: “paṭiggahaṇe tāvā”ti na vattabbaṃ, tasmā veditabbametaṃ “attano kāle gahitaṃ ajja
tika-vin06t:1173_0: Etthāha – yathā pañca bhesajjāni uggahitakāni anadhippetāni. Sattāhātikkame anāpatti
tika-vin06t:1173_1: anajjhoharaṇīyattā, tathā idhāpi uggahitakaṃ nādhippetanti? Ettha vuccati – bhesajjasikkhāpade
tika-vin06t:1173_2: uggahitakaṃ nādhippetanti yuttaṃ attano kālātikkamanamattena tattha āpattippasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:1173_3: Ettha na yuttaṃ attano kālātikkamanamattena āpattippasaṅgābhāvato. Ajjhoharaṇeneva
tika-vin06t:1173_4: hi ettha āpattīti adhippāyo, tasmā anugaṇṭhipadamatena ajja uggahetvā punadivase
tika-vin06t:1174_0: Tatrāyaṃ vicāraṇā – attanā bhuñjitukāmo ajja uggahetvā punadivase bhuñjati, dve āpattiyo
tika-vin06t:1174_1: āpajjati. Sāmaṇerādīnaṃyeva atthāya uggahetvā gahitaṃ punadivase paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto
tika-vin06t:1174_2: āpattiyā na kāretabboti. Paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassāti etthāyamadhippāyo – sace
tika-vin06t:1174_3: belaṭṭhasīso viya dutiyatatiyādidivasatthāya ajja paṭiggahetvā sāmaṇerādīnaṃ gopanatthāya
tika-vin06t:1174_4: deti, tassa punadivase ajjhoharaṇatthaṃ paṭiggahaṇe āpatti dukkaṭassāti sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:1174_5: Sayameva sace taṃ gopetvā ṭhapeti, punadivase patitaṃ kacavaraṃ disvā vimativasena
tika-vin06t:1174_6: vā paṭiggaṇhato paṭiggahaṇatova āpatti dukkaṭassāti sambhavati. No ce paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:1174_7: taṃ dukkaṭaṃ natthi. “Idañhi ‘ekaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti thullaccayassā’tiādi
tika-vin06t:1174_8: viyā”ti vuttaṃ. Yo pana ekappahāreneva dvepi pāde atikkāmeti, tassa taṃ thullaccayaṃ
tika-vin06t:1174_9: natthi, evaṃsampadamidanti veditabbaṃ. Ettha paṭiggahitabhāvaṃ avijahantameva sannidhiṃ
tika-vin06t:1174_10: janetīti dhammasiritthero, taṃ “paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti pāḷiyā virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:1174_11: Kapālena pīto pana sneho abbohāriko. Kiñcāpi uṇhe otāpentassa paggharati, tathāpi
