tika-vin06t:1174_12: “bhesajjasikkhāpade viyā”ti vuttaṃ. Itarathā kapālena pītā sappiādayopi sattāhātikkame
tika-vin06t:1174_13: āpattiṃ janeyyunti. Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvāti idhāpi pubbe vuttavidhiyeva. Duddhotapattakathāpi
tika-vin06t:1174_14: etena sameti viya. Āhāratthāyāti kālepi labbhati. Pakatiāmiseti kappiyāmise. Sāmisena
tika-vin06t:1174_15: mukhena ajjhoharato dveti “hiyyo paṭiggahitayāmakālikaṃ ajja purebhattaṃ sāmisena
tika-vin06t:1174_16: mukhena ajjhoharato dve pācittiyānī”ti likhitaṃ. Ajja paṭiggahitaṃ yāvakālikampi
tika-vin06t:1174_17: hi yāmātikkantapānakena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sannidhiṃ karoti. Akappiyamaṃsesu manussamaṃse
tika-vin06t:1175_0: 255. Sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāyāti kālepi dukkaṭameva sannidhiṃ anāpajjanatoti
tika-vin06t:1175_1: keci. Tadahu paṭiggahitaṃ tadahu purebhattaṃ vaṭṭatīti ce? Na, pāḷiyampi aṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-vin06t:1175_2: visesassa natthitāya. Bhesajjasikkhāpade purebhattaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjanaṃ vuttanti
tika-vin06t:1175_3: ce? Āhāre sappiādi saṅgahaṃ yāti, tena taggatikavasena vuttaṃ, na bhesajjavasena vuttanti upatisso.
tika-vin06t:1178_0: 259. Akappiyasappināti yesaṃ maṃsaṃ na kappati, tesaṃ sappinā. “Vasātelañhi ṭhapetvā
tika-vin06t:1178_1: akappiyasappi nāma natthī”ti likhitaṃ. Visaṅketanti ettha “sūpodanaviññattipi na
tika-vin06t:1179_0: 261. Mahānāmasikkhāpadena kāretabboti saṅghavasena pavārite bhesajjatthāya sappiādipañcakaṃ
tika-vin06t:1179_1: viññāpeti ce, tattha “na bhesajjena karaṇīyena bhesajja”nti ettha saṅgahaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin06t:1179_2: tasmā “tena pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ. Pāḷimuttakesu “bhikkhunīnampi dukkaṭa”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1182_0: 264-5. Mukhadvāranti kaṇṭhanāḷi. Uccāraṇamattanti ukkhipitabbamattakaṃ. Kasaṭaṃ chaḍḍetvāti
tika-vin06t:1182_2: Bhikkhussa detīti aññassa bhikkhussa. Kañjikanti yaṃ kiñci dravaṃ. Patto paṭiggahetabboti
tika-vin06t:1182_3: bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapite abhihārābhāvato. “Yathā paṭhamataraṃ patitatheve doso natthi, tathā
tika-vin06t:1182_4: ākiritvā apanentānaṃ patitathevepi abhihaṭattā nevatthi doso”ti likhitaṃ. Carukenāti
tika-vin06t:1182_5: khuddakapiṇḍena. Jāgarantassapīti “api-saddena suttassapī”ti likhitaṃ. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino.
tika-vin06t:1182_6: Tehi kāyasaṃsagge kāyapaṭibaddhenāpi tappaṭibaddhenāpi thullaccayāpatti dassitā evāti
tika-vin06t:1182_8: likhitaṃ, taṃ dullikhitaṃ satipi male puna paṭiggahetabbakiccābhāvato. Kesañci atthāyāti
tika-vin06t:1182_9: anupasampannānaṃ atthāya. “Sāmaṇerassa hatthaṃ phuṭṭhamattameva taṃ pariccatta”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1183_2: vaṭṭatī”’ti ye vadanti, te vattabbā “sīsamakkhanatelaṃ paṭiggahetvā ‘idaṃ sīsamakkhana’nti
tika-vin06t:1183_3: anābhogeneva sattāhaṃ atikkāmentassa kiṃ nissaggiyaṃ bhaveyyā”tiādi, suttādhippāyo
tika-vin06t:1183_4: pana evaṃ gahetabbo “macchikavāraṇatthaṃ bījantassa tasmiṃ laggarajādimhi patte patite
tika-vin06t:1183_5: sukhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ sakkā’ti saññāya pubbe paṭiggahitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Parivattanakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1183_6: “amhākaṃ taṇḍulesu khīṇesu etehi amhākaṃ hatthagatehi sāmaṇerasantakehipi sakkā patiṭṭhapetu’nti
tika-vin06t:1183_7: bhikkhūnaṃ cittuppādo ce sambhavati, ‘parivattanaṃ sātthaka’nti upatissatthero”ti
tika-vin06t:1183_8: vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ suddhacittānaṃ niratthakanti āpannameva, tathā “paṇḍito esa sāmaṇero
tika-vin06t:1183_9: pattaparivattanaṃ katvā dassati, mayameva ca imassa vissāsena vā yācitvā vā bhuñjissāmā”ti
tika-vin06t:1183_10: citte sati bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati katepi parivattaneti ca āpannaṃ, kiṃ bahunā. Nirapekkheheva
tika-vin06t:1183_11: gaṇhitabbaṃ, na sāpekkhehīti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti ācariyo. Ayamevattho “sace pana
tika-vin06t:1183_12: sakkoti vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ, tato laddhaṃ khāditumpi vaṭṭatī”ti vacanena siddhova.
tika-vin06t:1183_13: Ādhārake patto ṭhapito hoti yathāpaṭiggahitabhāve nirālayo. Samuddodakena appaṭiggahitakena.
tika-vin06t:1183_14: Meṇḍakassa khīraṃ khīrattāva vaṭṭati. “Attano pana khīraṃ mukheneva pivantassa anāpattīti
tika-vin06t:1183_15: dassetuṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ. “Sarīranissitamahābhūtāni hi idhādhippetānī”ti likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1184_1: thoka’nti vā aññena vā kāraṇena vadati, taṃ sabbesaṃ na kappati. Kasmā? Vinayadukkaṭattā.
tika-vin06t:1184_2: Attanā paṭiggahetvā pakkhipitabbaṃ vinayavidhiṃ akatvā dukkaṭanti adhippāyo. Evaṃ
tika-vin06t:1184_3: tādisaṃ kimatthaṃ na bhuñjatīti? Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘uggahitako hotī’ti vuttattā. Evañhi
tika-vin06t:1184_4: tattha vuttaṃ bhūmiyaṃ vā bhājane vā phalaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ vā yāvajīvikampi
tika-vin06t:1184_5: appaṭiggahitakaṃ ajānanto āmasati, na vaṭṭati, uggahitakaṃ hotī”ti anugaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:1184_6: vuttaṃ, tasmā imassa matena bhikkhu bhikkhussa sace patte appaṭiggahite piṇḍaṃ ṭhapeti,
tika-vin06t:1184_7: taṃ akappiyaṃ uggahitakanti siddhaṃ. Ayamevattho “sace attano vā bhikkhūnaṃ vā yāgupacanakabhājane…pe…
tika-vin06t:1184_8: nirāmisaṃ katvā paribhuñjitabba”nti vacanena saṃsanditvā kathetabbo. “Kappiyamaṃsakhīraṃ
tika-vin06t:1184_9: vā”ti pasaṅgavasena vuttaṃ. Dadhi ce paṭiladdhaṃ, tañca adhippetanti keci.
tika-vin06t:1189: 269. Vighāsādānaṃ antarā pūvalābhena aññatarā paribbājikā pavisitvā ṭhitā. Dāpetīti anupasampannena.
tika-vin06t:1192: 276. Vijahantassāti anādaratthe sāmivacanaṃ. Uyyojakassa vijahantassa sato āpatti dukkaṭassātipi attho. Idha anupasampanno nāma sāmaṇerovādhippeto.
tika-vin06t:1195: 280. Sabhojaneti ettha paṭhamavikappo “itthī ca puriso cā”ti iminā tatiyapadena yujjati, dutiyavikappo paṭhamehi dvīhi. Kuleti ghare. Anupavisitvā nisīdanacittena sacittakaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1198: 284. Idha pañcamaṃ upanandassa catutthaṃ hoti, tasmā bhikkhunivaggassa dasamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ upari upanandassa “tatiyasikkhāpadenā”ti na pāṭho, “catutthenā”ti pāṭhoti veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:1205: Siyā paramparāpatti, pacchābhattaṃ na sā siyā.
tika-vin06t:1216_0: 310. Kālanti so. Yasmā saṅghapavāraṇāyamevāyaṃ vidhi, tasmā “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti
tika-vin06t:1216_1: vuttaṃ. “Iminā hi tayā pavāritamha, amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca attho”ti yathābhūtaṃ
tika-vin06t:1216_2: ācikkhitvā viññāpetuṃ gilānova labhati. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ paṇītabhojanasikkhāpade “mahānāmasikkhāpadena
tika-vin06t:1216_3: kāretabbo”ti, taṃ saṅghavasena pavāritaṃ, bhesajjatthāya sappiādibhesajjapañcakaṃ
tika-vin06t:1216_4: viññāpeti ce, “na bhesajjena karaṇīyena bhesajjaṃ viññāpetī’ti vacanena pācittiyanti attho”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1219: 311-5. Maṃ diṭṭhenāti mayā diṭṭhena, mama dassanena vā. Ekampi sarahatthaṃ purisanti aṅgapariyāpannaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1222: 319. Navame senāparikkhepena vā parikkhepārahaṭṭhānena vā sañcaraṇaṭṭhānapariyantena vā paricchinditabbā.
tika-vin06t:1225_0: 324. Dasame ekamekaṃ dassanāya gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Yattha ṭhito passati,
tika-vin06t:1225_1: āpatti pācittiyassātiādi. Aṭṭhame pana ekamekaṃ dassanāya gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
tika-vin06t:1225_2: Yattha ṭhito passati, āpatti dukkaṭassāti pāḷi. Kasmā? Aṅgappamāṇābhedepi anīkavisesato.
tika-vin06t:1225_3: Dasame pana aṭṭhamaṅgassa dassanena dukkaṭaṃ siyāti.
tika-vin06t:1238_0: 326-8. Pasupālakāti ajapālakā. Yena majjati, tassa bījato paṭṭhāya. Keci “sacittakapakkhe
tika-vin06t:1238_1: cittaṃ akusalamevāti vuttattā vatthuṃ jānitvā pivato akusala”nti vadanti. Evaṃ sati
tika-vin06t:1238_3: vadanti. Evaṃ sati “kusalākusalābyākatacittanti vattabba”nti vutte tampi “tabbahulanayena
tika-vin06t:1238_4: vutta”nti vadanti. Kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyampi avisesetvā “akusalacitta”nti vuttaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin06t:1243: 336. Tatiye kathaṃ tivedanaṃ? Hasādhippāyeneva “parassa dukkhaṃ uppādessāmī”ti udakaṃ khipantassa dukkhavedanaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1246: Ettāvatā kathaṃ kīḷā, iti kīḷāyaṃ evāyaṃ;
tika-vin06t:1252_0: 344. “Lokavajjaṃ atikkamitvā ‘idaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyuggaho’ti vadantassa na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin06t:1252_1: likhitaṃ. Yaṃ saṃkiliṭṭheneva cittena āpajjati, yaṃ vā ariyapuggalo apaññatte sikkhāpade
tika-vin06t:1252_2: ajjhācarati, idaṃ lokavajjanti sabbatthikavādīādīni ācariyakulāni. Tattha dutiyatatiyavikappo
tika-vin06t:1253_0: Gārayho ācariyuggahoti ettha “yasmā ucchuraso sattāhakāliko, tassa kasaṭo yāvajīviko,
tika-vin06t:1253_1: dvinnaṃyeva samavāyo ucchuyaṭṭhi, tasmā vikāle ucchuyaṭṭhiṃ khādituṃ vaṭṭati guḷaharīṭakaṃ
tika-vin06t:1253_2: viyā’ti evamādiko sampati nibbatto gārayhācariyavādo na gahetabbo”ti ca, paṇṇattivajje
tika-vin06t:1253_3: pana vaṭṭatīti “na pattahatthena kavāṭo paṇāmetabbo’ti imassa ‘yena hatthena patto
tika-vin06t:1253_4: gahito, tena hatthena na paṇāmetabbo, itarena paṇāmetabbo’ti atthaṃ gahetvā tathā
tika-vin06t:1253_5: ācaranto na āpattiyā kāretabbo. ‘Tathā buddhabodhicetiyānaṃ pupphaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin06t:1253_6: tathā ācaranto”ti ca. Tathā ācarati abhayagirivāsiko. Mahāvihāravāsino ce evaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin06t:1253_7: “mā evaṃ vadā”ti apasādetabbo. Tena vuttaṃ “suttaṃ suttānulomañca uggahitakānaṃyevā”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:1253_8: “Idaṃ sabbaṃ upatissatthero āhā”ti ca vuttaṃ. “Suttānulomaṃ aṭṭhakathā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1258: 354. “Visibbanāpekkho”ti vacanato yassa apekkhā natthi, tassa anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:1263_0: 368. Alabhīti labho. Yathā “pacatīti paco, pathatīti patho”ti vuccati, evaṃ “labhatīti
tika-vin06t:1263_1: labho”ti kasmā na vuttaṃ? Pariniṭṭhitalābhasseva idhādhippetattā. Maggeti sibbinimagge.
tika-vin06t:1263_2: Kappakatena saddhiṃ akappakataṃ sibbeti. Yāvatā adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati, tāvatā pubbaṃ
tika-vin06t:1263_3: kappameva. Kappaṃ na vijahati ce, puna kappaṃ dātabbanti ācariyassa takko.
tika-vin06t:1269_0: 379. Dasame yasmā nisīdanasanthataṃ cīvaranisīdanampīti ubhayampi sadasameva, tasmā
tika-vin06t:1269_1: taṃ ubhayampi ekato katvā “nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī”ti āha. Tatthāpi cīvaraggahaṇena
tika-vin06t:1269_2: cīvaranisīdanaṃ gahitamevāti atthato santhatanisīdanameva vuttaṃ hoti. Yadi evaṃ
tika-vin06t:1269_3: “nisīdanasanthataṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī”ti vattabbanti? Na, itarassa anisīdanaadasabhāvappasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:1269_4: Ettha nisīdanasanthatassa pācittiyavatthuttā itarampi pācittiyavatthumevāti veditabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:1269_5: tajjātikattā. Sassāmike sūcighare sūcigaṇanāya āpattiyoti porāṇā.
tika-vin06t:1278: Evaṃ ubhinnaṃ nānattaṃ, ñeyyaṃ ñāṇavatā sadāti.
tika-vin06t:1281_0: 392. Tatiye dvādasa ukkoṭā veditabbā. Tattha akataṃ kammaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ, puna
tika-vin06t:1281_1: kātabbaṃ kammanti anuvādādhikaraṇe labbhanti. Anihaṭaṃ, dunnihaṭaṃ, na puna haritabbanti
tika-vin06t:1281_2: vivādādhikaraṇe labbhanti, avinicchitaṃ, duvinicchitaṃ, puna vinicchitabbanti āpattādhikaraṇe
tika-vin06t:1281_3: labbhanti. Avūpasantaṃ, duvūpasantaṃ, puna vūpasametabbanti kiccādhikaraṇe labbhantīti
tika-vin06t:1284_0: 399. “Pārājikānīti atthuddhāravasena dassitānī”ti kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? Parivārapāḷito.
tika-vin06t:1284_1: Vuttañhi tattha “āpattādhikaraṇapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati. Āpattādhikaraṇapaccayā
tika-vin06t:1284_2: catasso āpattiyo āpajjati. Bhikkhunī jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicchādeti, āpatti
tika-vin06t:1284_3: pārājikassa. Vematikā paṭicchādeti, āpatti thullaccayassa. Bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ
tika-vin06t:1284_4: paṭicchādeti, āpatti pācittiyassa. Ācāravipattiṃ paṭicchādeti, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti.
tika-vin06t:1284_5: Pārājikaṃ paṭicchādento bhikkhu anāpatti, no āpattiṃ āpajjati avuttattāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1284_6: saṃkiliṭṭhena cittena paṭicchādane vinā āpattiyā asambhavato. Dukkaṭavāre vattabbāpi
tika-vin06t:1284_7: pārājikāpattiyo paṭhamaṃ atthuddhāravasena saṅghādisesehi saha vuttattā na sakkā
tika-vin06t:1285_0: Yāva koṭi na chijjatīti cettha yo antamaso paṭicchādanatthaṃ aññassa ārocetu vā,
tika-vin06t:1285_1: mā vā, paṭicchādanacitteneva āpattiṃ āpanno. Tassa puna aññassa paṭicchādanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1285_2: anārocaneneva na koṭi chinnā hoti, kiṃ puna paṭinivattitvā vacanena payojananti na
tika-vin06t:1285_3: antimassa anārocanena chinnā hoti, appaṭicchādanena eva chinnā hoti, tato appaṭicchādanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1285_4: apubbassa ārocetabbaṃ, tato paṭṭhāya koṭi chinnā hoti, tadabhāvo paṭinivattitvā appaṭicchādanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1285_5: ārocetabbaṃ, evampi koṭi chinnā hotīti evaṃ no paṭibhātīti ācariyo. Tatiyena dutiyassāti
tika-vin06t:1285_6: ettha “dutiyo nāma paṭhamo”ti vadantānaṃ “vatthu puggalo na vattabbo”ti vāritattā
tika-vin06t:1285_7: na sundaraṃ. Aññassa catutthassa ārocanepi na sundaraṃ. Kasmā? Pubbeva sutvā aññassa
tika-vin06t:1288_0: 404. Punappunaṃ uppajjanato bahudhā. Hāyanavaḍḍhananti mātukucchismiṃ ce dvādasannaṃ
tika-vin06t:1288_1: māsānaṃ ūnatāya hāyanaṃ kataṃ. Pasūtassa vaḍḍhanaṃ kātabbaṃ. Mātukucchismiṃ ce vaḍḍhanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1288_2: kataṃ. Pasūtassa hāyanaṃ kātabbaṃ. Nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsī nāma sāvaṇamāsassa puṇṇamāsī.
tika-vin06t:1288_3: “Pāṭipadadivaseti dutiye upagacchati divase”ti likhitaṃ. So hi pasūtadivasato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin06t:1288_4: paripuṇṇavīsativasso hoti. Avasesānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassānaṃ adhikadivasāni honteva, tasmā
tika-vin06t:1288_5: nikkaṅkhā hutvā upasampādenti. Taṃ sandhāyāti gabbhavassañca pavāretvā laddhavassañca
tika-vin06t:1288_6: agaṇetvā jātadivasato paṭṭhāya gaṇetvā ekūnavīsativassaṃ. Ekūnavīsativassoti “gabbhavassaṃ
tika-vin06t:1289_0: 406. Aññaṃ upasampādetīti upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā hutvā upasampādeti. “Opapātikassa
tika-vin06t:1289_1: soḷasavassuddesikabhāvato puna cattāro vasse atikkamitvā upasampadā kātabbā”ti ācariyā vadantīti keci.
tika-vin06t:1292_0: 409. Theyyasattho ce suddhamātugāmo dve āpattiyo. Atha bhikkhuniyo, samayo rakkhati.
tika-vin06t:1292_1: Theyyasatthabhāvassa ṭhānaṃ katvā rakkhaṇīyattā sahadhammikānaṃ rakkhatiyevāti eke.
tika-vin06t:1292_2: Theyyabhāve na sahadhammikatā, tasmā na rakkhati evāti eke. Apārājikatheyyabhāve
tika-vin06t:1292_3: sati sahadhammikabhāvoti ce? Itarasmiṃ itaranti samayo anissaṭo āpajjati. Bhikkhu
tika-vin06t:1292_4: theyyasattho ce, yathāvatthukameva. Theyyasatthe theyyasatthasaññī saddhiṃ saṃvidhāyāti
tika-vin06t:1292_5: ca. “Saddhi”nti padaṃ kesuci natthi, taṃ ananurūpaṃ. Tathā dutiyepi.
tika-vin06t:1295_0: 412. “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī”ti ca pāṭho atthi, kesuci natthi. Natthibhāvo
tika-vin06t:1295_1: sundaro “tena kho samayenā”ti adhikārattāti keci. Idha ekatoupasampannā, sikkhamānā,
tika-vin06t:1295_2: sāmaṇerīti imāpi tisso saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Imāsaṃ pana samayo rakkhati, ayamimāsaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1296_0: 414. Apicettha “viññū paṭibalā”ti vacanato appaṭibalā anāpattivatthukāti eke, taṃ
tika-vin06t:1296_1: na yuttaṃ dukkaṭavatthukattā. “Bhikkhu saṃvidahati, mātugāmo na saṃvidahati, āpatti
tika-vin06t:1296_2: dukkaṭassā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tathā hi upaparikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1299_0: 417. Gahaṭṭhassāpi bhikkhunīdūsakakammaṃ mokkhantarāyikameva, tasmā tassa pabbajjāpi
tika-vin06t:1299_1: paṭikkhittā. Vipākantarāyikā ahetukattā. Pubbe sañcicca āpannā sammuṭṭhā suddhasaññino
tika-vin06t:1299_2: antarāyikā eva. Sesāti jātikā. Rasenāti bhāvena. Adhikuṭṭanaṭṭhenāti adhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:1299_3: katvā kuṭṭanaṭṭhena chindanaṭṭhena. Asisūnūpamā kusaladhammacchedanaṭṭhena. Sattisūlūpamā
tika-vin06t:1302_0: 425. “Taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhenāti iminā laddhinānāsaṃvāsakataṃ dīpetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1302_1: Ticittanti ettha vipākābyākatacittena sahavāseyyaṃ kappeyyāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin06t:1302_2: Aññathā sacittakattā sikkhāpadassa kiriyābyākataṃ sandhāya na yujjati.
tika-vin06t:1305_0: 428. Yattha te na passāmāti teti taṃ. Atha vā tava rūpādiṃ na passāma. Ayaṃ samaṇuddeso
tika-vin06t:1305_1: pārājiko hoti. “Sace taṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭinissajjati, saṅghassa ārocetvā saṅghānumatiyā
tika-vin06t:1305_2: pabbājetabbo”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ, taṃ na yuttaṃ, daṇḍakammanāsanā hi idhādhippetā.
tika-vin06t:1305_3: Yadi so pārājiko, liṅganāsanā nāma siyā. Te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyāti ca diṭṭhi
tika-vin06t:1305_4: satthari asatthādidiṭṭhi na hoti. Sace sā yassa uppajjati, so pārājiko hoti, tasmimpi
tika-vin06t:1305_5: evameva paṭipajjitabbaṃ saṃvare atiṭṭhanto liṅganāsanāyeva nāsetabboti ācariyassa takko.
tika-vin06t:1312_0: 438. Āpattiñca satisammosāyāti ettha ca-saddo kattabbañca na karotīti dīpeti, na
tika-vin06t:1312_1: cattāri evāti vuttaṃ hoti. Raṭṭhekadeso janapado. Buddhakāle ariṭṭhakaṇṭakā sāsanapaccatthikā.
tika-vin06t:1312_2: “Nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti vacanena hi te bhagavato asabbaññutaṃ dīpenti. Parinibbute bhagavati
tika-vin06t:1312_3: dasavatthudīpakā vajjiputtakā. Te hi vinayasāsanapaccatthikā. Parūpahārādivādā pana
tika-vin06t:1312_4: suttantābhidhammappaccatthikā. Ke pana te? Ekacce mahāsaṅghikādayo, na sabbeti dīpanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1312_5: “parūpahārā…pe… vādā”ti visesanavacanamāha. Tattha ye kuhakā pāpicchakā abhūtaṃ ullapitvā
tika-vin06t:1312_6: paṭiladdhavarabhojanāni bhuñjitvā muṭṭhassatī niddaṃ okkamitvā sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pattā,
tika-vin06t:1312_7: aññehi taṃ disvā “atthi arahato sukkavissaṭṭhī”ti vutte “mārakāyikā upasaṃharantī”ti
tika-vin06t:1312_8: vatvā janaṃ vañcenti. Ye ca sammāpaṭipannā akuhakā, tepi taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā keci taṃdiṭṭhikā
tika-vin06t:1312_9: honti adhimānino ca. Attano sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ passitvāpi nādhimuccanti, anadhigate
tika-vin06t:1312_10: adhikatasaññinova honti. Tathā atthi arahato aññāṇakaṅkhāvitaraṇā nāmagottādīsu viya
tika-vin06t:1312_11: saccesu paravitaraṇā parehi paññattā nāmānīti adhippāyo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo.
tika-vin06t:1312_12: Tattha vinayadharo “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ arahato asuci mucceyya.
tika-vin06t:1312_13: Diṭṭhadhammā…pe… aparappaccayā satthusāsane”tiādīni suttapadāni dassetvā te sāsanapaccatthikesu
tika-vin06t:1312_14: niggahitaṃ niggaṇhātīti adhippāyo. Itare “pariyatti mūla”nti vādino. “Pātimokkhe
tika-vin06t:1312_15: uddissamāne”ti nidānavasena vuttaṃ. Tathāgatassa vibhaṅgapadāni siddhāni. Siddheyeva
tika-vin06t:1312_16: kiṃ imassa aṅgāni? Garahitukāmatā upasampannassa santike sikkhāpadavivaṇṇanañcāti.
tika-vin06t:1317_0: 452. Rattacittoti kāyasaṃsaggarāgena. Viheṭhetukāmaṃ pana disvā “sace ahaṃ imaṃ māremi,
tika-vin06t:1317_1: natthi me mokkho”ti cintetvā kupito sattasaññaṃ purekkhatvā pahāraṃ deti, tassa yathāvatthukameva.
tika-vin06t:1320_0: 456. “Kāyaṃ vā kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ vā”ti vacanato kāyādīsu yaṃ uccāreti, taṃ talaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:1320_1: Talameva talasattikaṃ. Pothanasamatthaṭṭhena sattikanti eke. Taṃ “uppalapattampī”ti
tika-vin06t:1320_2: iminā niyameti. Evaṃ kupitā hi kopavasena pothanāsamatthataṃ avicāretvā yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin06t:1320_3: hatthagataṃ paṭikkhipanti, sukhasamphassampi hotu, pācittiyameva. Yasmā paharitukāmatāya
tika-vin06t:1320_4: pahaṭe purimena pācittiyaṃ. Kevalaṃ uccāretukāmatāya uggiraṇamatte kate iminā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1320_5: Iminā pana virajjhitvā pahāro dinno, tasmā na paharitukāmatāya dinnattā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1320_6: Kimidaṃ dukkaṭaṃ pahārapaccayā, udāhu uggiraṇapaccayāti? Pahārapaccayā eva dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1320_7: Purimaṃ uggiraṇapaccayā pācittiyanti sadukkaṭaṃ pācittiyaṃ yujjati. Purimañhi uggiraṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1320_8: pacchā pahāro. Na ca pacchimapahāraṃ nissāya purimaṃ uggiraṇaṃ anāpattivatthukaṃ
tika-vin06t:1320_9: bhavitumarahatīti no takkoti ācariyo. “Tena pahārena hatthādīsu yaṃ kiñci bhijjati,
tika-vin06t:1320_10: dukkaṭamevā”ti imināpi pahārapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ. Uggiraṇaṃ yathāvatthukamevāti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1320_11: suṭṭhu vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. “Tiracchānādīnaṃ asucikaraṇādīni disvā kujjhitvāpi uggirantassa
tika-vin06t:1323_1: saṅghādisesāpattiyā vatthunāti veditabbaṃ. Na hi anupasampannassa saṅghādisesāpatti nāma atthi.
tika-vin06t:1326_0: 468. Ūnavīsativasso maññeti ettha sayaṃ saññāya tathā amaññanto kukkuccuppādanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1326_1: “maññe”ti vadanto kiṃ musāvādena kāretabboti? Na siyā aṅgasampattiyā, na ca kevalaṃ
tika-vin06t:1326_2: “maññe”ti iminā niyamato aṅgasampatti hoti. Paramatthavihitaṃ katthaci hoti. “Udakaṃ
tika-vin06t:1326_3: maññe āditta”ntiādimhi paro kukkuccaṃ uppādetu vā, mā vā, taṃ appamāṇanti mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1329_0: 473. Imesaṃ sutvāti ettha “vacana”nti pāṭhaseso. Ekaparicchedānīti siyā kiriyā siyā
tika-vin06t:1329_1: akiriyāti iminā nayena ekaparicchedāni. Ettha kiñcāpi aññavādakapaccayāpatti kiriyā
tika-vin06t:1329_2: ca vihesakapaccayāpatti akiriyā ca, tadubhayaṃ pana ekasikkhāpadanti katvā taṃ aññavādakasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin06t:1329_3: sikkhāpadaṃ siyā kiriyā paṭhamassa vasena, siyā akiriyā dutiyassa vasenāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin06t:1332_0: 474. “Dhammikānaṃ kammāna”nti vacanato ekacce bhikkhū dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ “chandaṃ
tika-vin06t:1332_1: dammī”ti chandaṃ denti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattameva, na paṭipatti. Adhammaṃ nissāya khiyyati,
tika-vin06t:1332_2: taṃ vā ukkoṭeti, anāpatti neva hotīti? Na, tathā chandadānakāle akatvā pacchā adhammakammakhiyyanādipaccayā
tika-vin06t:1332_3: anāpattivāre vuttattā. Adhammena vā vaggena vā na kammārahassa vā kammakaraṇapaccayā
tika-vin06t:1332_4: āpattimokkhakaraṇato avisesameva tathāvacananti ce? Na, chandadānakāle adhammakammakaraṇānumatiyā
tika-vin06t:1332_5: abhāvato, kārakasseva vajjappasaṅgato ca. Gaṇassa dukkaṭanti ce? Pārisuddhichandadāyakāva
tika-vin06t:1332_6: te, na gaṇo akammappattattā, parivārepi kammavagge kammappattachandadāyakā visuṃ
tika-vin06t:1332_7: vuttā. Tathāpi adhammakammassa chando na dātabbo dente akappiyānumatidukkaṭato. Tattha
tika-vin06t:1332_8: hi yojanadukkaṭato na muccantīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1335_0: 481. Sannipātaṃ anāgantvā ce chandaṃ na deti, anāpattīti eke. Dukkaṭanti eke dhammakammantarāyakaraṇādhippāyattā.
tika-vin06t:1335_1: Saṅghamajjhe chandaṃ dātuṃ labhatīti keci. Dinnachande saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisitvā puna
tika-vin06t:1335_2: gatepi chando na paṭippassambheyyāti ce? Paṭippassambhati. Kasmā? “Ahatthapāso chandāraho”tiādīhi
tika-vin06t:1335_3: virujjhanato. Pāḷiyaṃ pana dātukāmatāya hatthapāsaṃ atikkamantaṃ sandhāya vuttanti keci.
tika-vin06t:1338_0: 484-5. Adāsīti apaloketvā adāsi. Bhikkhūti ettha te chabbaggiyā attānaṃ parivajjayitvā
tika-vin06t:1338_1: “saṅgho”ti avatvā “bhikkhū”ti āhaṃsu. Pariṇāmentīti nenti. Tattha lābhoti paduddhārakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:1338_2: idha anadhippetassapi yassa kassaci atthuddhāravasena lābhadīpanatthaṃ. Cīvarameva
tika-vin06t:1338_3: hi idhādhippetaṃ, teneva “aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ dinnaṃ khīyati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin06t:1338_4: vuttaṃ. Dinnanti ca parikkhāranti ca bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1341: 491. Ñātakampi parassa dātukāmaṃ aññassa dāpeti, āpatti eva. Sabbattha āpucchitvā dātukāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ vicāretuṃ labhati.
tika-vin06t:1346_0: 494-7. Yathā bhagavantaṃ payirupāsati, evamākārena nārahatāyaṃ puriso pāpo hotuṃ,
tika-vin06t:1346_1: na hoti pāpoti attho, kāraṇatthaṃ vā. Tanti nipātamattaṃ, yatoti vā attho. Hatthisammaddanti
tika-vin06t:1347_0: 498. Ratanaṃ nāma aggamahesī, tathāpi idha aññāpi devigottā na rakkhati, anāpattivāre
tika-vin06t:1347_1: “na mahesī hotī”ti vacanābhāvato. Sace khattiyova hoti, nābhisitto. Abhisittoyeva
tika-vin06t:1347_2: hoti, na khattiyo rakkhatīti ācariyo. Anāpattivāre mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ aṅgabhāvena
tika-vin06t:1347_3: ca vuttattā abhisittabhāvovapamāṇaṃ. Sesaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedoti eke.
tika-vin06t:1348: 500-501. “Na sayanighare sayanigharasaññī”ti tikacchedopi ettha labbhati. Na sayanigharaṃ nāma aparikkhittarukkhamūlādi.
tika-vin06t:1351: 504. “Adhivāsentu gahapatino bhatta”nti ca “me gahapatino”ti ca atthi.
tika-vin06t:1352_0: 506. Kurundivacanena gharepi yadi bhikkhū āsaṅkanti, tattha ṭhatvā ācikkhitabbanti
tika-vin06t:1352_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Patirūpāti “ratanasammate paṃsukūlaggahaṇaṃ vā ratane nirussukkagamanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1352_2: vā”ti likhitaṃ. “Tāvakālikavasenapi anāmāsaṃ paṭiggaṇhituṃ na labhatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1352_3: Samādapetvāti yācitvā “uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyāna yācanā”ti vuttanayena.
tika-vin06t:1355: 511-2. Ahinā ḍaṭṭhavatthumhi so bhikkhu santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā gato, tassa kukkuccaṃ udapādi. Adinnādāne vuttanayenāti gāmo gāmūpacāroti idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1358: 517. Tanti bhedanakaṃ. Assāti pācittiyassa paṭhamaṃ bhedanakaṃ katvā pacchā desetabbattā. Esa nayo itaresupi.
tika-vin06t:1362: 521-2. “Ucce mañce”ti ca “uccā mañce”ti ca katthaci. Āyatoti vitthato. Aṭṭhaṅgulapādakanti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ, aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇaṃ pādakaṃ vā.
tika-vin06t:1365_0: 528. Poṭakitūlanti yaṃ kiñci tiṇatūlaṃ. Paṭilābhena uddāletvā pācittiyaṃ desetabbanti
tika-vin06t:1365_1: ettha kiñcāpi paṭilābhamatteneva pācittiyanti viya dissati, paribhogeyeva pana āpatti
tika-vin06t:1365_2: daṭṭhabbā, “aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanaṃ ettha sādhakaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1368_0: 531. Kiñcāpi nisīdanassa jāti na dissati ettha, tathāpi cīvarakkhandhake anuññātattā,
tika-vin06t:1368_1: “nava cīvarāni adhiṭṭhātabbānī”ti ettha ca pariyāpannattā cīvarajātiyevassa jātīti
tika-vin06t:1368_3: upameti. Lābhe sadasaṃ, alābhe adasampi vaṭṭatīti eke, taṃ na yuttaṃ. “Nisīdanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1371_0: 539. Yadi kaṇḍupaṭicchādi nāma adhonābhi ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalā uppannakaṇḍupīḷakādipaṭicchādikā
tika-vin06t:1371_1: adhippetā, tassa sugatassa sugatavidatthiyā dīghaso catasso vidatthiyo tiriyaṃ dveti
tika-vin06t:1371_2: idampi atimahantaṃ pamāṇaṃ dissati. Sabbo hi puriso attano attano vidatthiyā sattavidatthiko
tika-vin06t:1371_3: hoti, sugatassa ca ekāvidatthi majjhimassa purisassa tisso vidatthiyo honti, tasmā
tika-vin06t:1371_4: kaṇḍupaṭicchādi pakatipurisassa pamāṇaṃ āpajjati tiriyaṃ, dīghaso pana diguṇaṃ āpajjatīti.
tika-vin06t:1371_5: Āpajjatu, ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo tassā, ce icchati, sabbampi sarīraṃ paṭicchādessati,
tika-vin06t:1371_6: sabbasarīragatasaṅghāṭi viya bahuguṇaṃ katvā nivāsetukāmo nivāsessatīti ayaṃ bhagavato adhippāyo siyā.
tika-vin06t:1374_0: 542. Vassikasāṭikāpi ukkaṭṭhapaṭicchedavasena anuññātā. Vassakāle keci saṅghāṭiparibhogeneva
tika-vin06t:1374_1: paribhuñjissantīti ayaṃ bhagavato adhippāyo siyā. Kiñcāpi iminā takkena anuññātā,
tika-vin06t:1374_2: “appamāṇikāyo kaṇḍupaṭicchādiyo dhārenti, vassikasāṭikāyo dhārentī”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ
tika-vin06t:1374_3: paññattattā pana aññathā puṇṇaparicchedato adhikappamāṇāyo te bhikkhū dhāresunti
tika-vin06t:1374_4: katvā etaparamatā tāsaṃ anuññātāti veditabbā. Eseva nayo dasamepi.
tika-vin06t:1377: 551. Tattha bhisiṃ vā bibbohanaṃ vā karotīti dīghaso bahūnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sādhāraṇatthaṃ karotīti yujjati.
tika-vin06t:1383_1: āpatti desetabbā, na aññathā. “Antaraghare antaragharasaññī”tiādinā ca “khādanīyabhojanīye
tika-vin06t:1386_0: 559. “Nimantitā bhuñjantīti pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantitā bhuñjantī”ti
tika-vin06t:1386_1: kiñcāpi vuttaṃ, atha kho akappiyanimantanena nimantitatā ettha na aṅgaṃ, mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1386_2: vā idha vā anāpattivāre lesābhāvato, tasmā “nimantitā”ti padassa attho pubbe āciṇṇavaseneva
tika-vin06t:1386_3: vutto. Aparepi tayo tikacchedā yojetvā dassetabbā padabhājane vuttattāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1386_4: Yathā tathā hi bhuñjantānaṃ tādisaṃ bhikkhuniṃ avārentānaṃ pāṭidesanīyameva. “Esā
tika-vin06t:1386_5: vosāsati nāma, vosāsantī”ti ca duvidho pāṭho. “Ajjhohāre ajjhohāre”ti vacanena puna
tika-vin06t:1386_6: “gārayhaṃ āvuso dhamma”nti ekavacanaṃ viruddhanti. Paṭhamaṃ ajjhohāreyeva āpannaṃ
tika-vin06t:1386_7: sandhāya vuttaṃ, tathā aññatrāpi āgacchati “āpajjimhā”ti vacanato. Ekena bahūnampi
tika-vin06t:1386_8: vaṭṭatīti keci, taṃ na sundaraṃ. “Tehi bhikkhūhī”tiādinā pāṭhe vuttattāti mama takko.
tika-vin06t:1386_9: Ekena saheva “ahaṃ āpajji”ntipi vattabbanti ekena dvīhi tīhi desetabbato, sabbehi
tika-vin06t:1386_10: evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati. “Āpajjimhāti sahevā”ti vadanti. Ekena ce avārito, “ahaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin06t:1392_0: 576. “Sikkhitasikkhenāti catūhi maggehī”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ otāretvā
tika-vin06t:1392_1: nivatthameva nisinnassa caturaṅgulamattaṃ hoti, tasmā ubhopete aṭṭhakathāvādā ekaparicchedā,
tika-vin06t:1392_2: “aḍḍhateyyahattha”nti sukhumaṃ, ekapattaṃ vā sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tañhi yathāṭhānena
tika-vin06t:1392_3: tiṭṭhati. Dupaṭṭaṃ sandhāya “dvihatthappamāṇampī”ti vuttanti upatissatthero. Ekapaṭṭaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1392_4: dvipaṭṭaṃ vā heṭṭhimaparicchedena “dvihatthappamāṇa”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhi
tika-vin06t:1392_5: nissaggiyaaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tiriyaṃ dvihatthopi vaṭṭatī”ti, tañca kho alābhe eva “alābhe
tika-vin06t:1392_6: tiriyaṃ dvihatthappamāṇampi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā. Idaṃ sabbaṃ adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:1392_7: vuttaṃ. Viruddhaṃ disvā sajjetabbaṃ. No ce sajjeti, dukkaṭaṃ. Sacittakaṃ paṇṇattivijānanacitteneva
tika-vin06t:1392_8: “anādariyaṃ paṭiccā”ti vuttattā, na vatthuvijānanacittena “idamevaṃ kata”nti jānatopi
tika-vin06t:1392_9: āpattiyā abhāvato. Phussadevattheravādopi ekena pariyāyena yujjati. Tathā upatissattheravādopi.
tika-vin06t:1392_10: Paññattepi sikkhāpade apaññattepi yaṃ pakatiyā vajjaṃ, taṃ lokavajjaṃ. Idaṃ pana
tika-vin06t:1392_11: paññatteyeva vajjaṃ, nāpaññatte, tasmā itaralokavajjena asadisattā na lokavajjaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1392_12: Paṇṇattito paṭṭhāya vajjato paṇṇattivajjaṃ. Anādariyacitteneva āpajjitabbattā sacittakaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1392_13: tassa cittassa tivedanattā tivedanaṃ. Yasmā anādariyacittatā nāma kevalaṃ akusalameva,
tika-vin06t:1392_14: tañca pakatiyā vajjaṃ, tasmā idaṃ lokavajjaṃ. Sañcicca vītikkamanaṃ nāma domanassikasseva
tika-vin06t:1392_15: hotīti dukkhavedanaṃ. Gaṇṭhipade pana “pāṇātipātādi viya nivāsanādidoso lokagarahito
tika-vin06t:1393: 577. Vihārepīti buddhupaṭṭhānādikāle, tasmā “pārupitabba”nti uttarāsaṅgakiccavasena vuttaṃ. Paṭhamadutiyasikkhāpadesu pariḷāhādipaccayā kappati, na antaragharapaṭisaṃyuttesu.
tika-vin06t:1394_0: 582. “Ekasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā”ti ettha “gacchantopi parissayābhāvaṃ oloketuṃ labhatiyeva.
tika-vin06t:1394_1: Tathā gāme pūja”nti likhitaṃ, taṃ pana “ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā”ti vuttattā tādisaṃ
tika-vin06t:1397_0: 586. Hasanīyasminti hetvatthe bhummaṃ, hasitabbavatthukāraṇāti attho. Antaraghare
tika-vin06t:1397_1: uccāsaddena anumodanādiṃ karontassa anāpatti kira. Tathā hi mahindattheropi hatthisālādīsu
tika-vin06t:1398_0: 591. Keci bhikkhū “parikkhāraṭṭhapanamattena vāsūpagato hotī”ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ
tika-vin06t:1398_1: matimattameva. Bhikkhuniyo ce vāsūpagā honti, bhikkhunupassayova kappiyabhūmi. “Yattha
tika-vin06t:1398_2: bhikkhuniyo ekarattampi vasanti, ayaṃ bhikkhunupassayo”ti vacanato tāsaṃ samīpaṃ
tika-vin06t:1398_3: vā tāhi gahitavāsāgāraṃ vā “gacchāmī”ti gacchato yathāsukhaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Na hi
tika-vin06t:1398_4: tāvatā taṃ gharaṃ antaragharasaṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1401: 604. Sūpo pattappamāṇavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttākāro. Oloṇī vuccati kudhitaṃ, gorasato pūrā thūpitoti attho.
tika-vin06t:1402_0: 605. Heṭṭhā orohatīti ettha “orohanappamāṇe sati ekadese thūpīkatepi anāpattī”ti
tika-vin06t:1402_1: vadanti. “Pattassa pana heṭṭhā ca upari ca paduminipaṇṇādīhi paṭicchādetvā odahantiyā
tika-vin06t:1402_2: laddhaṃ nāma vaṭṭatī”ti ca vadanti. Ettha “yasmā ‘samatittiko piṇḍapāto paṭiggahetabbo’ti
tika-vin06t:1402_3: vacanaṃ piṇḍapāto samapuṇṇo paṭiggahetabboti dīpeti, tasmā attano hatthagate patte
tika-vin06t:1402_4: piṇḍapāto diyyamāno thūpīkatopi ce hoti, vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. ‘Thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ
tika-vin06t:1402_5: paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassā’ti hi vacanaṃ paṭhamaṃ thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pacchā
tika-vin06t:1402_6: paṭiggaṇhato, āpattīti dīpeti. Pattena paṭiggaṇhato cepi thūpīkataṃ hoti, vaṭṭati
tika-vin06t:1402_7: athūpīkatassa paṭiggahitattā. Payogo pana natthi aññatra pubbadesā”ti ca “samatittikanti
tika-vin06t:1402_8: vā bhāvanapuṃsaka”nti ca vadanti, tasmā vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1405_0: 609. Sūpodanaviññattisikkhāpade “sūpo nāma dve sūpā”ti na vuttaṃ sūpaggahaṇena paṇītabhojanehi
tika-vin06t:1405_1: avasesānaṃ sabbabhojanānaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ. Anāpattivāre cassa “ñātakānaṃ pavāritānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1405_2: aññassatthāya attano dhanenā”ti idaṃ adhikaṃ. Katthaci potthake “anāpatti asañcicca
tika-vin06t:1405_3: asatiyā ajānantassa gilānassa āpadāsū”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ, taṃ na, “samasūpakaṃ
tika-vin06t:1405_4: piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissāmī”ti imassa anāpattivāre “aññassatthāyā”ti katthaci likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1405_5: tañca pamādavasena likhitaṃ. “Mukhe pakkhipitvā puna vippaṭisārī hutvā ogilitukāmassapi
tika-vin06t:1405_6: sahasā ce pavisati, ettha ‘asañciccā’ti vuccati. Viññattampi aviññattampi ekasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:1405_7: ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ sahasā anupadhāretvā gahetvā bhuñjanto ‘asatiyā’ti vuccatī”ti likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1405_8: anāpattivāre ekaccesu potthakesu “rasaraseti likhitaṃ, taṃ gahetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1408: 618. “Sabbaṃ hattha”nti vacanato ekadesaṃ mukhe pakkhipantassa anāpattīti ekacce. “Sabbanti vacanato ekadesampi na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ yuttaṃ anāpattivāre avisesitattā.
tika-vin06t:1409: 624. Sitthāvakārake “kacavaraṃ chaḍḍentaṃ sitthaṃ chaḍḍiyyatī”ti ca “kacavaraṃ chaḍḍento”ti ca pāṭho.
tika-vin06t:1412: 627. “Surusuru”nti ca “surosuro”ti ca pāṭho. Sītīkatoti sītaṅko. “Silakabuddhoti ariyānaṃ parihāsavacanameveta”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1413_0: 631. Paṭikkūlavasenāti ettha yadi paṭikkūlavasena paṭikkhittaṃ, “seyyathāpi kāmabhogino”ti
tika-vin06t:1413_1: na vattabbaṃ. Na hi te paṭikkūlaṃ karontīti ce? Na, issariyaliṅgavasena gahaṇasambhavato.
tika-vin06t:1413_2: Te hi anādarā honti. Pattadhovananti pattadhovanodakaṃ bhojanapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1415: 637. Cāpoti sattakhādanavadho. “Sesā sabbā dhanuvikati kodaṇḍe paviṭṭhā”ti ca likhitaṃ, paṭimukkanti pavesitaṃ, laggitaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin06t:1418: 640. Sayaṃ yānagato hutvā, yathā yānagatassa ve.
tika-vin06t:1419: Alaṃ vattuṃ tathā nālaṃ, sachatto chattapāṇino.
tika-vin06t:1421_0: 647. Chapakavatthusmiṃ “sacāhaṃ na labhissāmī”ti pāṭho, “dasa ce na labhissāmī”ti
tika-vin06t:1421_1: ca atthi, “vatthusmiṃ agilānassā”ti ca āgacchati, taṃ na sundaraṃ, sikkhāpadeyeva
tika-vin06t:1421_2: sundaraṃ. Thomitoti ahampi jānāmīti sambandho. Yā dhanayasalābhasaṅkhātā vutti vinipātena
tika-vin06t:1421_3: hoti samparāye apāyesu vinipātahetu hutvā pavattati. Atha vā vinipātenāti hetvatthe
tika-vin06t:1421_4: karaṇavacanaṃ, vinipātanāya pavattatīti adhippāyo. Adhammacaraṇena adhammacaraṇāya.
tika-vin06t:1424_1: kiriyaṃ. Imāni kiriyāni. Dhammadesanasamuṭṭhānāni vācācittatoti ettha kāyavacīviññattibhāvato
tika-vin06t:1424_2: ujjagghikauccāsaddādīsu viya “kāyavācācittato”ti vattabbānīti ce? Na vattabbāni.
tika-vin06t:1424_3: Nisīdanagamanāhārapakkhipanādikāyaviññattiyā sabbhāvā tattha yuttaṃ, na dhammadesane tādisassābhāvā.
tika-vin06t:1428: “Yebhuyyasikā kātabbā…pe… tiṇavatthārako kātabbo, so puggalo”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1437: Yo bhikkhunīnaṃ vibhaṅgo assa, tassa saṃvaṇṇanākkamo pattoti attho.
tika-vin06t:1440: 656-7. Tattha tattha ṭhānuppattikapaññā vīmaṃsā. Padapaṭipāṭiyā evāti mātikāpadapaṭipāṭiyā eva. “Vuttanti saṅgītikānaṃ upasaṅkappanānaṃ vibhājanaṃ vutta”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1441_0: 658. “Ehibhikkhunīti bhikkhunī, tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampannāti bhikkhunī”ti idaṃ
tika-vin06t:1441_1: pana desanāvilāsavasena vuttanti eke. Aññabuddhakāle atthīti eke, taṃ na yuttaṃ viya
tika-vin06t:1441_2: dissati amhākampi buddhakāle sambhavappasaṅgato, ehibhikkhuniyā paṭisedhachāyādissanato
tika-vin06t:1441_3: ca. Yathāha dhammapade visākhāvatthusmiṃ “tassa cīvaradānassa nissandena imaṃ mahālatāpasādhanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1441_4: labhi. Itthīnañhi cīvaradānaṃ mahālatāpasādhanabhaṇḍena matthakaṃ pappoti, purisānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1441_5: iddhimayapattacīvarenā”ti. Tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampannāya pana bhikkhuniyā sambhavo
tika-vin06t:1441_6: aññabuddhakāle kadāci siyā, nattheva amhākaṃ buddhakāle. Desanāvilāsena pana bhikkhudesanākkameneva
tika-vin06t:1441_7: bhikkhuniniddeso vutto, teneva bhikkhusaṅghavasena ekatoupasampannā bhikkhuniyo vijjamānāpi
tika-vin06t:1441_8: tattha na vuttā. Tāsaṃ atthitā imāya parivārakathāya veditabbā –
tika-vin06t:1446_0: Atha vā puthujjanakāle ehibhikkhusaraṇagamanena upasampannova itthiliṅgapātubhāvena
tika-vin06t:1446_2: upasampannā bhikkhunī”ti ca saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. No ce, taṃ vacanaṃ virujjheyyāti eke,
tika-vin06t:1446_3: vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ. “Viññū paṭibalo”ti dvinnaṃ avassavabhāvassa ijjhanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1446_4: Ettha yasmā yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ paṭiggaṇhantīnaṃ aggahatthā purisānaṃ hatthehi kadāci
tika-vin06t:1446_5: missībhāvaṃ gacchanti, vandantānaṃ vā purisānaṃ sirāni aggapādehi missitāni kadāci
tika-vin06t:1446_6: honti, kesacchedanakāle vā siraṃ purisānaṃ hatthehi missitaṃ hoti, cittaṃ nāmetaṃ
tika-vin06t:1446_7: atiraddhagavesi, durakkhiyaṃ vā, tasmā “mā atilahuṃ pārājikāpatti bhikkhunīnaṃ hotū”ti
tika-vin06t:1447_0: 659. Tabbahulanayena sā vuttāti ettha ayamanugaṇṭhipadakkamo – yebhuyyena kiriyasamuṭṭhānattā
tika-vin06t:1447_2: vuttattā akiriyatopi samuṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ. Yathā cettha, evaṃ heṭṭhā “manussitthiyā
tika-vin06t:1447_3: tayo magge methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpatti pārājikassā”tiādinā nayena kiriyasamuṭṭhānataṃ
tika-vin06t:1447_4: vatvā tadanantaraṃ “bhikkhupaccatthikā…pe… so ce pavesanaṃ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassā”tiādinā
tika-vin06t:1447_5: nayena akiriyasamuṭṭhānatāyapi vuttattā paṭhamapārājikassāpi tabbahulanayeneva kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā
tika-vin06t:1447_6: veditabbā. Na hi pavesanasādiyanādimhi kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā dissati. Aṅgajātacalanañcettha
tika-vin06t:1447_7: na sārato daṭṭhabbaṃ “so ce pavesanaṃ na sādiyati, paviṭṭhaṃ na sādiyati, ṭhitaṃ
tika-vin06t:1447_8: na sādiyati, uddharaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassā”ti ettha ṭhita na sādiyane pakatiyāpi
tika-vin06t:1447_9: paripuṇṇacalanattā. Sādiyanapaccayā hi sevanacalanañcettha na dissatevāti tabbahulanayeneva
tika-vin06t:1447_10: kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā gahetabbā. Tattha tattha aṭṭhakathāsu kasmā tabbahulanayo avuttoti
tika-vin06t:1447_11: ce? “Yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti mātikāyaṃ kiriyasamuṭṭhānassa
tika-vin06t:1447_13: vuttaṃ. Yathā cetesu tabbahulanayena kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā vuttā, tathā surādīnaṃ akusaleneva
tika-vin06t:1447_14: pātabbatā, na itarathā “yaṃ akusaleneva āpajjati, ayaṃ lokavajjā, sesā paṇṇattivajjā”ti
tika-vin06t:1447_15: vutte lokavajjapaṇṇattivajjānaṃ niyamanalakkhaṇasiddhi hoti, tathā taṃ avatvā “yassā
tika-vin06t:1447_16: sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, ayaṃ lokavajjā. Sesā paṇṇattivajjā”ti vutte
tika-vin06t:1447_17: lokavajjavacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā vatthuajānanapakkhepi akusaleneva pātabbattā. Yasmā
tika-vin06t:1447_18: tattha surāpānavītikkamassa akusalacittuppādo natthi, tasmā khandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1447_19: “majjapāne pana bhikkhuno ajānitvāpi bījato paṭṭhāya majjaṃ pivantassa pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1447_20: sāmaṇero jānitvā pivanto sīlabhedaṃ āpajjati, na ajānitvā”ti vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “vatthuajānanapakkhe
tika-vin06t:1447_21: pāṇātipātādīnaṃ siddhikaraakusalacittuppādasadise cittuppāde satipi sāmaṇero sīlabhedaṃ
tika-vin06t:1447_22: nāpajjatī”ti. Abhinivesavacanaṃ pāṇātipātādīhi samānajātikattā sāmaṇerānaṃ surāpānassa.
tika-vin06t:1447_23: “Surādayo panime”ti vatthuṃ jānitvā pātabbatādivasena vītikkamantassa akusalassa
tika-vin06t:1448_0: Kiñcettha yuttivacanena arahantānaṃ appavisanato sacittakācittakapakkhesu akusalaniyamoti
tika-vin06t:1448_1: ce? Na, dhammatāvasena sekkhānampi appavisanato. Acittakapakkhe akusalaniyamābhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1448_2: supantassa mukhe pakkhittajalabindumiva surābinduādayo udāharitabbāti. Tabbahulanayena
tika-vin06t:1448_3: hi atthe gahite pubbenāparaṃ aṭṭhakathāya sameti. “Saddhiṃ pāḷiyā avisesattho parato
tika-vin06t:1448_4: āvi bhavissatīti apare”ti vuttaṃ. Idamettha vicāretabbaṃ. Yadi vatthujānanapakkhe
tika-vin06t:1448_5: vinā akusalena majjapānaṃ siyā, kasmā nāḷimajjhaṃ nātikkamati ariyānaṃ pānakādisaññīnanti?
tika-vin06t:1448_6: Sīlabhedavatthuvītikkamo vināpi cittena ariyānaṃ dhammatāvaseneva na sambhavatīti
tika-vin06t:1448_7: ce, na, cakkhupālattheravatthu ādivirodhatoti. Apica bhikkhunopi sāmaṇerassa viya
tika-vin06t:1448_8: surāpānaṃ sacittakameva kasmā na jātanti? Appatirūpattāti ce, sāmaṇerānampi appatirūpameva.
tika-vin06t:1448_9: Sahadhammikā eva hi te. Mahāsāvajjattāti ce? Sāmaṇerānampi tādisameva. Sāmaṇerānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1448_10: sacittakameva pārājikaṃ, itaraṃ daṇḍakammavatthūti ce? Bhikkhūnampi majjapāne natthi.
tika-vin06t:1448_11: Ettha tikapācittiyena na bhavitabbaṃ. Majje amajjasaññissa dukkaṭāpatti paññāpetabbā
tika-vin06t:1448_12: siyā. Bhikkhussa pācittiyavatthu sāmaṇerānaṃ pārājikaṃ hoti tiracchānagatasāmaṇerānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1448_13: viyāti ce? Acittakampi majjapānādīnaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ pārājikaṃ paññāpetabbaṃ siyā. Nācittakaṃ
tika-vin06t:1448_14: pārājikaṃ sambhavatīti ce? Na, paṇṇattivajjampi pārājikaṃ sambhavatīti. Nikāyantarapakkhe
tika-vin06t:1448_15: ayameva doso. Amhākañhi lokavajjameva majjapānanti. Kasmā panettha surāpānameva dhammatāvasena
tika-vin06t:1448_16: ariyā na karontīti? Na kevalaṃ surāpānameva dhammatāvasena ariyā na karonti, pāṇesupi
tika-vin06t:1448_17: kodhavasena pāṇasaññitāya sīsacchedanādīni na karonti, sadārasaññāya paradāraṃ na
tika-vin06t:1448_18: vītikkamanti, anatthabhañjakasaññāya atthabhañjakamusā na vadanti, sammādiṭṭhisaññāya
tika-vin06t:1448_19: micchādiṭṭhiṃ na paṭipajjantīti veditabbā. Ācariyāpi surāpāne akusalaniyamābhāvameva
tika-vin06t:1448_20: vadanti, tasmā eva mātikāṭṭhakathāya gaṇṭhipade lokavajjapaṇṇattivajjādhikāre “sacittakapakkheakusalanti
tika-vin06t:1448_21: surāpānādisaṅgahatthaṃ, itarathā yassa akusalamevāti vadeyyā”ti likhitaṃ. Kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā
tika-vin06t:1448_22: panassa tabbahulanayameva, na paṭhamapārājike. Kathaṃ? Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpadaṃ paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1448_23: Ettha bhikkhussa ca bhikkhuniyā ca kāyasaṃsaggabhāve sati bhikkhunī kāyaṅgamacopayamānāpi
tika-vin06t:1448_24: citteneva adhivāsentī āpajjati, na evaṃ bhikkhu. Bhikkhu pana copayamānova āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:1448_25: evameva paṭhamapārājikepi copane sati eva āpajjati, nāsati. Pavesanaṃ sādiyatīti
tika-vin06t:1448_26: ettha pavesanasādiyanaṃ nāma sevanacittassuppādananti, evaṃ santepi “vīmaṃsitvā gahetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1451_0: “Kissa pana tvaṃ ayye jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanna”nti vacanato, “aṭṭhannaṃ
tika-vin06t:1451_1: pārājikānaṃ aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ ajjhāpanna”nti vacanato, ante “uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo
tika-vin06t:1451_3: vacanato ca bhikkhunivibhaṅgaṃ patvā bhagavā sādhāraṇāni sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin06t:1451_4: uppannavatthusmiṃyeva “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya antamaso
tika-vin06t:1451_5: tiracchānagatenapi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā”tiādinā nayena savisesampi avisesampi mātikaṃ
tika-vin06t:1451_6: nikkhipitvā anukkamena padabhājanaṃ, āpattibhedaṃ, tikacchedaṃ, anāpattivārañca anavasesaṃ
tika-vin06t:1451_7: vatvā vitthāresi. Saṅgītikārakehi pana asādhāraṇapaññattiyoyeva idha vitthāritāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:1452_0: 666. Tattha “aṭṭhannaṃ pārājikāna”nti idaṃ kevalaṃ saṅgītikārakānaṃyeva nayato nikkhittavacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1452_1: ito pubbe chaṭṭhasattamaṭṭhamānaṃ pārājikānaṃ apaññattattā. Bhagavatā pana idaṃ paññāpitamādisikkhāpadampi
tika-vin06t:1452_2: upādāya “channaṃ pārājikāna”nti vuttaṃ siyā. Ito uddhaṃ paññattānipi upādāya “aṭṭhannaṃ
tika-vin06t:1452_3: pārājikāna”nti vacanaṃ aparabhāge uppannanti ekacce ācariyā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “idañca
tika-vin06t:1452_4: pārājikaṃ pacchā paññattaṃ, tasmā ‘aṭṭhanna’nti vibhaṅge vutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin06t:1452_6: “Aññāsi”nti pāṭho. Aññāsīti na gahetabbo. “Duṭṭhullasikkhāpade vuttanayenevā”ti vacanato
tika-vin06t:1452_7: vajjapaṭicchādikaṃ yā paṭicchādeti, sāpi vajjapaṭicchādikaāyevāti siddhaṃ. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin06t:1452_8: vajjapaṭicchādanaṃ pemavasena hoti, tathāpi sikkhāpadavītikkamacittaṃ domanassikameva
tika-vin06t:1455_0: 669. Imaṃ adhippāyamattanti “codetvā sāretvā”ti etaṃ. Etthāyaṃ vicāraṇā – yo bhikkhu
tika-vin06t:1455_1: ukkhittakabhikkhunā samānadiṭṭhiko laddhinānāsaṃvāsako hoti, so avandanīyo, kammākamme
tika-vin06t:1455_2: ukkhittako viya na gaṇapūraṇo, sahaseyyampi na labhati, na tathā bhikkhunī. Sā hi
tika-vin06t:1455_3: yāva na samanubhaṭṭhā, tāva gaṇapūrakā ca hoti, saṃvāsañca labhati. Laddhinānāsaṃvāsikānuvattikāpi
tika-vin06t:1455_4: ukkhittānuvattikāva hoti. Ukkhitto ce kālaṅkato, tadanuvattako bhikkhu laddhinānāsaṃvāsako
tika-vin06t:1455_5: hotiyeva. Tathā vibbhantepi tasmiṃ titthiyapakkantakepi sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1455_6: ṭhitepīti eke. Tesaṃ matena ukkhittake tathābhūtepi bhikkhunī tadanuvattikā samanubhāsitabbāvāti
tika-vin06t:1455_7: āpajjati. Samanubhāsanakammaṃ saṅghāyattaṃ, saṅghena sañcicca purimakāpattiṃ apanetuṃ
tika-vin06t:1455_8: na yuttaṃ viya khāyati. Ukkhepanīyakammañca āpattiadassanamatte, appaṭikammamatte,
tika-vin06t:1455_9: kudiṭṭhiappaṭinissajjanamatte ca kariyati, tassa anuvattanamattena samanubhāsitvā
tika-vin06t:1455_10: sāsanato cāvetabbānīti na yuttanti ce? Na vattabbameva, idaṃ apārājikavatthūsupi
tika-vin06t:1458_1: vutta”nti likhitaṃ. Tissitthiyoti tīsu itthīsu, tisso vā itthiyo. Taṃ na seveti tāsu
tika-vin06t:1458_2: na sevati. Anariyāti ubhatobyañjanā. Byañjanasminti attano byañjane. Na seveti na
tika-vin06t:1458_3: sevati. Na cācareti nācarati. Vaṇṇāvaṇṇoti dvīhipi sukkavissaṭṭhi. Gamanuppādananti sañcarittaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1459: 676. “Nivatthaṃ vā pārutaṃ vā”ti ettha nivatthassa vā pārutassa vā vatthassa gahaṇaṃ sādiyatīti attho.
tika-vin06t:1464_0: 681. Āhatakoti ānīto, niyatakoti adhippāyo. Akappiyaaḍḍo nāma saṅghassa vā ārāmikapuggalassa
tika-vin06t:1464_1: vā vatthussa kāraṇā saṅghassa vārikabhāvena sayameva vā adhikaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
tika-vin06t:1464_2: “amhākaṃ eso dāso, dāsī, vāpī, khettaṃ, ārāmo, ārāmavatthu, gāvo, gāvī, mahiṃsī,
tika-vin06t:1464_3: ajā, kukkuṭā”tiādinā voharati, akappiyaṃ. “Ayaṃ amhākaṃ ārāmiko ārāmikā, ayaṃ vāpī
tika-vin06t:1464_4: itthannāmena saṅghassa hatthe dohanatthāya dinnā. Ito khettato ārāmato uppajjanakacatupaccayā
tika-vin06t:1464_5: ito gāvito mahiṃsito ajāto uppajjanakagorasā itthannāmena saṅghassa dinnā”ti pucchite
tika-vin06t:1464_6: vā apucchite vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati. “Kata”nti avatvā “karontī”ti vacanena kira anenakataṃ
tika-vin06t:1464_7: ārabbha ācikkhitā nāma hoti. Gīvāti kevalaṃ gīvā eva hoti, na pārājikaṃ. Kārāpetvā
tika-vin06t:1464_8: dātabbāti ettha sace āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ hoti, tassa dhārā na kāretabbā, aññena pana ākārena
tika-vin06t:1467_0: 683. Bhaṭiputtakānaṃ kumārabhaṭikānaṃ gaṇā bhaṭiputtagaṇā. Kappanti kappiyaṃ. Kappagatikanti
tika-vin06t:1467_1: kappiyasabhāvaṃ. Pakkantāsupīti attano parisaṃ ṭhapetvā itarāsu pakkantāsu. Paṇṇattiṃ
tika-vin06t:1467_2: ajānantā ariyāpi vuṭṭhāpentīti katvā vā kammavācāpariyosāne āpattikkhaṇe vipākābyākatasamaṅgitāvasena
tika-vin06t:1467_3: vā “ticitta”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ. “Pabbājane na dukkaṭa”nti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1470_0: 687. Bhaddākāpilānī mahākassapassa purāṇadutiyā kira. Ñātīnaṃ kulaṃ yasmiṃ gāmake,
tika-vin06t:1470_1: tadetaṃ gāmakaṃ ñātikulaṃ, kulasannihitaṃ gāmakaṃ agamāsīti attho. “Ajaṃ gāmaṃ netī”tiādīsu
tika-vin06t:1470_2: viya vā dvikammikaṃ katvā gāmakaṃ agamāsi ñātikulaṃ agamāsītipi yujjati.
tika-vin06t:1471_0: 692. “Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkāmentiyā”ti vacanenapi evaṃ veditabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:1471_1: – vikālagāmappavesane dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃyeva vasena upacāro paricchinditabbo, itarathā
tika-vin06t:1471_2: yathā ettha parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ parikkhepaṃ viya katvā “atikkāmentiyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1471_3: evaṃ tatthāpi “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkamantassā”ti vadeyya. Yasmā
tika-vin06t:1471_4: pana tattha parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato uttari eko leḍḍupāto upacāroti adhippeto, tasmā
tika-vin06t:1471_5: tadatthadīpanatthaṃ “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassā”ti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ
tika-vin06t:1471_8: aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkamantassa idha upacāro parikkhepo yathā bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:1471_9: taṃ upacāraṃ paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkamantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa. Dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkamantassa
tika-vin06t:1471_10: āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na gahetabbameva pāḷiyā visesasabbhāvatoti. “Aparikkhittassa
tika-vin06t:1471_11: gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantiyātipi ekaccesu dissati, taṃ na gahetabbanti apare”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1471_13: katthaci “upacāraṃ atikkamantassā”ti pāṭho dissatīti, so andhakaṭṭhakathāpāṭhato
tika-vin06t:1471_14: gahitoti ācariyo. Aparikkhittassa upacārokkamanameva pāṭho yujjati, na atikkamanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1471_15: Kasmā? Bahūsu ṭhānesu pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāhi virujjhanato, imasmiṃ vāpi sikkhāpade virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:1471_16: Kathaṃ? Gaṇamhā ohīyamānāya araññe āpatti hoti, na gāme. Atha ca pana nidassanampi
tika-vin06t:1471_17: “sikkhāpadā buddhavarenā”ti gāthā dassitā, tasmā upacārokkamanapariyāpannanadiṃ atikkāmentiyā
tika-vin06t:1471_18: hoti. Kiñca bhiyyo “gacchantassa catasso āpattiyo, ṭhitassa cāpi tattakātiādīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:1471_19: parivāragāthānaṃ aṭṭhakathāhi upacārokkamanameva pāṭhoti niṭṭhaṃ gantabba”nti ca
tika-vin06t:1472_0: “Padasā gamanameva hi idhādhippetaṃ, teneva paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentiyātiādimāhā”ti
tika-vin06t:1472_1: ettha vikālagāmappavesanasikkhāpadādīsu tadabhāvā yānena vā iddhiyā vā pavisato,
tika-vin06t:1472_2: addhānaṃ gacchato ca āpattīti dīpeti. Tattha asāruppattā āpattimokkho natthīti eke,
tika-vin06t:1472_3: vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ. Bhikkhunīvihārabhūmi “gāmantara”nti na vuccati gāmantarapariyāpannāyapi
tika-vin06t:1472_4: kappiyabhūmittā. “Parato ‘sace bhikkhunīsu mahābodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ pavisantīsu ekā bahi
tika-vin06t:1472_5: tiṭṭhati, tassā āpattī’tiādivacanato bhikkhuvihāro na kappiyabhūmīti siddhaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin06t:1472_6: kañcinagare khandhadhammavihāro viya, kāvīrapaṭṭane sārīdhammavihāro viya ca aññopi
tika-vin06t:1472_7: so vihāro, tasmā sīmabaddhasukhatthaṃ gāmantarabhāve nirantarā adhiṭṭhānatthaṃ pavisantiyā,
tika-vin06t:1472_8: nikkhamantiyāpi gāmantarāpatti hotīti apare”ti vuttaṃ. Catugāmasādhāraṇattāti ettha
tika-vin06t:1472_9: evaṃvidhe vihāre sīmaṃ bandhantehi cattāropi te gāmā sodhetabbāti veditabbā. Saṃvidahitvā
tika-vin06t:1472_10: bhikkhuniyā vā mātugāmena vā theyyasatthena vā saddhiṃ taṃ vihāraṃ okkamantiyā catasso
tika-vin06t:1472_11: āpattiyo ekatova honti. “Gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttāti eke.
tika-vin06t:1473_0: Dutiyapāduddhāre saṅghādisesoti ettha sace dutiyo pāduddhāro kappiyabhūmiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:1473_1: na saṅghādiseso, akappiyabhūmiyaṃ eva saṅghādiseso. “Ubhayatīresu vicaranti, vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin06t:1473_2: dassanūpacārassettha sambhavā”ti likhitaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ. Savanūpacāro hettha nadīpāre,
tika-vin06t:1473_3: gāmantare vā appamāṇanti. Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “paratīrato nadiṃ otaritvā dassanūpacārato
tika-vin06t:1473_4: dārūni, paṇṇānivā maggitvā āneti, anāpatti. Ticīvarāni paratīre otāpeti, anāpattī”ti
tika-vin06t:1473_5: vuttaṃ. “Orimatīrameva āgacchati, āpattī”ti atikkamitukāmatāya paviṭṭhattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1473_6: “Nhāyanādikiccena paviṭṭhānaṃ katthevālayasambhavā vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Gāmantare pamāṇanti
tika-vin06t:1473_7: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paratīrato nadiṃ otaritvā dassanūpacārato dārūni paṇṇāni sakagāmato
tika-vin06t:1473_8: thokampi taraṇavārena na vaṭṭati kira nikkhamitvā pavisituṃ.
tika-vin06t:1474_0: Agāmake araññeti agāmalakkhaṇe araññeti attho. Iminā āpattikhettaṃ dassitaṃ. Yasmā
tika-vin06t:1474_1: idaṃ āpattikhettaṃ, tasmā yā bhikkhunupassayato gāmassa indakhīlaṃ atikkamati, sā
tika-vin06t:1474_2: asante gāme gaṇamhā ohīyanāpattiṃ āpajjati. Dassanasavanūpacārābhāvepi pageva gāme
tika-vin06t:1474_3: indakhīlātikkamanakkhaṇeyeva āpajjati. Sace tattha ekā bhikkhunī atthi, tassā dassanasavanūpacārātikkamanakkhaṇe
tika-vin06t:1474_4: āpajjati, araññamaggagamanakāle evāyaṃ vidhīti na gahetabbaṃ. Gāmato pana nikkhamantī
tika-vin06t:1474_5: ito paṭṭhāya āpajjatīti dassanatthaṃ “agāmakaṃ arañña”nti vuttaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ “ārādhikā
tika-vin06t:1474_6: ca honti saṅgāhikā lajjiniyo, tā kopetvā aññattha na gantabbaṃ. Gacchati ce, gāmantaranadīpārarattivippavāsagaṇamhā
tika-vin06t:1474_7: ohīyanāpattīhi na muccatī”tiādi. Tattha “gaṇamhā ohīyanāpatti sakiṃyevāpajjati. Itarā
tika-vin06t:1474_8: gāme gāme pāre pāre aruṇe aruṇe cāti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha “vuttañheta”ntiādīni
tika-vin06t:1474_9: asādhakāni yathāsambhavaṃ gahetabbattā. “Mahābodhiyaṅgaṇantiādi evaṃ gāmassa āsannaṭṭhānepi
tika-vin06t:1474_10: imaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjatīti dassanatthaṃ vutta”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1477_0: 694. Paṭivattāti paṭivacanaṃ denti. Kammadosanti “anaññāya gaṇassa chandanti evamādī”ti
tika-vin06t:1477_2: sannipātetvā’ti vuttattā kārakasaṅghopi ayamevāti ce? Paṭhamameva kārakasaṅghaṃ na
tika-vin06t:1477_3: āmantetvā balakkārenāyaṃ thullanandā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ osāresī”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1477_4: tasmā kārakabhikkhūnaṃ sammukhāpi tesaṃ anumatiṃ paṭhamaṃ aggahetvā taṃ kammaṃ na
tika-vin06t:1477_5: paṭippassambhetabbanti siddhaṃ hoti, paṭippassaddhaṃ balakkārena na kātabbamevāti
tika-vin06t:1477_6: adhippāyo. “Bhikkhunīpi diṭṭhāvikammaṃ kātuṃ labhatī”ti ca tattha vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1478_0: 698. Asante kammakārakasaṅghe osāreti, anāpattīti ettha kittāvatā asanto nāma hotīti?
tika-vin06t:1478_1: Idaṃ sabbattha na vicāritaṃ. Kārakānaṃ kālakiriyāyāti eke. Ekassapi abhāvenāti eke.
tika-vin06t:1478_2: Ekasmiṃ rajjeti eke. Ekaraṭṭheti eke. Ekagāmeti eke. Ekasmiṃ āvāseti eke. Yattha
tika-vin06t:1478_3: sakkā apaloketunti eke. Antoaddhayojaneti eke. Tattha tasmiṃ āvāse asante kārakasaṅghe
tika-vin06t:1478_4: osāreti, anāpattīti idaṃ pasaṃsanti ācariyā. Yattha sakkā apaloketunti sāmīci.
tika-vin06t:1481_0: 701. Etaṃ na vuttanti bhikkhuniyā avassutabhāvo daṭṭhabboti etaṃ niyamanaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1481_1: Taṃ avacanaṃ pāḷiyā sameti. Katarapāḷiyāti? “Anavassutoti jānantī paṭiggaṇhātī”ti
tika-vin06t:1481_2: imāya. Yadi hi puggalassa avassutabhāvo na pamāṇaṃ, kiṃ imāya pāḷiyā payojanaṃ, “anāpatti
tika-vin06t:1481_3: ubho anavassutā honti, anavassutā paṭiggaṇhātī”ti ettakameva vattabbaṃ siyā. Attano
tika-vin06t:1481_4: hi anavassutabhāvoyeva pamāṇanti. Imassa pana anāpattivārassa ayamattho – ubho ce
tika-vin06t:1481_5: anavassutā, sabbathāpi anāpatti. Atha bhikkhunī anavassutā samānā avassutampi “anavassuto”ti
tika-vin06t:1481_6: saññāya tassa hatthato paṭiggaṇhāti, evampi anāpattīti. Atha sā anavassutāpi aññaṃ
tika-vin06t:1481_7: anavassutaṃ vā avassutaṃ vā “avassuto”ti jānāti, dukkaṭameva. Vuttañhetaṃ anantarasikkhāpade
tika-vin06t:1481_8: “kissa tvaṃ ayye na paṭiggaṇhāsīti. Avassuto ayyeti…pe… nāhaṃ avassutā”ti.
tika-vin06t:1484_0: 705. Tenāti tasmā. Yasmā uyyojikā na deti na paṭiggaṇhāti, tasmā paṭiggaho na vijjatīti
tika-vin06t:1487_0: 712-4. Kammavācato pubbe āpannāpattiyo na paṭippassambhanti. Ñattiyā dukkaṭathullaccayā
tika-vin06t:1487_1: paṭippassambhanti saṅghādisese patteti porāṇā. Taṃ “ajjhāpajjantiyā”ti pāḷiyā sameti.
tika-vin06t:1487_2: “Sutvā na vadantī”ti ettha sace jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyabhayā na vadanti, anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:1490_0: 715. Paccākatāti parājitā. Kuladūsakasikkhāpadassa, imassa ca nidānamattameva nānākaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1490_1: Vuttañhi tattha “tassa vacanassa paṭinissaggāya eva vacanīyo, na kuladūsananivāraṇatthāyā”ti.
tika-vin06t:1490_2: Evaṃ sante ubhopetā āpattiyo aññamaññaṃ sabhāgatthā, tasmā idaṃ tassa anupaññattisadisaṃ
tika-vin06t:1490_3: āpajjati, tato idaṃ niratthakameva āpajjatīti? Na evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vatthuvisesato,
tika-vin06t:1500_0: 740. Vatthusampattattā vā na tassā anāpannakāmatāya vā anāṇattikatāya vā akālacīvaramadaṃsu.
tika-vin06t:1500_1: Yathādāne eva upanetabbaṃ, na bhājetabbaṃ puggalikattāti adhippāyo. Atthato hi itarampi
tika-vin06t:1500_2: yathādāne eva upanetabbameva. Gaṇṭhipade pana “ayyāya dammīti evaṃ paṭiladdhanti
tika-vin06t:1500_3: nissaṭṭhapaṭiladdhaṃ. Yathādāneti dāyakehi pariccattavidhānena. Upanetabbanti akālacīvarabhāvena
tika-vin06t:1500_4: bhājetabbanti adhippāyo. Idha bhājāpitāya laddhacīvarameva nissaggiyaṃ hoti, taṃ
tika-vin06t:1500_5: vinayakammaṃ katvāpi attanā na labhatī”ti likhitaṃ. Yadi nissaṭṭhapaṭiladdhaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:1500_6: idaṃ vuttaṃ siyā, “nissajjitabbaṃ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā dadeyya,
tika-vin06t:1500_7: dadeyyuṃ, ayyāya dammī”ti vuttattā tīṇipetāni padāni vattabbāni siyuṃ, tasmā na kevalaṃ
tika-vin06t:1500_8: nissaṭṭhapaṭiladdhameva yathādāne upanetabbaṃ, aññāhi bhikkhunīhi laddhakoṭṭhāsampi
tika-vin06t:1501_1: nāpajjatīti ettakameva dīpeti, na paṭiladdhaṃ, na yathādāne dātabbanti imamatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1501_2: dīpeti. Lesena pana gaṇhāti ce, bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbā.
tika-vin06t:1504: 744. Sakasaññāya gahitattā pācittiyaṃ, dukkaṭañca vuttaṃ. Itarathā bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1507_0: 752. Lesena gahetukāmatā, aññassa viññussa viññāpanaṃ, paṭilābhoti tīṇi aṅgāni, tasmā
tika-vin06t:1507_1: paṭhamaṃ viññattaṃ alabhitvā aññaṃ tato ūnatarampi labheyya, nissaggiyameva aṅgasampattito.
tika-vin06t:1510: 753. “Telaṃ gopetvā sappimpi me attano kulagharā”ti kira pāṭho.
tika-vin06t:1513_0: 758-762. Pāvārikassāti dussavāṇijakassa. Yāya cetāpitaṃ, tassā nissaggiyaṃ, nissaṭṭhapaṭilābho
tika-vin06t:1513_1: ca. “Itarāsaṃ pana jānitvā vassaggena pattakoṭṭhāsaṃ sādiyantīnampi na nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1513_2: kevalaṃ yathādāne eva tāhipi upanetabba”nti vadanti. “Nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvāpi yathādāne
tika-vin06t:1513_3: upanetabba’nti vuttattā sesāhi gahitaṃ suggahita”nti vadanti. Ettha gilānāyapi na mokkho.
tika-vin06t:1516_0: 764. Sattame “sayaṃ yācitakenā”ti kiñcāpi avisesena vuttaṃ. Tathāpi aññadatthikena
tika-vin06t:1516_1: attuddesikena saññācikenāti attho veditabbo. Ayamattho “bhikkhuniyo tena ca parikkhārena
tika-vin06t:1516_2: sayampi yācitvā bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā paribhuñjiṃsū”ti imissā pāḷiyā atthena saṃsanditvā
tika-vin06t:1516_3: veditabbo. Tassāyamattho – tena parikkhārena bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā ca-saddena saññācikena
tika-vin06t:1516_4: ca bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvāti imamatthaṃ dīpento “sayampi yācitvā bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā”ti
tika-vin06t:1516_5: āha. Aññathā “tena parikkhārena bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā sayampi yācitvā paribhuñjiṃsū”ti
tika-vin06t:1517_0: Padabhājane pana “saṃyācikenāti sayaṃ yācitvā”ti tasseva padassa adhippāyamattaṃ
tika-vin06t:1517_1: vuttaṃ. Sā hi padabhājanadhammatā. “Saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇata”ntiādipadānaṃ bhājane
tika-vin06t:1517_2: pana sā pākaṭā. Aññathā saṃyācikapadena ko añño atirekattho saṅgahito siyā, so na
tika-vin06t:1517_3: dissatīti tadeva padaṃ nippayojanaṃ, idañca sikkhāpadaṃ purimena ninnānākaraṇaṃ siyā.
tika-vin06t:1517_4: Attano hi santakaṃ yathākāmaṃ karaṇīyanti. Ettha ca saṅghassa yācanāya vasena ekato
tika-vin06t:1517_5: hutvā yācanāya laddhaṃ saṃyācikanti veditabbaṃ. Aññathā ito parena saṃyācika-saddena
tika-vin06t:1517_6: idaṃ nibbisesaṃ āpajjatīti “puggalikena saṃyācikenā”ti idañca sikkhāpadaṃ visuṃ na
tika-vin06t:1517_7: vattabbaṃ siyā idheva tena āpajjitabbāpattiyā saṅgahitattā, na ca saṅgahitā āpattidvayabhāvato.
tika-vin06t:1517_8: Missetvā cetāpitattā hi ekameva āpattīti ce? Na, saṃyācikapadassa nippayojanabhāvappasaṅgato,
tika-vin06t:1517_9: evaṃ saṅghikamahājanikapuggalikāni missitvā cetāpane ekāpattibhāvappasaṅgato ca.
tika-vin06t:1526_0: 779. Dasame pana “yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena
tika-vin06t:1526_1: aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti evaṃvidhena bhavitabbaṃ, “puggalikena
tika-vin06t:1526_2: saṃyācikenā”ti iminā ekādasamena bhavitabbaṃ siyā yathākkamena sambhavato. Kāmameva
tika-vin06t:1526_3: cetaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyā abhāvato na vuttaṃ, atthato pana gahetabbameva. Ettha pana saṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1526_4: pavāritaṭṭhāne, puggalasseva ñātakaṭṭhāne ca anāpattichāyā dissati, idaṃ sabbaṃ amhākaṃ
tika-vin06t:1526_5: takkānusāravaseneva vuttanti katvā na sārato daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vicāretvā yathā niccalakāraṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:1526_6: disvā yaṃ vā vinayakkamakovidā anujānanti, taṃ tadeva gahetabbaṃ. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:1526_7: pana “āpadāsupi aññaṃ garubhaṇḍameva cetāpetabbaṃ, itaraṃ na vaṭṭati, bhikkhussa
tika-vin06t:1529_0: 784. “Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame”ti avatvā “ekādasame”ti idha vuttaṃ. Kasmā? Bhikkhunivibhaṅge
tika-vin06t:1529_1: tiṃsakakaṇḍaṃ patvā vaggakkamassa avuttattā. Yasmā pavāritaṭṭhāne viññatti nāma na
tika-vin06t:1529_2: paṭisedhetabbā, tasmā bhagavā aññātikaappavāritaṭṭhāne dhammanimantanavasena vadeyya
tika-vin06t:1529_4: Aññathā “nidānena sikkhāpadaṃ na sameti, sikkhāpadena ca anāpattivāro”ti ca “akataviññattiyā
tika-vin06t:1529_5: catukkaṃsaparamaṃ viññāpetabba”nti ca aniṭṭhaṃ āpajjati, tasmā mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1529_6: cetāpetabbanti ṭhapetvā sahadhammike ca ñātakapavārite ca aññena kismiñcideva guṇena,
tika-vin06t:1529_7: parituṭṭhena ca vadeyya “yenattho”ti vuttassa “viññāpetabba”nti vuttanayena attho
tika-vin06t:1529_8: daṭṭhabbo. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade pana “idaṃ paricchinnapavāraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Anāpatti
tika-vin06t:1529_9: ñātakānaṃ pavāritānanti pana sabbappakārena pavattaṃ niccapavāraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1529_10: Niccapavāraṇā nāma yadā yenattho, tadā taṃ vadeyyāthāti evaṃ pavattā. ‘Handa sītapāvuraṇa’nti
tika-vin06t:1529_11: dentānaṃ pana atirekacatukkaṃsampi gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Ayameva nayo dasamepīti.
tika-vin06t:1536: 793-7. Ahaṃ lasuṇenāti ettha “pavāremī”ti pāṭhaseso. Badarasāḷavaṃ kira badaraphalāni sukkhāpetvā cuṇṇetvā kattabbā khādanīyavikati.
tika-vin06t:1539_0: 800. Saṃharāpeyyāti “saṃharati vā saṃharāpeti vā”ti padabhājanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin06t:1539_2: pubbapayogesu dukkaṭaṃ yujjati, yathā cettha, evaṃ talaghātakādimhi ca āpattibhedo
tika-vin06t:1539_3: pāḷiyaṃ na vutto. Yathāsambhavaṃ pana pubbapayogesu dukkaṭaṃ sambhavati. Evaṃ bhikkhussa
tika-vin06t:1539_4: ettha ca lasuṇe ca dukkaṭaṃ. Idaṃ kiriyākiriyanti porāṇā. Tattha “kiriyākiriya”nti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1543_0: 812. Pañcame udakasuddhipaccaye satipi phassasādiyane yathāvuttaparicchede anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:1543_1: Tattha dvinnaṃ pabbānanti “dvinnaṃ aṅgulānaṃ sahapavesane ekekaaṅgulassa ekekaṃ pabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:1543_2: katvā dve pabbā, ekaṅgulappavesane dvinnaṃ pabbānaṃ upari na vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1547_1: dvārenāti attho. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Taṃ pubbāparaviruddhanti “punapi vutta”nti vuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:1547_2: vādaṃ sandhāya, na tato pubbe tattha vuttaṃ vādaṃ. Ettha “mātarampi viññāpetvāti
tika-vin06t:1547_3: vacanena virujjhatī”ti likhitaṃ, taṃ dullikhitaṃ, na hi tena virodhaṃ sandhāya idaṃ
tika-vin06t:1547_4: vuttanti. Karaṇe ce pācittiyaṃ, kārāpanepi pācittiyeneva bhavitabbaṃ. Atha kārāpane
tika-vin06t:1547_5: dukkaṭaṃ, karaṇepi dukkaṭeneva bhavitabbaṃ. Na hi karaṇe vā kārāpane vā viseso atthi
tika-vin06t:1548_0: 823. Sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭatīti appaṭikkhipitvā “sādhū”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1548_1: Na hi paṭiggahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Anāmāsattā “āmakadhaññaṃ pana ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānepi
tika-vin06t:1548_2: na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Anugaṇṭhipade pana “kappiyena laddhaṃ dhaññaṃ bhajjitvā bhuñjantiyā
tika-vin06t:1548_3: dukkaṭaṃ. Aparaṇṇepi eseva nayo”ti ca “anāpatti ābādhapaccayāti vacanato satta dhaññānipi
tika-vin06t:1548_4: anāmāsānīti siddhaṃ, teneva heṭṭhā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dukkaṭavatthumhi satta dhaññānipi
tika-vin06t:1548_5: gahitāni anāmāsānī”ti ca vuttāni. Āmāsāni kappiyavatthūni ca yadi bhaveyyuṃ, yathā
tika-vin06t:1548_6: ñātakapavārite sandhāya “aparaṇṇaṃ viññāpetī”ti avisesena vuttaṃ, evaṃ “anāpatti
tika-vin06t:1548_7: ñātakānaṃ pavāritānaṃ aññassa atthāya viññāpeti, ummattikāya ādikammikāyā”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1548_8: Yasmā dukkaṭavatthuttā ca anāmāsattā ca mātarampi sattavidhaṃ dhaññaṃ viññāpetuṃ
tika-vin06t:1548_9: na vaṭṭati, tasmā tadatthadīpanatthaṃ sattavidhaṃ dhaññaṃ sandhāya “anāpatti ābādhapaccayā”ti
tika-vin06t:1548_10: vuttaṃ, yathā bhikkhuniyā ābādhapaccayā vaṭṭati, tathā bhikkhussāpīti ca. Yathā vā
tika-vin06t:1548_11: pana bhikkhuniyā bhajjanādīni kārāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati, evaṃ bhikkhussāpi. Vuttampi cetaṃ
tika-vin06t:1548_13: sampaṭicchituṃ bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati. Etaṃ dhaññaṃ bhajjitvā koṭṭetvā pacitvā yāgukhajjakaṃ
tika-vin06t:1548_14: bhattañca dethā’ti, āṇāpakasseva bhikkhussa āpatti, sabbesaṃ anāpattī”ti. Tasmā “saṅghavārikānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1548_15: dhaññaṃ koṭṭethā”ti ārāmikānaṃ vattuñca na vaṭṭati. “Divasaṃ paribbayaṃ gaṇhatha,
tika-vin06t:1548_16: taṇḍule sampādetha, tvaṃ ettake gaṇha, tvaṃ ettake”ti evamādīni pana vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin06t:1548_17: ca. Yaṃ pana “aviññattiyā labbhamānaṃ pana navakammatthāya sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin06t:1548_18: vuttaṃ, tampi heṭṭhā “imaṃ taḷākaṃ khettaṃ vatthuṃ vihārassa demā’ti vutte ‘sampaṭicchituṃ
tika-vin06t:1548_19: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ nayaṃ sandhāya vuttattā suvuttameva. “Navakammatthāya dhaññaṃ demā”ti
tika-vin06t:1548_20: vutte “sādhū”ti vattabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana heṭṭhā “tattha nissaggiyavatthuṃ attano vā saṅghagaṇapuggalacetiyānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1548_21: vā atthāya sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati…pe… dukkaṭavatthuṃ sabbesampi atthāya sampaṭicchato
tika-vin06t:1548_22: dukkaṭamevā”ti vuttaṃ, tampi suvuttameva. Kasmā? “Cetiyassa atthāya dhaññaṃ dātukāmomhi,
tika-vin06t:1548_23: tumhe bhante tadatthāya sampaṭicchathā”ti vutte paṭiggahetuṃ akappiyattā. “Idaṃ pana
tika-vin06t:1548_24: tādisaṃ na hotī”ti ca vuttaṃ. Sabbopāyaṃ upatissattheravādo kira. Dhammasiritthero
tika-vin06t:1548_25: panevamāha “pubbepi navakammatthāya paṭiggaho na vārito, saṅghassatthāya paṭiggahitampi
tika-vin06t:1551: 824. Porāṇā “nibbiṭṭharājabhaṭo”ti paṭhanti. Tassattho vāritabhattavetano rājabhaṭoti. “Taññeva bhaṭapathanti taṃyeva bhattavetana”nti atthaṃ vadanti. Ummukanti alātaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1555_0: 832. “Sāmike apaloketvā chaḍḍetī”ti katthaci potthake natthi, katthaci atthi, atthibhāvova
tika-vin06t:1555_1: seyyo kiriyākiriyattā sikkhāpadassa. Idha khettapālakā, ārāmādigopakā ca sāmikā eva.
tika-vin06t:1555_2: “Saṅghassa khette, ārāme ca tattha kacavaraṃ na chaḍḍetabbanti katikā ce natthi,
tika-vin06t:1555_3: bhikkhussa chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati saṅghapariyāpannattā, na bhikkhunīnaṃ. Tāsampi bhikkhunisaṅghasantake
tika-vin06t:1555_4: vuttanayena vaṭṭati, na tattha bhikkhussa, evaṃ santepi sāruppavaseneva kātabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1558_0: 833. Sādhukīḷitagītaṃ vāti ettha pāciṇṇagītampi sotuṃ na vaṭṭati. “Gītupasañhitaṃ
tika-vin06t:1558_1: pana dhammaṃ sotuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:1558_2: pana “dhammagītampi na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā “buddhassa gāyāma vādemāti vutte sampaṭicchituṃ
tika-vin06t:1558_3: na vaṭṭati, dukkaṭaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ, “pūjaṃ karoma, jātakaṃ vā vatthuṃ vā desemāti
tika-vin06t:1559_0: 836. Ekapayogo nāma ekadivasāvalokanaṃ. Tesaṃyevāti yesaṃ naccaṃ passati. “Bhikkhunī
tika-vin06t:1559_1: sayampi naccituṃ vā gāyituṃ vā vādituṃ vā na labhatī”tiādi idha sikkhāpade natthi.
tika-vin06t:1559_2: Kasmā? Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānattā. Yadi evaṃ kasmā vuttanti ce? Suttānulomamahāpadesato.
tika-vin06t:1559_3: Yadi naccādīni passituṃ vā sotuṃ vā na labhati, pageva attanā kātunti nayato labbhamānattā
tika-vin06t:1559_4: vuttaṃ. Itarathā mahāpadesā niratthakā siyuṃ. Evamaññatthāpi nayo netabbo. “Samuṭṭhānampi
tika-vin06t:1559_5: idha vuttameva aggahetvā chasamuṭṭhānavasena gahetabba”nti likhitaṃ. Taṃ “aññe nacca,
tika-vin06t:1559_6: gāya, vādehī”ti vattuṃ na labbhatītiādivacīkammaṃ sandhāya likhitañce, taṃ sulikhitaṃ
tika-vin06t:1559_8: likhitaṃ, dullikhitaṃ. Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānañhi ekantato kāyakammaṃ hoti, tasmā uddhaṭaṃ
tika-vin06t:1559_9: aggahetvā ādisaddena saṅgahitameva idha gahetabbanti. Etaṃ eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānattāti
tika-vin06t:1559_10: ettha kāraṇavacane suttānulomamahāpadesatoti ettha pana uddhaṭaṃ gahetabbaṃ, evaṃ
tika-vin06t:1559_12: vuttanti upatissatthero. “Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānañce idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ, āṇāpako mucceyya,
tika-vin06t:1559_13: na ca muccatī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ “kasmā”ti vutte “sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vutta”nti aṭṭhakathācariyo
tika-vin06t:1560_0: 837. Ārāme ṭhatvāti na kevalaṃ ṭhatvā, tato gantvā pana sabbiriyāpathehipi labhati.
tika-vin06t:1560_1: “Ārāme ṭhitāti pana ārāmapariyāpannāti attho, itarathā nisinnāpi na labheyyā”ti likhitaṃ, taṃ sulikhitameva.
tika-vin06t:1565_1: porāṇā. Santiṭṭheyyāti ettha ṭhānāpadesena catubbidhopi iriyāpatho saṅgahito, tasmā
tika-vin06t:1565_2: purisassa hatthapāse tena saddhiṃ caṅkamanādiṃ karontiyā pācittiyameva. “Sallapeyya
tika-vin06t:1565_3: vā”ti kevalaṃ nidānavasena vuttaṃ visesābhāvato. “Sallapeyyavāti purisassa hatthapāse
tika-vin06t:1565_4: ṭhitā sallapati, āpatti pācittiyassā”ti hi vuttaṃ, taṃ na yuttanti eke. Kasmā? Yasmā
tika-vin06t:1565_5: tassa purisassa hatthapāse ṭhiteneva ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Sallapanenapi aparampi ekaṃ
tika-vin06t:1565_6: āpajjatīti nāpajjati, kathaṃ paññāyatīti? Aṅgavasena. Imassa hi rattandhakāratā,
tika-vin06t:1565_7: purisassa hatthapāse ṭhānaṃ vā sallapanaṃ vā, sahāyābhāvo, rahopekkhatāti imāni cattāri
tika-vin06t:1565_8: aṅgāni vuttāni. Tattha yadi ṭhānapaccayā ekā āpatti visuṃ siyā, tassā cattāri aṅgāni
tika-vin06t:1565_9: siyuṃ. Yadi sallapanapaccayā ekā, tassāpi pañca aṅgāni siyuṃ. Tasmā mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1565_10: “cattāri vā pañca vā aṅgānī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, na ca vuttaṃ, tasmā sallapanapaccayā
tika-vin06t:1565_11: visuṃ natthīti. Atthiyeva, mātikāṭṭhakathāvacanañca tadatthamevāti eke. Kathaṃ? Sahuppattito
tika-vin06t:1565_12: dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Sallapane sati ṭhānapaccayā āpajjitabbaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1565_13: sallapanapaccayā āpajjitabbaṃ caturaṅgikanti dve pācittiyāni sahuppannāni ekato āpajjantīti.
tika-vin06t:1565_14: Idaṃ ayuttaṃ pāḷivirodhato. Pāḷiyañhi “sallapeyya vāti purisassa hatthapāse ṭhitā
tika-vin06t:1565_15: sallapati, āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi dve siyuṃ, “āpatti dvinnaṃ pācittiyāna”nti
tika-vin06t:1565_16: na vattabbatā siyāti. Ayaṃ nayo dutiyādīsupi yathāyogaṃ veditabbo. Ettha dutiyenāpi
tika-vin06t:1565_17: saddhiṃ yadi bhikkhuniyā rahopekkhatā atthi, so ce puriso, na dutiyo, purisagaṇanāya
tika-vin06t:1565_18: āpattiyo. Atha dutiyā bhikkhunī hoti, tassā ca tena purisena saddhiṃ rahopekkhatā
tika-vin06t:1565_19: atthi, sā ca bhikkhunī na dutiyā hoti. Ubhinnampi āpajjatīti eke, vicāretvā pana
tika-vin06t:1565_20: gahetabbaṃ. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade pana vuttaṃ “hatthapāse ṭhānena dukkaṭa”nti, taṃ pāḷiyā
tika-vin06t:1565_21: virujjhati. “Purisassa hatthapāse tiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassā”ti hi pāḷi, kiṃbahunā.
tika-vin06t:1565_23: vatthugaṇanāya āpatti veditabbā. “Aṅgāni cettha cattāri pañca vā”ti vattabbanti sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1568: 842-6. Dutiyatatiyacatutthāni uttānāni. Sabbattha “sallapatīti yaṃ kiñci tiracchānakathaṃ kathetī”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1569_0: 852. Catutthe panāyaṃ viseso – “ekenekā”ti paṭhamaṃ vuttattā dutiyikaṃ vā bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:1569_1: uyyojeyya, pācittiyaṃ na sambhavatīti ce? Sambhavati. Kasmā? Santiṭṭhanādittayamattāpekkhattā,
tika-vin06t:1569_2: tassa vacanassāpi vā aññāyapi rahopekkhanassādasambhave sati ubhinnaṃ ekatthasambhavato
tika-vin06t:1569_3: ca sādhitametaṃ. “Hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā santiṭṭhati vā sallapati vā”ti ettakameva
tika-vin06t:1569_4: vuttaṃ. Kasmā “nikaṇṇikaṃ vā jappetī”ti na vuttaṃ? Hatthapāsātikkame asambhavato.
tika-vin06t:1569_5: Tassa tatiyassa padassa pacchinnattā sambhavantampi “dutiyikaṃ vā uyyojetī”ti na
tika-vin06t:1569_6: vuttaṃ, tasmā atthato hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā santiṭṭhati vā sallapati vā dutiyikaṃ
tika-vin06t:1569_7: vā uyyojeti, āpatti dukkaṭassāti vuttaṃ hoti. Esa nayo yakkhena vātiādīsupi. Tattha
tika-vin06t:1569_8: “hatthapāse”ti vā “hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā”ti vā na vuttaṃ ubhayattha dukkaṭattā. Anāpattivārepi
tika-vin06t:1569_9: asambhavato “nikaṇṇikaṃ vā jappetī”ti na vuttanti ce? Sambhavati sati karaṇīye nikaṇṇikaṃ
tika-vin06t:1569_10: vā jappetīti sambhavato. Atha kasmā evaṃ na vuttanti ce? Anavajjakathāyaṃ nikaṇṇikajappane
tika-vin06t:1569_11: payojanābhāvā, dhammakathāyampi udāyiṃ ārabbha paṭisiddhattā ca.
tika-vin06t:1572_0: 856. “Kulaṃ nāma cattāri kulānī”ti vuttattā titthiyārāme kappati tassa kulavohārābhāvatoti
tika-vin06t:1572_1: eke. Titthiyānaṃ khattiyādipariyāpannattā na kappatīti eke. Tassa kappiyabhūmittā
tika-vin06t:1572_2: na yuttanti ce? Na, yathāvuttakhattiyādīnaṃ sambhavato. Tathāpi gocarakulaṃ idhādhippetaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1575_0: 860. “Nisīdantiyā ekā, nipajjantiyā ekā”ti avatvā “nisīditvā gacchantiyā”tiādi na
tika-vin06t:1575_1: vattabbaṃ. Na hi gamanapaccayā esā āpattīti? Na, pariyosānādhippāyavasena vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:1575_2: “Nisīditvā nipajjantiyā dve”ti vacanenapi gamanaṃ idha nādhippetanti dassitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:1575_3: tathā “nipajjitvā nisīdantiyā dve”tipi vattabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “tasmiṃ abhinipajjati,
tika-vin06t:1575_4: āpatti dvinnaṃ pācittiyāna”nti kasmā na vuttanti ce? Anisīditvāpi nipajjanasambhavato.
tika-vin06t:1575_5: Nipajjanatthāya nisīditvā nipajjantiyā nipajjanakapayogattā ekā āpattīti keci.
tika-vin06t:1578_0: 867. Anāpattivāre “dhuvapaññatte”ti na vuttaṃ “santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā”ti
tika-vin06t:1578_1: vuttattā. Idha chaṭṭhe vuttanayena pakatiyā paññatte abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati
tika-vin06t:1578_2: vā, pācittiyameva. Aññattha dhuvapaññattaṃ. Idha vuttanayena santharitvā vā santharāpetvā
tika-vin06t:1578_3: vā abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, pācittiyameva. Ubhayatthāpi pañcame vuttanayena
tika-vin06t:1578_4: anāpucchā pakkameyya, pācittiyameva, anāpattivāre mātikāyaṃ vuttakālato aññakālassa
tika-vin06t:1578_5: aparāmaṭṭhattāti no takkoti ācariyo. Apica atthāpattikāle āpajjati, no vikāletiādittike,
tika-vin06t:1578_6: atthāpatti rattiṃ āpajjati, no divātiādittike ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ idha pañcamachaṭṭhasattamasikkhāpadehi
tika-vin06t:1578_7: saṅgahitāpattīnaṃ aparāmaṭṭhattā yathāsambhavaṃ tividhakāle tividhametaṃ yojetvā
tika-vin06t:1584_0: 875-7. Duggāhavasena vā suggāhavasena vā yathāvuttanayena sapathakaraṇe āpattīti
tika-vin06t:1584_1: veditabbaṃ. Yasmā mātikāyaṃ “attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā yā attānameva ārabbha
tika-vin06t:1584_2: sapathaṃ kareyya, tassā ekā. Paramevārabbha tassā ekā. Ubhopi ārabbha tassā dve āpattiyo
tika-vin06t:1584_3: sambhavanti. Tikacchedo panettha paramevārabbha sapathakaraṇaṃ sandhāya pavatto.
tika-vin06t:1587: 882. Dasame anāpattivāro rodanasseva, na vadhassa, tasmā ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhāpi attānaṃ vadhati eva, na rodati, dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin06t:1592_0: 883. Naggavaggassa paṭhamadutiyāni uttānāni. Paṭhame ayaṃ viseso – bhikkhussa tathā
tika-vin06t:1592_1: nhāyantassa dukkaṭaṃ aññatra jantāgharaudakapaṭicchādīhi. Na ca vigarahi tattha bhagavā
tika-vin06t:1592_2: attanāva ananuññātattā udakasāṭikāyāti porāṇā. “Ekameva nivāsetvā, pārupitvā ca nahāyituṃ
tika-vin06t:1595_0: 894. Tatiye antocatūhapañcāhaṃ dhuraṃ nikkhipantiyāpi āpatti eva. Liṅgaparivatte
tika-vin06t:1595_1: dhuraṃ nikkhipantiyā dukkaṭaṃ tikadukkaṭattā. “Sambahulāhi bhikkhunīhi saddhinti
tika-vin06t:1598_0: 898. Catutthe saṅghāṭicāranti ettha saṅghāṭiādivasena adhiṭṭhitānaṃyevāyaṃ vidhi,
tika-vin06t:1598_1: netarāsaṃ kira. Tattha ticīvare eva vippavāsapaccayā nissaggiyaṃ. Antocīvarakālepi
tika-vin06t:1598_2: pañcāhikaṃ saṅghāṭicāraṃ atikkāmentiyā āpattiyeva. “Vinā etehi cīvarehi upasampadaṃ
tika-vin06t:1601: 906. Pañcamassa anāpattivāre tāya vā avippavāsāyāti atthato labbhati.
tika-vin06t:1605: 916. Sokajjhāyikā nāma kira māyākārā. Vilumpakā bhaṇḍakāti ca porāṇā.
tika-vin06t:1608: 920. “Kathañhi nāma atikkāmessatī”ti vuttattā thullanandā cīvarakālasamayaṃ āgamethāti atikkamāpesīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:1611: 927. Dasame ekakulaṃ etadavocunti ettha kulaṃ nāma tasmiṃ manussā, tasmā bahuvacanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1616_0: 934-5. Ekāya nipannāya aparā nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassāti “ubhinnampi paṭhamanipannāya
tika-vin06t:1616_1: anuṭṭhāpanā”ti vatvā ettha kiriyākiriyanti eke, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya virujjhati. “Kiriya”nti
tika-vin06t:1616_2: hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Atha kassā āpattīti? Ubhinnampi nipajjanakiriyaṃ paṭicca.
tika-vin06t:1616_3: Imassa anāpattivāre “vavatthānaṃ dassetvā”ti natthi, tasmā vavatthānaṃ katvā nipajjituṃ
tika-vin06t:1616_4: na vaṭṭatīti eke. Vipulatare vaṭṭatīti eke. “Antaraṃ katvā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin06t:1619_0: 940. Vavatthānaṃ dassetvāti ettha upari pārupanampi majjhe obhogaṃ katvā ubhinnaṃ
tika-vin06t:1619_1: antare otāreti, vaṭṭatīti eke. Vavatthānañca yathā ṭhāne na tiṭṭhati, tathā atikkamitvā
tika-vin06t:1622_0: 941. Attano sajjhāyanaṭṭhāne ce vuḍḍhatarā āgacchati, vandanakāle vā, āpucchanakiccaṃ
tika-vin06t:1622_1: natthi. Ekasmiṃ ovarake āpucchitabbaṃ. “Atha ovarake mahātherī vasati, sammukhe itarā,
tika-vin06t:1626: 956. Gahapati nāma ṭhapetvā sahadhammike veditabbo, tasmā bhikkhunā vā sāmaṇerena vā ananulomikena saṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭhāpi na samanubhāsitabbāti sambhavati eva.
tika-vin06t:1630_0: 969. Ekindriyanti kāyindriyeneva ekindriyaṃ, nigaṇṭhānaṃ acelakānaṃ mataṃ. Kāpilā
tika-vin06t:1630_1: pana “pañcindriyā”ti maññantā evaṃ vadanti “sacakkhukattā alābumāluvādayo yattha
tika-vin06t:1630_2: ālambanaṃ, tattha gacchanti. Sasotakattā kadaliyo meghagajjitaṃ sutvā gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti.
tika-vin06t:1630_3: Saghānakattā panasādayo kuṇapagandhena phalanti. Sajivhakattā udakaṃ pivanti yena,
tika-vin06t:1630_4: sabbepi ‘pādapā’ti vuccanti. Sakāyapasādattā itthisamphassena asokarukkhā pupphantī”ti.
tika-vin06t:1631_0: 970. Idha ca vassacchedena dukkaṭaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ āvasitvā pacchā cārikā caraṇapaccayā
tika-vin06t:1631_1: pācittiyaṃ āpajjatīti veditabbaṃ. Atha vassaṃ avasitvā carati, avassupagamanapaccayā
tika-vin06t:1631_2: dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade pana “antosattāhe antovasse cārikaṃ carantiyā
tika-vin06t:1631_3: pācittiyaṃ. Sattāhakaraṇīyena pana vaṭṭati, bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1632_0: 972. Kenaci ubbāḷhāti vassacchedakāraṇenāti no takkoti ācariyo. Kittāvatā cārikā
tika-vin06t:1632_1: hotīti? Idaṃ na sabbattha vicāritaṃ. Anantarasikkhāpade “antamaso chappañcayojanānipī”ti
tika-vin06t:1640_0: 978. Kīḷanaupavanaṃ nāma kañcinagarassa nagarupavanaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Uyyānaṃ nāma
tika-vin06t:1640_1: tattheva nandavanauyyānaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Tattheva ṭhatvā taṃ taṃ disābhāgaṃ viloketvā
tika-vin06t:1640_2: passantiyā pana pāṭekkā āpattiyo”ti pāṭho. Evaṃ vutte yaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ padaṃ “anuddharamānā”ti,
tika-vin06t:1640_3: taṃ ekasmiṃyeva disābhāgeti siddhanti eke. Upacāro dve leḍḍupātoti ca.
tika-vin06t:1643_0: 984. “Āharimehi vāḷehī”ti “asaṃhārimenā”ti ca duvidho pāṭho. “Visuṃ katvā pacchā
tika-vin06t:1643_1: saddhiṃ tehi vāḷehī”ti likhitaṃ. Yathā tathā vāḷarūpe uṭṭhapetvā katapādaṃ “pallaṅka”nti
tika-vin06t:1643_2: vuccati anāpattivāre “asaṃhārimehi vāḷehi kataṃ paribhuñjatī”ti vacanābhāvato.
tika-vin06t:1646: 988. “Ujjavujjaveti hatthappasāraṇe”ti likhitaṃ, taṃ na yuttaṃ “yattakaṃ hatthena añchitaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ takkamhi veṭhite ekāpattī”ti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:1649: 993. “Yāgupāneti yāgudāne”ti likhitaṃ. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade “mātāpitūnaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1653: 1001. Chaṭṭhe bhikkhuvibhaṅge acelakasikkhāpadena ekaparicchedaṃ. Idha agāriko viseso, tasmā “asādhāraṇa”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1657_0: 1015. “Khīlanamantaṃ dārusārakhīlaṃ mantetvā pathaviyaṃ pavesetvā māraṇamantaṃ. Nāgamaṇḍalaṃnāma
tika-vin06t:1657_1: nāgarodhamantaṃ, piṭṭhādīhi vā parikkhepaṃ katvā tattha manusse pavesenti guttatthāyā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1664: 1030. Bhikkhunī ce bhikkhuṃ akkosati, iminā sikkhāpadena pācittiyaṃ. Bhikkhuniṃ ce akkosati, omasavādena āpajjati. Omasavāde sammukhāva ruhati, idha pana parammukhāpi.
tika-vin06t:1665_0: Tatrāyaṃ vicāraṇā – bhikkhuvibhaṅge osamavādasikkhāpade bhikkhunī anupasampannaṭṭhāne
tika-vin06t:1665_1: tiṭṭhatīti katvā bhikkhunivibhaṅgepi omasavādasikkhāpade bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā anupasampannaṭṭhāne
tika-vin06t:1665_2: tiṭṭhatīti siddhaṃ. Idha ca anupasampannassa akkosane dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, bhikkhussa
tika-vin06t:1665_3: upasampannassa akkosane pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā imāni dve sikkhāpadāni bhikkhumhi
tika-vin06t:1665_4: saṃsandiyamānāni aññamaññaṃ na samenti. Yathā samenti, tathā jānitabbaṃ. Tattha porāṇagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:1665_5: vuttanayena bhikkhunīnaṃ omasavādasikkhāpade anupasampannoti na gahetabbo, idamettha
tika-vin06t:1665_6: yuttaṃ. Paribhāseyyāti aññatra akkosavatthūhi. Tesu hi aññatarasmiṃ sati omasavādapācittiyamevāti
tika-vin06t:1665_7: eke, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Omasavāde pāḷimuttakaakkose hi dukkaṭaṃ hotīti. Dukkaṭokāse idaṃ
tika-vin06t:1665_8: pācittiyaṃ tehi niddiṭṭhaṃ hoti, tasmā “bālā etā”ti pāḷiyaṃ idha āgatapadānaṃyeva
tika-vin06t:1669_0: 1038. Nimantitā vā pavāritā vāti ettha porāṇagaṇṭhipade tāva evaṃ vuttaṃ “pavāritāpi
tika-vin06t:1669_1: yāguṃ pātuṃ labhati, bhojjayāguṃ na labhati. Yāgu panettha khādanīyabhojanīyasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1669_2: na gacchati. Nimantitā bhikkhunī piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjitukāmā sāmike apaloketvāva
tika-vin06t:1669_3: bhuñjituṃ labhati. Paramparabhojanāpatti bhikkhunīnaṃ natthi. Nimantitā taṃ bhattaṃ
tika-vin06t:1669_4: bhuñjitvā vā abhuñjitvā vā pavāritā kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā bhuñjituṃ na labhati, akappiyanimantanena
tika-vin06t:1669_5: nimantiyamānā dve nimantanāni sampaṭicchituñca na labhatī”ti. Tattha “pavāritāpi
tika-vin06t:1669_6: yāguṃ pātuṃ labhatī”ti vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyañca anuññātattā. “Nimantitā appavāritā
tika-vin06t:1669_7: yāguṃ pivatī”ti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tatridaṃ sikkhāpadavaṇṇanāpubbaṅgamasanniṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1669_8: – nimantitā vā pavāritā vāti ettha vāsaddena akappiyanimantanena nimantitā appavāritā
