tika-vin06t:1669_9: ṭhapetvā yāguṃ aññaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1669_10: aññatra sāmikānaṃ apalokanā. Paramparabhojanābhāvena bhikkhunīnaṃ ko guṇo jātoti?
tika-vin06t:1669_11: Na etāsaṃ guṇalābho, kevalaṃ pākaṭataraṃ jātaṃ. Bhikkhūpi vikappetvā missetvāva bhuñjituṃ
tika-vin06t:1669_12: labhanti. Samaye yathāsukhaṃ labhanti. Iminā apalokanena kinti? Pavāritā vā animantitā
tika-vin06t:1669_13: vā na kiñci kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā gilānātirittampi labhanti, nimantitā ca pavāritā ca
tika-vin06t:1669_14: yāgumpi na labhanti, apaloketvāpi na labhantīti.
tika-vin06t:1674: 1067. “Gabbhini”nti dassanādīhipi gabbhasambhavato vuttaṃ. Padabhājanepi pavāritabhāvo na dissati.
tika-vin06t:1675: 1074. Dhāti vāti ettha dārakaṃ sāmikānaṃ datvā āhaṭe vaḍḍheti, tathā mātāpīti keci.
tika-vin06t:1676_1: “sikkhamānā”ti. Tassattho sikkhādhammamānanato sikkhamānāti. Idha kiriyā na hoti,
tika-vin06t:1676_2: saññāva adhippetā. Na etāsu asikkhitā upasampādetabbā upajjhāyinīādīnaṃ āpattibhāvā.
tika-vin06t:1678: 1112. Vuṭṭhāpitanti sāmaṇeribhūmito yāya theriyā upasampadāpekkhā vuṭṭhapitā, sā therī vuṭṭhāpitā nāma, teneva puna visesanatthaṃ “pavattini”nti āha.
tika-vin06t:1683_1: idha vuttaṃ viya “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dasavassāya gihigatāya…pe… sikkhāsammutiṃ
tika-vin06t:1683_2: dātu”nti na vuttaṃ, tasmā “paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya eva gihigatāya sikkhāsammuti dātabbā”ti
tika-vin06t:1683_3: vuttaṃ. Gihigatāya sikkhāsammuti dātabbāti eketi katvā dasavassāyapi vaṭṭati. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:1683_5: gihigataṃ…pe… sikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpetī’ti ca vuttattā”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1683_6: Kiṃ iminā parihārena. “Dasavassāya gihigatāya sikkhāsammuti dātabbā”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1683_7: “Gihigatātipi vattuṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti sace vadanti, kammaṃ kuppatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1684: 1146. Ahameva nūna…pe… alajjinī, yā saṅghoti ettha yā ahameva nūna bālāti attho. “Yaṃ saṅgho”tipi atthi, tattha yaṃ yasmā deti, tasmā ahameva nūna bālāti attho.
tika-vin06t:1685_0: 1159. Purisasaṃsaṭṭhā kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhā caṇḍī sokāvāsāvakathaṃ sikkhamānāti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:1685_1: padabhājane eva cāyaṃ sikkhamānā “chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā”ti kasmā vuttanti?
tika-vin06t:1685_2: Pubbe gahitasikkhattā, pubbe paripuṇṇasikkhattā ca evaṃ vuccatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1686_0: 1166-7. Pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ passitvāti ettha “sikkhamānāya ñātakā kira
tika-vin06t:1686_1: sampādayiṃsu, taṃ passitvā there bhikkhū uyyojesi. Uyyojetvā tesaṃ chandaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin06t:1686_2: pubbe chandadāyake gaṇaṃ katvā sesānaṃ chandaṃ chandameva katvā kammaṃ kārāpesī”ti
tika-vin06t:1686_3: porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Chandaṃ vissajjetvāti ettha anugaṇṭhipade evaṃ vuttaṃ “idaṃ
tika-vin06t:1686_4: kammaṃ ajja na kattabbaṃ. ‘Yathāsukha’nti vatvā vissajjitaṃ hoti, tasmā yo koci mukharo,
tika-vin06t:1686_5: bālo vā kiñcāpi ‘yathāsukha’nti vadati, therāyattattā pana therassa anumatiyā satiyā
tika-vin06t:1686_6: vissajjito hoti, asatiyā na hoti, tathāpi puna chandaṃ gahetvāva kammaṃ karonti,
tika-vin06t:1686_7: ayaṃ payogo. Gahaṇe payojanaṃ pana natthi. Saṅghatthero ce vissajjeti, chandaṃ gahetvāva
tika-vin06t:1686_8: kātabbaṃ. Chandaṃ vissajjetvā kāyena vuṭṭhitāyāti ettha idha sambādho, ‘amukamhi
tika-vin06t:1686_9: ṭhāne karissāmā’ti hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvāpi gacchanti ce, natthi doso. Kiñcāpi natthi,
tika-vin06t:1686_10: tā pana hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvāva gacchanti, ayaṃ payogo”ti. “Rattipārivāsiye uposathapavāraṇāva
tika-vin06t:1686_11: na vaṭṭati, aññakammaṃ pana vaṭṭati. Uposathapavāraṇāpi anuposathapavāraṇadivase
tika-vin06t:1686_12: na vaṭṭanti, itaraṃ sabbakālaṃ vaṭṭati. Parisapārivāsiye hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā catūsu
tika-vin06t:1686_13: gatesu catuvaggakaraṇīye aññasmiṃ pañcasu dasasu vīsatīsu gatesu sesehi visuṃ tahiṃ
tika-vin06t:1686_14: tahiṃ gantvāpi puna sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Ajjhāsayapārivāsiye hatthapāsaṃ
tika-vin06t:1686_15: avijahitvā yathānisinnāva nisinnā ce, puna kātuṃ vaṭṭati hatthapāsassa avijahitattā”ti
tika-vin06t:1686_16: porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Tesaṃ porāṇānaṃ matena chandapārivāsiyamevekaṃ na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin06t:1686_17: āpannaṅgañca dassitaṃ, idhāpi taṃ visuṃ na dassitaṃ asambhavatoti eke. Chandadāyake
tika-vin06t:1686_18: parisaṃ patvā gate tassa pubbachandadānaṃ chandapārivāsiyanti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1687_0: Tatridaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ – parisapārivāsiye aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “aññatra gacchāmāti chandaṃ
tika-vin06t:1687_1: avissajjetvāva uṭṭhahanti…pe… kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttavacane hatthapāsā vijahanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1687_2: na paññāyati. Ettha pana kammappattānaṃ hatthapāsassa avijahanameva icchitabbanti
tika-vin06t:1687_3: katvā porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi na paññāyati, appaṭikkhittattā pana vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin06t:1687_4: ce? Na, paṭikkhittattā. Kathaṃ? Chando nāma kammappattesu bhikkhūsu ekasīmāya sannipatitesu
tika-vin06t:1687_5: āgacchati, nāsannipatitesu. Idha hi “chandaṃ avissajjetvā”ti ca “chandassa pana avissaṭṭhattā”ti
tika-vin06t:1687_6: ca vuttaṃ. “Ajjhāsayaṃ avissajjetvā”ti ca “ajjhāsayassa avissaṭṭhattā”ti ca na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1687_7: tasmā chandassa avissajjanaṃ kammappattānaṃ hatthapāsāvijahaneneva hoti, na vijahaneti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1691_0: Rattipārivāsiyachando viya rattipārivāsiyapārisuddhipīti tadanulomena vaṭṭati svātanāya
tika-vin06t:1691_1: chando vā pārisuddhi vā pavāraṇā vā, tāya kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Uposathapavāraṇā
tika-vin06t:1691_2: pana anuposathadivase na vaṭṭati, itaraṃ vaṭṭati. Pannarasiuposathaṃ cātuddasiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1691_3: kātuṃ vaṭṭati khettattā. Na cātuddasiuposathaṃ pannarasiyaṃ akhettattā anuposathadivasattā
tika-vin06t:1691_4: pāṭipadadivasattāti ekacce ācariyā, tasmā tesaṃ matena cātuddasiuposathaṃ tatiyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1691_5: sattamaṃ vā pannarasiyaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ panettha vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace
tika-vin06t:1691_6: cātuddasikaṃ uposathaṃ karissāmāti nisinnā, pannarasoti kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Tato “pannarasiyameva
tika-vin06t:1691_7: ‘cātuddasikaṃ uposathaṃ karissāmā’ti nisinnā punadivase attano taṃ uposathaṃ ‘pannaraso’ti
tika-vin06t:1691_8: kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti attho”ti evaṃ pariharanti, taṃ tesaṃ mataṃ “tathārūpapaccaye sati
tika-vin06t:1691_9: aññasmimpi cātuddase uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā mātikāṭṭhakathāvacanena na
tika-vin06t:1691_10: sameti. Na hi tattha “aññasmimpi pannarase cātuddasikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1691_11: Evaṃ santepi “sakiṃ pakkhassa cātuddase vā pannarase vā”ti anuññātadivase pariyāpannattā
tika-vin06t:1691_12: channaṃ cātuddasikānaṃ pacchimā pannarasī anuposathadivaso na hotīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:1691_13: Kiñcāpi siddhaṃ, iminā pana “āvāsikānaṃ pannaraso, āgantukānaṃ cātuddaso, āgantukehi
tika-vin06t:1691_14: āvāsikānaṃ samasamehi vā appatarehi vā anuvattitabba”nti vacanamettha niratthakaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1697: 1221. Suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā vinayaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā pucchatīti ettha ca tīṇi piṭakāni attano attano nāmena vuttānīti katvā abhidhammo buddhena bhāsito evāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:1698_0: 1224-5. Thano ca udaro ca thanudarā. “Saṃkaccikāya pamāṇaṃ tiriyaṃ diyaḍḍhahatthā”ti
tika-vin06t:1698_1: porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. “Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantiyā”ti bahūsu
tika-vin06t:1698_2: potthakesu, saṅghādisesakaṇḍe viya “upacāraṃ atikkamantiyā”ti pāṭho appakesu, sova
tika-vin06t:1698_3: pāṭho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “parikkhepaṃ atikkamantiyāti ekena pādena atikkante dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1698_4: dutiyena pācittiyaṃ. Upacārepi eseva nayo”ti vacanampi “upacāraṃ atikkamantiyā”ti
tika-vin06t:1702_1: ajānitvāpi dassanena, vilimpanena vā āpajjanato vatthuajānanacittena acittakāni.
tika-vin06t:1702_2: “Nacca”nti vā “gandho”ti vā jānitvā passantiyā, vilimpantiyā ca akusalattā eva lokavajjāni.
tika-vin06t:1702_3: Corivuṭṭhāpanādīni “corī”tiādinā vatthuṃ jānitvā karaṇe eva āpattisabbhāvato sacittakāni.
tika-vin06t:1702_4: Upasampadādīnaṃ ekantena akusalacitteneva akattabbattā paṇṇattivajjāni. “Idha sacittakācittakatā
tika-vin06t:1702_7: vā ‘saṅghāṇī’ti vā ‘gandho’ti vā tassa nāmavasena ajānitvā māyākārassa māyāni sīsaṭṭhiādīni
tika-vin06t:1702_8: paṭisaṅkhāya passantiyā, akkhamālādiatthāya saṅghāṇiṃ kaṭiyā bandhantiyā, ‘sedagandhaṃ
tika-vin06t:1702_9: apanetvā buddhapūjaṃ karissāmī’ti uppannena cittena gandhaṃ vilimpetvā nahāyantiyā
tika-vin06t:1702_10: ca āpattisabbhāvato nāmena saddhiṃ nāmavasena vā vatthussa ajānanacittena acittakāni
tika-vin06t:1702_11: nāma. Na andhakāre ‘kaṭisuttamida’nti saññāya saṅghāṇiṃ gahetvā kaṭiyaṃ dhāraṇakāle,
tika-vin06t:1702_12: mattikāsaññāya ca gandhaṃ gahetvā vilimpanakāle āpattisabbhāvato ‘acittakānī’ti vattabbāni.
tika-vin06t:1702_13: Tasmiṃ kāle anāpatti, teneva saṅghāṇiyā asaṅghāṇisaññāvārepi ‘āpatti pācittiyassā’ti
tika-vin06t:1702_14: pāḷi na vuttā. Yathā ‘khettaābādhapaccayā, kaṭisuttakaṃ dhāretī’ti vacanato vināpi
tika-vin06t:1702_15: akusalena saṅghāṇiādīni sakkā dhāretunti siddhaṃ, evaṃ ābādhapaccayā vināpi akusalena
tika-vin06t:1702_16: na sakkā suraṃ pātunti siddhaṃ ‘anāpatti ābādhapaccayā majjaṃ pivatī’ti pāḷiyā abhāvato.
tika-vin06t:1702_17: Akusalena vinā madhupuṇṇamuṭṭhiyaṃ pakkhittamajjassa ajjhoharaṇakālādīsu surāpānāpattiṃ
tika-vin06t:1702_18: āpajjatīti ca siddhaṃ ‘majje amajjasaññī pivati, āpatti pācittiyassā’ti vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:1702_19: Kiṃbahunā, kāmabhogasaññāya saddhiṃ ‘saṅghāṇī’ti ca ‘gandho’ti ca jānitvā vinā anāpattikāraṇena
tika-vin06t:1702_20: dhārentiyā ekantākusalattā lokavajjāni nāma vuccanti. Iminā upāyena sesesupi nayo
tika-vin06t:1702_21: netabbo. Ettha surāpānādhikāre upatissattheravādo”ti vuttaṃ. Asaṃkaccikasikkhāpade
tika-vin06t:1702_24: mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya addhānagamanaṃ, rājantepurappavesanaṃ, santaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin06t:1702_25: anāpucchā vikāle gāmappavesanaṃ, nisīdanaṃ, vassikasāṭikanti pāṭho”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1712_0: Tattha kenaṭṭhenāyaṃ khandhakoti? Khandhānaṃ samūhattā vibhaṅgo viya. Te pana kathanti?
tika-vin06t:1712_1: Khandhānaṃ pakāsanato dīpanato. Khandhāti cettha pabbajjādivinayakammasaṅkhātā, cārittavārittasikkhāpadasaṅkhātā
tika-vin06t:1712_2: ca paññattiyo adhippetā. Pabbajjādīni hi bhagavatā paññattattā “paññattiyo”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin06t:1712_4: viya. Tesaṃ paññattisaṅkhātānaṃ khandhānaṃ pakāsanato vaṇṇanato pabbajjakkhandhakādayo
tika-vin06t:1712_5: vīsati “khandhakā”ti vuttā, avasāne dve taṃsadisattā velāya sadisattā sīlassa velāti
tika-vin06t:1712_6: vacanaṃ viya. Apica bhāgarāsatthatāpettha yujjate tesaṃ paññattīnaṃ bhāgato ca rāsito
tika-vin06t:1712_7: ca vibhattattā. Kiṃ panetesaṃ khandhakānaṃ anupubbakāraṇanti? Nāyaṃ pucchā sambhavati,
tika-vin06t:1712_8: aññathā vuttesupi tappasaṅgānatikkamanato. Atha vā pabbajjupasampadāpubbaṅgamattā
tika-vin06t:1712_9: sāsanappavesanassa tadatthasaṅgahako mahākhandhako paṭhamaṃ vutto. Kenāti ce? Dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi.
tika-vin06t:1712_10: Bhagavatā pana tattha tattha uppannavatthuṃ paṭicca tathā tathā vuttāni, na iminā
tika-vin06t:1712_11: anukkamena. Therā pana taṃ taṃ payojanaṃ paṭicca samānajātike ekajjhaṃ katvā anukkamena
tika-vin06t:1712_12: sajjhāyiṃsu. Sesānaṃ payojanaṃ tattha tattheva āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin06t:1713_1: attho. Tesaṃ anuttānatthānaṃ padānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā. Kasmā panevaṃ visesitanti? Tato
tika-vin06t:1713_3: Yehi atthā yesaṃ padavisesānaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pakāsitā, tesaṃ te padavisese puna idha
tika-vin06t:1713_4: vadeyyāma, vaṇṇanāya pariyosānaṃ kadā bhave te te attheti vuttaṃ, taṃ tassa niddesena
tika-vin06t:1713_5: yujjati. Uttānā ceva yā pāḷi, tassā saṃvaṇṇanāya kinti vattabbaṃ? Na hi atthā uttānāti
tika-vin06t:1713_6: sambhavati. Adhippāyānusandhīhītiādivacanehipi taṃ vacanaṃ sambhavatīti ce? Na, atthaggahaṇena
tika-vin06t:1713_7: cettha padavisesānaṃ gahitattā. Te hi atthato anapetatthena, abhidhānatthena vā atthopacārena
tika-vin06t:1713_8: vā atthāti veditabbā. Saṃvaṇṇanānayoti saṃvaṇṇanā nāma avuttesu uhāpohakkamanidassanato “nayo”ti vutto.
tika-vin06t:1714_0: 1. Uruvelāti yathāvuttavālikarāsivasena laddhanāmako gāmo, tasmā samīpatthe etaṃ
tika-vin06t:1714_1: bhummaṃ. Tathābhāvadassanatthaṃ “najjā nerañjarāya tīre”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aññathā tasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:1714_2: vālikarāsimhi viharatīti āpajjati, “uruvelaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisīti yena uruvelasenānigamo”tiādivacanavirodho
tika-vin06t:1714_3: ca. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mūlakāraṇameva dassitaṃ. Tattha taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ…pe… daṭṭhabboti
tika-vin06t:1714_4: nigamanavacanaṃ. Taṃ kimatthanti ce? Gāmaṃ sandhāya yathāvuttapadatthasambhavadassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1714_5: “So pana gāmo tadupacārena evaṃ nāmaṃ labhatī”ti vacanaṃ pana avuttasiddhanti katvā
tika-vin06t:1714_6: na vuttanti veditabbaṃ, atha vā yassa “uruvelā”ti yathāvuttavālikarāsissa, tassa
tika-vin06t:1714_7: samīpagāmassapi nāmaṃ. Tattha āyasmā upālitthero na idha gāmaṃ sandhāya “uruvelāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1714_8: viharatī”ti āha gocaragāmapayojanābhāvato. Na hi bhagavā taṃ gāmaṃ gocaraṃ katvā
tika-vin06t:1714_9: tadā tattha vihāsi, tasmā ettha vālikarāsissa samīpe bodhirukkhamūle vihāraṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:1714_10: so evamāhāti dassetukāmo aṭṭhakathācariyo evamāhāti veditabbaṃ, tasmā bhagavato gāmato
tika-vin06t:1714_11: dūratare araññe abhisambodhidīpanena dutiyuppattiṭṭhānaniyamaṃ tīhi padehi akāsi
tika-vin06t:1714_12: theroti veditabbaṃ, aññathā padattayavacanapayojanābhāvato. Tattha nadantā gacchatīti
tika-vin06t:1714_13: nadī. Nelañjalāyāti vattabbe la-kārassa ra-kāraṃ katvā “nerañjarāyā”ti vuttaṃ, kaddamasevālavirahitattā
tika-vin06t:1714_14: niddosajalāyāti attho, nīlajalāyāti tassā nāmameva vā etaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1715_0: Bodhirukkhamūleti ettha ca bodhi vuccati abhisambodho. So ca atthato bhagavato catutthamaggañāṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:1715_1: hoti “vimokkhantikametaṃ nāma”nti paṭisambhidāvacanato. Kiñcāpi taṃ nāmakaraṇabhūtaṃ
tika-vin06t:1715_2: catutthaphalañāṇampi vattuṃ sambhavati, kattabbakiccānaṃ pana karaṇato taṃ catutthamaggañāṇameva
tika-vin06t:1715_3: ettha bodhīti veditabbaṃ. Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “tatiyavijjāya āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyā”ti tadeva
tika-vin06t:1715_4: dassitaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “bojjhaṅgā”ti, “bodhipakkhiyā dhammā”ti ca. Tattha yasmā
tika-vin06t:1715_5: catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ “bodhī”ti vuccati, tasmā sāmaññato vattukāmatādhippāyavasena
tika-vin06t:1715_6: “bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ idhādhippetañāṇassapi tadantogadhattā.
tika-vin06t:1715_7: Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ bhagavato ādimaggattayavacanassa vuttaṭṭhānābhāvā catutthamaggañāṇameva
tika-vin06t:1715_8: bhagavato uppannaṃ, na bhagavā sotāpannādibhāvaṃ patvā buddho jātoti samayantarappasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1715_10: “Puggalopi senāsanampi upanissayapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato phalahetuko phalajanako
tika-vin06t:1715_11: rukkho phalarukkhoti viya bodhiheturukkho bodhirukkhoti veditabbo. Ettha “yasmā kevalaṃ
tika-vin06t:1715_12: bodhīti rukkhassapi nāmaṃ, tasmā bodhī”ti parato vuttaṃ. Nigrodhādirukkhato assa
tika-vin06t:1715_14: bodhi ca taṃ mūlañcāti saṅkhyaṃ labheyya. Paṭhamābhisambuddho nisīdatīti sambandho.
tika-vin06t:1715_15: Tena abhisambuddhadivasena saddhiṃ aṭṭhāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinnabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:1715_16: Ettha eka-saddo tassa nisajjāsaṅkhātassa pabbajjānuyogānurūpassa pallaṅkassa aññena
tika-vin06t:1715_17: iriyāpathena anantariyabhāvaṃ athassa akopitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Vimuttisukhanti ettha
tika-vin06t:1715_18: vimuttiyaṃ vā sukhanti na sambhavati. Pañcamajjhānikattā bhagavato phalasamāpattisaṅkhātā
tika-vin06t:1715_19: vimutti eva anujaṅghanaṭṭhena nibbānasukhanti vimuttisukhaṃ, taṃ samāpajjanena paṭisaṃvedī
tika-vin06t:1715_20: anubhavanto nisīdi. Veneyyakālānatikkamanato taṃ apekkhamāno nisīdi, na vimuttisukhasaṅgena.
tika-vin06t:1716_0: Atha khoti adhikārantarārambhe nipātadvayaṃ. Tena vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedayamāno
tika-vin06t:1716_1: na paṭiccasamuppādaṃ manasākāsi, kintu tato vuṭṭhāyāti dasseti. Paṭivedhavaseneva
tika-vin06t:1716_2: sumanasikatassa paṭiccasamuppādassa punappunaṃ manasikaraṇaṃ gambhīrattā assādajananato,
tika-vin06t:1716_4: paṭividdhassa visayato vā manasikaraṇaṃ pana vijitadesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ viya rañño
tika-vin06t:1716_5: apubbaṃ pītiṃ janeti. Vuttañhi “amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato”ti. Rattiyā
tika-vin06t:1716_6: paṭhamaṃ yāmanti accantasaṃyogavasena upayogavacanaṃ, tena tassa vikappanānattataṃ
tika-vin06t:1716_7: dasseti. Kiñcāpi “anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasākāsī”ti ekatova vuttaṃ, tathāpi iminā anukkamenāti
tika-vin06t:1716_8: dassanatthaṃ “avijjāpaccayā”tiādi. Tattha ca kiñcāpi pavattimattapaccavekkhaṇā adhippetā
tika-vin06t:1716_9: kathaṃ paññāyatīti? Paṭhamabhāvāya, paṭilomamanasikaraṇaṃ pana anulome paccayānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1716_10: paccayuppannānañca tathābhāvasādhanatthaṃ. Yasmā avijjāya eva nirodhā saṅkhāranirodho,
tika-vin06t:1716_11: na aññathā, tasmā saṅkhārānaṃ avijjā paccayo, tassā ca saṅkhārā phalanti dīpanato.
tika-vin06t:1716_13: Ettha ca anubhāvato nibbānaṃ dassitaṃ. Na hi taṃ avijjādinirodhamattanti. Tattha
tika-vin06t:1716_14: “yato khayaṃ paccayānaṃ avedī”ti vacanena anulomo nādhippetoti siddhaṃ. Maggapaccavekkhaṇāya
tika-vin06t:1716_15: vattabbaṃ natthi, ubhayatthapi kiccato, ārammaṇato ca tassa maggassa visayato ca
tika-vin06t:1717_0: Tatthāha – “paṭiccasamuppādaṃ paṭilomaṃ manasākāsī”ti na yujjati, na hi paṭilomāpadesena
tika-vin06t:1717_1: niddiṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādo bhavitumarahatīti? Vuccate – na, tadatthajānanato.
tika-vin06t:1717_2: Anulomapaṭilomanti hi bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ. Anulomato, paṭilomato ca taṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
tika-vin06t:1717_3: manasākāsīti hi tattha attho. Aññathā nirodhassa paṭilomappasaṅgāpattiyevāpajjati.
tika-vin06t:1717_4: Paṭilome ca panetasmiṃ anukkamaniyamo anulome anukkamaniyamato siddhoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1717_5: Evaṃ sati paṭiccasamuppādassa paṭilomo nāma apaṭiccasamuppādoti siddhaṃ hoti. Tena
tika-vin06t:1717_6: vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nirodho hotīti anuppādo hotī”tiādi. Evaṃ sante pubbāparavirodho
tika-vin06t:1717_7: hoti. Kathaṃ? Paṭiccāti hi iminā phalassa paccayapariggahena, paccayānañca paccayāyattupagamanena
tika-vin06t:1717_8: tassa uppādābhimukhabhāvadīpanato asamuppādo na sambhavati, tasmā apaṭiccasamuppādoti
tika-vin06t:1717_9: evaṃ ubhayapaṭikkhepena panassa paṭilomatā veditabbāti eke. Taṃ ayuttaṃ tassa anulomabhāvaniyamanato,
tika-vin06t:1717_10: atthātisayābhāvato, tasmā appaṭiccasamuppādo tassa paṭilomoti veditabbaṃ. Teneva
tika-vin06t:1717_11: bhagavatā pāḷiyaṃ paccayapaccayuppannanirodho vutto. Tattha hi “avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā”ti
tika-vin06t:1717_12: evaṃ paccayassa samucchinnapaccayabhāvavasena paccayanirodhaṃ, phalassa paccayapaṭiggahābhāvavasena
tika-vin06t:1717_13: paccayuppannanirodhañca dīpeti. Duvidho pāḷiyaṃ nirodho atthato anuppādo nāma hotīti
tika-vin06t:1717_14: katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nirodho hotīti anuppādo hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sante nibbānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1717_15: paccayapaccayuppannānaṃ nirodhamattanti āpajjatīti ce? Na, tassānubhāvadīpanādhippāyato.
tika-vin06t:1717_16: Viditavelāyanti manasikatavelāyanti attho, aññathā tato pubbe aviditappasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:1718_0: Jhāyatoti ettha kāmaṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena jhāyato bodhipakkhiyadhammā pātubhavanti,
tika-vin06t:1718_1: catuariyasaccadhammā vā pakāsanti, tathāpi pubbabhāge samathādiyānikavibhāgadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1718_3: virujjhati, tathāpi “yo dukkhaṃ parijānāti, so samudayaṃ pajahatī”ti laddhivasena katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1719_1: duvidhaṃ nibbānaṃ dassitaṃ hotīti. Kāmañca taṃ na kevalaṃ paccayakkhayamattaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:1719_2: atha kho paccayuppannakkhayampi karoti. Yato ubhinnampi nirodho dassito, tathāpi
tika-vin06t:1719_3: hetunirodhā phalanirodhoti katvā “paccayakkhayassā”ti vuttaṃ. Vuttappakārā dhammāti
tika-vin06t:1719_4: ettha catusaccaggahaṇaṃ paṭhamagāthāyaṃ vuttanayavipallāsena katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1720_0: 3. Samudayanirodhasaṅkhāto atthoti ettha samudayo kiccavasena, nirodho ārammaṇakiriyāya.
tika-vin06t:1720_1: Etena dvippakārā nirodhā dassitā honti tassa anubhāvassa vasenāti attho. Yasmā pallaṅkābhujitaṭṭhānañca
tika-vin06t:1722_0: 4. Sammodīti hitakāmatāya bhagavā tena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ sammodi. Vedehi antanti
tika-vin06t:1722_1: ettha nibbānaṃ anto nāma. Vedānaṃ vā antaṃ gatattāti ettha arahattaṃ. Tattha paṭhamena
tika-vin06t:1722_2: vedantagū yasmā, tasmā eva vusitabrahmacariyo. Dutiyena vedantagū yasmā, tasmā vusitabrahmacariyoti
tika-vin06t:1722_3: evaṃ yojanā kātabbā. Kiñcāpi brāhmaṇassa catusaccayuttaṃ atthato vuttaṃ, udānagāthāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1725_0: 5. Mucalindavatthumhi etamatthanti idāni vattabbamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Taṃ vivekanti
tika-vin06t:1725_1: upadhivivekaṃ. “Abyāpajjaṃ sukhaṃ loke”ti iminā paṭhamamaggaṃ dasseti tena sattesu
tika-vin06t:1725_3: dasseti. Maggī hi puggalo avasiṭṭhabyāpādatanuttavasena pāṇabhūtesu saṃyato hoti
tika-vin06t:1725_4: vihiṃsādhippāyābhāvato. Evaṃ cattāro hi maggā anukkamenāpi gahitā honti.
tika-vin06t:1728_0: 6. Rājāyatanaṃ pātali. “Catuddisā āgantvā”ti pāṭhaseso. Mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ kirassa dinnānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1728_1: catunnampi lekhāparicchedo atthi, te vāṇijā devatāya gāravadassanena bhagavato rūpakāyadassanena
tika-vin06t:1728_2: pasannattā saraṇaṃ aggahesuṃ. Devatāya “bhagavā rājāyatanamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti
tika-vin06t:1728_3: vacanaṃ sutvā sāvakasaṅghābhāvaṃ, abhisambuddhadhammasabbhāvañca jāniṃsūti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1731_0: 7. Adhigato kho myāyantiādimhi dhammoti catusaccadhammo, gambhīrattā duddaso. Duddasattā
tika-vin06t:1731_1: duranubodho. Santoti nibbuto. Paṇītoti atappako. Idaṃ dvayaṃ lokuttarameva sandhāya
tika-vin06t:1731_2: vuttaṃ. Atakkāvacaroti takkena ākāraparivitakkena ogāhitabbo na hoti, ñāṇeneva avacaritabboti
tika-vin06t:1731_3: attho. Paṇḍitavedanīyoti sammāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipannehi paṇḍitehi vedanīyo. Sabbasaṅkhārasamathotiādi
tika-vin06t:1731_4: sabbaṃ nibbānameva. Tañhi phalūpacārena ekampi samānaṃ tathā tathā vuccati. Rāmāti
tika-vin06t:1731_5: pajā. Anu anu acchariyā anacchariyā. Tesaṃ bhagavato pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ sutapubbānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1731_6: dhammassa vā gambhīrabhāvaṃ adhigatapubbānaṃ. Kiñcāpi bhagavato cattāropi maggā sukhappaṭipadā,
tika-vin06t:1731_7: tathāpi bodhisattapaṭipadaṃ sandhāya “kicchena me”ti vuttaṃ. “Pakāsitaṃ pakāsitu”nti
tika-vin06t:1731_8: ubhayathāpi pāṭho. Paretehi yuttehi. Rāgarattāti kāmarāgadiṭṭhirāgehi rattā. Attaniccādigāhakā
tika-vin06t:1732_0: 8. Sahaṃpati kira “nassati vata bho loko”ti imaṃ saddaṃ tathā nicchāreti, yathā dasasahassilokadhātubrahmāno
tika-vin06t:1732_1: sutvā sannipatiṃsu. Paññāmaye akkhimhi santānānusayitavasena appaṃ parittaṃ rāgādirajaṃ
tika-vin06t:1733_0: Samalehi satthārehi. Apāpuretanti vivara etaṃ. Amatassa dvāranti ariyamaggaṃ, catusaccadhammaṃ
tika-vin06t:1733_1: vā. Vijjattayacatumaggañāṇehi punappunaṃ buddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ. Seleti silāmaye. Vigatarajattā
tika-vin06t:1733_2: sukhadassanayogge ito ca etto ca āgantvā yathā ṭhito cakkhumā puriso samantato janataṃ
tika-vin06t:1733_3: passeyya. Tvampi sumedha sundarapañña sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamāya samantacakkhu. Sabbakilesasaṅgāmānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1734_0: 9. Buddhacakkhunā indriyaparopariyattañāṇena ca āsayānusayañāṇena ca. Imesañhi dvinnaṃ
tika-vin06t:1734_1: ñāṇānaṃ “buddhacakkhū”ti nāmaṃ. Uppaliniyanti uppalavane. Evaṃ sesesupi. Anto nimuggaposīnīti
tika-vin06t:1734_2: yāni anto nimuggāneva posiyanti, tattha yāni udakaṃ accuggamma ṭhitāni, tāni sūriyaraṃsisamphassaṃ
tika-vin06t:1734_3: āgamayamānāni ṭhitāni ajja pupphanakāni. Yāni samodakaṃ ṭhitāni, tāni sve pupphanakāni.
tika-vin06t:1734_4: Yāni udakānuggatāni, tāni tatiyadivase pupphanakāni. Udakā pana anuggatāni aññānipi
tika-vin06t:1734_5: sarogauppalādīni nāma honti. Yāni neva pupphissanti macchakacchapabhakkhāneva bhavissanti,
tika-vin06t:1734_6: tāni pāḷināruḷhāni, āharitvā pana dīpetabbāni. Etehi ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyo
tika-vin06t:1734_7: padaparamoti cattāro puggalā yojetabbā. Paccabhāsīti pati abhāsi.
tika-vin06t:1735: Apārutāti vivaṭā. Pacchimassa padadvayassa ayamattho. Ahañhi attano paguṇaṃ suppavattampi imaṃ paṇītaṃ uttamaṃ dhammaṃ kāyavācākilamathasaññī hutvā nābhāsi.
tika-vin06t:1738_0: 10. Idāni pana sabbo jano saddhābhājanaṃ upanetu, pūressāmi nesaṃ saṅkappanti. Apparajakkhajātikoti
tika-vin06t:1738_1: samāpattiyā vikkhambhitakilesattā nikkilesajātiko. Ājānissatīti ce na niṭṭhānamakaṃsu
tika-vin06t:1738_2: dhammasaṅgāhakā te vinayakkamaññā, ahaṃ deseyyaṃ paṭivijjhissatīti adhippāyo, “muddhāpi
tika-vin06t:1738_3: tassa vipateyyā”ti ettha viya abhūtaparikappo kireso. Loke tassa adhimuttabhāvadīpanatthañhi
tika-vin06t:1738_4: idaṃ vacanaṃ attano tadupadesena aviditabhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Tassa anantevāsikabhāvadīpanatthanti
tika-vin06t:1738_5: evamādīni panettha payojanāni. Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇanti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ tassa maraṇārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:1738_6: uppajji. Tena tato pubbe tassa sati dhammadesanāya khippaṃ jānanabhāvārammaṇanti
tika-vin06t:1738_7: dīpeti. Paropadesato ajānitvā paccakkhato maraṇasacchikiriyampi dasseti. Buddhānampi
tika-vin06t:1738_8: anekañāṇasamodhānābhāvato suvuttametaṃ. Cittapubbikā hi cittappavatti, aññathā navasattapātubhāvappasaṅgo.
tika-vin06t:1738_9: Sabbadhammānaṃ ekato gahaṇe viruddhakālānaṃ ekato jānanappasaṅgo. Tato ekañāṇassa
tika-vin06t:1738_10: vitathabhāvappattidoso, tasmā sabbassa vinānekañāṇasamodhānaṃ āpajjitadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇavantattā
tika-vin06t:1738_11: pana sabbaññū eva bhagavāti veditabbaṃ, na sabbakālaṃ ekato. Āḷārādīnaṃ maraṇājānanatoti
tika-vin06t:1738_12: ce? Na, tassa jānanena puthujjanassāpi sabbaññutāpattippasaṅgato. Yadābhāvena yadābhāvo
tika-vin06t:1738_13: tabbhāvena tassābhāvappasaṅgo loke siddhoti. “Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti vacanato
tika-vin06t:1738_14: tassa maraṇajānanaṃ siddhanti katvā bhavaṃ mateneva bhagavā sabbaññūti siddhaṃ na
tika-vin06t:1738_15: devatārocanato pubbe ajānanatoti ce? Na, visesaṃ pariggahetvā antarā pajānanato,
tika-vin06t:1738_16: devatāya sabbaññubhāvappattidosato ca. Na hi so kassaci vacanena aññāsīti.
tika-vin06t:1739_0: Apica kimidaṃ tattha jānanaṃ nāma tadārammaṇañāṇuppattīti ce? Na, loke sabbaññuno
tika-vin06t:1739_1: accantābhāvappasaṅgato. Sādhikā hi mayā ekañāṇakkhaṇe sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tadaññesañca
tika-vin06t:1739_2: tadaññāṇānuppatti. Apica sabbaññuno sabbadhammavisaye ñāṇapaccupaṭṭhānasiddhi tassa
tika-vin06t:1739_3: ñāṇassa attanāva attano avisayoti ce? Na, hetunidassanānuppattito. Apica “bhagavatopi
tika-vin06t:1739_4: kho ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti ettha visesavacanaṃ atthi. Yena devatārocanuttarakālameva bhagavato
tika-vin06t:1739_5: ñāṇaṃ udapādīti paññāyati. Na hi vacanapubbāpariyabhāvamattena tadatthapubbāpariyatā
tika-vin06t:1739_6: hoti, tasmā ayuttametaṃ. Abhidosakālaṃkatoti paṭhamayāme kālaṃkato. “Majjhimayāme”tipi
tika-vin06t:1739_7: vadanti. Ubhayatthapi mahājāniyo. Sattadivasabbhantare, ekadivasabbhantare ca pattabbamaggaphalato
tika-vin06t:1739_8: parihīnattā mahatī jāni assāti mahājāni. Tesu hi dvīsu āḷāro ākiñcaññāyatanabhave
tika-vin06t:1739_9: nibbatto, udako bhavagge, tasmā nesaṃ dhammadesanāya akkhaṇe nibbattabhāvaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:1739_10: bhagavā evaṃ cintesi, na ito manussalokato cutibhāvaṃ sandhāyāti veditabbaṃ. Abuddhaveneyyatañca
tika-vin06t:1739_11: sandhāyāti no takko, aññathā aniṭṭhappasaṅgoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1740_0: Bodhisattassa jātakāle supinapaṭiggāhakā ceva lakkhaṇapariggāhakā ca aṭṭha brāhmaṇā.
tika-vin06t:1740_1: Tesu tayo dvidhā byākariṃsu “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāraṃ ajjhāvasanto rājā
tika-vin06t:1740_2: hoti cakkavatti, pabbajanto buddho”ti. Pañca brāhmaṇā “agāre na tiṭṭhati, buddhova
tika-vin06t:1740_3: hotī”ti ekaṃsabyākaraṇāva ahesuṃ. Tesu purimā tayo yathāmantapāraṃ gatā. Ime pana
tika-vin06t:1740_4: mantapāraṃ atikkamantā attanā laddhaṃ puññamahattaṃ vissajjetvā bodhisattaṃ uddissa
tika-vin06t:1740_5: puretarameva pabbajiṃsu. Ime sandhāya vuttaṃ “pañcavaggiyā”ti. “Tesaṃ puttā”tipi
tika-vin06t:1740_6: vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ. Kasmā panettha bhagavā “bahūpakārā kho me”ti
tika-vin06t:1740_7: cintesi. Kiṃ upakārakānaṃ eva esa dhammaṃ deseti, itaresaṃ na desetīti? No na deseti.
tika-vin06t:1741_0: 11. Antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhinti gayāya ca bodhiyā ca majjhe tigāvutantare
tika-vin06t:1741_1: ṭhāne. Bodhimaṇḍato hi gayā tīṇi gāvutāni. Bārāṇasinagaraṃ aṭṭhārasa yojanāni. Upako
tika-vin06t:1741_2: pana bodhimaṇḍassa ca gayāya ca antare bhagavantaṃ addasa. Antarā-saddena pana yuttattā
tika-vin06t:1741_3: upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ. Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti,
tika-vin06t:1741_4: so dutiyapadepi yojetabbo. Ayojiyamāne pana upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Idha pana yojetvāva vuttoti.
tika-vin06t:1742_0: Sabbābhibhūti sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhito. Taṇhakkhayeti nibbāne.
tika-vin06t:1742_1: Vimuttoti ārammaṇato vimutto. Natthi me paṭipuggaloti mayhaṃ paṭipuggalo nāma natthi,
tika-vin06t:1742_2: asadisoti attho, mama sabbaññubhāve dosaṃ dassetvā loke ṭhātuṃ asamatthatāya mama
tika-vin06t:1742_3: paccatthikapuggalo vā natthīti attho. Āhañchaṃ amatadundubhinti dhammacakkhupaṭilābhāya
tika-vin06t:1743_0: Arahasi anantajino bhavituṃ yutto tvanti attho. Idampi attano satthunāmaṃ. Hupeyyāsīti
tika-vin06t:1743_1: āvuso evampi nāma bhaveyya. Pakkāmīti vaṅkahārajanapadaṃ nāma agamāsi. Bhagavāpi
tika-vin06t:1743_2: “tattha tassa migaluddakassa dhītuyā cāpāya ukkaṇṭhitvā puna āgantvā anāgāmī ayaṃ
tika-vin06t:1743_3: bhavissatī”ti upanissayasampattiṃ disvā tena saddhiṃ ālapi. So ca tathevāgantvā pabbajitvā
tika-vin06t:1743_4: anāgāmī hutvā anukkamena kālaṃ katvā avihesu uppajjitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-vin06t:1744_0: 12. Saṇṭhapesunti katikaṃ akaṃsu. Padhānavibbhantoti padhānato bhaṭṭho parihīno.
tika-vin06t:1744_1: “Abhijānātha nu bhāsitameta”nti, “vācaṃ bhāsitameva”nti ca evarūpaṃ kañci vacanabhedaṃ
tika-vin06t:1744_2: akāsīti adhippāyo. Bhagavantaṃ sussūsiṃsūti bhagavato vacanaṃ sotukāmā ahesuṃ. Aññāti
tika-vin06t:1745_0: 13. Atha kimatthaṃ āmantesīti? Tatopi suṭṭhutaraṃ paṭijānanatthaṃ, dhammassa abhibhāriyadullabhabhāvadīpanatthaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1745_1: akkharavikkhepanivāraṇatthañca. Tattha dvemeti antadvayavacanaṃ aññesampi tadantogadhabhāvato.
tika-vin06t:1745_2: Apica yojanāvasena. Taṇhāavijjāti hi saṃsārappavattiyā sīsabhūtā dve kilesā. Te ca
tika-vin06t:1745_3: samathavipassanānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtattā antā nāma. Tesu taṇhāvasena kāmasukhallikānuyogaṃ
tika-vin06t:1745_4: bhajanto samathaṃ parihāpeti bālo, tathā avijjāvasena attakilamathānuyogaṃ bhajanto
tika-vin06t:1745_5: gacchanto vipassananti na sakkā ubho dve ante appahāya amataṃ adhigantunti evaṃ vuttā.
tika-vin06t:1745_6: Apica līnuddhaccapahānadassanametaṃ. Līno hi nikkhittavīriyārambho kāmasukhañca bhajati,
tika-vin06t:1745_7: itaro accāraddhavīriyo attakilamathaṃ. Ubhopi te vīriyasamatāya paṭipakkhattā antā
tika-vin06t:1745_8: nāma. Apica tisso sāsane paṭipadā vuttā āgāḷhā, nijjhāmā, majjhimā ca. Tattha āgāḷhā
tika-vin06t:1745_9: “pāṇātipātī hoti, natthi kāmesu doso”ti evamādikā. Nijjhāmā “acelako hoti, muttācāro”ti
tika-vin06t:1745_10: evamādikā, majjhimā “ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti evamādikā. Tattha kāmasukhallikānuyogo
tika-vin06t:1745_11: āgāḷhā nāma paṭipadā hoti sabbākusalamūlattā. Attakilamathānuyogo nijjhāmā nāma attajjhāpanato.
tika-vin06t:1745_12: Ubhopete majjhimāya paṭipadāya paṭipakkhabhūtattā antā nāma, tasmā imeva sandhāya
tika-vin06t:1745_13: dvemeti. Kimatthaṃ bhagavā “pabbajitena na sevitabbā”ti pabbajite eva adhikaroti,
tika-vin06t:1745_14: na gahaṭṭheti? Pabbajitānaṃ tadadhimuttattā, sukhaparivajjanasamatthatāya, tadadhikatattā
tika-vin06t:1745_15: ca pabbajitā ettha adhikatā, na gahaṭṭhā. Yadi evaṃ kimatthaṃ kāmasukhallikānuyogamāha,
tika-vin06t:1745_16: nanu te pakatiyāpi kāmapariccāgaṃ katvā taṃ nissaraṇatthaṃ pabbajitāti? Na, tesaṃ
tika-vin06t:1745_17: antadvayanissitattā. Te hi idha loke kāmena visuddhimicchanti attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā
tika-vin06t:1745_18: tasseva tapassa phalena pecca dibbe kāme āsīsamānā daḷhataraṃ kāmasukhallikānuyogamanuyuttāti
tika-vin06t:1745_19: veditabbā. Antattho pana idha kucchitaṭṭhena veditabbo “antamidaṃ, bhikkhave, jīvikānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1746_0: Yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogoti ettha kāmesūti vatthukāmo adhippeto, dutiyo
tika-vin06t:1746_1: kilesakāmo. Taṃsampayuttasukhamettha kāmasukhaṃ nāma. Tena vipākasukhassa niravajjabhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:1746_2: dīpetīti. Allīyanaṃ nāma tadabhinandanā. Anuyogo nāma bhavantare tadanuyogapatthanā.
tika-vin06t:1746_4: lāmakaṭṭhena hīno. Gāmanivāsisattadhammattā gammo. Puthujjanasādhāraṇattā pothujjaniko.
tika-vin06t:1746_5: Anariyoti ariyānaṃ anadhippetattā, ariyadhammapaṭipakkhattā, anariyakarattā, anariyadhammattā,
tika-vin06t:1746_7: ca anatthasaṃhito. Attano kevalaṃ khedūpagamo attakilamatho nāma. So diṭṭhigatapubbakattatapānukkamakiriyāvisesaṃ
tika-vin06t:1746_8: nissāya pavattati, tassa diṭṭhivasena anuyogo attakilamathānuyogo nāma. Attaviyogavittāparissamattā,
tika-vin06t:1746_10: narakaṃ netīti anatthasaṃhito. Ete tvāti ete tu. Tathāgatenāti attānaṃ avitathāgamanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1746_11: āvi karoti, tenetaṃ dasseti “na mayā parivitakkitamattena vitakkitā, kintu mayā tathāgateneva
tika-vin06t:1746_12: satā abhisambodhiñāṇena abhisambuddho”ti. Cakkhukaraṇītiādīhi pana tameva paṭipadaṃ
tika-vin06t:1746_13: thometi. Bhesajjaṃ āturassa viya “cakkhukaraṇī”ti iminā ñāṇacakkhuvisodhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1746_14: Ñāṇakaraṇīti iminā andhakāravidhamanaṃ vuttaṃ. Upasamāyāti kilesapariḷāhapaṭippassaddhi
tika-vin06t:1746_15: vuttā. Abhiññāyāti saccapaṭivedhanaṃ vuttaṃ. Sambodhāyāti saccapaṭivijjhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1747_0: 14. Kasmā panettha bhagavā aññattha viya anupubbiṃ kathaṃ akathetvā paṭhamameva asevitabbamantadvayaṃ
tika-vin06t:1747_3: tesañca majjhimapaṭipadādīpanena tattha anuyojanatthaṃ pacchā sammāpaṭipadaṃ desesi,
tika-vin06t:1747_4: tato tassa majjhimapaṭipadāsaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa visayadassanatthaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ
tika-vin06t:1747_5: saṅkhepavitthāravasena desetukāmo “idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkha”ntiādimāha, ayamettha
tika-vin06t:1747_6: anusandhi. “Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti me, bhikkhave”tiādi suttānusandhipakaāsanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1747_7: ayamanukkamo veditabbo. Yathāvuttaṃ paṭipadaṃ sutvā kira koṇḍañño āha “kathaṃ bhagavatā
tika-vin06t:1747_8: vuttapaṭipadāya uppatti siyā. Ayañhi paṭipadā kilesānaṃ anuppattiyā sati sambhavati,
tika-vin06t:1747_9: na aññathā. Kilesānañca yadi lobhato uppatti khuppipāsānaṃ viya, tadāsevanāya anuppatti
tika-vin06t:1747_10: siyā, tadavatthussa vā tesaṃ uppatti. Tadavatthuviparītakāyakilamathāsevanāya anuppatti
tika-vin06t:1747_11: siyā. Ubhopetā bhagavatā ‘antā’ti vuttā, tasmā kathaṃ panetissāya sammāpaṭipadāya
tika-vin06t:1747_12: uppatti sambhaveyyā”ti. Bhagavā āha anupāyāsevanato. Kathanti ce? –
tika-vin06t:1749: Jīvite sati taṃ hoti, tañca jīvitasādhane.
tika-vin06t:1752: “Jīvitañca yathā loke, bhinne kāye na vijjati;
tika-vin06t:1774_0: Cintāmayissa paññāparipuṇṇā bhāvanāmayipaññāsampatti jānitabbā imehi iti bhagavā
tika-vin06t:1774_1: suttamidamāhāti kira. Kasmā bhagavā koṇḍaññassa purimameva saccadesanaṃ avaḍḍhetvā
tika-vin06t:1774_2: attano adhigatakkamamāhāti? Nāhaṃ kassaci āgamaṃ desemi, apica kho sayameva evamadhigatomhīti
tika-vin06t:1774_3: dassanatthaṃ. Tattha “pubbe ananussutesu dhammesū”ti iminā idaṃ atthadvayaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin06t:1774_4: na mayā āḷārato, udakato vā ayaṃ dhammo suto, kintu pubbe ananussutesveva ñāṇaṃ me
tika-vin06t:1774_5: udapādīti majjhimāya paṭipadāya ānubhāvaṃ pakāseti. Apica yasmā evaṃ paṭipanno vināpi
tika-vin06t:1774_6: paropadesena ariyasaccāni passati, tasmā kathaṃ tumheva mamāpadesena na passathāti.
tika-vin06t:1775_0: 15. Cakkhuntiādīni pañca padāni ñāṇavevacanāneva. Ñāṇañhi saccānaṃ ālocanato cakkhubhūtatthajānanato
tika-vin06t:1775_1: ñāṇaṃ. Pakārehi jānanato paññā. Kilesavidāraṇato, vijjanato ca vijjā. Saccacchādakatamavināsanato,
tika-vin06t:1775_2: tesaṃ gatikoṭipakāsanato ālokoti veditabbaṃ. Tattha paṭhamena parivaṭṭena saccānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1775_3: aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato ṭhapanapaññaṃ dasseti, dutiyena tesaṃ kattabbākāraparicchindanapaññaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1776_0: 16. Yāvakīvañcāti dvīhi padehi yāvaicceva vuttaṃ hoti “iti cittamano”tiādi viya.
tika-vin06t:1776_1: Rāgādīhi akuppatāya akuppā vimutti. Veyyākaraṇanti dhammadesanā. Sā hi dhammānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1776_2: byākaraṇato pakāsanato “veyyākaraṇa”nti vuccati. Virajaṃ vītamalanti ettha virajaṃ
tika-vin06t:1776_4: Vītamalaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhippahānato. Virajaṃ pariyuṭṭhānappahānato. Vītamalaṃ anusayappahānato.
tika-vin06t:1776_5: Dhammacakkhunti dhammamattadassanaṃ, na tattha satto vā jīvo vā kārako vā vedako
tika-vin06t:1776_6: vāti, tenevāha “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbantaṃ nirodhadhamma”nti. Idañhi tassa
tika-vin06t:1776_7: dhammacakkhussa uppattiākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tañhi nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccavasena
tika-vin06t:1777_0: 17. Dhammacakkanti ettha desanāñāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ, paṭivedhañāṇañca labbhateva. Ettha
tika-vin06t:1777_3: cāti evamādīnettha kāraṇāni vadanti. Pathavikampanamahāsaddapātubhāvo ca dhammatāvaseneva
tika-vin06t:1777_4: hotīti eke. Devatānaṃ kīḷitukāmatāya pathavikampo. Bahuno devasaṅghassa sannipātato,
tika-vin06t:1778_1: Tadavasāno hi tassa bhikkhubhāvo. Svākkhātotiādi “ehī”ti āmantanāya payojanadassanavacanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1778_2: “Ehibhikkhū”ti bhagavā avoca “svākkhāto dhammo cara…pe… kiriyāyā”ti ca avocāti padasambandho.
tika-vin06t:1778_3: Tattha cara brahmacariyanti avasiṭṭhaṃ maggattayabrahmacariyaṃ samadhigaccha. Kimatthaṃ?
tika-vin06t:1778_4: Sammādukkhassantakiriyāyāti attho. “Ehibhikkhū”ti iminā bhagavato vacanena nipphannattā
tika-vin06t:1778_5: kāraṇūpacārena “ehibhikkhūpasampadā”ti vuttā. Sāva tassāyasmato yāvajīvaṃ upasampadā
tika-vin06t:1778_6: ahosīti attho. Tena tassā upasampadāya sikkhāpaccakkhātādinā vicchedā vā tadaññāya
tika-vin06t:1778_7: upasampadāya kiccaṃ vā natthīti idamatthadvayaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dasseti. Aṭṭhannampi
tika-vin06t:1778_9: catunnaṃ aññatarāya upasampannassa antarā vicchedo vā tadaññūpasampadāya kiccaṃ vā
tika-vin06t:1778_12: bhinditvā dasavidhopasampadā”ti. Kā panettha atthato upasampadā nāmāti? Tadadhigatakiriyāvasena
tika-vin06t:1778_14: Kā panettha paribhāvanā nāma? Tabbipakkhadhammajjhācāraviruddhabhāvo, tassa pattiyā
tika-vin06t:1778_15: tāya paribhāvanāya vasena katthaci “samannāgato”ti vuccati. Yathāha “lobhena samannāgato,
tika-vin06t:1778_16: bhikkhave, abhabbo cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni bhāvetu”ntiādi. Etthāhu nikāyantarikā “yathāvuttāya
tika-vin06t:1778_17: upasampadāya pattisaṅkhāto cittavippayutto saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno dhammo atthi,
tika-vin06t:1778_18: tassa santativasena pubbāpariyaṃ uppajjamānassa yāva avicchedo, tāva upasampannoti,
tika-vin06t:1778_19: aññathā tato dhammantaruppattikkhaṇe tassa upasampannassa anupasampannabhāvappasaṅgo
tika-vin06t:1778_20: āpajjatī”ti. Te vattabbā “suttaṃ āharathā”ti. Te ce vadeyyuṃ “yo tesaṃ dasannaṃ asekkhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1778_21: dhammānaṃ upādāya paṭilābhasamannāgamo ariyo hoti vippahīnoti evamādīni no suttānī”ti.
tika-vin06t:1778_22: Evaṃ sati asantadhammehi, parasattehi ca samannāgamadosappasaṅgo nesaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin06t:1778_23: Kiṃkāraṇaṃ? Suttasambhavato. Yathāha – “rājā, bhikkhave, cakkavattī sattahi ratanehi
tika-vin06t:1778_24: samannāgato hotī”ti vitthāro. Vasibhāvo tattha samannāgatasaddena vutto. Tassahitesu
tika-vin06t:1778_25: ratanesu vasibhāvo kāmacāro atthīti ce? Ettha vasibhāvo samannāgamasaddena vutto,
tika-vin06t:1778_26: aññattha pattisaṅkhāto, taṃ dhammantaranti. Kimettha visesakāraṇaṃ? Natthi ca, tasmā
tika-vin06t:1778_27: yathāvuttalakkhaṇāva upasampadā. Ayameva nayo pabbajjādīsupi netabbo.
tika-vin06t:1779_0: 19. Kiñcāpi vappattherassa pāṭipadadivase…pe… assajittherassa catutthiyanti evaṃ
tika-vin06t:1779_1: nānādivasesu pāṭekkaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi, tathāpi ovādasāmaññena vappabhaddiyānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1780_0: 20. “Rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, anattā”ti kimatthaṃ āditova anattalakkhaṇaṃ dīpetīti? Tesaṃ
tika-vin06t:1780_1: puthujjanakālepi itaralakkhaṇadvayassa pākaṭattā. Te hi manāpānaṃ kāmānaṃ aniccatādassanena
tika-vin06t:1780_2: saṃviggā pabbajiṃsūti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ tāva nesaṃ ekadesena pākaṭaṃ, pabbajitānañca
tika-vin06t:1780_3: attakilamathānuyogato kāyikadukkhaṃ, tañca mānasassa paccayoti mānasikadukkhañca
tika-vin06t:1780_4: pākaṭaṃ, tasmā tadubhayaṃ vajjitvā anattalakkhaṇameva dīpetuṃ ārabhi. Tañca dīpento
tika-vin06t:1780_5: dukkhalakkhaṇeneva dīpetuṃ “rūpañca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissā”tiādimāha. Kimatthanti?
tika-vin06t:1780_6: Aniccalakkhaṇatopi tesaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇassa suṭṭhutaraṃ pākaṭattā. Tesañhi attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttattā,
tika-vin06t:1780_7: tapparāyaṇabhāvato ca dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ suṭṭhu pākaṭaṃ, tasmā tena tāva suṭṭhu pākaṭena
tika-vin06t:1780_8: anattalakkhaṇaṃ dīpetvā puna tadeva tadubhayenāpi dīpetuṃ “taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:1780_9: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti vakkhati. Kallaṃ nūti yuttaṃ nu. Etaṃ mamāti taṇhāggāho.
tika-vin06t:1780_10: Esohamasmīti mānaggāho. Eso me attāti diṭṭhiggāho. Taṇhāggāho cettha aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritavasena,
tika-vin06t:1783_0: 25. Yena samayena bhagavā pañcavaggiye pañcamiyaṃ arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā sattamiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1783_1: nāḷakattherassa nāḷakapaṭipadaṃ ācikkhitvā bhaddapadapuṇṇamāyaṃ yasassa indriyānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1783_2: paripakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ udikkhanto bārāṇasiyaṃ vihāsi, tena samayena yaso nāmāti
tika-vin06t:1783_3: sambandho. Tassa kira uppattito paṭṭhāya tassa kulassa kittisaddasaṅkhāto, parijanasaṅkhāto
tika-vin06t:1783_4: vā yaso visesato pavaḍḍhati. Tena tassa mātāpitaro evaṃ nāmamakaṃsu. “Sukhumālo”tiādi
tika-vin06t:1783_5: kimatthaṃ āyasmatā upālittherena vuttanti? Pacchimajanassa nekkhamme samussāhanajananatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1783_6: Evaṃ uttamabhogasamappitānampi uttamesu bhogesu appamattakenāpi asubhanimittena vitajjetvā
tika-vin06t:1783_7: kālākālaṃ agaṇetvā vivekābhiratiyā mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ tiṇaṃ viya pahāya gehato
tika-vin06t:1783_8: nikkhamanā ahosi, kassa panaññassa na siyāti adhippāyo. Samaṅgībhūtassāti tehi ekattaṃ
tika-vin06t:1783_9: upagatassa, avivittassāti attho. Niddā okkamīti manāpesupi visayesu pavattiṃ nivāretvā
tika-vin06t:1783_10: tassa cittaṃ atikkamitvā abhibhavitvā attano vasaṃ upanesīti attho. Sabbarattiyo
tika-vin06t:1783_11: cāti tayopi yāme. Tena parijanassa vikāradassane kāraṇaṃ dasseti. Ratti-saddo panettha
tika-vin06t:1783_12: kāle sūriyābhāve, yāme ca pavattatīti viññeyyo. Yāmevidha viññeyyo ticīvaravippavāse
tika-vin06t:1783_13: ca. Kaccheti kacchapasse. Kaṇṭheti kaṇṭhassa heṭṭhā. Mudiṅgassa hi upari kaṇṭhaṃ
tika-vin06t:1783_14: ṭhapetvā sayantiyā kaṇṭhe mudiṅgaṃ addasāti attho. Āḷambaranti paṇavaṃ. Ubhatomukhassa
tika-vin06t:1783_15: tanukā dīghā. Vitthinnasamatalassa vāditassa etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Vippalapantiyoti supinadassanādivasena
tika-vin06t:1783_16: asambandhapalāpaṃ vippalapantiyo. Susānaṃ maññeti susānaṃ viya addasa sakaṃ parijananti
tika-vin06t:1783_17: sambandho. Ādīnavoti asubhabhāvo. Nibbidāya cittaṃ saṇṭhātīti vimuccitukāmatāsaṅkhātāya
tika-vin06t:1783_18: ukkaṇṭhāya cittaṃ namīti attho. Udānaṃ udānesīti “ito paṭṭhāya imāhi itthīhi saha
tika-vin06t:1783_19: nāhaṃ bhavissāmī”ti attamanavācaṃ nicchāresi. Dve kira ākārā tassa pamādasuttaparijanadassane
tika-vin06t:1783_20: pākaṭā jātā kilesānaṃ balavabhāvo, asubhākārassa atioḷārikabhāvo ca. Evaṃ sati oḷārikatare
tika-vin06t:1783_21: ca asubhākāre kilesavasenāyaṃ sabbopi loko ettha pīḷito mucchito. Aho kilesā balavatarāti
tika-vin06t:1783_22: hi passato passato tassa dvepi te ākārā pākaṭā jātā, yenevamavocāti.
tika-vin06t:1784_0: “Suvaṇṇapādukāyo ārohitvā”ti etenassa nissaṅgatāya vissaṭṭhagamanaṃ dīpeti. So hi
tika-vin06t:1784_1: balavasaṃvegābhitunnahadayattā parijanassa pabodhe satipi attano gamananivāraṇasamatthabhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:1784_2: asahamāno attānaṃ takkento vissaṭṭho agamāsi. Amanussāti devatā. Tā hi manussehi
tika-vin06t:1784_4: tiracchānādayo “abrāhmaṇā”ti vā “avasalā”ti vā vuccanti, kintu jātisabhāgatāya eva
tika-vin06t:1784_5: vasalādayo “abrāhmaṇā”ti vuccanti, evaṃ manussehi kenaci ākārena sabhāgatāya devatā
tika-vin06t:1784_6: “amanussā”ti vuttā. Aññathā manussā na hontīti tiracchānagatāpi “amanussā”ti vattabbā bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-vin06t:1785_0: 26. Vanagahanaṃ disvā “sumuttohaṃ nagarato”ti pamuditattā bhagavato avidūre udānesi.
tika-vin06t:1785_1: Idaṃ kho yasāti bhagavā nibbānaṃ sandhāyāha. Tañhi taṇhādikilesehi anupaddutaṃ, anupasaṭṭhatañca
tika-vin06t:1785_2: dassanamattenāpi assādajananato. Dhammaṃ desessāmīti yena taṃ nibbānaṃ idha nisinnamattova
tika-vin06t:1785_3: tvaṃ adhigamissasīti adhippāyo. Kirāti assaddheyyaabyattiparihāsesu nipāto, idha
tika-vin06t:1785_4: abyattiyaṃ. Suvaṇṇapādukāyo orohitvāti ca suvaṇṇapādukāhi otaritvā. Nissakkatthe
tika-vin06t:1785_5: hi idaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. Tassa nisinnamattasseva aññaṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ akatvā
tika-vin06t:1785_6: anāmantetvā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi. Suparipakkindriyattā, paṭivedhakkhaṇānatikkamanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1785_8: acirāgamanadassanato ca. Kimatthaṃ bhagavā tassa suṭṭhutaraṃ saṃviggahadayassa bhavato
tika-vin06t:1785_10: So hi manussalokasseva upaddutaupasaṭṭhabhāvaṃ addasa, na saggānanti kadāci saggalokaṃ
tika-vin06t:1785_11: sukhato maññeyya. Tattha sukhasaññena nibbānābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ peseyyāti saggānampi
tika-vin06t:1785_12: ādīnavaṃ dassetukāmatāya anupubbiṃ kathaṃ ārabhi. Ettha dānaṃ, dānānisaṃsaṃ, sīlānisaṃsañca
tika-vin06t:1785_13: kathento dānasīlakathaṃ katheti nāma. Saggavaṇṇaṃ kathento saggakathaṃ katheti nāma.
tika-vin06t:1785_14: Tattha vatthukāmakilesakāmānaṃ aniccataṃ, apasādataṃ, mahādīnavatañca kathento kāmānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1785_15: ādīnavaṃ, okāraṃ, saṃkilesañca pakāseti. Nekkhamme tadabhāvato ca taṃnissaraṇato
tika-vin06t:1785_16: ca tabbiparītaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ kathento nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāseti nāma. Tattha okāranti
tika-vin06t:1785_17: avakāraṃ lāmakabhāvaṃ. Saṃkilesanti saṃkilissanaṃ bādhanaṃ upatāpanaṃ vāti attho.
tika-vin06t:1785_20: cittamudutādikusaladhammappavesanaṃ karontaṃ sahajātaṃ cittaṃ muduṃ karoti. Samādhindriyassa
tika-vin06t:1785_21: ānubhāvena vinīvaraṇacittaṃ. Tañhi visesato nīvaraṇavipakkhabhūtanti. Vīriyindriyavasena
tika-vin06t:1785_23: pasannacittaṃ tassa pasādalakkhaṇattā. Sāmukkaṃsikāti etaṃ visayavasena desanaṃ upālitthero
tika-vin06t:1785_24: pakāseti. Saccāni hi sāmukkaṃsikadesanāya visayāni. Aññathā dukkhādīni sāmukkaṃsikā
tika-vin06t:1785_25: dhammadesanāti āpajjati tassa vibhāvane saccānaṃ niddiṭṭhattā.
tika-vin06t:1786_0: 27. Catuddisāti catūsu disāsu. Abhisaṅkharesīti abhisaṅkhari. Kimatthanti ce? Ubhinnaṃ
tika-vin06t:1786_1: paṭilabhitabbavisesantarāyanisedhanatthaṃ. Yadi so puttaṃ passeyya, puttassapi dhammacakkhupaṭilābho
tika-vin06t:1786_2: arahattuppatti, seṭṭhissapi dhammacakkhupaṭilābho na siyā. Diṭṭhasaccopi “dehi te
tika-vin06t:1786_3: mātuyā jīvita”nti vadanto kimaññaṃ na kareyya. Yasopi taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā arahāpi samāno
tika-vin06t:1786_4: sayaṃ appaṭikkhipitvā bhagavantaṃ ullokento kimaññāya saṇṭhaheyya.
tika-vin06t:1787_0: 28. Ubhohipi pattabbavisesakoṭiyā pattattā bhagavā puna taṃ paṭippassambhesi. Pubbe
tika-vin06t:1787_1: agārikabhūtoti tassa sotāpannakālaṃ sandhāyāha. Sotāpanno hi agāramajjhe vasanārahattā
tika-vin06t:1787_2: agāriyabhūto nāma hoti apabbajito. Sampati pabbajito samāno agāramajjhavasanassa
tika-vin06t:1787_3: abhabbattā “agāriko”ti na vuccati, tasmā evamāha. Yassa diṭṭhoti sambandho, yena
tika-vin06t:1787_4: diṭṭhoti vuttaṃ hoti. “Seyyathāpi pubbe agārikabhūto”ti vacanena laddhanayattā pacchā
tika-vin06t:1787_5: gahapati gihivesadhārimeva yasaṃ sandhāyāha “yasena kulaputtena pacchāsamaṇenā”ti.
tika-vin06t:1787_6: Tattha cara brahmacariyanti ābhisamācārikasīlaṃ brahmacariyaṃ cara paripūrehi tāva,
tika-vin06t:1787_7: yāva sammādukkhassantakiriyā, yāva cuticittāti adhippāyo. Liṅgabrahmacariyaṃ sandhāyāti
tika-vin06t:1787_8: porāṇā, tañca yuttaṃ. Liṅgamattañhi sandhāya so āyasmā “labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, pabbajjaṃ upasampada”nti āha.
tika-vin06t:1788_0: Kimatthaṃ bhagavā yasassa mātu, pajāpatiyā ca bhattakiccaṃ akatvāva dhammaṃ desesīti?
tika-vin06t:1788_1: Yasassa pabbajjāya sokasallasamappitattā dānañca somanassikacittena na dadeyyuṃ,
tika-vin06t:1788_2: satthari ca domanassappattā hutvā maggapaṭivedhampi na labheyyunti bhagavā paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin06t:1788_3: tāva tā vigatasokasallahadayāyo katvā puna bhattakiccaṃ akāsi.
tika-vin06t:1789_0: 30. Seṭṭhānuseṭṭhīnanti anukkamaseṭṭhīnanti porāṇā. “Seṭṭhino cānuseṭṭhino ca yāni
tika-vin06t:1789_1: kulāni, tāni seṭṭhānuseṭṭhāni kulāni, tesaṃ seṭṭhānuseṭṭhīnaṃ kulāna”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1789_2: Dhammavinayoti sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ pāvacananti idha atthato ekaṃ. Atha vā dhammena
tika-vin06t:1789_3: vinayo, na daṇḍasatthehīti dhammavinayo, dhammāya vinayo, na hiṃsatthanti vā dhammato
tika-vin06t:1789_4: vinayo, nādhammatoti vā dhammo vinayo, nādhammoti vā dhammānaṃ vinayo, na aññesanti
tika-vin06t:1789_5: vā dhammakāyattā, dhammasāmittā vā dhammo bhagavā, tassa dhammassa vinayo, na takkikānanti
tika-vin06t:1789_6: vā dhammavinayo. Samānādhikaraṇavasena vā dhammavinayo nīluppalaṃ viya, dhammo ca
tika-vin06t:1789_7: vinayo cāti dhammavinayo phalāphalaṃ viya napuṃsakamiti pulliṅgāpadesato assa liṅgabhāvo
tika-vin06t:1789_8: siddho, yassa vā dhammo vinayo, so dhammavinayo setapaṭo puriso viya, dhammena yutto
tika-vin06t:1789_9: vā vinayo dhammavinayo assaratho viyāti evamādinā nayena yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:1790_1: vihāre aññampi etassa kese chindā”ti vattuṃ na vaṭṭatīti. Pabbājetvāti imassa adhippāyapakāsanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1790_2: “kāsāyāni acchādetvā ehī”ti vuttaṃ. Upajjhāyo ce kesamassuoropanādīni akatvā pabbajatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1790_3: saraṇāni deti, na ruhati pabbajjā. Kammavācaṃ sāvetvā upasampādeti, ruhati upasampadā.
tika-vin06t:1790_4: Appattacīvarānaṃ upasampadāsiddhidassanato, kammavipattiyā abhāvato cetaṃ yujjatevāti eke. Hoti cettha –
tika-vin06t:1793_0: Bhikkhunā hi sahatthena vā āṇattiyā vā dinnameva kāsāvaṃ vaṭṭati, adinnaṃ na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin06t:1793_1: pana santesveva kāsāvesu, nāsantesu asambhavatoti tesaṃ adhippāyo. Evañca pana, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:1793_2: pabbājetabbo upasampādetabbo. Paṭhamaṃ…pe…anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi
tika-vin06t:1793_3: pabbajjaṃ upasampadanti ettha iminā anukkamena dinnehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjaṃ
tika-vin06t:1796_0: Ācariyo. Ācariyena adinnaṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha “pabbajjā na ruhatīti vadantī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1796_1: Porāṇagaṇṭhipadepi tatheva likhitaṃ. Urādīni ṭhānāni nāma. Saṃvutādīni karaṇāni nāma.
tika-vin06t:1796_2: “Anunāsikantaṃ katvā ekasambandhaṃ katvā dānakāle antarā aṭṭhatvā vattabbaṃ. Vicchinditvā
tika-vin06t:1796_3: dānepi yathāvuttaṭṭhāne eva vicchedo, aññatra na vaṭṭatī”ti likhitaṃ. Anunāsikante
tika-vin06t:1796_4: diyyamāne khalitvā “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti makārena missībhūte khette otiṇṇattā
tika-vin06t:1796_5: vaṭṭatīti upatissatthero. Missaṃ katvā vattuṃ vaṭṭati, vacanakāle pana anunāsikaṭṭhāne
tika-vin06t:1796_6: vicchedaṃ akatvā vattabbanti dhammasiritthero. “Evaṃ kammavācāyampī”ti vuttaṃ. Ubhatosuddhiyāva
tika-vin06t:1796_7: vaṭṭatīti ettha mahāthero patitadantādikāraṇatāya acaturassaṃ katvā vadati, byattasāmaṇero
tika-vin06t:1796_8: samīpe ṭhito pabbajjāpekkhaṃ byattaṃ vadāpeti. Mahātherena avuttaṃ vadāpetīti na
tika-vin06t:1796_9: vaṭṭati. Kammavācāya itaro bhikkhu ce vadati, vaṭṭatīti. Saṅgho hi kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:1796_10: na puggaloti. Na nānāsīmapavattakammavācāsāmaññanayena paṭikkhipitabbattā. Atha therena
tika-vin06t:1796_11: caturassaṃ vuttaṃ pabbajjāpekkhaṃ vattuṃ asakkontaṃ sāmaṇero sayaṃ vatvā vadāpeti,
tika-vin06t:1796_12: ubhatosuddhi eva hoti therena vuttasseva vuttattā. Buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchanto asādhāraṇe
tika-vin06t:1796_13: buddhaguṇe, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchanto nibbānaṃ, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchanto sekkhadhammaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1796_14: asekkhadhammañca saraṇaṃ gacchatīti aggahitaggahaṇavasena yojanā kātabbā. Aññathā
tika-vin06t:1796_17: pūretabbaṃ. Tattha cārittassa akaraṇe vārittassa karaṇe daṇḍakammāraho hotīti dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:1799: 35. “Tena hetunā”ti vacanato pāḷiyaṃ “yonisomanasikārāsammappadhānā”ti hetvatthe nissakkavacananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1802_0: 37-8. Vaseyyāmāti “tvañca ahañca vaseyyāmā”ti piyavacanena tassa saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1802_1: vuttaṃ kira. Tejasā tejanti ānubhāvena ānubhāvaṃ. Tejodhātuyā vā tejodhātuṃ. Ubhinnaṃ
tika-vin06t:1802_2: sajotibhūtānanti anādaratthe sāmivacanaṃ, bhāvasattamīatthe vā. Agyāgārameva ādittaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1802_3: na tattha vasanako sattajātiko. Acinteyyo hi iddhivisayo. Kasmā pana bhagavā agyāgārampi
tika-vin06t:1802_5: Kimatthaṃ parasantakaṃ mahāsambhārapavattaṃ taṃ vināsetīti? Puna yathāporāṇaṃ iddhānubhāvena
tika-vin06t:1802_6: kattukāmatādhippāyato. Pariyādinnoti khayaṃ nīto. Tejasā tejanti ānubhāvena ānubhāvaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1802_7: Agyāgārassa parittattā itaro attho na sambhavati. Ayamattho “makkhaṃ asahamāno”ti
tika-vin06t:1802_8: iminā ativiya sameti. Iddhānubhāvamakkhanañhi tattha makkho nāma. Pattenāti padumapattenātipi
tika-vin06t:1802_9: porāṇā. Paduminisaṇḍe ṭhito hi bhagavā tattha ahosīti tesaṃ mati.
tika-vin06t:1803_0: 39. Dinnanti anumatinti attho. Abhīto nibbhayo. Kasmā? Yato so maggena bhayamatīto.
tika-vin06t:1803_1: “Sumanamanasoti sundaracittasaṅkhātamano. Sumano eva vā”ti likhitaṃ. Tejovāti aggi
tika-vin06t:1803_2: viya. Dhātukusaloti tejodhātumhi kusalo. “Byavahitā ce”ti saddalakkhaṇattā ca upasaggo.
tika-vin06t:1803_4: ca likhitaṃ. Iti evaṃ bhaṇantīti attho. Hatāti samāti attho, kāḷakāva hontīti kirettha
tika-vin06t:1803_5: adhippāyo. Īsakampi byāpāraṃ akatvā upasamānurūpaṃ tiṭṭhanti. Ye ca anekavaṇṇā acciyo
tika-vin06t:1805_0: 44. Paṃsukūlaṃ uppannanti pariyesamānassa paṭilābhavasena uppannaṃ hoti. Cittavicittapāṭihīradassanatthāya
tika-vin06t:1805_1: ca sā pariyesanā. Sā ayaṃ sāyaṃ. Tā imā tayimā. Dve ekato gahetvā vadati. Āyāmi ahaṃ
tika-vin06t:1805_2: āyamahaṃ. Etanti etassa. Yathā mayanti yasmā mayaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1806_0: 50-51. Udakavāhakoti udakogho. Udakasototi porāṇā. “Yāya tva”nti pubbabhāgavipassanāpaṭipadaṃ
tika-vin06t:1806_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Cirapaṭikāti cirapabhuti, nāgadamanato paṭṭhāya cirapaṭikā. “Cirapaṭisaṅkhā”tipi
tika-vin06t:1806_2: vadanti. Kesamissantiādimhi abbokiṇṇaṃ visuṃ visuṃ bandhitvā pakkhittattā kesādayova
tika-vin06t:1806_3: kesamissāti porāṇā. Khārikājamissanti ettha khārī vuccati tāpasaparikkhāro. Jaṭile
tika-vin06t:1806_4: pāhesīti dve tayo tāpase pāhesi. “Soḷasātirekaaḍḍhauḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1807_0: 54. Aggihutte kataparicayattā bhagavā tesaṃ ādittapariyāya-mabhāsi. Tattha ekaccaṃ
tika-vin06t:1807_1: ārammaṇavasena ādittaṃ cakkhādi rāgagginā, ekaccaṃ sampayogavasena cakkhusamphassapaccayā
tika-vin06t:1807_2: vedayitādikeneva, ekaccaṃ abhibhūtatthena cakkhādi eva jātiādinā, ekaccaṃ paccayatthena,
tika-vin06t:1807_3: tadeva sokādināti yathāsambhavamettha ādittatā veditabbā. Ettha kiñcāpi dukkhalakkhaṇamevekaṃ
tika-vin06t:1807_4: pākaṭaṃ, tadanusārena pana itaraṃ lakkhaṇadvayampi tehi diṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ dukkhākārassa
tika-vin06t:1810_0: 55-7. Vatthukāmabhūtā itthiyo kāmitthiyo. Dutiyādayo assāsakā. Yasmā anuppanne eva
tika-vin06t:1810_1: bhagavati buddhakolāhalaṃ loke paṭhamameva vassasahassaṃ uppajjati. Brahmāno ca brāhmaṇavaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:1810_2: abhinimminitvā vedesu sahassattayamattaṃ buddhapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ pariyattiṃ pakkhipitvā
tika-vin06t:1810_3: vācenti, bhagavato jātito paṭṭhāya ca buddhakathā lakkhaṇaññūhi brāhmaṇehi uppāditā,
tika-vin06t:1810_4: patthaṭā loke, tasmā yujjanti, na aññathā. “Tamaddasa bimbisāro, pāsādasmiṃ patiṭṭhito”tiādigāthāhi
tika-vin06t:1811_0: 58. Idhāvuso khīṇāsavo bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti chaḷaṅgasamannāgato ekārakkho
tika-vin06t:1811_2: suvimuttacitto suvimuttapaññoti dasa ariyavāsā nāma. Rūpārūpasamāpattiyo aṭṭha nirodhasamāpatti
tika-vin06t:1811_3: mahākaruṇāsamāpattītipi porāṇā. Tattha nīvaraṇā pañcaṅgā ca. Chaḷaṅgupekkhā chaḷaṅgā.
tika-vin06t:1811_4: Satārakkhena ekārakkhā. Saṅkhāya ekaṃ paṭisevati, adhivāseti, parivajjeti, saṅkhāya
tika-vin06t:1811_5: ekaṃ vinodetīti ayaṃ caturāpasseno. Puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ puthupaccekasaccāni cattāri
tika-vin06t:1811_6: pahīnāni, evaṃ paṇunnapaccekasacco. Kāmesanā bhavesanā pahīnā hoti, brahmacariyesanā
tika-vin06t:1811_7: paṭippassaddhā, evaṃ samavayasaṭṭhesano. Kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāsaṅkappo pahīno hoti,
tika-vin06t:1811_8: evaṃ anāvilasaṅkappo, sukhassa ca pahānā…pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati
tika-vin06t:1811_9: evaṃ suvimuttacitto hoti. Rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo…pe… anuppādadhammoti pajānāti,
tika-vin06t:1811_10: doso, moho anuppādadhammoti pajānāti, evaṃ suvimuttapaññoti.
tika-vin06t:1816: Imāni dasa balāni. Asekkhaṅgāni nāma asekkhā sammādiṭṭhi…pe… asekkhavimutti asekkhavimuttiñāṇadassananti. Tattha dasamaṃ asekkhaṃ. Etehi dasahi cupeto pāramīhīti porāṇā.
tika-vin06t:1819_0: 60. Kiṃ kāhasīti kiṃ kāhati. “Kiṃ karoti, kiṃ karosī”ti vā byañjanaṃ bahuṃ vatvāti
tika-vin06t:1819_1: attho. Paṭipādentoti nigamento. “Paccabyathā, paccabyatha”ntipi paṭhanti. Kappanahutehīti
tika-vin06t:1819_2: ettha dasakānaṃ sataṃ sahassaṃ, sahassānaṃ sataṃ satasahassaṃ, satasahassānaṃ sataṃ
tika-vin06t:1819_3: koṭi, koṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ pakoṭi, pakoṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ koṭipakoṭi, koṭipakoṭisatasahassānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1819_4: sataṃ nahutanti veditabbaṃ. Kappanahutehīti evamanusārato abbhatītaṃ nāmāti khandhakabhāṇakānaṃ pāṭhoti.
tika-vin06t:1820: 63. “Kulacchedāyā”ti pāṭho, kulupacchedāyāti attho. Manussā “dhammena kira samaṇā sakyaputtiyā nayanti, nādhammenā”ti na puna codesunti evaṃ pāṭhasesena sambandho kātabbo.
tika-vin06t:1821: Ettāvatā thero nidānaṃ niṭṭhapesīti veditabbaṃ. Honti cettha –
tika-vin06t:1832_0: 64. Buddhupajjhāyakānaṃ itaresaṃ ehibhikkhūnaṃ nivāsanapārupanakappato nesaṃ visuṃ
tika-vin06t:1832_1: visuṃ sadisattā “dunnivatthā duppārutā anākappasampannā”ti vuttā. Na kevalañca itthambhūtā
tika-vin06t:1832_2: piṇḍāya caranti, apica manussānaṃ bhuñjamānānaṃ uparītiādi. Manussā ujjhāyanti pipāsāsahanato,
tika-vin06t:1833_0: 65. Kena ko upajjhāyo gahetabboti? “Tadā so yassa santike pabbājito, etarahi yassa
tika-vin06t:1833_1: santike upasampadāpekkho hoti. Upajjhāyena ca sādhūti sampaṭicchanaṃ sandhāyā”ti
tika-vin06t:1833_2: kehici likhitaṃ. Taṃ te evaṃ jānanti “upajjhāyena ‘sāhū’tiādinā sampaṭicchite saddhivihārikassa
tika-vin06t:1833_3: ‘sādhu suṭṭhu sampaṭicchāmī’ti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ bhikkhūhi āciṇṇameva, na katthaci
tika-vin06t:1833_4: dissati, tasmā vināpi tena upajjhāyo gahitova hotī”ti. Tattha sāhūti sādhūti vuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:1833_5: hoti. Lahūti lahu, tvaṃ mama na bhāriyosīti vuttaṃ hoti. Opāyikanti upāyapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1833_6: iminā upāyena tvaṃ me ito paṭṭhāya bhāro jātosīti attho. Patirūpanti anurūpaṃ te
tika-vin06t:1834_0: 66. Tādisameva mukhadhovanodakaṃ utumhi ekasabhāgeti. Ito paṭṭhāyāti “na upajjhāyassa
tika-vin06t:1834_1: bhaṇamānassā”ti ettha vuttana-kārato paṭṭhāya. Tena “nātidūre gantabbaṃ, nāccāsanne
tika-vin06t:1834_2: gantabba”nti ettha vuttana-kārena anāpattīti dīpetīti eke. Sacittakā ayaṃ āpatti,
tika-vin06t:1834_3: udāhu acittakāti? Anādariyapaccayattā sacittakā. Anādariyapaccayatā kathaṃ paññāyatīti
tika-vin06t:1834_4: ce? Anādariyapaccayehi saṅgahitanti. Pātimokkhuddese sekhiyānaṃ gaṇaparicchedākaraṇañhi
tika-vin06t:1834_5: khandhakapariyāpannāpattiyā saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ. Idaṃ pana lakkhaṇaṃ cāritteyeva veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1834_6: na vāritte akappiyamaṃsakhādanādiāpattīnaṃ acittakattā. Khandhakavārittānaṃ tehi
tika-vin06t:1834_7: saṅgaho, sekhiyavāritteyeva acittakehi sūpodanaviññattipaccayādīhīti ācariyo. Yattha
tika-vin06t:1834_8: yattha na-kārena paṭisedho karīyati, kiṃ sabbattha dukkaṭāpattīti? Āma. Yattha aṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin06t:1834_9: nayo na dassito, tattha sabbattha. Parato hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace pana kāḷavaṇṇakatā
tika-vin06t:1834_10: vā sudhābaddhā vā hoti nirajamattikā, tathārūpāya bhūmiyā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”tiādinā
tika-vin06t:1835_0: Etthāha – yasmā pāḷiyaṃyeva “sace upajjhāyassa anabhirati uppannā hoti, diṭṭhigataṃ
tika-vin06t:1835_1: uppannaṃ hotī”ti bhagavato vacanavasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayo yuttoti dassetuṃ
tika-vin06t:1835_2: “nātidūre nāccāsanne”ti ettha ko bhagavato vacanalesoti? Vuccate – “paṭhamataraṃ
tika-vin06t:1835_3: āgantvā āsanaṃ paññāpetabba”ntiādīni vadanti desaniyamanato. Upajjhāyena anumataṃyeva
tika-vin06t:1835_4: paṭhamagamananti ce? Na, asiddhattā, siddhepi yathāvuttanayasiddhito ca. Na hi vārittassa
tika-vin06t:1835_5: anumati anāpattikarā hoti, evaṃ santepi vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ. Koṭṭhakanti dvārakoṭṭhakaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1838_0: 68. Adhimattaṃ gehassitapemaṃ na hotīti ettha gehassitapemaṃ na akusalamicceva daṭṭhabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:1838_1: khīṇāsavānampi sādhāraṇattā imassa lakkhaṇassa. Na khīṇāsavānaṃ asammāvattanābhāvatoti
tika-vin06t:1838_2: ce? Na, tesaṃ na paṇāmetabbaṃ taṃsamannāgamanasiddhito, tasmā “mamesa bhāro”ti mamattakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:1838_3: tattha pemanti veditabbaṃ. “Eko vattasampanno…pe… tesaṃ anāpattī’ti ettha viya sace
tika-vin06t:1838_4: eko vattasampanno bhikkhu ‘bhante, tumhe appossukkā hotha, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ saddhivihārikaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1838_5: antevāsikaṃ vā gilānaṃ vā upaṭṭhahissāmi, ovaditabbaṃ ovadissāmi, iti karaṇīyesu
tika-vin06t:1838_6: ussukkaṃ āpajjissāmī’ti vadati, te evāsaddhivihārikādayo ‘bhante, tumheva kevalaṃ
tika-vin06t:1838_7: appossukkā hothā’ti vadanti, vattaṃ vā na sādiyanti, tato paṭṭhāya ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1841: 73. “Pūtimuttanti muttaṃ pūtikāyo viyā”ti vatvāpi “pūtibhāvena muttaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ bhesajjaṃ pūtimuttabhesajja”nti likhitaṃ. Sabbattha itthannāmoti ekova na-kāro hoti.
tika-vin06t:1844_0: 76. “Āyasmato nissāya vacchāmī”ti vuttaṃ. “Āyasmato ovādaṃ nissāya vasāmī”ti pāṭhasesavasena
tika-vin06t:1844_1: veditabbā. Nissāyāti vā nissayā, nissayenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Āyasmatoti vā upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1847_0: 83. Disaṃ gatoti tattha dhuranikkhittavāso hutvā tirogāmaṃ gato. Yattha nissayo labbhati,
tika-vin06t:1847_1: tattha gantabbanti etthāpi upajjhāye vuttanayeneva “katipāhena gamissāmī”ti gamane
tika-vin06t:1847_2: cesa ussāho rakkhati. Mā idha paṭikkamīti mā idha gaccha. Sabhāgā nāma upajjhāyassa
tika-vin06t:1847_3: sissā. Tattha nissayaṃ gahetvā. Yadi evaṃ ko visesoti ce? Tena idaṃ vuccati “appeva
tika-vin06t:1847_4: nāma khameyyā”ti. Vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti upajjhāyena pariccattattā upajjhāyasamodhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1847_5: niratthakanti attho. Sace upajjhāyo cirena anuggahetukāmo hoti, tato paṭṭhāya upajjhāyova
tika-vin06t:1847_6: nissayo. Upajjhāyo ce alajjī hoti, saddhivihārikena anekakkhattuṃ vāretvā aviramantaṃ
tika-vin06t:1847_7: upajjhāyaṃ pahāya vināpi nissayapaṇāmanena aññassa santike nissayaṃ gahetvā vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1847_8: Upajjhāyassa ce liṅgaṃ parivattati, ekadivasampi na rakkhati. Pakkhapaṇḍako ce hoti,
tika-vin06t:1847_9: nissayajātiko ce “upajjhāyassa sukkapakkhaṃ āgamehī”ti vadati, sayameva vā āgameti,
tika-vin06t:1847_10: vaṭṭati. Upajjhāyo ce ukkhepaniyakammakato hoti, nānāsaṃvāsakabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitattā nissayo
tika-vin06t:1847_11: paṭippassambhati. Sammāvattantaṃ pana passitvā kammapaṭippassaddhiṃ āgametuṃ labhati.
tika-vin06t:1847_12: Mānattācārī ce hoti, abbhānaṃ āgametabbaṃ. Dīghaṃ ce parivāsaṃ carati, aññassa santike
tika-vin06t:1847_13: nissayo gahetabbo, upajjhāyasamodhānaṃ appamāṇaṃ. Parivāsamānattacārinā hi na nissayo
tika-vin06t:1847_14: dātabbo. Yaṃ pana pārivāsikakkhandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “saddhivihārikānampi sādiyantassa
tika-vin06t:1847_15: dukkaṭamevā”tiādi, taṃ yathāvuttamatthaṃ sādheti eva. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “sace saddhāpabbajitā
tika-vin06t:1847_16: kulaputtā ‘tumhe, bhante, vinayakammamattaṃ karothā”ti vatvā vattaṃ karontiyeva,
tika-vin06t:1847_17: gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchantiyeva, taṃ vāritakālato paṭṭhāya anāpattī”ti. Taṃ vattasādiyanapaccayā
tika-vin06t:1847_18: dukkaṭābhāvamattadīpanatthaṃ, saddhivihārikānaṃ sāpekkhataṃ vā sandhāya vuttanti
tika-vin06t:1847_19: veditabbaṃ. Tasmā te ce upajjhāyena vāritānurūpameva paṭipajjanti, nissayo tesaṃ
tika-vin06t:1848_0: Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā nivattatīti “ettāvatā disāpakkanto nāma hoti, tasmā antevāsike
tika-vin06t:1848_1: anikkhittadhurepi nissayo paṭippassambhati. Ācariyupajjhāyā dve leḍḍupāte anatikkamma
tika-vin06t:1848_2: leḍḍupātadvayabbhantare tirovihārepi parikkhitte, aparikkhitte vā vasituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin06t:1848_3: likhitaṃ. Aparikkhitteyevāti no takkoti ācariyo, ettha pana aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato
tika-vin06t:1848_4: vimutte aññasmiṃ vihāre vasantīti adhippāyo. Vihāroti cettha “tādisassa vihārassa
tika-vin06t:1848_5: ante ṭhitā ekā kuṭikā adhippetāti upatissatthero”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha “sace ubhopi ācariyantevāsikā
tika-vin06t:1848_6: kenaci…pe… nissayo na paṭippassambhatī”ti iminā sāmaññato vuttena aṭṭhakathāvacanena
tika-vin06t:1848_7: dhammasirittheravādo sameti. Aparikkhitte vāti dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ anto parikkhitto
tika-vin06t:1848_8: vā hoti aparikkhitto vā. “Bahisīma”nti ca vuttattā antovihārasīmāyaṃ dve leḍḍupāte
tika-vin06t:1848_9: atikkamitvāpi vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhattā pana upatissattheravādo na sameti. Ekāvāse
tika-vin06t:1848_10: hi parikkhitte vā aparikkhitte vā antamaso antotiyojanepi vasato nissayo na paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin06t:1848_11: So ca upacārasīmāya paricchinno, sā ca upacārasīmā parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepena
tika-vin06t:1849_0: Uposathakkhandhake ekāvāsavimatiyaṃ sīmāya anuññātattāti ce? Na, cīvarakkhandhakaṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin06t:1849_1: vicāritattā. Yathāha “sīmaṭṭhakasaṅgho bhājetvā gaṇhātū”ti. Katarasīmāya bhājetabbaṃ?
tika-vin06t:1849_2: Mahāsivatthero kirāha “avippavāsasīmāyā”ti. Tato naṃ āhaṃsu “avippavāsasīmā nāma
tika-vin06t:1849_3: tiyojanāpi hoti, evaṃ sante tiyojane ṭhitā lābhaṃ gaṇhissanti, tiyojane ṭhatvā āgantukavattaṃ
tika-vin06t:1849_4: pūretvā ārāmaṃ pavisitabbaṃ bhavissati, gamiko tiyojanaṃ gantvā senāsanaṃ āpucchissati,
tika-vin06t:1849_5: nissayapaṭippannassa tiyojanātikkame nissayo paṭippassambhissati, pārivāsikena tiyojanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1849_6: atikkamitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ bhavissati, bhikkhuniyā tiyojane ṭhatvā ārāmappavesanā
tika-vin06t:1849_7: āpucchitabbā bhavissati, sabbametaṃ upacārasīmāparicchedavasena kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin06t:1849_8: Tasmā antoupacārasīmāya leḍḍupātadvayaṃ atikkamitvāpi vasato nissayo tiyojanātikkame
tika-vin06t:1849_9: nissayo na paṭippassambhatīti siddhaṃ. Kāmañcettha upacārasīmāya tiyojanappamāṇāya,
tika-vin06t:1849_10: atirekāya vā yathāvuttadosappasaṅgo siyāti. Sā hi āvāsesu vaḍḍhantesu vaḍḍhati, parihāyantesu
tika-vin06t:1849_11: parihāyatīti vuttattā, tasmā tādisassa vihārassa ante ṭhitā ekā kuṭi vihāroti idhādhippetā.
tika-vin06t:1849_12: Sāpi tasseva vihārassa kuṭikāva hotīti katvā so āvāso hoti. Nānāvāso eva ce adhippeto,
tika-vin06t:1849_13: “ante ṭhitā kuṭikā”ti na vattabbaṃ. Dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ abbhantare pana aparikkhitte
tika-vin06t:1849_14: nānāvāse nissayo na paṭippassambhatīti yvāyaṃ “no takko”ti vutto, so tādise nānāvāse
tika-vin06t:1849_15: senāsanaggāhassa appaṭippassaddhinayena vutto. Senāsanaggāho hi “gahaṇena gahaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:1849_16: ālayo paṭippassambhatī”ti lakkhaṇattā itarattha paṭippassambhati. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi “tena
tika-vin06t:1849_17: kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto eko dvīsu āvāsesu vassaṃ vasi…pe… detha,
tika-vin06t:1849_18: bhikkhave, moghapurisassa ekādhippāya”nti. Aṭṭhakathāyañcassa evaṃ vuttaṃ “idañca
tika-vin06t:1849_19: nānālābhehi nānūpacārehi ekasīmavihārehi kathitaṃ, nānāsīmavihāre pana senāsanaggāho
tika-vin06t:1849_20: paṭippassambhatī”ti. Aparikkhittā nānāvāsā ekūpacārasaṅkhyaṃ gacchanti. Parikkhittañca
tika-vin06t:1849_21: ekūpacāraṃ aparikkhittasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Ettāvatā leḍḍupātadvayabbhantare aparikkhitte
tika-vin06t:1849_22: aññasmiṃ vihāre vasato nissayo pana na paṭippassambhati, parikkhitte paṭippassambhati
tika-vin06t:1849_23: evāti ayamattho sādhitoti. Etthāha – dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāva satopi nissayo na
tika-vin06t:1849_25: daharesu aruṇaṃ uggacchati, cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti, nissayo pana na paṭippassambhatī”ti
tika-vin06t:1849_26: ? Vuccate – taṃ upajjhāyena samāgame saussāhatāya vuttaṃ. Idha dhuvavāsaṃ sandhāya,
tika-vin06t:1849_27: tasmā aññamaññaṃ na vilomenti. Keci pana “dve leḍḍupātaṃ atikkammāti idaṃ devasikaṃ
tika-vin06t:1849_28: ārocetvā vasanavasena vutta”nti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattamevāti mama takko. Devasikaṃ
tika-vin06t:1849_29: ārocetvā vatthabbanti hi neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dissati, tañca pana apakataññūhi
tika-vin06t:1852_0: 84. Na asekkhena sīlakkhandhenātiādi “attānameva paṭhamaṃ, patirūpe nivesaye”ti vacanavasena
tika-vin06t:1852_1: vuttaṃ, na āpattiaṅgavasena. Nīlasamāyogato nīlaṃ viya vuttaṃ “asekkhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhenā”ti.
tika-vin06t:1855_0: 86. Yo so aññatitthiyapubboti ettha dve atthavikappā – tassa pasūrassa bhikkhubhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:1855_1: sandhāya aññatitthiyapubbo, so bhikkhu taṃyeva titthāyatanaṃ saṅkamīti ayameko attho.
tika-vin06t:1855_2: Evaṃ titthiyapakkantako puna gihivesena āgato aññatitthiyapubbo, so āgato na upasampādetabboti
tika-vin06t:1855_3: ayameko attho. Taṃ aññatitthiyapakkantakaṃ ṭhapetvā “yo so, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo”ti
tika-vin06t:1855_4: ettha na gihivesadhāraṇova pubbasaddena vutto, kintu tasmiṃ attano yathāsamādinnatitthiyavese
tika-vin06t:1855_5: ṭhitopi. Diṭṭhivasena atitthiyabhūtattā atitthiyapubbo, so panāgato vibbhanto āgacchati,
tika-vin06t:1855_6: tassa parivāsadānakiccaṃ natthi. Kiṃ imassa aññatitthiyapubbassa bhikkhuvesaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin06t:1855_7: saraṇagamanena sāmaṇerapabbajjā jātā, na jātāti? Kiñcettha yadi jātā, “yo so, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:1855_8: aññopi aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ, ākaṅkhati upasampadaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1855_9: tassa cattāro māse parivāso dātabbo”ti vacanaṃ virujjhati. Atha na jātā, parivāsakammavācāya
tika-vin06t:1855_10: pabbajjāya aparāmasanaṃ virujjhatīti. Tattha mahāvihāravāsino “sāmaṇerasseva sato
tika-vin06t:1855_11: parivāso dātabbo”ti vadanti. Itare tathā na vadanti. Te hi “evaṃ ārādhako kho bhikkhave
tika-vin06t:1855_12: aññatitthiyapubbo āgato upasampādetabbo’ti suttapadaṃ pariharitabbaṃ, pure ca pacchā
tika-vin06t:1855_13: ca ‘aññatitthiyapubbo’ti vacanasāmaññato na sāmaṇero jātoti ce, yadi evaṃ apabbājetvāva
tika-vin06t:1855_14: upasampādetabboti āpajjati. Tato ca sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttasuttaṃ virujjhati. ‘Titthāyatanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1855_15: saṅkanto’ti pāṭhopi na sundaraṃ. Pāṇātipātādīsu aññataraṃ sace bhindati, cattāro
tika-vin06t:1855_16: māse paripuṇṇepi puna paripūretabbaṃ viya dissati. Vuttampi tassa saṃvaraṃ bhikkhukaraṇatthāya
tika-vin06t:1855_17: anuññātattā sīle vattabbaṃ natthī”ti vadanti, vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ. Saraṇāni sace
tika-vin06t:1858_1: vaṭṭati, evaṃ sesesupī”ti keci vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti viya. Padumakaṇṇikāpi
tika-vin06t:1861_0: 91-2. Dhammasāmīti yasmā sayaṃ dhammasāmī, tasmā bhikkhūhi apabbājetabbakampi coraṃ
tika-vin06t:1861_1: aṅgulimālaṃ pabbājetvā āyatiṃ evamāhāti attho. Pāḷipotthakesu “kharabhedako”tipi
tika-vin06t:1864: 96. Passa me pattacīvaramattaṃ, ahaṃ idaṃ dassāmīti sāmīci, yato natthi āpatti. Upaḍḍhupaḍḍhanti thokaṃ thokaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1865_0: 97. Desacārittanti sāvanapaṇṇāropanādi taṃ taṃ desacārittaṃ. “Devadāsiputte vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin06t:1865_1: likhitaṃ. “Ārāmikaṃ ce pabbājetukāmo, aññamekaṃ datvā pabbājetabba”nti vuttaṃ. Mahāpaccarivādassa
tika-vin06t:1865_2: ayamidha adhippāyo. “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ārāmike demā”ti dinnattā na te tesaṃ dāsā.
tika-vin06t:1865_3: “Ārāmiko ca neva dāso na bhujissoti vattabbato na dāso”ti likhitaṃ. Takkāsiñcanaṃ
tika-vin06t:1865_4: sīhaḷadīpe cārittaṃ. Te ca pabbājetabbā saṅghassārāmikattā. Nissāmikaṃ dāsaṃ attanāpi
tika-vin06t:1865_5: bhujissaṃ kātuṃ labhati. “Dāsassa pabbajitvā attano sāmike disvā palāyantassa āpatti
tika-vin06t:1865_6: natthīti vadantī”ti ca likhitaṃ. Attano vā dāso assa bhikkhunoti attho. Nissāmikassa
tika-vin06t:1865_7: dāsassa rājā sāmi, tasmā rājānaṃ vā tasmiṃ gāme manusse vā āpucchitvā pabbājetabboti
tika-vin06t:1865_8: eke. “Bhujissaṃ katvā”ti likhitaṃ. Tassa parihāraṃ bhaṇanti “yathā bhujisso hoti,
tika-vin06t:1865_9: tathā kattabbo”ti. Evaṃ saṅkappena vatvā “payojanaṃ natthī”ti kehici likhitaṃ. Bhujissaṃ
tika-vin06t:1865_10: kātumeva vaṭṭatīti “sace passanti, anubandhissantī”ti vuttaṃ. Āpatti natthi. “Asuddhā
tika-vin06t:1865_11: kira metipi taṃ sandhāyeva vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1868_0: 98. Kammārabhaṇḍūti ettha dārako cūḷāmattaṃ ṭhapetvā āgacchati, tasmā āpucchituṃ
tika-vin06t:1868_1: labhati. Tañce so vā añño vā avaharati, doso natthi. “Kesamassuorohanaṃ akatvā asatiyā
tika-vin06t:1869_0: 101-3. Ettha kule. “Ubhayāni kho panassa…pe… anubyañjanasoti sabbopāyaṃ pabhedo mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1869_1: ñāto hotī”ti ca “āpattiṃ jānātīti pāṭhe avattamānepi idaṃ nāma katvā idaṃ āpajjatīti
tika-vin06t:1869_2: jānāti ce, vaṭṭatī”ti ca likhitaṃ. “Tañca kho tato pubbe pāṭhe paguṇe kateti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1872_0: 105. “Aṅgārino dāni dumā bhadante”tiādīhi saṭṭhimattāhi. Dassehi iti maṃ āṇāpesi.
tika-vin06t:1872_1: Ettha iti-saddo āharitabbo. Pokkharavassanti pokkharapattavaṇṇaṃ udakaṃ, tamhi vassante
tika-vin06t:1872_2: temitukāmāva tementi. Uṇhīsato paṭṭhāyāti muddhato paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin06t:1915: Uddiṭṭheti evaṃ caritabbanti attano, “uttiṭṭhe”ti dhammapadapāṭho. Dhammanti sapadānacārikavattaṃ. Anesanaṃ vajjetvā sucaritaṃ care.
tika-vin06t:1916_0: Kesavissajjananti pañcasikhākāraṃ vajjetvā ekasikhākāraṃ. Paṭṭabandhoti ettha paṭṭoti
tika-vin06t:1916_1: tasmiṃ kule āciṇṇo alaṅkāraviseso. Gharamaṅgalanti gharamaho. Chattamaṅgalanti yuvarājachattapaṭṭi.
tika-vin06t:1916_2: Vaṭṭānugatanti kilesavaṭṭānugataṃ. Vighātapaccayattā savighātakaṃ. Thero rādhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:1916_3: pubbe pabbajitvā kasmā idāni “kathāhaṃ, bhante, rāhulaṃ pabbājemī”ti āhāti ce? Tattha
tika-vin06t:1916_4: upasampadāpaṭikkhepo adhippeto, tasmā “bhagavā upasampadameva paṭikkhipi, idāni anāgate
tika-vin06t:1916_6: āhaccā”ti vuttaṃ kira. Buddhānaṃ, cakkavattīnañca byattādivasena nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1916_7: aññathā nandādayopi pabbajitvā buddhā siyuṃ “sace pabbajati, buddho hotī”ti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:1917_0: Pesetvā dassetuṃ vaṭṭati, āpucchissāmāti pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ca idaṃ yasmā videsappatto
tika-vin06t:1917_1: nāma lokasaṅketenāpi mātāpituvāsato mutto serivihārīti vuccati, tasmāssa te asantapakkhe
tika-vin06t:1917_2: ṭhitā viya hontīti katvā “na tassa pabbajjācariye vā appasādaṃ karontī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:1917_3: naṭṭhameva. Pabbajitā samagatikāti lokavohāro. Teneva cettha dukkhappattādinā desantaragamanañca
tika-vin06t:1917_4: samagatikaṃ kataṃ. Videsaṃ gantvāti cettha videso nāma mātāpituvāsato añño deso,
tika-vin06t:1917_5: na uppattidesato. Byañjanattho eva ce pamāṇaṃ, na yutti. Matamātāpitikopi na pabbājetabboti
tika-vin06t:1917_6: āpajjati, tasmā anuppattabbaṭṭhāne ṭhitehiyeva mātāpitūhi ananuññāto putto na pabbājetabboti
tika-vin06t:1917_7: evamidhādhippāyo veditabbo, aññathā pāḷiyā virujjheyya, āpattiṭṭhānassa ca sithilakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:1917_8: aṭṭhakathāya na yujjati. Idaṃ tāva evaṃ hotu, “vihāraṃ vā jhāpemī”tiādinayo kathaṃ
tika-vin06t:1917_9: na virujjhatīti ce? Attaparūpaddavappasaṅgabhayena avasena pabbajitattā, puttarakkhaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1917_10: pabbajitattā ca. Evañhi sati sayameva so attanā pabbajito hoti, na kenaci upalāpetvā
tika-vin06t:1917_11: pabbajito. “Puttapemaṃ vā puttarakkhe piyo hotī”ti nidānānulomato na virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:1920_0: 107. Attano pariveṇañcāti puggalikaṃ. Mukhadvārikanti mukhadvārena bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1920_1: Tattha niyojitabbakaṃ, tassa āvaraṇaṃ nivāraṇaṃ karonti. Atha vā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:1920_2: āvaraṇaṃ kātu”nti yaṃ āvaraṇaṃ anuññātaṃ, taṃ āvaraṇaṃ mukhadvārikaṃ āhāraṃ karontīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1923_0: 108. Parassa dussīlabhikkhussapīti attho. Keci “dussīlabhikkhūpī”ti likhanti, taṃ
tika-vin06t:1923_1: na sundaraṃ. Porāṇā pana “yāvatatiyaṃ vuccamāno ce na oramati, saṅghaṃ apaloketvā
tika-vin06t:1923_2: nāsetabbo, puna pabbajjaṃ yācamānopi apaloketvā pabbājetabbo”ti vadanti. Bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin06t:1923_3: upasampadakammavācāsadisanti ettha “yathā upasampanno sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya yathānivatthapārutova
tika-vin06t:1923_4: hutvā pacchā upasampanno pubbe attano navakatarassa samānavassikassa puna vandanādīni
tika-vin06t:1923_5: karoti, evaṃ sāmaṇeropi puna gahitasaraṇo tato pubbe attano navakatarassa samānavassikassa
tika-vin06t:1923_6: sāmaṇerassa puna vandanādīni karoti. Liṅgaṃ panettha vuḍḍhatarabhāvaṃ na sādhetīti
tika-vin06t:1923_7: vuttaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Vikālabhojanaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ vītikkamevāti eke. “Accayo maṃ,
tika-vin06t:1923_8: bhante, accāgamā”tiādinā nayena accayaṃ desāpetabbo. “Diṭṭhiyā anissajjanena ‘tvaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1923_9: sāmaṇera, gacchā’ti vutteyeva pārājiko hotī”ti vuttaṃ, “yāvatatiyanti vuttattā buddhādīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:1923_10: avaṇṇabhāsitamattena ca diṭṭhiggahitamattena ca saraṇāni na bhijjantīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti
tika-vin06t:1923_11: vadanti. Evaṃ sante pāṇātipātādiṃ karontassāpi taṃ sambhotīti mama takko. “Nissīlassa
tika-vin06t:1923_12: puna nāsanā vuttā”ti ca keci vadanti, taṃ yuttaṃ viya. Na hi bhagavā sīlavantassa
tika-vin06t:1923_13: liṅganāsanaṃ anujānātīti vicāretabbaṃ, bhikkhunidūsakāpadesena bhabbābhabbe saṅgaṇhātīti
tika-vin06t:1923_14: porāṇā. “Pabbajjampi na labhatīti yathā cettha ayamattho dassito, tathā ‘paṇḍako,
tika-vin06t:1923_15: bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo’ti ādinā nayena
tika-vin06t:1923_16: vuttānampi pabbajjaṃ natthīti dīpitaṃ hoti. Na hi idaṃ ṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvā tesaṃ pabbajjāya
tika-vin06t:1923_17: vāritaṭṭhānaṃ atthi. ‘Bhikkhunidūsako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo,
tika-vin06t:1923_18: upasampanno nāsetabbo’ti vuttenapi samānattā tassa pabbajjā viya tesampi pabbajjā
tika-vin06t:1923_19: vāritāva hotītipi dassetuṃ puna bhikkhunidūsakoti gahitanti apare”ti vuttaṃ. Kiṃ
tika-vin06t:1923_20: iminā? Nanu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “yassa cettha pabbajjā vāritā, taṃ sandhāya idaṃ
tika-vin06t:1923_21: vuttaṃ anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
tika-vin06t:1926_0: 109. Opakkamikapaṇḍakassa hīnaṅgattā apabbajitassa pabbajjā vāritā, pabbajitassa
tika-vin06t:1926_1: upasampadā na kātabbā. Pubbe upasampannassa ce upacaraṇaṃ atthi, na nāsanā kātabbāti
tika-vin06t:1926_2: no takkoti ācariyo. Chinnaṅgajāto na paṇḍako. Pañcasu napuṃsakapaṇḍakova abhāvako.
tika-vin06t:1926_3: Itare cattāro sabhāvakāti veditabbā. Bhāvo pana tesaṃ paṇḍako hoti. Ete cattāropi
tika-vin06t:1926_4: kira purisāvāti eke. Itthīpi pakkhapaṇḍakī hotīti eke. Upakkame kate paṇḍakabhāvo
tika-vin06t:1926_5: avassaṃ hoti, tasmā pabbajjaṃ na labhati. “Yadi pana kassaci na hoti, pabbajjā na
tika-vin06t:1927_0: “Pabbajjā vāritāti apaṇḍakapakkhe pabbājetvā paṇḍakapakkhe nāsetabboti adhippāyo”ti
tika-vin06t:1927_1: likhitaṃ. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade pana māsapaṇḍakalekhapaṇḍakehi saha satta paṇḍakā vuttā.
tika-vin06t:1927_2: Tattha lekhapaṇḍako nāma kira mantavasena upahatabījo. Tattha “opakkamikalekhapaṇḍakā
tika-vin06t:1927_3: pabbajitā na nāsetabbā. Yo pabbājeti, tassa dukkaṭa”nti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1930_0: 110. Theyyasaṃvāsakoti ettha kiñcāpi byañjanatthavasena saṃvāsatthenakova theyyasaṃvāsakoti
tika-vin06t:1930_1: paññāyati, atha kho tayo theyyasaṃvāsakā. Saṃvāsoti cettha na ekakammādiko saṃvāso,
tika-vin06t:1930_2: kintu bhikkhuvassagaṇanādiko kiriyabhedo idha saṃvāso nāma. Imañhi sakkā theyyāya
tika-vin06t:1930_3: kātuṃ, netaranti aṭṭhakathāya adhippāyo. Videsaṃ gantvā pabbajitehi pucchite “dasavasso”tiādiṃ
tika-vin06t:1930_4: bhaṇantassa doso. Gihīnaṃ vutte doso natthīti keci. Rājabhayādīhi gahitaliṅgānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1930_5: “gihī maṃ samaṇoti jānātū”ti vañcanacitte satipi bhikkhūnaṃ vañcetukāmatāya, tehi
tika-vin06t:1930_6: saṃvasitukāmatāya ca abhāvā doso na jāto. “Sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattānīti vihāraṃ āgantvā
tika-vin06t:1930_7: saṅghikaṃ gaṇhantassa saṃvāsaṃ pariharituṃ dukkaraṃ, tasmā vutta”nti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1930_8: “Sūpasampanno”ti vuttattā gahaṭṭhampi sace upasampādenti, sūpasampannoti āpannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1930_9: “anupasampannakāleyevā”ti iminā sace upasampannakāle suṇāti, sūpasampanno eva anārocentopīti
tika-vin06t:1930_11: vutto “theyyāya vo, bhikkhave, raṭṭhapiṇḍo bhutto”ti iminā kira pariyāyenāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1930_12: Tenevāha “taṃ na gahetabba”nti. “Mahāpeḷādīsū”ti etena gihisantakaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1931_0: Sayaṃ sāmaṇerova kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā gaṇhanto pārājiko hoti, theyyasaṃvāsako pana
tika-vin06t:1931_1: na hoti, tathā bhikkhupi, so pana bhaṇḍagghena kāretabboti iminā adhippāyena “sayaṃ
tika-vin06t:1931_2: sāmaṇerovā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ pana theyyasaṃvāsako nāma yasmā pabbajitova hoti, nāpabbajito,
tika-vin06t:1931_3: tasmā “theyyasaṃvāsako, bhikkhave, apabbajito na pabbājetabbo, pabbajito nāsetabbo”ti
