tika-vin06t:1931_4: vattuṃ na sakkāti katvā imassa vasena paṇḍakato paṭṭhāya “anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo”tiādinā
tika-vin06t:1931_5: pāḷi ṭhapitā, na upasampadāmattasseva abhabbattā ekādasannampi nesaṃ pabbajjārahabhāvappasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:1931_6: Apica aniṭṭhadosappasaṅgato tathā eva pāḷi ṭhapitā. Yasmā titthiyapakkamanaṃ, saṅghabhedanañca
tika-vin06t:1931_7: upasampannasseva hoti, nānupasampannassa, so duvidhopi pabbajitova hoti, nāpabbajito,
tika-vin06t:1931_8: tasmā “titthiyapakkantako, bhikkhave, apabbajito na pabbājetabbo”tiādipāḷiyā sati
tika-vin06t:1931_9: te ubhopi apabbājetabbā hontīti aniṭṭhappasaṅgo āpajjatīti. Tīsu pana theyyasaṃvāsakesu
tika-vin06t:1931_10: sāmaṇerālayaṃ karonto liṅgatthenako, upasampannālayaṃ karonto saṃvāsatthenako, ubhayatthenako
tika-vin06t:1931_11: ca. Na hi sāmaṇerasaṃvāso idha saṃvāso nāma, teneva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “bhikkhuvassagaṇanādiko
tika-vin06t:1931_12: hi sabbopi kiriyabhedo imasmiṃ atthe saṃvāso”ti vuttanti eke. Yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanasādiyanāsanapaṭibāhanānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1934_0: Titthiyapakkantako, bhikkhavetiādi attano nidānabhūte pasūravatthusmiṃ eva vattabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:1934_1: samānampi tattha vāritaadhikārābhāvā abhabbā. Idheva theyyasaṃvāsakena vinā sambhavato
tika-vin06t:1934_2: vutto. Tattha “atha kho na pabbājetabbopī”ti idheva vacanaṃ pasūrassa upasampadāya
tika-vin06t:1934_3: eva yācanicchāya dassanena, “so āgato na upasampādetabbo”ti bhagavato upasampadāmattapaṭisedhanena
tika-vin06t:1934_4: ca pabbajjānumatidosappasaṅgabhayāti veditabbaṃ. Tesaṃ liṅge ādinnamatte laddhiyā
tika-vin06t:1934_5: gahitāyapi aggahitāyapi titthiyapakkantako hoti, avandanīyasseva naggaliṅgassa seṭṭhabhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:1934_6: vā upagacchati, na muccati, ettha “padavāre dukkaṭaṃ, ājīvako bhavissanti visamacittavasena
tika-vin06t:1934_7: gatattā naggo hutvā na gamanenā”ti vadanti. Ubhinnampi vasena yuttanti mama takko.
tika-vin06t:1934_8: Tāva naṃ laddhi rakkhati asampaṭicchitattā. Upasampannabhikkhunā kathitoti kathaṃ
tika-vin06t:1934_9: paññāyati? Aṭṭhakathāvacanappamāṇatovāti eke. Nidānavasenāti eke. Pasūrassa upasampannattā
tika-vin06t:1934_10: upasampannānaṃ eva titthiyapakkantatāvacanatoti eke. Yathāha “upajjhāyo pakkantovā
tika-vin06t:1934_11: hoti, vibbhanto vā, kālaṃkato vā, pakkhasaṅkanto vā”ti ācariyo. Pakkhasaṅkanto vāti
tika-vin06t:1934_12: sāmaṇeranāsanāvatthūsu abhāvatoti eke. Aññatitthiyapubbassa upasampannassa sato pakkhasaṅkantabhayā
tika-vin06t:1934_13: anupasampannakāle upasampadatthaṃ parivāsapaññāpanenāti eke. Pabbajjatthampīti ce?
tika-vin06t:1934_14: Na, pubbe vicāritattā, apabbajitassa adhisīlābhāvato ca. Pātimokkhasīlañhi adhisīlaṃ
tika-vin06t:1934_15: nāma, tañca apabbajitassa natthi. Imassa ca parivāsavatte adhisīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathāha
tika-vin06t:1934_16: “puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo tibbacchando hoti uddese paripucchāya
tika-vin06t:1934_17: adhisīle”ti. Apica “sace, bhikkhave, jātiyā sākiyo aññatitthiyapubbo āgacchati, so
tika-vin06t:1937: 111. Nāgayoniyāti nāgayonito, attano nāgajātihetūti adhippāyo. Kiṃkāraṇā? Abhikkhaṇaṃ sakajātiyā methunapaṭisevane, vissaṭṭhaniddokkamane ca sabbesampi.
tika-vin06t:1940_0: 112-5. Apavāhananti pakkhalanaṃ, kāsāyavatthanivāsanaṃ icchamānanti attho. Duṭṭhacittena.
tika-vin06t:1940_1: Kīdisena? Vadhakacittenāti adhippāyo. Lohituppādanavasena duṭṭhacittanti keci, taṃ na sundaraṃ.
tika-vin06t:1943: 116. “Yadi paṭisandhiyaṃ uppannaliṅgena etaṃ nāmaṃ labhantīti adhippāyo”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1946_0: 117. “Keci ‘kuppatī’ti vadanti, taṃ ‘na gahetabba”nti yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ “pañcavaggakaraṇīyañce,
tika-vin06t:1946_1: bhikkhave, kammaṃ bhikkhunipañcamo kammaṃ kareyya, akammaṃ na ca karaṇīya”ntiādinā
tika-vin06t:1946_2: nayena vuttattā paṇḍakādīnaṃ gaṇapūraṇabhāve eva kammaṃ kuppati, na sabbanti katvā
tika-vin06t:1946_3: suvuttaṃ, itarathā “paṇḍakupajjhāyena kammaṃ kareyya, akammaṃ na ca karaṇīya”ntiādikāya
tika-vin06t:1946_4: pāḷiyā bhavitabbaṃ siyā. Yathā aparipuṇṇapattacīvarassa upasampādanakāle kammavācāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1946_5: “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti asantaṃ vatthuṃ kittetvā upasampadāya katāya tasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:1946_6: asantepi upasampadā ruhati, evaṃ “ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassa
tika-vin06t:1946_7: upasampadāpekkho”ti avatthuṃ paṇḍakupajjhāyādiṃ, asantaṃ vā, vatthuṃ kittetvā katāyapi
tika-vin06t:1946_8: gaṇapūrakānamatthitāya upasampadā ruhateva. “Na, bhikkhave, paṇḍakupajjhāyena upasampādetabbo,
tika-vin06t:1946_9: yo upasampādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa, so ca puggalo anupasampanno”tiādivacanassābhāvā
tika-vin06t:1946_10: ayamattho siddhova hoti. Na hi buddhā vattabbayuttaṃ na vadanti, tena vuttaṃ “yo
tika-vin06t:1946_11: pana, bhikkhu, jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ…pe… so ca puggalo anupasampanno”tiādi. Tathā
tika-vin06t:1946_12: “byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo’ti vacanato theyyasaṃvāsakādiācariyehi
tika-vin06t:1946_13: anussāvanāya katāya upasampadā na ruhati tesaṃ abhikkhuttā”ti vacanampi na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1946_14: Kiñca bhiyyo “imāni cattāri kammāni pañcahākārehi vipajjantī”tiādinā nayena kammānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1946_15: sampattivipattiyā kathiyamānāya “sattahi ākārehi kammāni vipajjanti vatthuto vā ñattito
tika-vin06t:1946_16: vā anussāvanato vā sīmato vā parisato vā upajjhāyato vā ācariyato vā”ti akathitattā
tika-vin06t:1946_17: na gahetabbaṃ. “Parisato vā”ti vacanena ācariyaupajjhāyānaṃ vā saṅgaho katoti ce?
tika-vin06t:1946_18: Na, “dvādasahākārehi parisato kammāni vipajjantī”ti etassa vibhaṅge tesamanāmaṭṭhattā.
tika-vin06t:1946_19: Ayamattho “yasmā tattha tattha sarūpena vuttapāḷivaseneva sakkā jānituṃ, tasmā nayamukhaṃ
tika-vin06t:1946_20: dassetvā saṃkhittoti ayamassa yuttigavesanā”ti vuttaṃ. Tatridaṃ vicāretabbaṃ – anupajjhāyakaṃ
tika-vin06t:1946_21: upasampādentā te bhikkhū yathāvuttanayena abhūtaṃ taṃ vatthuṃ kittayiṃsu, udāhu musāvādabhayā
tika-vin06t:1946_22: tāneva padāni na sāvesunti. Kiñcettha yadi tāva upajjhāyābhāvata na sāvesuṃ, “puggalaṃ
tika-vin06t:1946_23: na parāmasatī”ti vuttavipattippasaṅgo hoti, atha sāvesuṃ, musāvādo nesaṃ bhavatīti?
tika-vin06t:1946_24: Vuccate – sāvesuṃyeva yathāvuttavipattippasaṅgabhayā, “kammaṃ pana na kuppatī”ti
tika-vin06t:1946_25: aṭṭhakathāya vuttattā ca, na musāvādassa asambhavato, musāvādenāpi kammasambhavato
tika-vin06t:1946_26: ca. Na hi sakkā musāvādena kammavipattisampattiṃ kātunti. Tasmā “anupajjhāyakaṃ upasampādentī”ti
tika-vin06t:1947_0: Ayañcettha yutti – “yathā pubbe pabbajjupasampadupajjhāyesu vijjamānesupi upajjhāyaggahaṇakkamena
tika-vin06t:1947_1: aggahitattā ‘tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū anupajjhāyaka’ntiādi vuttaṃ, tathā idhāpi
tika-vin06t:1947_2: upajjhāyassa vijjamānasseva sato aggahitattā ‘anupajjhāyakaṃ upasampādentī’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1947_3: Kammavācācariyena pana gahito tena upajjhāyoti saññāya upajjhāyaṃ kittetvā kammavācaṃ
tika-vin06t:1947_4: sāvetabbaṃ, kenaci vā kāraṇena kāyasāmaggiṃ adentassa upajjhāyassa chandaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin06t:1947_5: kammavācaṃ sāveti, upajjhāyo vā upasampadāpekkhassa upajjhaṃ datvā pacchā upasampanne
tika-vin06t:1947_6: tasmiṃ tādise vatthusmiṃ samanuyuñjiyamāno vā asamanuyuñjiyamāno vā upajjhāyadānato
tika-vin06t:1947_7: pubbe eva sāmaṇero paṭijānāti, sikkhāpaccakkhātako vā antimavatthuajjhāpannako vā
tika-vin06t:1947_8: paṭijānāti, chandahārakādayo viya upajjhāyo vā aññasīmāgato hoti, ‘kammavācā ruhatī’ti
tika-vin06t:1947_9: vatvā ‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena
tika-vin06t:1947_10: upasampada’nti vuttattā keci ‘vinayadharapañcamena upajjhāyena sannihiteneva bhavitabba’nti
tika-vin06t:1947_11: vadantī”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. So ce pāṭho pamāṇo majjhimesu janapadesu tassa
tika-vin06t:1947_12: vacanassābhāvato. Asannihitepi upajjhāye kammavācā ruhatīti āpajjatīti ce? Na, kasmā?
tika-vin06t:1947_13: Kammasampattiyaṃ “puggalaṃ parāmasatī”ti vuttapāṭhova no pamāṇaṃ. Na hi tattha asannihito
tika-vin06t:1947_14: upajjhāyasaṅkhāto puggalo parāmasanaṃ arahati, tasmā tattha saṅghaparāmasanaṃ viya
tika-vin06t:1947_15: puggalaparāmasanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Saṅghena gaṇena upajjhāyena upasampādenti tesaṃ atthato
tika-vin06t:1947_16: puggalattā. Paṇḍakādiupajjhāyena upasampādenti upasampādanakāle aviditattāti porāṇā.
tika-vin06t:1949_1: saññāya, kevalaṃ atthasampattiṃ anapekkhitvā santapadanihārena vā “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti
tika-vin06t:1949_2: kammavācaṃ sāveti. Yathā etarahi matavippavutthamātāpitikopi “anuññātosi mātāpitūhī”ti
tika-vin06t:1949_3: puṭṭho “āma bhante”ti vadati. Kiṃ bahunā, ayaṃ panettha sāro – “tasmiṃ samaye cattāri
tika-vin06t:1949_4: kammāni pañcahākārehi vipajjantī”ti lakkhaṇassa na tāva paññattattā anupajjhāyakādiṃ
tika-vin06t:1949_5: upasampādenti, vajjanīyapuggalānaṃ avuttattā paṇḍakupajjhāyādiṃ upasampādenti. Terasantarāyapucchāya
tika-vin06t:1949_7: kammena upasampādetu”nti evaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ anuññātakammavācāya “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti
tika-vin06t:1949_8: avacanamettha sādhakanti veditabbaṃ. Tañhi vacanaṃ anukkamenānuññātanti.
tika-vin06t:1951_0: 119. Idaṃ tāva sabbathā hotu, “mūgaṃ pabbājenti, badhiraṃ pabbājentī”ti idaṃ kathaṃ
tika-vin06t:1951_1: sambhavitumarahati ādito paṭṭhāya “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi
tika-vin06t:1951_2: pabbajja”ntiādinā anuññātattāti? Vuccate – “evañca pana, bhikkhave, pabbājetabboti.
tika-vin06t:1951_3: Evaṃ vadehīti vattabbo…pe… tatiyampi saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti ettha “evaṃ vadehīti
tika-vin06t:1951_4: vattabbo”ti imassa vacanassa micchā atthaṃ gahetvā mūgaṃ pabbājesuṃ. “Evaṃ vadehī”ti
tika-vin06t:1951_5: taṃ pabbajjāpekkhaṃ āṇāpetvā sayaṃ upajjhāyena vattabbo “tatiyaṃ saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:1951_6: gacchāmī”ti, so pabbajjāpekkho tathā āṇatto upajjhāyavacanassa anu anu vadatu vā,
tika-vin06t:1951_7: mā vā, tattha tattha bhagavā “kāyena viññāpeti, vācāya viññāpeti, kāyena vācāya viññāpeti,
tika-vin06t:1951_8: gahito hoti upajjhāyo. Dinno hoti chando. Dinnā hoti pārisuddhi. Dinnā hoti pavāraṇā”ti
tika-vin06t:1951_9: vadati. Tadanumānena vā kāyena tena pabbajjāpekkhena viññattaṃ hoti saraṇagamananti
tika-vin06t:1951_10: vā lokepi kāyena viññāpento “evaṃ vadatī”ti vuccati, taṃ pariyāyaṃ gahetvā mūgaṃ
tika-vin06t:1951_11: pabbājentīti veditabbaṃ. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade “mūgaṃ kathaṃ pabbājentī’ti pucchaṃ katvā
tika-vin06t:1951_12: tassa kāyappasādasambhavato kāyena pahāraṃ datvā hatthamuddāya viññāpetvā pabbājesu”nti
tika-vin06t:1951_13: vuttaṃ. Kiṃ bahunā, ayaṃ panettha sāro – yathā pubbe pabbajjādhikāre vattamāne pabbajjābhilāpaṃ
tika-vin06t:1951_14: upacchinditvā “paṇḍako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo”tiādinā nayena
tika-vin06t:1951_15: upasampadavaseneva abhilāpo kato. Theyyasaṃvāsakapade asambhavato kiñcāpi so na kato
tika-vin06t:1951_16: pabbajjāva tattha katā, sabbattha pana upasampadābhilāpena adhippetā tadanubhāvato.
tika-vin06t:1951_17: Upasampadāya pabbajjāya vāritāya upasampadā vāritā hotīti katvā. Tathā idha upasampadādhikāre
tika-vin06t:1951_18: vattamāne upasampadābhilāpaṃ upacchinditvā upasampadameva sandhāya pabbajjābhilāpo
tika-vin06t:1951_19: katoti veditabbo. Kāmaṃ so na kattabbo, mūgapade asambhavato tassa vasena ādito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin06t:1951_20: upasampadābhilāpova kattabbo viya dissati, tathāpi tasseva mūgapadassa vasena ādito
tika-vin06t:1951_21: paṭṭhāya pabbajjābhilāpova kato micchāgahaṇanivāraṇatthaṃ. Kathaṃ? “Mūgo, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:1951_22: appatto osāraṇaṃ, tañce saṅgho osāreti, sosārito”ti vacanato mūgo upasampanno hotīti
tika-vin06t:1951_23: siddhaṃ. So “kevalaṃ upasampannova hoti, na pana pabbajito tassa pabbajjāya asambhavato”ti
tika-vin06t:1951_24: micchāgāho hoti. Taṃ pariccajāpetvā yo upasampanno, so pabbajitova hoti. Pabbajito
tika-vin06t:1951_25: pana atthi koci upasampanno, atthi koci anupasampanno. Imaṃ sammāgāhaṃ uppādeti bhagavāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1952_0: Apica tesaṃ hatthacchinnādīnaṃ pabbajitānaṃ supabbajitabhāvadīpanatthaṃ, pabbajjābhāvāsaṅkānivāraṇatthañcettha
tika-vin06t:1952_1: pabbajjābhilāpo kato. Kathaṃ? “Na, bhikkhave, hatthacchinno pabbājetabbo”tiādinā
tika-vin06t:1952_2: paṭikkhepena, “pabbajitā supabbajitā”ti vuttaṭṭhānābhāvena ca tesaṃ pabbajjābhāvappasaṅkā
tika-vin06t:1952_3: bhaveyya. Yathā pasaṅkābhave, tathā pasaṅkaṃ ṭhapeyya. Khandhake upasampadaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:1952_4: “hatthacchinno, bhikkhave, appatto osāraṇaṃ, tañce saṅgho osāreti, sosārito”tiādinā
tika-vin06t:1952_5: nayena bhagavā nivāreti. Teneva pana nayena pabbajitā te sabbepi supabbajitā evāti
tika-vin06t:1952_6: dīpeti, aññathā sabbepete upasampannāva honti, na pabbajitāti ayamaniṭṭhappasaṅgo
tika-vin06t:1952_7: āpajjati. Kathaṃ? “Hatthacchinno, bhikkhave, na pabbājetabbo, pabbajito nāsetabbo”ti
tika-vin06t:1952_8: vā “na, bhikkhave, hatthacchinno pabbājetabbo, yo pabbājeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa,
tika-vin06t:1952_9: so ca apabbajito”ti vā tantiyā ṭhapitāya campeyyakkhandhake “sosārito”ti vuttattā
tika-vin06t:1952_10: kevalaṃ “ime hatthacchinnādayo upasampannāva honti, na pabbajitā”ti vā “upasampannāpi
tika-vin06t:1952_11: ce pabbajitā, nāsetabbā”ti vā aniṭṭhakoṭṭhāso āpajjatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:1953_0: Idaṃ panettha vicāretabbaṃ – “so ca apabbajito”ti vacanābhāvato mūgassa pabbajjasiddhippasaṅgato
tika-vin06t:1953_1: pabbajjāpi ekatosuddhiyā hotīti ayamaniṭṭhakoṭṭhāso kathaṃ nāpajjatīti? Pabbajjābhilāpena
tika-vin06t:1953_2: upasampadā idhādhippetāti sammāgāhena nāpajjati, aññathā yathābyañjanaṃ atthe gahite
tika-vin06t:1953_4: bhikkhave, mūgo pabbājetabbo, yo pabbājeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttadukkaṭaṃ pabbajjapariyosāne
tika-vin06t:1953_5: hoti, na tassāvippakatāya. Pubbapayogadukkaṭameva hi paṭhamaṃ āpajjati, tasmā mūgassa
tika-vin06t:1953_6: pabbajjapariyosānasseva abhāvato imassa dukkaṭassa okāso ca sabbakālaṃ na sambhaveyya.
tika-vin06t:1953_7: Upasampadāvasena pana atthe gahite sambhavati kammanipphattito. Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “na,
tika-vin06t:1953_8: bhikkhave, paṇḍako upasampādetabbo, yo upasampādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin06t:1953_9: na paññattaṃ. Apaññattattā pubbapayogadukkaṭameva cettha sambhavati, netaraṃ, ettāvatā
tika-vin06t:1953_10: siddhametaṃ “pabbajjābhilāpena upasampadā ca tattha adhippetā, na pabbajjā”ti.
tika-vin06t:1954: Etthāha – sāmaṇerapabbajjā na kāyapayogato hotīti kathaṃ paññāyatīti? Vuccate – kāyena viññāpetītiādittikādassanato. Hoti cettha –
tika-vin06t:1957_0: Brahmujugattoti ettha “niddosatthe, seṭṭhatthe ca brahma-saddaṃ gahetvā niddosaṃ
tika-vin06t:1957_1: hutvā uju gattaṃ yassa so brahmujugatto”ti likhitaṃ. Atha vā kāmabhogittā devindādayo
tika-vin06t:1957_2: upamāvasena aggahetvā brahmā viya ujugatto brahmujugatto. Mahākucchito ghaṭo mahākucchighaṭo.
tika-vin06t:1957_3: Tena samāno vuccati “mahākucchighaṭasadiso”ti. Galagaṇḍīti desanāmattamevetanti kathaṃ
tika-vin06t:1957_4: paññāyatīti? “Na, bhikkhave, pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭho pabbājetabbo”ti vacanato. Kilāsopi
tika-vin06t:1957_5: idhādhippetoti na kevalaṃ so eveko, kintu pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭho, pāḷiyaṃ āgatā
tika-vin06t:1957_6: rājabhaṭādayo dāsapariyosānā, rāhulavatthumhi āgatā ananuññātamātāpitaro cāti dasapi
tika-vin06t:1957_7: janā idhādhippetā. Tadatthadīpanatthameva likhitakakasāhatalakkhaṇāhate pubbe vuttepi
tika-vin06t:1957_8: ānetvā upālitthero idha hatthacchinnapāḷiyaṃ āha. Teneva campeyyakkhandhake “atthi,
tika-vin06t:1957_9: bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṃ, tañce saṅgho osāreti, ekacco sosārito, ekacco
tika-vin06t:1957_10: dosārito”ti imassa vibhaṅge “pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhā, rājabhaṭā, corakārabhedakaiṇāyikadāsā,
tika-vin06t:1957_11: ananuññātamātāpitaro cā”ti satta janā na gahitā, na ca labbhanti, aññathā imepi tassa
tika-vin06t:1957_12: vibhaṅge vattabbā siyuṃ. Na vattabbā tattha abhabbattāti ce? Evaṃ sante “saṅgho osāreti,
tika-vin06t:1957_13: ekacco dosārito”ti imassa vibhaṅge vattabbā paṇḍakādayo viya, na ca vuttā. Ubhayattha
tika-vin06t:1957_14: avuttattā na cime anubhayā bhavitumarahanti, tasmā avuttānameva dasannaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1957_15: saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ puna likhitakādayo vuttāti. Atha kimatthaṃ te idha uppaṭipāṭiyā vuttāti?
tika-vin06t:1957_16: Iṇāyikadāsānaṃ sosāritabhāvepi iṇāyikadāsā sāmikānaṃ dātabbāti tadadhīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1957_17: Teneva tattha vuttaṃ “palātopi ānetvā dātabbo”tiādi. Yo panettha coro katakammo pabbajati,
tika-vin06t:1957_18: rājabhaṭo vā sace katadoso, iṇāyikaggahaṇeneva gahitoti veditabbo. Atha vā yathāvuttalakkhaṇo
tika-vin06t:1957_19: sabbopi iṇāyikadāsānaṃ “sosārito”ti vattabbāraho na hotīti katvā tesaṃ parivajjanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1957_20: uppaṭipāṭiyā desanā upari ārohati, na heṭṭhāti dīpanato. Likhitako “sosārito”ti vuttattā
tika-vin06t:1958_0: Ettāvatā bhagavatā attano desanākusalatāya pubbe gahitaggahaṇena yathāvuttānaṃ dasannampi
tika-vin06t:1958_2: kovidānaṃ dīpitaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. Hoti cettha –
tika-vin06t:1960: Sandīpayantaṃ sugatassa vākyaṃ, cittaṃ vicittaṃva karotipī”ti.
tika-vin06t:1961_0: Etthāha – campeyyakkhandhake ūnavīsativasso ubhayattha avuttattā anubhayo siyāti?
tika-vin06t:1961_1: Na siyā avuttattā eva. Yadi hi tatiyāya koṭiyā bhavitabbaṃ, sā avassaṃ bhagavatā
tika-vin06t:1961_2: vattabbāva hoti, na ca vuttā, tasmā na so anubhayo hoti. Atha kataraṃ pakkhaṃ bhajatīti?
tika-vin06t:1961_3: Dosāritapakkhaṃ bhajati. Atha kasmā na vuttoti? Sikkhāpadena paṭisiddhattā. Upanāhaṃ
tika-vin06t:1961_4: bandhitvāti puna bandhanaṃ katvā. “Nānāvidhehi osadhehi pādaṃ bandhitvā āvāṭake pavesetvā
tika-vin06t:1961_5: kattabbavidhānassetaṃ adhivacana”nti likhitaṃ. Kappasīso vā hatthī viya. Gobhattanāḷikā
tika-vin06t:1961_6: nāma gunnaṃ bhattapānatthaṃ katanāḷikā. Upakkamukho nāma kudhitamukho vuccati, vātaṇḍiko
tika-vin06t:1961_7: nāma aṇḍakesu vuḍḍhirogena samannāgato. Vikaṭo nāma tiriyaṃ gamanakapādehi samannāgato.
tika-vin06t:1961_8: “Guṇi kuṇī”ti duvidho kira pāṭho. Yesañca pabbajjā paṭikkhittā, upasampadāpi tesaṃ
tika-vin06t:1961_9: paṭikkhittāvātiādi yasmā hatthacchinnādayo upasampadāvaseneva vuttā, tasmā te eva
tika-vin06t:1964_0: 120. “Na, bhikkhave, alajjīnaṃ nissayo dātabbo”ti iminā alajjīhi bhikkhūhi, sāmaṇerehi
tika-vin06t:1964_1: vā saddhiṃ dvepi dhammāmisaparibhogā paṭikkhittā honti nissayabhāve bhāvato tesaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1964_2: Yathāha “ācariyena, bhikkhave, antevāsiko saṅgahetabbo anuggahetabbo uddesena paripucchāya
tika-vin06t:1964_3: ovādena anusāsaniyā”tiādi upajjhāyassapi nissayappaṇāmanasambhavato, sopi saddhivihārikassa
tika-vin06t:1964_4: nissayoti veditabbaṃ, tasmā upajjhāyo ce alajjī hoti, na taṃ nissāya vasitabbanti
tika-vin06t:1964_5: siddhaṃ hoti. Bhikkhūnaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā samānabhāgo bhikkhu sabhāgo. Tassabhāvo
tika-vin06t:1964_6: bhikkhusabhāgatā. Taṃ bhikkhusabhāgataṃ. Yāva jānāmīti adhippāyena vasituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:1964_7: Bhikkhūhi sabhāgataṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Lajjibhāvaṃ. “Sattāhaṃ…pe… gahetabbo”ti ettha “sattāhamattaṃ
tika-vin06t:1964_8: vasissāmi, kiṃ bhikkhusabhāgatājānanenāti jānane dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā vasituṃ na labhatīti
tika-vin06t:1964_9: attho”ti likhitaṃ. “Bhikkhusabhāgataṃ pana jānanto sveva gamissāmi, kiṃ me nissayārocanenā”ti
tika-vin06t:1964_10: aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapetuṃ na labhati. “Pure aruṇaṃ uṭṭhahitvā gamissāmī”ti ābhogena sayantassa
tika-vin06t:1966_1: avassakāleyeva vassakāle addhānagamanassa pāḷiyaṃyeva paṭikkhittattā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin06t:1966_2: appamāṇaṃ sattāhaṃ vassacchedādivasena addhānagamanasambhavato, gacchantasseva vassakālagamanasambhavato
tika-vin06t:1966_3: ca. Antarāmagge…pe… anāpattīti nissayadāyakābhāveyeva. “Tassa nissāyā”ti pāṭhānurūpaṃ
tika-vin06t:1966_4: vuttaṃ, taṃ nissāyāti attho. “Yadā patirūpo nissayadāyako āgacchissatī”ti vacanena
tika-vin06t:1966_5: ayaṃ vidhi avassakāle evāti siddhaṃ. “Antovasse pana kassaci āgamanābhāvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1966_6: Sace so jalapaṭṭane vā thalapaṭṭane vā vasanto vassūpanāyikāya āsannāya gantukāmo
tika-vin06t:1966_7: suṇāti “asuko mahāthero āgamissatī”ti, taṃ ce āgameti, vaṭṭati. Āgamentasseva ce
tika-vin06t:1966_8: vassūpanāyikadivaso hoti, hotu, gantabbaṃ tattha, yattha nissayadāyakaṃ labhatīti.
tika-vin06t:1966_9: Pātimokkhuddesakābhāvena ce gantuṃ vaṭṭati, pageva nissayadāyakābhāvena. Sace so
tika-vin06t:1966_10: gacchanto jīvitantarāyaṃ, brahmacariyantarāyaṃ vā passati, tattheva vasitabbanti eke.
tika-vin06t:1967_0: 122. “Nāhaṃ ussahāmi therassa nāmaṃ gahetu”nti itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmatoti
tika-vin06t:1967_1: lakkhaṇato āha. “Gottenāpī’ti vacanato yena vohārena vohariyanti, tena vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin06t:1967_2: siddhaṃ, tasmā ‘ko nāmo te upajjhāyo’ti puṭṭhenāpi gottameva nāmaṃ katvā vattabbanti
tika-vin06t:1967_3: siddhaṃ hoti, tasmā catubbidhesu nāmesu yena kenaci nāmena anussāvanā kātabbā”ti
tika-vin06t:1967_4: vadanti. Ekassa bahūni nāmāni honti, tattha ekaṃ nāmaṃ ñattiyā, ekaṃ anussāvanāya
tika-vin06t:1967_5: kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, atthato, byañjanato ca abhinnāhi anussāvanāhi bhavitabbanti. Katthaci
tika-vin06t:1967_7: sāveti, “sāvanaṃ hāpetī”ti na vuccati nāmassa ahāpitattāti eke. Sace katthaci “āyasmato
tika-vin06t:1967_9: khettameva otiṇṇantipi eke. Byañjanabhedappasaṅgato anussāvane taṃ na vaṭṭatīti eke.
tika-vin06t:1967_10: Sace pana sabbaṭṭhānepi tatheva vadati, vaṭṭati bhagavatā dinnalakkhaṇānurūpattā.
tika-vin06t:1967_11: Lakkhaṇavirodhato aññathā na vaṭṭatīti ce? Na, payogānurūpattā. Tattha tathā, idha
tika-vin06t:1967_12: aññathā payogoti ce? Na, vipattilakkhaṇānaṃ virodhato. Na sabbena sabbaṃ, sāvanāhāpanā
tika-vin06t:1967_13: eva hi pāḷiyaṃ tadatthavibhāvane āgatāti aññapadesu sāvanesu parihāro na sambhavati
tika-vin06t:1967_14: āciṇṇakappavirodhato. Sopi kiṃpamāṇanti ce? Pamāṇaṃ ācariyuggahassa pamāṇattā.
tika-vin06t:1968_0: 123. Dve ekānussāvaneti ettha gaṇṭhipade tāva evaṃ likhitaṃ “ekato pavattaanussāvane”.
tika-vin06t:1968_1: Idaṃ sandhāyāti nānupajjhāyaṃ ekācariyaṃ anussāvanakiriyaṃ sandhāya, tañca anussāvanakiriyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1968_2: ekenupajjhāyena nānācariyehi anujānāmīti attho. Nānupajjhāyehi ekenācariyena na tveva
tika-vin06t:1968_3: anujānāmīti atthoti. Porāṇagaṇṭhipadepi tatheva vatvā “tiṇṇaṃ uddhaṃ na kenaci ākārena
tika-vin06t:1968_4: ekato vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ, na hi saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ karotīti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1968_5: Idaṃ panettha cintetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Cattāro vā atirekā vā upasampadāpekkhā saṅghavohāraṃ
tika-vin06t:1968_6: na labhanti bhikkhubhāvaṃ appattattā. Kevalaṃ bhagavatā paricchinditvā “tayo”ti vuttattā
tika-vin06t:1968_7: tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭatīti no takkoti ācariyo. Anugaṇṭhipadepi ayamevattho bahudhā
tika-vin06t:1968_8: vicāretvā vutto. Tathā andhakaṭṭhakathāyampi. Na sabbattha imasmiṃ atthavikappe matibhedo
tika-vin06t:1968_9: atthi. Yā panesā ubho paripuṇṇavīsativassā, ubhinnamekupajjhāyo, ekācariyo, ekā kammavācā,
tika-vin06t:1968_10: eko upasampanno, eko anupasampannoti parivārakathā, taṃ dassetvā eko ce ācariyo dvinnaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1968_11: tiṇṇaṃ vā upasampadāpekkhānaṃ ekaṃ kammavācaṃ ekenupajjhāyena sāveti, vaṭṭatīti eke.
tika-vin06t:1968_12: Taṃ ayuttaṃ, na hi sakkā sithiladhanitādibyañjanalakkhaṇasampannaṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe kammavācaṃ
tika-vin06t:1968_13: dassetuṃ vimuttadosādīsu patanato. Visuṃ visuṃ karaṇaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti dīpanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:1968_14: “tayo paripuṇṇavīsativassā, tiṇṇamekupajjhāyo, ekācariyo, ekā kammavācā, dve upasampannā,
tika-vin06t:1968_15: eko anupasampanno”ti na vutto. Evañhi vutte sakkā tīsu ākāsaṭṭhamapanetvā sīmaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1968_16: dvinnamanurūpaṃ kammavācaṃ dassetuṃ, tamaniṭṭhappasaṅgaṃ nivāretuṃ “ubho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1968_18: parisasampatti, kammavācāya anussāvanasampatti dassitā, sīmasampatti evekā na dassitā.
tika-vin06t:1968_19: Tato vipatti jātā kammavācānaṃ nānākkhaṇikattā. Ekakkhaṇabhāve sati ubhinnaṃ sampatti
tika-vin06t:1968_20: vā siyā vipatti vā, na ekasseva sampatti ekassa vipattīti sambhavati vimuttādibyañjanadosappasaṅgato”ti
tika-vin06t:1968_21: vuttaṃ, taṃ vacanaṃ ubhopi cete sīmagatāva honti, ubhinnaṃ ekato kammasampattidīpanato
tika-vin06t:1968_22: dvinnaṃ ekato anussāvanaṃ ekena upajjhāyena ekenācariyena vaṭṭatīti sādheti. Dvinnaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1968_23: tiṇṇañca ekato sasamanubhāsanā ca pāḷiyaṃyeva dassitā, tañca anulometi. Aṭṭhakathācariyehi
tika-vin06t:1968_24: nānuññātaṃ, na paṭikkhittaṃ, vicāretvā gahetabbanti ācariyo, taṃ dhammatāya virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:1969_0: Ayañhi buddhānaṃ dhammatā – yadidaṃ yattha yattha vacananānattamatthi, tattha tattha
tika-vin06t:1969_1: garukesu ṭhānesu vattabbayuttaṃ vadanti. Dūtena upasampadādayo cettha nidassanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1969_2: Yasmā cettha pubbe anuññātakammavācāya nānattaṃ natthi, tasmā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:1969_3: dve tayo ekānussāvane kātu”nti vatvā “evañca pana, bhikkhave, kātabbo”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1969_4: Nānatte satipi tattha tattha dvinnaṃ, bahūnaṃ vā vasena vuttakammavācānusārena gahetabbato
tika-vin06t:1969_5: avuttanti ce? Na hi lahukesu ṭhānesu vatvā garukesu avacanaṃ dhammatāti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:1969_6: Aññatarasmiṃ pana gaṇṭhipade evaṃ papañcitaṃ dve ekānussāvaneti dve ekato anussāvane.
tika-vin06t:1969_7: “Ekena” iti pāṭho, ekena ācariyenāti attho. Purimanayenevāti “ekena vā dvīhi vā ācariyehī”ti
tika-vin06t:1969_8: vuttanayena eva, tasmā ekenācariyena dve vā tayo vā anussāvetabbā. “Dvīhi vā tīhi
tika-vin06t:1969_9: vā”ti pāṭho. Nānācariyā nānupajjhāyāti ettha “tañca kho ekena upajjhāyena, na tveva
tika-vin06t:1969_10: nānupajjhāyenā”ti vuttattā na vaṭṭatīti ce? Vaṭṭati. Kathaṃ? Ekena anussāvane ekānussāvaneti
tika-vin06t:1969_11: viggahassa pākaṭattā līnameva dassetuṃ “ekato anussāvane”ti viggahova vutto, tasmā
tika-vin06t:1969_12: ujukattameva sandhāya tañca kho ekena anussāvanaṃ ekānussāvanaṃ, ekena upajjhāyena
tika-vin06t:1969_13: anujānāmi, na tveva nānupajjhāyenāti attho. Idaṃ sandhāya hi dvidhā viggaho, tasmā
tika-vin06t:1969_14: “nānācariyehi nānupajjhāyā na vaṭṭantīti siddhamevā”ti aññathāpi vadanti. Tañca kho
tika-vin06t:1969_15: ekena upajjhāyena ekassa upajjhāyassa vā vattabbaṃ anussāvanaṃ, na tveva nānupajjhāyena
tika-vin06t:1969_16: anujānāmīti attho. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? “Eko ācariyo, dve vā tayo vā upasampadāpekkhā
tika-vin06t:1969_17: dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā upajjhāyānaṃ na tveva anujānāmī”ti kira vuttanti. Aparasmiṃ pana
tika-vin06t:1969_18: gaṇṭhipade “ekena anussāvaneti viggahassa pākaṭattā taṃ pakāsetuṃ ‘ekenā’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1969_19: Evaṃ vutte avassaṃ paṇḍitā jānanti. Taṃpākaṭattā ce jānanti, ekenāti iminā kinti
tika-vin06t:1969_20: ce? Kiñcāpi jānanti, vivādo pana hoti aladdhalesattā, jānituñca na sakkā, ‘ekenā’ti
tika-vin06t:1969_21: vutte pana taṃ sabbaṃ na hotīti vutta”nti likhitaṃ. Evaṃ ettha aneke ācariyā ca takkikā
tika-vin06t:1969_22: ca anekadhā papañcenti, taṃ sabbaṃ suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā garukulaṃ payirupāsitvā
tika-vin06t:1969_23: vaṃsānugatova attho gahetabbo. “Na sabbattha imasmiṃ atthavikappe matibhedo atthī”ti vuttameva.
tika-vin06t:1971_0: 125. Kuṭṭhaṃ gaṇḍoti ettha kuṭṭhādiggahaṇena hatthacchinnādayopi gahitāva hontīti
tika-vin06t:1971_1: porāṇā, tasmā “manussosi purisosī”ti etehi bhabbābhabbapuggalaparivajjanaṃ karoti.
tika-vin06t:1971_3: vikappaṃ upathambheti. Tattha “aṇaṇosi bhujissosī”ti anukkamena avatvā uppaṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin06t:1971_4: vacanena bhujisso hoti, na ca rañño bhattavetanavasena bhaṭo. Rājādhīnattā pana so
tika-vin06t:1971_6: Aññathā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhānaṃ gahaṇeneva sabbesaṃ gahaṇe siddhe itare na vattabbā.
tika-vin06t:1973: 128-9. “Tāvadeva chāyā metabbā”tiādi “bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vandāpetvā”ti vacanato therātherabhāvajānanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. “Cirena agamāsī”ti kira porāṇapāṭho, ciraṃ akāsīti catthi.
tika-vin06t:1974_0: 130. Anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāseti ukkhittakena saddhiṃ sambhogasaṃvāsapaccayā pācittiyāpatti
tika-vin06t:1974_1: paññattā, tato anāpattīti attho. Kathaṃ paññāyatīti? Saṃvāsaggahaṇe. Alajjinā saddhiṃ
tika-vin06t:1974_2: sambhogapaccayā āpajjitabbaṃ dukkaṭaṃ pana āpajjati eva, na saṃvāsapaccayā. Na hi
tika-vin06t:1974_3: alajjinā saddhiṃ saṃvāso paṭikkhitto. Saṃvāso panettha sahaseyyappahonake āvāse sahavāso,
tika-vin06t:1974_4: na “pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti ettha vuttasaṃvāso. Ayaṃ saṃvāso ukkhittakena saddhiṃ
tika-vin06t:1974_5: na vaṭṭati. Alajjinā saddhiṃ ekacco vaṭṭati. Dhammasambhogavinimuttovetaro. Idaṃ
tika-vin06t:1974_7: vuttaṃ. Kiñca bhiyyo paṭipattikkamatova āpattito suddhi hoti, na vibbhamena, tasmā
tika-vin06t:1974_8: upasampanno bhikkhu antamaso dubbhāsitampi āpajjitvā aparabhāge vibbhamitvā āgato
tika-vin06t:1974_9: upasampajjati, taṃ āpattiṃ desetvāva sujjhati, na aññathāti upasampannassa suddhikkamadassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1974_10: Asādhāraṇāpattiyā adassanapaccayā ukkhittakassa liṅgaparivattanena āpattito vuṭṭhitassa
tika-vin06t:1974_11: puna ce pakatiliṅgamevuppajjati, nānāsaṃvāsakatāva, vibbhamitvā āgatepi yathāvuttanayeneva
tika-vin06t:1974_12: upasampādetvā na vuṭṭhitattāti ce? Na liṅgantarapātubhāvā. Na vibbhamena kammāsujjhanato.
tika-vin06t:1974_13: Na kammāsujjhane puna upasampadākammavipattippasaṅgato. Na ca kammavipatti, na ca
tika-vin06t:1974_14: kammapaṭippassaddhi. Vibbhamena ca anupasampanno nānāsaṃvāsakabhāvena kammaṃ kopeti
tika-vin06t:1974_15: dhammissarena āhacca bhāsitattā. Teneva “passissasī”ti anāgatavacanaṃ kataṃ. Tādiso
tika-vin06t:1974_16: pana gahaṭṭho nikkhittavattapārivāsiko viya pakatattabhūmiyaṃ vibbhamādinā anupasampannapakatiyaṃyeva
tika-vin06t:1974_17: tiṭṭhatīti imassa sabbassapi atthavikappassa dassanatthamidaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1974_18: Pubbe vuttappakāro pana parivattitaliṅgo hutvā puna pakatiliṅge ṭhitaukkhittako puna
tika-vin06t:1974_19: pucchitabbo “passasī”ti. “Āma passāmī”ti vadanto osāretabbo. “Desehī”ti na vattabbo
tika-vin06t:1974_20: liṅgaparivattanena vuṭṭhitattā. Tappaṭikammo ukkhittako pucchitabbo “paṭikammaṃ kiṃ
tika-vin06t:1974_21: te kata”nti, “āma kata”nti vadanto osāretabbo. “Kattabbaṃ me paṭikammaṃ na hotī”ti
tika-vin06t:1974_22: vadanto na osāretabboti eke. Asādhāraṇāpattimhi idaṃ vidhānaṃ, na sādhāraṇāya. Tattha
tika-vin06t:1974_23: ukkhittako liṅgaparivattaneneva paṭippassaddhakammoti eke. Vicāretvā yuttataraṃ gahetabbanti
tika-vin06t:1974_25: ‘sāraṇīyadhammapūrakādayo dassetvā alajjissa sahatthā dātuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti vadantānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1974_26: vādo paṭisedhetabbo. Kathaṃ? Ukkhittakassa sahatthā dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vinicchayānusārena.
tika-vin06t:1974_27: Dāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭatevāti ca. Kiñcāpi alajjiparibhogavasena dukkaṭaṃ, atha kho ayaṃ
tika-vin06t:1974_28: alajjī na hoti, tasmā sabbākārena nirāpattitaṃ sandhāya ‘anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāse’ti
tika-vin06t:1974_29: vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ paññāyatīti? Viññeyyo atthato ucchurasakasaṭānaṃ sattāhakālikayāvajīvikattā
tika-vin06t:1974_30: ‘vaṭṭati vikāle ucchuṃ khāditu’nti saññaṃ uppādetvā taṃ khāditvā tappaccayā pācittiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:1974_31: na passati, vaṭṭatīti tathāsaññitāya. Yo vā pana āpattiṃ āpannabhāvaṃ paṭijānitvā
tika-vin06t:1977_0: Vuttalakkhaṇe apatanato alajjino na honti, tasmā ‘yo āpattidesanapaṭikammāni na karoti,
tika-vin06t:1977_1: tena saddhiṃ sambhogādikaraṇe anāpattī’ti visesetvā vuttavacanena, itarenapi saddhiṃ
tika-vin06t:1977_2: kiñcāpi rūpiyasaṃvohāro na hoti, atha kho kayavikkayena āpatti hotiyevāti nayo dinno
tika-vin06t:1977_3: hoti, pañcahi saddhiṃ sabbathāpi anāpattīti nayo ca. Evaṃ sāpattiṭṭhānesu visesetvā
tika-vin06t:1977_4: ca vacanato idha tathā avuttattā tena saha alajjiparibhogo natthi. Bhajāpiyamāno
tika-vin06t:1977_5: pana alajjipakkhaṃ bhajatīti imināpi upāyena sabbattha taṃ taṃ saṃsanditvā attho
tika-vin06t:1977_6: pariyesitabboti apare. Ācariyā pana evaṃ na vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. “Sacāhaṃ na passissāmīti
tika-vin06t:1977_7: vadati, na pabbājetabbo”ti vuttattā pubbe āpannāpattiyo uppabbajitassāpi na paṭippassambhantīti
tika-vin06t:1977_8: siddhaṃ, teneva ācariyā āpattiṃ desāpetvāva sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ kārāpentīti ca anāpatti
tika-vin06t:1977_9: sambhoge saṃvāseti idaṃ pubbe āpannaṃ santiṃ eva āpattiṃ na passatīti āsaṅkitabbo.
tika-vin06t:1977_10: Sā paṭippassaddhāti ñāpanatthaṃ vuttanti ca eke. “Passissasī”ti gahaṭṭhattā desetuṃ
tika-vin06t:1977_11: na vaṭṭatīti anāgatavasena vuttaṃ. “Upasampādetvā passissasī”ti parivāsādinā kattabbassa
tika-vin06t:1977_12: atthibhāvena “passasī”ti avatvā anāgatavasena vuttaṃ, osāretvāti abbhānavasena. Tattha
tika-vin06t:1977_13: puna kātabbassa abhāvā “passasī”ti vuttaṃ. Idaṃ sabbaṃ sabbattha paṭijānanaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin06t:1977_14: vuttaṃ. Ekatrāpi puna na paṭijānāti, etena saha tassā āpattiyā anurūpena saṃvāso
tika-vin06t:1977_15: na kātabbo, alajjibhāvenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Diṭṭhiyātiādīsu osāraṇaṃ nāma samānakammādinā
tika-vin06t:1977_16: karaṇanti attho. Anāpatti sambhogeti ukkhittakena sambhoge anāpatti. Kasmā? Ukkhittakakammassa
tika-vin06t:1977_17: gahaṭṭhabhāvena paṭippassaddhattā, teneva “alabbhamānāya sāmaggiyā”ti vuttaṃ. Idāni
tika-vin06t:1977_18: bhikkhubhāve kattabbatoti keci. Dvīsupi vāresu kammapaṭippassaddhividhānaṃ teyeva
tika-vin06t:1977_19: jānanti, tasmā sabbavāresu yuttamayuttañca suṭṭhu sallakkhetvā kathetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1985_0: 132-3. Tena samayenāti attano ovādapātimokkhuddese dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā bhikkhūnaṃyeva
tika-vin06t:1985_1: visuṃ uposathakaraṇaṃ anujānitvā ṭhitasamayena. Ko pana soti? Majjhimabodhiyaṃ pātimokkhuddesappahonakasikkhāpadānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1985_2: pariniṭṭhānakālo. Tenevāha “tāni nesaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyya”nti. “Evañca pana,
tika-vin06t:1985_3: bhikkhave, uddisitabba”nti nidānuddesaṃ paññāpetukāmatāya ca sikkhāpadānaṃ uddesaparicchedanidassanatthañca
tika-vin06t:1985_4: vuttaṃ. Aññathā “evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyathā”ti sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1985_5: uddisitabbakkamassa dassitattā idāni “evañca pana, bhikkhave, uddisitabba”nti idaṃ
tika-vin06t:1985_6: niratthakaṃ āpajjati, idañca sabbasaṅghuposathaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1986_0: 134. “Yaṃnūna ayyāpi…pe… sannipateyyu”nti bahūnaṃ adhikārappavatti. Tatrāpi vinayaṃ
tika-vin06t:1986_1: āgamma vutto bhikkhu sāmi, na kevalaṃ saṅghattheroti dassanatthaṃ, saṅghassa gāravayuttavacanārahatādassanatthañca
tika-vin06t:1986_2: “suṇātu me, bhante”ti āha. Tattha sayaṃ ce thero, bhikkhuṃ sandhāya “āvuso”ti vattuṃ
tika-vin06t:1986_3: yujjati. Kathaṃ paññāyati? Buddhakāle saṅghatthero abyatto nāma dullabho. Sabbakammavācāya
tika-vin06t:1986_4: payoganidassane ca “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho” icceva bhagavā dassetīti ce? Evametaṃ
tika-vin06t:1986_5: tathā dassanato. Saṅghaṃ upādāya saṅghattherenāpi “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1986_6: bhikkhuṃ upādāya “āvuso”ti mahākassapassa kammavācāya payogadassanato, pārisuddhiuposathe
tika-vin06t:1986_7: ca therena bhikkhunā “parisuddho ahaṃ, āvuso”ti payogadassanato ca. “Yadi saṅghassa
tika-vin06t:1986_8: pattakalla”nti parato paññāpetabbe uposathakaraṇantarāye sandhāyāha. Uposathassa
tika-vin06t:1986_9: bahuvidhattā sarūpato vattuṃ “pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyā”ti āha. Ettāvatā ñattiṃ niṭṭhapesi.
tika-vin06t:1986_10: Ñattidutiyakammato eva hi uposathakammaṃ. Na, tatiyānussāvanasambhavatoti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1986_11: aññehi ñatticatutthakammehi asadisattā. Na hi ettha catukkhattuṃ “suṇātu me”ti ārabhīyatīti.
tika-vin06t:1986_12: Aññehi ñattidutiyehi asadisattā ñattidutiyampi māhotūti ce? Na, ñattidutiyakammassa
tika-vin06t:1986_13: aññathāpi kattabbato. Tathā hi ñattidutiyakammaṃ ekaccaṃ apalokanavasenapi kātuṃ
tika-vin06t:1986_14: vaṭṭati, na aññaṃ aññathā kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Kathaṃ paññāyatīti? Idameva uposathakammaṃ ñāpakaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1987_0: “Kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakicca”nti idaṃ na ñatti niṭṭhapetvā vattabbaṃ, tañhi ñattito
tika-vin06t:1987_1: puretarameva karīyatīti. Tasmā “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakiccaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1987_2: yadi saṅghassā”ti vattabbaṃ siyāti? Tathāpi na vattabbaṃ, na hi taṃ ñattiyā antokarīyatīti.
tika-vin06t:1987_3: Yadi evaṃ sabbattha na vattabbaṃ payojanābhāvāti ce? Na, yathāgataṭṭhāneyeva vattabbato,
tika-vin06t:1987_4: parapadāpekkhatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Idaṃ pubbakiccaṃ akatvā uposathaṃ karonto saṅgho,
tika-vin06t:1987_5: puggalo vā ṭhapanakkhettātikkame āpajjati. Na hi tasmiṃ khette atikkante sammajjanāsanodakapadīpakaraṇe
tika-vin06t:1987_6: āpattimokkho hoti. Uposathakammato pubbe kattabbakiccākaraṇapaccayattā tassā āpattiyā,
tika-vin06t:1987_7: na sā kammapariyosānāpekkhā etthāgatasampajānamusāvādāpatti viya, tasmā pātimokkhuddesako
tika-vin06t:1987_8: bhikkhu “pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocethā”ti vattukāmo paṭhamaṃyeva parisuddhāparisuddhapaccayaṃ
tika-vin06t:1987_9: pubbakiccaṃ sarāpeti. Tañhi kataṃ parisuddhapaccayo hoti, akataṃ aparisuddhapaccayo,
tika-vin06t:1987_10: teneva ubhayāpekkhādhippāyena “kataṃ na kata”nti avatvā “kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakicca”
tika-vin06t:1987_11: miccevāha. Tattha akatapakkhe tāva pārisuddhiārocanakkamanidassanatthaṃ parato “yassa
tika-vin06t:1987_12: siyā āpatti, so āvi kareyyā”ti ca, katapakkhe “asantiyā āpattiyā tuṇhī bhavitabba”nti ca vakkhati.
tika-vin06t:1988_0: Pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocetha. Kiṃkāraṇā? Yasmā pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmi. Ettha ca
tika-vin06t:1988_2: yvāyaṃ “dāni nesaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyya”nti ettha vuttapātimokkhuddeso, taṃ
tika-vin06t:1988_3: sandhāya “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”ti vuttanti eke. Yasmā “pañcime, bhikkhave, pātimokkhuddesā”ti
tika-vin06t:1988_4: vuttaṃ, tasmā vattamānassa nidānuddesasaṅkhātassa pātimokkhassa yadetaṃ ante “kaccittha
tika-vin06t:1988_5: parisuddhā”tiādikaṃ yāvatatiyānussāvanaṃ, tasseva āpattikhettattā, avayavepi avayavīvohārasambhavato
tika-vin06t:1988_6: ca idha āpattikhettameva sandhāya “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”ti vuttaṃ. Evañhi vutte
tika-vin06t:1988_7: yasmā parato āpattikhettaṃ āgamissati, tasmā āpattibhīrukā tumhe sabbeva paṭhamameva
tika-vin06t:1988_8: pārisuddhiṃ ārocethāti ayamattho sambhavati. Vattamānakālavasena vutte “pārisuddhiṃ
tika-vin06t:1988_9: āyasmanto ārocethā”ti vacanameva na sambhavati tadārocanassa paṭhamaṃ icchitabbattā,
tika-vin06t:1988_10: pageva tassa karaṇābhāvena “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”ti vacanaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo santiyā
tika-vin06t:1988_11: āpattiyā ārocane yujjati, na tuṇhībhāve, akammapariyosānā tuṇhībhāvappattito, evaṃ
tika-vin06t:1988_12: santepi tasmiṃ yujjateva. Pātimokkhuddesako hi aññamaññaṃ āpattiāvikaraṇaṃ akatvā
tika-vin06t:1988_13: tuṇhībhūte bhikkhū passitvā teneva tuṇhībhāvena ārocitapārisuddhiko hutvā “suṇātu
tika-vin06t:1989_0: Etthāha – paṭhamaṃ “saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyya, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyā”ti vuttattā idhāpi
tika-vin06t:1989_1: “saṅgho uposathaṃ karissati, pātimokkhaṃ uddisissatī”ti vattabbaṃ, atha “puggalassa
tika-vin06t:1989_2: uddesā”ti lakkhaṇattā yathārutameva vattabbaṃ, tathāpi “uposathaṃ karissāmi, pātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin06t:1989_3: uddisissāmī”ti vattabbanti? Na vattabbaṃ lakkhaṇavirodhato, aniṭṭhappasaṅgato ca.
tika-vin06t:1989_4: Puggalassa uddesā eva hi saṅghassa uposatho kato hoti, na puggalassa uposathakaraṇena.
tika-vin06t:1989_5: Tañca sova karissati, na saṅghoti aniṭṭhappasaṅgova āpajjati. “Suṇāthā”ti vutte acittasāmaggippasaṅgabhayā
tika-vin06t:1989_6: “suṇomā”ti vuttaṃ. “Suṇissāmā”ti vattabbaṃ “uddisissāmī”ti vuttattāti ce? Na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:1989_8: hissa tadadhippāyo atikkantoti. Yadi evaṃ kimatthaṃ taṃ sabbeheva āraddhanti ce?
tika-vin06t:1989_10: Saramānenāti iminā cassa sampajānamusāvādassa sacittakataṃ dasseti. Antarāyiko dhammo
tika-vin06t:1989_11: vutto bhagavatāti evaṃ akiriyasamuṭṭhānassāpi evaṃ parittakassa imassa musāvādassa
tika-vin06t:1989_12: mahādīnavataṃ dasseti. Visuddhāpekkhenāti sāvasesaṃ āpattiṃ upādāya anāpattibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin06t:1989_13: anavasesañca upādāya gihibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ visuddhiṃ icchantena kasmā āvi kātabbā? Antarāyabhāvānupagamanena
tika-vin06t:1989_14: phāsuvihārapaccayattā. Idha “ajjuposatho pannaraso”ti na vuttaṃ parato divasaniyamassa
tika-vin06t:1989_15: kattukāmatādhippāyena avuttattā. Evaṃ pana te bhikkhū sabbadivasesu uddisiṃsu.
tika-vin06t:1990_1: “Pañcannaṃ vā”ti mātikāyaṃ vuttānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Anajjhāpanno vāti puggalādhiṭṭhānadesanā.
tika-vin06t:1990_2: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade pana “‘uposathaṃ kareyyā’ti ettāvatā ñatti hoti. Yāvatatiyānussāvanā
tika-vin06t:1990_3: nāma ‘yassa siyā āpattī’tiādivacanattayaṃ, ante ‘dutiyampi tatiyampi pucchāmī’ti
tika-vin06t:1990_4: idañcāti duvidhaṃ. Tattha paṭhamaṃ āpattiṃ saritvā nisinnassa, dutiyaṃ asarantassa
tika-vin06t:1990_5: sāraṇattha”nti vuttaṃ. “Vacīdvāre”ti pākaṭavasena ujukameva vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi kāyaviññattiyāpi
tika-vin06t:1990_6: karīyati, kāyakammābhāvā pana vacīviññattiyāyeva āvi kātabbā. “Saṅghamajjhe vā”tiādi
tika-vin06t:1990_7: lakkhaṇavacanaṃ kira. Saṅghuposathakaraṇatthaṃ saṅghamajjhe ce nisinno, tasmiṃ saṅghamajjhe.
tika-vin06t:1990_8: Gaṇuposathakaraṇatthañce gaṇamajjhe nisinno, tasmiṃ gaṇamajjhe. Ekasseva santike
tika-vin06t:1990_9: ce pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kattukāmo, tasmiṃ ekapuggale āvi kātabbāti, “etena na kevalaṃ
tika-vin06t:1990_10: saṅghamajjhe evāyaṃ musāvādo sambhavati, atha kho ettha vuttalakkhaṇena asatipi ‘pārisuddhiṃ
tika-vin06t:1990_11: āyasmanto ārocethā’tiādividhāne gaṇuposathepi sāpattiko hutvā uposathaṃ kattukāmo
tika-vin06t:1990_12: anārocetvā tuṇhībhūtova karoti ce, sampajānamusāvādāpattiṃ āpajjatīti imassatthassa
tika-vin06t:1990_13: āvikaraṇato lakkhaṇavacanaṃ kireta”nti vadanti takkikā. Aññathā “gaṇamajjhevā”ti
tika-vin06t:1990_14: na vuttanti tesaṃ adhippāyo. Ārocanādhippāyavasena vuttanti no takkoti ācariyo. Ārocento
tika-vin06t:1990_15: hi saṅghassa ārocemīti adhippāyena āvi karonto saṅghamajjhe āvi karoti nāma. Attano
tika-vin06t:1990_16: ubhatopasse nisinnānaṃ ārocento gaṇamajjhe. Ekassevārocessāmi sabhāgassāti adhippāyena
tika-vin06t:1990_17: ārocento ekapuggale āroceti nāma. Pubbe vibhattapadassa puna vibhajanaṃ atthavisesābhāvadīpanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1991_0: 136-7. “Na, bhikkhave, devasikaṃ…pe… dukkaṭassā”ti vatvā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, uposathe
tika-vin06t:1991_1: pātimokkhaṃ uddisitu”nti idaṃ anuposathe eva taṃ dukkaṭaṃ, uposathe pana devasikampi
tika-vin06t:1991_2: vaṭṭatīti dīpeti, tasmā te bhikkhū cātuddasiyaṃ uddisitvāpi pannarasiyaṃ uddisiṃsu,
tika-vin06t:1991_3: tenāha “sakiṃ pakkhassā”ti. Tattha purimena sāmaggīdivaso uposathadivaso evāti dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:1991_4: Ubhayena aṭṭhamiṃ paṭikkhipitvā devasikaṃ paṭikkhepassa atippasaṅgaṃ nivāreti. Kiṃ
tika-vin06t:1991_5: vuttaṃ hoti? Bhinno ce saṅgho pāṭipadadivase samaggo hoti, tasmiṃ divase sāmaggīuposathaṃ
tika-vin06t:1991_6: karonto ubhayampi dukkaṭaṃ āpajjanto ubhayena ekībhūtena nivārito hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:1991_7: Aññathā sāmaggīuposatho na devasiko. Ce, ahorattaṃ kātabbo. Tasmiñca pakkhe pakatiuposatho
tika-vin06t:1991_8: na devasiko. Ce, ahorattaṃ kātabbo. Tasmiñca pakkhe pakatiuposatho anuddiṭṭho. Ce
tika-vin06t:1991_9: hoti, sāmaggīuposatho kātabboti āpajjati. Na apavādanayena gahetabbattāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:1991_10: aniṭṭhappasaṅgato. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Sāmaggīdivase sāmaggīuposathaṃ katvā puna tasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:1991_11: pakkhe pakatiuposathadivase sampatte pakatiuposatho na kātabboti. Apavādoti. Apavāditabbaṭṭhānato
tika-vin06t:1992_0: Kittāvatā nu kho sāmaggīti etthāyamadhippāyo – sāmaggī nāmesā sabhāgānaṃ sannipāto.
tika-vin06t:1992_1: Sabhāgā ca nāma yattakā sahadhammikā, te sabbepi honti, udāhu āvāsasabhāgatāya sabhāgā
tika-vin06t:1992_2: nāma hontīti. Tattha yadi sahadhammikānaṃ sāmaggī sāmaggī nāma, sabbesaṃ puthuvibhattānaṃ
tika-vin06t:1992_3: sāmaggī icchitabbā. Athāvasathavasena, ekāvāsasabhāgānanti vuttaṃ hoti. Aññathā ekāvāse
tika-vin06t:1992_4: sāmaggīti āpajjati. Mā no agamāsīti agato mā hoti.
tika-vin06t:1994_0: 138. Ekāvāsagatānaṃ vasena sāmaggiṃ paṭikkhipitvā ekasīmagatānaṃ vasena anujānitukāmo
tika-vin06t:1994_1: bhagavā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sīmaṃ sammannitu”nti āha. Atha āvāsaparicchedaṃ vattukāmo
tika-vin06t:1994_2: bhaveyya. Ettāvatā ekāvāso yāvatā ekāsīmā. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sīmaṃ sammannitu”nti
tika-vin06t:1994_3: vadeyya. Tasmā na idha anuññātabaddhasīmāvasena ekāvāsaparicchedo hoti, upacārasīmāvaseneva
tika-vin06t:1994_4: hotīti veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ jānitabbanti ce? Pāḷitova, yathāha “tena kho pana samayena
tika-vin06t:1994_5: āyasmā upanando sakyaputto eko dvīsu āvāsesu vassaṃ vasi…pe… ekādhippāya”nti. Aññathā
tika-vin06t:1994_6: vassacchedoti aniṭṭhappasaṅgova, kathaṃ? Ekāvāsavaseneva ce sāmaggī, bahuāvāsaanāvāsesu
tika-vin06t:1994_7: na sambhaveyya. Tato so taṃ āvāsaṃ gacchanto bahiddhā uposathaṃ karoti. “Na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:1994_8: tadahuposathe sabhikkhuko anāvāso gantabbo”tiādi -pāḷivirodho satipi saṅghe anāvāse
tika-vin06t:1994_9: uposathassa akattabbato. Anāvāsepi ce sāmaggī labbhati, “ettāvatā sāmaggī, yāvatā
tika-vin06t:1994_10: ekāvāso”ti na vattabbaṃ, tasmā sabbathā purimanayo pacchimeneva paṭikkhittoti katvā
tika-vin06t:1994_11: nānāvāsavasenapi sāmaggīti veditabbaṃ. “Taṃ kammaṃ karomāti vatvā na akaṃsū’tiādīsu
tika-vin06t:1994_12: viya anāgatampi apekkhati, tasmā ‘karomā’ti vutte na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. “Sīmaṃ asodhetvāpi
tika-vin06t:1994_13: nimittaṃ kittetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti likhitaṃ. Heṭṭhimakoṭiyā aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanubbedho hatthippamāṇo.
tika-vin06t:1994_14: Sace eko baddho hoti, na kātabboti ettha “catūsu disāsu catunnaṃ pabbatakūṭānaṃ heṭṭhā
tika-vin06t:1994_15: piṭṭhipāsāṇasadise pāsāṇe ṭhitattā ekābaddhabhāve satipi pathavito uddhaṃ tesaṃ sambandhe
tika-vin06t:1994_16: asati heṭṭhā pathavigatasambandhamatte abbohārikaṃ katvā kittetuṃ vaṭṭati. Teneva
tika-vin06t:1994_17: ‘piṭṭhipāsāṇo atimahantopi pāsāṇasaṅkhyameva gacchatī’ti vuttaṃ. Pathavito heṭṭhā
tika-vin06t:1994_18: tassa mahantabhāve gayhamāne pabbatameva hotī”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. “Cinitvā katapaṃsupuñje
tika-vin06t:1994_19: tiṇagumbarukkhā ce jāyanti, pabbato hotīti dhammasiritthero. Nevāti upatissatthero”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:1995: Pāsāṇoti “sudhāmayapāsāṇopi vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Vīmaṃsitabbaṃ iṭṭhakāya paṭikkhittattā. Dvattiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍappamāṇo tulatāya, na tulagaṇanāya. Sopīti khāṇuko viya uṭṭhitapāsāṇo.
tika-vin06t:1996_0: Catupañcarukkhanimittamattampīti ekaccesu nimittasaddo natthi. Ettha tayo ce sārarukkhā
tika-vin06t:1996_1: honti, dve asārarukkhā, sārarukkhānaṃ bahuttaṃ icchitabbaṃ. “Susānampi idha ‘vanamevā’ti
tika-vin06t:1996_2: saṅkhyaṃ gacchati sayaṃjātattā”ti vuttaṃ. Keci pana “catūsu dve antosārā ce, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:1996_3: Antosārā adhikā, samā vā, vaṭṭati. Tasmā bahūsupi dve ce antosārā atthi, vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1997: Parabhāgeti ettha “etehi baddhaṭṭhānato gatattā vaṭṭati. Tathā dīghamaggepi gahitaṭṭhānato gataṭṭhānassa aññattā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:1998_0: Anvaddhamāsanti ettha “anubaddho addhamāso, addhamāsassa vā anū”ti likhitaṃ. “Antaravāsako
tika-vin06t:1998_1: temiyatī”ti vuttattā tattakappamāṇaudakeyeva kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti keci. Temiyatīti iminā
tika-vin06t:1998_2: heṭṭhimakoṭiyā nadilakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Evarūpāya nadiyā yasmiṃ ṭhāne cattāro māse appaṃ
tika-vin06t:1998_3: vā bahuṃ vā udakaṃ ajjhottharitvā pavattati, tasmiṃ ṭhāne appodakepi ṭhatvā kātuṃ
tika-vin06t:1998_4: vaṭṭatīti eke. “Pavattanaṭṭhāne nadinimitta’nti vuttattā setuto parato tattakaṃ udakaṃ
tika-vin06t:1999_0: Jātassarādīsu ṭhitodakaṃ jātassarādipadesena anantarikampi nimittaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati
tika-vin06t:1999_1: nadipārasīmāya nimittaṃ viya. Sace so padeso kālantarena gāmakhettabhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin06t:1999_2: tattha aññaṃ sīmaṃ sammannituṃ vaṭṭati. Ukkhepimanti uddharitvā gahetabbakaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2000_0: Abaddhasīmavihārānaṃ sīmāya upacāraṃ ṭhapetvāti “āyatiṃ sammannitabbāya okāsaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti
tika-vin06t:2000_1: likhitaṃ. Antonimittagatehi panāti “ekassa upaḍḍhaṃ antokattukāmatāya sati sabbesaṃ
tika-vin06t:2000_2: āgamane payojanaṃ natthīti katvā ‘antonimittagatehī’ti vuttaṃ, tañca sāmīcivasenā”ti
tika-vin06t:2000_3: vadanti. Anāgamanampi vaṭṭatīti “sīmāya abaddhattā vaggaṃ nāma na hotī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2000_5: ca āgamanapayojanaṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Bherisaññaṃ vāti “sammannanapariyosānaṃ karomāti
tika-vin06t:2000_6: vatvā”ti likhitaṃ, tena tādise kāle taṃ kappatīti siddhaṃ hoti. Kiṃ iminā? Sukhakaraṇatthanti
tika-vin06t:2000_7: mahājanasannipātanaparissamaṃ akatvā appatarehi sukhakaraṇatthaṃ. Yadi mahāsīmābandhanakāle
tika-vin06t:2000_8: antarāyo hoti, tattakenapi sukhavihāroti dassanatthaṃ “paṭhama”nti vuttanti eke.
tika-vin06t:2000_9: Tato oraṃ na vaṭṭatīti kathaṃ paññāyatīti? Vīsativaggakaraṇīyaparamattā saṅghakammassa.
tika-vin06t:2000_10: Kammārahena saddhiṃ ekavīsati bhikkhū ce gaṇhāti, vaṭṭati. Tattakappamāṇaṃ sukhanisajjavasena
tika-vin06t:2000_11: veditabbaṃ. Tameva nimittaṃ aññepi kittetvā sace bandhanti, vaṭṭatīti eke.
tika-vin06t:2001_0: “Evaṃ baddhāsu pana…pe… sīmantarikā hi gāmakhettaṃ bhajatī”ti na āvāsavasena sāmaggīparicchedo,
tika-vin06t:2001_1: kintu sīmāvasenevāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. “Nimittupagapāsāṇe ṭhapetvā”ti sañcārimanimittassa
tika-vin06t:2001_2: tapparato vuttaṃ. Ito paṭṭhāya gaṇṭhipadakkamo hoti – na sakkhissantīti te avippavāsaṃ
tika-vin06t:2001_3: asallakkhetvā “samānasaṃvāsakameva samūhanissāmā”ti vāyāmantā samūhanituṃ na sakkhissanti.
tika-vin06t:2001_4: “Ekaratanappamāṇā”ti suviññeyyantarā hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. Ekaṅgulamattampi vaṭṭateva.
tika-vin06t:2001_5: Khaṇḍasīmato paṭṭhāya bandhanaṃ āciṇṇaṃ. Āciṇṇakaraṇena vigatasammoho hotīti. Kuṭigeheti
tika-vin06t:2001_6: kuṭighare bhūmighare. Udukkhalaṃvāti bhūmiudukkhalaṃ viya khuddakāvāṭaṃ. “Pamukhe”ti
tika-vin06t:2001_7: bhūmikuṭiṃ sandhāya vuttanti eke. Heṭṭhā na otaratīti bhittito oraṃ nimittāni ṭhapetvā
tika-vin06t:2001_8: kittitattā heṭṭhā ākāse na otarati, upari kate pāsādeti attho. Bhittilaggeti bhittinissitake.
tika-vin06t:2001_9: Ime kira bhittilaggāpi “ekābaddhā”ti na vuccanti. Sabbo pāsādo sīmaṭṭho hotīti ekābaddho
tika-vin06t:2001_10: vā hotu, mā vā. Tālamūlakapabbato nāma anupubbena tanuko. Ākāsapabbhāranti aparikkhepapabbhāraṃ.
tika-vin06t:2001_11: Susirapāsāṇo nāma leṇaṃ hoti. Antoleṇanti pabbatassa antoleṇaṃ. Dvāraṃ pana sandhāya
tika-vin06t:2001_12: parato “orato”ti vuttaṃ, sabbathāpi sīmato bahileṇena otaratīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:2002_0: Mahāsīmaṃ sodhetvāti sīmaṭṭhaṃ dūragatampi sīmagataṃ sīmasambandhaṃva, tasmā taṃ
tika-vin06t:2002_1: anāmasitvā ṭhātabbanti adhippāyo. Yadi evaṃ “tannissitakaṃ apanetvā kammaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin06t:2002_2: vaṭṭatī”ti vattabbaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyampi “sīmaṃ sodhetvā kātabba”nti ettakameva
tika-vin06t:2002_3: vuttaṃ. Mahātherāpi “sodhetabba”micceva vadantīti eke. “Mahāsīmaṃ sodhetvā vā kammaṃ
tika-vin06t:2002_4: kātabba”nti ca pāṭho atthi. “Vuttanayenevā”ti ca parato vakkhati, tasmā sādhāraṇapāṭhova
tika-vin06t:2002_5: sundaroti eke. Purimanayepīti khaṇḍasīmāya uṭṭhahitvā mahāsīmāya onatepīti attho.
tika-vin06t:2002_6: Ukkhipāpetvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Kasmā? Anto ṭhitattā. Rukkhassa heṭṭhā pathavigataṃ
tika-vin06t:2002_7: mūlaṃ khaṇḍasīmāva hoti, abbohārikaṃ vāti apare. “Majjhe pana chinne mahāsīmāya ṭhitamūlaṃ
tika-vin06t:2002_8: mahāsīmameva bhajati, khaṇḍasīmāya ṭhitaṃ khaṇḍasīmameva bhajati tadāyattapathavirasādīhi
tika-vin06t:2002_9: anuggahitattā”ti vuttaṃ. “Sīmāya pacchā uṭṭhitarukkhe nisīditvā kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati
tika-vin06t:2002_10: pacchāsīmāyaṃ katagehe viyā”ti vatvā “bandhanakāle ṭhitarukkhe nisīditvā kātuṃ na
tika-vin06t:2002_11: vaṭṭati uparisīmāya agamanato”ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti. Evaṃ sati bandhanakāle puna ārohaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:2002_12: nāma natthi, bandhitakāle eva āruhatīti āpajjati. Pacchā uṭṭhitarukkho pana tappaṭibaddhattā
tika-vin06t:2002_13: sīmasaṅkhyameva gato, evaṃ pubbe uṭṭhitarukkhopīti gahetabbaṃ. “Yaṃ kiñcipī”ti vacanato
tika-vin06t:2002_14: tiṇādipi saṅgahitaṃ. Mahātherāpi tiṇaṃ sodhetvāva karontīti.
tika-vin06t:2003_0: 140. Yasmā majjhato koṇaṃ hoti, tasmā “koṇato koṇa”nti vuttaṃ. “Āpattiñca āpajjati
tika-vin06t:2003_1: acittakattā”ti vadanti. Pārayatīti ajjhottharati. Kā sā? Sīmā. “Yā sabbantimena…pe…
tika-vin06t:2003_2: vahatī”ti tato heṭṭhimā nāvāsaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatīti katvā vuttanti eke, taṃ na yuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:2003_3: dutiyapārājike nāvaṭṭhabhaṇḍādhikāre tassāpi adhippetattā. Majjhimapurisassa bhārappamāṇena
tika-vin06t:2003_4: vuttanti eke. Bhikkhunīnampi nadīpārasīmāsambhavato tāsaṃ “ekā vā nadīpāraṃ gaccheyyā”ti
tika-vin06t:2003_5: vuttadosapariharaṇatthanti ācariyassa takko. Ubhayatthāpi dhuva-saddo gahito. Tena
tika-vin06t:2003_6: uposathantarāya pariharaṇatthaṃ uposathadivaso niyamatova vutto. Ettha ca nāvā nāma
tika-vin06t:2003_7: pamāṇayuttā sabbasādhāraṇā thambhanāvā adhippetā, na kullanāvāti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:2003_8: Rukkhaṃ chinditvā katoti attho. Sace ekaṃ gāmakhettaṃ, sabbanimittānaṃ anto ṭhite
tika-vin06t:2003_9: bhikkhū hatthapāsagate katvā sammannitabbā. Nānāgāmakhettaṃ ce, anāgamanampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2003_10: Ubhayatīre nimittakittanamattena dīpako saṅgahito na hoti, tasmā dīpake nimittāni
tika-vin06t:2003_11: kittetabbāneva. “Nadiyā heṭṭhā nisinnabhikkhu kammaṃ kopeti. Upariyeva hi nadī hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2006_0: 141. “Yaṃ saṅgho ākaṅkhati vihāraṃ vā…pe… guhaṃ vā”ti vacanato na kevalaṃ pathaviyaṃyeva,
tika-vin06t:2006_1: vihārādīnaṃ uparipi sīmā anuññātā hoti uposathakammapadhānattāti siddhaṃ. Tappadhānā
tika-vin06t:2006_2: sīmāti kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce? Tadadhikārānuññātattā, sammutiyaṃ “samānasaṃvāsā”ti
tika-vin06t:2006_3: ettāvatā siddhe visuṃ “ekūposathā”ti vacanato ca. “Uposathaṃ ṭhapetvā sesakammāni
tika-vin06t:2007_0: 142. Katovassāti ekasīmāya samagge sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aññathā nānāsīmāyaṃ ṭhitānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2007_1: savanaṃ pamāṇaṃ, ekasīmāyapi hatthapāsaṃ muñcitvā ṭhitānaṃ vā savanameva pamāṇanti
tika-vin06t:2007_2: aniṭṭhaṃ āpajjati. Tattha sammatāya vā asammatāya vāti uposathāgārasammutiyā, na
tika-vin06t:2007_3: sīmāsammutiyā. Kathaṃ paññāyatīti? Adhikārato, parato chandadānapaññattito, pārisuddhidānapaññattito
tika-vin06t:2007_4: ca. Tattha purimaṃ kāraṇaṃ purimaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ nivāreti, pacchimaṃ pacchimanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2007_6: Yāni kānici nimittāni kittetuṃ vaṭṭetīti idaṃ kathaṃ paññāyatīti? “Paṭhamaṃ nimittā
tika-vin06t:2007_7: kittetabbā nimitte kittetvā”ti ettakameva vuttattā. Paṭhamaṃ vuttattā na vuccantīti
tika-vin06t:2007_8: ce? Taṃ pana akāraṇaṃ, na hi buddhānaṃ desanāya ālasiyaṃ atthi. Sīmāsamūhananakāle
tika-vin06t:2007_9: uposathāgāraṃ samūhanitvāva sīmāsamūhananaṃ ijjhatīti eke. Taṃ ayuttaṃ abaddhāya
tika-vin06t:2007_10: sīmāya uposathāgārasammutisiddhitoti no takkoti ācariyo. Uposathamukhanti uposathāgārassa
tika-vin06t:2007_11: mukhanti ācariyā. Uposathamukhassa nimittakittanā sīmāya vuttanayena kātabbā. Ekenāpi
tika-vin06t:2007_12: kittetuṃ vaṭṭatīti eke. “Pāsādo vā hotu, maṇḍapādīsu vā aññataro. Kammavācāya pana
tika-vin06t:2007_13: ‘uposathamukha’micceva vattabba”nti vadanti. “Porāṇako āvāso nāma mūlāvāso”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2009_0: 143-4. “Manamhi vūḷho”ti vā pāṭho. Tattha manamhi vūḷhoti manaṃ vūḷho amhīti attho.
tika-vin06t:2009_1: Ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcāti antaragharasaṅkhātaṃ gāmañca gāmūpacārañca ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin06t:2009_2: Keci “parikkhittaṃ gāmaṃ sandhāya ‘gāma’nti vuttaṃ, aparikkhittaṃ sandhāya ‘gāmūpacāra”nti
tika-vin06t:2009_3: vadanti, taṃ pana aṭṭhakathāya virujjhati. Tasmā nivesanaracchādayo sandhāya gāmaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2009_4: parikkhepārahaṭṭhānāni sandhāya “gāmūpacāra”nti ca vuttaṃ. Ettha pana anekadhā paṭhanti.
tika-vin06t:2009_5: Kiṃ tena, pāḷiñca aṭṭhakathañca suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā yathā samenti, tathā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2009_6: Bhikkhūnaṃ purimakammavācā na vaṭṭatīti gāmagāmūpacāre antokatvā samānasaṃvāsakasīmāya
tika-vin06t:2009_7: sammatāya upari avippavāsasīmāsammutiyaṃ yujjati. Yattha pana kevalaṃ araññaṃyeva
tika-vin06t:2009_8: sammataṃ, tattha kathaṃ na vaṭṭatīti. Tattha “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti vacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:2009_9: na sātthakanti ce? Vuccate – evametaṃ, kintu anussāvanahānippasaṅgato taṃ vacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:2009_10: vattabbamevāti imināva adhippāyena “purimakammavācā na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ siyā. Ekasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:2009_11: vā atthe kammavācādvayaābhāvatoti vuttaṃ. “Na hi te aññamaññassa kamme gaṇapūrakā
tika-vin06t:2009_12: hontī”ti vuttattā ubhinnaṃ nānāsaṃvāsakasaṅghānampi ayameva vidhi āpajjeyyāti ce?
tika-vin06t:2009_13: Nāpajjati paṭiggahasannidhīnaṃ anuññātattā, omasanādipaccayā avisesato, kammapaṭippassaddhimattāpekkhatāya
tika-vin06t:2009_14: ca. Tassāti bhikkhunisaṅghassa. Na kammavācaṃ vaggaṃ karontīti kammaṃ na kopentīti
tika-vin06t:2009_15: attho. Etthāti ṭhapetvā gāmanti ettha. “Yadi bhikkhūnaṃ avippavāsasīmā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca
tika-vin06t:2009_16: na otarati, atha kasmā gāme sīmābandhanakāle avippavāsaṃ sammannantīti ce? Āciṇṇakappena,
tika-vin06t:2009_17: na tato aññaṃ kañci atthaṃ apekkhitvā”ti likhitaṃ. “Atthato hi sā bahiddhāpi abaddhā
tika-vin06t:2009_18: eva hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Antaragāme baddhā samānasaṃvāsasīmā yasmā gāmasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin06t:2009_19: tasmāti eke. Sopi sīmāsaṅkhyameva gacchatīti avippavāsasīmāsaṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti attho.
tika-vin06t:2009_20: Idaṃ panettha vicāretabbaṃ – gāmaṃ antokatvā baddhāya sīmāya puna avippavāsasammutiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2009_21: araññapadese ṭhatvā avippavāsakammavācā kātabbā, udāhu gāme ṭhatvāti? Gāme ṭhatvā
tika-vin06t:2009_22: katāyapi kappiyabhūmiyā pharatīti. Bahisīme ṭhitasammatadosānulomattā akappiyabhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2009_23: ṭhatvā na kātabbāti no takko, esa nayo samūhananepīti ācariyo. Khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ ṭhatvā
tika-vin06t:2010_0: 146. “Yassāyasmato khamati etissā sīmāya samānasaṃvāsāya ekūposathāya samugghāto,
tika-vin06t:2010_1: so tuṇhassā”ti andhakapotthake, sīhaḷapotthakesu ca kesuci pāṭho atthi. Kesuci “samugghāto
tika-vin06t:2010_2: etissā sīmāyā”ti paṭhamaṃ likhanti, kesuci “etissā sīmāya samugghāto”ti ca.
tika-vin06t:2012_0: 147. Sā cāti sā paricchinditvā dinnagāmasīmā ca itarā ca. Sā katamāti ce? “Pakatigāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin06t:2012_1: Baddhasīmāsadisāyeva hontīti sā ca hoti itarā ca hotīti adhippāyo, tasmāyeva “ticīvaravippavāsaparihāraṃ
tika-vin06t:2012_2: labhatī”ti ekavacanaṃ kataṃ, taṃ na yuttaṃ ubhinnampi gāmattāti eke. “Honti, na labhantī”ti
tika-vin06t:2012_3: ca bahuvacanampi karontīti. “Sā ca itarā cā”ti vuttā “majjhe bhinditvā dinnagāmasīmā
tika-vin06t:2012_4: pakatigāmādayo abhinnā”ti ca vadanti. “Bhikkhuvasatī”ti pāṭho, “vasantī”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2012_5: “Athassa ṭhitokāsato”ti vuttattā ekavacanameva yuttaṃ. Sabbā, bhikkhave, nadī asīmāti
tika-vin06t:2012_6: kataraṃ sīmaṃ paṭikkhipati? Baddhasīmaṃ, ekādasavipattisīmaññatarappasaṅgatoti ācariyā.
tika-vin06t:2012_7: Sace paṭhamaṃ sīmāya baddhāya pacchā nadiādayo honti, paṭikkhepoti pasaṅgo āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:2012_8: tasmā abaddhasīmameva paṭikkhipati. Yathā sabbo gāmo gāmasīmā, tathā sabbā nadī asīmā.
tika-vin06t:2012_9: Kintu tassa tassa bhikkhuno udakukkhepasīmāti sīmānānattaṃ dassetīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:2012_10: Yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepāti pana ekissā nadiyā catuvaggādīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:2012_13: viyāti ācariyā, tasmā udakukkhepaparicchedābhāvepi antonadiyaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2013_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – tattha nāvāgato ce, nāvāyaṃ vuttanayena. Satthagato ce, satthe
tika-vin06t:2013_1: vuttanayena. So ce atirekacātumāsaniviṭṭho, gāme vuttanayena ticīvarāvippavāso veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:2013_2: Tatthāpi ayaṃ viseso – sace sattho udakukkhepassa anto hoti, udakukkhepasīmāpamāṇanti
tika-vin06t:2013_3: eke. Satthova pamāṇanti ācariyā. Sace panettha bahū bhikkhūtiādimhi keci adhiṭṭhānuposathaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2013_4: keci gaṇuposathaṃ, keci saṅghuposathanti vattukāmatāya “bahū saṅghā”ti avatvā “bhikkhū”ti
tika-vin06t:2013_5: vuttaṃ. Ūnakaṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti ettha sīmāsambhedasambhavatoti upatissatthero. Ṭhapente
tika-vin06t:2013_6: hi ūnakaṃ na ṭhapetabbaṃ. “Aṭhapetumpi vaṭṭati evā”ti vuttaṃ. Gacchantiyā panāti
tika-vin06t:2013_7: ettha “udakukkhepamanatikkamitvā parivattamānāya kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti likhitaṃ. Aññissā
tika-vin06t:2013_8: sīmāya ñattītiādi kiṃ sīmato kammavipattibhayā vuttaṃ, udāhu parisatoti? Ekakammassa
tika-vin06t:2013_9: nānāsīmāya asambhavato sīmatoti. Ekakammassa nānāsīmaṭṭhasaṅghena asambhavato parisatotipi
tika-vin06t:2013_10: eke. “Savanaṃ hāpetī”ti vuttadosappasaṅgatoti no takko. Ekissā hi sīmāya ekaṃ kammaṃ
tika-vin06t:2014_0: Bahinaditīre jātarukkhassa antonadiyaṃ paviṭṭhasākhāya vāti ettha ca naditīre khāṇukaṃ
tika-vin06t:2014_1: koṭṭetvāti ettha ca sace pana setu vā setupādā vā bahitīre patiṭṭhitāti ettha ca
tika-vin06t:2014_2: sīmāsodhanaṃ nāma gāmasīmaṭṭhe hatthapāsānayanaṃ. Khaṇḍasīmāya uṭṭhitarukkhato viyojetvā
tika-vin06t:2014_3: kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā? Tīraṭṭhe rukkhe baddhanāvāya gāmo ādhāroti. “Ubhatobhāgena
tika-vin06t:2014_4: gāmasīmaṃ phusitvā ṭhitasetu khaṇḍasīmāmahāsīmāyo phusitvā ṭhitarukkhena upametabbo”ti
tika-vin06t:2014_5: ca likhitaṃ. Tattha purimanaye tāva idaṃ vicāretabbaṃ – tādise ṭhāne katakammaṃ kiṃ
tika-vin06t:2014_6: nadiyaṃ katasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati, udāhu gāmasīmāyaṃ, atha ubhayatthāti? Kiñcettha taṃ
tika-vin06t:2014_7: ce nadiyaṃ katasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati, udakukkhepasīmāva sodhetabbā, na itarā. Atha gāmasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2014_8: katasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati, udakukkhepasīmā na sodhetabbā. Yadi ubhayattha katasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2014_9: gacchati, dvīsu sīmāsu ekakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti aniṭṭhappasaṅgo āpajjati. Tato “aññissā
tika-vin06t:2014_10: sīmāya ñatti, aññissā anussāvanā hotī”ti idañca “khaṇḍasīmāmahāsīmaṭṭhānaṃ kāyasāmaggiyā
tika-vin06t:2014_11: kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idañcāniṭṭhaṃ āpajjatīti? Ettha vuccate – yathāvuttaṃ kammaṃ
tika-vin06t:2014_12: ubhayattha katasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati, na ca yathāvuttaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ āpajjati. Kasmā? “Ñattianussāvanānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2014_13: ekekasīmāyaṃ pavattattā, kārakabhikkhūnaṃ vā ekekasīmāyaṃ ṭhitattā”ti vadanti. Ubhayatthāpi
tika-vin06t:2014_14: ṭhātuṃ sakkuṇeyyatāya pana taṃ akāraṇaṃ. Ekībhāvaṃ upagatasīmaṭṭhāne katattāti idaṃ
tika-vin06t:2014_15: acalakāraṇaṃ. Ekībhāvaṃ upagatāsu hi dvīsu nadīgāmasīmāsu kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin06t:2014_16: ca. Sattabbhantarasīmāyaṃ ce nadī hoti, samuddo vā, jātassaro vā. Tesu ṭhitabhikkhu
tika-vin06t:2014_17: sattabbhantarasīmāyaṃ ṭhitasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati. Tattha ce nadiādilakkhaṇaṃ appatto
tika-vin06t:2014_18: dīpako, pāsāṇo, rukkho vā hoti, sattabbhantarasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Manussehi vaḷañjanaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2014_19: ce taṃ hoti, gāmakhettasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Kataragāmakhettaṃ? Yato manussā sañcaranti,
tika-vin06t:2014_20: sabbe ce sañcaranti, visuṃ gāmakhettasaṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti ca ācariyā.
tika-vin06t:2015_0: Pacchimanaye sace setu nadīlakkhaṇaṭṭhānaṃ aphusitvā ṭhito, gāmasīmāsaṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin06t:2015_1: Tattha eko ce gāmo, taṃ sodhetvā, dvīsu tīresu sace dve, dvepi gāme sodhetvā kammaṃ
tika-vin06t:2015_2: kātabbaṃ. Evañhi kataṃ ubhayatra kataṃ hoti. Iminā nayena dvīsu nadīsu, jātassaresu
tika-vin06t:2015_3: ca ekakammapasiddhi veditabbā. Ayaṃ pana nayo khaṇḍasīmāmahāsīmānampi labbhateva.
tika-vin06t:2015_4: Sace setu nadīlakkhaṇaṭṭhānaṃ phusitvā ṭhito, udakukkhepasīmāpi sodhetabbā.
tika-vin06t:2019: Ekakammaṃ siyā tassa, kopo parisato siyāti.
tika-vin06t:2020_0: Ayaṃ panettha viseso – nadiyaṃ karontānaṃ udakukkhepato bahi rukkhādisambandho appamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2020_1: Gāme karontānaṃ nadiyaṃ sambandharukkhassa udakukkhepato bahi ṭhitabhikkhu appamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2020_2: tato oraṃ pamāṇaṃ. Baddhasīmāya sambandharukkhassa baddhasīmāya ṭhitabhikkhu pamāṇanti
tika-vin06t:2020_3: veditabbaṃ, teneva vuttaṃ “sīmaṃ sodhetvā kammaṃ kātabba”nti. “Sace pana setu vā
tika-vin06t:2020_4: setupādā vā bahitīre patiṭṭhitā kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vacanampi pārohādīsu viya
tika-vin06t:2020_5: sakalasīmāsodhanameva kātabbanti sādheti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Ativuṭṭhikāle panāti ettha
tika-vin06t:2020_6: ativuṭṭhi nāma yathā cātumāsikāyāti veditabbā, tasmā catumāsaṃ ativuṭṭhiyeva sace
tika-vin06t:2020_7: hoti, sabbopi oghena otthaṭokāso nadī eva. Atha ekissāpi ativuṭṭhiyā ogho catumāsaṃ
tika-vin06t:2020_8: tiṭṭhati, sandati vā, bahitīre patiṭṭhitaoghena otthaṭokāso sabbopi nadī eva. Nadiṃ
tika-vin06t:2020_9: ottharitvā sandanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāyāti tameva vā nadiṃ aññaṃ vā apubbaṃ vā padesaṃ
tika-vin06t:2020_10: attano pavattavasena nadilakkhaṇappattaṃ ottharitvā sandanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2020_11: Gāmanigamasīmaṃ ottharitvāti catumāsappavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Agamanapatheti tadahu
tika-vin06t:2020_12: gatapaccāgataṃ kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyake”ti likhitaṃ. Yaṃ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2020_13: taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Kasmā? Nadiyampi taṃdosappasaṅgato. Tipusakādīti ettha ādi-saddena
tika-vin06t:2020_14: kamaluppalādīnipi saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Sabbopi ajātassaro hoti, gāmasīmāsaṅkhyameva
tika-vin06t:2020_15: gacchatīti yehi kataṃ, tesaṃ gāmasīmāsaṅkhyaṃ vā, samantato tīraṭṭhagāmehi ce kataṃ,
tika-vin06t:2020_16: sabbagāmasaṅkhyaṃ vā, aññehi gāmakhettehi asambandhaṭṭhānaṃ ce, visuṃgāmasīmāsaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2021_0: 148. Saṃsaṭṭhaviṭapāti iminā āsannattaṃ dīpeti, tena padesasambhindanā idha sambhedoti
tika-vin06t:2021_1: dīpeti. So pana vaḍḍhanto sīmāsaṅkaraṃ karotīti baddhasīmaṭṭhānappavesanavasena “ekadesabaddhasīmā”ti
tika-vin06t:2021_2: vattabbato saṅkaradoso hoti. Na, bhikkhave, sīmāya sīmā sambhinditabbāti ettha “paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin06t:2021_3: baddhasīmāya pacchā attanā bandhitabbasīmā na sambhinditabbā”ti eke adhippāyaṃ saṃvaṇṇayanti.
tika-vin06t:2021_4: Paṭhamaṃ sammatasīmāyaṃ sambhedābhāvato svādhippāyo ajjhottharaṇena yujjati, tasmā
tika-vin06t:2021_5: pacchā bandhitabbasīmāya paṭhamaṃ baddhasīmā na sambhinditabbā. Sakalaṃ vā ekadesato
tika-vin06t:2021_6: vā nimittānaṃ antokaraṇena paṭhamaṃ baddhasīmāya sīmantarike akittetvā sammannanato
tika-vin06t:2021_7: hi sambhindati nāma, paresaṃ baddhasīmaṃ sakalaṃ vā ekadesato vā nimittānaṃ antokaraṇena
tika-vin06t:2021_8: ajjhottharati nāma, tenevāha “sīmaṃ sammannantena sīmantarikaṃ ṭhapetvā”tiādi. Tassattho
tika-vin06t:2021_9: – paṭhamaṃ baddhasīmāya sīmantarikaṃ pacchā bandhitabbasīmāya nimittabhūtaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin06t:2021_10: pacchā sīmaṃ sammannitunti. Imā dvepi vipattiyo bhikkhubhikkhunīsīmānaṃ aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin06t:2021_11: na sambhavanti. So pana vaḍḍhanto sīmāsaṅkaraṃ karotīti ettha kevalaṃ sīmāsaṅkarameva
tika-vin06t:2021_12: karoti. Tasmiṃ katakammāni na kuppantīti keci, taṃ nayuttaṃ sākhāpārohachedanasīmāsodhanānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2021_13: vuttattā. Idaṃ sabbaṃ suṭṭhu vicāretvā garukule payirupāsitvā gahetabbayuttakaṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2023_0: 149. “Dveme, bhikkhave, uposathā”ti tadā sāmaggīuposathassa ananuññātattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2023_1: Sāmaggīuposathassa pubbakicce “ajjuposatho sāmaggī”ti vattabbaṃ, na ca kammavācāya
tika-vin06t:2023_2: bhagavatā payogo dassito, pāḷinayato aṭṭhakathācariyehi uddisitabbakkamo dassito.
tika-vin06t:2023_3: Tathā pañcannaṃ pātimokkhuddesānaṃ uddesakkamo siddhoti veditabbaṃ. Tayo vā dve vā
tika-vin06t:2023_4: pātimokkhaṃ uddisanti, adhammena samaggaṃ nāma hotīti ettha kāmaṃ saṅghassa sāmaggī
tika-vin06t:2023_5: nāma hoti vaggakathāya yathākammaṃ sāmaggīvavatthānato. Tathāpi vaggapaṭipakkhabhāvena
tika-vin06t:2023_6: samaggaṃ, samaggapaṭipakkhabhāvena ca vaggaṃ nāma kataṃ. Āveṇikato vā gaṇakammādisambhavato,
tika-vin06t:2023_7: tassa ca samaggavaggabhāvasambhavato vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Dhammena vagganti ettha
tika-vin06t:2023_8: pārisuddhikaraṇaṃ dhammikaṃ, saṅghasseva chandāgamanaṃ, na gaṇassāti katvā vaggaṃ
tika-vin06t:2023_9: nāma hoti. “Ekavāraṃ kataṃ sukataṃ, āpattiṃ pana āpajjati, puna kātuṃ na labhantī”ti
tika-vin06t:2023_10: vadanti. “Pañcasu ekassa chandaṃ āharitvā catūhi pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin06t:2023_11: vadanti, taṃ yuttaṃ, chandahārake bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ patte tena saṅgho pahoti, tasmā
tika-vin06t:2025_0: 150. Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho…pe… āvikatā hissa phāsu hoti,
tika-vin06t:2025_1: tatthāyasmante pucchāmi…pe… tasmā tuṇhī. Evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti vatvā ‘uddiṭṭhaṃ kho
tika-vin06t:2025_2: āyasmanto nidāna’ntiādinā nayena avasese sutena sāvite uddiṭṭho hotī”ti vuttattā
tika-vin06t:2025_3: “evametaṃ dhārayāmīti sutā kho panāyasmantehī”ti ettha “dhārayāmī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin06t:2025_4: kho āyasmanto nidāna”nti vacanaṃ saṃkhittanti gahetabbaṃ, teneva khuddakapeyyālavasena
tika-vin06t:2025_5: likhitaṃ. Evaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi “āvikatā hissa phāsu hoti, tatthāyasmante”ti
tika-vin06t:2025_6: etthāpi “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidāna”nti vacanaṃ saṃkhittanti gahetabbanti eke.
tika-vin06t:2025_7: Keci “avivadamānehi sikkhitabba’nti vutte nidānuddeso niṭṭhito nāma hoti, tasmā anāvikaronto
tika-vin06t:2025_8: āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Kasmā? “Nidānaṃ uddisitvā”ti niṭṭhānavacanena
tika-vin06t:2025_9: hi nidānassa niṭṭhitabhāvo vutto, nidānāvasāne ca āpatti vuttāti. “Sarabhaññaṃ nāma
tika-vin06t:2025_10: sarena bhaṇana”nti likhitaṃ. Sajjhāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvāti “sajjhāyaṃ karomī”ti cittaṃ
tika-vin06t:2025_11: uppādetvā. “Āpucchāmīti vuttamattena kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Taṃ tuṇhībhāve
tika-vin06t:2025_12: yujjati. “Athāpi lābhādinā abhibhūto vāreti, taṃ na pamāṇa”nti vadanti. Eseva nayoti
tika-vin06t:2027: 154. “Tesaṃ anupaddavatthāyā”ti saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ na karoti, aññopi upaddavo bahūnaṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2029_0: 155. “Therādhikaṃ pātimokkha”nti vatvāpi pacchā avisesena “yo tattha byatto paṭibalo,
tika-vin06t:2029_1: tassādheyya”nti vuttattā “bhante”ti vacanaṃ therassāpi atthīti siddhaṃ hoti. “Gacchāvuso
tika-vin06t:2029_2: saṃkhittena vā vitthārena vā”ti vacanato asatipi antarāye thāmaṃ pamāṇanti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2031: 163. “Sacassa saddhiṃcarā bhikkhuupaṭṭhākā atthī”ti pāṭho. “Utuvasseti utusaṃvacchare hemantagimhesū”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2033_0: 164. Pārisuddhiṃ dammīti “sāpattiko therānaṃ deti, sampajānamusāvāde dukkaṭaṃ sambhavatī”ti
tika-vin06t:2033_1: ācariyena likhitaṃ. Kiṃ nu kho kāraṇaṃ? Sampajānamusāvādena dukkaṭāpatti nāma kevalaṃ
tika-vin06t:2033_2: bhagavatā vuttattā akiriyasamuṭṭhānā hotīti. “Pārisuddhiṃ dammī”ti ettha pana kiriyā
tika-vin06t:2033_3: paññāyati, tasmā sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṃ viya dissati, suṭṭhu upaparikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2033_4: Mahantā hi te ācariyā nāma. Tattha “dammī”ti attano uposathakammanibbattinimittaṃ
tika-vin06t:2033_5: vuttaṃ. “Harā”ti ca “ārocehī”ti ca hārakassa anārocanapaccayā dukkaṭamocanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:2033_6: vuttaṃ. Eseva nayo chandadānepi. Tattha “dammī”ti attano cittasāmaggidīpanavacanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2033_7: sesaṃ vuttanayameva, evaṃ upatissatthero vaṇṇeti. Atha vā paṭhamaṃ samaggabhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:2033_8: sandhāya, dutiyaṃ pacchā vidhātabbabhāvaṃ, tatiyaṃ chandahārakassa dukkaṭamocanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:2033_9: vuttaṃ. Ubhayatthāpi “saṅghappatto pakkamatī”tiādivacanato saṅghe samagge eva chandapārisuddhidānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2033_10: ruhati, nāsamaggeti siddhaṃ. “Saṅghappatto ukkhittako paṭijānāti, āhaṭā hoti pārisuddhī”tiādivacanato
tika-vin06t:2033_11: ukkhittakādīnampi chandapārisuddhidānaṃ ruhatīti siddhaṃ, tañca kho pakatattasaññāya,
tika-vin06t:2033_12: no aññathāti takko. Jānitvā sāmaṇerassa dinne na yāti, āpatti ca, ajānitvā dinne
tika-vin06t:2033_13: yāti ca, anāpattīti eke. Biḷālasaṅkhalikā nāma pārisuddhīti ettha saṅkhalikā nāma
tika-vin06t:2033_14: anantarena sambajjhati, aññena ca saṅkhalikenāti kevalaṃ saṅkhalikā pārisuddhi nāma
tika-vin06t:2033_15: hotīti upatissatthero. Evaṃ sante visesanaṃ niratthakaṃ hoti. Biḷālasaṅkhalikā baddhāva
tika-vin06t:2033_16: hoti antogehe eva sampayojanattā. Yathā sā na katthaci gacchati, tathā sāpi na katthaci
tika-vin06t:2035_0: 165-7. “Chandaṃ datvā khaṇḍasīmaṃ vā sīmantarikaṃ vā bahisīmaṃ vā gantvā āgato bhikkhu
tika-vin06t:2035_1: kammaṃ na kopeti, tasmā gamikabhikkhūnaṃ chandaṃ gaṇhitvā khaṇḍasīmaṃ bandhitvā puna
tika-vin06t:2035_2: vihārasīmaṃ bandhituṃ tesaṃ chandaṃ na gaṇhantī”ti vadanti. “Muhuttaṃ ekamantaṃ hothā”tiādivacanato
tika-vin06t:2035_3: yaṃ kiñci bhikkhukammaṃ gahaṭṭhādīsu hatthapāsagatesu na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Nissīmanti
tika-vin06t:2035_4: bahisīmaṃ. Tassa sammutidānakiccaṃ natthīti tasmiṃ satipi vaṭṭatīti attho. Āsanena
tika-vin06t:2035_5: saha udakanti attho. Pannarasopīti api-saddo cātuddasiṃ sampiṇḍeti, tena vuttaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2035_6: “yadi no eta”nti. “Ajja me uposatho pannaraso”ti adhiṭṭhānaṃ sadā na kiñci, na aññathāti eke.
tika-vin06t:2037_0: 169-170. Paṭidesemīti yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vutte desanā ca paṭiggaho ca hotiyeva diṭṭhāvikammena
tika-vin06t:2037_1: visuddhiyā vuttattāti keci. Vematikena “ahaṃ, bhante, ekissā thullaccayāpattiyā vematiko,
tika-vin06t:2037_2: yadā nibbematiko bhavissāmi, tadā taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissāmī”ti vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ kate
tika-vin06t:2037_3: yāva nibbematiko na hoti, tāva sabhāgāpattiṃ paṭiggahetuṃ na labhati, aññesañca kammānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2037_4: parisuddho nāma hoti. Puna nibbematiko hutvā desetabbaṃ. Na cāti neva pāḷiyaṃ na
tika-vin06t:2037_5: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthi, desite pana doso natthīti. Tathā ito vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin06t:2037_6: paṭikarissāmīti ettha ca sakalasaṅghe sabhāgāpattiṃ āpanne, vematike ca. Tathā ca
tika-vin06t:2037_7: “sabbo saṅgho sabhāgāpattiṃ āpajjitvā yadā suddhaṃ passissatī”ti, “tadā tassa santike
tika-vin06t:2037_8: taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissatī’ti vatvā ‘uposathaṃ kātuṃ labhatī”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2039: 172-3. “Atthaññe”ti pubbavāre, “athaññe”ti pacchāvāre pāṭho. Sīmaṃ okkante vā okkamante vā passanti. Dhammasaññino pana aññāṇena honti. “Vematikapannarasakaṃ uttānamevā”ti pāṭho.
tika-vin06t:2041: 178. “Na akāmā dātabbā”tivacanato icchāya sati dātabbāti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2043_0: 180. Nābhivitarantīti ettha laddhinānāsaṃvāsakā kira te. Kammanānāsaṃvāsakañhi diṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin06t:2043_1: paṭinissajjāpetvā tassa osāraṇakammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Evañhi kate tena saddhiṃ uposathaṃ
tika-vin06t:2043_2: kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Itarena laddhinissajjanamattena kātunti vuttaṃ. Āpattiyā adassane
tika-vin06t:2043_3: appaṭikamme ukkhittakañca diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittakañca jānitvā tena saddhiṃ
tika-vin06t:2043_4: karontassa pācittiyaṃ, tasmā ime ukkhittānuvattakāti veditabbāti eke.
tika-vin06t:2045_0: 181. Na gantabboti kiṃ sandhāya? “Aññatra saṅghenā”ti vacanato yasmiṃ vihāre sataṃ
tika-vin06t:2045_1: bhikkhū viharanti, te sabbe kenacideva karaṇīyena dasa dasa hutvā visuṃ visuṃ nānāudakukkhepasīmādīsu
tika-vin06t:2045_2: ṭhatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ labhanti. Navakammasālādikā nānāsīmākoṭi uposathādhiṭṭhānatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:2045_3: sīmāpi nadīpi na gantabbā. Garukaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ vissajjitvā lahukassa akattabbattā
tika-vin06t:2045_4: “aññatra saṅghenā”ti vacanaṃ sādheti. Tattha “yasmiṃ āvāse uposathakārakā …pe… akatvā
tika-vin06t:2045_5: na gantabbo”ti vacanato vissaṭṭhauposathāpi āvāsā gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. “Tato
tika-vin06t:2045_6: pārisuddhiuposathakaraṇatthaṃ vissaṭṭhauposathā gantuṃ vaṭṭati, khaṇḍasīmaṃ vā pavisitunti
tika-vin06t:2045_7: apare vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. Iminā neva uposathantarāyoti “attano uposathantarāyo”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2047_1: cittaṃ uppādetvā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati. Aññakamme tassa nisinnaparisāya āpatti natthīti
tika-vin06t:2047_2: eke. “Na ca, bhikkhave, anuposathe uposatho kātabbo aññatra saṅghasāmaggiyā”ti vacanato
tika-vin06t:2047_3: sāmaggīdivaso anuposathadivasoti atthato vuttaṃ viya dissati. “Dveme, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:2047_4: uposathā”ti vuttavacanavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ, aññathā parivārapāḷiyā virujjhatīti ācariyā.
tika-vin06t:2047_5: Cātuddasiyaṃ, pannarasiyaṃ vā ce saṅgho samaggo hoti, “ajjuposatho sāmaggī”ti avatvā
tika-vin06t:2047_6: pakatinīhāreneva kattabbanti dassanatthaṃ yathādesanā katāti no takko. Aññathā yathāvuttadvaye
tika-vin06t:2047_7: ce sāmaggī hoti, tattha uposathaṃ akatvā anuposathadivase eva sāmaggīuposatho kātabboti
tika-vin06t:2047_8: āpajjati. Aññathā pubbe paṭisiddhattā idāni paṭisedhanakiccaṃ natthi. “Na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:2047_9: devasikaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabba”nti pubbe hi vuttaṃ. Atha vā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:2047_10: uposathe pātimokkhaṃ uddisitu”nti pubbe vuttattā “sakiṃ pakkhassa cātuddase vā pannarase
tika-vin06t:2047_11: vā”ti ca “dveme, bhikkhave, uposathā”ti ca pacchā vuttattā tato aññasmiṃ divase uposatho
tika-vin06t:2047_12: na kātabboti atthato āpannaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ, sati saṅghasāmaggiyā añño divaso pakativasena
tika-vin06t:2047_13: anuposathopi uposathadivaso nāma hotīti dassanavasena nivāretumpi evaṃdesanā katāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:2051_1: paṭhanti kira. “Kati nu kho vassūpanāyikā”ti cintāyaṃ “kiṃ nimitta”nti vutte “anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:2051_2: bhikkhave, vassaṃ upagantu”nti yaṃ vassūpagamanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ “imaṃ temāsaṃ vassaṃ
tika-vin06t:2051_3: upemī”ti vatvā upagantabbaṃ. Vassānamāsā ca cattāro. Tattha paṭhamaṃ temāsaṃ, pacchimaṃ
tika-vin06t:2051_4: temāsanti duvidhaṃ temāsaṃ. Tenāyaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cintā ahosi.
tika-vin06t:2053_0: 185. Anapekkhagamanena vā aññattha aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpanena vā āpatti veditabbāti ettha
tika-vin06t:2053_1: paṭhamaṃ tāva so sattāhaṃ anāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamati. “Āgaccheyya
tika-vin06t:2053_2: vā so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu taṃ āvāsaṃ na vā āgaccheyya, tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno
tika-vin06t:2053_3: purimikā ca paññāyati, paṭissave ca anāpattī”ti vacanato oraṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2053_4: Tathā hi “so tadaheva akaraṇīyo pakkamati, sakaraṇīyo pakkamati, tassa, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:2053_5: bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyati, paṭissave ca āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2055_0: 187-8. Dutiyaṃ pana “so taṃ sattāhaṃ bahiddhā vītināmeti, tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno
tika-vin06t:2055_1: purimikā ca na paññāyati, paṭissave ca āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato sattāhato paraṃ
tika-vin06t:2055_2: veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi “so taṃ sattāhaṃ anto sannivattaṃ karoti, tassa, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:2055_3: bhikkhuno purimikā ca paññāyati, paṭissave ca anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ. Satipi kāraṇadvaye
tika-vin06t:2055_4: vassacchedakāraṇābhāve āpatti veditabbā, tasmā tīṇipi etāni vacanāni yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-vin06t:2055_5: yojitāni viggahāni honti. Tīṇi parihīnānīti tāsaṃ natthitāya.
tika-vin06t:2057_0: 199. “Anujānāmi bhikkhave, saṅghakaraṇīyena gantuṃ, sattāhaṃ sannivatto kātabbo”ti
tika-vin06t:2057_1: vacanato antovasse saṃhārikabhāvena gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha dhammachandavasenapi āgate
tika-vin06t:2057_2: saṅghassa āyamukhaṃ vinassati. Tato “senāsanāni katvā”ti ca vuttaṃ. Āgatanti āgamanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2057_3: Bhāvettha tapaccayoyaṃ. Saṅghakaraṇīyena gantunti ettha “senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttesu eva
tika-vin06t:2057_4: saṅghakaraṇīyesu, na aññesū”ti dhammasiritthero vadati kira. Aṭṭhakathāyampi taṃ
tika-vin06t:2057_5: padaṃ uddharitvā “yaṃ kiñci uposathāgārādīsu senāsanesū”tiādinā senāsanameva dassitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2058_0: Animantitena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti tassa ratticchedo ca dukkaṭāpatti ca hoti, taṃ “vassacchedo”ti
tika-vin06t:2058_1: ca vadanti. Nimantitoyeva nāma hotīti ettha upāsakehi “imasmiṃ nāma divase dānādīni
tika-vin06t:2058_2: karoma, sabbe sannipatantū”ti katāyapi katikāya gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Pavāraṇāya navamito
tika-vin06t:2058_3: paṭṭhāya paṃsukūlikacīvaraṃ pariyesituṃ kāvīrapaṭṭane viya sabbesaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati
tika-vin06t:2058_4: anusaṃvaccharaṃ niyamato upāsakehi sajjitvā ṭhapanato. Vuttampi cetaṃ andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2058_5: “bhikkhusaṅghena vā katikā katā ‘samantā bhikkhū gacchantū’ti, ghosanaṃ vā kataṃ
tika-vin06t:2058_6: upāsakehi, tattha gacchantassa ratticchedo natthīti tathā ‘anusaṃvaccharaṃ āgacchantū’ti
tika-vin06t:2058_7: sakiṃ nimantitepi vaṭṭatī”ti ca “cīvarakālato paṭṭhāya niyamaṃ katvā samantato āgatānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2058_8: sajjetvā dānato kāvīrapaṭṭane ghosetvā karaṇākāro paññāyatīti apare”ti ca. Ācariyā
tika-vin06t:2060_0: 201. “Sace dūraṃ gato hoti, sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo”ti vacanato ‘yasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:2060_1: antarāye sati vassacchedaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmiṃ antarāyeva vassacchedamakatvā sattāhakaraṇīyena
tika-vin06t:2060_2: vītināmetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitanti apare”ti vuttaṃ. Vinayadharā pana na icchanti, tasmā
tika-vin06t:2060_3: “sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo”ti idaṃ tatruppādādinimittaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2060_4: Taṃ sandhāya “ācariyā pana evaṃ na vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. Gāvuṃ vāti balibaddhaṃ vā.
tika-vin06t:2060_5: Bahisīmāya ṭhitānanti tehi khaṇḍasīmāya ṭhitehipīti upatissatthero. Vassacchede assa
tika-vin06t:2060_6: vassacchedassa. Vihārā aññattha vuṭṭhāpentehi tattheva sannipatitvā “iminā ca iminā
tika-vin06t:2060_7: ca kāraṇena imasmiṃ nāma padese imaṃ vihāraṃ netvā vuṭṭhāpemā”ti anussāvetvāva kātabbanti.
tika-vin06t:2062_0: 203. Vajena saddhiṃ gatassa vassacchede anāpattīti vassacchedo na hotīti kira adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:2062_1: Satthassa avihārattā “imasmiṃ vihāre”ti avatvā “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti ettakaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2062_2: “Satthe pana vassaṃ upagantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ‘imasmiṃ vihāre imaṃ temāsa’nti vā ‘idha
tika-vin06t:2062_3: vassaṃ upemī’ti vā na vaṭṭati, ālayakaraṇamatteneva vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2062_4: Taṃ pana aṭṭhakathāya virujjhati. “Idha vassaṃ upemīti tikkhattuṃ vattabba”nti hi
tika-vin06t:2062_5: vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāvacanampi pubbāparaṃ virujjhatīti ce? Na, adhippāyājānanato. Sattho
