tika-vin06t:2062_6: duvidho ṭhito, sañcāroti. Tattha ṭhite kuṭikāya “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti vatvā vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2062_7: Idañhi sandhāya “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, satthe vassaṃ upagantu”nti vuttaṃ, sañcārimhi
tika-vin06t:2062_8: pana satthe kuṭikāya abhāvato vassaṃ upagantuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sati sivikāya vā sakaṭakuṭikāya
tika-vin06t:2062_9: vā vaṭṭati, tathā vajepi. Tīsu ṭhānesu bhikkhuno natthi vassacchede āpatti.
tika-vin06t:2063_0: Pavāretuñca labhatīti etthāyaṃ vicāraṇā – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yena vajo, tena
tika-vin06t:2063_1: gantu”nti idaṃ kiṃ vassarakkhaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ, udāhu vassacchedāpattirakkhaṇatthanti?
tika-vin06t:2063_2: Kiñcettha yadi vassarakkhaṇatthaṃ, “na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba”nti
tika-vin06t:2063_3: idaṃ virujjhati. Atha vassacchedāpattirakkhaṇatthaṃ vuttanti siddhaṃ na so pavāretuṃ
tika-vin06t:2063_4: labhatīti, kā panettha yutti? Yato ayameva tividho pavāretuṃ labhati, netaro. Vāḷehi
tika-vin06t:2063_5: ubbāḷhādiko hi upagataṭṭhānāpariccāgā labhati. Pariccāgā na labhatīti ayamettha yutti.
tika-vin06t:2063_6: Yena gāmo, tattha gatopi pavāretuṃ labhatīti ekenāti ācariyo. Yo hi pubbe “idha vassaṃ
tika-vin06t:2063_7: upemī”ti na upagato, “imasmiṃ vihāre”ti upagato, so ca pariccatto. Aññathā vinā vihārena
tika-vin06t:2063_8: kevalaṃ gāmaṃ sandhāya “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti upagantuṃ vaṭṭatīti. Āpajjatūti ce?
tika-vin06t:2063_9: Na, “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vaje satthe nāvāya vassaṃ upagantu”nti vacanaṃ viya “gāme
tika-vin06t:2063_10: upagantu”nti vacanābhāvato. Yasmā “tīsu ṭhānesu bhikkhuno natthi vassacchede āpattī”ti
tika-vin06t:2063_11: vacanaṃ tattha vassūpagamanaṃ atthīti dīpeti tadabhāve chedābhāvā, tasmā “satthe
tika-vin06t:2063_12: pana vassaṃ upagantuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti kuṭiyā abhāvakālaṃ sandhāya vuttanti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2063_13: Tīsu ṭhānesu bhikkhuno natthi vassacchede āpattīti “tehi saddhiṃ gacchantasseva natthi,
tika-vin06t:2063_14: virujjhitvā gamane āpatti ca, pavāretuñca na labhatī”ti likhitaṃ, tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin06t:2063_15: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “atha sattho antovasseyeva bhikkhunā patthitaṭṭhānaṃ patvā atikkamati…pe…
tika-vin06t:2063_16: antarā ekasmiṃ gāme tiṭṭhati vā vippakirati vā”tiādi, taṃ ettāvatā virujjhitvā gatānampi
tika-vin06t:2063_17: virujjhitvā gamanaṃ na hoti, tasmā pavāretabbanti dassanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2064_0: Tattha “padaracchadanaṃ kuṭiṃ katvā upagantabba”nti vacanato senāsanatthāya rukkhaṃ
tika-vin06t:2064_1: āruhituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ hoti, na pāḷivirodhatoti ce? Na, tappaṭikkhepeneva siddhattā,
tika-vin06t:2064_2: imassa idha punapi paṭikkhepanato. “Na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba”nti
tika-vin06t:2064_3: iminā paṭikkhepena siddhe “na, bhikkhave, ajjhokāse vassaṃ upagantabba”nti paṭikkhepo
tika-vin06t:2064_4: viya siyāti ce? Na, ajjhokāsassa asenāsanabhāvānumatippasaṅgato. Ajjhokāso hi “ajjhokāse
tika-vin06t:2064_5: palālapuñje”ti vacanato senāsananti siddhaṃ. Catusālaajjhokāse vasantopi “catusālāya
tika-vin06t:2064_6: vasatī”ti vuccati, tasmā tattha vaṭṭatīti āpajjati, tasmā idha asenāsaniko nāma attanā
tika-vin06t:2064_7: vā parena vā attano nibaddhavāsatthaṃ apāpitasenāsanikoti veditabbaṃ. Aññathā dvinnaṃ
tika-vin06t:2064_8: paṭikkhepānaṃ aññatarātirekatā ca rukkhamūlepi nibbakosepi vassaṃ upagantuṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin06t:2064_9: ca, apāpitasenāsanikenāpi gabbhe vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti ca āpajjati, sadvārabandhameva
tika-vin06t:2064_10: senāsanaṃ idha adhippetanti kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce? Nidānato. Ayañhi asenāsanikavassūpagamanāpatti
tika-vin06t:2064_11: “tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū asenāsanikā vassaṃ upagacchanti, sītenapi uṇhenapi
tika-vin06t:2064_12: kilamantī”ti imasmiṃ nidāne paññattā, tasmā sītādipaṭikkhepameva idha senāsananti
tika-vin06t:2064_13: adhippetabbanti siddhaṃ. Evaṃ sante siddhaṃ pubbapakkhanidassananti ce? Na, pubbe
tika-vin06t:2064_15: avicāra”nti vacanāni nidassanaṃ. Ajjhokāsapaṭikkhepanidānena bahiajjhokāsova paṭikkhitto,
tika-vin06t:2064_16: na catusālādimajjhagato ajjhokāsoti āpajjati, tasmā na nidānaṃ pamāṇanti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2064_17: niyamato. Kiñci hi sikkhāpadaṃ nidānāpekkhaṃ hotīti sādhitametaṃ. Idaṃ sāpekkhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2064_18: idaṃ anapekkhanti kathaṃ paññāyati, na hi ettha ubhatovibhaṅge viya sikkhāpadānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2064_19: padabhājanaṃ, anāpattivāro vā atthīti? Idhāpi desanāvidhānato paññāyati. “Deve vassante
tika-vin06t:2064_20: rukkhamūlampi nibbakosampi upadhāvantī”ti hi imehi dvīhi nidānavacanehi bahi vā anto
tika-vin06t:2064_21: vā sabbaṃ ovassakaṭṭhānaṃ idha ajjhokāso nāma. Anovassakaṭṭhānampi anibbakosameva
tika-vin06t:2064_22: idha icchitabbanti siddhaṃ hoti. Tena na upagantabbanti na ālayakaraṇapaṭikkhepo,
tika-vin06t:2064_23: “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti vacanapaṭikkhepo. Chavasarīraṃ dahitvā chārikāya, aṭṭhikānañca
tika-vin06t:2064_25: likhitaṃ. “Akavāṭabaddhasenāsane attano pāpite sabhāgaṭṭhāne sakavāṭabaddhe vasati
tika-vin06t:2064_26: ce, vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Payogopi atthi, “asenāsanikena vassaṃ na upagantabba”nti pāḷi
tika-vin06t:2066_0: 205. Mahāvibhaṅge vuttanti ettha ayaṃ andhakaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ ūnapannarasavassena
tika-vin06t:2066_1: sāmaṇerena idha vihāre na vatthabbā, na paṃsukūlaṃ āhiṇḍitabbaṃ, na coḷabhikkhā gahetabbā,
tika-vin06t:2066_2: na aññavihāre bhuñjitabbaṃ, na aññassa bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā santakaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2066_3: aññamaññaṃ neva ālapeyyāma na sallapeyyāma, na sajjhāyitabbaṃ, mattikāpattena vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:2067: 206. Musāvādoti visaṃvādo adhippeto. Keci “visaṃvādanavasena paṭissuṇitvāti vutta”nti ca, “rañño vuttavacanānurūpato musāvādoti gahaṭṭhā gaṇhantīti vutta”nti ca vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2068_0: 207. “Purimikā ca na paññāyati. Kasmā? ‘Dutiye vasāmī’ti citte uppanne paṭhamasenāsanaggāho
tika-vin06t:2068_1: paṭippassambhati. Puna ‘paṭhame eva vasāmī’ti citte uppanne dutiyo paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin06t:2068_2: Ubhayāvāse vidhānaṃ natthī”ti likhitaṃ. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade pana “paṭhamaṃ gahitaṭṭhāne
tika-vin06t:2068_3: avasitvā aññasmiṃ vihāre senāsanaṃ gahetvā dvīhatīhaṃ vasati, tato paṭhamaggāho paṭippassambhatīti
tika-vin06t:2068_4: purimikā ca na paññāyati. Pacchimaggāho na paṭippassambhati. Idañhi divasavasena
tika-vin06t:2068_5: paṭippassambhanaṃ nāma hoti. Atha pacchimaṃ temāsaṃ aññasmiṃ vasati, purimikā ca
tika-vin06t:2068_6: na paññāyati, idaṃ senāsanaggāhānaṃ vasena paṭippassambhanaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Ubhopete
tika-vin06t:2068_7: atthavikappā idha nādhippetā. Yatthāyaṃ paṭissuto, tattha purimikā ca na paññāyati,
tika-vin06t:2068_8: paṭissave ca āpatti dukkaṭassa. Kattha pana purimikā paññāyatīti? Antarāmagge dvīsu
tika-vin06t:2068_9: āvāsesu yattha tadaheva pacchimaggāho, tattha paṭhamaṃ gahitaṭṭhāne sattāhakaraṇīyena
tika-vin06t:2068_10: gacchato na vassacchedo, so tadaheva akaraṇīyo pakkamatītiādimhi “karaṇīyaṃ nāma
tika-vin06t:2069_1: nirapekkhapakkamanassādhippetattā “sattāhakaraṇīyenā”ti na vuttaṃ tasmiṃ sati nirapekkhagamanābhāvato.
tika-vin06t:2069_2: Tattha purimā dve vārā vassaṃ anupagatassa vasena vuttā, tasmā upagatassa tadaheva
tika-vin06t:2069_3: sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā antosattāhaṃ āgacchato na vassacchedoti siddhaṃ. Pacchimā
tika-vin06t:2069_4: dve vārā upagatassa nirapekkhagamanavasena vuttā, “sattāhaṃ anāgatāya pavāraṇāya
tika-vin06t:2069_5: sakaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti tato bahiddhā sattāhaṃ vītināmentassa vassacchedoti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:2069_6: vuttaṃ. Tattha “akaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti vacanābhāvā vinā ratticchedakāraṇena gantuṃ
tika-vin06t:2069_7: na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Pavāretvā pana gantuṃ vaṭṭati pavāraṇāya taṃdivasasannissitattā.
tika-vin06t:2069_8: Tattha na vā āgaccheyyāti antarāyena. Ācariyo pana “na puna idhāgacchāmī’ti nirapekkhopi
tika-vin06t:2069_9: sakaraṇīyova gantuṃ labhatīti dassanatthaṃ akaraṇīyo’ti na vutta”nti vadati. “Sīhaḷadīpe
tika-vin06t:2069_10: kira cūḷapavāraṇā nāma atthi, taṃ pavāraṇaṃ katvā yathāsukhaṃ sakaraṇīyā gacchanti,
tika-vin06t:2069_11: payogañca dassentī”ti vuttaṃ. “Tattha cha aruṇā antovasse honti, eko bahi, tasmā
tika-vin06t:2069_12: so temāsaṃ vuttho hotīti apare”ti ca, “ācariyo evaṃ na vadatī”ti ca vuttaṃ. Sabbattha
tika-vin06t:2069_13: vihāraṃ upetīti attano vassaggena pattagabbhaṃ upetīti porāṇā. Asatiyā pana vassaṃ
tika-vin06t:2069_14: na upetīti ettha “imasmiṃ vihāre imaṃ temāsa”nti avacanena. “Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaratticchedakāraṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:2069_15: vinā tirovihāre vasitvā āgacchissāmīti gacchatopi vassaccheda”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2070_0: 208. Paṭissuto hoti pacchimikāyāti antarā pabbajitabhikkhunā, chinnavassena vā paṭissuto,
tika-vin06t:2070_1: aññena pana purimaṃ anupagantvā pacchimikāyaṃ paṭissavo na kātabbo. Ratticchede sabbattha
tika-vin06t:2070_2: vassacchedoti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā vadanti. Keci pana na icchanti. Taṃ sādhetuṃ anekadhā
tika-vin06t:2074_0: 210. “Saṅghaṃ āvuso pavāremī”ti vuttattā pacchāpi “vadatu maṃ saṅgho”ti vattabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:2074_1: viya dissati. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – yasmā ahaṃ saṅghaṃ pavāremi, tasmā tattha
tika-vin06t:2074_2: pariyāpannā therā, majjhimā, navā vā avisesenāyasmanto sabbepi maṃ vadantūti.
tika-vin06t:2076_0: 212. Dvemā, bhikkhave, pavāraṇāti ettha tādise kicce sati yattha katthaci pavāretuṃ
tika-vin06t:2076_1: vaṭṭati. Teneva mahāvihāre bhikkhū cātuddasiyaṃ pavāretvā pannarasiyaṃ kāyasāmaggiṃ
tika-vin06t:2076_2: idānipi denti. Cetiyagiri mahādassanatthampi aṭṭhamiyaṃ gacchanti, tampi cātuddasiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2076_3: pavāretukāmānaṃyeva hoti. “Sattāhaṃ anāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamati, anāpattīti
tika-vin06t:2076_4: vacanato idaṃ āciṇṇa”nti likhitaṃ. “No ce adhiṭṭhaheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti ekassa
tika-vin06t:2076_5: vuttadukkaṭaṃ, tasseva vuttaṃ pubbakiccañca saṅghagaṇānampi netabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2080: “Tassā ca pavāraṇāya ārocitāya saṅghena ca pavārite sabbesaṃ suppavāritaṃ hotīti vacanato kevalaṃ pavāraṇāya pavāraṇādāyakopi pavāritova hotī”ti vadantīti.
tika-vin06t:2081_0: 222. Avuṭṭhitāya parisāyāti pavāretvā pacchā aññamaññaṃ kathentiyā. Ekaccāya vuṭṭhitāyāti
tika-vin06t:2081_1: ekaccesu yathānisinnesu ekaccesu sakasakaṭṭhānaṃ gatesu. Puna pavāretabbanti punapi
tika-vin06t:2081_2: sabbehi samāgantvā pavāretabbaṃ. Āgacchanti samasamā, tesaṃ santike pavāretabbanti
tika-vin06t:2081_3: “gate anānetvā nisinnānaṃyeva santike pavāretabbaṃ, uposathakkhandhakepi eseva nayo”ti
tika-vin06t:2081_4: likhitaṃ. Sabbāya vuṭṭhitāya parisāya āgacchanti samasamā, tesaṃ santike pavāretabbanti
tika-vin06t:2081_5: “yadi sabbe vuṭṭhahitvā gatā, sannipātetuñca na sakkā, ekacce sannipātāpetvā pavāretuṃ
tika-vin06t:2081_6: vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Kasmā? Ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā kattabbasaṅghakammābhāvā vaggaṃ na hoti
tika-vin06t:2081_7: kira. Ettha pana ekaccesu gatesupi sabbesu gatesupi sabbe sannipātāpetvā ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā
tika-vin06t:2081_8: kevalaṃ pavāretabbaṃ. Ekacce sannipātāpetvā pavāretuṃ na vaṭṭati “saṅghaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin06t:2081_9: pavāremī”ti vacanato. Sabbepi hi sannipatitā pacchā diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā parisaṅkitaṃ
tika-vin06t:2081_10: vā vattāro honti. Anāgatānaṃ atthibhāvaṃ ñatvāpi ekaccānaṃ santike pavāraṇāvacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:2081_11: viya hoti. Sammukhībhūte cattāro sannipātāpetvā nissaggiyaṃ āpannacīvarādinissajjanaṃ
tika-vin06t:2081_12: viya pavāraṇā na hoti sabbāyattattā. “Samaggānaṃ pavāraṇā paññattā”ti vacanañcettha
tika-vin06t:2081_13: sādhakaṃ. “Ito aññathā na vaṭṭati aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ananuññātattā”ti upatissatthero vadati.
tika-vin06t:2081_14: “Thokatarehi tesaṃ santike pavāretabbaṃ ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvāvā”ti vuttaṃ. Āgantukā nāma
tika-vin06t:2081_15: navamito paṭṭhāyāgatā vā vajasatthanāvāsu vutthavassā vā honti.
tika-vin06t:2082: 237. “Dasavatthukā micchādiṭṭhi hoti tathāgatotiādī”ti likhitaṃ. “Natthi dinnantiādī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2087_0: 242. Asītiyā …pe… kāretīti “asīti gāmikasahassāni sannipātāpetvā”ti imassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2087_1: Tattha “gāmānaṃ asītiyā sahassesū”ti vattabbe “asītiyā gāmasahassesū”ti vuttaṃ. Gāmappamukhā
tika-vin06t:2087_2: gāmikā, tesaṃ sahassāni. “Kammacittīkatānī”ti upacārena vuttaṃ. Kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhāne
tika-vin06t:2087_3: hi tesaṃ añjanavaṇṇabhāvo. “Kenacideva karaṇīyenā”ti vattabbe “kenacidevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2087_5: Purato pekkhamānānanti anādaratthe sāmivacanaṃ. Tato pana bhagavato gandhakuṭiyā
tika-vin06t:2087_6: kavāṭaṃ subaddhaṃ passitvā icchitākārakusalatāya iddhiyā gantvā kuṭiṃ pavisitvā ārocesi.
tika-vin06t:2087_7: Vihārapacchāyāyanti vihārassa vaḍḍhamānacchāyāyaṃ. “Aho nūnāti aho mahanto”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2087_8: Bhagavato sambahulehi saddhiṃ āhiṇḍanaṃ āyasmato soṇassa vīriyārambhanidassanena
tika-vin06t:2087_9: anāraddhavīriyānaṃ uttejanatthaṃ, evaṃ sukhumālānaṃ pādarakkhaṇatthaṃ upāhanā anuññātāti dassanatthañca.
tika-vin06t:2089: 243. Tattha ca nimittaṃ gaṇhāhīti tesaṃ indriyānaṃ ākāraṃ upalakkhehi.
tika-vin06t:2090_0: 244. Adhimutto hotīti paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā ṭhito hoti. Nekkhammādhimuttotiādīhi
tika-vin06t:2090_1: nibbānaṃ, arahattañca vuttaṃ. “Tañhi sabbakilesehi nikkhantattā ‘nekkhamma’nti ca
tika-vin06t:2090_2: gehato pavivittattā ‘paviveko’ti ca byāpajjābhāvato ‘abyāpajja’nti ca arahattaṃ upādānassa
tika-vin06t:2090_3: khayante uppannattā ‘upādānakkhayo’ti ca taṇhāya khayante uppannattā ‘taṇhakkhayo’ti
tika-vin06t:2090_4: ca sammohābhāvato ‘asammoho’ti ca vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbehi arahattaṃ vuttanti keci.
tika-vin06t:2090_5: Siyā kho evamassāti kadāci evamassa, assa vā āyasmato evaṃ siyā. Paccāgacchanto jānanto.
tika-vin06t:2090_6: Karaṇīyamattānanti attano. So eva vā pāṭho. Nekkhammādhimuttoti imasmiṃyeva arahattaṃ
tika-vin06t:2090_7: kathitaṃ. Sesesu nibbānanti keci. Asammohādhimuttoti ettheva nibbānaṃ. Sesesu arahattanti
tika-vin06t:2090_8: keci. “Sabbesvevetesu ubhayampī”ti vadanti. Pavivekañca cetaso, adhimuttassa, upādānakkhayassa
tika-vin06t:2090_9: cāti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Āyatanānaṃ uppādañca vayañca disvā.
tika-vin06t:2092: 246. “Rañjanacoḷakena puñchitvā”ti pāṭho. “Khallakādīni apanetvā’ti vuttattā dve tīṇi chiddāni katvā vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadantānaṃ vādo na gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:2094: 254. “Caturaṅgulādhikānī”ti vuttattā caturaṅgulato heṭṭhā vaṭṭatīti eke. Ubhatolohitakūpadhānanti ettha “kāsāvaṃ pana vaṭṭati, kusumbhādirattameva na vaṭṭatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2097_0: 256. Gihivikatanti gihīnaṃ atthāya kataṃ. “Yattha katthaci nisīdituṃ anujānāmīti
tika-vin06t:2097_1: attho”ti likhitaṃ. Kiñcāpi dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni
tika-vin06t:2097_2: ratanaparisibbitāni vaṭṭantī”ti vuttaṃ, atha kho vinayapariyāyaṃ patvā garuke ṭhātabbato
tika-vin06t:2097_3: idha vuttanayenevettha attho gahetabbo. “Tattha pana suttantikadesanāya gahaṭṭhādīnampi
tika-vin06t:2097_4: vasena vuttattā tesaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ ṭhapetvā ‘tūlikaṃ…pe… vaṭṭantī’ti vuttaṃ viya
tika-vin06t:2098_0: 259. Migamātukoti tassa nāmaṃ. Vātamigoti ca tassa nāmaṃ. “Kāḷasīho kāḷamukho kapī”ti
tika-vin06t:2098_1: likhitaṃ. Cammaṃ na vaṭṭatīti yena pariyāyena cammaṃ vaṭṭissati, so parato āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin06t:2098_2: “Attano puggalikavasena parihāro paṭikkhitto”ti vuttaṃ. “Na, bhikkhave, kiñci cammaṃ
tika-vin06t:2098_3: dhāretabba”nti ettāvatā siddhe “na, bhikkhave, gocamma”nti idaṃ parato “anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:2098_4: bhikkhave, sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu cammāni attharaṇānī”ti ettha anumatippasaṅgabhayā
tika-vin06t:2102_0: 260. “Yaṃ bhesajjañceva assā”ti parato “tadubhayena bhiyyoso mattāya kissā hontī”tiādinā
tika-vin06t:2102_1: virodhadassanato nidānānapekkhaṃ yathālābhavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Yathānidānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2102_2: kasmā na vuttanti ce? Tadaññāpekkhādhippāyato. Sabbabuddhakālepi hi sappiādīnaṃ sattāhakālikabhāvāpekkhāti
tika-vin06t:2102_3: tathā vacanena bhagavato adhippāyo, teneva “āhāratthañca phareyya, na ca oḷāriko
tika-vin06t:2102_4: āhāro paññāyeyyā”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitunti ettha
tika-vin06t:2102_5: ca kālaparicchedo na kato. Kutoyeva pana labbhā tadaññāpekkhādhippāyo bhagavato mūlabhesajjādīni
tika-vin06t:2102_6: tāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvanti kālaparicchedo. Yaṃ pana “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tāni
tika-vin06t:2102_7: pañca bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitu”nti vacanaṃ, taṃ “sannidhiṃ
tika-vin06t:2102_8: katvā aparāparasmiṃ divase kāle eva paribhuñjituṃ anujānāmī”ti adhippāyato vuttanti
tika-vin06t:2102_9: veditabbaṃ. Aññathā atisayattābhāvato “yaṃ bhesajjañceva assā”tiādi vitakkuppādo
tika-vin06t:2102_10: na sambhavati. Paṇītabhojanānumatiyā pasiddhattā ābādhānurūpasappāyāpekkhāya vuttānīti
tika-vin06t:2102_11: ce? Tañca na, bhiyyoso mattāya kisādibhāvāpattidassanato. Yathā “ucchurasaṃ upādāya
tika-vin06t:2102_12: phāṇita”nti vuttaṃ, tathā “navanītaṃ upādāya sappi”nti vattabbato navanītaṃ visuṃ
tika-vin06t:2102_13: na vattabbanti ce? Na, visesadassanādhippāyato. Yathā phāṇitaggahaṇena siddhepi parato
tika-vin06t:2102_14: ucchuraso visuṃ anuññāto ucchusāmaññato guḷodakaṭṭhāne ṭhapanādhippāyato. Tathā navanīte
tika-vin06t:2102_15: visesavidhidassanādhippāyato navanītaṃ visuṃ anuññātanti veditabbaṃ. Visesavidhi
tika-vin06t:2102_16: panassa bhesajjasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāvasena veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhi tattha “pacitvā sappiṃ
tika-vin06t:2102_17: katvā paribhuñjitukāmena adhotampi pacituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Tattha sappi pakkāva hoti,
tika-vin06t:2103_0: Etthāha – navanītaṃ viya ucchurasopi sattāhakālikapāḷiyaṃ eva vattabboti? Na vattabbo.
tika-vin06t:2103_1: Kasmā? Sattāhakālikapāḷiyaṃ vutte ucchuraso guḷāpadesena yathā agilānassa phāṇitaṃ
tika-vin06t:2103_2: paṭisiddhaṃ, tathā ucchurasopīti āpajjati, avutte pana guḷaṃ viya so phāṇitasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2103_3: na gacchati. Idha avatvā pacchā vacanena guḷodakaṭṭhāneva ṭhapito hoti. Tadatthameva
tika-vin06t:2103_4: pacchābhattaṃ vaṭṭanakapānakādhikāre vutto, tasmā eva yāmakālikoti ce? Na, aṭṭhakathāvirodhato.
tika-vin06t:2103_5: Na upādāyatthassa nissayatthattāti ce? Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “ucchurasaṃ upādāya ucchuvikati
tika-vin06t:2103_6: phāṇitanti veditabbā”ti yadetaṃ nissaggiyaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ, tattha “upādāyā”ti imassa
tika-vin06t:2103_7: nissāya paccayaṃ katvāti atthoti. Na, parato aparakiriyāya adassanato. Yathā “cakkhuñca
tika-vin06t:2103_8: paṭicca rūpe cā”tiādīsu “paṭiccā”ti imassa ussukkavacanassa “uppajjatī”ti aparakiriyā
tika-vin06t:2103_9: dissati, na tathā “ucchurasaṃ upādāyā”ti ettha aparakiriyā dissatīti. Ayuttametaṃ
tika-vin06t:2103_10: tattha tadabhāvepi siddhattā. Yathā “cattāro ca mahābhūtā catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2103_11: upādāya rūpa”nti ettha aparakiriyāya abhāvepi ussukkavacanaṃ siddhaṃ, tathā etthāpi
tika-vin06t:2103_12: siyāti? Na, tattha pāṭhasesāpekkhattā. Yathā cattāro mahābhūtā upādāya vuttaṃ, pavattakaṃ
tika-vin06t:2103_13: vā rūpanti imaṃ pāṭhasesaṃ sā pāḷi apekkhati, na tathā idaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ kañci
tika-vin06t:2103_14: pāṭhaṃ apekkhati. Paripuṇṇavādino hi aṭṭhakathācariyā. Saññākaraṇamattaṃ vā tassa
tika-vin06t:2103_15: rūpassa. “Atthi rūpaṃ upādāyā”tiādīsu hi saññākaraṇamattaṃ, evamidhāpīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2103_16: Idha pana “ucchurasaṃ upādāyā”ti ucchurasaṃ ādiṃ katvā, tato paṭṭhāyāti attho, tasmā
tika-vin06t:2103_17: “ucchurasena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ bhattaṃ agilāno bhikkhu viññāpetvā bhuñjanto paṇītabhojanasikkhāpadena
tika-vin06t:2103_18: kāretabbo, bhikkhunī pāṭidesaniyenā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ ayuttanti eke. Te visesahetuno
tika-vin06t:2104_0: Ettāvatā “ucchurasaṃ upādāyāti ucchurasaṃ ādiṃ katvā”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ micchā
tika-vin06t:2104_1: gahetvā yadi “ucchurasaṃ upādāyā”ti vacanena ucchuraso phāṇitaṃ siyā, “apakkā vā”ti
tika-vin06t:2104_2: vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ apakkavacanena ucchurasassa gahitattā. Atha “pakkā vā”ti vacanena
tika-vin06t:2104_3: ucchuraso phāṇitanti siddhaṃ, “ucchurasaṃ upādāyā”ti vacanaṃ niratthakanti uttaraṃ
tika-vin06t:2104_4: vuttaṃ, taṃ anuttaranti sādhitaṃ hoti. So cetehi apakkā vāti sāmaṃ bhikkhunā apakkā
tika-vin06t:2104_5: vā. Avatthukapakkā vāti bhikkhunāva sāmaṃ vinā vatthunā pakkā vāti attho. Tasmā aññathā
tika-vin06t:2104_6: “savatthukapakkā vā”ti ca vattabbanti attho dassito, so duṭṭhu dassito. Kasmā? Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2104_7: “jhāmaucchuphāṇitaṃ vā koṭṭitaucchuphāṇitaṃ vā purebhattameva vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā,
tika-vin06t:2104_8: “savatthukapakkā vā”ti vacanassa ca laddhivirodhato avuttattā. “Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana
tika-vin06t:2104_9: ‘etaṃ savatthukapakkaṃ vaṭṭati no vaṭṭatī’ti pucchaṃ katvā ‘ucchuphāṇitaṃ pacchābhattaṃ
tika-vin06t:2104_10: no vaṭṭanakaṃ nāma natthī’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ yutta”nti vuttattā ca savatthukapakkā vāti
tika-vin06t:2104_11: attho ca vuttoyeva hoti, tasmā duddassitoti siddhaṃ. Āhāratthanti āhārapayojanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2106_0: 263. Sati paccayeti ettha satipaccayatā gilānāgilānavasena dvidhā veditabbā. Vikālabhojanasikkhāpadassa
tika-vin06t:2106_1: hi anāpattivāre yāmakālikādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi avisesena satipaccayatā vuttā. Imasmiṃ khandhake
tika-vin06t:2106_2: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānassa guḷaṃ, agilānassa guḷodakaṃ, anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:2106_3: gilānassa loṇasovīrakaṃ, agilānassa udakasambhinna”nti vuttaṃ. Tasmā siddhaṃ satipaccayatā
tika-vin06t:2106_4: gilānāgilānavasena duvidhāti. Aññathā asati paccaye guḷodakādīsu āpajjati. Tato ca pāḷivirodho.
tika-vin06t:2107_0: Piṭṭhehīti pisitatelehi. Koṭṭhaphalanti koṭṭharukkhassa phalaṃ. “Madanaphalaṃ vā”ti
tika-vin06t:2107_1: ca likhitaṃ. Hiṅgujatu nāma hiṅgurukkhassa daṇḍapallavapavāḷapākanipphannā. Hiṅgusipāṭikā
tika-vin06t:2107_2: nāma tassa mūlasākhapākanipphannā. Takaṃ nāma tassa rukkhassa tacapākodakaṃ. Takapattīti
tika-vin06t:2107_3: tassa pattapākodakaṃ. Takapaṇṇīti tassa phalapākodakaṃ. Atha vā “takaṃ nāma lākhā.
tika-vin06t:2107_4: Takapattīti kittimalomalākhā. Takapaṇṇīti pakkalākhā”ti likhitaṃ. Ubbhidaṃ nāma ūsapaṃsumayaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2108: 264. Chakaṇaṃ gomayaṃ. Pākatikacuṇṇaṃ nāma apakkakasāvacuṇṇaṃ, tena “ṭhapetvā gandhacuṇṇaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Cālitehīti parissāvitehi.
tika-vin06t:2111: 274. Sāmaṃ pakkaṃ samapakkanti duvidhaṃ viya dīpeti, tasmā khīrādīsu uṇhamattameva pāko. Tena uttaṇḍulādisamānā honti.
tika-vin06t:2112: 276-8. “Buddhappamukha’nti āgataṭṭhāne ‘bhikkhusaṅgho’ti avatvā ‘saṅgho’ti vuccati bhagavantampi saṅgahetu”nti vadanti. Nāgoti hatthī.
tika-vin06t:2113_0: 279. Sambādheti vaccamagge bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā ca passāvamaggepi anulomato. Dahanaṃ
tika-vin06t:2113_1: paṭikkhepābhāvā vaṭṭati. Satthavattikammānulomato na vaṭṭatīti ce? Na, paṭikkhittapaṭikkhepā,
tika-vin06t:2113_2: paṭikkhipitabbassa tapparamatādīpanato, kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Pubbe paṭikkhittampi satthakammaṃ
tika-vin06t:2113_3: sampiṇḍetvā pacchā “na, bhikkhave…pe… thullaccayassā”ti dvikkhattuṃ satthakammassa
tika-vin06t:2113_4: paṭikkhepo kato. Tena sambādhassa sāmantā dvaṅgulaṃ paṭikkhipitabbaṃ nāma. Satthavattikammato
tika-vin06t:2113_5: uddhaṃ natthīti dīpeti. Kiñca bhiyyo pubbe sambādheyeva satthakammaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2113_6: pacchā sambādhassa sāmantā dvaṅgulampi paṭikkhittaṃ, tasmā tasseva paṭikkhepo, netarassāti
tika-vin06t:2113_7: siddhaṃ. Ettha “satthaṃ nāma satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyā”tiādīsu viya yena chindati,
tika-vin06t:2113_8: taṃ sabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “kaṇṭakena vā”tiādi. Khāradānaṃ panettha bhikkhunivibhaṅge
tika-vin06t:2113_9: pasākhe lepamukhena anuññātanti veditabbaṃ. Eke pana “satthakammaṃ vā”ti pāṭhaṃ vikappetvā
tika-vin06t:2113_10: vatthikammaṃ karonti. “Vatthī”ti kira agghikā vuccati. Tāya chindanaṃ vatthikammaṃ
tika-vin06t:2113_11: nāmāti ca atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti, te “satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyā”ti imassa padabhājanīyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2113_12: dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā. Aṇḍavuḍḍhīti vātaṇḍako. Ādānavattīti ānahavatti.
tika-vin06t:2115_0: 280. “Na, bhikkhave, manussamaṃsaṃ…pe… thullaccayassā”ti vuttattā, “na ca, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:2115_1: appaṭi…pe… dukkaṭassā”ti ca vuttattā appaṭivekkhaṇadukkaṭañca thullaccayañcāti dve
tika-vin06t:2115_2: āpajjati, tasmā kappiyamaṃsepi appaṭivekkhaṇapaccayā dukkaṭameva. Keci “maṃsabhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:2115_3: jānantova āpajjati. Pūvādīsu ajānantassa kā paccavekkhaṇā”ti vadanti. Ajānantopi
tika-vin06t:2117_0: 281. Imesaṃ …pe… sabbaṃ na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ dasannampi manussamaṃsādīnaṃ akappiyabhāvamattaparidīpanavacanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2117_1: nāpattivibhāgadassanavacanaṃ. Yaṃ kiñci ñatvā vā añatvā vā khādantassa āpattiyevāti
tika-vin06t:2117_2: idampi aniyamitavacanameva “ayaṃ nāma āpattī”ti avuttattā. Tadubhayampi heṭṭhā manussādīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:2117_3: maṃsādīsu thullaccayadukkaṭāpattiyo hontīti gahitanayehi adhippāyo jānituṃ sakkāti
tika-vin06t:2117_4: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo – yasmā etesaṃ manussādīnaṃ maṃsādīni akappiyāni,
tika-vin06t:2117_5: tasmā manussānaṃ maṃsādīsu thullaccayāpatti. Sesānaṃ sabbattha dukkaṭāpattīti. Pāṭheyeva
tika-vin06t:2117_6: hi lohitādiṃ maṃsagatikaṃ katvā “na, bhikkhave, manussamaṃsaṃ…pe… thullaccayassā”ti
tika-vin06t:2117_7: vuttaṃ. Tattheva hatthādīnaṃ maṃsādīsupi dukkaṭāpatti paññattā. Tena vuttaṃ sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2117_8: “manussamaṃse vā kese vā nakhe vā aṭṭhimhi vā lohite vā thullaccayamevā”ti vuttaṃ. Iminā eva –
tika-vin06t:2119_0: Khuddasikkhāgāthāpadassa attho ca adhippāyo ca suviññeyyoti. Paṭiggahaṇeti ettha
tika-vin06t:2119_1: anādariyadukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. “Udakamanussādimaṃsampi na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Nāgarājena
tika-vin06t:2121_0: 283. Yathādhammo kāretabboti idaṃ saṅgītikārakavacanaṃ. Na hi bhagavā tameva sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin06t:2121_1: dvikkhattuṃ paññapesi, evaṃ evarūpesūti eke. Paṭhamapaññattameva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2121_2: tathāpi na ca te bhikkhū sāpattikā jātā. Kathaṃ? Paramparabhojanasikkhāpadassa aṭṭhuppattiyā.
tika-vin06t:2121_3: “Apica mayaṃ kālasseva piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjimhā”ti vuttaṃ. Mātikāvibhaṅge ca “paramparabhojanaṃ
tika-vin06t:2121_4: nāma pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantito, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pañcannaṃ
tika-vin06t:2121_5: bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati, etaṃ paramparabhojanaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin06t:2121_6: aññaṃ bhojanaṃ nāma nimantanato laddhaṃ yaṃ kiñcīti siddhaṃ. Yasmā na bhojjayāgunimantanato
tika-vin06t:2121_7: laddhabhojanaṃ, tasmā “ettha anāpattī”ti te bhikkhū paribhuñjiṃsūti. Ettha “yathādhammo
tika-vin06t:2121_8: kāretabbo”ti vuttattā pana aññanimantanato laddhabhojanameva bhuñjantassa āpatti,
tika-vin06t:2121_9: netaranti anuññātaṃ. Tato paṭṭhāya tassa anāpattivāre “niccabhatte salākabhatte pakkhike
tika-vin06t:2121_10: uposathike pāṭipadike”ti vuttaṃ. Pubbe vesāliyā paññattakāle natthi, yadi atthi,
tika-vin06t:2121_11: aṭṭhuppattimātikāvibhaṅgavirodho, tasmā “apica mayaṃ kālasseva piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjimhā”ti
tika-vin06t:2121_12: aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ vuttattā, padabhājanepi “aññaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ
tika-vin06t:2121_13: bhuñjatī”ti avisesena vuttattā ca paṭhamaṃ vā pacchā vā nimantitaṃ bhojanaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin06t:2121_14: animantitameva bhuñjantassa āpatti, netaranti kiñcāpi āpannaṃ, “na, bhikkhave, aññatra
tika-vin06t:2121_15: nimantitena aññassa bhojjayāgu paribhuñjitabbā”ti vuttattā pana paṭhamanimantitabhojanato
tika-vin06t:2121_16: aññaṃ pacchā laddhaṃ nimantitabhojanaṃ, niccabhattādīni ca bhuñjantassa āpattīti
tika-vin06t:2121_17: āpajjamānaṃ viya jātanti anupaññattippasaṅganivāraṇaṃ, animantanabhojane āpattippasaṅganivāraṇañca
tika-vin06t:2121_18: karonto, paṭhamapaññattisikkhāpadameva iminā atthena pariṇāmento ca “yathādhammo
tika-vin06t:2121_19: kāretabbo”ti bhagavā āha, tasmā tato paṭṭhāya pacchā nimantanabhojanaṃ bhuñjantasseva
tika-vin06t:2121_20: āpatti. Tesu na niccabhattādīnīti āpannaṃ. Tenevāyasmā upālitthero tassa anāpattivāre
tika-vin06t:2121_21: “niccabhatte”tiādīni pañca padāni pakkhipitvā saṅgāyi. Adhippāyaññū hi te mahānāgā,
tika-vin06t:2121_22: tasmā paṭhamameva yaṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ “pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpattī”ti
tika-vin06t:2121_23: vacanaṃ, pacchāpi taṃ anurakkhantena abhojanaṃ madhugoḷakaṃ aparāmasitvā bhojjayāgu
tika-vin06t:2122_0: Etthāha – yathā pacchāladdhalesena therena niccabhattādipakkhepo kato, evaṃ kathinakkhandhake
tika-vin06t:2122_1: paramparabhojanaṃ pakkhipitvā “atthatakathinānaṃ vo, bhikkhave, cha kappissantī”ti
tika-vin06t:2122_2: kimatthaṃ na vuccanti? Vuccate – yathāvuttalesanidassanatthaṃ. Aññathā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin06t:2122_3: vesāliyaṃ, andhakavinde cāti ubhayattha upaḍḍhupaḍḍhena paññattaṃ siyā. No ce, sāpattikā
tika-vin06t:2122_4: bhikkhū siyuṃ, na ca te sāpattikā appaṭikkhittepi tesaṃ kukkuccadassanato. “Tena
tika-vin06t:2122_5: hi, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhūnaṃ dehīti. Bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhantī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2122_6: Tesañhi “paribhuñjathā”ti bhagavato āṇattiyā paribhuttānampi “odissakaṃ nu kho idaṃ
tika-vin06t:2122_7: amhāka”nti vimatippattānaṃ vimativinodanatthaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yāguñca madhugoḷakañcā”ti
tika-vin06t:2122_8: vuttaṃ. Evamidhāpete paññattaṃ paramparabhojanasikkhāpadaṃ omadditvā paramparabhojanaṃ
tika-vin06t:2122_9: kathaṃ bhuñjissantīti. Etthāhu keci ācariyā paramparabhojanasikkhāpadeneva “aññassa
tika-vin06t:2122_10: bhojanaṃ na kappatī”ti jānantāpi “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yāguñcā”ti visuṃ anuññātattā
tika-vin06t:2122_11: “paṭaggidānamahāvikaṭādi viya kappatī”ti saññāya bhuñjiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ “apica mayaṃ
tika-vin06t:2122_12: kālasseva bhojjayāguyā dhātā”tiādi, taṃ ayuttaṃ tattha aṭṭhuppattimātikāvibhaṅgavirodhena
tika-vin06t:2122_14: micchāgāhahetuppasaṅgena bhagavatā anuññātappasaṅgato ca. Te hi bhikkhū yasmā bhagavā
tika-vin06t:2122_15: katthaci vinayavasena kappiyampi “gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyya”nti paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin06t:2122_16: tasmā bhagavato adhippāyaṃ pati “kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhantī”ti vuttaṃ, sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin06t:2122_17: pati bhagavāpi attano adhippāyappakāsanatthameva “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yāguñcā”ti
tika-vin06t:2122_18: āha. Duravaggāho hi bhagavato adhippāyo. Tathā hi bhāradvājassa pāyāsaṃ abhojaneyyanti
tika-vin06t:2122_19: akataviññattippasaṅgato paṭikkhipi. Ānandattherena viññāpetvā sajjitaṃ tekaṭulayāguṃ
tika-vin06t:2122_20: pana “yadapi, ānanda, viññattaṃ, tadapi akappiya”nti avatvā “yadapi, ānanda, antovuttha”ntiādimevāha.
tika-vin06t:2122_21: Tena no ce taṃ antovutthaṃ kappatīti adhippāyadassanena paṇītabhojanasūpodanaviññattisikkhāpadāni
tika-vin06t:2123_0: 284. Gilānasseva bhagavatā guḷo anuññātoti “yāni kho pana tāni gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin06t:2123_1: paṭisāyanīyānī”ti vacanavasena vuttaṃ, teneva te idha paṭiggahaṇe kukkuccāyiṃsu.
tika-vin06t:2123_2: Idha pana “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānassa guḷodaka”nti vattabbe guḷādhikārattā pubbe
tika-vin06t:2123_3: anuññātañca vatvā agilānassa guḷodakaṃ anuññātaṃ, tena gilānena sati paccaye guḷo
tika-vin06t:2123_4: paribhuñjitabbo, guḷodakaṃ asati paccayepi vaṭṭatīti imaṃ visesaṃ dīpeti. Tattha
tika-vin06t:2123_5: “guḷodakaṃ kālikesu sattāhakālikaṃ, bhagavatā odissānuññātattā sattāhātikkamena dukkaṭa”nti
tika-vin06t:2123_6: vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ, udakasambhinnattā sattāhakālikabhāvaṃ jahati. “Yathā ambādi
tika-vin06t:2123_7: udakasambhinnaṃ yāmakālikaṃ jātaṃ, tathā sattāhakālikaṃ jahitvā tadanantare yāvajīvike
tika-vin06t:2123_8: ṭhita”nti vadanti, taṃ yuttaṃ, tañca bhagavatā odissānuññātattā paccavekkhaṇābhāve
tika-vin06t:2123_9: doso natthi. “Guḷodaka’nti vuttattā udakagatika”nti vadanti. Yadi udakamissaṃ udakagatikaṃ
tika-vin06t:2123_10: hoti, madhupi siyā taṃ tathā anuññātattā. Mā hotu, appaṭiggahetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:2123_11: siyā udakagatikattā, tañca na hoti, “sabbatthāpi upaparikkhitvā gahetabba”nti aññatarasmiṃ gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2126_0: 295. Oravasaddanti mahāsaddaṃ. Bahūhi samparivāretvāti ettha ekenāpi vaṭṭati. “Bahūsu
tika-vin06t:2126_1: ekassapi vacanena saha siyāti vutta”nti vadanti. “Āmasitvā”ti vuttattā anāmasite
tika-vin06t:2126_2: na vaṭṭati. “Doso natthī”ti vacanena sesāpi anuññātā. “Bhittiñce upasante pacchā
tika-vin06t:2126_3: taṃ pūrenti, tattha kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, pakatibhūmiyaṃyeva kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2126_4: Taṃ upari aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “iṭṭhakādīhi katācayassā”tiādinā virujjhati viya. Mattikāpiṇḍaṃ
tika-vin06t:2126_5: vāti ettha “asatiyā anadhiṭṭhitāya saritaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya ce upari adhiṭṭhitā, heṭṭhā
tika-vin06t:2126_6: ṭhitaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ akappiyaṃ, upariṭṭhitameva kappiyaṃ, ayamettha viseso”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha
tika-vin06t:2126_7: kappiyakuṭi laddhuṃ vaṭṭatīti evaṃvidhe puna kātabbāti attho. Kappiyakuṭiṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin06t:2126_8: demāti ettha kappiyakuṭikiccaṃ kātunti adhippāyo. Bhojanasālā pana senāsanameva,
tika-vin06t:2126_9: tasmā tattha kātabbanti apare. “Akatepi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2127_0: “Mukhasannidhi nāma bhojanakāle sannidhī”ti likhitaṃ. Mukhasannidhīti tassa nāmaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2127_1: “Yadi sannidhi hoti, pācittiyaṃ bhaveyya, mukhasannidhi pana dukkaṭaṃ, tasmā sannidhi
tika-vin06t:2127_2: anadhippetā”ti vuttaṃ. “Tassa santakaṃ katvā”ti vuttattā anapekkhavissajjanaṃ nādhippetaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2129_0: 300. “Attanā paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattameva pariccajitvā sāmaṇerādīhi pānakaṃ katvā
tika-vin06t:2129_1: dinne purebhattameva vaṭṭati, na pacchābhattaṃ savatthukapaṭiggahitattā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:2129_2: tattha puna paṭiggahaṇe niddosattā, purebhattameva paṭiggahaṇassa nissaṭṭhattā, attanā
tika-vin06t:2129_3: ca aggahitattā doso na dissati, upaparikkhitvā gahetabbaṃ. Sālūkā nāma kandā, “ito
tika-vin06t:2129_4: kiñcitaka”nti voharanti. “Phārusakanti goḷavisaye eko rukkho”ti ca likhitaṃ. “Pakkaḍākarasa”nti
tika-vin06t:2129_5: visesitattā “apakkaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Kurundivacanenapi siddhameva. Taṇḍuladhovanodakampi
tika-vin06t:2129_6: dhaññaraso eva. “Nikkasaṭo ucchuraso sattāhakāliko”ti likhitaṃ. Sāvittīti gāyatti.
tika-vin06t:2129_7: Chandasoti vedassa. “Na, bhikkhave, pabbajitena akappiye samādapetabba’nti vuttattā
tika-vin06t:2129_8: anupasampannassāpi na kevalaṃ dasasu eva sikkhāpadesu, atha kho yaṃ bhikkhussa na
tika-vin06t:2130_0: 305. Dve paṭā desanāmenevāti cīnapaṭṭasomārapaṭṭāni. Tīṇīti pattuṇṇena saha tīṇi.
tika-vin06t:2130_1: Iddhimayikaṃ ehibhikkhūnaṃ nibbattaṃ. Devadattiyaṃ anuruddhattherena laddhaṃ. “Yāmātikkame
tika-vin06t:2134_2: yujjati tesaṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe anatthatakathinattā. Dvīsu panetesu atthavikappesu pacchimo
tika-vin06t:2134_3: yutto sabbesampi tesaṃ pāveyyakānaṃ sabbadhutaṅgadharattā. Nimantanaṃ sādiyantasseva
tika-vin06t:2134_4: hi anāmantacāro paññatto, tathā gaṇabhojanaṃ. Asamādānacāro anadhiṭṭhitaticīvarassa
tika-vin06t:2134_7: upacārasīmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Upacārasīmaṭṭhassa matakacīvarādibhāgiyatāya baddhasīmāya
tika-vin06t:2134_8: tatruppādābhāvato viññeyyametaṃ upacārasīmāvettha adhippetāti. Kathinatthāraṃ ke
tika-vin06t:2134_9: labhantīti ke sādhentīti attho. Pañca janā sādhenti. Kathinadussassa hi dāyakā pacchimakoṭiyā
tika-vin06t:2134_10: cattāro honti. Eko paṭiggāhakoti. “Tatra ce, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ catuvaggo bhikkhusaṅgho
tika-vin06t:2134_11: ṭhapetvā tīṇi kammāni upasampadaṃ pavāraṇaṃ abbhāna”nti campeyyakkhandhake vuttattā
tika-vin06t:2134_12: “na pañcavaggakaraṇīya”nti gahetabbaṃ. “Yassa saṅgho kathinadussaṃ deti, taṃ hatthapāse
tika-vin06t:2134_13: akatvāpi bahisīmāya ṭhitassapi dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ hatthapāse katvā eva
tika-vin06t:2134_14: dātabbaṃ. Kasmā? “Tassa kammappattattā”ti vuttaṃ. “Tatruppādena taṇḍulādinā vatthesu
tika-vin06t:2134_15: cetāpitesu atthatakathinānameva tāni vatthāni pāpuṇanti. Vatthehi pana taṇḍulādīsu
tika-vin06t:2134_16: cetāpitesu sabbesaṃ tāni pāpuṇantī”ti vuttaṃ. Paṭhamapavāraṇāya pavāritā labhantīti
tika-vin06t:2134_17: idaṃ ukkaṭṭhakoṭiyā vuttaṃ. Antarāyena appavāritānampi vutthavassānaṃ kathinatthārasambhavato
tika-vin06t:2134_18: itare gaṇapūrake katvā kathinaṃ attharitabbanti kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce? “Dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2134_19: atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ atthārakassa ca anumodakassa cā”ti parivāre ekavacanakaraṇato,
tika-vin06t:2134_20: tattheva “saṅghassa atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, gaṇassa puggalassa atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti vacanato ca.
tika-vin06t:2135_0: Aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassāpi na labhantīti idaṃ kiṃ ekasīmasmiṃ, udāhu nānāsīmasminti?
tika-vin06t:2135_1: Kiñcettha – yadi tāva ekasīmasmiṃ, parato “sace pana ekasīmāya bahū vihārā honti,
tika-vin06t:2135_2: sabbe bhikkhū sannipātetvā ekattha kathinaṃ attharitabbaṃ, visuṃ visuṃ attharituṃ
tika-vin06t:2135_3: na vaṭṭatī”ti iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanena virujjhati. Idañhi vacanaṃ sabbesaṃyeva eko
tika-vin06t:2135_4: kathinatthāroti dīpeti. Atha nānāsīmasmiṃ, upanandassa ekādhippāyadānānumatiyā virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:2135_5: Vuttañhetaṃ “detha, bhikkhave, moghapurisassa ekādhippāya”nti. Idañhi vacanaṃ dvīsupi
tika-vin06t:2135_6: āvāsesu tassa kathinatthārasiddhiṃ dīpetīti. Avirodhova icchitabbo appaṭisiddhattā,
tika-vin06t:2135_7: tasmā ekasīmasmiṃ vā nānāsīmasmiṃ vā nānūpacāre aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassāpi na
tika-vin06t:2135_8: labhantīti adhippāyo veditabbo. “Pacchimikāya upasampanno paṭhamapavāraṇāya pavāretumpi
tika-vin06t:2135_9: labhati, vassiko ca hoti ānisaṃsañca labhatīti sāmaṇerānaṃ vassūpagamanaṃ anuññātaṃ
tika-vin06t:2136_0: Tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññatarappahonakanti idaṃ “na aññatra saṅghāṭiyā uttarāsaṅgena antaravāsakena
tika-vin06t:2136_1: atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti imāya pāḷiyā virujjhanaṃ viya dissati. Ayañhi pāḷi tiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:2136_2: cīvarānaṃ aññataravirahenāpi na atthataṃ hoti kathinanti dīpetīti ce? Na, tadatthajānanato,
tika-vin06t:2136_3: na tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataravirahena na atthataṃ hoti kathinanti hi dīpetukāmo bhagavā
tika-vin06t:2136_4: taṃ pāḷimāha. Yadi evaṃ “aññatra saṅghāṭiyā uttarāsaṅgena antaravāsakenā”ti na vattabbā
tika-vin06t:2136_5: siyāti ce? Na, adhippāyajānanatova. Yo saṅghāṭiyā attharitukāmo, tassa aññatra saṅghāṭiyā
tika-vin06t:2136_6: na atthataṃ hoti. Esa nayo itaratthāpīti ayamettha adhippāyo. Teneva sukkapakkhe
tika-vin06t:2136_7: “saṅghāṭiyā atthataṃ hotī”tiādinā nayena ekameva cīvaraṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ sante “catuvīsatiyā
tika-vin06t:2136_8: ākārehi anatthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, sattarasahi ākārehi atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti yathārahaṃ
tika-vin06t:2136_9: ukkaṭṭhakoṭiyā vuttanti veditabbaṃ, tasmā kaṇhapakkhe ullikhita…pe… nissīmaṭṭhānumodanānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2136_10: catuvīsatiyā ākārānaṃ sambhavantānaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvenapi nimittakatādīnaṃ asambhavantānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2136_11: aññatarabhāvenapi na atthataṃ hoti kathinanti evamadhippāyo veditabbo. Sukkapakkhepi
tika-vin06t:2136_12: ahatāhatakappa…pe… sīmaṭṭhānumodanānaṃ sattarasannaṃ ākārānaṃ sambhavantānaṃ aññatarabhāvenapi
tika-vin06t:2136_13: itaresaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvenapi atthataṃ hoti kathinanti evamadhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:2137_0: Tatridaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ – kaṇhapakkhe “uttarāsaṅgena atthate kathine na aññatra
tika-vin06t:2137_1: saṅghāṭiyā na aññatra antaravāsakena atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti vacanappamāṇato taṃ
tika-vin06t:2137_2: kathinaṃ anatthataṃ siyā. Sukkapakkhe ca “animittakatena atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti
tika-vin06t:2137_3: vacanappamāṇato animittakatena kathine atthate tañce parikathā kataṃ, tathāpi atthatameva
tika-vin06t:2137_4: kathinaṃ hotīti ayaṃ duvidhopi virodho. Yathāvuttanayena adhippāye gahite parihāro hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2138_0: Yo ānisaṃsaṃ bahuṃ detīti iminā paccayalolabhāvaṃ viya dīpeti, tathāpi bhagavatā
tika-vin06t:2138_2: hoti. “Akātuṃ na hotīti anādariyena akarontassa dukkaṭa”nti likhitaṃ. Anumodāmāti
tika-vin06t:2138_3: ettha sabbasaṅgāhikavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ. “Anumodāmī”ti ekakena vattabbaṃ, itarathā
tika-vin06t:2138_4: “na vaṭṭatī”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ kira vuttaṃ. Kathinacīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā “imāya
tika-vin06t:2138_5: saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti vācāya bhinnamattāya puggalassa atthataṃ hoti. “Kammavācā
tika-vin06t:2138_6: pana ekāyeva vaṭṭatīti kathinadussassa eva kammavācā, sesacīvaradāne apalokanamevāti
tika-vin06t:2138_7: attho”ti likhitaṃ. Ekasīmāyāti ekaupacārasīmāyāti attho yujjati. Keci pana “baddhasīmā
tika-vin06t:2138_8: adhippetā ekasīmāya ekaṭṭhāne attharite sabbattha attharitaṃ hoti ‘sabbe bhikkhū
tika-vin06t:2138_9: sannipatitvā’ti vuttattā, tehipi anumodantehi attharitameva hoti, upacāraparicchinne
tika-vin06t:2138_10: tattha tattha laddhaṃ tehi tehi laddhabbaṃ hoti. Tattha paviṭṭhehipi labhitabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:2138_11: sabbehipi attharitattā, ayaṃ viseso. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyampi evameva vutta”nti vadanti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2139_1: ovaṭṭitvā sibbanaṃ vā”ti likhitaṃ. Kaṇḍusaṃ nāma pubbabandhanaṃ. Paṭhamacimilikā
tika-vin06t:2139_2: ghaṭetvā ṭhapitā hotīti kathinadussaṃ dubbalaṃ disvā taṃ balavatā attano pakatidussena
tika-vin06t:2139_3: saddhiṃ ghaṭetvā dupaṭṭaṃ katvā sibbitukāmehi kathinadussato pakatidussassa mahantatāya
tika-vin06t:2139_4: paṭhamaṃ tappamāṇānurūpaṃ bandhakaṇḍuse ghaṭetvā rajjukehi bandhitvā kataṃ hotīti
tika-vin06t:2139_5: adhippāyo. Kathinacīvarassa appatāya paṭhamaṃ baddhadussaṃ kucchicimilikā hoti, mahāpaccariyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2139_6: kurundiyañca vuttavacananidassanaṃ, byañjane eva bhedo, atthe natthīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:2139_7: katanti veditabbaṃ. “Iminā kiṃ dīpetīti ce? Tathākataṃ dupaṭṭacīvaraṃ pakaticīvarassa
tika-vin06t:2139_8: mahantatāya pakaticīvarasaṅkhyameva gacchati, na kathinacīvarasaṅkhyanti kassaci
tika-vin06t:2139_9: siyā, nevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ kucchicimilikabhāvena ṭhitampi kathinacīvaraṃ. Mahantampi
tika-vin06t:2139_10: taṃ pakaticīvaraṃ attano kathinacīvaramevāti. Heṭṭhimakoṭiyā pañcakassa icchitabbattā
tika-vin06t:2139_11: kathinadussaṃ khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ bahudhā chinditvā sibbitukāmo kathinacīvarato paṭṭaṃ
tika-vin06t:2139_12: gahetvā aññasmiṃ akathinacīvare paṭṭamāropetī”ti likhitaṃ. Atha vā bahūni kathinadussāni
tika-vin06t:2139_13: paṃsukūlāni khuddakakhuddakāni ekacīvaratthāya, mahantāni ca ūnatthāya dinnāni honti.
tika-vin06t:2139_14: Kathinacīvaratoti bhikkhu ekaccato kathinacīvarato paṭṭaṃ gahetvā aññasmiṃ āropeti.
tika-vin06t:2139_15: Etthāha – kiṃ paṃsukūlāni kathinadussāni vikappanupagapacchimāni dātabbāni, udāhu
tika-vin06t:2139_16: khuddakānipīti? Ettha acīvarasaṅkhyattā khuddakāni dātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Kammavācā tattha
tika-vin06t:2139_17: na ruhatīti eke. “Paṃsukūlena atthataṃ hotī”ti pāḷiyaṃ nayadānato kucchicimilikabhāvena
tika-vin06t:2139_18: ṭhitassa kathinadussassa attano sabhāvena anadhiṭṭhānupagassa purāṇacīvarabhāveneva
tika-vin06t:2139_19: adhiṭṭhānārahassapi kathinacīvarabhāvānumatimukhena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ padānato ca khuddakānipi
tika-vin06t:2139_20: dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tañhi kathinatthārako ghaṭetvā kathinacīvaraṃ karissatīti katvā kappatīti
tika-vin06t:2140_0: Nicayasannidhi saṅghāyattā saṅghena katattā. Rattātikkantaṃ nissajjitabbattā “nissaggiya”nti
tika-vin06t:2140_1: vuccati. Pañca khaṇḍāni paṭṭāni pamāṇaṃ assāti pañcakaṃ. Tena vā atirittena vāti
tika-vin06t:2140_2: attho. Tadaheva sañchinnenāti saṅghena kathinatthārakassa kammavācaṃ vatvā dinneneva
tika-vin06t:2140_3: tadaheva sañchinnena samaṇḍalikatena bhavitabbaṃ. Evaṃ dinnaṃyeva hi parivāre “pubbakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:2140_4: sattahi dhammehi saṅgahita”nti vuttaṃ, na dāyakena diyyamānaṃ, tasmā pariniṭṭhitapubbakaraṇameva
tika-vin06t:2140_5: ce dāyako saṅghassa deti, sampaṭicchitvā kammavācāya dātabbaṃ. Tena ca tasmiṃyeva
tika-vin06t:2140_6: sīmāmaṇḍale adhiṭṭhahitvā attharitvā saṅgho anumodāpetabbo katapubbakaraṇassa puna
tika-vin06t:2140_7: kattabbābhāvato. Atthārakassa hatthagatameva hi sandhāya “na ullikhitamattenā”tiādi
tika-vin06t:2140_8: vuttaṃ. Pariniṭṭhitapubbakaraṇampi puna dhovitvā visibbitvā kātabbameva vacanapamāṇatoti
tika-vin06t:2140_9: ce? Na, chinnassa puna chedāsambhavato. Aññasmiṃ ṭhāne chinditabbamevāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2140_10: pabbajjādhikāre “kesamassuṃ ohārāpetvā”ti vacanappamāṇato muṇḍikassa chinnepi kese
tika-vin06t:2140_11: pariyesitvā sirasmiṃ ṭhapetvā puna ohārāpetvā pabbājetabbappasaṅgato, na idha na-kārena
tika-vin06t:2140_12: paṭisiddhattāti ce? Na, “na aññatra saṅghāṭiyā”ti na-kārena paṭisiddhattā uttarāsaṅgena
tika-vin06t:2140_13: atthate anatthataṃ hotīti aniṭṭhappasaṅgato, tasmā abhiniveso na kātabbo. “Bahiupacārasīmāya
tika-vin06t:2141_0: 309. Asannidhikatena atthataṃ hoti kathinanti ettha kiṃ kathinatthāramāseyeva duvidhopi
tika-vin06t:2141_1: sannidhi adhippeto, udāhu tato pubbepi, dāyakena vā kadā dātabbaṃ, kiṃ kathinatthāramāseyeva,
tika-vin06t:2141_2: udāhu tato pubbepi, kathinatthāramāsepi asukasmiṃ divaseyeva atthāratthāya dammīti
tika-vin06t:2141_3: dātuṃ vaṭṭati na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ vicāretabbaṃ. Kathinatthāramāse eva duvidhopi sannidhi.
tika-vin06t:2141_4: Dāyakenāpi vassāvāsikaṃ viya kathinacīvaraṃ uddissa dinnaṃ na vaṭṭati. Kasmā? “Kathinadāyakassa
tika-vin06t:2141_5: vattaṃ atthī”tiādinā nayena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā. Ukkaṭṭhamattametanti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2141_6: “kathinaṃ nāma atiukkaṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā. Na āgamanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ce?
tika-vin06t:2141_7: Na, idampi āgamanameva sandhāya vuttaṃ, pubbe dinnaṃ na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin06t:2142_0: 310. Kathinassāti kathinatthārassa. Ubbhārāyāti vūpasamāya, appavattiyāti attho.
tika-vin06t:2142_1: Kimatthiyaṃ ubbhāranidassananti ce? Pañcahi anāpattikālapariyantadassanena tesu saṃvaruppādanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2142_2: Aññathā “cīvarakālasamayo nāma anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate
tika-vin06t:2142_3: kathine pañca māsā”ti vibhaṅge vuttattā antarāpakkamanantikādiubbhārābhāvepi pañcahi
tika-vin06t:2142_4: pañcasu māsesu anāpattiyevāti micchāgāho siyā. Tato āpattikhette anāpattikhettasaññāya
tika-vin06t:2142_5: taṃ taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, itaresañca bhikkhūnaṃ lābhantarāyaṃ karotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2144_0: 311. Sanniṭṭhānantike dvepi palibodhā ekato chijjantīti idha, parivāraṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-vin06t:2144_1: vuttaṃ imissā khandhakapāḷiyā sameti ekato ubhinnampi dhuranikkhepassa katattā. “Idaṃ
tika-vin06t:2144_2: bahisīmāyameva vuttaṃ sanniṭṭhānantikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ parivāre
tika-vin06t:2144_3: ‘cattāro kathinuddhārā siyā antosīmāya uddhariyyanti, siyā bahisīmāya uddhariyyanti,
tika-vin06t:2144_4: niṭṭhānantiko sanniṭṭhānantiko nāsanantiko āsāvacchediko’ti. Tattha bahisīmāya sanniṭṭhānantiko
tika-vin06t:2144_5: uddhariyyatīti idha dassitanayova. Kathaṃ antosīmāya sanniṭṭhānantiko? Akatacīvaramādāya
tika-vin06t:2144_6: ‘na paccessa’nti gato, gatagataṭṭhāne phāsuvihāraṃ alabhanto tameva vihāraṃ āgacchati,
tika-vin06t:2144_7: tassa cīvarapalibodho ṭhito. So ca ‘nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressa’nti citte uppannamatte
tika-vin06t:2144_8: chijjati, tasmā antosīmāya uddhariyyati, tasmā duvidho sanniṭṭhānantiko”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:2144_9: likhitaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ, aññathā antosīmāya “nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressa”nti pavattaubbhāro
tika-vin06t:2144_10: itaresu samodhānaṃ na gacchatīti atiritto siyā. Sīmātikkantikoti cīvarakālasīmātikkantiko.
tika-vin06t:2144_11: Saubbhāre cīvarapalibodho paṭhamaṃ chijjanto viya khāyati, atha kho sāpekkhatāya
tika-vin06t:2144_12: cīvarakaraṇe saussāhova hotīti lesaṃ sandhāya parivāravasena “dve palibodhā apubbaṃ
tika-vin06t:2144_13: acarimaṃ chijjantī”ti vuttaṃ. “Katacīvaro”ti vuttattā idha na sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:2145_0: 316. Sabbaṃ attano parikkhāraṃ anavasesetvā pakkamanto “samādāya pakkamatī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:2145_1: “Kathinuddhāre viseso natthi. Puggalādhippāyavisesena kevalaṃ vāradassanatthaṃ samādāyavārā
tika-vin06t:2145_2: vuttā”ti sabbesu gaṇṭhipadesu likhitaṃ. Idha pana puggalādhippāyena payojanaṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2145_4: pakkamanantikatā sambhavati, tasmā pakkamanantikavāropi vattabboti ce? Na, sanniṭṭhānantikalakkhaṇappasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:2146_0: Tatrāyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya vāravibhāvanā – ādāyavārā satta, tathā samādāyavārāti dve
tika-vin06t:2146_1: sattakavārā. Tato pakkamanantikaṃ vajjetvā vippakatacīvarassa ādāyavārā, samādāyavārā
tika-vin06t:2146_2: cāti dve chakkavārā. Tato paraṃ niṭṭhānasanniṭṭhānanāsanantikānaṃ vasena tīṇi tikāni
tika-vin06t:2146_3: dassitāni, tattha paṭhamattikaṃ antosīmāya “na paccessa”nti imaṃ vidhiṃ anāmasitvā
tika-vin06t:2146_4: bahisīmāyaṃ eva “na paccessa”nti pavattaṃ, tasmā pakkamanantikasīmātikkantikasaubbhārā
tika-vin06t:2146_5: tattha na yujjanti. “Āsāvacchediko sambhavantopi yathāvuttakāraṇena na vutto. Dutiyattikaṃ
tika-vin06t:2146_6: antosīmāya ‘na paccessa’nti pavattaṃ, ettha kiñcāpi pakkamanantiko sambhavati, tathāpi
tika-vin06t:2146_7: yehi cīvarapalibodho chijjati, tesaṃyevādhippetattā na vutto”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin06t:2146_8: vuttaṃ. Sabbasmimpi pannarasake vippakatacīvarassevādhippetattāti takko. Adhiṭṭhānupage
tika-vin06t:2146_9: ca vippakate sati na niṭṭhānantiko. Niṭṭhānāvasese sati na nāsanantikoti porāṇā.
tika-vin06t:2146_10: Tatiyattikaṃ anadhiṭṭhita-padena visesetvā pavattaṃ, atthato paṭhamattikena sameti.
tika-vin06t:2146_11: Tassa atthadassanapayojanaṃ kira taṃ. Yasmā ime tayo atthavikappā imehi eva tīhi
tika-vin06t:2146_12: kathinuddhārehi sakkā dassetuṃ, tasmā imeva yojitā ekasambandhavasena, aññathā paṭhamattikaṃ
tika-vin06t:2146_13: chakkaṃ bhaveyya imassa pannarasakassa ante chakkaṃ viya. Tatiyattikānantaraṃ catutthattikaṃ
tika-vin06t:2146_14: sambhavantaṃ “antosīmāyaṃ ‘paccessa”nti vacanavisesena sambhavati. Tathā ca yojiyamānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2146_15: itarehi savanantikādīhi aviruddhakkamaṃ hoti, tasmā catutthattikaṃ ahutvā chakkaṃ
tika-vin06t:2146_16: jātanti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ tīṇi tikāni ekaṃ chakkañcāti paṭhamaṃ pannarasakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2146_17: Idāni idameva pannarasakaṃ upasaggavisesena dutiyaṃ samādāyapannarasakaṃ nāma kataṃ.
tika-vin06t:2146_18: Puna vippakatacīvaraṃ ādāyāti tatiyaṃ pannarasakaṃ, samādāyāti catutthaṃ pannarasakaṃ
tika-vin06t:2146_19: dassitaṃ. Evaṃ cattāri pannarasakāni veditabbāni. Tattha paṭhamadutiyesu pannarasakesu
tika-vin06t:2146_20: sabbena sabbaṃ akatacīvaraṃ adhippetaṃ, itaresu dvīsu vippakatanti yojetabbaṃ. “Pubbe
tika-vin06t:2146_21: nibaddhaṭṭhāne cīvarāsāya gahetabbaṃ, aññattha na vaṭṭati. Upacchinnāya ce cīvarāsāya
tika-vin06t:2146_22: cīvaraṃ uppannaṃ, na taṃ cīvarapalibodhaṃ karotī”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Nissaggiyesu
tika-vin06t:2146_23: tatiyakathine āgatacīvarapaccāsā idha cīvarāsāti takko. Yattha cīvarāsā, taṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2146_25: vuttaṃ, tasmā anāsāya labhatīti anāsāyitaṭṭhāne labhatītiādinā attho gahetabbo. Ettha
tika-vin06t:2146_27: tasmā pubbe vuttāni tīṇi tikāni āsāvacchedikādhikāni tīṇi catukkānīti ekaṃ anāsāyadvādasakanti
tika-vin06t:2146_28: veditabbaṃ. Tadanantare āsāyadvādasake kiñcāpi paṭhamadvādasakkamo labbhati, tathāpi
tika-vin06t:2146_29: taṃ nibbisesanti tamekaṃ dvādasakaṃ avuttasiddhaṃ katvā visesato dassetuṃ ādito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin06t:2146_30: “antosīmāya paccessa”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ dutiyacatukke “so bahisīmagato suṇātī”tiādivacanassa
tika-vin06t:2146_31: tatiyacatukke savanantikādīnañca okāsakaraṇatthanti veditabbaṃ. Idaṃ pana dvādasakaṃ
tika-vin06t:2146_32: anāsāya vasena labbhamānampi iminā avuttasiddhaṃ katvā na dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2146_33: Evamettha dve dvādasakāni uddharitāni. Karaṇīyadvādasakepi yathādassitaanāsāyadvādasakaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2146_34: avuttasiddhaṃ āsāyadvādasakañcāti dve dvādasakāni uddharitabbāni. Idāni disaṃgamikanavakaṃ
tika-vin06t:2146_35: hoti. Tattha yasmā “disaṃgamiko pakkamatī”ti vacaneneva “na paccessa”nti idaṃ avuttasiddhameva,
tika-vin06t:2146_36: tasmā taṃ na vuttaṃ. Ettāvatā āvāsapalibodhābhāvo dassito.
tika-vin06t:2147_1: Paṭivīsoti attano pattabbo cīvarabhāgo. Apavilāyamānoti ākaṅkhamāno. Tassa cīvaralābhe
tika-vin06t:2147_2: sati vassaṃvutthāvāse niṭṭhānasanniṭṭhānanāsanantikānaṃ vasena ekaṃ tikaṃ, tesaṃyeva
tika-vin06t:2147_3: vasena antarāmagge ekaṃ, gataṭṭhāne ekanti tiṇṇaṃ tikānaṃ vasena ekaṃ navakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2147_4: Tato paraṃ niṭṭhānasanniṭṭhānanāsananti kasīmātikkantikasaubbhārānaṃ vasena phāsuvihārapañcakaṃ
tika-vin06t:2147_5: vuttaṃ. Ubhayattha sesakathinuddhārāsambhavo pākaṭova. Ayaṃ panettha pañcake viseso
tika-vin06t:2148: 325. Dveme bhikkhave kathinassa palibodhāti kathinatthārassa anupabandhanapaccayāti.
tika-vin06t:2153: 328. Amohajātikattā na cirasseva viññutaṃ pāpuṇi. Ahaṃ te pitā, kenaṭṭhena? Yasmā tvaṃ mayā posāpito.
tika-vin06t:2156: 334. Bhuñjituṃ nisinnassāti ettha “dhammapade ‘bahinagare disvā’ti vuttaṃ, tasmā dvīsu divasesu dinnaṃ tena tesu ekekaṃ gahetvā dvīsu aṭṭhakathāsu vuttanti yujjatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2158: 336. Kabaḷe kabaḷeti ettha kiñcāpi guḷādīsu pakkhittaṃ, taṃ pana bhagavāva paribhuñji, tasmā natthi doso.
tika-vin06t:2162_0: 340. Upacāreti susānassa upacāre. Bahipi vaṭṭatīti eke. Katikakaraṇaṃ dassetvā “mayhaṃ
tika-vin06t:2162_1: santakaṃ tava ca mama ca hotūti vatvā itarena ca tathāvutte vaṭṭatī”ti samānaparikkhāravidhiṃ vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2163_0: 342. “Khaṇḍasīmāyapi sammannituṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttattā sesakammānipi tattha nisīditvā
tika-vin06t:2163_1: kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Evaṃ sante corikāya katasadisaṃ hoti, tasmā na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin06t:2163_2: dīpavāsino vadanti kira. “Corikāya gahitattā na pāpuṇātīti senāsanakkhandhake āgatasuttañca
tika-vin06t:2163_3: sādhaka”nti vadanti, tasmā tesaṃ matena idaṃ āveṇikalakkhaṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2167: 344. Gomaye āpatti natthi, virūpattāvāritaṃ. “Kuṅkumapupphaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. “Allikāyā”tipi pāṭho atthi.
tika-vin06t:2169_1: rāgacittābhāvā na muccatīti vā rāgapaccaye sati kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti vā vicāretvā
tika-vin06t:2170: 362. Aggaḷaguttiyeva pamāṇanti imehi catūhi nikkhepakāraṇehi ṭhapentena aggaḷaguttivihāreyeva ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:2172_0: 363. No ce atthataṃ hoti “ekaṃ cīvaramāsa”nti na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā? “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin06t:2172_1: tasseva tāni cīvarāni yāva cīvaramāsā”ti vacanassa abhāvato, tasmā anatthatakathinassa
tika-vin06t:2172_2: ananuññātanti ce? Na, heṭṭhā anuññātattā, tato līnatthadīpanatthamidha tathā vuttattā
tika-vin06t:2172_3: ca. Heṭṭhā hi “akālacīvaraṃ nāma anatthate kathine ekādasamāse uppannaṃ, atthate
tika-vin06t:2172_4: kathine sattamāse uppannaṃ, kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ, etaṃ akālacīvaraṃ nāmā”ti vacanato
tika-vin06t:2172_5: anatthatakathinānaṃ ekacīvaramāse uppannaṃ, tesaṃyeva hotīti siddhaṃ, tasmā idha
tika-vin06t:2172_6: taṃ avatvā ekopi tayo gaṇapūrake labhitvā kathinaṃ attharituṃ labhatīti imaṃ līnatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:2172_7: pakāsetuṃ “yāva kathinassa ubbhārāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Itarathā ayamattho na ñāyati. “Jānitabbo
tika-vin06t:2172_8: ca vinayadharehīti tathā vuttoti apare”ti vuttaṃ. Atthataṃ hoti, pañca māse sabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:2172_9: tasseva bhikkhuno hotīti sambandho. Accantasaṃyogavasena upayogavacanaṃ. “Idha vassaṃvutthasaṅghassā”ti
tika-vin06t:2172_10: niyamitattā “vassāvāsikaṃ demā”ti ettha ca “idhā”ti adhikārattā tasmiṃ vutte labhati.
tika-vin06t:2172_12: anuññātaṭṭhānattā eva vutta”nti aññatarasmiṃ gaṇṭhipade likhitaṃ. Keci pana “yaṃ
tika-vin06t:2172_13: pana idaṃ ‘idha vassaṃvutthasaṅghassā’tiādiṃ katvā yāva ‘anāgatavasse’ti padaṃ, tāva
tika-vin06t:2172_14: pucchitvā ‘kasmā? Piṭṭhisamaye uppannattā’ti idaṃ parato ‘tatra sammukhībhūtānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2172_15: sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātī’ti imassa pariyosāne ‘kasmā? Piṭṭhisamaye uppannattā’ti likhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2172_16: Kasmāti ce? Parato ‘cīvaramāsato paṭṭhāya yāva hemantassā’ti vuttena nibbisesattā,
tika-vin06t:2172_17: tasmā eva ekaccesu paṇḍitanti vadantī”ti vadanti. Idha pana idha-saddena visesitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2172_18: tattha natthi, tasmā aññamaññavirodho natthīti gahetabbaṃ. “Mayhimāni cīvarāni pāpuṇantī”ti
tika-vin06t:2172_19: vacanamevādhiṭṭhānaṃ, idamettha ukkaṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ. “Mayhimāni cīvarānī’ti vuttepi
tika-vin06t:2172_20: adhiṭṭhitameva hotī”ti vuttaṃ. “Mayhimānī’ti vutte tassa cīvarāni nāma natthi, tasmā
tika-vin06t:2172_21: ‘cīvarāni pāpuṇantī’ti vattabbamevā”ti vadanti. Duggahitānīti saṅghikāneva honti.
tika-vin06t:2172_22: “Gahitameva nāmā’ti imassa idaṃ pattanti kiñcāpi na viditaṃ, te pana bhāgā tesaṃ
tika-vin06t:2172_23: atthato pattāyevāti adhippāyo”ti likhitaṃ. “Ekasmiṃ apatite puna āgatā labhantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2174_0: 364. “Na, bhikkhave, aññatra vassaṃvutthenā”ti cīvarasamayaṃ upādāya paṭikkhepo kato.Ekasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:2174_1: vihāre “rājavihāre viya nānāpariveṇesu vā idha vā vutthā labhatū”ti vatvā dinnaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2174_2: “Sattāhavārena aruṇameva uṭṭhāpetīti etaṃ vacanamattameva ekavihāre sattāhakiccābhāvā”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2176_1: sabbaparikkhāranidassananti veditabbaṃ. Adhammena uppannañcetaṃ hoti, saṅghassa kappiyameva
tika-vin06t:2176_2: matattāti eke. Noti takko pattacatukke sabbathā akappiyapattanayavirodhato. Adhammena
tika-vin06t:2176_3: uppannasenāsane ca vasato anāpatti. Aññatarasmiṃ āvāse dve bhikkhū vasanti, tattha
tika-vin06t:2176_4: ceko kālaṃkato, itaro tassa parikkhāraṃ apāpetvā taṃ theyyacittena gaṇhāti, saṅghasantakaṃ
tika-vin06t:2176_5: gahitaṃ hoti, bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Anāvāse gaṇhāti, na kāretabbo assāmikassa gahitattā.
tika-vin06t:2176_6: Maraṇasamaye vattuṃ asahanto ce citteneva deti, puññaṃ pasavati, saṅghova tassa sāmī.
tika-vin06t:2176_7: Paro vā avissāsiko sayameva gaṇhāti, gahaṇaṃ na ruhati, theyyacittena ce, bhaṇḍagghena
tika-vin06t:2176_8: kāretabbo. Tassa ca āvāsagatassa ko sāmī. “Saṅgho sāmī”ti vacanato saṅghena balakkārena
tika-vin06t:2176_9: so vāretabboti eke. Jīvamānakāle gahitattā na saṅgho sāmīti eke. Sāmiko ce sayaṃ
tika-vin06t:2176_10: passitvā acchindituṃ labhati, saṅghopi labhati sāmiṭhāne ṭhitattāti itare, vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2177_0: Matakassa hiraññādiakappiyabhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Uggahitañcetaṃ hoti, uggahite vuttanayena
tika-vin06t:2177_1: paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Dhammena uppannaṃ ce, kappiyakārako ācikkhitabbo. Dāso ce gahito
tika-vin06t:2177_2: hoti, na saṅgho sāmī, ārāmiko ce, saṅgho sāmī. Gāvīmahiṃsīādayo honti, āvāsagatānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2177_3: saṅgho sāmī, anāvāsagatānaṃ na saṅgho sāmī. Saṅgho ce āvāsaṃ ānetvā attano santakaṃ
tika-vin06t:2177_4: katvā pacchā samīpe bahisīmāya ṭhapeti, kārakasaṅgho sāmī, tathā ārāmike. Matakassa
tika-vin06t:2177_5: parikkhāro nikkhepavasena ṭhapito hoti, esova sāmī. Mahaggho ce hoti, sesassa saṅgho
tika-vin06t:2177_6: sāmī. “Kenaci gilānupaṭṭhākenā”ti vattabbakkamo etena dassito. Puna upaṭṭhākānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2177_7: bahubhāve sati sabbesaṃ dātabbakammaṃ dassentena bhagavatā kammavācāyaṃ “gilānupaṭṭhākāna”nti
tika-vin06t:2177_8: vuttaṃ. Sāmaṇeravāre “cīvara”nti pāṭho. “Imaṃ tuyhaṃ demi dadāmi dajjāmi oṇojemi
tika-vin06t:2177_9: pariccajāmi vissajjāmi nissajjāmī’ti vā ‘itthannāmassa demi…pe… nissajjāmī’ti vā
tika-vin06t:2177_10: vadati, ‘sammukhā vā parammukhā vā vutte dinnaṃyeva hotī’ti dānalakkhaṇassa ca ‘tuyhaṃ
tika-vin06t:2177_11: gaṇhāhī’ti vutte ‘mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī’ti vadati, ‘sudinnaṃ suggahitañcā’ti gahaṇalakkhaṇassa
tika-vin06t:2177_12: ca vuttattā ‘mama santakaṃ tava ca mama ca hotū’ti evamādivacanena samānaparikkhāraṃ
tika-vin06t:2178_0: Anugaṇṭhipade pana atīva papañcaṃ katvā puna “idamettha ācariyānaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ –
tika-vin06t:2178_1: sacesambahulā, dve vā samānaparikkhāraṃ kattukāmā honti, te sabbe attano santakaṃ
tika-vin06t:2178_2: vattamānaṃ uppajjanakena saddhiṃ pesalassa ekassa pariccajanti, so puna tesameva
tika-vin06t:2178_3: pariccajati, ettāvatā te samānaparikkhārikā hontīti. Idaṃ samānaparikkhāralakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:2178_4: pāḷiādīsu vuttalakkhaṇeyeva patanato acalappattaṃ hoti, tathāpi porāṇavidhiṃ ajjhottharitvā
tika-vin06t:2178_5: vattanato paṭisedhetabbo, ācariyānaṃ matānusārena kātabbaṃ kātukāmenāti apare”ti
tika-vin06t:2178_6: vuttaṃ, “vassaṃvutthasāmaṇero pañcasu sikkhāpadesu ekaṃ atikkamitvā puna gahito lābhaṃ
tika-vin06t:2178_7: na labhati, antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno nāma hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2180_0: 375. Uppanne cīvare abhājite pakkamatīti ettha “saṅghena tatruppādato ekekassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin06t:2180_1: ettakaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ dātuṃ saṅghassa ruccatī”ti sāvitepi vibbhamati, tato na labhati,
tika-vin06t:2180_2: puna pabbajitvā upasampajjitvā cīvarabhājanaṃ sambhāventopi na labhatiyeva pubbapakatito
tika-vin06t:2180_3: bhaṭṭhattā. Atha pāpite vibbhamati, labhatī”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2184_0: 379. Yasmā aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ dubbijānaṃ, tasmā “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2184_2: bhikkhūsupi…pe… pāpuṇātīti ‘upacārasīmāya demā’ti evaṃ dinnameva sandhāyā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2184_3: “Samānasaṃvāsakasīmāyā”ti vutte khaṇḍasīmādīsu ṭhitānaṃ na pāpuṇāti tāsaṃ visuṃ samānasaṃvāsakasīmattā.
tika-vin06t:2184_5: gāmaṭṭhānaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Kasmā? “Ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti vuttattā. “Samānasaṃvāsakasīmāyā”ti
tika-vin06t:2184_6: dinnaṃ pana yasmiṃ ṭhāne avippavāsasīmā atthi, tattha ṭhitānaṃ, itaratra ṭhitānañca
tika-vin06t:2184_8: eva paricchinditvā dātabba”nti vuttaṃ. “Avippavāsasīmāya demā”ti khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ ṭhatvā
tika-vin06t:2184_9: dinne tattheva pāpuṇātīti keci. Yojanasatampi pūretvā nisīdantīti ettha vihārūpacāre
tika-vin06t:2184_10: hatthapāsena, bahigāmādīsu dvādasahatthena upacāroti eke. “Imasmiṃ vihāre saṅghassā”ti
tika-vin06t:2184_11: vutte ekābaddhā hutvāpi parikkhepaparikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitānaṃ na pāpuṇātīti
tika-vin06t:2184_12: eke. “Bhikkhunivihārato bahi yattha katthaci ṭhatvā ‘saṅghassā’ti vutte bhikkhusaṅghova
tika-vin06t:2184_13: sāmī”ti vadanti. Ekopi gantvāti ettha sabbesaṃ vā pāpetvā gantabbaṃ, ānetvā vā pāpetabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2184_14: itarathā gatassa na pāpuṇāti. Samānalābhakatikā mūlāvāse sati siyā, mūlāvāsavināsena
tika-vin06t:2184_15: katikāpi vinassati. Samānalābhavacanaṃ sati dvīsu, bahūsu vā yujjati. Teneva ekasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:2188_0: Sabbattha dinnamevāti “samānabhāgova hotī”ti vadanti. “Ekamekaṃ amhākaṃ pāpuṇātīti
tika-vin06t:2188_1: ce vadati, vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti vibhāgassa katattā. “Bhikkhusaṅghassa cīvare dinne
tika-vin06t:2188_3: avuttattā bhikkhunisaṅghena missitattā, tattha apariyāpannattā ca puggalo visuṃ labhati.
tika-vin06t:2188_4: Evaṃ sante “bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunisaṅghassa ca dammī”ti vuttepi “ubhatosaṅghassa
tika-vin06t:2188_5: dinnameva hotī”ti iminā virujjhatīti ce? Na virujjhati, taṃ dvinnaṃ saṅghānaṃ dinnabhāvameva
tika-vin06t:2188_6: dīpeti, na ubhatosaṅghapaññattiṃ, tasmā eva “bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunisaṅghassa
tika-vin06t:2188_7: ca tuyhañcā”ti vāro na vutto. Atha vā aṭṭhakathāvacanameva pamāṇaṃ, na vicāraṇāti
tika-vin06t:2188_8: eke. Yasmā eko addhānādiyako viya duvidho na hoti, tasmā ubhatosaṅghaggahaṇena eko
tika-vin06t:2188_9: bhikkhu na gahitoti. “Sabbāvāsassa ca cetiyassa ca dhammassa cā’ti vutte sabbavihāresu
tika-vin06t:2188_10: cetiyadhammānaṃ ekekassa bhikkhuno bhāgo dātabbo”ti vadanti. “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca
tika-vin06t:2188_11: cetiyassa cā”ti vutte na virujjhatīti ce? Na, tattha “bhikkhusaṅghassā”ti vuttattā,
tika-vin06t:2188_12: idha vihārena ghaṭitattā ca tamhi tamhi vihāre ekabhāgaṃ labhitabbamevāti pariharanti.
tika-vin06t:2188_13: Attano pāpetvāti vikāle aparibhogattā sakalopi vaṭṭeyyāti ce? “Bhikkhusaṅghassa harā”ti
tika-vin06t:2188_14: vuttattā, tena “harāmī”ti gahitattā ca na vaṭṭati. Pacchimavassaṃvutthānampīti ettha
tika-vin06t:2188_15: api-saddo avadhāraṇattho, pacchimavassaṃvutthānamevāti attho, itarathā samuccayatthe
tika-vin06t:2188_16: gahite “lakkhaṇaññū vadantī”ti vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā. Kasmāti ārabhitvā papañcaṃ
tika-vin06t:2188_17: karonti. Kiṃ tena, parato “cīvaramāsato paṭṭhāya…pe… atītavassaṃvutthānameva pāpuṇātī”ti
tika-vin06t:2188_18: iminā siddhattā na vicāritaṃ, tena vuttaṃ “lakkhaṇaññū”ti acalavasena. Sace pana
tika-vin06t:2188_19: bahiupacārasīmāya ṭhito…pe… sampattānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātīti yattha katthaci vutthavassānanti
tika-vin06t:2188_20: adhippāyo “yattha katthaci vutthavassānaṃ sabbesaṃ sampattānaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2188_21: vuttattā. Gimhānaṃ paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya vutte pana yasmā anantarātītaṃ hemantaṃ
tika-vin06t:2188_22: eva vutthā nāma honti, na vassaṃ, tasmā “mātikā āropetabbā”ti vuttaṃ. Ye vā therehi
tika-vin06t:2192_0: 395. Appatto nissāraṇanti ettha nissāraṇaṃ nāma kuladūsakānaṃyeva anuññātaṃ, ayaṃ
tika-vin06t:2192_1: pana kuladūsako na hoti, tasmā “appatto”ti vutto. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sunissārito hotīti?
tika-vin06t:2192_3: tassapāpiyasikakammaṃ karontī”ti vacanato cakkaṃ bandhanti ñātabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2194_1: āgato vippannavatthukattā”ti vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ campeyyakkhandhake adhammakammāniyeva
tika-vin06t:2194_2: dvidhā katvā pañcāgatānīti veditabbaṃ. Teneva parivāre imasmiṃ khandhake “pañca adhammikānī”ti
tika-vin06t:2194_3: vuttaṃ. “Andhamūgabadhiro sosārito”ti iminā apabbajitassapi upasampadā ruhatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2198_0: 451. Suttantikoti ettha kiñcāpi “vinayadharo mātikādharo”ti vuttaṃ, ubhatovibhaṅgaṃ
tika-vin06t:2198_1: pana sandhāya vuttaṃ, na khandhakabhāṇako hoti. Āvuso ettha āpattīti vacanaṃ upādāya
tika-vin06t:2198_2: “so tassā āpattiyā āpattidiṭṭhi hotī”ti vuccati. Pacchā vinayadharo “vatthumhi sati
tika-vin06t:2198_3: pamāṇaṃ, na paññattiya”nti satiṃ paṭilabhitvā tassā āpattiyā āpattidiṭṭhi ahosi,
tika-vin06t:2198_4: tena vuttaṃ ante “aññe bhikkhū tassā āpattiyā āpattidiṭṭhino hontī”ti.
tika-vin06t:2201: 458. “Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto”ti likhanti. Purāṇapotthakesu “bārāṇasiya”nti natthi, “natthibhāvova sundaro”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2203: 467. Rakkhitavanasaṇḍeti saṅgītittherehi suviññeyyaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. “Pālileyyoti gāmo, tassa vasenā”tipi vadanti, taṃ dhammapadaṭṭhakathāya na virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:2205_0: 473. Na tveva…pe… paṭibāhitabbanti vadāmīti ettha senāsanārahassa yo senāsanaṃ paṭibāhati,
tika-vin06t:2205_1: tasseva āpatti dukkaṭassa. “Kalahakārakādīnamettha okāso natthītiādikaṃ saṅghassa
tika-vin06t:2205_2: katikaṃ vatvā taṃ na paññāpentassa vā ‘ahaṃ buddho’ti pasayha attanā attano paññāpetvā
tika-vin06t:2205_3: gaṇhantaṃ ‘yuttiyā gaṇhathā’ti vatvā vārentassa vā doso natthi. Idha kalahavūpasamanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:2205_4: āgatānaṃ kosambikānampi ‘yathāvuḍḍha’nti avatvā ‘vivitte asati vivittaṃ katvāpi dātabba’nti
tika-vin06t:2205_5: vuttattā vivittaṃ katvā dentaṃ paṭibāhentasseva āpattīti kira ayamattho pārivāsikādīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:2207_0: 475. “Atha kho te ukkhittānuvattakā bhikkhū taṃ ukkhittakaṃ bhikkhuṃ osāretvā yena
tika-vin06t:2207_1: ukkhepakā bhikkhū…pe… tassa vatthussa vūpasamāya saṅghasāmaggiṃ karomā”ti vacanaṃ
tika-vin06t:2207_2: duviññeyyavinicchayaṃ vinayalakkhaṇakusalassa. Vijjamāne hi kārakasaṅghe itaro saṅgho
tika-vin06t:2207_3: osārituṃ na labhati. Osārento ce, te bhikkhū kārakasaṅghena samānaladdhikabhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:2207_4: pattattā tena samānasaṃvāsakā honti, tato ukkhepakānaṃ chandaṃ aggahetvā osārentānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2207_5: kammaṃ kuppati, tasmā “tena hi, bhikkhave, taṃ bhikkhuṃ osārethā”ti bhagavato vacanena
tika-vin06t:2207_6: ukkhittānuvattakā osāresuṃ, udāhu nissīmaṃ gantvā, udāhu itaresaṃ chandaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin06t:2207_7: osāresuṃ, nanu etesamaññatarenettha bhavitabbaṃ, na ca panetaṃ sabbagaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin06t:2209: Sati tasmiṃ na aññassa, paṭippassambhanaṃ khamaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2212: 477. “Aṭṭha dūtaṅgāni nāma sotā ca hoti, sāvetā ca uggahetā ca dhāretā ca viññātā ca viññāpetā ca kusalo ca sahitāsahitadassano ca akalahakārako cāti etānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2219_0: 4. Asammukhā kataṃ hotītiādayo tikā kevalaṃ desanāmattameva. Na hi tīhi eva aṅgehi
tika-vin06t:2219_1: samodhānehi adhammakammaṃ hoti, ekenapi hoti eva, ayamattho “tiṇṇaṃ, bhikkhave”tiādipāḷiyā
tika-vin06t:2219_2: sādhetabbo. “Appaṭiññāya kataṃ hotī”ti lajjiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kaṇhapakkhe “adesanāgāminiyā
tika-vin06t:2219_3: āpattiyā kataṃ hotī”ti sukkapakkhe “desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hotī”ti idaṃ dvayaṃ
tika-vin06t:2219_4: parato “tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tajjanīyakammaṃ
tika-vin06t:2219_5: kareyya. Adhisīle sīlavipanno hotī”ti iminā virujjhati, adesanāgāminiṃ āpanno hi
tika-vin06t:2219_6: “adhisīle sīlavipanno”ti vuccatīti. Yuttametaṃ, kattu adhippāyo ettha cintetabbo.
tika-vin06t:2219_7: Etthāha upatissatthero “tajjanīyakammassa hi visesena bhaṇḍanakārakattaṃ aṅga’nti
tika-vin06t:2219_8: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ pāḷiyā āgatanidānena yujjati, tasmā sabbattikesupi bhaṇḍanaṃ
tika-vin06t:2219_9: āropetvā bhaṇḍanapaccayā āpannāpattivasena idaṃ kammaṃ kātabbaṃ, tasmā ‘adhisīle
tika-vin06t:2219_10: sīlavipanno’ti etthāpi pubbabhāge vā aparabhāge vā codanāsāraṇādikāle bhaṇḍanapaccayā
tika-vin06t:2219_11: āpannāpattivaseneva kāretabbaṃ, na kevalaṃ saṅghādisesapaccayā kātabba”nti. “Adesanāgāminiyā
tika-vin06t:2219_12: āpattiyāti pārājikāpattiyā’ti ettakamattaṃ vatvā parato ‘adhisīle pārājikasaṅghādisese
tika-vin06t:2219_13: ajjhācārā’ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vutta”nti likhitaṃ. “Adhisīle sīlavipanno’ti saṅghādisesaṃ
tika-vin06t:2219_14: sandhāyā”ti gaṇṭhipade likhitaṃ. Idaṃ porāṇagaṇṭhipade purimavacanena sameti, tasmā
tika-vin06t:2219_15: tattha pacchimaṃ pārājikapadaṃ atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ siyā, aṭṭhakathāyañca “adesanāgāminiyāti
tika-vin06t:2219_16: pārājikāpattiyā vā saṅghādisesāpattiyā vā”ti vuttaṃ, tattha pārājikāpatti atthuddhāravasena
tika-vin06t:2219_17: vuttā siyā. Yato gaṇṭhipade “adhisīle sīlavipanno’ti saṅghādisesaṃ sandhāyā”ti ettakameva
tika-vin06t:2219_18: likhitaṃ, tasmā sabbattha gaṇṭhipade sakalena nayena pārājikāpattipaccayā uppannabhaṇḍanahetu
tika-vin06t:2219_19: na tajjanīyakammaṃ kātabbaṃ payojanābhāvā, saṅghādisesapaccayā kātabbanti ayamattho
tika-vin06t:2219_20: siddho hoti. Na, sukkapakkhe “desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hotī”ti vacanatoti ce?
tika-vin06t:2220_0: Yena kammena santajjanaṃ karīyati, taṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ nāma. Yena kammena nissāya
tika-vin06t:2220_1: te vatthabbanti nissiyati bhajāpiyati niyasso, taṃ niyasakammaṃ nāma. Yena tato āvāsato,
tika-vin06t:2220_2: gāmato ca pabbājenti kuladūsakaṃ, taṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ nāma. Yena kammena akkuṭṭhagahaṭṭhasamaīpameva
tika-vin06t:2220_3: paṭisāriyati so akkosako pacchā pesiyati, taṃ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ nāma. Yena samānasaṃvāsakabhūmito
tika-vin06t:2220_4: ukkhipiyati. Chaḍḍīyati sātisāro bhikkhusaṅghena, taṃ kammaṃ ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2221: 11. “Nissāya te vatthabba”nti garunissayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na itaranti.
tika-vin06t:2222_1: sammāvattantānaṃyevā”ti likhitaṃ. Sammukhā vuttameva gihipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ nāma. Parammukhā
tika-vin06t:2223: 41. Khamāpentena “khamāhī”ti vattabbamattameva, na ukkuṭikādisāmīcinā payojananti. Anudūtanti sahāyanti attho.
tika-vin06t:2224: 50. Adassaneyeva ukkhepanīyaṃ kātabbaṃ, na aññathā. “Tajjanīyādikaraṇakāle āpattiṃ ropetvā tassā adassane, appaṭikamme vā bhaṇḍanakārakādiaṅgehi kātabba”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2225_0: Tajjanīyakammādīsu ayaṃ pakiṇṇakavinicchayoti veditabbo. Kiṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ, tajjanīyakammassa
tika-vin06t:2225_1: kiṃ mūlaṃ, kiṃ vatthu, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ, kasmā “tajjanīyakamma”nti vuccatīti? Kiṃ
tika-vin06t:2225_2: tajjanīyakammanti vatthusmiṃ sati karaṇasampatti. Tajjanīyakammassa kiṃ mūlanti saṅgho
tika-vin06t:2225_3: mūlaṃ. Tajjanīyakammassa kiṃ vatthūti kalahajātāpattivatthu. Kiṃ pariyosānanti bhāvanāpariyosānaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2225_4: Kasmā tajjanīyakammanti vuccatīti saṅgho kalahakārakapuggalaṃ kalahe ca bhede ca
tika-vin06t:2225_5: bhayaṃ dassetvā khantiyā janeti, upasame janeti, tasmā “tajjanīyakamma”nti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:2225_6: Kathaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti, kathaṃ akataṃ. Kinti ca tajjanīyakammaṃ kataṃ
tika-vin06t:2225_7: hoti, kinti ca akataṃ. Kena ca tajjanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti, kena ca akataṃ. Kattha
tika-vin06t:2225_8: ca tajjanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti, kattha ca akataṃ. Kāya velāya tajjanīyakammaṃ kataṃ
tika-vin06t:2225_9: hoti, kāya velāya akataṃ hoti? Kathaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hotīti samaggena saṅghena
tika-vin06t:2225_10: ñatticatutthena kammena. Kathaṃ akataṃ hotīti vaggena saṅghena ñatticatutthena kammena.
tika-vin06t:2225_11: Kinti ca kataṃ hotīti karaṇasampattiyā. Kinti ca akataṃ hotīti karaṇavipattiyā. Kena
tika-vin06t:2225_12: ca kataṃ hotīti saṅghena. Kena ca akataṃ hotīti gaṇena puggalena. Kattha ca kataṃ
tika-vin06t:2225_13: hotīti yassa puggalassa saṅgho tajjanīyakammaṃ karoti, tassa puggalassa sammukhībhūte.
tika-vin06t:2225_14: Kattha ca akataṃ hotīti yassa puggalassa saṅgho tajjanīyakammaṃ karoti, tassa puggalassa
tika-vin06t:2225_15: asammukhībhūte. Kāya velāya kataṃ hotīti yadā kalahajātāpatti saṃvijjati. Kāya velāya
tika-vin06t:2225_16: akataṃ hotīti yadā kalahajātāpatti na saṃvijjati. Katihākārehi tajjanīyakammassa
tika-vin06t:2225_17: pattakallaṃ hoti, katihākārehi apattakallaṃ? Sattahākārehi tajjanīyakammassa pattakallaṃ
tika-vin06t:2225_18: hoti, sattahākārehi apattakallaṃ. Katamehi sattahākārehi pattakallaṃ, katamehi sattahākārehi
tika-vin06t:2225_19: apattakallaṃ hoti? Kalahajātāpatti na saṃvijjati, so vā puggalo asammukhībhūto hoti,
tika-vin06t:2225_20: saṅgho vā vaggo hoti, asaṃvāsiko vā puggalo tassaṃ parisāyaṃ saṃvijjati, acodito
tika-vin06t:2225_21: vā hoti asārito vā, āpattiṃ vā anāropito. Imehi sattahākārehi tajjanīyakammassa apattakallaṃ
tika-vin06t:2225_22: hoti, itarehi sattahākārehi pattakallaṃ hoti. Evaṃ sesakammesūti.
tika-vin06t:2229_0: 75. Pārivāsikakkhandhake “mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchathāti vutte anāpucchāpi gāmaṃ
tika-vin06t:2229_1: pavisituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Saṅgho attano pattaṭṭhāne gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Oṇojanaṃ
tika-vin06t:2229_2: nāma vissajjanaṃ. “Taṃ pana pārivāsikena pāpitassa attanā sampaṭicchitasseva punadivasādiatthāya
tika-vin06t:2229_3: vissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ, asampaṭicchitvāyeva ce vissajjeti, na labhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2230_0: 76. Pakatiyāva nissayoti ettha “antevāsikānaṃ ālayasabbhāve yāva vassūpanāyikadivaso,
tika-vin06t:2230_1: tāva kappati, tassa ālayassa sabbhāve nissayo na paṭippassambhatīti ce? Na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2230_2: Tattha idāni khamāpeyyāmītiādinā vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ekantena vissaṭṭhattā,
tika-vin06t:2230_3: idha pana ekanteneva dvinnampi samabhāvo icchitabbo evāti eke. Paṭibalassa vā bhikkhussāti
tika-vin06t:2230_4: ettha “laddhasammutikena āṇattopi garudhammehi, aññehi vā ovadituṃ na labhatī”ti
tika-vin06t:2230_5: likhitaṃ. Tato vā pāpiṭṭhatarāti ettha “asañcicca āpannasañcarittato sukkavissaṭṭhi
tika-vin06t:2230_6: pāpiṭṭhatarāti ayampi nayo yojetabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Paccayanti vassāvāsikaṃ. Senāsanaṃ
tika-vin06t:2230_7: na labhati seyyapariyantabhāgitāya. “Uddesādīni dātumpi na labhatī”ti vadanti. “Sace
tika-vin06t:2230_8: dve pārivāsikā gataṭṭhāne aññamaññaṃ passanti, ubhohipi aññamaññassa ārocetabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:2230_9: avisesena ‘āgantukena ārocetabbaṃ, āgantukassa ārocetabba’nti vuttattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2230_10: Aññavihāragatenāpi tattha pubbe ārocitassa punārocanakiccaṃ natthi. “Anikkhittavattassa
tika-vin06t:2230_11: bahi ārocitassa yathā puna vihāre ārocanakiccaṃ natthi, evaṃ ‘āgantukasodhanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:2231_0: 81. Ekacchanne nisinnassāpi ratticchedadukkaṭāpattiyo hontīti eke. Avisesenāti pārivāsikassa
tika-vin06t:2231_1: ukkhittakassāti imaṃ bhedaṃ akatvā. “Tadahupasampannepi pakatatte”ti vacanato anupasampannehi
tika-vin06t:2231_2: vasituṃ vaṭṭati. “Samavassāti etena apacchā apurimaṃ nipajjane dvinnampi vattabhedāpattibhāvaṃ dīpetī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2234_0: 86. Attano attano navakataranti pārivāsikādinavakataraṃ. Paṭhamaṃ saṅghamajjhe parivāsaṃ
tika-vin06t:2234_1: gahetvā nikkhittavattena puna ekassapi santike samādiyituṃ, nikkhipituñca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2234_2: Mānatte pana nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati. Ūne gaṇe caraṇadosattā na gahetunti eke. Paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin06t:2234_3: ādinnavattaṃ ekassa santike yathā nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati, tathā samādiyitumpi vaṭṭatīti porāṇagaṇṭhipade.
tika-vin06t:2238_0: 97. “Vedayāmīti jānāmi, cittena sampaṭicchitvā sukhaṃ anubhavāmi, na tappaccayā ahaṃ
tika-vin06t:2238_1: dukkhitoti adhippāyo”ti likhitaṃ. Yassa māḷake nārocitaṃ, tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2238_2: Yassa ārocitaṃ, tassa puna ārocanakiccaṃ natthi, kevalaṃ nikkhipitabbameva. Vattaṃ
tika-vin06t:2238_3: nikkhipitvā vasantassa upacārasīmāgatānaṃ sabbesaṃ ārocanakiccaṃ natthi. Diṭṭharūpānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2238_5: “Idaṃ vattaṃ nikkhipitvā vasantassa lakkhaṇa”nti vuttaṃ. “Parikkhittassa vihārassa
tika-vin06t:2238_6: parikkhepato’tiādi kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ natthi, atha kho aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ vacanena
tika-vin06t:2238_7: tathā eva paṭipajjitabba”nti ca vuttaṃ. “Atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāti dvādasahatthe
tika-vin06t:2238_8: upacāre sallakkhetvā, anikkhittavattānaṃ upacārasīmāya āgatabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sahavāsādikaṃ
tika-vin06t:2238_9: veditabba”nti ca vuttaṃ. “Nikkhipantena ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ, payojanaṃ atthī”ti
tika-vin06t:2238_10: ca vuttaṃ, na pana taṃ payojanaṃ dassitaṃ. Ciṇṇamānatto bhikkhu abbhetabboti ciṇṇamānattassa
tika-vin06t:2238_11: ca abbhānārahassa ca ninnānākāraṇattā aññathā “abbhānāraho abbhetabbo”ti vattabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:2238_12: siyā. Ukkhepanīyakammakatopi attano laddhiggahaṇavasena sabhāgabhikkhumhi sati tassa
tika-vin06t:2240_0: 102. “Anantarāyikassa pana antarāyikasaññāya chādayato acchannāvā”ti pāṭho. Averibhāvena
tika-vin06t:2240_1: sabhāgo averisabhāgo. “Sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ āpannassa pana santike āvi kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin06t:2240_2: pasaṅgato idheva pakāsitaṃ. Lahukesu paṭikkhepo natthi. Tattha ñattiyā āvi katvā
tika-vin06t:2240_3: uposathaṃ kātuṃ anuññātattā lahukasabhāgaṃ āvi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti. Sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ
tika-vin06t:2240_4: pana ñattiyā ārocanaṃ na vaṭṭatīti kira. “Tassa santike taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissatī’ti
tika-vin06t:2240_5: vuttattā lahukassevāyamanuññātā. Na hi sakkā suddhassa ekassa santike saṅghādisesassa
tika-vin06t:2240_6: paṭikaraṇaṃ kātu”nti likhitaṃ. Lahukesupi sabhāgaṃ āvi kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti, tasmā
tika-vin06t:2240_7: eva hi ñattiyā āvikaraṇaṃ anuññātaṃ, itarathā taṃ niratthakaṃ siyā. Aññamaññārocanassa
tika-vin06t:2240_8: vaṭṭati, tato na vaṭṭatīti dīpanatthameva ñattiyā āvikaraṇamanuññātaṃ, teneva idha
tika-vin06t:2240_9: “sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ āpannassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayamattho “ettāvatā te dve nirāpattikā
tika-vin06t:2240_10: honti, tesaṃ santike sesehi sabhāgāpattiyo desetabbā”ti vacanena kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2240_11: pakāsitova. Saṅghādisesaṃ pana ñattiyā ārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tassā ñattiyā
tika-vin06t:2240_12: ayamattho yadā suddhaṃ bhikkhuṃ passissati, tassa santike ārocanavasena paṭikarissati.
tika-vin06t:2240_13: Evaṃ paṭikate “na ca, bhikkhave, sāpattikena pātimokkhaṃ sotabbaṃ, yo suṇeyya, āpatti
tika-vin06t:2240_14: dukkaṭassā”ti vuttāpattito mokkho hotīti, tasmā “garukaṃ vā hotu lahukaṃ vā, ñattiyā
tika-vin06t:2240_15: āvi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ, ubhosu nayesu yuttataraṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2241_0: Nāmañceva āpatti cāti “tena tena vītikkamenāpannāpatti āpatti. Nāmanti tassā āpattiyā
tika-vin06t:2241_1: nāma”nti likhitaṃ. Ārocetvā nikkhipitabbanti ettha ārocanaṃ vattabhedadukkaṭapaaharaṇappayojananti
tika-vin06t:2241_2: veditabbaṃ. Akāraṇametanti “sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji”nti vutte vuṭṭhānato.
tika-vin06t:2242_0: Dasasataṃ rattisatanti dasasataṃ āpattiyo rattisataṃ chādetvāti yojetabbaṃ. Agghasamodhāno
tika-vin06t:2242_1: nāma sabhāgavatthukāyo sambahulā āpattiyo āpannassa bahurattiṃ paṭicchāditāpattiyaṃ
tika-vin06t:2242_2: nikkhipitvā dātabbo, itaro nānāvatthukānaṃ vasenāti ayametesaṃ visesoti.
tika-vin06t:2244_0: “Gāmassāti na vutta”nti vacanato kira gāmūpacārepi vaṭṭatīti adhippāyoti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2244_1: Vuttañca “ayaṃ pana viseso”ti. “Ettha aṭṭhakathācariyāva pamāṇaṃ. Yuttaṃ na dissatī”ti
tika-vin06t:2244_2: likhitaṃ. Anugaṇṭhipade pana “ayaṃ pana viseso, āgantukassa…pe… okkamitvā gacchati,
tika-vin06t:2244_3: ratticchedo hotiyevā”ti vacane heṭṭhā “antoaruṇe eva nikkhamitvā gāmūpacārato dve
tika-vin06t:2244_4: leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā”tiādinā nayena garuṃ katvā vacanato, bhikkhunīnaṃ garukavaseneva
tika-vin06t:2244_5: tattha tattha sikkhāpadānaṃ paññattattā ca tadanurūpavaseneva aṭṭhakathācariyena
tika-vin06t:2244_6: bhikkhunīnaṃ garuṃ katvā mānattacaraṇavidhidassanatthaṃ “yattakā purebhattaṃ vā”tiādi
tika-vin06t:2244_7: vuttaṃ. Kurundiādīsu vuttavacanena karontassapi doso natthīti dassetuṃ kevalaṃ lakkhaṇamattameva
tika-vin06t:2244_8: vuttaṃ, tadubhayampi tena tena pariyāyena yujjati, vinicchaye patte lakkhaṇe eva
tika-vin06t:2244_9: ṭhātabbato kurundiādīsu vuttavacanaṃ pacchā vuttaṃ. Payogo pana purimova. Yathā cettha,
tika-vin06t:2244_10: tathā sace kāci bhikkhunī dve leḍḍupāte anatikkamitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapeti, doso natthi,
tika-vin06t:2244_11: tathāpi sabbaṭṭhakathāsu vuttattā “purimameva āciṇṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Parivāsavattādīnanti
tika-vin06t:2244_13: upacārasīmāva gahetabbā, na gāmo”ti likhitaṃ. “Tasmiṃ gāme bhikkhācāro sampajjatī’tiādi
tika-vin06t:2244_14: pavāritavasena vuttaṃ. Na hi tattha antogāme vihāro atthī”ti ca likhitaṃ, “tampi
tika-vin06t:2244_15: tena pariyāyena yujjati, na atthato”ti ca.
tika-vin06t:2246_0: 108. “Visuṃ mānatthaṃ caritabbanti mūlāya paṭikassanaṃ akatvā visuṃ kammavācāyā”ti
tika-vin06t:2246_1: ca likhitaṃ. “Saṅghādisesāpattī”ti vuttattā ekova, ekavatthumhi āpannā saṅghādisesā
tika-vin06t:2247: 143. Dhammatāti dhammatāya, tathātāyāti attho “alajjitā”ti ettha viya.
tika-vin06t:2248: 148. Purimaṃ upādāya dve māsā parivasitabbāti ettha “parivasitadivasāpi gaṇanūpagā hontī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2249: 184. Tasmiṃ bhūmiyanti tassaṃ bhūmiyaṃ. Sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇampītiādi jātivasenekavacanaṃ.
